item.text: rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ba pu la pra bsha ma hAsU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na/ bcom ldan 'dus 'dam bu'i khrodan/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas ni bzhugs
ti de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bal pan lag
pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar manyan te/ donas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzar rgyu/
zhing gshegs te/ yas pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a ma srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs
so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yas
pa'i grong khyer du song la phyi nas sgo'i them pa la rkyang pa zhig ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang/ tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smos shig/ bi sa ra ta/ ba sa ra ta/ bas ra ta/ bis ra ta/ sas rgyas 'jig rten la
thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgos pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad
'gyu/ kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan
chos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa// chos kyis bsams pa/ tshas pas
bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa//
lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po
thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sar te/ bas rata/ ba sa ra ta/ bas ra ta/ sos rgyus 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka'
stsal to// muny+tsata/ muny+tsata/ ma 'ag cig/ yams kyind rnam par zhi bar gyur cig/ nits+tshata/ ninats+tshata/nagits+tshata/ nikits+tshata/ sangs rgyas
lha chen po/ lhab dang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shang/ dbang podangabacas pa'ilha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang/ dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang/
bcas pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong/ lha'abum phrag du ma dus dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ lha ma yin babum phrag dum dag kyang 'ong/ bcom ldan 'das la

mngon par dad pa'i 'byung bo 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang soms can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par bsgyu ra du khong gis/ ninats+tshata/ nargata/ nirgats+tsi ta/

nargyats+tsaMtA/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag lasagang dgu sdang bsams dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i soms dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srungabar bajug par 'dod/
padad ni'akhod cig/ lus la'ang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtsango can gyisabakAbastsal pa// su musumusumu/ sumu nusu u dusumu ru/ su mu ru/ sumur/ su mu ru
sumu ru/ sa u ru/ sumu ru tshur/ mu ru/ mu'u/ munu/ mu'u/ mu'u/ mur/ mur/ mu ru rim/ ya mi/ ba mi/ mi/ rimi mi/ mi/ mi/ ra mi/ mu'u rimi/ mu ru rimi/ mu ru'i mi/
u nu rimi/ mu ru'i mi/mu'u mi (mulu mi/ chu mi/ murami/ mu ru mi mu'u mi/ mu ru mi/ mu tshu ni ti/ ri yi ri ri/ nI mAn+ti/ timi ri/ mi ri'i mi yi mi'i/ mar ti/ pAsi mi ri ti
mInIti ]miti/ si sI/ silI/ kaM ka ra/ kiM ka rA/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra tsa/ kaM karA kaM ka nA/ kaM ka rA kaM kar/ kaM ka zla/ kaM kAnA/ kaM ka nA kaM ka rA/ kiM ka rA/ kaM ka rA//

ma kaM ka nA/ kaM ka nA/ kaM ka ra/ kA ka nA/ kaM ka nA/ kaMka rA/ kaM ka ro tIti ku ra shi kaM ka nA/ kaM karapisha/ kaM ka shi/ riri ro'i re'i tir te phu swA/ riphu'i phu riphu ri'u/ ri pu ramu/ ri khu ri su/ nA thA/ nAnAthA tha/

'a phu ri phu/ nAb+hatha/ nargats+tsha// ri phu ri phu/ nargati/ bA la ya ta/ ri pu ri phu/ ba la yata/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phanabar lhag par dgongs ba dang ldan ng//
byams pa la gnas ab/ thugs N+Dadang ldan pa// dga' ba la gnas pa/ gtang snyoms la gnas par gshegs kyis/ kluphranani gtsatasatwA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams

cad dor 'byung po thums cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub ba'o// tshig sasu bcad b 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang laser sna rnam chags pa// rnam bajoms drimamada mdzad cing// thugs zhi
gnod pa mim bde// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren bgang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar ba'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing// chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad por 'gyur// ston

pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gangagos bdeb mnga mdzad de// khyed la bde legasa mdzad pa ra'agyur// skyob pagang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'grob 'di dag kun// bu gcig
bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi nyen gyur cing// gling dadapung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed lu bde legs mdzad par
'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing sla bam mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyod la bde legasa mdzad pa'i gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phunasu mchog
don 'byor gyur cing// don grub chogs kyang grub pa de// khyed labang lags mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pasas rnams ni// nagasal bcas bar rab gayos shing// sems can thams cad rab dga'/

de/ rnakhyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dug rnam drug gsos gyur cig/ bdud yid mi bder gyur padre// khyed la bdalegs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor

ban// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung pa// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung ngo// khyod la bde legs byed par 'gyur// yid 'phrogagang gis mu stagasabyed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing// chogs kun dbang

ngu mdzad ba de// khyod labade legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyod la bdalegs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang// 'byung bo kun gyi de legs ni// khyod la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
khasodanamasamathu dag dang// lha rnams kyisanibasams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang pazhikhyed cagabade legs
shog khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// zhima'i gung la bde legs shing// khyed cag kun tubar//
legs shog/ khyed cag sdig bar ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor tagshegs mdzad kyis/ sngangasams ldan pa rnams byeracig/ snying rje'i bdag zhed can rnams 'khod/

sangs rgyas rangasangs rgyas rnams dang// dgrabcomaslob pa'ibadon tshagagis// 'jig rtenami phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'dizhigatong gyur cig/ sems can kun darasrog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed
( cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nd rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par mgyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir milcags gyur te// sa dang

bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams// spyad gu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa dbazhin bgyi'o zhes
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar manyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer dusong ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dadeg kyang smras so//
bsar// ba sa ra ta/ ba sa ra taM/ bis ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyisadagos pa/ rangasangs rgyas thams cad kyis
bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa// slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa// bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsam
pa/ chos kyis bsams pa// tshangs bas bsams pa// tshangs pa so sos bsams pa// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa// dbang pos bsams pa// lhas bsams pa// lha ma yin gyi
dbang pos bsams pa// lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa// lham yen gyi mjag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa// bis ra ta/ bis ra ta/ ba sa ra ta/
bas ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsalato// muny+tsata/ muny+tsata/ yams kyind thoms cad zhi bar gyur cig/ nargats+tshata/ nigatsAta ninats+tsata/ mgits+tsatu/
sas rgyas lha chen po// lha yang lta lha'i bla ma gshegs shing/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang/ dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang/
skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang/ 'jig rtan skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong/ lta stong phrag dum dug dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/ lham yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang
'ong bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dadapa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi rin gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyod la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nirgats+tsa 3/
nigats+tsatA/nigatsA// nigats+tsata/ myur du byed cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sngang ba'isams dang ldan pa de dugani phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'isoms dang ldan/
[E ]zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni'akhod cig/ lus la'ang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa// sumu su mu/
sumu sumu/ su mu/ sumur/ sumur/ su yur/ su mu ru/ sumu'u/ sumu'u/ sumu ru/ mur/ mur mur mur/ mu'u/ mu ru/ mu'u//
mur/ mu ru/ miri/ mir/ mi ri/ mir/ mir/ mir/ mi ri/ mu rumi'i/ murami ri/ murum ri/ mur mi'i mu rume ri/ murumi'i/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi 'i/
mu ru mi'i/ mur mi'i/ su rum ra/ mu'u mi ri/ mumunIti/ ri'i ri ra/ rArI mI nI/ di ri di/ mi'i mi ri mi'i mi'i/ mi rir hasimi rI ti/ mi risi si mI/ kaM ka ra/
kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka tsa/ kaM gtsa/ kaM karA/ kaM ka rA/ kaMka rA/ kaM ka nA kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka nA/ kaM ka rA/
kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaMka ro/ tIti ku ri sho kaM ka rA/ kaMka ra'i/ ri rir ri/ rir ti/ riphu swA/ ri phu ri phu/ riphu/ riphu/ phu/ riphu/ ri phu/ ri lu/ nAnA tha/ nunu tha/ riphu ri'u/ cha nA tha/
nirgats+tsaM// riyu'i phu/ rigats+tsata/ nga la 2 ta/ ri phu'i phu/ pa la ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa//
byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa// btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/ klu phran nir gtsa ta swAhA/ sangs rgyus kyi yang shas kyi mchog dang chos nyid
kyis lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka'astsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'adi dag nigrub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags ba// rnam 'joms
drim med mdzad cing// thugs zhiganod pa mnga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren ngagang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing// chos rnams thams cad
ston pa de// khyed la bad lags mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga'a mdzad de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'agyur//
skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugasakyis 'gro ba 'di deg kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legasa mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba 'di//
sems can kun gyi rtan gyur cing// gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ gtsang zhing slu ba ma mnga' la// gsung
gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dba' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing// den grub tshogs kyang grub
pa de khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing// sems can thams cad rab dagab de// khyod la bde legs mdzad
par 'gyur// byang chub snying poragang zhig gi/ sa dag rnam drug g.yosagyur cing// bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lobaskor ba na// 'ang ga
pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba// thub pa'isAn pa gang byung de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'brog gang gas mu stags byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing/ tshogs kun
dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyod la bde legs mdzad// brgyabyan lhar bcas bde legs dang// 'byung po kun gyi bde legasan// khyod la rtag tu
[ra ]spyani gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang// lha rnams kyis nibasams pa yis// khyod kyi den 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyod cag bde legasashog
rkang bzhi byed cag bde legs shog/ khyod cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs sheg/ nyin mo bde legasas tshan bde legs// nyami'i gung la'ang bde legs shang/
khyed cag rtag tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig pa ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor tagshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan ba rnams byer cig
snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang// dgra bcom slob pa'ibadenatshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'din gtong gyur cig
sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bdeb 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nd rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cagi

gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyodagyur cig
'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyuratshang zhus te gtan la phab pa//
@#// rgyugar skad du/ ar+ya tso ribi d+hAnasnamAm d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang
nub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tulus 'phags ri la gshags
pa'itsho/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bosami rgod phal bo che zhig rgyung mnas mthong/ mthong nas kyang skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das mi rgod dag cig go/ bde bar gshegs pa mi rgodadag cig go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dasa'ajig
lags so// bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshog ti mug chen po'i
tshogs rab tu gzhom pa 'di bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ anule mo pa ta lam/ anu lo ma pa tilo ma/ a ti ke/ pra tiM ke/ paM ke/ a ti paM ke/ go ra/ gan+d+ha ra/ bats+tshA li/ ma taM gi/ puk+ka si//

rimi mi/ rid+d+hi/ ma tse b.li titsorapra dan+tu/ bits+tshan+tu/ b+ha man+tu/ ma mi yan+tu/ ya bdadagran thon muny+tsami sAhA/ kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun tu srung ba dang/ mi rgod thams cad dang/
ba ri sul gyi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang/ gseb lam srung ba thams cad dang ( gnod bar sems pa thams cad kyiskang pa bcing bar byas so// rmugs par byas so// rengs par byas so// jiltar
rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ jiltar rdzamakhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar/ mi rgod rnams 'darab r gyur cig/ rengs par gyur cig/ mgo rmongs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'adas kyasi
de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun bo yi'angs// bcom ldan 'das kyisagasusab la mngon par bstod do// chog nishing kun ng/ bong bu'i spu bregs te// bumogatsang masabakal
ba'i srad bu la lanashu rtsa gcig bzlasabarjod bya'o// mngan gos kyimatha'agal 'dud pa bor ta bde bar phyin na dgrolabatabya'o/ 'dinagrub pa'o// 'phags pa mi rgodo rnam ba'ajogs bzhes bya ba'i gzungs
rdzogs so///@#// rgya gar skadadu/ Asarba an+tarasaMg+hA sa d+hA ra Nin/ bodaskad du/ 'phags bab dugacod pa thamasacad selakhagazungs sngags/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dbasams dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba/ phyu gnas doN+Dagazungs sngags 'di
'dzin ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ bzlas brjod byed pa de la dug dang mtshon gyis 'jib dang/ ltogs pa dang/ mtshon brgyab pa dang gcan gzan ma rungs bas bab dang/ chos tshog pa dang/ chu 'ag
dang/ 'go ba'i rigs gzhan ma bab dang/ mdze'i nadadang/ gso mi rung ba'i nad yabarang/ g.yang la lhung ba dang/ gzhan gyi byanadang/ zas kyisakhas bar/ bdag rang gis gsod
dang ltar gshas nganadu'achib bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyulo// phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang gnang/ bzlas brjod byed g de lasadang mam ba'agags
pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje gazungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ bzlas brjod byed pa de la las

kyi sgrib pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang// shes bya'i sgribapa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// obatsan+tamahA'o khA NahU~MphaT a pra ti ta ba la hUM/
phaT/ sarba big+haM azhanA ya'i/sha kar mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod n 'grub pa'o// nges par 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa bar du gcod bo thams cad sal ba'i gzungasaM
sngags rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa lanAmad+hAr Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog
gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gse thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khung bu brtsegasapan bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa na byang chub
ga sum dpa' kun tubazang po dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ sa'i snying po dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang lagazhi
la rdo rje dang/ byams pa lasogs pa sa bcupa 'ba' zhig dang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adus 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ sha za ma rus ba dag gis mind dang/ sku
phyugs nad dang/ yams nad dang/ rnam par 'atshab dang/ dus yin pa'i 'chib dang/ sdang ba dang/ rmilam ngan pa dang/ dusan yin pa'i rlung dang/ sar ba dang/ sa g.yos pa

lasogs pa byung ste/ de dag u0f8bzhabara mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das cang migasung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sku'ib spu'i khung bu
nas 'od zer molce rab tu 'bar ba byung ste// 'dodapa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa la thug pamalce 'bar ba gcig tugyur to// de'i tshiganyim dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lhamam dang
lhanAn dang/ lhang ngo ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lham dang/ lhan n dang/ lhang nges yin no// klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ sha za lasogs pa rnams ni rlung drag pos bdas pa'i shing/

bzhin no// de nas bcos ldan 'das kiMchos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtogapa zhes bya bting nge 'dzin lamanyamakhar gzhag ste/ mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bshig nas zhabs kyi busao la brdabus pas thugs kyi bdag nyid
kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khra bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa dag byung sta/ thabs las byung pa'i khro bo'isprul ba dpag tu med pa dang bcasanas niamamakha'am lus pa 'od kyis 'gas pa'o/ 'od kyi
dkyil 'khoradaganabazhugs ba tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen ngo dang/ drag po chen po bzhi po dag hahU~MhU~M/ zhes bya bas skag par byed ba/ 'dod
chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtumug dang/ sar sna dag 'joms pa/ klu dang/ gnod spyin dang/ sha za yi dgas la sogs pahayaM/ zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to//

gsung gi bdag nyid kyi brnyan pa'i sku can zhabs phyedas la pus mo dang mtha bong btsugs pa/ zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugasang sa bzhugs pa'i khro bo brtan ba'i sku can/ shes rab kyi bdag nyidi ral gri

ma 'od dang bcas pas 'od kyis bgos pa dag sprul to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi sngags sas pa/ mas man+ta'adz+dzaN+NaM/ atsal kanan tsan+d+ra mahAro

'a Na/ spo Ta ya hU~M badzratIka kharba hU~MmahUMmaM/ zhes barjod de/ phyag rgyanilag pa g.yas pa khutshur bcangs te/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrungs par l gri'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas skor du

mtshams gcad do/ namasaman+ta badza/ a tsal kan na tsan+d+hamahAr kha Na/ spo Ta ya hU~M/ a mr-i ta hU~M// zhes brjod do// phyag rgya ni lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung mtho bas mnan pa ni
rdo rje rtsa gsum pa'i phyag rgyasta/ g.yas nas bsko'abagegs bskrad do// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba bsrungs pa nidamar po'i yi ge raspyi bor bsams te/

rnam par dag ba'i mi'i 'dus brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus che bod dang bcas pa' sgrom ste/ namasaman+tabadzAN+NaM/ kha tsam kan tsaNAmashArol Naka te/ sarba bil teT+Tho/ sha mu kha sarba
tag ta hUMoMrak+Sha/ zhes brjod de/ phyag na rdo thal mo sbyar tamadzub mo gnyis kung mo'i rgyab tusbyarasmin mtshams su bcathar bya'o/ de nas khacoldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pachen
bo'i srung ba sus banishudang bzhi'i rnam pas bltas te/ mthas man+tabat+taM/ atsal ka natsaN+Dam hA roN ka tats+tsha/ sarba big dats+tso/ bi shwa mu khe sarba ta thA ga tAhU~MaM/ rakA ma kA/

ba le saro ta thA ga ta pra mnargadzra hUM hUM phaT trA tha zla tha/ a pra tid de swAhA/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgyani rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la chung mo rtsa sprad de/ srin lag gnyis brkyang nas
mthe'u chung gnyis dung zhig bkag la snying khar bcas tesrung ban yum gyi sta/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ ma rungs pa thams cad dran ba tsam gyis 'khyer bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byams pa'i ting nga'adzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ kha zas kyi bya brug bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ gzhib ba dang/ btung ba dang/ bldag pa la sogs pa dang/ gzugs
dang [0f10 ]sgra dang/ dang/ lo byi brag 'khyen gyis brlabs pa mdzad de/ osawad+harmatAsi ta[%, ]/ zhes byas pas dag par byas te/ o a kr-i ta o hU~MhI/ nas byabs ni'ad/
ba'i don du'o// omasarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo kitisam+b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hU~M/ zhes bya bas lanabadunabadun btab ste bsdos pas tshim par 'gyur ro// phyag rgyu ni mchog sbyin gyi thug rgya'o//
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa/ snabar 'dod na sngags 'di brjod bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya// gam tsat+tabadzrapA Na ye// namo badzra kro d+hA ya// dIt+tota ka Ta b+hi rawA ya/ as

mus la pa ra shu pA hasta ya/ tad+ya thA/ o amr-i takuN+Dal kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+habats+tshA/ han han/ grib+hakriSh+Tha/ gardza gardzu/ ba spo Ta ya/ sarba big+haM bi nA ya kAnaM ma ga Na pa ti

btaan+ta ka ra Na sAhA/ zhes bya ba brjod do// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la kha nang du bstan te mdzub mo bsgreng la brang du bstsal la phyag rgya bcings te/ gtor ma gtang zhing 'chag pa'i dus su'ang de
bzhinano// toreg bya ba dang khrus bya ba rin po che'i bum par drizhim po'i nul/ ma sa man+ta badzrat+taM/ a tsa la kun yi a ma ta/ zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste/ lag ba g.yon pas
bum pa bzung nas g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la/ rimo can gunang du a bsams la nublugs te/ oshud+d+hadud+hesho d+ha nA ye swAhA/ zhes bya bas khrus bya'o// da skad
cis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la'o// do nas rgyal po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang/
'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang// 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyilha rnams kyis me tog dang/ rjod ng/ bdug spos dang/ lha'i zhal zas dang/ lha'abu bo dang
bumo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shangartadabag tumar pa dang/ mchod pa 'i yi khyad dpag tumadapa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang skor ba rgya chen po dag byas te/ byang nub
sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs cig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spro ba dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam ba mkhyen
nas bsam gtanadang po lamanyam par gazhag ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te dga' bar rtog ba tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan dang bo nas gnyis ba la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtsagacig pa'i
rtog dpyod spangs te dga' bde tsamamo// bsam gtan gnyis panas gsum kha la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs te bde ba tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi
palamanyam par gzhag sta/ tshor ba 'bar zhiba'i bde ba tsam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan n rnam par dag pago/ byams pa dang/
snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyis ni byang chub kyisams kyi rgyud spel ba'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar mtha' bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o// namasam
badza?N+NaM/ d+hamad+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma koTahaM/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgyani 'di'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo/
mganyis sgrung bko[0f8b]'phags pa ma ga yo ba'i gzungs las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te/

snying khag nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi sa bon bod kyis nam mkha' kun khengs par bsams te/ sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral ba'o zhes bya pa'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phal ba dang
'grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro bsdu dang bcas pa'o// de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdan 'dam nas skyas pa'i dri ma med cing yongs su rgyas par tshogs kyi bdag po' stong du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro pa//

'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi stang dunam mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyis 'gangs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur
te de dag las bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po/ rnam rtog thams cad yongs su bcom pa// dri ma mad cing gzhon nu'i sku'o// de'ang gzhon zhing skarig rgyus
la pan/ dpar na bus pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa'i lus lta bu ste/ de'i sku mdog namathing nag tu gnas te/ dpe ran dbyar gyi char sprin nag po 'amadog bzhin du gnas pa'o// nam mkha' ma
khus ba thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pan/ dparan rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no/ dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni/ debar na gang a la kA'i 'bras bu bzhin
no/ sku cung zhig 'gying ba dang gu lo bani/ bar nadabag bsam gyi shing longs 'dus brtol bzhinano/ khabasakharkyang bskum du bzhugs pa ni/ dbar na gyad kyi 'gros bzhin go/ spyan
gsum shin tudamar ba ni/ dper na pa la sha'am tog bzhin go/ spyan stong 'og tu blta ba'i stong 'og gi bgegs sreg pa ste/ dbab nalham yin gyi bya gtom za ba bzhin go/ mtshab gtsigs
bzhi/ dbo na zla ba phyad ba bzhanano// ljags shin tu 'khyug bzhu/ dang ra na nam mkha'i glog bzhin// sminam khro gnyer dubasdus pa// dpar shing 'bri sha'i 'o 'bazhinano/
phyag g.yasan ral gri bsnams pa// dparanagaza' chen po'i 'od khyung ba bzhin no/ sbrul gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni/ dper na rgya mtsho'i mching bzhinano// de lta bu'i sku des ni
tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bo dag dang/ phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams dbang du sdud pa// lha dang/ klu ma rungs pa dang/ srin po dang 2 shozad ng/
grul bum dang/ lto 'phyel sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dag go/ de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs laM/ nam/ saman+tabadzaN+DitAN/ amo g+ha tsaN+Dam hAro Sha Naso Ta ya hU~M
tram ya trA ma ya hU~M/ tA ta haMmaM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// des na 'tsho ba dang/ rnam bar 'tshab dang/ sdang ba dang/ rnam bar sdang ba dang/ log 'dren
dang rnam par log 'dren dang/ srin bo dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ grul bum dang/ sha zal sogs pa thams cad zhabar 'gyug/ rlung lasagyurapa dang/ mkhris pa las
gyur ba dang/ bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'bras dang/ shu ba dang/ g.yanapa dang mdzad ng/ khrumabudang 'brum bu phra mo dang/ rnams nyin gcig bdang/ nyin gnyis ba
dang [0f10 ]zla ba phyed dang/ ldang dub pa dang/ yud tsam ba'i mis dang/ rtagapa'irims las thar bar 'gyur ro// sa ngagadang/ stag dang/ domadang/ drod dang/ spyang ki dang/
sbrul dug can dang/ sbrang bu dang/ sha sbrang dang/ bung gnod pa las thar ro// rgyal po'i chadang dang/ dmag dbubagi 'jigs pa las tharago/ rkun po dang/ thanadang/ gza' mi 'thab
cing rtsod ba las thar ro// chu yis 'jigs pa dang/ ma yis 'jigs pa dang/ sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang/ lce 'bab pas 'jigs ba las thara'o/ ral gridang/ shak+ti dang/ dgra ste
dang/ mdung dang/ mda'adang/ mda'akho tshe dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las zlar 'o// 'chib dang/ dusam yakha ba las thar ro// mtshams med pa lnga
la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun dag par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang// yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro skyo gnas dang/ chu lamatha' khob dang/ dbang bo ma tshang ba
dang lhatshoring bo dang/ log par lta ba 'dzin pa dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung gnas mnyes pa med ba dag tum 'khyugo/ gzus sngags 'di ni dus gsum gyisangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/

lanatsag brjod ngas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro// 'di brjod ba'i gang zag des na chos nyid kyi lam rdo rdzolta bur myur ba nyid du thob bar 'gyur ro// de nas rtabadun pa'i stangadu rnam par dag pa'i yi
gnam mkha'am lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa bsams te/ byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir haMsar po mag tu'o// srog gikham dun[W]nag bo bsam par bya'o/ spyi bor chos nyid rnamapar dag pa'i yi gabasams/

tasngags 'di brjod par bya'o// nams man+tabadzrapA NitsaNAmahA ro ShA NahU~M/ zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar// gungalo bsgrungaba'i rgyab tamadzubamo cung zad bkug la/ srin lag kyang de bzhin dubyas te
rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs pago/ gsar la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye bra gnas dang/ 'bras dang/ gro dang/
so ba dang/ til la sogs pa dang/ zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ khar dang/ gsaradang/ dngul dang/ zangs dang/ mu tig dang/ byu ru dag blugs te/ 'brugasum pa'i
sngags kyis byin gyis brlabasanas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ nam / sa man+ta ta zlagatany+nyo // bi shwa mu khesgyu sarba thA khaM udag te/ sgyuraN isogagan khaM/ zhes brjod par bya'o//

sma phyag rgyani mchog spyin gyi phyag rgya'o// nam / sarba tathAg ta a ba lo ki/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ratuM/ zhes bya ba 'byung po kun mchod bcu'o// de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par byago/ nams man
bud+d+hanaM/ tsaNAm hAr khA Na a sam tri samam hAsamaya/ sarbad khaM swAhA/ phyag rgyathal mo sbyar la gsol ba gdab ste dam tshigagaso khago/ 'phags patshigakho ba'i gzungasalas le'u staganyisakhako
denas dam tshig 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun 'bras bu dang/ lam dang/ sgrub ba'i khyad par te/ gang nas brtsams te khyad bgyisa mtshon

cing nam du'ang mi 'bral bar bya'o// tshad mdaba'akhyang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tasgom zhing smon lam chen kholagadab par bya'o/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya'i rnyanargyun du
bcapazhing bral bar mi bya'o// lha dang/ blam dang/ byang nub kyi grogs 'khon gnas 'khrug pa'isams sgang ngo// srog gis btus pa'i sangs can Thams cad khyams dang sIng cha ston dusong bas//
gnod pa dang rnam par 'atsho ba spangs tinam dophar mi bya'o// ser sna spangs tesems can la sbyin pa sbyin bar bya'o// sems cal gnod pa dang mkhara'atshob spangs pa'i tshul khrachisanabago

rang la rnam bar 'tshob la bzod bar bya'o/ ngang dang gzhan gyidon sgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o// rnam par g.yeng ba spangs te bsam gtan lamanyamakhara gzhug go zhul ba dang snang ba kun rang bzhin
gyis rnam par dag ba'i don la ma 'ongs bar byago/ dmatshig med cing mi gnas pa la bsam gtanadang/ ting nge 'dzinadang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya la sog sa ba kun bastan cing bshad par mi bya'o
srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pa la phyin caleg pa dang/ brdzun du sgrub ni tshangs par spyod pa dang spyad par 'dod pas spang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams dang/ byang chub tu sems

bskyod ba dang/ dam tshig dang ldan pa la gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o// thuna mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan bar bya'o// khro ba dar/ bab col du smra ba dang/ khad lud dang/ bshangag ci 'dor

ba dang/ drim 'khru ba dang/ skadang sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang/ drang ba dang/ dri'i zhim ra dku zhing gnamapa dang ldan brtsams cad spang bar bya'o// khang pa ni spos kyi khang ba yid du 'ong ba
gtsang zhing drim med pa dag bkrashis pa'i sgo shadzadubastanapa// gsang skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa 'am/ bram ze'i khyimamam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ lha khang ngas/ ribo'irtsa 'am/
bya skad sgrog pa'is 'am/ dgon ba kham/ bsamatha' 'am/ spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i nus skyang nul byas la/ rtswa'i snyan batang ste gnas par bya'o// khri la 'dug pa spang bar bya'o// zho dang
khomadang/ mar dang/ la dudang/ labanadang/ snum 'khur dang/ 'khur sku dang/ 'bras dang/ 'brasazhan la sogs pa dag bsang ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o/
shadang/ changadang/ sgog pa la sogs pa dgu pa'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o// zla ba dang/ skar mdang/ tshes grangs la sogs pa yar gyi ngodag la dkona mchog lagase'ababab la bsgrub
par bya'o// reb dang/ rdza ma dang/ rtsub pa dganyim yin no// 'dod nga 'i don du'ajam zhingeganag ba lane'agal ba mad do// dus rtag tu yi dam la dang ba bskyang pa'i phyir byams pa'i sar pa dang ljon
rabs bsgrub par bya'o// sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni kha dog shin tuganag pa ste/ nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnam lcags kyi 'khor bsnams bgo/ rdo rjechags chen n mdog dmar po//
chagasapa dar chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o// rdo rje rnonapon ljang khu ste/ 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i bdag nyidalcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje'abarab namadog dmar po ste/ mi shes

pa dang mi shes pa 'joms ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i brag 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khro bon ser po ste/ klob dang khro ba'i bdag nyid kyiral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o// jo rdzagatum chen n mdog ljang nag ste//

btang snyoms dang btang snyomasasu gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sbyin gyi zhags pa 'dzin bgo/ rdo rje thabs bdag ni duba'i mdog can/ bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdza rngabasnams pa'o// rdo rje stobasachen

mgi bab ste/ dman pa dang dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ rdo rje rgyu'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/ rten 'brel dang rtenacing bsrel par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi ba con 'dzin/
ba'o rdo rje rab 'byed ni sna tshogs 'phrin las kyi mdog can/ mtha' dang mtha'alas grol ba'i bdag 'dican gyi rdo rje rtsagacig pa bsnams pa'o/ dedag nis bcu'i bodag nyid can m 'bal ba'i sku las
rab cu'agro ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u stagasum pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisabyang chub sems dpa' byams pa la thun mong du de dag pa'i
phyir du'i chog gsungs pa/ gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la maN+Dal mda' gang ba byas te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i skyang nul byas la/ ma tog sngon po dgram par bya'o// de nas bum
ba gsar ram/ dngul lam/ zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi tshad dubyas te/ der rin po chagasaradang/ dngul dang zas dang/ byu ru dang mu tig dang/ rnam pa lnga/
gzhug par bya'o// sbrang rtsi dang/ bu 'amadang/ kha radang/ zho dang/ 'om dang/ maro rnams gzhug par bya'o// nas dang 'bras dang/ so ba dang/ til dang/
(gro dang/ cu rtse rnams gzhug pa bya 'o// sdugang dang/ gur kum dang/ dzA tidang/ sug smel dang/ ka ko la dang/ lishi rnams gzhug par byago/ tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/
duruka dang/ gla rtsi dang/ rgya spos dang/ ga buralasogasakha'i dri mas kyang gzhug bar bya'o/ mtshodang/ rdzing dang/ lteng ka dang/ 'bab chu dang/
lu ma bkod ma rnams kyi tshu'ang blugs la/ ba la 'ama' sa la dri'i chus bsang bsamagul ba bcings tegazhag par bya'o// dridang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa'ishangal kha rgyan
byas te/ dridang/ spros dang/ me tog dang/ mar ma dang/ byug pa dang/ lha bshosadang/ rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o// 'byung po thams cad ba'i gtor tshabang cha
bdunanAm lta la sogasapa bya'o/ nam saman+tabadzAN+NaM/ a tsalatsaN+Da ma hA ro pa taM/ sarbabI gyoT ya/ badzrad+d+haM khaN+DahU~M zhes khyabasa mtshams rnams bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin du

srung ba'ichog rdzogs par bya ste/ bum ba lagazungasakyathig pa kha tags nas rnamakha' dbabangashesayosasubasgyur pa'i bum pa la shrI zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha drog dbatshad dang bu'i rim pa 'o/ thugs
kyis bon las byung ba'i nga com ldan 'das dond khon nyid bsamanyam par bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa 'dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ lags ba'i gang thag dang bcas pa gdan sang go'i
stangan sna tshogs pa'i gdan pa d+madang blaba'i stongan bzhugs pa'o// chos nyidadang ldan pa'i rnam pa drug gis bcom ldan 'dasabasamabar bya'o// chos nyid dar/ soms dang/ sams kyi rnam pa
dang sgra dang/ sgra brnyan dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugasabarAnadang bcasapaskur mgadan pad+madang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sna'i stang du bsam sta/ thugs kyis bon las ral gri 'od dang
bcas pas naam mkha' kun khebs pa'o// da las pa dud tshar gcod pa'icom ldan 'das kyisku bsams te/ mchod bsabacos ldan 'das lamachodapabya'o// nam saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/

a At+yAhU~M/ drakha rasata kA ra pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o nam saman+tabud+d+hanaM a A tsahU~M/ sarba de ba tAa tsar+ya amr-itad+ha ra ya satwA/ zhes brjod b.ru bya'o// namasaman+ta bud+d+hanaM
ohar b+ha ga bAn/ sarba tu d+ha ra pAdziti swAhA/ zhes brjod pa rabya'o// nam/ sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ oAhU~M/ d+hamad+hA tu a nu ga ted+hupahU~M swAhA/ zhes barjod ng pu'o// nam/ samanabud+d+hanaM/

o AhU~M/ ma hUm gyi phyug ta puT+Ta hU~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ namasamanabud+d+hanaM/ o atsAhU~M/ sarba tathA ga ta a tsi pa taub+ha ba gagani nats+tshanir+ya Aleka hUM hAhU/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ dmaDa

samanyebud+d+hanaM/ ogatahU~M/ gagan samayag+hAn+tehU~MAhA/ zhes barjod par bya'o/ namasa'abud+d+hanaM/ ha rasarba tathAg ten wa pUdzan pa ra Na'i hU~MAhA/ zhes brjod bar bya'o// namasamanyakhan+d+hanaM/

a b+hi smar yi/ sbar Na i maM ga ga na khaM/ d+harma d+hA tu A kA kA la samalta ba/ sarbatathAg taparishud+d+hamaN+Dal/ mamadra Nid+hipU dzanam ba len rnyamadz+hAtu/ ad+hi nangatsa hU~MswAhA/ zhes brjod de// rdo rje dang dril
bugasil bar bya'o// thal mo bkal mdzubamoganyisagung mo'i rgyab tunung zhig bkug la sbyar/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol lam bong cung zhig pa kug pa ni yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o// so la'o

rnams gungamol bstan te cung zad baku gnas agungamo bsgrung ba/bdug spos kyi phyag rgyu'o// sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol tan du bcug nas mdzubamomatho bos mnan pa ni ma tog gi phyag rgyu'o/ mthe bong dwangagungamo'iso'amo

rtse spyad de lhagam khu tshur bcas pa nam ma'i phyag rgya'o/ mi 'jigs pa'i phyag lag pa g.yon pas mkhrig bteg panadri'i phyag rgyu'o// thal mo bkun pa'i zur sbyar te mtha'achungaganyisagashibs nas bsgrung ba ni lha bshos

kyi phyag rgya'o// spyi bor lag pa bskor te thal mo khong stong sbyar nas dgrol bani rgya chen po'i mchod pa sta mchod pa'i sa rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha mos rdzus sbyangs ba'o// namasaman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ab+hAb sra pa mudag
tAnaM/ ma brakyi kabud+d+haar shAb kAnaM/ kho bo d+hisatAnaM/ dkatshul pra tatisha naM/ bod+his d+hAya/ mahAsatAnaM/ tadu[% ]/oM kha kha khAhikhA hi duShA sAhA/ kAs kra asazhus la pa ra shudAg

has ya/ tsatud+d+hAdza/ tsatsamakha/ 'a tshatsa ra Na/ gtsayagats+tsal/ saMNabin+d+haM/ g+hA tuli kri tAnaM/ sarba b+hU tag+ha yaM ka ra aT+Ta hA sa nInI ti bya glu tsamabs// ku ru ku ru sarbad+hamAn+taM/ ts+tshin+datsin+da/ sarba man+ta

b+hin+dab+hen+ti/ pa ratshan+ti/ a kaNA ya sa kaNA ya/ nirmathanematha/ sarba duShAn/ bro desha ya dra reng sha la// maN+Dal many+tse b+hab sa skya dzIpi ton/ ka rakur ku ru ku ru mamasarbakAt+yaM/ da had ha/ pa tsapa tse/
mAsilaMb/ sa ma yaM/ anustsar hU~MhU~M/ spo Ta yaso Ta ya/ sajakhaNA'i myur ka/ hab+ha ga ban/ kany+tsi rlabasi/ mams cakhaMsAn+tu// amo gtsaN tarob Thaspo Ta ya hU~M/ drom rngamahaMkaM/
zhes bdunam tishu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems drang ba thams cad l phyag 'tshal bar yags la/ las dang/ rnam par smin pa dang/ 'jigs ba dang/ gnod pa dang/
rnam par batshab dang/ nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs bzlas par bya'o// de nas gtobar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshog damasapa'itshu'agyis dbul ba'ago 'phags pa mig lo ba'i gzungs las la khazhigs
dunas bcom ldan 'das kyisangasaris kyi chog gsungs la/ shing ba la shin tu dri med dal bram ze'amagatsang sbra dang ldan pa'ikhrus byas te/ dkon mchog gsum la gsol kha
btab la brtag par bya'o// rigs nganadamangs rigs lasogs pa'i ras dgan sbyang bar bya'o// rasadagur kumadang/ gla rtsid aka la sogs ba'i nusabakrus tadagarar bya'o// des
sngags 'di grig 'amar sa la bris nas gdags par bya'o// a Ai I u A222lA a a o au aM a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsatshadzadz+ha1/ 2[R7]lha Na/ da thadarnyan/ pa pha balhag/
ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa hikA/ zhes bya ba bris tadagod ba ra bya'o// de nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o/ namasaman+taban+d+hanaM/ tsanam hArongaN/ gloT pahU~M/ trathag/
bya@#// daMnam/ zhes khyapalas thams cad 'grub pa ste/ gur kumadang/ tsan dan dang/ gla rtsi'i chu la bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o// de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag ba byas te/ bram za'i/
sma rigasakyis bri bar bya'o// tshonanagasaradang/ dnguladang/ zas dang/ lcags rang gis bribar byab 'am/ yang nadakar rtsidang/ mtshal dang/ ldong nges dang/ ba bla dang/ spang mdang/ mthing shun

dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ rdosol dang/ snag tshe dang/ de lasogs pa'i tshon rnams la a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ tsan dan dang/ rgyu rtsi dang/ rgyaspos la sogs pa rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan bdun

brjod de bribar bya// nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tsaN+DamahArol ta Ta ya hU~M/ tu thAhaMmaM/ blakhyehU~M/ o[']abi rahU~M/ khatsalamaM/ zhes barjod la brib bya sta/ khyad par bzang po 'dzom pa'i dusasu tshul/

khrims dang ldan zhing dag ba la kha zasabyin te spyanadabyabar bya'o// phriba'ang de bzhin tu/ spyan 'byed pa'idus su sngags 'dabarjod do// nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tsaN+Dam hAro 2Naspo Ta ya hU~M/ trA thA haMmaM//

gag nab rak+Sha Na/ kuru Nas ya/ sawaM ta thA ga tatsak+kha o AhUM swAhA/ zhes sbrang rtsi gisar gyi thur ma la phyugs la lan gsum du byug pa bya'o/ bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongasasu zin pa dang/ 'drimakhanal
jiltar 'dod babazhin du sbyin par bya ste/ gsar ram/ dngul lam/ bas sam/ rwa 'am/ rdob dag las byed na'ang de bzhin du bya'o// gzugs dang sku'i khyadabar gyi rang bzhin dang/ rang bzhin ma yin

ngas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya sta/ rang bzhin dang ldan pa la bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni yongs su bsgyur nas ban gyis brlab par ba'o// de nas khyad par bazang po 'dus su khang pa ba'i rnam lngas
byug par byas te sa ris dang/ thang ka dang/ po tidang/ glegasabam la sogs pa maN+Dal gyi stang dubazhugs su gsol to// spos dang/ ma tog dung/ mar mdang/ dridang/ lha bshos la sogs

pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par dang ga tu med pa bshams te/ gtor ma'ang de bzhin du'o// gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ bdan dang/ bla re la sogs pa'i ng bri bar bya'o// de nas khro bo'i skudang ldan pas sngags

brjod par bya ste/ nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM a mo g+ha ahi/ a pra tig taa tsal tsa ta A naM tAka NaM/ tiSh+Thahi/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tadi tadi/ ta Ta ta Ta/ big+haM g+hA ta ya// ma ya/ khrod la/ spo Ta ya sa taMtsam/
anu b+hAny+tsa ya/ akuru/ ad+ha hAd+ha hanaMkra ka rtaka ta ma tam ta/ gaMhaMmaMmaM/ a te b.laad+himahAmun bshan/ naT+Tan/ a ba sha ya a lo shi ya/ a tsale tsaha/ taTataT/ dmadam/ phaT phaT/

ces 'bumabarjod par bya ste/ lha'i sku gnyis lan bye ba'o// 'a ba sprul pa'i sku sgyu/ sngon ngani di bzhin shes par bya'o// a ka ru dang/ durukadang/ tsanadan dang/ gaburadang/ gla rtsi dang/ rgya lcos kyi tshul/
namo rat+tatAyA[']pa/ nam shAkyaman maM/ tathAgatasgyu= arnyad/ somyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ mun munemahAmun/ oM dza ya dza ya bAkyisha swAhA/ o bAkya bi dzag/ [0f00]khAkyeniya/ obAkun m
o pa []daMnam/ oMAhU~MhamaM/ zhes bya bas sku khrus bya'o// de nas rol mo bsgrags bar bya'o// rdzas la stags nyi shu rtsagacig bzlasanas/ nam saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ daMmaM/

ba so ar+ya nutanan taprab+hasA ra sug shud+d+hA/ rnyamad+hAtuswa b+hA ba At+ma ko'ahaM/ zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dpag tumed pas mchod de/ 'di'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
tugarjod pa'i gzungs sngags so// nams ya d+hI kA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tAnaMtsaNatsaN+Da/ bal ba la/ ba trab tra/ shAn+taM shAn+taM/ ha laha la/ bar ba la/ marA NamarANabadzrad la so Tam/

ti ta shi kha ra/ saman+tabadzANidzA la dzA la/ namosku te/ amog+hatsaN+DamasAro' NasasaM ra Nar NahaMhU~Ml badzraspo TamaMswAhA/ nam yat+tIkA nAM ta thA ga tAnaMsarba tra a pra tihatabAstad+harma tAb lin+taM/ oM
samasaman+tato anaM tatrab stishAsan/ harahar/ smarasar/ bi ka ta rAg/ bud+d+had+hamataM/ sa ras ra sam ba lA ha sa has/ tra ya dral/ ga gnam hAb ralaka NidzA la dzA lan sA ga re

swAhA/ namasaman bud+d+hanaM/ namasarbabud+d+habod+hisat+tAnaM/ o ar/ bi ra dze/ mahAbi ra dza/ mahAbar dza/ sA ra tasur te/ trayi tra yi/ bi b+hamani/ saM g+haMdzan ra ma tisid+d+haa twaM hU~MswAhU zhes brjod do/
'dini de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs te lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyura'o//

dbazhinagshegs pa'i dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'igazungs 'dis lha dang/ sngags dang/ phyug rgyu bcings pa rnams nus pa dang ldan par 'gyuralo// lha dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya rnams kyis ltas dang mtshan
ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro// srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gzungs 'di rjes su brjod par bya'o// dbazhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig gsum bkod pa'i khrus

'di la brtson par bya'o// namasaman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tad+ya thA/ o i hoshud+d+hi shud+d+hami ho shud+d+hewuSh+Tha/ rihou0f00 shud+d+heshud+d+he/ a shumaM bi shud+d+haM shud+d+hes ma ya sAhA/ zhes brjod do// 'di'i dbazhinagshegs pa thams

cad kyi dmatshig gsum bkod ba'i gzungs ti/ chul sngags bzlasanas khrus byas na sdug pa kun bdag par 'gyur ro// rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ mtshan ma ngan pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chibab dus/
byed par mi 'gyur ro// rims dang/ 'brum bu dang/ lha gor dang/ 'phras dang/ shu ba dang/ 'go ba'anadadang/ 'tsho ba las thar par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa ma g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u lnga pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor le'i rnam pa

gsungs pa// dang po chos kyi byings kyi rang bzhin gyi e'i rnam pa can gyi nam mkha' 'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhulta bu ba dan can yaM las byung ba'o// chu'idakyil 'khoragangs ltar dkarab 'i zlum po bum pa can
khaM lasaso// sa'i dkyil 'khor gser gyi mdog grubazhi rdo rjecan laM las byung ngo// de'i snyingadung ba rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i tshad dang ldan ba oM las byung ba'o// chu'i dkyil

'khor dmar bo gru gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas ba raM las so// de'i nang dubru kha dog sna tshogs byung ba'i khang bu brtsags pa/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang bcas pa'i nango ma sna lnga las grub pa ni shel dang bzumadang
byu rudang/ in+d+ra nIl dang/ gsar las grub pa'o// de'inang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i gdan no// shar gyi 'dabam nishel las grub pa'o// lho'i'adab mnabo cha rlu las grub pa'o// nub kyi

'dab ma ni byu ru las grub pa'o// byang gi 'dabamani in+danI'a'o// mtshams rnams kyang shal dang/ bskrurludang/ byu ru dang/ in+d+ra nIl las grub pa'o// dbus sun tshogs bdag glang sna'i stang du sna tshogs pa'i

'dam skyas dang nyi ma'i gdan no// shar du brgyabyin/ lhor lhachen po// nub tu khyab 'jug/ byung du thag bzangs dris so// shar lho mtshams su tshangasar// lho nub mtshams su gzhonanu/ nub byang du dga'

byed/ byungashar du kun turgyal bsto/ lha chen po brgyad kyisnying du bad+ma dang zhima'i gdan no/ yig ra las byung ba'i rim dang/ maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyimtshan matsho dang ldan pa las/ bcos ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mig lo ba nam mkha'i mdog can/ zhima'i snying po la pus moreg cing bzhugs pa// rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan bdasazhamamakha'am lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa//

phyag g.yas naral gri bsnams pa// g.yonan klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnangs pa// thubu zhes bya pa'i sgra 'don pa'o/ shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs lag rtsi las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma tsadang

ldan ng las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba shes rab kyi mdog can/ nyima'i snying po la pus mo rig cing bzhugs pa// rin po che'i rgyan daro ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'dasamamakha'

ma lus pa 'od kyis bgengs pa// phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa// g.yon pa na klu nor rgyas bsnams pa// du bu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// lhor bcom ldan 'das 'a bo chab 'igs yig cha las byung ba'isha

rab kyi mtshan mad+ha dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag nyid mi g.yo ba pe cha mU'i mdog can/ rima'isnying po la bus mo rag cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcotshaldan 'adus

nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa// phyag g.yas ral gri bsnams pa// g.yon na klu 'argyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o// thu bu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// nub tubcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs yi g.yaMwA

byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan mu0f00 dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo byu ru'i mdog can/rima'i snying po la busamo rig cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcos
ldan 'dasanam mkhalo ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa g.yas na ral gri bsnams ba/ g.yon na klu tshulha bsnams pa// phu yu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'donapa'o/ byang du bcom ldan 'das las kyi'igs yi ge daM las
byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan mahaMdang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das 'as kyirigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi migayo ga in+danIla'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pusamoreg cing bzhugs pa/
rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan po'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'am lus pa 'od kyis 'gongs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa// g.yonan klu rigasalcan bsnams pa/ phu bu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'donapa'o//

shar lhomatshamasasu raM las byung ba'i tri shu la rigyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ g.yas kyidang po na drishAl/ g.yon gyi dang bo na klu mtha' yas kyibu/

g.yas g.yon gyi 'og man rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// ltenub mtshams su khaM las byung ba'i dbyug tho khaM gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i gshin rdzagashad po bo DUmu'i mdog can/

kayas kyi dang po na rdo rje'i dbyug to// g.yon gyi dang pon klu ngaga'abo bsnamasaso// g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma gnyis n tho ba phur bu bsnamasapa'o// nub byang mtshams su calas byung ba'i lo tsAgana'i mtshan

ma dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i mgrin byu ru'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang po na kha TaM ga/ g.yon gyi dang pon klu pad+ma chen po bsnams pa// g.yas g.yon gyi 'ogam na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o//

byang shar mtshams su hUM las byung ba'i brtson shugs mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ga in+d+ra nIla'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang pon be con/ g.yon gyi dang pon klu stobs kyi//
ba rgyubasnams pa/ g.ya sa ga la na gyi tha ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o// shar lho'i gru chadal lham bdug pa mamadog mthing kha bog khor 'dzin ba dang ldan// g+hanub tut+tagog tog namadog dkatsho

mo tog 'dzinapa dang ldan ng go/ nub byang du lha moganam dmaramo mar me'adzinapa'o// byang shar du lha mo dri chab ma ljang khu dro chub snams pa'o 'dedag ni gzhon nu lang tshol bgab/ mdzes ba'i tshul can hU~M

las bskyadapa' bya'o// shar phyogs su lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar bo lcags kyu bstsams pa ste/ lho phyogs su lha mo gsar gyimadog can zhagasal 'dzin pa'o// nub phyogs su lha mo dmar mo lcags sgrog/

'dzin pa'o// byang phyogasasu lha mo ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa'o// de dag nicung zhig khros pa'i tshul can gyi phaTalas bskyod par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi'ang bzhin las yongs su gnas par bsgom bar bya'o//

dunas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang dag pa ba brjod pa'i gzungs 'digasungs so// dmas man+taban+d+hanaM/ mo tsaN+DamahAr 'a NahUMphaT/ rnam saman+tabadzAnaM/ lokya bi dza ya hU~MpaT/ nam/ sa man+ta badzAnaM akro

d+ha ka yatshwa ta ka hU~M phaT/ namaHsa man+ta badzAnaM/ badzra krod+ha ha yaglib/ yulu hu lu hU~MphaT/ namasaman+ta badzahU~M/ rlatha a mo g+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Dal hU~MphaT rnamaTha sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ dratha badzra/ a tsal tsitar ha

dahahU~MphaT/ nam saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ rdatharata a tsa la pa tsa hU~M phaT/ nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tAtha pad+ma a tsa la tsa khaban+d+ha hU~MphaT/ nam gtsaman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tratha amo g+hakarma atsal na na hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba
gsus te/ lhadang lham yan dang/ mi'am cidang/ lta ba phye chen pa dang/ lhadang/ dang/ ma rungs ba dang/ sdang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdig pa ngaman nga 'i las rnams
bdag par bgyu'o/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'igazungs las le'u drug pabo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor nang du gzungs sngags 'dabaka' stsal to/ namasaman+ta
bud+d+hanaM/ tsaahArob khagatsal kan/ tsaN+DatsaN+Da/ natanata/ ma ta ma ta TA/ mo Ta tamaT ta/ sha sha ta/ Ta taTata/ han han/ dgud ha/ mahaha/ mahAsarbapA paM ka' hasahas badzahasaM
atshosgo kun sags/ martayata/ gardzag// ban ban+d+ha/ panahan/ ti ti/ abishayaabishaya/ mahAman+ta pa la ka/ dun dun/ tinitin/ khad kha dasarbagaM/ mAras mA ra la/ sarbadut+tAnab+hak+Sha

b+hAkA/ sarba bad+d+haM/ kun ka/ ma hAbasha/ sarba pA paM/ mahA badzra/ spyoTaya sa tsal/ haM ba 'arag+han ta ka/ shIny+tsamasaMhitaM/ namasaman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ mahAtsaN+DamahIro' cha ya/ amo g+ha e hi/ a pra
tig ta A hi/ a tsa le tsa taazhan kanaM/ tib+hUti/ tsar tsar tadiTi ta/ taT taT/ g+haMg+hA ta ya/ mA ya/ khAd yi/ spro ba ya/ satsami/ azhu bats+tshA/ a dzA kuruku ru/ a ha sa/ a dan/
kraka tamaT/ ma Ta ma Ta/ haMhaM/ a ti pa la a tim hAgu chab shan/ nanaNAta/ a bi sha ya i tsalatsita// samatra/ anu t+ta7/ katsetataN taT/ Dam kham rgaha/ maMmaM phaT phaN hU~M/ rnams man/

btsa/bat+taM/ draam g+ha tsacha matArob Naso Ta yahU~M dram ra dram ya hUMdzuTahaMmaM/ o ba len taphyob wisAhA/ nams mat+tabadz+dzAnaM/ tsaNAm hA ro Sha Na/ a tsal tseta/ spo Ta ya sU tsa ya hU~M/ a sa man+ti ka tra ta//
mahA ba la/ kar mahU~M/ oM kaM/ haMg shud+d+ha pulakya tu byed chub dzra/ a pra ti ha tub lo rgyu/ na mo 6la ya tratA/ atsAhasanamaMhAsAhA/ zhes gsungs ma thag cu'adzam bu glingen gnas ba'i lha dang/
lha ma yin dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye la sogs ba thams cad sreg cings ba 'gyel bar gyur to// danas chog gsungasas/ lcagasasna lnga las byas pa'i

ral gri khru tshad gsum pa byas te/ sngags kyi 'phreng bamaM hU~M zhes bya ba bkod la/ khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyi maN+Dal byas taM/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i drig zhag ste/ gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag tu brjod cing
bzlasan ral grinam mkha'al 'bags par 'gyur ro// dunas g.yul du zhugs n dpag bsam gyi shing lang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te// g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i lhung
bzed byas te/ mahaMzhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de/ gser dang/ dal dang/ zas las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ dbal babudang/ me tog dang/ 'khor lo dang/ nya dang/

dung g.yas su 'khyil ba rnams dang/ byu ru bcug pa bam/ yang na zas la byuru bcug la gzungs sngags 'di grog 'am las la bris te/ khongapa 'amamagul du btags nas gsang sngags bye ba bzlas na lhung bzed nam mkha'
la 'phags te gsol ba btaban 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste da len pa'i shing bzhinano// nam mkha'i tIta'i lce dang/ 'gapa'i mog dang gnyis cha mnyam pa dang/ lcags

sna gsum gyi phyem la khwa ta'i khrag gis ril bu bdunanamanyi shu rtsa gcig byas te thod ba dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags hU~MmaM zhes bya bas pad+ma la bskor to// gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+manam/

mkha' la 'phags te/ de mid bugs dang bral ma thag gi snying gi khrag mas dang sbyar te/ mig nasnang byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na thams cad mthong zhing thos la/ khar bcug

na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// namasaman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sarbatathAg tabya ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya// pAkye don wanitsakyur ba shed+ha ya swAhA/ rdza phyugs la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nasamanyis
telham dus la/ haMdang maM rang gi rkang mthil la bris te/ gzus sngags bye ba bzlas na lhamanam mkha' la 'phags te/ rkang pa la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugasanas gonan gar 'dod par phyin no// nams man

bud+d+hanaM/ o hrimasAya kr-i tasAhA/ zhes bya bas nagamakha' la 'gro zhing 'apags te/ bya rgod bzhin du'o// skye ba bdun pa'i sha dang/ bya rgod kyi sha dang/ rtsangs pa'i pig dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la

lde gyi byas te/ gzungs sngags bye pa brjod de lus la byugs nas ra mnyeb dang/ nyi'u shing pa dang/ bra ma ka ra'i mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu rnams nang re la srang re cha sbrang rtsi dang ba ser skya'i 'om rnams M btang ste
zla ba gcig skyabaslabs nam mkha' la thogs pa med do// nag po'i mig gnyis dkar po 'am/ byi ba nag po rnab gnyis dkar po 'am/ pha wang dkar po bam/ mi mang nas sa dkar phebasreg chags la
rmabyab chu'akha phor dublugs pa la gzungs sngags bya ba bzlas taglud la/ de'i mig gnyis mnor bar bton pa grib ma la bskams nas ma rul ba'i phyim la sngags 'di btab ste/ g.yas g.yon ma nor bar
phyugasan thams cad mkhyen bar 'gyur ro// 'bags pa'i spyan dang ldan bar 'gyur/ man spres dang/ gi'u wang dang/ stag ma'i shun pa dang/ nyamakhris dang ru rtadang/ phug ron gyi mig dang//
lce dang/ ga retsan dang/ rtog pa rnams la ri'i bu byas to/ khas pa'i ga bur ril bu re re la gzus sngags haMmaM zhes bya pa brjod da/ ga 'u nam mkha' la 'phagasas/ nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/
nam yaMn ma hA'i bi nin hri/ zhes lan bdun btab nas byin na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bya rgod dang/ bya gag dang/ khra dang/ stag dang/ spyang ki dang/ wa dang/ de rnams kyi mchob dang//
sdes ma dar/ bram ze'icus pa'i thal ba la gzungs sngags bzlas te bsgrub pa byas nas dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang ser ba dag la gteran sprin rnams 'thor zhing ser ba dang/ 'brug dang/ thog la seg
pa zhiba' 'gyur ro// gcan gazan thams cad dang/ sha za thams cad dang/ khyi dang/ phag dang/ rngamo'i rtug pa dang/ gumul dang sbyar te dud pas bdugasan dem kun 'bros par 'gyur ro//
'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzus las le'u bdun pa'o///mo tsaN+Dam Aro kha NahUM phaT/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ lan cig brjod pas
kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyur ro// rams nyin gcig pa dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ zla ba gcig pa dang/ ldang dub pa dang/ rtag pa'i/
mis dang/ yud tsam pa las thar ro// 'brum budango/ lha gor dang/ shu ba dang/ me dbal dang/ g.yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan cig brjod pas kyang mtshams med pa lasogs ba'i sdig pa zhi bar
'gyur ro// ragi khyad tshig gdang po dang/ gnyis pa'i dang par bcas bani// gsum pa dag gi lnga par ldan// bzhi pa yin bzhi pa dang// lnga ba dag gi lta pago/ ut+tarAnams kyi bzhi pa dang/ mthar gnas

pa yas gnyis pa ni// oM gyis mtshan pa bri bya ste// uts+tsha rnams kyi gnyis pa dang// bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang// utu ya gi bzhi ba la// u yis brgyan cing thig lerab cas pa'o// sde tshan lnga pa dag gzhi/

dang bo'i yi ge spangs pa dang/ bzhi pa dang por bcas pan// snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag go 'khor lo rtsibs bcupa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te/ khyi nag po'i srid pa'i nang du bcug la/ gzungs

sngags lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas tecungs kar gyis rlab par bya'o// de nas klu yod pa'i gnas su khyer la rang gi lus la gla rtsi byugs te// rlumag tuthod pa bcug la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mor

khralAl/ nag sha rnamahAgog Na hU~M phaT/ na mo b+ha ga ba tabut+tA bI nA la/ tad+ya thA/ phu'aT/ b+har b+ha ra/ mi li mi li hU~MhU~M phaTathaT/ phyag rgyanasor mo rnams brkyang ste/ mthe'u chung bkug la mthe bos/

mnan tu bskor bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA la/ namashANAb kyi d+ha phyagrwa ban mi mi li tsi li g+ho/ ban+tul/ kod+ma ya/ badzalam ya/ ma kan pa/oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dzul pra dzul/ spu Ta spu Ta/

saNanA ga ban d+haban d+ha/nA gnas 'asar/ bas rasarba duSh+Thasrid la/ sha ra NahU~MhU~M phaT/ phyag rgyani lag pa'i zu gnyasi gshibs te/ srin lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol la mdzabamaganyis kyis mnananaso mthe'u

chu gnyis gshibs bsgreng la gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis gshibs te spyi boragazha gnas / sngags lan bdun brjod de ldang bar bya'o// gu gul dang/ yungs kar dang/ shing kun dang/ dri chen dang/ nya'i mkhris pa

dang [0f10 ]sgog skya dang/ shu dag rnams sbyar telus la byugs nas rdzas kyis srung ba'o// rgyas l gyi me la bsregs te bdugasan se' ba dang dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams zhi bar 'gyur zhing gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur//
zho dang/ bo ma dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ bu ram dang/ kha ra dang/ 'bras yos dang/ dung dang mtshal dang/ rgya mtsho'i lhu pa la sogs pa dag 'khar gzhong du blugs te/ yungs kar lagazungs

sngags 'di brjod cing klumachod par bya'o/ namo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam N+Da badzra kro d+ha ya hU~M hU~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM a nan+ta ka/ taSh+Tha ka/ shaM kha pA la/ bA su ma wApad+ma/ o ga ta pa la wa ta/ kaskortogs phu
swAhA/ zhes brjod pas klu rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// char dbab par 'dod na dri zhim po'achus maN+Dal byas te/ sbra tshil la klu'i gzugs sor mo nyashu rtsa lnga pa byas nas

maN+Dal gyi steng du me tog gtor la gzus thag btags te/zhag par bya'o// sAngo kharagong gi de gro ga la ga'u wang gis bris la gzhug par byas/ nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po sa 'u'i lcagams byab par byas
nas gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/ o susu pra tibadzradu mi li mi li ba ri sha ya/ ba rin ya swA hA/ zhes brjod de rang skya bar gnas par bya'o// gal te glu rnams kyis char mi 'babason klu rnams kyi
mgo a lnga ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gos par 'gyur ro// skyes kyi maN+Dal byas te/ spes kyi ma la gzugs bsazhing gzungasaM sngags brjod pa'i spogs pa'i tshiga'o// drizhim po'ami la bu ram dang/
sbrang rtsi dang/ kha ra dang/ til la sogs pa'i dgang blugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/ o tsats+tsham wA'o 'a Na hU~MAku ru swA hA/ zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa tshu/
g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u brgyad pa'o// pa//de nas 'dam skyes pad+masna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi steng du a las byung ba'achu'i dkyil bakhor/ de'i steng du mu gyis bon las byung ba'i shes
rab kyamtshan mtshu dang ldan pa las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal mgon po'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis len pa lta bu/ gser btsomingam gur kum gyi kha dog 'dra ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems
nyid pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa la phyag g.yas ban ral grinam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pas pa ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha ba la gur
kum gyis gtor ba badrab 'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyilam krung gis bzhugs pa// phyag g.yas pa naral grinam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon ban ut+pa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kan

'dzin pa'o// lho'i bad+ma la 'jam dbalagasung gi dbang phyug sku mdog mthing kha zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba/ semar pa'i skyolamo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na 'grinam mkha' la phyar ba/ g.yon pa

na'akhyor la thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o// nub kyi pad+ma la 'jam dpal rnon po snyam dog byu ru bcag pa lta bu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa// phyag gnyis n ut+pa la gnyis

btsAms pa'o/ byang gi pad+ma'i 'dabam la 'jam dbal shes rab ral gri skumadog ljang khu la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krungagis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang pon ral grinam mkha' la 'phyar ba/

g.yon gyi dang pon ut+pa lasdong bu dang bcas ba thugs kar 'dzin ba'o// g.yas kyi 'og man mdaba'adzin pa/ g.yon gyi 'og mnaran po cha'a gzhu'adzin pa'o// sku de dag ma rig pa'i mun ba thams cad bsal ba'i nam

mkha'am lus pa'i 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i sku'o// o d+harmad+hAt+yA bA kIhA'i maM/ zhes brjod pas shes rab dang ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// rin po tsho'i bum pa du gang dang/ gur kum dang/
a ka ru dang/ tsanadan dkar po dang/ gla rtsibasags pa dri zhim po banublugs te/ na mas man ta thA ga ta achud/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha/ tingathA/ o A b+ha tAl/
d+hAr Na ]bishA saMb+ha ba/ agats+tsaya A gats+tsha ya/ gulu hu lu/ bri bru [ ]/ hU~M hU~M/ jin dzika many+dzashrI la/ suphyogs so// tar ya mahaM/ sa dubo phaT akr-i tod bsam yasam
ud gru khe/ sarba pA paM me sha la sAhA/ zhes gzungs sngags 'di bum pa banub lan bdun brjod de khrus byas n sdig pa thams cad bdag par bgyur ro// dbang po rnazhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nam
sarba tathA ga tA ya/ gtad byusamyakasaM bud+d+hag/ mtshany+dza'i la/ bo d+hisat+tAya/ mahAsat+tAl/ tadut+tA om ljag+ho khahan han/ ba tsa pa tsa/ ma ma Na ma tha ma tha/ bi d+his la/ ka raka ra/

rtsa tututA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza a bi sha ya a bi sha la/ tsakra tut+tha/ tuN+Da tun/ spyi zas spu sa/ srid pa sA d+hani/ nams bo d+ha ni/ pra be sha ya 'du ta la tuta/ ki te kritaM bra ban+d+ha pra ban+d+ha/
a be sha a bosha ya/ hamaM sarbabagaM AhU~M phaT phaTasAnA/ zhes bya bas nad pa la 'bras kyi sim 'am/ til btab ste khrus bya'o// gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas las dang/ nyon mongs ba dong/

rnam par smanepa'i sdug bsngal las wa'i par 'gyur ro/ kara'ishang game la sbyin sreg byas zha'ang zhib 'gyur go// ral gri la btab g.yul du zhugs g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// smyung ba dang ldan pas skugazugs

kyimadun du bsgrub par bya zhing bshags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// gro ga'am ras la bris te sdug bsngal gyis nyen bal btags pa byago/ skud pa la gzungs sngags btab stemadud bu byas la srid kyis gdungs
bal btags taM/ 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am bu mo dag sbyang bas 'dug ste/ la dam du 'don na lha dang/ klu dung/ gnod sbyin dang/ sha za la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi
'byung ngo// gzab dang/ rgyuskar dang/ lce 'bab ba dang/ dus ma yanib 'i 'chib las grol bar 'gyur/ stag dang/ dom dang/ drod la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang/ rlung dang/
serab dang/ dusam yin pa'i si g.yo ba rnams 'bar 'gyur ro// yid gzhungasashang thos pa 'dzin pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags song ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa
med pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcig gam/ lan gsum mam/ bdun mam/ nyi shu rtsagacig gam brgyu rtsa brgyad du brjod ra byed// de'i lus la mdzad ng
phol migadang/ 'bras dang/ shub dang/ g.yan pa dang/ lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang/ mig dang/ rna ba'i dang/ sen ba lasogs ba dag mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so// gdengs
bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum ba mdzad d/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'jug ba'i 'od cesabya ba'i tingang 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems can namyol ba dang/ mdegs dang/ dung bgro dang/
glingabazhi'i mi'i 'jig rten du bod kyis khyab par mdzad do/ de nas rgyal batshonapa bzhi dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ thobakhral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul

rtsa dbang byed ba'i gnas man chad khyab bar mdzad do// bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go/ bsan gtan dang po las langs te bsam gtanaganyis pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ gnyis pa las
langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam bar gzhug go/ gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi ba la mnyam par gzhag go/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lamanyam
par gzhag go/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las las nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ rnam shesamatha' yas skye mched las langs nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la

N+NaM mnyam par gzhag go/ ci'ang med pa'i skyemachod las langs nas yodamin medaman skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go/ de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan
'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tubazang po dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ sgrub pa rnam bar sel ba dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug dang/
phyagan rdo rjod ng/ byams ba la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga' 'o// lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma lan dang/ namanakha' lding dang/ ma bam cidang/ dritha bcas ba'ajig rten yi ra sa ti/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mgayo ba'i gzungs las le'u dgu ba'o//'phags ngam g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
rgyagar gyi mkhan po d+homa'amitudang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus togatan la phab pa'o//@#// rgyug skad du//

Ar+ya bar kho d+ha rA dzA kalnga la glu tan+tanam/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa rdo dzakhrobo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na

bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyin m mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying po byin gyis brlabs pa'i stod du rin po chesna bdun las grub pa/ lha'i gzhal med khadabye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor ba'i dbus su

dpag tshad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtsigs ma shin tumatho ba/ kun kyang rin po tsho duma'i khri pad+madungasangags ma thob/ dbu rtsayin patshozurams kyi mchod rten bad+ma/ 'khor 'dang gdugs mtho bar drangs

ba la dar gyi spyangs ldang ba/ de'i grib ma sagazhi la bkod pan byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i bzhon pa las babs nas nang dugshegs pa/ sna tshogs dril bu dang/ ba dan dang/ rin po che'i me tog gi
'phreng ba dang/ dra ba dang dra phyed pa dang/ rdzayab dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ rdo rje phyed pa dang/ chu 'phyang shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes kha/ sgo khyud byams dang/ sgo glags dang/
rin bo tsho'i mi la dang/ gdugs la sogs pa du mas khyab pa/ bon po tsho'i pha gubatsugs te mdzes par byas b dum de thams cad kyidabus su 'khor gyidakyil 'khor chen ba dang lhan
cig cu bzhugs so// debang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshog sani'aphags pa spyanaras gzigs kyidabang phyug dang/ 'jam dpal dar/ kun tubazang po dang/ byams pa dang/
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ zhiba'i blo gros dang sAtshog sabakram ba dpaM/ mkha' 'od me togo 'chadapa dang/ nam mkha'isnying po dang/ gzugasamadzes dag kha dang/
sa'i snying pa dang/ phyagar rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal dang/ rtathul dang/ bod srungs la sogs pa byeb
phrag bzhi dang/ grags chen snyan ba chen po brgyabyen dang/ tshas pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug dang/ lus ngan dang/ gshin rjod ng/ dga' dbang phyug la sogs pa
cha lha'i rigs sum brgyadang lhan cig tuchos kyi rnam grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyanathosang/ bag naslong bal sogs pa rnam pa dum dong ldan ba'i
'khor rnams la dbye/ngas pa tha dad kyi bsam bdang 'thunaba'i bkodar chen bskyed pa dang/ cho 'phrul dum bsgyur ba dang/ 'od zer dum 'gyed cing thabs cig tu bzhugs so// des bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jus

bzhan du 'khor la gzigs nas lcags kyi dbang bo bkram ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa phyagan rdordzol bka' stsal ba/ yi ge mang tshig dag gi sgos// sngags dbyibs chos su byin brlabs kyis//

yi ge sgra tsam byed dam gcig/ mngon sum rjes 'jug ring thung dang/ dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshonags mtshan// sa bcu ba rol phyin bcu bdag/ dbang bdu don 'acu rnam pa bcu// mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dris chos/

byams dang thugs rje chen po dag/ dbyangs gcig gis ni sngags su gyis// sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'bazhi dang// yid 'phrog dpal 'byor dbang phyug dang// mthu stobs dum bskyed pa dang// rtag gnas thob dang don

nges thob// rdo rje bla na medasems bskyed// mdor na gang gis gang 'dod pa// bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa gsolo// chos su bla na med pa sgrogos// 'khor lo sman med pa skyel/

la gri gnamed pa zung// pad+ma bran med pa chongs// rin chen bla med gsal bar gyis// dkyil 'khor tshul du spos nas kyang// mchod rten tshul dubasprubar gyis// lha klu gnod sbyin dril dang// lham mkha'
ldang mi 'am ci// srin po sha za brjedabyed tshogs// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs 'gyur ba'i// rnam 'phrul du ma 'di sgyur cig/ gsung mchog de skad thos ma thag/ lag na rdo rjemathu bo tshos/ dga'
mgu thal mo rab sbyar te// snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol to// gser dang rin chen lnga po las// rab mchog ri bor gyur pa las// 'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang// rtags su la nga dag 'dzin ba de
lta/ rnam par shes dang phung po bzhi// 'byung ga mkha' dag bsgrubs pas// lha dang phyag rgya'aphrin las su// sngags shes rnams kyis bzung byas nas// btul ba'i la
a shes byang chub sa// khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub patsho/u0f38kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches// sku las sna tshogs gdangs bod can/'od zer du mkhyung nas kyang//

gzhi dang snying po me tog gis// brgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas tshe// sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// 'jig rten skyong dang bdud kyi tshogs// ma lus pa rnams brgyal bar gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal
'dar ba'agyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// tshogs rnams shin tuskrag par gyur// de tshe phyogs bcu'i zhing namasanas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu nas// khro bo chen po'i tshogs byung ba//
'od thar rtsa mes drangs nas su// zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lcags// 'od zer tshogs kyang rab bdusangs// dpa' ba'anyid du thim par gyur// de tshe 'od de'i byin rlabs las// mkha' la sgra 'di grags
bar gyur// shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang du gzi brjid chab zhugs slad// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// rgyalaba'i sras bathams cad gshegs// dri ma med pa'i dmachos mchog/ gsang

sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba// thosanas byang chub 'dus ma byas// 'jig rten mgon pakhornyes par gyur// de nas log na rdo rje tshogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang// snyim pa me tog bkang byas te//
gtonas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas// dungazhing gus pa'i tshul gyis su/ dbus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba 'debs// mi gnas ye shes che ba'i mchog yon tan rgya mtsho'abyung ba'i gtso// mtshan nyid thams ]

cad rab brgyan pa// mtshan min spungs pa'i thub ba che// drimed dag ba ji ltar lags// gsang sngags tshul du spyod ba ci// 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang// 'jig rten mgon po ji ltar 'gyur// bdag cag
rnams la sman rab dang// 'gro la thugs rdzache mdzad phyir// mgon po bcom ldan thub bache// yang dang yang du bshad dugasal// de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtsobos bka' stsal pa//

gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pas// bdag gzhan phan don la brtson phyir// legs par nyon la yid la zung/ yang dag yang dag mtha' men tshul// de ni nga yis bshad pas
srog gcod ma byin len brdzun 'khragi/ tshig rtsub dbyen dang ngag bkyal sa// brnabasams gnod sems log lta chang// dri ngan pa'i zas skom dang// srog can sha khrag log 'tshor bcas// slob dpar

dge 'dun mchod rtenasogs// khyad par yul can yo byad dang// dman zhing nyam thag thog dgu pa// glegs bam 'tshong dang chos kyi thong// g.yang sa ral gri sa dug sogs// me 'obs ltar mthong spangasanas kyang/

rnam par dkar la sogs pa rabya// yin 'drimachod sbyin rtsol dang/ nyanadang 'dzin dang glog ba dag mchod pa dang na kha ton dang// de dgasems dang sgom pa ste// da karab cu lam la yun rajis dang// nub
btsus rgyun mi 'chad du babad// gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems// shel ltar dri mamed pa'o// mchog 'di spyad pas sdug bsngal tshogs// myur du gcod pas dge ba go/ chos/
la/ bdag med dang mnyamanyid dang/ rang sems gdod nas dag pa gang// skya badra 'du byed med pa dang/ zag bcas de dang bral ba las/ byang chub phyogisames ma lus pa// chos nyid bdagamed spyod pa'i//
chos dbyings ye shes mngon byas nas/ ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsol ba// 'dus ma byas kyi byang chub ste// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi las so// 'dod pa'i khams sogs yon tan la// shin tu bde
la spyad pa spyod// sangs rgyas mu stegs can rnams kyi// lkog tugyur pa gsang ba ste// bskal pa bsam yas dpag med du// brlabs dka' yas zab rgyachen rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du//
lus ga yod la gang gnas pa// dbyer med tshul du skyobs pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis sngags su brjod// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku// yon tanamatha' dag rdzogs pa// bden pa gnyis la
gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgon// la lar 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs// la las dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs// la lar srin po sran ma'i gzugs// la lar 'gro ba
bzang bo'i gzugs// chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang// seng ge ltar gzigs mdzad lo sogs// snatshogs du ma mdzad pa na// rkang gnyis lha min rnam gnyis sogs// 'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o//
rtag dang 'dra dang nges med pa'i// gtso bo bsam pasagyur pa rnams// 'jig rten phal pa'i mgon po ste// gzugs byad kha dog tha dad nga// yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gis// gras ma byung ba mchod 'os//
thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag/ rdo rjecan gyis bzhengs nas kyang// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol// 'dren pa gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// sngags

zhes pa ni gang gang yin// phyag rgya zhes n ji lta bu// ting 'dzin zhes nAji ltar b shad/ lus ngag yid la ji ltar gnas// dbyer med tshul du ji ltar skyob// bdag la phanaba'i don phyir dang// gzhan la

brtse phyir bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal ba gtso mchog ni// ljags kyi dbang bo bkram byas te// tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis// rnam rtog zad phyi'i 'di gsungs so// sA pa ni snying rtsa ba'i sngags//

las kyi sngags su gyur ba ste// snying po brjod dang sa bonano// nyesnying ye shes gachog dang// gsang ba'i snying pa zhes grags so// las kyi sngags gnyis yin te// bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang/

sbyoratshogs grub par byed pa'o// phyag rgyalag pa'i 'du byed dang// rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba 'o// rtags su mtshon dang 'debs pa dang// 'gyur ba med par byed pas na// phyag rgya zhes su bshad pa'o//
rang gi rtsa gcig sems bsdusan/ sems la lhag pa'i chos 'babs pa// den ting nge 'dzin zhes bya// de ltar de dag la rten nas// snga ma'i gnas de longs gyur nas// sgo nga bral ba'i 'dab bzang ltar/
lus 'dim khab lacher song nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du//rgyal ba dam chos mnyan nas kyang// rgyal sras kun la bshad pa dang// skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas
kyang she sa bya ma lus phyogs khyab pa// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o// sems dang yid 'dres pa'i tshe/ ye shes bde bar shar ba// dusagasumasangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dbyer med tshul
duskyob ces gsungs// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtogs pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// lhag par gnas pa'i don yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//zhibs btul dka' bgegA
( chen dang// log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sems kyi bye brag thugs chud nas// de dang gzugs 'dral gzhom pa'i phyir// rtog med nam mkha'i lam gnas te// rdzogs sangs gduladaka' 'dul
mdzad sku// rab 'phags khro bo stobs chen dpal// sas rgyas kun gyi sras kyisras/ mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir// rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal// tshangs sogs lha dbalus can kun//

de la rtag tumachod par byed// rgyal bas byas gzo rgyal sras kyi// snyen rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// ye shes rdzogs nas ma gso' sa// thob pas mi g.yo ba zhes ba// zas kyi rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste//

tshar gcod pa nikhribo yi// sngags kyi bden tshig sla bas// nyan thos bdud tshogs kyis ma g.yo// rtog med bdud rtsi khro bas rgyal// rdzu 'phrul bskyod med mi g.yo ba// debazhi nyid kyi snying po mchog/

stong nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku/ chos dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas// sprul 'dis srid pa'i khams sbyango mdzad// mkha' ltar dri med spros bral bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung// spres
med nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// tha snyad tsam du gsang sngags zhes// brjod kyang ga gi spyod yul 'das// skyob pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs// sems med rang bzhin stong pa nyid// slu badrar
yade kyis sgem pa yin// dngos med mnyamamadzes 'dod don rnams// gsang sngags mgon 'dis brjod pas stsol// mu stegs bdag dang srog gang zag/ gtsobo skyes bu khyab gnas bas// 'khor bo rtag rtog
nga rgyal rmos// lag pa bzhabs bcings sdug bsngal skyed/ bdagamed srog med sems can med// byed pa med cingagatso bo med// khyab gnas med cing dngos po med// rdzas lasogs pa'i rang bzhin
med/ leg rtog srad 'ching zhabs gcad pa'o// dngos med sna tshogs gzugs bsgoms pas// dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang 'thob/ daphyin ng khyad par goms pa'o// khrubachu bur sgyu'adrar sgom//
stong nyidi las lhang ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog sdig btsungs las grol nas// bamamed ye shes go 'phang thob// phung po khams dang skye mched med// kun gzhimid de gang zag mad//
gzung 'dzin med de bcings med pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad// kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i// stong nyid byang sems sgyu'adra bar// bag yod pas nai rtag bsgoms na//
byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char// yid bzhin nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che/ mkha' ltar shes pa med pa'i sku// sngags spyod byang chub sems dang ba yi// byang chub se/
kyi sgom pa 'thob/ ngo mtshar gsungs te thos ma thag/ khro bo rnams kyis gtso la bstod// rtag tudag cing drimed pa// rnam rtog rgyun 'gags kun rtogamed// brtag rtog med la zhugs pa/
yi dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos kun g.yo ba med pa khyod// spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas/ kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtog/ rang bzhin spros bral khyod phyag 'tshal// sems
can sna tshogs phan don du// mdzad spyod sna tshos/sa gsungs pa'o// dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung// rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// mun pa phra rab rdul spangs pa 'gi/ sprin bral nam
mkha' dag pa ltar/ mgon po khyod skashel sgang ltar// kun rtog spangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// spres med nam mkha' ltabu la// dngos po thams cad dang bral bas// phung khams skyed mchod shin tu dag/
ye shes rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod// mkha' la 'jab shar sna tshogs ltar/ gtso khyod dag pa'i sems can gzigs// ngan 'gro kun sgrol dpa' chen 'khrugs// ge chachen pa phyag 'tshal bstod// chos nyid
las byung snying po'i// yi ge gcas pa bzi ba che// sems can sdug bsngal sa gzhi la// mun 'khrigs sel la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngags mchog gtso bo'i gsang ba 'dis// rgyal sras chos 'phel

shes rab bskyed// bla med ge'abad myu'agrogasus// gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos kun gyur dang bcas pa yi// las dang skyelas rnam par grol// rgyal ba med bdag nyid 'khrungs/ dgatso mchog khyod la
