phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos med ye shes me lce yis// 'dus byas ri bo kun bsregasanas// chos dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal// blamed sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i dond thugs chudazhus//
'gro la phan phyir chog gsungs// gsang sngags leg par spyod pa dang// ser sna log par goms pa la// 'dod pas naon pa'i sems rtog gis/ sngags ba yi dgas gnas su skye// dang pos mar me me
tog dang// zhal bras gtor ma 'phreng ba sogs/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang yo byad dang// ma yi lus dang kha zas la// 'tsho zhing sgrub pa'i bar du gcod// mi sdug nad skyed lo tog 'tsho// gnyis pa
gnod sbyin badra gyur nas// sha khrag chang la sbom zhing rgyug/ thos bsam sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing// nad skye tshe len log lta skyid// rig sngags 'chang gi gdon gzhim phyir// sgrub pas 'bad
de sngags brjod bya/ sngags mthu bskyed pa gtor ma dang// sbyome sreg phyog rgya sngags bcas dang// mnan pa'i las kyisonags me ltar// thogs pa med par 'joms par 'gyur// de dag stan
byed lha yin te// de gsal byed pa cas ris yin// de kun rnam dag gsal byed pa/ byang chub sems mchog zhi ba ni// log rtog 'khor ba'i zo chun la// ral gri rnon po'i sta re lta// 'phags
ba khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o///denas sngags dang phyag rgyadag/ 'byung bar 'ab tu bshad par bya//

na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra keb+b+ha sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yasarba thA hU~M/ snying po dam pa'o// namasarba sa pa ri pU ra ke byu sarba ta thA ga ta b+husarba thA/ tsaNamahA'o 'a NasU Ta ya hU~M/ ca tahaMmaM/ snying po'o//

na ma/ sarbas pa ri pU ra ka b+h+yasarba tathA ga tasam+bathA/ brata a mo g+ha/ tsaN+DamahAro Sha Na Ti ya hU~M/ dras ma yahUM/ Ta TahaM maM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// namasarba sa ra pU ra ka sarba tathA
ga ta b+husats+tshathA/ a tsalAkan/ naTA/ me mo/ saa/ hatsAtaN+NaM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha a be sha a ma/ ma la ka d+ha Na d+ha Na/ tits+tsha// khA da khA da/ big+hon/
mArAyA ra du rakarakA satwaM/ ku ru ku ra/ ki ki'i/ ma hAbi dzaya badzra waT/ h+pha shA drib la ta re gnaka/ haM haM/ atsa la/ tsa phaT phaT/ a t+taM/
a saman+ta ka/ Ta Ta/ ma hAb la sa ta a man ya/ dr-imaM haM/ shu d+d+hA tu latsaka/ cun tu leka/ badzinam/ su pra ting ba le b+ho/ dzal ma tra ti as tanamaswAhA/

u0f8bgsang ba'asnying po'o// de nas phyag rgya stang stabs kyis sngags brjod pa 'dir gsungs so// mas sa pa ri pU ra ka b+hu sarbad theg te b+hasarba thA/ oM han han mA ra ya ma ra ya dzAn khag hUMphaT

ral gri'i phyag rgya'i sngags so// namasarbas pa ripIr ke b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarbathA/ o graT+Tagro/ khA da khA da/ pAshan/ ban b+habanad+ha/ mahA Ar+ya te/ d+harmatasAhA/ zhags pa'i 'o//

namasaa pa ri pU ra ke h+phuThasarba ta thA ga te b+h+yasawab+haM/ o rakarake/ han han/ kuT+Ta ku rgyu/ mAr ya du'u ban la kaM hU~M/ go cha'i 'o// na maH sarbas pa ri pU ra ka b+hu sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya

sarbathA/ o d+ha ra d+hor badzin la u0f7a/ kha TIg pAsha d+ha ra sA/ gtsug tor gyi'o// namasazhes pa ri pU ra ke h+phu sam+ba tathA ga ta / sam+bathA/ o b+hany+dza ban d+hu dad pa tsa b+hasmi ku ru ku ru han han badzra/
gra groT+Tha phaT/ thoba'i'i// namasams pa'ipUr ke sh+tsa sarba ta thA ga tasgyu / sarba thA/ o na tamAti/ da had ha/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya// bi dzaya kIrtisAhA/ mgo bo'i
phyag rgya'o// namasams pa ra pU ra ke sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sawathA/ o b+hu d+ha ra d+ha ra/ a tsin bya ba la ba kram NaM/ bu ra bu sa la ya/ kAraka sarba sAgA/ rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o// namasawas
pa ri pU ra ka sata thA ga te b+hU / sorngahA/ o badzra srid la// bam togi sAhA/ snying kha'i phyag rgya'o// na masarbas pa ri pU ra ke byu / sarbatathA ga te b+hu sawathA/ o hUMd nyid ha
kany+tsi ra ya si/ An ya shrI hU~M/ rake kA/ ban ng+haban d+haM/ duny+tsan/ da ma da ma swahA/ phyogs bcing ba'o// no ma/ sarbas pa ri pu ra ke byu / sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ saNathA/

thu'u@#// o dun du nam hA pA sha kha TaMgad+hir/ pa'ipA ra ka sgyu / bka' rtags kyi'o// nam/ sarbas ba ri bA ra ke sh+tsa 2 sarba ta thA ga te sgyu / sarbathA/ o ga gan gan d+hod b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya/

pa pu ra ke hAhA/ dri'i thug rgyu'o// namasarma sa pa ri la ko byu sarba ta thA ga te sgyu / sarba thA/ o bi shud d+hadz+han ra dzisaM b+ha ba ga ga nAnAn hA tha sAhA/ ma mo'i phyag rgya'o/// nam/ sarmas ba

ri b+hu ra ki phru khri hathA ga te gyu[]wahA oM shud d+had+hamate/ shut+tA shAn+ti/ grah+phagro/ 'a/ sarbas pa ri pU ra ke sgyu / sAhA 2 gtor ma'i phyag rgyu'o// nam sarba sa pa ri pu ra ke sgyu / sarba tathA ga
te sacha wA/ o shud d+ha hAdzAn sA b+hA wa tit+tati'am shAn la sAhA/ bdug pa'i khro// nam saN+Das pa ri pU ra ki sgyu / sam+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yA / sarba thA/ oM ga ga na bi kAn
ta gAminamah+phu shud snyan la sAhA/ me tog gi'o/ nam # sarbas pa ri pU ra ka sgyu / sarba ta thA ga ta sarba thA/ o da han/ pa ra ma ba shadu ny+nyo/ d+harman ya pa ri pU ra ke h+phu/ sAwA/
zhal zas kyi'o// nam sarbas pa ra pU ra ka byA/ sarba ta thA ga te b+ha sarba thA/ o a pra tiho hon bya tad med ma/ sarbathA/ sa pa ri pU ra ke byu sAhA/ dpa' bo spyan drang ba'i'o/
nam/ sarbas pa'i pU kesh+tsa sawa ta thA kitesh+tsa / sam+bathA/ o bi shud d+habi shudad+ha/ sa kra sA hA be A na pa/ mahAn ye swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang ba'o// nam
sangs pa ri bA ra kasgyu/ sarba ta thA ga ta / sarba b+hU/ o bi shud d+ha sAhA/ han han/ dam da ma/ mahAn ye swAhA/ nyan thos spyan dra ba'i'o// ma / sams pa re pA ra ka/ /
sarba tathA ga tib+hU / samathA/oM badzra kanAya/ g+haM/ da had// ba tsa pa tsa/ mahA par wAre swAhA/ nya pho mo san drang ba'o// nam sarbas pa ri pU ra ko b+hasarba ta
thA ga te b+h+ya sh+tsa sadza?thA/ om tham the A na ya AnA ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarbatathAgata/ sarbad khaM/ ma tam/ ma hAn ya/ pa wa'e sAn/ 'jig rtenam
rnams spyan dra ba'i 'o// num/ sarba sa pa'i pu ra ka sgyu / sarba thA/ o sa t+yas kya/ mahA sAts+tsha ya/ dmadag/ mtshur a/ Akams kal/ A byab many+nyan la shud d+haM
sAhA drang srong spyan drang ba'o// na ma/ sarbas pa ri pU ra ke h+phe/ sarba tathA ga ta/ samathA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza/ mahAsarkyab ti// sarbahi tis/ srinamo rnams
sbyan drang ba'o// nam / sarmas ba'i pur ka b+hu sarba ta thAg ta sarba b+hU/ o bAhAdA/ mazla ma/ dmadam/ dan// mahAnal/ ma mar/ hasAgA/ mamo rnams
sbyin drang ba'o// naa/ sarbas pa ri pU ra ko sgyu / sarbatathA ga to byu / sarbathA/ ohanabadzra hU~MphaT/ sarbadu'u gra haM/ mthA ma thA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sarbabag+hAn dam da ma/ sarba duShAn
oM hUM phaT swahU/ rkang stabs tsham mgyi sngagasas/ nams rgyas pa ra pU ra ke sh+yasarba tathAg ted+masamathA/ o ahU~M/ A kA shA gagan sU ra NakhaM swAhA/ 'o thug 'khur ba 'bru

sna tshogs// spos dang me tog la sogs pa// ci'abyor 'byor ba'i gtor ma// sngags des spro zhing spel bar bya// namasermas pa ri pUr ki sgyuu0f09 sarba ta thA ga te sarbab+he/ oM swa b+hA ba sarbathA b+ho

thAsAhA/ namasarba sa pa ri pUr ke sgyu / sarba thA/ o lan+d+he sarba ga gan lan+d+hA ya sAhA/ nam serma sa pa ri pU ra ke h+phu/ sarba ta thA ga tathA/ saMchathA/ oM sarbasid+d+ho/ dwa d+hamihasAhA/ ni rlabs

bzhin dupasgyur ba dang/ kun gyis thim par bya ba dang// 'dodo ba'i lasa rnamagang dang gang// grub par bya ba'i sngags yin no// gza' chen brgyad nang rgyu skar yang// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi sngags//
namasarngas ba ri pU ra keb+hu/ sarba tathA ga tasgyu bya sarba g+ha A da dut+tasou0f00 gir/bud+d+ha dr-iha ti/ shu klashazhe byA 2 rA hu / ka kr-it+tikA/ rohi/ tshigasag gin/ a pun tha su//
pa rlu a she TA/ mag+hA purma phawanI ut+tar phalhunI/ ha/ tsi tAsAste/ bikA lA anu rAd+hAts+tshiSh+Thamu lA/ pUrlu/ ut+tarAdzA shra ba Na a b+hi dzi ta/ sha tab+hi rAd+hani/
pUrba b+ha dra pAdA ut+taM' b+ha dra/ pra dAri ba tI/ a shInI/ b+ha'i Ne/ o dang sA hAr bcas pan/ rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te// gang 'dod las kyang sbyar bar bya// mchod

0 pa'i rigs kyang tha dad bya// namasaman kA ya bAkrit+tabadzra N+NaM/ o a tsa la tsan+d+ham hAroT Na spro Ta ya tra ka khahaM yaM/ namasazhan kAl khAkAt+ta badzaN+NaM/ o badzraka pa tsadu thaM/ on masarba

tathA ga tah+phu/ sarbab+ha ya ba ga ta / bshwa mu khe sgyu sarba thA khaM rek+Sha/ ma hAb la/ sarbatab+hA ga tapa ny+tsa lnga te/ hUM hUM ta thA/ a pra tig tasAhA/ khro bospyan gcig drag shul can// srung dang
bcas pa'i mchod pa dang// sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub// ci 'dod las la chogs sbyar// lag g.yasagung mdzub gzhabs tabarkyang// srin lagamathe'u chung mtheb mes mnan//
shugs drangasatshul phyung mkha' la 'phyur// ral gri phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms// g.yon pa khu tshur sdigs mdzub bsgreng// slar sgyur byed pa zhags pa'i rgyu// gung momathe'u chung seser spyad//
mdzubamamang med nang du dgug/ mthe thong gzhabs pa gung 'gram sbyar// su kha bkod de go cha'irgyan/ sor 'khyud khu tshur nang du bsdam// mtheb gnyis cung bsgyu mgo thod rgyu// g.yon

pa'i khu tshur mthe bong ni// g.yas pa'i khu tshuganang bcu gnas // mtha bong g.yas bsgreng tho ba'i rgya/ phyogs bcur brdungs ltar bya 'o// g.yas pa khu tshuragung me bsgreng// sbyigatsug phyag rgya gtsug tu
gzhag/ g.yon pa khu tshur gangamadzub bsgreng// bka' rtags phyag rgya rtag tu 'phyur// khu tshur gnyis gzhibs ltosbyar ba// rdzob lta bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur snying khagazhag/ nga kha
rgyan pa'i phyag rgya bo// lag gnyis sor mos sar brkyang// phyogs bcu bcing ba'i phyag rgya 'o// lag sbyar gung gnyis nang bcug pa// dri yi phyag rgyur bshad pa'o// khu tshur rgyab
spradagung mthe bong/ mthe bong gung mdzub sprad dnga'akhyud/ gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ thalam khong steng shugs ltar gdon// bdug spos 'bul ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis sa sar gung srin bkug

mtheb mnana bzhi g brkyang me tog rgyu// thal sbyar gung srin 'dzub mo bkug/ mthe'u chung mtheb brkyang zhal zas rgyu// skyil krung 'dug ste snyim pa zed// mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug/ solagazhibs nas
g.yab byed pa'i// dang 'a bo gtso bo spyan drang rgyu// thal sbyar mdzub bkugamathe bos mnan// byang chub sems tshogs 'gugs pa'i rgya// sAm bskyed mthe'u chung gshibs te brkyang// lhag ma brgyad
pa sosor dgug/ nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// ma lus thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya// khu tshur g.yas pa g.yon steng gzhag mdzub gnyis brkyang ste so so dgug/ cung zad skyod par
byed pa na// phonya pho mo 'gugs pa'i rgyu// khu tshur rgyab sprad gung mdzuban// so sor drang po gshibs te brkyang// mtheb gnyis cung zad sprad de dgug/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'gugs pa'i rgya/
gson min g.yas pas de ltar bya// brtul zhugs drang srong dgug pa'i rgya// g.yon pa khu tshur gung mo bsgreng// dngos grub srin mo 'gugs pa'i rgyu// lag g.yas bkan tu brkyang nas kyang/
mthe bosamadzab mnanagasum po g.yab// ma bdun la sogs mamo rnams// las kyi dus su bzhugs par 'gyur// res kyis bteg cing drang po yis// busamo dag la rkang mthil sbyar// spyi bor
me tog thal sbyar yang// phyogs der g.yob cing 'bru tshugs bal// zlum pa'i stabs kyis 'di kun gyis/ khagegs tshogs 'joms shing rnal 'byor srung// lag pa g.yas ni gyen du brkyang//
g.yon pa snying khar sdigs mdzub ste// rkang gnyis sprad nas rnying ba rdobs// hUMbarjod drag skadamadun du lta// sa gsum g.yo khyad zla gam stabs// rkang ga yon brkyang pa'i stabs dang// gaha brjod
cing zhabs rgya bcings// phan tshun bsnol nas bgegs la bsnun// 'khor lo phyag rgya phyamar bya// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang na// rdo rje thal mom pa'i la bsnun// khro gnyer mig can
mamachu ma/ kan lag gnyis gnyis me ltar spyad// rkang pa mnyam stabs hU~M sgra can// lag gnyis sdigs mdzub phyag rgya 'o// rkang gnyis mnyam du bzhag pa la// g.yas kyis g.yon
bskor lte ba yin// mdun dug las te sgrub tu g.yon// gya tshom gsum gsum mnan pa// rtsagasum yin te rtse gsum rgya// lagapa stang brkyang dbyig bsgrang ltar/ bgegs la bsnun zhing 'bru
tshugs blta// g.yas su tho ba hU~M brjod brdeg/ g.yon pa snying kha'i sdigs mdzub ste// gnyis ka sprad pa 'khor lo bya// nub bltas rkang pa mnyam bzhag nas// mdun g.yas rgyab dang
thubya/// g.yon phyogs su/ g.yon pas bgegs gsum mnan bya zhing// rim pas me dang ral gri dang// sdigs mdzub zhags pas phyogs bzhir bcing// gshI drug brjod brjid
gnon rgyu// rkang gnyis pus 'bulag pa gnyis// gru mo bsgyur na thag gis man// bgegs bskrad phyir 'bru tshugs blta// rtsegacig rdo rje skabs su bcad// rkang pa g.yas g.yon
res kyis bskor// lho byang g.yon teshar nub g.yas/ borkyang zhing drag tubardab par bya// rgyab nas drung dang tho ba dang// rdo dzad ng ni zhags pa'i rgyu// phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs//
phyag rgya dang ni stang stabs kyis// phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na// 'byung po'i tshogs 'joms smos ci dgos// thams cad dbang du sdud par byed// de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yi//
rkang stabs khyod bar b shad par bya// shar du rkang ba mnyam pa yis// dordzothal mo rgyan du brdog/ lhorani rkang rting sprad de gdang// hUM sgrog thal momadun rgyab sbyar// nub turkang pad
lag pa gnyis// so sor sdigs mdzub gyen du brkang// byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang// rkang ba ya gcig sa la bsgreng// khu tshur mdzab sbyaradapral bar bzlog/ rkang gnyis mnyamathus/
thos kyis phyar// mche gtsigs hU~M sgrog khro gnyer lta// byang shar thig ler grags pa'i rgya// khu tshur mthe'u chung mtshoba'i rgyu// rkang pa ras bteg shar lhor phye// lho nub rkang gnyis zhes
kyis brdab// zhags pas bdebs dang ral gris gcod// nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang// lag gnyis mtheb sdud 'khor lo bskor/ yang na mtshegatsigs phyag rgyas gdab// stong
stabs thams cad ha hUM sgrog/ de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yi// phyag rgya cho ga bshad par bya// khu tshu mgung mo bskyang rtsi sprad/ mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du bcad// sngags dang phyag rgyu
thams cad kyis/ lha klu srin po gnod sbyin dang// mkha' 'gro 'byung po mi ma yin// gsod dang skyod de mo ltar mdzad// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'irgyud las//
sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//blunamad pa'i las ris sku/ cho ga de nas bshad par bya/ bris sku 'dod pas thams cad du// dge ba'i ltas bzang
btsal nas kyang// bkrus te sngags kyis bsrung byas la// dur smig rgyun bsgyur bar// rgyud bzang dal zhing dul bag yod// chos thos ri mo mkhan la sgra'i// srid chung yid gzhud+ma
khromed pas// sen rtsi shun kan tshwal sbyar// spang dang mu zi kan tar ljang// ba bla kan blun ser// li khri sgo nga mtshal lpags dmar// rams dang mthing shun thun re spro// sprig dang a dza
nag bo ste// sha tra dag kyang dka' por 'gyur// sa snod so btang skagasasnyig byug/ par 'jam bal 'bring tha mabri// rgyal dang sa rinam gru dang/ smon snubs smin drug lha mtshams shis//
denas yang dag rab bshad pa// thub pa'i dge ba bas ris la// dbus su byang chub shanga mchog drung// gser mdog 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sa// chos 'chad phyag rgya dus/
sgrig bsnams// logs su 'dab bzang rgyal po gnyis// snyam pa ma tog bkang ba'i gzugs// g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po dkar// dur smogi gon pas thalamo sbyar// de yi zhabs
su mi g.yo ba// spyan gsum khros pa klu yi brgyan// nama'i stod g.yogs stag smad bkras// rin chen rgyan can do ker can// rdob dmar po'i khri stangasan// ral gri dang nazhags pa dang//
g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs// gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs tshal// rdordza'adzin sogs dur smig can// rdo rjedung ni zhags pa 'chang// de yi 'og tasgrub pon// pus btsugs smos kyi
khang du 'dzin// gtso bo zhabs su khro bo che// nag po khams gsum bstan pa yi// lag genyas 'ani chen khri 'bateg/ gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste/ 'jig rten dbang dang khro bo ya/
rdo rdzo'adzin dang sgrub pa'i sde// yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig/ klu yi bumo mdzes ma gnyis// pang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad// zhu ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyi'i// de nas bris sku gang dag
bshad// dobus su shAkya thub pa dang// g.yas su 'phagaso ba 'jamadapal te// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o// bsnyen ba'i don du bas risan/ shin tu blta dka' gsus po tsho/
zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yi brgyan/ kha nas khrag 'dzag lce 'dril ba/ mche gtsigs b+hats+tshisgra cher sgrog pa// spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od// dunasmig bsnams pachar sprinamadogo//
sku 'thod rlon 'phreng ba can// dbu la thod pa tshar bzhis brgyan// g.yon du rin chen zur pud 'phyang// bskal pa'im 'od 'bar ba yis// phyogs kyi bgegs tshogs sreg par mdzad/ g.yA/
kyi dang po rdo rje// gnyis pas la gri 'od 'bar 'chang// g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags// gnyis pa sdigasamadzub brkyang ste mad// rin chen rdo yi khri stengs su// bgegs kyi rgyal bo mnanas
kyang g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis gnas// de yi mdun du zhiba'i khyad// sos khang bzung ba'i sgrub po// ci'abyor rgyun du mchod par bya// mngon spyod sgrub pa'i las 'di ni denas la nga dag/
bshad par bya// dur khrod sa la mi g.yo ba// mdoganag spyan gsum zur mge lta// ngur smig gos gyon khro gnyer ldan// ral grid na zhags pa 'chang// bris nas bdag gi khrag gisan// spyan
phye gsol ba btab par bya// mo 'disani rig 'dzin kyang// sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos/ yang nas tshogs las kyi phyir// mthing khan ra'i rgyan can ni/ brkyang bskum rdo rjodril bu 'dzin
pad+ma zla bal bzhugs bri// dmag dpung rengs pa'i ras rasani// gser mdog khro bo mgayo ba// mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku// 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i bod ldan pa// zhal bzhi phyag
kyang bzhipa ste// ral gri zhags pa dang po'adzin// rib tshe dang sdigs mdzubu 'og/ zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying khar ro// de nas rig 'dzin dngos grubakyis// ras ris/
bri ba yang dag bshad// mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa// mdangs bzang zar ma'i me tog mdog ral gri zhags pa sdigs mdzuban// bsamo g.yas bteg g.yon pa mi/ sa la cung zad/
btsugs par mdzad// mkha' la lta yi bu gnyis kyis// dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams dgang gzugs// g.yas su rnam snangamakhris te/ dgayon du bod dpag med pa 'o// de mdun sgrub po nyid kyang
bri gang yang ris ma thams cad la// mchod de me tog gto gnas kyang// spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te// na 'brel sngags kyis rab ba nas bya/ de rjes smon lam btab pa na// o ldan bdag
gis bsags pa yi// bsod nams grangs med gzhalami lang// des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa// blamad go 'phang thob par shog/ sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro dang// yi dgas gang dag grangs med rnams/
bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// thams cad bad dang ldan gyur cig/ gang yang lhamadabul 'phongs dang// mind mug dgrachom sogs// bdag gibasod namasamathu yis ni// de dag thams cad
bral gyur shog/ jisAng sems can thams cad rnams// da snyad sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun// sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas// bga' yang sdug bsngalamed pa'i shog/ sems can gang dag
lus ngag yid/ mi dge spyod pa bral gyur nas// dge ba phun tshogs sbyong gyur te// kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog/ de nas rgyal sras kun btud de// lag na drideng ma tog sogs// mchod
pa'i yo byad kun thogs nas// bla'og tha dad gsal bya'i phyir// bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod/ oM bde gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// skyob pa dngos su bzhugs pa rnams// bdag la
slar yang brtse ba'i phyir// rgyal ba sras bcas la mi mnga'// bdag don grub par 'gro ba la// brtse phyir slar yang byon par mdzod// de nas gtor ma me tog// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnams
dngos grub mtshig gnod spangs phyi'i// lag pas reg par mi bya ste// gos kyi yul ma la sogs pa// ci bde bas na phyogs nas kyang// skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas/ chu bo la'adir bar bya//
'bras dang 'omasha ka dang// mar dang bcas pa bsgol byas te// 'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu// dga' skyed phyir nadage 'dun dang// bram ze la ni ston mo bya// de nas bris sku brtan bani// gsang ba'i
gnas sumachod par bya// khyad par chos brgyud dus su mchod// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing// rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang// mnyes par bya zhing khros pamani// sems can m mos spang bar bya//

dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed de// the tsom le lo spang bar bya// rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir// khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas// gos bkra dri ma med pa bgo/ zas kyang 'bras sogs drimed la/
nyung du bza' zhing btung btu// mas pas gnyid dang le lo dang// dring ban skyed par 'gyur// tho rangs dang por langs nas ni// srid thal bar du brtson par bya//
nam gyi gulaganyid pa'i tshe/ 'gro la phan bya'i sams kyis nyal// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'irgyud las// bris sku'ile'u sta ba zhipa'o// de nas lang
dag bshad bya ste// wa sgoms pa rim pa mi rang gzugs stong par byas nas su/ yig 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo lis/[]sgra grags pa rig pa che// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang//
I der son pa na rdo rjesogs// rang gi phyag rgyunyid yin no// de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni// lang 'tshonashar ba ji lta bar// mtshan dpa mdangs 'od yang dag ldan// brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang

zla ldan/ sgeg cade rol pa'i cha byad ni// byis pa gzhon nu'i lang tsho 'dra// rin chen rgyan dang na bza'ani// gzugs mdzes lha la ji lta ba// khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste skra dang kha spu la sogs pa//

sbra sog sasar zhing rtsub ga'akhril// sna tshogs du khrod rgyan rnams// rtsub cing blo ldan rab chu khros/ na bza brlon pa khrag can na// steng gaM khyams su yod par mdzad/ hahahU~MhU~M phaT phaT kyi//
ngar skad 'brug sgra spyags blun// ri rab 'bum sIl tshal chos ltar// lus rab ltos 'gros brgyan pa ni// gzi ldan 'khyud cing du sgra 'don/ de 'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi 'bum dus
me'i bskal pa tra/ thab gdug mtshon cha du ma// lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung ga/ thams cad yi ge hU~Msgracan// mamo dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams// rgyu yig
drug po'i bdag nyid can// thub pa yi ga tshu las bskyed// rgyal sras rig ma nyan thos dang// 'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed// namasarba ta thAg ta sa pa'i skur ke sawat+tA//

oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+hat+takotathadagan/ samud ga te sa ha ba bshud d+he/ mahAn ya ba ri wA re swAhA/ rang gi lus lasems bcu gnas // sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi/ ngang tshul bzang por yang dge khyu
ga par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas// drang srong rdzu 'phrul can du 'gyur// gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nusan// rang gi bde thob sos ci dgos// ngas ba'ags kyi lha rnams kyi gags bstan phyag
mtshan kha dog ni// dkyil 'khor ram ras ma las// gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya// de nas mi g.yo khro bobs// rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas// dag cing gsal la sAn ba yis// tshig gis
yang 'degasol to// rdo rdzo'adzin pa bcom ldan 'das/ gtum mo mtshan nyid ldan b yi/ nga mtshan nyikhyed shad nas// detshe ro'adzin rgyal bos// gtumatsho'i cha byad ldan byas nas// sa
gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis// gsang chen brda'adibaka' stsal to// dgapa'i samasanyidahUM rdorje// mthang kha'i mdog las rdo rdzo'adzin// mthing kha brkyang skum khro sems can/ nara'i
rgyan bcas 'jigasakhyod sku// gyen zla kha spu gyunas dmar// pad+ma zla ba'i steng dun/ ma nang bzhugs rdo dril 'chang/ rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po// bzhi pa'i
[H ]lnga pa de'i gsum pa// lnga pa'i lta pa bdun pa bzhi// me yis bdagug bsamanan// bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa lun// gsum pas btag go shuphaTabacas// gsang sngagasargyal bo bla med
'des// dgos pa thams cad 'grub ba dang// khyad par du ni 'byung pos la/ klu 'dul ba nadakar bo che/ nam mkha' lding gi chabyadacho// grub pa'i gter gyi don du// son po 'od dang ldan pa yi//
mda' bo dang ljang nag dag/ drag po'i gdon rnams sal ba dang// tshe ring ba la shis pa go/ lhag pa bskyod pa'i sku mchogani// 'byung bo'agyur pa'i dam thag// sa stengs thams cad mun nag 'khrigs/
bdud rnams thams cad rab tutshig/ ya shes ma 'od chen po 'di// bzod par bla lagatsage ma mchis// bgegasachen lag pa 'dren pa rnams// dog pa'isams kyis thag rings 'bros//
gsang sngags yi ge hUM sgra can// glog 'khrug pa pa 'od zer 'dra// klad par yi gahaM ga gzugs/ gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can// 'od dmar tshal pa rab 'byor bas// bgegs tshogs
sreg cing 'bros par byed// bong bu mo khyi spre'agazugs// ro langs ma lus thams cad kun// hahU~M brjod cing 'bros par byed// rlung gis g.yas pa'i rdul dang mtshungs// gyen thur haMgi 'phro 'dudang//

khrobcus bon yi ge hUM// me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bul// mngon sum rtswa lam bzhin du/ sAng gi sh+logis 'dasanas kyang// klad pa'i hUM gisasreg par byed// 'dod dang phyag rgya lha yi sku// bskad dang
bcing dang chos byed bsam// sang ge dang ni glang chen babrug/ drag po'isgraskad ci'adra bar// rtsa ba'igosang sngags zlog pa ni// bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa// sreg cing phyim rdul du rlog/
snying nang snying po bstan pa ni// 'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs// du ma rnams kyang zad pa'i mad// lus ngag yid brtan 'khor lo sngags// o dang adang hUMphyor gyis// dpal 'phal dbang
phyug skyed pa dang// go cha chen po sbyin par byed// nams yan+tunaM/ tathA ga tAnaM haM/ go cha chen po 'i gsang sngags 'dis// rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na// bgegs rnams srog ba smos
ci dgos// sam ya hU~M oMhaM gis// ye shes lha dang 'brel bar bya// rgyalabs dbang bskur sbyor bsan// yeshes dbu rgyan btags par bya// gtso la ma bskyod dbu rgyun can// 'khor kun
mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya// bdag nyid yi ger byas nas// ma gzugs shan tu phra bas// mtshonamo dus su nyams par bya// sdang ba hU~Mgasgra las so// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'irgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus
pa'i rgyud las/ lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///denas rang dag bshad bya ba// sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga nyon// dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhig/ byang chub sems las ma bskyed de//
dbang bskur rjes gnang ma thobal/ sdom tshul dmatshig bral ba'i mi// gsang sngags rang nyid len pa// byis pa lcags srog mid pa 'dra// thog ma mad sgrib bkru ba'i phyir//
rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjod/ o/ sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// sdig ba'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems su byed/ mos

tathAg tabadzraa d+hiSh+Than kA yakhAka tsit+tabashed+han ab+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ o sas rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen sngags las byung ba yi// dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis// dbang bskur rin

chen mchog tu 'gyur// oM badzadz+har ba badzra sa ma ya ahaM/ rat+tamu ku Ta a b+hi'iny+tsahU~M/ rdo rje chen po thun med// bzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te// rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pas// khyod kyis

kyang ni rtag tu zung// osarba badzra a b+hi'iny+tsahUM/ dril bu dbyangs snyan blan med// suyi ridzarab tu bskyed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung// khams gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// oM sa ma ya

g+haNA badzra ab+hiShiny+tsahUM/ o [0f10 ]snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgyu// gang gis thos banang gi su// de yi ming mtshan bdag par 'gyur// rtag pa'i rang gnas blad bar mdzod// oM badzranAm a b+hi She ka ta/
thog mtha' med nga'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rjesams dpa' dga' ba che// kun chub zang po kun bdag nyidi// rdo rjesAms bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu rgyu// shes rab dbang
pas kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ rtag tu khyod kyis bzung byas nas/ byang chub mchog thob rgyal bas gsungs// yo/ shes rab ral gri bla na med// gang gis 'chang ba rgyu la 'gyur te// bdud kyi dpung
gshegs nas kyang// mkha' la ya shasa'od 'bar 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzadzA na khaN+Da a b+hi lcahU~M/ a rdo rje zhags thugs rdo rje can// nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong bu rnams//

thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzad// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzrapAshen a b+hi'i[% ]/ dbang dang rjes gnang la thob cing/ dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la// blom mnyes
bar mi byed na// sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro// log lta can g bla ma 'tsho// dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro bar nges/ 'di'i nyams pas ni nad yams dang// dgra bo mu ges rtag tu 'tsho// dkyil 'khor sa/
bzhi nyams dga' ba// nu klu mtsho'agram ri ljongs dang// 'bras bume tog skyed mos tshal// kun dga' ra ba khang bzang mchog/ khamado silabashang gcig rdung// phyugs lhas khungabartsegs rlung/

chen bres// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa dang// nu gling mtshe'u 'gramanyegasang du/ bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang// dur khro sogs su las rnams sgrub// las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang sku// dbang gi
dkyil 'khor chen po la// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bzhi ba/ yang na drug gam brgyud kyang bya/ khazhanan khru gsum tshad du bya// yang na lnga 'am bdun du bya// gzang yid kyila 'khor khru gnyis te//
yang n phyed dang gsum bar bya/ kun tu bzhi chapo drang ste// khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te// khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum pa// rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o// lha snam bzhi dag tu

'gyur// thub pa'i sgron bzhi yin ta// gzhan du sgegacig ba nyidishasi// 'jam pa'i dbyang san byang gi sgo// chos 'i nub sgo rdo rje lha// gza' dang 'jig rten skyong sogs shir// dbang sgyur lha yi gnas
rnams su/ bum pa phyag rgyur bcas pa khag/ sku bam rang rang phyag rgya bzhag/ thub pa'idakyil 'khor dbus sun// pad dkar steng du lhung bzed do// gtso bo bsan sor drug ste/ lhag ma rnams ni
sor bzhi 'o// rigs kyimtshan ms yang yang bskoro// byang du 'jig rten dbang sdudani// mudadakar dordzagadangs por bcas// dbang ldan spyi blugs byams ba'a'o/ shar du 'jam dpal ut+pal sngo//

mar na kun bzung yid bzhinano// lho ni rje rdo rje 'dzin/ bden bral mkha' snying po da dkar te/ nub tu bdaser rdo rje chos// nub byang sa snying bdamar// gtsug tor gnod mdzes steng 'og chus// gtsug tor

sku dngan gtun shing ngo// shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste/ mar ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum mo// rdo rje rtsa gcig gshin rje lhog bden brol ral gri stobs po che// nub tu rtamagrin pad+ma ste/ khyud du bgags dgrardo rje

rgya nub tu dbyug pa sngon po ste// dbang ldan dun mi g.yo ba// de yi rgyub tu nyan thosazhi/ shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang/ mo'u 'gal bu dang 'od srungs dang// rgyal mchog dang sa stengs skyong// rta thul dang

0 nib glang bdag/ drag shul dbang chen changs bu can// b+ha la d+hAdza lteng rgyas dang// dga' bo ' dga' sgra gcan no// de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya 'o// bad+ma'i stang du lhung bzed do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//

'jam dpal dkyil 'khor bzang po yi// dbus su ral gri me 'od can// rin chen rdo brag stang dub+ba// byang du rdo rjes mtshan ma pa// bum pa bri ba byams pa'o// shar du kun tubazang po la// rdo rje dkar po bri

par bya// lhe ran ma 'od ldan pa yi// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri// nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste// pad dkar 'od dang ldan ba bri// yid bzhin nor 'dzamadzes gzugs can// rin chen rdo stengadabang ldan bri/ mar

nib 'bar rdo rje gi/ bgrang 'phreng pad+mal gnasabri/ bdan bra'adun 'babarjid pa'i// go cha'abar pa bri bar bya// rlung du mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lha// rin chen sgron ni bri bar bya// steng du rtul phod chas khro bo'o//

pad+ma'i steng du khro bo yi// 'og tu khro rgyalamanga'a gzhug gi/ rdo rje brag stangs zhags pa bri// khro bo lhagam sngon gyi ni// tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya// brtan bzhes pa'i pho nyamo'i// chu gri byang du bri bar bya/
zla ba'i dkyil 'khorab chang ba yi// mkha' srolam shar du 'o/ nyima'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba gi rnama'ajigs man lha'u'o// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// mdzod spum zhes rin 'phreng 'dzin//

rin chen rdo stengs shar lhor bri// shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa// 'khor lo me 'bar rdo rje bri// 'bar ba'i gtun shing bden bral du// 'joms pa'i tho ba rlung du bri// thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug
pad+mamadzod kyi phyag rgya dang/ sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor na gyis brlab/ namasarba ta thA ga te b+hasazamu kha hU~MhU~M/ ba kha/ maMmaM swA hA/ spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba

dang / srung ba mchog gi sngags yin no// namasarba ta thA ga ta sarba bi kAmu khesgyu/hahahe A dzA ba ma rag gan/ Agats+tshagats+tshab+ha ga bAn hU~M swAhA// bstanapa 'bum la byin brlabs dang// lha sgrub pa dang

mchod pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad byas/ rdordzachos kyidakyil 'khor// dbusasu 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid// pad+ma dmar po 'chang ba 'o/ shar du don yod zhags pa ni// bgrang 'phreng sngon po 'chang ba'o

lho nanam mkha'adrimadade// rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba 'o// nub tugar gyi dbang pad+ma// byang du thugasarje shugs po che// rdo rje nag bo 'dzinapa gi/ sgrol ma khro gnyer la gcig dang// yid bzang ma ni mtshams

su bri// khro bo dang ni ye nyamo// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'am pas dgod// de nas phyag rdo rje yi// kyil 'khor yang dag bshad ba'i bya// dbus su phyag na rdo rje nyid// rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o// shar du

spyi sangs rgyas spyan ma yin// lhor ni pad 'dzin mA ma kI/ nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar// byang du sgrol ma ut+pal 'chang/ phyogs bzhi'i nam mkha' drimed dang// shugs po cha dang rdo rje tog/ bsnyems

tshul chen po zhes pa rnams// rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa 'o// de'i yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin dubri bar bya// de yapecha rgyab dkyil 'khor la// drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni// dpung bzang

pa la sogs rdo rje can// brgyad po byang gi phyogs su gyi// tshogs 'chang bshes gnyen 'gro skyong dang// mthong dka' rigs byed bden bra'amed// ngan spong brgyad de drang srongashar// lhob ni rje rje dgra stam//
rdordzatheb drag shul ma// rta rnam dang khro gnyer ma/ rolangs ma dang lcags sgrog ma// mthong dka' ma ste brgyudalo// dug sal mabya 'od zer can// nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma/ dbyangs

ldan dril sgrog brgyad nub phyogs/ kun kyang rang 'gi phyag can// sgo yi phyogs su dgod bya ba// thub pa'i 'ajig rten skyong ba bzhi// brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug cha// tshangs pa 'jam dpaladakyil

'khor la 'o// rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub pa/// gnan ma thub pa spyan ras gzagis// nag mo tshe dang uts+tsha// gzhon nu 'brog mogater 'dzin gyi// khro bos g.yo sgo bzhi la// nag po tshe dang dga' byed/
dang / ngan speng dung na tshogs bdag go/ mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes ba yi// dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'i// rol grim 'od 'bar ba 'o// phyogs bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i byad
can rdo rjerin chen pad+madang// rgyagramagayas pa'i phyag tu 'chang// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang// rin chen bragalasku bzhugs nas// nabasu gnas pad+ma'i stang du'o// mtshams su khro mo

bzhi po yang/ gtso bo dang mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams// de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu// sku 'as phyag rgya'i 'phreng ba bri/ dkyil 'khor cha la ba tun/ 'jig rten skyong b.ru drag shul can// khros pas rang
rigs 'khor bcas khri/ bum pa tshad ldan las kyis dkri// dri bzang chus bkang lha grungs sam// bcu gnyis sam ni drug kyang rung// kha rgyan dang bcas gzhag par bya//
bu leb dan gdugs rgyal mtshan// yon chab bdug spos ma tog dang// sgro ma byug chab zhal zas dang/ gling bu sil sAmanabaza'i tshogs// gtor madri bzang smanangang bcas// yid 'ong dri zhim
zas skom tshogs// dkyil 'khor sprad nas mchod ba'akhyu// sal dusamotshad brkos nas/ 'bu srin shang rdodum bu sogs// skyonamanga' bral nas salas dgang// ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar//
ma tog gcal bkram mchod sogs bkod// lhan spyan drangs mchodanas kyang// dge dang mi dge'i rmi lamakha rtag/ rmilakhabazangan phyogs gyur nas// sabadag mo la gsol ba gdab// khyad par du yang
gtor mas mchod// bu tshur shog ces thog chen gyi// tshul chen khyod ni snod yazhibs// gsang sngags spyod tshul chog rnams// khyod la lang dag bstan par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung
ba rnams// mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mtshungs pa med pa bzhes// skyob pa shAkya seng ge s kyang// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dasi// bdud sdashan mi/
bzad pa// dbung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom// 'jig rten 'dul phyir chos rnams kyi/'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu khyod blo gros 'dakyis shig/

0 u dumab ra'i ma tog ltar// bsgyu laman nas 'ga' zhig// 'byung 'gyur yang nAmi 'byung ste// skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che/ red dka' rnyed par gyur na yang// gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba//
shin tudakab ste rmad byung phyir// sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshocher 'jigs las/ myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags las// sa stangs gsang sngags nor bu 'dra// gnod 'chi
'jigs sbyong ba dang// nyesa mdzad grogs gcugs mthuna'adodadang// mu ge dgra choms bral bde dang// zas skomogos rgyan longs spyod brtag/ bde bskyodadapal 'byor thob pa dang// myur dusangs rgyas
'dod pa yis// gsang sngags thabs lamyur brtson bsgrubs// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tuni ngas mdzad pa'i// byang chub samasanI bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyod par bya//
sdom pa la ni tshul khrims dang// dge ba'i chos ni sdudape dang// sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// deng nas mchog tubastan bar gzung// 'grol lhag ba'i sams bskyed nas// blam la ni

yon phul zhu// yid bzhin nor 'dra bla medasku// zhibasangs rgyas go 'phang thob// srog gcod rkubardzun mi tshangs spyod// myos byed 'thung dang glu gar rol// rgyun byug mal chen mtho ba dang// phyi dro kha zas
spang ba ste// brgyad dang bcu gcig bco lnga dang// khyad par du naganam stong la// dal 'byor thob pa shin tudakon/ sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tudakon// sdom pa blangs nas srog bzhin du//
g.yengs med bsams tebasrung bar bya// gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'go bya// lha'i bde ldan lus thob nas// dmyal ba dud 'gro mi dgas gnas// thob gnas spang dka'ade
dag ni// nam lAng thob par mi bya'o/ bdag nyid 'khoral gri 'chang// gsang ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas// bka' las 'das pa'i gdug can rnams/ dum bu phyamar 'gasabar 'gyur/
slobam gzung byi thogamaran// bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthu bskyed khyu// longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma btang/ bsod masa'adod phyir mchod ba brtson// blam thos bsam sgom
la gnas// gtong phod dul zhing chos spyod mkhas/ nad med ba'od de snying rdzatshe// sngags sgrub brtsonadabal shes rab can// brtags naas slob ma lnga 'am bdun// dad brtson zhi dul blam

bkur// sdeg 'gas nad med dbang po tshang// dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa gzung// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus ba'i rgyud las// skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//
nas lang dag bshad bya ba// rigalo 'dzin ba'i dngos grub che/ gzhan du med par la grub// rgyud 'di bshad pa mnyan par byos/ ma na chen dang po ste// gang gang sgrub

ba de dang de// 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ ral gri lcagasasemashang la bya// sor bzhib 'am sorab rgyad bya// yu ba'i rigs kyi rgyaltabri// ba yi rnam lnga dri zhim chus// bkrus te dre dang la togo
mchod// zla drug sngags bzlas khro bo sgom// ral gri dud 'thul 'od du 'bar// blangs pas mkha' spyod yul 'gro bgyur// tshenabar gyi bskal pa ste// lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs//
sangs rgyas zhing rnam 'gro bar 'gyur// gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa 'am// shang gi zhags pa'i ng de ltar 'grub// rgyalamtshan nor bugi'u wangagadugs// lcags kyi rnams kyang de bzhin/
sgrub// lha rnams sgruban thang shang la// gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te/ sngags bzlos tsam gyis mdun du 'og/ ci'adod gsola'adebs 'dod ba sna// klu la nA ga ge sar shing// gnod sbyin/
len gsar lasagazugs/ dri bra lan boma'i shing// mkha'alding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyis so// srin po lan khrod dang// gang yang gzugs byas rkang pa ni// g.yon pas de yi skamanan ta/
sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong/ ci'adod sgra tshadagos pa byung// shar du lasa'is kha sprad drug/ dus gsum khrus byas gos rlon gyon// sum 'bum bzlasan mar ngo yi// brgyad la 'byung po gtor

ma sbyin// maN+Dal steng du 'o bzha gnas // rang nyidazhi chekhri stang du// snying bo khribarjod ro'agul 'gyur// mi skrag kha yin ng du lce// bad+ma kha byalta can mthong// khacad n ral gri rig 'dzin gyug/ lha yi
gzugs kyis tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten khams kyi gsas rnams rgyu/ dgi'u wangabadunakhas thig las// skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo// migayo lus mo btsugs ba 'am// 'jam dbal risama'i
drung du// 'jam dbal sngags 'dis ya bas// nya la khyad par mchod pa byas// mtshan 'angs bzlas pa'i tho'angasazhas/ dang po rtagasas g.yo bar bgyur/ gti
ba nyim 'gyur ldog byed// phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen bo/ haha 'brug skad grag bar 'gyur// gsum par mkha' la ragi 'dzin rnams// ma tog char 'bebs nun 'phya'i sbreng/
de rjesareg 'dzinam lus dang// 'jig rten skyong bse'ababaskor nas// khro rgyal byon nas gsungasnyan gyis// ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur// rig 'dzin rgyal bo mi snang sogs// ci 'dod
par ni smra bar bya// grub nas brgyad gnyis byad can// rgyun bzang 'gana' gri thigs// lha yi bzhon pa la bcibs nas// rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i
tshe/ rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas// mchod pa chen po thob 'gyurato// bskal pa du mar tsha gnas 'gyur// ut+pal sngon po lig bu mig/ ru rta zangs snod ril bu gzhag/ zla ba gzas zin//
bar bzlas nas// mig bskus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyug/ bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong bo gnam lcags rdo rdzisore bcu drug/ sa gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te// tsan dan dmar dang
dribawad byug/ cho 'phrulatshes gnyis nya yi bar// mchod cing bzlasan tha mal// mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de// kusha khros kyi stang 'dug nas// rdordzalag gnyis bzung ma thag
[4/ ]dud 'thul 'od du 'bar nas kyang// 'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur// 'khor lo bdun brtsegs mtshon cha dang/ gsadang mal lhamtshangs skud sogs//

dngos po thams cad de ltar sgrub// sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung// chos gcig nyin par skyogazugs kyi// mthe bo dza tisngags brjod brdeg/ stong phrag brgyad kyis mthe bong las// 'od zer phyung nas legs thag/
dbu sku lcang lo 'khyil gyuranasaM// 'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyalaM po thob// sus kyang mi thub lus grub 'gyur// mo bskal pa'i bar du gnas/ sa la pad 'dab brgyad pa bri// bum ba skud banag pos dkri//

nadan gyis byug dris kyang dgang// pad+ma'i stangagazhag pad stangs 'dug/ stong phrag brgyad bzlasas gzhigs// pad+mar snang zhungs gzhir snang// chu des gtor la khru gang bko// blangs bas bskal pa'i tshatshan
thob/grog mkharas la sengag bya// ga'u wang gis byugs dkyil 'khoragazhag/ g.yo 'gul bar du mchod cing bzlas// singager gyur nas rgyab zhon nas// 'dod gzugs lha gnas kun tu 'gro// sas rgyas
zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur// tshe lo khri phrag gcig bskor nas// rig 'dzin chen po 'i gnas su 'gro/ 'dir gsungs pa 'amam gsungs pa// sngags dang lha 'das sgrub pa las// rig 'dzin sgrub par
grags pa rnams// ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las/ ga 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/
yang dag bshad byug phran tshogs las kyi sbyor ba gtso// gza' lachog 'di yin te/ gnod pa sel dang phan skyed mdzad// ba yi rnam lngas byug pa la// dkyil 'khor
dbus su pad+ma// kha dog sna tshogs si ba rtsag gi/ dbus su sasargyas de bzhin lcog/ chos nor rdzachos dkar bo// shar du dge 'dun ljang khu 'o/ nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dma'/
byang du phyag na rdo rje ste/ byang shar du ni'ajam dpal se// mnag shani rdzagashed ngo gzhug// dbyug 'chang ma he zhon pa 'o// migayo mgon po srin po phyogs// mgrin rlung gi phyogs su 'o
la dkon mchog gsum po chos 'char rgya// sems dpa' khro bo 'ong rtags so// kun kyang rin chen khri la bzhugs// de rgyab cha la gza' rnams te// shar du nyi ma dkar serani// rta la zhon ta pad+ma
chang// nub tu zla ba dkar po ni/ kumu du 'chang dang pa zhon// lho ni mig dmar kha dog dmar// gal ba'i stong bzhugs me sgron bsnams// lhag ba mdog sor ur 'chang/ khyang du nga da
stos bzhugs pa la// phur bu mdog sngon glegs bam thogs// shar lho phyogs su klu la bcibs/ pa lngasas dkar shing thog 'chag/ lho nub gsar gyi khri la bzhugs// byang nar sngan pa
mdoga gzhugani// tshangs pa'i stongan dbyug pa thogs// babyang sgra gcan dud kani// sbrul gyi stong na 'khor lo 'dzin// rnon po ljang khu ral gri 'chang// gtso bo drug du pad stong bzhugs// namasarba

ta thA ga te b+husam sa pa ri pU ra ke blu sarbathA/ o b+ha kinaM swAhA/ ma'i snying po'o// masarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya sarbas pa'i pU la ke sarba thA/ oMsarba tra yaM a swA hA/ zla ba'i 'o// namasarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/

sarbas pa'i pur ka klu sarbawI/ o abA rung sAhA/ rnon po'i'o// namasarba tathAg te b+hus=sa pa ri pU ra ke h+phu=sam+baD+ha/ o su bi shud d+hA sAhU/ dmig dmar gyi'o/ nam sarba ta thA ga te byusarba sa ba
ripU ra ku b+ha sarba thA/ o bi su Ta pa ka ya swAhA/ gza' lhag gi'o// on ma sarba ta thA ga te ny+tsasarngas pa'i pur ke sarbathA/ o b+hi kachu d+hA ya sAhA/ phur bu'i/ namasam+ba ta thA ga te
b+husazlas pa ri pU ra ki sarbathA/ o su d+hanaN mdosAhA/ pa lbasangs kyi'o// namasarba ta thA ga ted+d+hasarlas pa'i pur ke h+phusachadzA/ o kroskyabaskya pa ka swAhA/ spen pa'i 'o/ nam sarba

ta b+hA ga te ny+tsasaN sa pa ri pU ra kasgyu / sarbab+hA/ o bi krid la 'bu tsisazhwa/ sgra gcan gyi'o// sngags brgyud stong brgyad brgya bzlas// ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab// lengs spyod spel cing
'jigs pa sel// nad med bgogs rims 'joms par 'gyur// rims sogs gzas zinand la yang// sku yi drung du gsol btab sol// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba// de dag thams
cad 'grub par 'gyur/ midang bya rgod sbrul rus pa// skabs gtumasanas dgra khyim sba// dgra bond skyed nor rnams brlag/ rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges// stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i sku//
dgra bo'amo smAs bats+tshad par byed// ne'u le nag po wa smral rus/ rang khrag rtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams// gong du mang bcas dgra sgor smra// dgra bo 'khor ba ces sha bar/
'gyur/ mtshil dur thal rgya skyagasazhi/ thod ba so can nang blugs nas// grang ga sgor gzhag khang pa 'dzag/ ku sha'i gzugs bstan rkang pas mnan/ dbad byar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlasan/
rgyal po tsho yang dbang 'gyur na// 'byung bo gzhan lcas ci dgos/ bud med skyes phyugs la sogasal/ 'ang ming ldan pa 'gazugs byas te// rkang pagalon ra nanaming bcas bzla// gang dang gang yang
nges par 'grub// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs briti/ sngags kyis brdungs n bag khar 'gyur// 'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te// gdab cing brdungs zhu sal bar byed// phur busag dag/
dang mtshon chas brub/ ro'i rab lcog brgyud ldan/ sa la byas pa'i thimasabasadu/ gzugs banAnabatsugs ste rkang pasam// gzas bzhinub mo ba'imatshal/ dribazangame tog sil ma bkram//
tsa pha'ol phyin pa'i[@]gas bam bzhugs// dngas ma'i stod dum bzhag ste// sa ldang mesan bskol ba'i bya// dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang/ gter mthong bur yang 'dis 'gyur 'o// khros
pas spyan gyi phyag rgyu bya// hUMmatha' gsang sngags drag tu brjod// dur khrod thal ba'ang byin ba/ gdon gyis 'dzinanam bran du 'gyur// de nas mi g.yo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags kyi cho ga bshang par
risama'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum// brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs// dben par can gyi chang bu sbyin// des ni rtag tu 'brel bar 'gyur// mdzub mo'i rtse la hU~M bkod nas// brjod pas sprin
rnams 'dral bar byed// dgra bo lhar bcas gzugs bstan la// rkang g.yon mnanabazlas lcags phur gdab// bka' nyan bgyur ro gtubs na sheng// skud pa ser po bcingasan ngag/ spang
leb mun nanamanan par 'gyur// ra lpags brab sanabaka' nyan 'gyur// srad bu yus kar la bzlas te// 'tshangan gang 'dod srung bar byed// namasarba ta b+hA ga ta sam+babi shwa mu khe b+husachub+hU/ o tsa

mahA ro Sha Na hU~MtaMb+hA ma hAtsaNA a tsal ka na hU~MhU~MhU~Ma pra ti ha ta ta thA ga tadzA/ sma ra hU~MhU~MphaTaAhU~M/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du// tsan dan sdugs pa'i pad+mani// sngags bcas ci tsam bsgyur
ba'i grangs// gser gyi dong tshe red par 'gyur// bram ze 'am na dge 'dunas// rgyal po'i lasasam glog la// pad+ma mu khyud gnyis ldan bri lta bar oM hU~M ming dang bcas// tsaN+DamahA 'o 'a//
phaT dang bcas pa 'dab mar bkod// mu khyud dang bo'i rtsa sngags te// gnyis pa 'jamadapalasngags nyid bri// dridang ma tog sogs mchod nas// skabs kyis dril nas lus la bcang// gdon
dang nad dang mu ge sal// g.yul du phyin n rgyal bar 'gyur// lang na ral gri sor bzhi'i bri/ 'od kyi ri mo nang chud pa// ye d+hamalasogs kyis bskor// dbus su mang dang bcas pa yi// snying po
sngagasan khrigs su bri// 'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyug/ mtho lngas 'khor ba'i bar du ni// mthogang 'phang du bod pa bya/ nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags//
mgon gyin du bltas pa bri// kha la 'o bar rten 'brelasngags// spra tshil las byas dgu yi gzugs/ dug dang gri khrag gis brisanas/ mang 'gagasad par bcas ban// ling ga'i snying khar
bcug byas to// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi// dbus su mtho gangathusabyas tenang gzhag stong du sbar bu sprub/ ji srid mar gyi tshes gcig nas// zla ba mi snang zhag bar du// nyin ma rten
'grol sngags bzlas te// mtshan dus khro bo lcan gacig pa// sngagasanadrag tu pa rjod par bya/ mtshams dang dzisrad mtshams bar du// g.yon du bskor zhang rtsa ba'i sngags/ drug cu rtsa bzhi'i
grangs su brjod// 'jam dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung// bdagshegs yigabargyu bas ni// mchod rten la migasagashangagasil// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig ba dang// sngags la 'phya
zhing sems can 'atsho/ log lta log par spyod byed cing/ sems can la'atshabyed ba// rgyal bo khro bo bcu la dang/ 'jig rten skyong dang rgyalachen bzhi/ mtshogs gza' dang rgyu skar tshogs/
bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol/ rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi// bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod// dur khrod sa la mchod rtan// nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i// srog shing nag po
gsum pa la// bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas drakri/ gur kum li khris dris pa'o// mya ngan mdangashing gru gsum la// rgya gramadabang chen rim par bca'// laM haM b+ha yananab brgyad// phyogs brgyad/
briba'i dbusal// snying ming dang bcas pa bri// de yi lta bar snying bon// gsad ba'i mang bcas khri ba 'o// tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod// mamo rnams dang legs ldan sras//
sha khrag ma toganagabos mchod// ji srid gsum dang bdun bar du// le lo med par byas gyur na// dag slong dge tshul bstan ldan gang// sdom brtson den ldan gyur te// sdig ldan myur du shi bar
'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad byar// gtum podordzo'adzin pa yis// sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste// khyad par spyor ba cung zad bshad// yungs kar bsnanangs 'byung po 'bros// sorab srung/
'khor lo'am// rdzudang dung labri bar bya// g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs// nad la 'khor la chu yungs kar// thod lo kor gyis sa khong la// khris te sgor sbas spre'u srug/ spra tshil gzugs bstan
sor bzhi ba/dur khrod thal bzlas sgostangs gzhug/ nad pa gdon las srungabar nges// snying khar mang sngags spyal banu gnas // tsher ma kha btsugs ngag rings byed// snying la btsugs nas
khros pa ni// nan tanasomasakyis gsod par nges// lengags brtags kyi nus bamed// yang na 'basachad thod pa la/ mang sngags bris te mi khrag bkang// rab sachad dur sbas rigs
rgyud 'chad// khyi dag thod par ming sngags bcas// dug ba kung glu gzhas smras mdzas 'dzin// dgra yi sgor smras 'byed par byed/ zhid du smras na le nas byed// phyugs
gnasagod 'byung zla dang 'byed/ chu dong sbasan chu skams 'gyur// ma dur sbyas na rims kyis 'dzin// yang na dgramang khrag gisabris// smratshil gzugs kyi snying khar bcug/ mchod rtenanag po
mthog nga ba'i// nang bcug dong ga zhag lhung bzed kyang/ bram ze gas bzhis sngags brjod cing/ nag po tshes nas phyis skor zhing// bdenamamakhru brjod gzugs brnyan sreg/ dgra bo shi 'gyur bya
tsos mang// gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag/ ka tra ta yi ltemam la// ka ra ka yi dus su/ gzugs lamang dang sngags bcas gra rkang pas nyes rdul du brgyug/ dordzo'adzan pa'i bka' bzhin
mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la// sngags dang yul lha'i ming stsal bri// lha yi gnas bcug da steng du// sngags bzlas phur pa snying kharagadab// gdug pa'itshar ma'i shom sbyar te// mi rta ba glang
la khyimaha// sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod/ lha khyod yul 'di'i thog ser thob// med na bskal pa'i khyod nyid sreg/ de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po
gsum dul ba bsregs ba gi/ gnod cigs thams cad sel bar byed/ yamashadi 'bras bugasum bsregs shing// gdon zhud thams cad zhibar byed// 'om cagyi yam shang la/ kho ma dur ba
til dang 'bras// snying rje'i sems kyis brgyabasregasan// gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// ga bur mnga' gsum 'bru thams cad// dur bdakar po'i yim shing rnams// 'o ma can gyi shing la
sreg/ nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi/ khrom sbyin sregabargya rtsa brgyud// phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyug/ dul bamang ba gsum ming bcas pas// bsregs pas rta phyugs nad zhi byed//
shar nub byang phyogs kyigi/ dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'khrug// khru gang khugonyasitshad kyi thab/ sor bzhi ba khyer rim pasagatang/ sems dapa' pad+ma'i rdo rjadang// gcig bus ni rgyas
dbang drag bkrub// de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sregani/ci'adod thob pa bshad par bya// pad+ma'i rlu ba 'bum phrag gcig/ rgyal bo 'thob ste blon po// ku mud la 'bum phrag gsum// zho dang mnga'
gsum dang bcas pa'o// a ba mazla'i 'bras bu dang/ mngar gsum 'bum gyisayul bdag 'thob// 'phazang 'bum phrag bdun gyis// yid la ci 'dod thob ba'i 'grug/ dur ba til dang 'bras
sogs srog bud med bu bzang thob par 'gyur/ nor 'dod pas na kun po gi lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas// mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni// nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur//
yang na rgyu yi pags ba la// gur kum gi'u wang yung bsani// byib cha brjed sar po bri// shar namadzod phugs bltas par gzhug/ zas kyi lhag lus mchod bya zhing// gsol
ba btab pas nor rod 'gyur// pad+ma'i ze ba ka lag/ bri yang kunor rad do// 'bras bsregs bas kyang nor chen thob// ku mud yi 'bras sogs srog/ longs spyod chedang sa gzhi 'thob//
pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsimar// sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog sel ba// gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar gsum bcas// 'bum phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni//
rang nyid rgyal po chen por 'gyur// mar dang nyungs kar dkar posanI/ nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregasan// snying po snying pa rgyas par 'gyur// nas la sogs pa'i 'bru ragis rnams// gang bsregs
gsol btab de rgyas bgyur// gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can// me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur// sngos shing bsregs na 'khor g.yog 'phal// zho mar seng ldeng mo la stong// bsragasan nor
rnams rnyed par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi srog blugs bshad// til dang 'bras sogs phub ma bsregs// bud med dbang du byed pa 'o// pri yang ku yi sbyan srog gis// byis pa rnams nadabang du'agyur//
'o ma sbrang rtse a ru ra'i/ shang la bsregasan lha dbang byed// gsum po dadang gu gul sreg/ gnod sbyin rnams dbang du 'gyur// myang n med pa'i yam shing gas// gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du
'gyur// rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas// bsregs pasargyal po dbang du 'gyur// de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i// sbyin sug yang dag bshad par bya// ming bcasatshad dang nam pa bsregs//
bstan sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi// dgra ming dug gisanim pa la// bris te dug dang lhan cig tu// sbrul shunathum po lnga byas nas// thod pa lnga yin ng bzhag ste// lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas//
gsum ni sbyadabugenyis btsugs la// khros pas gcig pus grol bas// sngags brjod thal ba'i gyur bar du// nyin phyed bsragasan dgrwa'achings// 'tshaltas 'dabu ma rtsa ba shun// ra khrag nyungs
mar tshwa rgya skyegs// tshoba'i bud shing yam shang la// bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa sreg/ stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi// bzhis ni bu dang chung ma 'chi// drug gis nya du gnyen 'dun rlag
brgyad kyis dgra yirang srog 'chad// gal daskyabs su 'ong 'gyur na// 'o ma stong bsrags rnal dusos// khrug dang dug phyanim pa'i 'bras// yungs mar la sbags brgya rtsa brgyad// myos byed la
bsregs dgra bo'achi// yang n bus phyagam pa'i lnga// rang gi khrag gam yungs mar sbug/ yang na skatsho dug dang ni// nim pa'i 'bras bu gsadapar bya// yang na gri khrag gis bsregs pas// byad ma
rgyud du gsod par 'gyur// nim pa'ilnga dngar khrig dug/ drim lnga bcasagazugs snying khar// ming yig banu gnas phur bus gdab// rig sngags byad mnyid ldog 'gyur// rgyaskyagasam rus phye ma/
@#// yis mi lpags rlon la dgragazugs bri// dug dang sku tshe nung zad byug rim pa'i mi la khros pas bsro// bsngags pas tsha ba'i rims kyis bci// dur ba'o mas sos/
par 'gyur// dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang/ mirus phya bsags phyagasa rnams mag/ chagasum lanatshadurang skyar// yungasamamaros sbrul shun dang// rim pa'i lnga dang mi rus// ska tsha dug phyi
sgog btsong dang// sgog skya tshar ma'i ma lag/ dgra bo khrag skyagos te 'chi/ rgyaskyags lan tshwa ba rlung mkhris// bsregs na mchin gos nad kyis 'chi// sgu'agashar lan tshwa tsha ba gsum//
rdza gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la/ mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du sreg/ thig nag gisanagasod par 'gyur// 'om can gyi yam shang la// dkar gsum bsregasan sos par 'gyur//
dri chus sbangasapa'os lasani thab khung byas te dug gis byug/ nam pa'i'adab mar dgru bo'i ming/ ra khragags bris rgyas pas bkris/ tshagasum shang gi mar bsregs pas// rgyal po myu
du 'chibar nges// dug khrag lan tshwatshab gsum// ming b.rus gzugs bstan nam ma'i mar// bsregasan dgrab dam rdzade ngam/ mdzend kyisan gsod par 'gyur// tsha gsum rim pa dug dang
dur khrag dang lan tsha'i gzugs brnyan ni// lan tshwam pa tshaba'i mar// byugs nas arga'ishing la bsregs// mdzand chen pos bzung nas 'chi// ra khrog tsha gsum nyungs mar spos/
[n ]nam pa'i lo ma na le sham/ nyungs mar dug bsrags tsha bas 'chi// ne'usha bam dug dang tsha// da ru ra lnga tsha ba gsum// sol ba lan dgra gzugs bya// nyungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi//
tshagasum pa yi 'bras bu yis// nam pa'i 'dab lu drag ming bri// thod par dug nyungs lhan cig gzhag/ da rur lnga bcos na 'ching// sa ma byang du bltas nas kyang// rang nyade lho phyogs blta bar
bya tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sogs// sa banu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems// rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal po dang//
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson// sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro// chad lta sngags 'khyud dkon mchog bcom// bstano la sdang zhangasems can 'tshe// mtshams medacan 'di sgralaM
du gsol// rlung gis 'dar zhing char gyisagasher// mesagadung rdulatshub skabs 'di'i skye// sang ga mkha' lding stag khro bas/ bcom zhing 'bu sbrang bung rgod kyis// khrag 'jib bya chogs
mkha' la khyer// mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtanano// de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa// mi cus phyam tsho sku tshe/ gnod sbyin 'khrig pa dug shang la// tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas//
bskud dang dbyed ng smyo bar byed// dur ba 'o mar bcas pas sos// da dur yan lag lta 'bras bu// tsher ma'i mes bsregs so bar byed// tsha gsum lan tshwasatshar ms bskyed// yang na shang
skum lta bur bsams/ dzam pa'i dang rang sgyur bcas// dgra bo grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs// khA'i sgo araNA'i mar zhus// byugs pa da dung ma la srog/ lag stobs
khu ta lta bur ni// dgra bo sa mtha' kun tubakhyam// skatshomi rus lanortswa dug/ nyungs mar nAm pa'i ma la sdug/ dgra bo rtag tu'athab pa dang// nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur// dur/
khrod thal ba sol bar bcas// dgra bo'i gzugs byas dum bur mnan// tshag rngam phur bus 'debs pa ni phol mig nad ngan spyad par byed// bya rgod 'ug pa byi la sha// ne'u lo'i bu rnams
khyor ba'i mar// drugatsut+tabargyad bsregs pa yis// mthun gnyis myur du 'byed par nges// khrag can s la gzugs bris nas// rkang g.yon skar mnan tsham rngam bcas// 'dong bcas
sngags ni drag po yis// brgyal dang rimasanadamacharanang bskyod/ dgra yi sku dang rkung rjes sa// dgragazugs dug dang ske tshes byug/ chos mes bsregasan rengs par 'gyur// dgra yi pha rus
dug rab sgyur// gzugs byad nam pa mer bsregs na// dgrab gdon chenend kyis 'dabs/ phag rtug sna ha argya'ishing// tsher mas bsregasan mgo 'khor 'gyur// rnalu le byi la
byi tsher spu/ bsregasan bud med bu slog 'gyur// mi dang ne'u le khA rus pa// yungs ma zhim pa'i mi la srogaM/ grong dang grong khyer bskrad par byed// stag spu thod rus 'og pa'i spu// sa ha
me togan le sham// zhim pa'i lo ma dug bsregs byed// zhim pa'i 'bras bu dug lan tshwa// da dung 'bru bsregs nad skyed byed// dug khrag da dur 'bras bu yis// yapa'i shing la dgra ming bri/
tshagasum lan tshwa khrag gis byug/ lcags snod yungs marananga bzhi gnas // nim pa'i shing gi ma yis btso// dgra bo lha dang 'byed par 'gyur// mi phyi bya rgod dus phye dug/ sku tshe yungasam
sprulashun dang// nam pa'ilnga dang skugs lan tsha// tsher mes bsregasanand kyis 'debs// sku tshe dug sbrul tshaba'o mar// gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung// char ches pa dang thog

thob 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rma khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi la'u stadag po'o//'gababasdus pa'irgyud las/ spyanasragag la'u stadag po'o//de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sogs// 'khor gyi
rakyil 'khor thams cad kyis// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang// snyan pasached du 'di brjod do/ emasangs rgyas thams cad la// thabs dang shes rab bsam du med//
thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni// mtshungs med rgyu chadamachos gsungs// dugagi 'jigs pasas stangs 'khrigs// nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi// bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'di
gus// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stongs par 'gyur// de nas tshangasasogs 'jig rten skyong// rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas// ma zhang ched du brjod pa 'di// snyan pa'i tshig gis
rab tu gsol// am sangs rgyas chab 'i bdag/ sems can kun la sman pa bdagyes// skyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yis// mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs/
gsus pa 'di la gang gnas pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshosbyong// 'gro la smana mthong bsgrubs pas ni// lhag pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// byung
chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ngo mtshar spyonani gdangs nas su// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod di// amasangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// gdod nas thugs su 'gro ngan chud// rtog med/
rang bzhin las grol nas// bsam gyis ma khyab go 'phang gsungs// 'chang byed dang po ngan 'grogacod// gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed// de rjes 'jigs med nga yi mdu// dogs pa
spangasan zad par gyis// sa la bzhugs nasasems can don// ma bsamasathogs pa med par bud// gsang sngags rgyal po skyob kun la// sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub sta/ nam mkha'
nuser dag pa ltar// sgom pa bla med yid rgyus byed// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// ma lus pa rnams 'dusanas kyang// gtso lam tog gtor byas te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de/
a masangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// 'gro la phan dang don byed pa'i// cho ga'aming dang shes rab dang// snying rje'i byibasargyas gyur nas// mnar med la
sogasangan 'gro yi// 'jigs rnams las brgal pad+ma ltar// rnal 'byor can de mdzes par spyod// de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i/ phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas// shin tungs pas snyan
tshig gis// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de// emasangs rgyas chos chen dang// dge 'dun dkona mchog bsam mi khyab// 'khor ba'i mun pa chen por ni// bying bsabalta dka' rtogs pa yis// sngags

dang phyag rgyobasam mi khyab// mthong dang thos pa tsamagyis kyang// bltadaka' 'byung po drag po rnams// lhag pa'i sems na smyos par 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha mo che// spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams//
ngomatshar gyur nas spyanagadangs te// snyan pas ched du'adi brjod do// amasangs rgyas rmad du byung// emasangs rgyas dpa' bo che// emasangs rgyas rab tu zab// chos rnams skye med 'gag
pa med// sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol pa ltar// sgyum gdul bya tshim mdzad pa// spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar// sgyum rab tu 'phel bar mdzad// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// stong
gsum mi mdzad 'jig rten khams// gdul ba dag la rab gzigs nas// 'dul mdzad rdornga 'chang ba la// ngomatshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni// ched du brjod pa 'dibastod do// o zhes dang po phug
'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa// ser sna rnam par d gnas yo byadadabang thob dang// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// rab dga' yo shes khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dud//
tsaN yig dribazang tsan dan byugs dang nga tshul mtshungs// tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshul dbang ba dang// las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// dri med
yashos khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo// Na yinyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i zhi gnas dang// bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang// mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes bya'i stobs dang
ni/ 'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshal lo// ma yagi sgyu 'phrul chen po lhaga mthong che ba'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang// khamasakyi rnam pa sna
tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// 'od byed ye shes gshin rjegashed po phyag 'tshal lo// hAyigam chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog spungs pa che// bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob
dang[]thams cad dag lu'agro ba'i lamadag stobs dang// sbyang dka'aye shes rta mgrin khro bo phyag batshal lo// 'o yig 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang thob// bsam gtan rnam
thar ting 'dzin dnganisnyoms zhugs pa'i// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen stobs// mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo// kha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen dbang
phyug chen po rgyal// stobs chen dag las mos pa la nidabang thob dang// sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// 'di dusang bab ye shes bdud rtsi'akhyil la 'dud/
Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso// smon lam dag pas smon lam che la dbang thob dang// dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// mi g.yo ye shes khro bo stobs
chen phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M yigahu lu sprin gdongs 'brug sgra gad rgyas can// thabs dag pas niya shes che la dbang thob dang/ 'chi 'phodang nu gang zhig skya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs//
legs ba'i blo gros yo shes khro bo mdzad bdud// phaTasgras thegachags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs// ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang// thag pa thams cad yang dag zad
pas mkhyen pa'i stobs// chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud// de nas chos rje thub pas nai// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas// 'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs ta//
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus// lagan rdo rjemathu chen la/ snyan pa'igasung gis bka' stsal pa// mchog tu brtan pa'i babasngags pa// rdo rje theg pa blan mad// mi gang
bsod nams dman pa 'am// mtshams mar la sogs byed pa yang// rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag/ gsar 'gyur gyi ni rtse bzhin du// log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang// rtog
med bde ba'i skur byung ste// rmilam bzang po'isams bzhin du// rnam 'phrul sna tshog sacir yang snang// mu mtha' med pa 'khor ba'i mtsho// bskul pa'i gazisachen bla mar 'di
chags gsang mang pa'i tshul du ni// khyad kyis rtag tagazung ba// lag na rdo rje stobs po ches// ston pa la ni 'di gsol to// rgyud 'di phyung ma thag tu// gdul
dka' ba rab tu zhi// sa stengasand dang gnamu go/ bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral// slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyisaM/ brtan por bdagagis gzung bar bgyi// dpa' bo mkha'
'gro drag po rnams// yid kyis brtul zhugs phyung nas kyang// rgyud 'di'adzinapa'irjesasu 'brang// lha dang 'jig rten pa dang// ma mo srani mo mkha' 'grom// sha za gnod sbyin
srin po rnams// rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed// rgyud 'dzin lengs sngong spel bar byed/ ston pasagasungs pa rdo rje 'dzin legs so shan tu chen legs so// rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor
can chen de// rgyun du srung zhang blo 'phel mdzod// de skyid kyi'i gsung thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang// mkha' 'gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong// lha klu gnod sbyin dra zer
bcas// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams// gyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i// mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i btson ra nas/ lha klu 'bum phrag 'dzi brul
dkarapo dgo ba'i kun slonganams// skyes nas byang chub rani chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad byung mtshar// rgyas pa'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shan tu gsang// 'phags pa rdo rje
bas khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus ba las// mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so//
rgyugar skad du/ Ar+ya kalcab tInAm d+hAr Ni/ bod skad du/ baphags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu n gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po lagan rdo dang thabs cagi tubazhugs te// de nas
lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug nas lha'i
dbang po brgyabyin rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lham yin gyi sgyu dang/ rig sngags rnams dang/
gsang sngags dang/ sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang/ bdag cag la thugs brtso ba dang/ lham yin rnams kyi
skya dang/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ sman rab tugazhom pa dang/ rab tugazhig pa'i slad du rnam par rgyal pa chen pa'i gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/
khu@#// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pan/ rig sngagrwa
rnams dang/ gsang sngags rnams dang/ sman rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir ragi sngags brjod par bya ste smyuthams cad rengs par byed pa//
rig sngags thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mtshang 'bru ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu
zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsharig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gangabasal
pa grangs mad pa gsum du/ gzhan mu stegs can sbyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyudang/ gcer bu pa rnams kyisangan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las/ ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan/
pa rnams kyi rig sngags thams cad bzlogazhas pa zol tuphyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang/ kun turlu dang/ gcer bu pa dang/ 'tshob rnams
kyi sgyu dang/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ smanadang/ bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i 'og pa chen po de ngas bshad par byaso/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyisasems can
thams cad rjes sugazung ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen po thung zhig/ bcom ldan 'as de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ lha'i dbang po brgyu ban bcom ldan 'das kyi
ltar nyan pa dang/ de nas bcom ldanubadas kyis de'i tshorig sngags chen po gsur can 'dadagabaka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ o hin hin/ hrili dal/ mi li mi li/ hrimi la//

nihir pAni/ kany+tsanA pa ti/ lo kAmAte/ b+hate/ b+hUta/ man/ ad+hi kr-i te ba de be de ta man+tA/ ad+hi kr-ite/ hanahan/ hes has/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ b+hin+dab+hin+da b+ha ga ba ti/dza ya bi dza ya/

dzam+b+han/ stam+b+haniban d+hani/ mohani/ amok+tashakaud+har Ni/ grot+tagro/ kA Na mamAn si/ dzam+b+ha la dzas ya/ b+hany+dzaya b+hany+dzaya/ stam ya stam+b+haya/ b+han+d+hAya b+han+d+hAya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya//
lha'i sgyu dang klu'i skyadang/ gnod sbyin gyisgyudang/ sin po'i skyadang/ mamakha' lding gi sbyadang/ dri za'i rgyudang/ lha ma yin rgyu sgyu dang/ mi 'am ci'i sgra dang/ lto 'phachen po'i
sgyu rang/ rig sngags 'chang ga smyudang/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i skya dang/ drang srong ga skya dang se masacan dang rigasngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgyu dang/ 'byung
bi skye dang/ sgyu thams cad ra la ra la/ radz+dzase// d+humad+humaM/ d+hu rUm rAb 'banA ban kAnatsan/ grwan thani/ han han/ sarbabati/ sha rlu rgyun/ stam+b+ha laM/ b+ha yu lha/
ya sAr+yan stam+b+ha ya/ sonan stam+b+ha ya/ ba ru Nan/ sam+b+haya/ asmin stam+b+ha ya/ udananad+hi tib+hi ti/ d+har Ni/ pA shahaste/ bany+tsa ya pAshen/ gang dag bdag la
phyir rgol ba rnams dang/ dgra rnams M dang/ sdang ba dang/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ 'thub pa dang/ rab tu'athab pa dang/ mi yin par 'dod pa thams cad han

han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dzaya b+hany+dzaya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stsal+lAya/ ban ng+ha ya ban ng+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo hA ya/ mahAmo hAnaM/ b+ha ga ba tisAhA/ bdug 'jigs pa
thams cad dang/ gnod pa dang nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shigayaNasAhAko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon pe chen
po gang la la zhag gsal can gyi rig sngags 'dirjes su dran par byed na/ ri la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo// de'i sde la phaphel gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugasaso// lhas ma yin
klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin byas ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma yin nam mkha' ldingagis ma yi// mi 'am cisam yin/ rig sngags
'chang gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chiba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol
[f/]gyidamag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmagatshogs kyis 'chiba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang/ chudang/ dug dang/ rig sngags dang/
gsang sngags dung/ sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so// gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang/ byed du bcug pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar 'gro ba
'gyur ro// kolusha ka de lta bsan dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsamanam/ dge bsnyan ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rogis kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di la lan bdun
bzlas te bdag gi lus la byugs na/ bdag gilus srung bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad dang// rig
sngags thams cad dang/ gsang sngags dang smanathams cad dang/ byad thams cad lasanyan rtsa 'das par 'dod pas/ gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o// rgyal po 'am/
rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'dul bar 'dod pas/ gser can gyi 'ogi sngags 'di dran par bya'o// lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun
bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba 'am/ tshulalan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o// 'jigs pa thamasacad la thogs pa med pa'igazungs yi ger bris te 'chong bar bya/
mgul du gdags par bya'o// yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na/ dge ba dang bde bar thar par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'di'i/
stobs kyin ng mi dang/ g.yog 'khor dang/ sde dang bcas tadag pa dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyur ro// ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas
srad bu dkar po la lan bdunapazlas te mdud pa bdun bon/ bcings pa dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// skya rengs par byas par 'dod pas/ dur khrod kyis la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na/
sgyurengs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa'i tshi kha lkugs par byed pas/ zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'choson/sgrub thams cad kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro// ba klog par bya//
lo ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab cuzhibar 'gyur ro// gang gis byas par gyur pa dang/ gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'agro'o//
srud bu btags sam/ chus bdag bsrung bar byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags dang/ sman thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro//
de'i don thams cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs taM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
[n/ ]bstod do// 'phags pa gsaracan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzan mi tra dang/ dAnashI la dang/ zhuchen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur
cing zhus pa skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/@#// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gamtshan brgya rtsa brgyad paM/
gzungs sngagasadang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// namasarba bud+d+hA/ bo d+his wAnAn/ saman+ta a mo g+ha/ a pra tig

ta shA sanAnAn/ nam A ba lo kiteshwa rA la/ mahA bo d+hisatAya/ badzrasats+tshAya/ badzrabi pu lA ya/ pad+masaM b+ha b+hA ya// pad+ma yo na ye/ tad+ya thA/ AtsIka ra/ ka ra pra b+ha ka ra badzrasatwA/
badzrasaM b+hab/ pad+masaM b+hab/ pad+masAg ra/ pad+mago tsar/ ba ra da mahUM kA ru Nika/ ka ru NasaM b+hab hU~MhU/ d+ha ra d+hur/ da ra da ra/ ba rab ra/ mahA kA ru Nika ma hAshud+d+hasat+tha sAhA/
denas phyogasabanu'id bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang sku/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/
yon tan rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas/ saMmasacan rnams la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ichos bstan pa legs so legs so// 'di nithos pa tsam gyis kyang
@#// sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o// gang la la nyan pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa des ni yon tan phun sum tshogs
pa thams cad dang dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag duman khyab cing 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po kun tu sa ko lta ste/
'khor dang bcas pa dang// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems japab thomasacad kyis mgo bo btud nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gabregs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyag
dbang po rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa/ sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba// srid gsum molus yon tan chen po'i bodag/ dri mir skyon
bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chog/ rab dga' rab dgyes zab tu ston pa 'o// bskal pa bzang po rnam par zhi ba'i gtso// shin tu rnam dag
yon tan chen po'i bdag/ rnam dag dumar grags pa'i me tog glod/ rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa// mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes// dpag med pas
kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung// skyabs dang yade 'phrog dag cing sol bar mdzad// nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba// srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan// thos pa'i rgya mtsho las
can kun pas dpa'// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog/ snyan cha'agul zhung pad+mag pa bsnams// dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can// tshul bzang yon tAn
skyed du 'tsham pa'i gzugs// 'jigs pa'irlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon chacan// dge ba'i rgyusta dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu// tshul gyi las sbyong bde can mchog gi rgyu// dkyil 'khora mchog gi
spyod yul rgyugacig pa// srid gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags// dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan tasdegamed pa/ gsar mdog bod rgyun rten du gyur pa ste// mnyam pa nyid kyis mimanyam
mtshungs par 'gyur// sa bskyis bod zer rgyas pa rgyun 'phreng mnga'// chen po'atshab thogs pa med pa ste// sngamamun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med// dge bdag pas sbyor yul rnam par dag/
tshul gyi dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag/ srid gsum dbang phyug pad+malas byung ba// srid gsum bde chen yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste// dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa 'o//
de bzhin gshegs pachen po rab mchog yangs// nor bu'i rgyun tardo rje rgyan du thogs// pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba// dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa// bde la longs spyod rnam
'drenachen po'abadag/ smon lam rgya cherlamatsho ldan pa ste// 'grobasring pa lhung ba 'grol mdzad nga// sa dang mnyom pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad// bskal bzang bskal pa stong gis gnang ba bo
rdo rje mchog gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor can// yon tana rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor ba// dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo' rtsal mnga' ba// de bzhin nyid chos ramakhyen/
sbyol yul can// cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan// lha chen brgyamanga' sum du gsum bdag dbang// lhadang lha min dbang bcas rnams kyis btud// brtson 'grus/
brgyadang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'// bsod nams brgya mang mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba// pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung// dkyil 'khorab sgyu yi dbus na mdzes pa ste// chos brgya ldan
pa mchog steng ston pa po// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa// bskal pa rab 'byamamang ngor mkhasaM pa ste// dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku// 'jig rten
'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po// rgyu chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzadu me tog thod// na bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad
pa/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa lags// chaphrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad ma shes// dpa' bo'i nyi ma 'od zer rgyun mnga' ba// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra'od/
gsal zhing// nyims kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa// ma tog mchon mthogs pa'i lha zhes grags// gtsug phud gsum pa tshangs sras skyadagu'i bdag/ btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen
nang du skyes// rang gi rigasagasal dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba// pad+mabazang po'i ges mchog thig le'i mtshan// spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa// gsang sngags mang po 'dzin
pa'i dbang phyug po// tshog sachen bdun ma 'dus pa'i mda' bdag lags// spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa// ka la bang ka'i skad kyis snang ba 'dul// mda' dang
rus ga zhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams// stobs kyi lha sku stobs dang brtsonapos 'dul// rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par sprad pa ste// rgyalab rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod//
tshogs mchog dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstodapa// tshusrina'adzin khri 'jigs las rab grola mdzad// gzugasamang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa// lha yul grol ba'i khyad par
kyil 'khor can// mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs madamathu rtsal mnga'// stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan// 'jig rtenanang na mkhas pa sbyin ras gzigs// sagazhi'i dkyil 'khor
dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can// bod bram ng po stong phrag zad mi shes// nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa// mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigos pa ste// rab zhi kun las 'phags
pa'i spyod yul can// don dam tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba// theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'inyim lags// dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes// skye dgu rnams kyi dris ma lus bcom//
@#// blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po// bde ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can// bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad// rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa'o/
rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brtes pa'iblo// bdi la longs spyod che'abyung drim mad// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shang dri mid pa// ming dang srid med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten
mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po// stobasadang rigs dang mthu stobs tshab lags// sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchogarin chen mtshungs// dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub
par dka'// khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs// khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i/ jorjesams mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalale/ pad+ma dri med
phyag gi dbus bsnams pa// thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan codapa thogs// spyi bo 'od dpag dang rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// ra nas bcom ldan rang byungamun sol ba rngachen sgra ltar brtan pas
bka' stsal pa// mchog chen rdo rje'aglu la bstod pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyonasol legs pamanga'// casti la la rtag tudage mchog 'dod/ rdzunaras gzigs dbang 'dzibastod byed pa//
