desaniring po mi thogs yon tan gyi// longs spyod mchog chen cos ni thob par 'gyur// mi gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la/ spyan ras gzigs dabang dmapa sngonapa byed// sdig pa rnams
kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur// 'dod pa gang yin bad bag de yis 'thob// den sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos te// lamasung bzangapor dmegs te bgro bar 'gyur// sridagasum skyabs 'os gcig
pa pad+ma skyes// de 'dri'i chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur// de ltar mang ga khyadapar grub 'dod cing// gang zhugartag tubade bar 'dod pa yis// 'gro kun skye dgub bdag po spyanasagazigs//
pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod bar gyis// bcom ldan badasablam 'phagasapa sbyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan bargya rtswabargyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan bargyartsa brgyad po gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dapa'i sems dang ba chen po byams pa la phyag batshal lo// de nas byang
nubasams dpa' byams pas rangagi snying po gsungs pa// namasnaya d+hIkAnAn/ sarba tathA ga tAnAn/ tad+yathA/ os ras ra/ su u ru d+ha rad+har/ mahAd+ha rA/ tsa ratshar/ mahUtsar/
b+ha 'ab+har/ mahAb+har/ kam kam+pa/ mahAkam+pahUM/ ma yAh+pha ra Na/ d+harmaa gra sA ga ra sAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kyem gzungs chen po na
yon tan bsta/ mtha' yas pa'i khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/ de bzhin gshags pa grasamad pa 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad sred kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang/ sdug bsngal pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar bar

byed pa'o// sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongasasu tharapar byed pa de shani tu dkon pa'o// de nas rdo rjadakyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pas nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings
pa rgya'aphreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thalamo sbyar nas/ byang chub mas dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyisa mngonaparab stod pa// dpa' bo chen po thobs
brnyes pa// rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste// 'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal// dar ba chen po mngon par rgyas// tshan chen stobs ldan che bas// de bzhinagashegasashang rdul dang bral/ dpang

chen bartse ldan 'od ldan pa// sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon// rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste// mtshon chachen po rdo rje'i mtshon// yon tan bod rgyas bsgyings pa ste// nor bu'i rnama'i rgyan thogs
ma/ pa srid gsum rig dpa' ba'i sku// rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can// lhun po zla 'byin tise yi// rus dkyil4lor 'char ba po// dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa// rab tu gal ba
de bzhin des// yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha// chob lha rnams kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyus mdzad cing// sangs rgyas dakyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas longs
spyod longs par spyod// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// dus zla babyin bzhin du gnas// sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa// rdo rje'ipad+malegs pabaskyas// chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod//
sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'// snang bar mdzes pa 'byung ba 'o// srid gsum ye shes nyem lags/ dogatso bo tshan po che grags pa// sang ge chen pa stobs po che// cha lugs chen po zhol tsheb//
skya bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul// rdo rje byu ru bskrun// nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs// byurugaser gyi gcal bkram la// skuchen zhags kyi stabs kyis gshegs// zhal gdangs nyi ma
du ma'i gzi/ lcang lo cod pan dbu thod can// ragi sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la gtugs// rjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod// nor bu rgyan 'gul 'od zer kyis// brang gi phyog
rnams dag par byas// cod pan can tu'od 'chor ba// nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan// banichen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing// drimadadakyil 'khor rab tu baphro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa/
yi 'bar bachen po'i lta ba can// 'od zer mang pos phog pa yi// phan pa'i thabs n rab ston pa/ brjid pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa yi/ bod kyi zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung
rgyan 'od zer spel bar bkod// tshon bris shan mdzes par 'tsher// lhun po phrad cing 'khrug pa ltar// dad zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrog/ rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo can// shin tu dga' mdzad/
@#// bde sbyin pa// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go mar bgos// btsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen pa shin tu 'bar/
byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas dpa' ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// ma pham thub med dam pa ste// sangs rgyas malugs mnyam ma che// byams pa'isnying po snying po che//
byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba// rdorje 'chang chen rdo rje can// ro rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud// de bzhin bstan cing bstod pa 'o// grub
pachen po'i rig sngags grub// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thams cad gruba mdzad grub pa 'o// sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges//
mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa/ ngas gyur des pa'i 'od sgronagyi// snang bas drim sel bar mdzad// bab ba rtsamar 'od snang ba// dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste// gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos
dbyings dang// nyabar gyur cing shin tu nges// swAhAsAhA'i bdag po mchog/ 'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad// stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa// nyim 'dra ste snyoms pa lags// stobs
byed rgyalaba'i las spyod ldan// mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med// dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes
za ston// rlung chen shugs kyis bskyod pa yis// g.yo dang 'brug sgrog sgra ldan pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes// mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes//
khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ de nas sa yi dbang phyug po// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la// bstod nas kun mkhyenaganod bral ba// thub pa'inyi mas bka' stsal pa/ kyam/
mang brgyabargyad mchog/ ma gi yon tan 'od ldan la// badzad ng phunasumatshog sasgrub pa// thabs chenublamar bsta// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun gyibad byed pa// 'dabaton
pa tsam gyis kyang// sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi/ byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la// ming brgya rtsa brgyadadam pa 'dis// min la la gang bstodapa//

de la lha la sogs kun dang// laganardo rje stobs chen rnams// rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun// gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyada mchog/ myur du'adon pa'i mi de ni
sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom yod med do// nang par mal nas langasanas ni// gang zhig byams pa'i sams kyis bstod// de la byams par rtog pa yi// byams pa bde legs byed/
par 'gyur// de phyir drim thams cad rnam par sel byed cing// sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad skyod pa dang// de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngalasal ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lcogs//
'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogasaso//oM Ami tri yaM swAhA/
'phags panam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bsanam mkha'idakyil dri zhim

par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// os sti ka mA laka bi pu lasam ba/ d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra snyahA/ gzungs

'di brjod ma thag tungan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni ba rtsazhibar gyur// salang g.yos par gyur/ sprubu cha dag gi sgru'ang grag par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legasasi zhes bya ba byin no//
dezhasabcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa// skye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi sAhA'i
mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shun tudaka' ba pasong nyams chen po snyeg pa dpon lo la gru byedug pa// byang chugasems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rinapo che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon
cig dang/ 'di thos pos dri mamed par 'gyurazhing legs par khrus byas pa'i 'gyur la/ shin tu rnam par dagapar 'gyur ro// pad+ma lta bur 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so// nyi ma lta bur
'gyur te/ sems can thams cad snang bar byed do// zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tusim par byed do// nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ nasongagi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis
mi gosaso// sagazhi lta bur 'gyur ti/ mtho dman med do// lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par minus so// thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bod ba dang sdug bsngalagyis
mi gosaso// de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad mad grangs med pa dag thob par gyur te/ nyanang dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ ston pa tsam dang/ bzlasaM brjod byas
pa tsam gyis gang ci'ang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang/ smon pa dang/ re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro// bzlasabarjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang chab ches pa dang/ mar mi 'bab pa dang/ sdangams dkrugs
pa dang/ mind dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ gnodapa 'byung ba dang/ 'jigs pa'i dus dang/ 'chibadang/ chom rkun dang/ mgon med pa dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ gcan gzan dang/
muga'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/ bde ba dang/ 'byor pa dang/ ci'adod pa dang/ cil dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad

kyis hahazhos capodang gzhabatoti/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyanasna tshogs bskyod de snyings phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags banam mkha'isAngapa'i mtshan
brgyartsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstodapa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog/ 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtshomanga'/ sems can/
dag pa bla med rin chen mchog/ thar pa'is bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dngulegs minamakhyen// thar mkhyen chos makhyin bde dang mi bdemakhyen// lamamkhyen g/
mkhyan dag dang ma dgamakhyen// dusamkhyen dage mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyan// 'gro mchogachos mchog samus can yon tana mchog/ lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog/

rgyun mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang ma bodzin mchog/ dga mchog stobasa mchoga mchog dang mchog mina mchog/ nir bsnying rje'i rab sta 'khor gyi rab// bod rab thar pa'irebastargyanagyi rab// rgyarab sngag
kyi rab sta thugs brtse'i rab// mnyam rab sems can rab stagasum rig rab// legasasgron mchog sgronastobs dang stobs chen sgron// thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyalamin sgron// dge sgron gzi sgron
nor bu bod kyi sgron// skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron/ mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od// legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od// bod chen gati mug rab tu'abyed pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i

'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od bochang ba// rdo rje'i dbang po'i 'dren dbangasems can dbang// rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal bab stobs rgyun chad med dbang// dpa' bo ragi sngags/

'chang dbang srid gsum dbang// rdo rdzobazang po rdo bod rdorje 'bar// rdo rjes mas dpa' rdo rje'abar bas brgyan// rdo rje'i 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rdzodrag/ rdo rje rgya chen jo rdzorab mchog dbang// nabaza' sngo zhing sku yi cha

lugasasngo// skumadog sngo zhing spro ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// ral gri rna 'jebs sngo zhing bstan pa bsnams// mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'baranang na bzhugs// lha zhal dri med shane dumi bzad 'bal/ rab tu dral

la bod zer 'phro zhing 'gyur// sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed 'phreng mchog can// glog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgrog la brtan// b.lagri mtshon thogs dpaldan mathu stobasamatsho// rdo ya mtshon thogs mda' dang
mdung thung 'jigs// 'khor le'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa'i dang 'khrul// gsal shing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa// bad 'byang 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje dbug/ sku rnams thams cad ma'i
bod kyis brgyan// grags pa'i rigasasu byung bas rgyal po mad// mu tig 'phreng bas sgrog cing mdzes par bgyis// sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes// rob 'jams mchog bzhus sa la
'jug pa brnyes// mthu stobs lhag pa bores shing grub brnyes la// jigapa gsum gyi stobs brtasamathu brnyes pa// bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa// cha lugs/sala mchog dar ba chen po
'dran byams 'dren nyi ma'adrenacing skye dgu 'drin// legs 'dren zhingag stobs 'dren snying brtsi can// drimad tshalugasagasal ba chalugs 'bar// rnamagragasasgog pas grags pa'i ba dan can// 'gro ba'i
skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pamakhyen// longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'isams kyis 'jug/ sku dmar skumathon sgamadzes sku bzang ba// skusar sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku//

sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku// rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen basnams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pana mchog/ cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/ dpal 'dzin rin chen dam
pa 'chang ba'i mchog/ sngags baniphyag rgya'achang ba phunasum tshogs// 'bamadzesamakha' la gshegs shing rab turgyu// srid gsum kyi mgacig pu 'od stong mnga'// ri rtsar 'chab bdal legs bkra
shis pa// yon tanamathu stobs khyad par rnam par grags// nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od// khyim nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun magon gcig pu// nam mkha'i dkyil
nor gcig snang ba// sems can rnam dag yangs shinge rnam par grags// srid gsum bsrungamagacig pu rgyal sras mchog/ zhib rab duzhib skyabs 'os sdug/ skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad+mas+yas//
kun nas bod bzang legs bshad chos mngar ba// darab legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag/ blo bzang 'od bazang bde ldan skye gnas bzang// mkhas rab zhi ba mchog gi chos dang lda/ zhi mdzad rgyal

'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas// bod kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byunga shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa// snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad// rnamagrol nges

0 grolashAn tugrol ba'i blo// blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun tu las spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog/ blo gros brtan padakon mchog gsum las bsgrubs// sangs rgyas pad+ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i/
nul// dag cing spyan yangs malugs yid du 'thad// snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul// ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun bzhes rab gsal ba// spyan thur mda'i ni rab dul gtadra legs pa// 'jigamed
zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra// mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon chardzogs// drag po 'jigs pa sdig salagaMsum las skyes// rab dulamakhas pa bgrogs dga' 'adris pa sla// rab tudrag pa
gnyen rab gsal mdog can/ lha chen bade byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams// spyanagasumarig pa gsum ldan m gsum sel// 'od bzang ma tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'// na bza' bzang mnabs
g.yas 'phan tshabs cher 'phen// legasabris sna tshog sa mtshonamasna tshogs mdab// na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal// zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra// zhalamadas bstan pas
'jig rten kun 'byora mdzad// bzhed pa ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mda'// zhalamadangs rgya mtshog sal mdzad lam me ba// dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba

'dzin// sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros rnaba'i mchog/ rgyun 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan/ rgyudang mi rgyu'agro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshags pa/
mgon sras 'phreng ba bzang// stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bkab lung mnyam zhing brtags// mi yi mnga' bdag mtho rasi spyod pa'i rgyu// rlu'adra

'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can// mthu stobasama' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan// ston pa bzang po stong nyidi lamakyi stags// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad// brtan po rgyu la 'ab tu bsagyur/
pa dkyil 'khoradam pa kun gyi slobadapon lags/ gcig pu skyo dgu'i dkyil 'khor chogamakhyen// rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nias skyes// dbangabaskur brnyes shings bcur legs par gnas//
gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sal bu dang// sdig 'amasamtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas// bdagshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa//
'jig rten zla ba gcig shar b zhin dusung// mamakha'isnying po sems can gcig pu yi// mduna'aduganang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang// de ni sringagasum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing// drima'i gnas

kun las kyang thar par 'gyur// g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shan tsami bzad dang/ muga'i gnod pamanang byung ban// mkhas pa su zhig sngar las dad bskyed nas// nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa// deni'ajig

ba'i'abyung gnas thams cad dang// sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdegapa mas las grol// sanizhi mchog mchog bden gnas dang// bad ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur// bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am//

rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs noba'athob dang// rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi sgrub phyir// btonan 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshomamad// de phyir rtsis rtag tu'adod bde kun// 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' bo//
nam mkha'ising po sridagasumamagon po la// rtag tubastan cing sngags kyang bstan par bgyi// 'phagasapanam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
'phags pa kun tubazang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po kun tubazapo nam mkha'idakyil kun

rab 'byamA ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i dbo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal bar brnyesapa/ sa'idakyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid bshes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can byang chub
sams pasams dpa' chen po mchog dang rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/ yon tan chen po'i skus kun tumanga'a mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas deb byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog
kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshog can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byamasa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpasams dpa' chen

po kun tubazang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi skurab 'byamAkun tuyongs su rgyas par gyur ta 2 nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su
gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhingarab 'bum thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'id bzhin gshegs ni
rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang sta/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba

thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog/ lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas/ de'i tshosangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas
gzungs 'di bshad do// tad+ya thA kA onamonam lci/ b+hu ban/ shAre/ ma hA/ b+ho gA ya/ a samasam/ amr-i tas ma anan sam/ gagan sam/ tib+hu banas ma 3/a she khasum/ ba kus ma/ ba ramArmis
ma swa b+hA bsam/ tatha tAsam/ ar dzasam/ shud+d+haMsam/ bud+d+hisam/ d+harmata b+ha kAs ma/ a b+hi Shas ma/ sa mas ma/ a kA nA ya sAgar/bi shud+d+hI/ A lo ka/ nyAhI/ lab+ha lab+b+ha//

cha bi dza ya bi dza/ o/ pras ga ta/ na yan ya/ ham ni ra d+hiSh+Than/ saMb+hog/ oM an la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dzaya dza ya/ hU~MhU~M/ d+ham d+ham sAhA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyathu bo/
'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa// byang chub sems dpa' kun tubazang pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor

0 g.yo bar byas nas 'di skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so// de nas lha dang lham yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sams dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer 'bar

zhing snang la/ rab tukayo bas brgyan pa'i lus can s steng kun gyi rdo rje ma tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas hadazhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste sa pa// kyemasnying rje chen po dang/ yon tan ga=

med pa'i rgya mtshorab 'byam pa'i gzungasa chen mo/ kyemasangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/ mtha' dang dbus medaba'is gsum dang mnyam zhing/ sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
gnas pa/ chos kyidakyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kyam bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'ibag chen sa sel cing/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho sems l/ lta ba'i ri bo 'thor ba
byed pa'i gzungs chonamo/ bskal pamatha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'itshogs 'byung ba yadag par bsags shing/ bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyis bo ma bsgrubs la/

thams cad mkhyen pa'isa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa// rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzus chen mo 'dimanyan par yang mi nuson/

gzung ba dang/ bklag pa dang/ kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/ gzungs chen mo 'di'iming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos pa dka' 'o/ kyam gzungasachen mo 'disems can gang dag gi lag
na'adug pa de dag ni nad pa legs par rnyed pa'o// 'tshob bzang pos 'tshob// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o// yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// 'dilanagacigabarjod pa tsam gyis n gnas ogi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod

pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod pa tsamagyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par bgyura'o// de ltar n brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par

'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng mthong bar 'gyur 'o// 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las tharapa ra 'gyur ro// shing gcig bsgrangs kyi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams
cad thob bar 'agyur ro/ 'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nasems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nags tshal chen po'inang du skyilamo krung bcas te 'dug le lan bdun brjod na bsam gtan chen po thob bar

'gyur la// nyon mos pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa kun bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ ma tog lasogs pa ji snyed pa mchod nas lus ngal bar gyur kyi bar du gzungs
chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyalanarmi lam du byang chub soms dpa' kun tubazang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pa de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/

chos kyi snang ba chen po'ang stsol bar mdzad do// 'di skad du/ rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshags pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tshe brjes nas sa chen po thob

para'agyur ro zhes kyang gsung ngo// de nas lus bde ba dang/ sems bde ba dang/ dga' b chen po dang/ dang ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sadapar 'gyur ro// mthu che ba dang che bar grags par

yang 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo// nang par las nas byang chub sums dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o// sems can thams cad la'ang phan pa

dang bdeba'i sams bskyadang ra bya'o// de nas pha rol tuphyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral tanyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags

par 'gyur// lha la sogs pa'i ng de la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// de ltar jiskadabastan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i srasaden ring po mi thogs par kun tubazang po'i sa

chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro// nga nas rdo rje gtsug phud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po ragi sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dung/ spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang/ rdo rje snying po

la sogs pa byang chub sems dapab chen po rnams dang/ rdo rje'i zhabs pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen mo rnams dang/ mi chen drab can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang/ lha mo sgrol/
ma lasogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyila 'khoragyi lha rnams dang/ dar chen dang/ gzugs bzang dang/ shAni tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang/ gzhon nu/
ma rnams dang/ bran rnams dang/ bran mo rnams dang/ mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa leg 'dren chen po rnams dang/ lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang/ mamo la sogs pa srin mo/
rnams dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang/ rdo rje ma tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas byang chub

soms dang 'chen po'i michog 'phags pa kun tubazang po la mtshan brgyartsa brgyad blonamadapa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sna tshogru kun gyi 'byor pa che// dkyil/
'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/ rdo rjechen po dgyes pa che// gzi brjid chen po stobs po che// gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab// khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros

rgyal// rdo rje chen po rab tu bshad// sgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa// rolamo chen pos rnam par rol// ba dga' chen pos 'dul ba po// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste// btsan po khyab 'jug skya dgu'i
bdag/ sa stengs sa 'ogs la dgyes// dbazhinas 'dzin so gsum pa// dul dang sbyin pa'i go ramis thabs// rab makhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags// bshesaganyen can tabazod la dgyes// brtson bgrus

'byung ba 'byor pa che// brtson 'grus bsu dang thabs bcupa// stobs bcu'isras chen thu bo ste// mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang// yongasasu ldan zhing bcu sel ba// rdulasal rgya mtshochen po ste// rgyal

ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtshob// rdul rnams rab tuzhi ba'i thabs// chogamakhyen pa blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang// shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa// snying po chen po las byang ba// nyonamos/

bral ba thub par dka'// sa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' dang// rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can// gzibarjid nyid de gzi brjidamtshungs// rgya mtsho bzhi yi chudang 'dra// rmugs dang skyo ba zhib mdzad// thub par

dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil// g.yulase lagayul la dgyes pa ste// g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa// gsung bzang ngang pa'imadangasasu bzhad// dbang po nyid dbang dbang chen sras// dbang po'i las lhag thubad mnyam/
chos 'dzin 'byoradang ldan par bstan// rab dga'ibun longs zhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skams par mdzad// dbang po rgyags pa'i rims nad sal// khro bo dregs pa rnam par 'joms// gsung snyan
'jam pa nyid dang mnyam// mnyamapa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang// mnyam med yul las rnam par 'dus// sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig/ byang chub snying po rgya cher rol// rim pa 'ab ston dge ba ste
spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dag/ gtsangam lam bzang spyin mdzad pa// dag mdzad srog mdzad mchog spen po// 'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms// 'thob mdzad dpa ma gsung ba po/
rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba// skyes pa bud mang tshogs kyi bdag/ nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa// sems can 'khorab zhi mdzad pa// brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral//
kun tu rnam rgyal snangab po// kun tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor can// kun tu rgya mtsho'isnangab mdzad// kun tunyes pasal ba lags// mi bzad s 'og rnam par dkrugs// de bzhinazad mdzad thug par mdzad//
nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam pa dkrugs// nyonamos phyogs rnams zad par mdzad// 'barab 'i dka' ba 'phrog mdzad pa// rgyugs shing bdo bzhiba mdzad// rdo rjechen po stobs bskyed pa// snga ba thams cad

sa par 'joms// pha rolazhugs pa'i sdig sel ba// dag panam mkha'ispyod yul can// dag pasbyin zhing yon tan sbyin// 'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa// ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin// longs spyod sbyin zhing

rgyal sbyin pa// dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyanepa// nor sbyin tshog saldan sdordzasun// gzugs bzhin dbang po rnam par rgyal// dug cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa// bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs// sa 'dzin
gzungabar dka' ba po// dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa// 'bab cing de bzhin 'babs par mdzad// rin chen drub rin chen manyam// sgronam mun sel rgyal ba ca// yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan// brtan

mchog che ba'i chos nyid can// gsung ba chen po shes rab che// sangs rgyas tshulani rab ston pa// mchod pa chen po thag chen gyi// theg pa bla named par ldan// mchod pa chen po'ichos che ba// 'bras bu chen po chos kyi

0 mchog/ ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po// zhib de bzhin zhi mdzad pa// bzang po bzang dang mtshungs b nyid// kun tu rab 'byamasal mdzad pa// snying rje ye shes snying pomakhyen// snying rje'i 'od kyidakyil 'khor
can[;]snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs// dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad// mtsho mchog dang ba 'bumathog// rtsod chen 'das pa spyod yul can// skye dgusu zhing spyan yangs pa// red par dka' ba'i dal

'byor can// kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba// dga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po// kun tu yul kun mang ba sta// zhes bzang po rtag tumanga'// dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lag//
zla ba lta burasim mdzad thobs// mkhas pa rgyags spangs chog mkhyen// spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'iya shosamanga'// dam tshig chen po'i nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po
grags pa che// dam pa nyid de blunamad// gsang sngagasarlabs ni rgyas par mdzad/ de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni// yon tan brgyayaM spos kyis rgyas// dag cing byang l mkhas la sogs// yon tan 'byung
b.rig sngags rgyal// gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs// mchog rnam

mi brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin// mi rnams la la gang zhagegs// sdig bsal kun tu bzang po la// snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na// des sas rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don//
@#// mde yon tan yongs rdzogs shing// de bzhin gshegs tshul cheb yi// ye shesam lus sna bar nus// de ltar thub mchog sras pos yon tan brgyayi spobs las nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing//

yon tanasna tshogs byung dang 'jig rten no// yan chad dgags yon tan rgyas rnams la// bstod pa chen po rnams byas rgyal ba'i srasal bstod pas nyin rebastod byas na/ stobs pasumanga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob
cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgyartsa brgyad pa gzus sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so/// @#// 'phags pa

lugan rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcasapa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan rdzordzol phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gisnying po snyas pa//

obadzra tsaNA/ sarba duShAn ta ka/ tand hapa tsa hU~M phan/ de nas gazungs 'di bshadamathag tus chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyamathag pa'i skad phyung nga/
dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang zhes 'dzar to// lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzumabazhin du/
rdo rje'achang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// sdang bsol ba/ 'khor 'di dag hacang skrag par med cika/ rdo rje 'achangagisagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tugasang ba lags so/

rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dung/ bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang/ snang ba thams cad sel ba dang/ dam pastsal ba dang/ 'byor pa stsol ba dang/ sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang/ thos na don mchis
pa dang/ brjod na don mchis pa dang/ bsnyan bkur bgyis na donamachis pa dang/ stobs skyed pa dang/ gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang/ spobs pa skyed pa dang/ dbang phyug thob par brgyad pa dang/ noradang
ldan parab gyid pa dang/ dbang bgyid pa dang/ sdang ba 'joms pa dang/ sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ dugasal ba dang/ rgyal bar b rgyadi pa dang/ dga' bar bgyid pa dang/ mchog tu dga'aphar bgyid
pa dang/ dang bar b gyid pa dang/ nga rgyal 'joms pa dang/ pha rol phamepa bgyid pa dang/ sdig pa zhiba' brgyadapa da/ nongs par bgyis pa sbyong ba dang/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'inyin mongs pazhi
bar bgyid pa dang/ mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang/ rmilam ngan pa zhibar bgyid pa dang/ bkra mi shes pa zhi rab byed pa dang/ dpal skyod pa dang/ skalababazang po bgyid pa dang/ sems can thams
cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang/ gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang/ ci'atshal ba stsol ba dang/ yon tanAthams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang/ char ches pa dang/ char mi 'bab pa dang/ dus kyi gnod pa
rab tu 'bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang/ mind chen po dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mim lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ byad stams dang/ rolangs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang/
[491 ]@#// skyod pa dang/ srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang/ 'jig pa chen po byung ba na nang par lasanas lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la// bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje'achang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing/ grub pa chen po'ang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du'ang rgyalabar 'gyur da/ sams na/

rnams la srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbyad pa zhigazungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so// de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad dugyul nas/ rdo rje'achang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod ba

jo rdzasams dpa' samasadapa' che// ro rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje'ajigs pa dgyes pa che// rdo rje snying po stobs po che// rdo rje'akhrug pa zhags pa che// snying rdzachan po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs bya 'jig

para mdzad// jo rdzahU~MgihU~Mlags te// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i rdo rje chags pachu// chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pacha/ phyag dmar phyugan ring ba ste// spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/

rdo rdzomathon ka mthon kache// mthon mthing dbu skyes brgyan ba lags// ralagisngon po ral gri che// dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can// mthon ka'i spyan dbu sdo ba// 'od chen mathonaka'i 'od dang ldan/

rdo rje sngonapo stobs mi mtshungs// rdo rje skyo ba'i stobs cheb// khro bo'i jo khro bo che// sal mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pasol// khros pa'i spyanani rab tugatod// khro bo bgegs sa sal bar mdzad// gzhu bsnamasazhagA/

babasams pa ste// jorje'imangs ni nges par 'gums// dbug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams// jo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms// rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khoralem// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog rab tu khro// sna tshogs/
su stathig les bris// gzibarjid sbyad pa grogs mdzad pa/ bzod par daka' ba reg mi bzod// sdig dang bgags rnams gacod mdzad pa// drag po chen po rdo rje khro// sgul byed drag po skyol ba mdzad// gting

dang dka'ab ring du gshegs// mi chen rgya mtshorab tu dga'// mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan// dam pa'i tis lhun po'ir// gad rgyang sachen pos bzhad pa po// spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum// ra gasngag

bachang mchogardo rjecan// rig sngags 'chang chen manga'abadag lags// nabaza' jagong rtsa dmaragasol// mthon kan babrab mathon ladagyes// srin po srung ba drag po ste// ma tog 'phrang ba'i rgyan la dgyes//
nyi ma chen po nyima'i 'od// 'od zerab rgya phrag rab tu'agyed// grol mdzad mgonapo ston pa po// rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod// mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba// mgur bzang zhal bzad
dam pa lags// cod pan chen po rdorje'i 'od// phun sum tshogs ldan sams dag pa/ g.yo shes tshe ldan srung ba che// rlung mar lags dpyod yul ring// gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/ 'jigs
las sgrol ba ba 'jigs pa// rgya chen gtsugan nor bu thogs// mtshon m chen po sna tshog sa mtshon// 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig/ gsum gazigs rtsagasumagatsug phud gsum// 'dod pa'i lha
@#// sa snanga chen machon// zab po ste 'jigs par mdzad/ mtho ba sku mchog zhalagasumapa// tsham tshomamadade srin las byung// rtag pa dkar dgyes dus 'byor pa// rgyu skar rgyal sa
'phel bar mdzad// rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste// bgegs kun dabang phyug mkhas po lags/ be cha lta'adrimad sku// mdzes shing stobs skyod sna tshogs stobs// dga' bskyid pa dga'abar

mdzad// dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog/ lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste// bstan pa dpa' bo lam me ba// bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod// dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba// mtshon chacha rdzogasagacod pan/

can rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' b// pad+machen bo phyag ring ba// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog/ nag po chen po 'byung po che// gtumachen thog thog chen po ste// rlung chen bzhi damo 'byung bdang// dorje

mtshon cha rgya rdzogs pa// rtul phod thub pa brtson pa ste// 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje// zhib dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon// brag gi rtsa mo rnam par 'gems// rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs bag/ rdo rje yi ni dekyil

khor rgyan/ 'jorje lcags mdus srog mdzad pa// rdordzamadason rnam par sbyong// rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang// rdo rje bzang po rdo rjertsal// ye shes dam pa theg pa che// thabs bas snying rje chen po lags//

rdo rje chen po rtsedamo ca// spyanabazang rnam par gzigs pa po// rdo rje drilabu rnam dag spyan// mdza' bo sdug pa dmatshigamakhyen// rdo rje chen po dgon pa po// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje chen po gad

rgyangs sgrog/ ma tog chun po 'od gsal ba// dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras/ desapaskal bzangagatsang ba lags// sna tshogs can telha ku mchog/ rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyila 'khoraldan// jo gtsug sdud shes

rab can/ rdo rje bkod pa rab tumadzes// mdzes pa shin tu rnamapar dag/ bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags// dpa' bogasang ba chen po 'chang// rig sngags 'changaga mchog gis rjed// gsang ba pa sku gsang

bgasung// skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba// rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrog/ rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms// rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba// nor bu smras pa'i nabaza' gsol//

spos dang me tog 'phreng gis brgyan// dbu yi snyan cha gdugakol btags// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dngamanyam// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// dkyil 'kho raslob dpon dkyil

'khor can// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bston pa po// dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcangs// sna tshog sargyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dgagis bstod// de nas/

rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa// rdo rdzogasang bas brgyan pa yi// rdo rje brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung// sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa// ming ni brgya rtsa brgyadapa 'di// dad pasagang zhig 'chang byed

grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing// nyes pa kun las rnam par grol// lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ rtag tuphyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che// gang zhiganang par langs nasabarjod// de ni sdig
pa kun lasagrol// ngan 'gro kun las tharapar 'gyur// gsang sngags thog mar smos pa zad// su zhige nang par las nas brjod// rgyal po blon po grong khyerang// gnyen rnams kyang ni
dga' bar 'gyur// bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa// 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang// tshodang bsod nams phal bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin//
bde bde las thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nang par las nas ni// lagan rdo rje'i drung du brjod/ de na ltar 'dod pa dang// ldan 'gyur 'di la the tsomamed// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la// bgagasadang
log 'dren thams cad dang// 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang// zil gyis mnan pa minusaso// shes rab can n gung zhag gis// ming brgya rtsa brgyada mchog btonan// gzugs bzang stobs

skyo ba dang// bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob// gang zhig ming bsgyurtsa brgyud 'di// nges par gnas sharigatsang mara'adon// mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa lag na
rdo rje'i mtshan brgyartsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//@#/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags

dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus bar khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gzhon nus/

gyur pa thugs drim dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ zhabs brtan gyi pad+ma la lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ klu dang/ rig sngags 'chang

rnams kyi thor tsugs dang cod pan gyi rtsomosagatugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo//

tadu thu/ o b+ho/ mahAm Ni/ rutsir ka lA pa/ btsit+taM/ muk+ta dA ma/ a laM kr-i ta sha mIr/ pa ramasatA mo tsa ka/ tathAg ta mahAd+harma/ ko ShA d+ha ra/ prab ra d+harma/ lab d+ha/ ba ji ya/ su ra ta/
bayog pa dar sha ka/ klo sha ga ra/ pusha maka/ shA tu swa b+hab/ anu pA ri/ mahAbo d+hisitra ba 2/ bar tu/ ba ra Nad de/ o ma rUpAshu phras ra/ a sa ma sam/ anan sam sa man+ta/ b+ha dra/

sa mon+tasasgyur/ saman+ta A ka ra/ sam pas ra/ sa ra sa ra/ hademany+dzarab/ mahAbadzram Akha/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+dab+hin+da/ bi ra dzapa mdza/ karma a ba gam ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hu rud+hu ru/ su rusu ru
mu ru mu ru/ d+had+ma d+ha d+hu d+hab+hud+d+had+hu/ mahAmashA/ mahUm// mohaya mohaya/ b+hab+ho/ b+him b+him/ na da na da/ sa ra sa ra/ mahA bo d+hisatra/ mo tsa ya/ mA mnA tha/ mnu sri ta/
a pA ya du / khan su khaM da mahA kA ru Ni kA/ anA thohaM/ du kha tigaM/ saradzodaM/ u pad dru todaM/ a ba bkohaM/ kusI dohaM/ mAr Na d+hamodaM/ tAn b+ha ga bAn/ du khi tAnAn/ su khand dA/
anAthAnAn/ sa nAb+hU ka ra/ sa ra dzasaM/ bI ra dza ska ra/ u pad drut+tAmAn/ sa ropa trab/ pra sha ma ka/ a bibagatA nAn/ kusha la sasgyur/ pa ra pAr pi t+tha kusi dAnAn//
mahUbAbyed ta/ ma ra NaM/ d+hamiN/ mami ta/ ba dAdAtA/ ma mabi b+hig bAn/ nAtho b+ha ba/ shAr N+NaM/ pa ra yAnaM tratA/ sarba dukhAni/ mapra sha ma ya/ sarba klob ra dzis mi/ a ban ya/ sarbasan/

sa ro pa dra ba/ dukhani ma/ nasha ya/ sarba kusha lad+harma/ pa ri pU ra ma mo/ kuru/ sarba karma a ba ra Ne/ klasha par tum/ pamo kir/ mahAbo d+hisatwAsi b+hid+hi bAr+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo gam+me/ sin+d+hAyo
dzaya/ A ba ra Na/ d+ham/ bi rAg ba radza/ salcahapu dza// dz+hariN/ sam khas ma/ dza la nid+his ma/ ma rusam/ mahA bo d+hi sat+tha/ ba ra da swAhA/ 'gi sngags don kun grub pa 'ad/'jam
pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pan// demathag cusems can rnams// skyedang zla ba zad par gyu// ngan 'gro thams cad zhigyur nas// bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu'adar// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'//

log 'dren rnams skrag par gyur// sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang// grangs med phrag dung phyur srid// 'khor ba'i btson ra du gnas thal// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis//

'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing// gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na// brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyuba'i// sa gzhidi yi tshe nagayos sangs rgyas 'od kyis snang ba yis/
sa yi stong yang khyab par gyur// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang// srin po ma bzad gzugs can rnams// stobs bcu ldan l phyag 'tshal zhes// skud phyung tshig mthunapar smra// lha rnams
zhi ba'i malugs can// thams cad du ni dga' gyur nas// gang na rdo rjeral gri che// de yi drung lcags smras pan// phyag 'tshala mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog/ 'jamapa'i dbungasanAstobs chen la//
shugasastong ldan pa rgyal bca8/ bgags kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa// sngags 'chang gsang sngagase chen po 'chang/ snachogs gzugs can mi yi bdag shan tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes
'jigs// drag po drugapo rab 'jomasang/ gzi brjed gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal// dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpa// rdo rje can de snying sbyor ba// mi shes pa de rab bge la// sgeg pa'i malugs

mchog mnga' ba/ skye dgu'i bdag po sgrig par dgyes// gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba// nyon mongs dgra rnams sal bar mdzad// mdzes pan bza' sna tshogs gsol// ma tog 'phrang rgyan sna tshogs can// spyan
bzang dbumadzes pa ste// dgyes shing n bzacu sna tshogs gsol// 'jam pa'i byangs te rab tu bzhi d// dkur gnag 'byed pa'i spyan mnga' ba// haha'i sgran rib tubasgrags// rab tu dga' ba ston par dga'/

rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan// rgyamacho'i snying po'i spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldanu'ajigs pa ste// sdangaba'asAde ni 'jigs par mdzad// malugs sngo bas skyong ba// lha yi bdagapo dga' ba'a mdzad/
[} ]/'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod selabartan// rgyal po 'jig rtenas 'dzin pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad// btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa//

rtag tu mchod chang rjed pa lags// stobs po che la shugs che ba// phyag ringagayul chen mangabab po// sgog chen rdo rje dam pa ste// mdzes shes rab srung ngo tshashes// dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog/ dkyil
'khor chen po ston pa po// dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// zhabs larjod pa'i tshogs dang ldan// hahasAhA'i bdag cha
rtob/ mchodapachen po sa dang mnyam// hU~Mgis 'jigasa mdzad 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs pa'i'od kyis gsal ba po// lha dang lha min rnams kyis bcud// de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis// zhabs 'bring/
gad rgyangs chen po can// rlung drag mun pa sol bar mdzad// 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags// gnod sbyin srin pos bsan bkur ba// drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba// mnga' bdagagatsug gi nor bu
tsha can 'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu spyod// spyod pa sa ltar b stan pa lags// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa// rim gsal ba lamame ba// nyim 'od 'aprab 'i khugs bzhin// tha ler bzhugs

shing rgya cher bzhad// mthong na dga' zhang dga' bor mdzad// nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin// dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid spyin/ gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa// dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegru
gnona'i// kun turmongs pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du gdan g shegs pa// zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa// dpung rgyun snyan chagadub kor can// nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyanupa ste//
rgyudang mi rgyu 'greba'i sgron// rab ribasal bar mdzad pa po// ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa// dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog/ 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste// 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin
pa dkar bo so ba 'od bzang ba// mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin lugs rab tu ston// shes rab phalaspris 'debs par mdzad// stong nyid chos ni lha
'dzin pa// byams pa mchog dang thamamakhyen// rnam par grags pa gsanapa nges// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// shAn tu rnam rgyal 'khor los sgyur// 'jigI
mang blo gros shes rab can// dubazhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa// mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste// zhi ba'i laman ston mdzad pa// lha dang lhamin pa ca sa pas bkur// sems can thams cad 'jigasamed

mdzad// sems can kun la rab ston pa// brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi blo lamakhas// srang mad bu ste drag shul stobs// ma yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste// byis pa'i sku mchoga mchog spyin la/

rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/ phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngagasa mdzad// bdag gir mi mdzad rtulamad brtan// mkha' 'dra dpe mad smra mkhas pa// bdud dpung nges par 'dzoms pa po// mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du
[]@#// med[}]de bzhin thub mad rnam par rgyal// brtan posangs rgyas de bzhinagshegs// mya nganamed cing gnas pa mad/ 'jomasamad tshig bzang rgyalugs bzang// dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam
par 'joms// tshad med nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs// mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog/ gshin rje'aphama mdzadu skye dgu srung// las dang nyon mongs rab bsregs pa//

ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/ legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan// brgya rtsa brgyud pa rab gsal zhing// dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di// lha mchog rnams kyis rab ru bshadu// bgegs chen dang ni leg 'dren

dang/ gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang// mdangs 'phrog chun po rgod rnams kyis// de ring legs par bstod par gyur// 'jamadabal rdo mchogagi rab// bsgyings pas lha yang bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun la bltas
nas kyang// 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa// khyod kun rtag tubagegs med cing// nges legs thar pa thob gyur la// 'jigasamad bkra ya shis par shog/ nga la 'jigs bamasams shig/ de nas rab tu chen
bzhad cing/ 'brug chen sgra ltar sgrog pa yi// dbazhinagshegs pazhalags labs/ shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul// sems can gati mug bsal ba'i
phyi'id sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs// gni tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur// khyem bsod namasache bcas pa'i/ sems can rnams ni rab sbyangs phyir// dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs///
0/ 'jam pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad// la lagang zhig mnyam bzha gnas // sdug bsngal thams cad sal ba yi// grubapa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa 'am// yang n nyan tam sems kyang rung// de yi don kun 'grub/
'gyur zhing/ sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnamadag pa// de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kyis chen yang// 'ang por mthogs de yis 'thob// byang chub sam

dpa' rnams kyis// rab dga' shin tu dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur// ring dusong dang migayo ba/ legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sa chen dam pa de dag kyang//
gang zhig ngesa gnas a'adon pa yi// sems can chen pos mi thogs par// tshe thad nas nii thob par 'gyur// sdig pathams cad rnamadag dang// sems can kun la sdug pa dang// spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi//

byang chub bla med thob bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang kun spyod pa dang// sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing// bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyud yid 'ong 'di// sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas//
jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la// shinetudang ba'i sems kyis su// nang par lasanas su brjod pa// de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang// de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams// gnod sbyin srin pomang po
dag rtag tu yang na srung bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang// de bzhin gshags pa 'di rnams dang// dbazhin rdo rje'i mchog 'chang rnams// de la nges par srung bar byed// de nas ngs rgyas
skur bzhugs shing// mnyam par bzhag pa snang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams// bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis// rgyang mdag nas
phyag kyang 'tshal// de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas// 'tshob byed kyang mi nus so// lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang// bsod namasamanyam par thob par 'gyur// shes rab chen pogang zhagi
gas nyiwamtshan mchog brjod byas na// drim med cing rab dagal// rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang// sems can thams cad dga' ba yi// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob// mtshungs pa med cing
stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang// 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing// yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi// gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin//
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so/// @#// 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud
pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dapabasams dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ o a ta/ bin+dadzab/ mahAsu kha swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'dus/

de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tanarin po che'i tshog

can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di byung bas/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gangal la gzungs sngags 'dithos pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung bcu'i

bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang la la'i rnalam du grags par gyur pa de bang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad
dam tshes bco lnga la sbyang bar 'ag cing/ gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar ma dang/ ma tog dang/ ma tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa la sogs pas mchod la/ bskor ba/
byas nas bzlas brjod byatsos na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang/ sngag bsngal ba dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub soms dpa' sgrub pa/
thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ti/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing nyon mongs pa dang sdugabasngal thams cad

sel bar byed do// de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen pos gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs mig chu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par ngesal

ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che// byang chub sems dpa' tshul tsheb// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshalo/
bya// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// nyon mongs drim kun sal cing// nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba// skyon bral khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// lam srang gcig bu'i tshulaston cing//
theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa// theg pa chen po'i tshul b.ris te// theg pa dag pakhyod phyag 'tshal// snang ba chen por snang ba bar s// yon tanadakyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/ zla ba bzhin du 'od
dkar ba// 'jig rten bdas pa khyod phyag 'tshal// theg pa chen po dag pa che// sangs rgyas thug pa rtogs gyur cing/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams grogs pa// rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal//
dpa' bo tshan po bdud las rgyal// dpa' bo chen po nyonamosachoms// bgegs grub gshin rje thubapa ste// rin chen drab khyod phyag 'tshal// blob chen po rtim che// lhunapo chen po dbang phyug che

lha chen mgon po chen po ste// 'byor pachen po khyod phyag 'tshal// sgrib pathams cad gcoda mdzad cing// sgrib pa thams cad sal mdzad pa// kun makhyen yon tan bdag nyid che// rnamasel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//

sas rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste// chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags// yashes dbang phyug ye sheseche// srad bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skumadzes yon tanas nig po mkhye// rdo rjeyidikyil 'khor brgyan//

sangs rgyas lamos don yodachi// ye shesadag pakhyod phyag 'tshal// bstan pa gnas dbabadag po ste// bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste// yas padrimeda shes rab can// snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// zab
00/ cung brtan la rnam par gnon// zhib 'jig rten dag par mdzad// ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum n// dpa' btsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skal ba chen po nyon mos bcom// 'khorab 'idagyila 'khor 'jom

pa stu ni bzhi mdzad bed 'byung ba// chu bo ni mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// thar pa'i stachos lugs che// bad bgror gnas pa dri ma med// rnam dag thugs mnga' zhibamakhyen// shesasol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
rtsomo yangs pa rnam par gragaso// sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor mkhyenapa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngalagasumasal gsum gyi mchog/ dkon//
mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/ ] rnam gsum mkhyen pa b.res pa'i bdag/ rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi// 'byor pa brnyes shing manyamanyid brnyes// bskal pa
dgun grangs med par// tshogs chenubasags khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sa la gnasab sa chenubares// sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba// ye shesas khyod phyag 'tshal lo//

ting nga 'dzin lamanga' brnyes pa/ nyes gsum skyo zhing sdig pa sel// ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya chab// mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal// mgon po chanabo snang ba che// sdug bsngag chen po'i dris sel//
zhigyuram lus zhi mdzad ng// yon tan phamatha' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa// chos kun zhi ba phun sumatshogs// dkon mchog gsum ragis pa med pa// zhi chen matha'
yas khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rjechen po drimad mchog/ rdo rje mchog bsnams sdig mimanga'// nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan// ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'// de bzhin

tsha gshegs dang yul gcig pa/ gsal ba po ltadres sbyong// shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras// srad gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal le// rdzodzad kyil 'khor rdo rje mchog/ rdo rtsa 'dul ba rdo rje'achang// rdo rtsal

can rnams kyi rtsal// rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen chen por chen blo// rin chen rdo rje'i bod chab// rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung// rin chen bastanapa srung mdzad pa// stong pa nyid kyi yul

brnyes shing// ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston// stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan// stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab matshungasaMmida shes rab// dag po rnam dgas dang bral// chos gcig
las byung snang ba po// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags// 'jig rten snang mdzad sgra mkhas pa// 'jig rten chos las snang ba' 'das// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan b.rus// skyon par mdzad

cha padakyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste/ phyag chen skye bo kun laphan// sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po// kun makhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' makhyen dga' la longs spyod pa// dga' ba'i

rigasa mchog rnams kyi mchog/ dga' ba'a mdzad pa'i rtog pa can// dga' b ldan pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sgeg chen 'dzin zhing dgongs par ldan// rnamapar sgrog la spyod pa brtan// rdo rje'i ga pa sgeg pa'i mchog/ sgog chen khyod la

phyag 'tshalalo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// bla mar mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo byang chub sems pa'i mchog/ sgrib pa

thams cad sal mdzad la// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyaleg/ ming brgyartsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// rdo rje bstan pa rnamagrags pa// bcom ldan rdordzacan gyisagasus// kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yis// dkyil

'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pa// gang zhig ming bsgyurtsa brgyad pa// 'di dag so sor rjod byed na// nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing// rtag chung ye bzhin 'brang// na par lasanas gtsang ma yis// sgrib pa thams

cad sal pa la// blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed ng// de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur// gang zhige ming brgya rtsa brgyud mchog/ nang par langs nas rjod byed pa// snang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur// bgags rnams kyis
kyang yongs su btang// sdig padagapa 'thob pa dang// de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang// yashes rgya mtsholos spyod cing// sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nges par gnas abyas la/

ming brgya rtsa brgyada mchog 'don pa// denu 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa// ring por mi thogasathob par 'gyur// rgyud chen ldan zhing blo tshob// gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa'i// dordzad kyil 'khor bstan pa la// ring por
mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyadapa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//

'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyila 'khor gyi rgyalapo chanapo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa pha chen posa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// o su rgyu ni/
ma saMb+ha har tsar/ mahApAsha/ marutA/ amog/ badzrasat+tA sAhA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa na// tis gangs bcas g.yos par gyur//
sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras// skal ldan chen po legs so legs// sa stangs khyod kyis yang par byas// khyod kyi gzurayani ma sbags shing/ yon tanadapag med
mchog bskyed pa// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang/ nyes pa zlog cing thos pa 'di// 'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// jit+tar 'dam gyi pad+madag/ 'dam gyi nyes pas mi
gos bzhin// lus can dag la su yang rung// khyod kyi bsang sngags 'chang byed pa// de dag las ni gcig tsam yang// byang chub las ldog mi 'gyu 2// sAlas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/

thos nas mos par byed pa dang// nges par yon tan thams cad kyang// thos par 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa yi dbang phyug po// sa yi snyang po sa mchog la// mings

rtsa brgyad smras pa ni// sa yi sA po gtsopo cha// glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// tsed pan can te sa b.res pa// phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor ba mchog/ rigs ldan M rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas // gtsobod ge/

sbyong ston pa po// gzhi bcas ldan ng 'i klung gi tshul// swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ma'i mchog/ snying po snying po mkhyen par grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgyachar rol// sa yi
dbang phyug gar stabs can// sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan// 'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po// rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen// sAng po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med// mgon po sangs rgyas gzuglu/
mnga' ba// shes rab kyisanem lus gzigs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing// gar stabs chen po ston pa po// ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa//

nyamachen po nyade yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar ba bskor// yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa// sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can// chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che// yon tan rgya mtsho'igang chen matsho//

yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog/ thabs tshul thab la mkhas pa ste// theg pachen po 'jigs pa med// mchod pa chen po sgrachab// zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can

rdo rje 'chang chen machon brgya pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ma tog thod// blo gros chen po phyag ring ba// pad+machen po stobs po che// sngags 'chang chen po stobs cher ldan// sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags// lag na rdo rje yon tan

sa/ nor bu'i ma tog thod kyis brgyan// mnyam nyid 'byam la los sbyong ba// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje'i 'od lnga rdo rje ldan// sa ya bdag po lhun po bzhin// sa la longs spyod los sbyong che// mtshon chagayo ba
phunasum tshogs// rab 'byamaslong ni rnam par grags// smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa// spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste// ma tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcis// spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/

brtan pobartan pa bde sbyin pa// ded dpom dpal bzang chen po ste// gangs can lhunapo lta bu lags// dbang po gshAn rje rgyal chen dang// btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug/ 'jig rtena mchog rigs sangs rgyas

tshangs// de bzhinanying tshul spyod tshul can// rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa// dgyesapan bza' sna tshogs gsol// gathigs pa ring ba spyan yarung// nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pamed// thogs pa med dpogs rin chen

gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu// dul btonamongasadrimabasal// dag pa gtsang ma gso sbyong can// rnamapar gnon pa yulalas 'das// ljang mdog skyabasa mdzad snying rje che// stobs kyis grags pa rgyu
che ba/ bsams nashes pa'i spyod yul can// dpa' bo sengag 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi sAng 'joms pa/// mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan// dga' ba cher rab 'abyung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs

kyising po mkhyen// rigs kun tsunimachod pa lags// rgyal po rigs chos skyong pa'i rtan// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rjes 'og rab grags pa// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par 'phags pa/
khyab par mchog/ mgrin bzangasand dang bral ba lags// skyong mdzad ston pa dog pa ste// sangs rgyas lamanarab ston pa// sgrol ba smina mdzad sdud par mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud//

0 rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas// rdzordzab slob dpon yon tan rten// grub pa spyin pa rnam dag mchog/ tshul dang tshulamin rtog pa po// dkyil 'khor rtsa saramanga' ba ste// 'od zer ljang khu'i 'od dang
badra/ sar la na bza' ser pomanabs// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan sban chu dmar ba zla ba'i dpal// nor bu sna tshog sa'od 'byung ba// ro brgya yi stobs kyis spro// mnyamakidamanyam

pa dri ma med// su yang dag cing na bza'adag/ dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan// dag pa'i chos manga' dang ba ste// 'byung ldan srad pa sal mdzad pa// 'khor ba zad mdzad shes rab can// tshul shes tshul

la spyod yul ba// rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpa' dge bache// 'byung ldan rab 'byam shes rab can// ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying posIngapo che// rdo rje'i snying po rnamapar
'dron// dpag tsamed pa dpagamod rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// zab cing gsal ba'i gtsobo ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/dga' ba dang bskyod pa ste// yo shos
rgya chen spyod yul ba// rlung gi drag shul lta bur grags// drag po lags tedrag salagatsang// rgyalabar byed cing rgyal la// rgyal ba'i dpala mdzad dga' bar mdzad// lhun po tis ma la yas// spyod yul

zab mo gnod pa ste// rin chen rdo rje snying po che// sa gzhi spyod yulamanga' ba lags// rin chen brag las byung ba'i bod// rdo rjedakyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// dbazhin gshegs pa lhuradagyes pa// shugs drag dpal
gyi gzhi rten lags// rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste// phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de ltar rdorje 'chang chen l// ming brgyartsa brgyada mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje sems dpA

bstod nas nii// rdo rjes gsum dbang mchog smras// yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis// ming brgyartsa brgyad mchogebarjod cing// nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan// sa yastangan ngas ma mthong// ming brgya rtsa brgyad
dam pa 'di// thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste// sdig pa thams cad sal ba dang// drim kun bral yon tan des// de phyir sgrib pa thams cad kyis// phunasum tshogs pa 'dod pa yis// mi brgya rtsa brgyad

dge ba 'di// rtag tuyang na brjod pa gyis/ ming brgyartsa brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi// gnasa mchog blanamadapa ste// dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pas// yid ni[]hin sudang ba yis// sa yi

snying po mtshan gsal ba// 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i// yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang// dpal yon rgya cher 'dzin pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'do// min gang zhig rjod byed pa// sdug bsngal
kun las myur du grol// 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mi di pra ti dzAnA
ma d+hAr Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ rgyalab byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ namo b+hag pa
te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga ta ya achato/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te a te/ apa rA dzitaM/ adzitaN+Daya/ hor har/ ma tria ba lo kite/ ka ra ka ra/ mahAsam yasid+d+haM

b+ha ra b+ha ra/ mahAbo d+himaN+DadI dza/ sma ra sma ra/ AstsakaMsamaya/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hAbo d+hiswAhA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// omohim/ mahAmo hasA hA/ snying po'o// o munimu ni sma ra swA hA/

nyaba'i snying po'o// gzus 'di nyan pa tsam dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la sems pa dang/ bsgoms pa tsamagyis gang gi tshabadag blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pan/ bdagagis sems can de nges par btsalabar bgyi// blonamed pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i byang nub tulung bstan par bagyi'o// than dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su gyur

pa'i ridags dang bya rnams kyi rnakhung dusgrog par byed na/ dadag kyang bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshulung bstan pa 'thob bo// 'di thos pa tsam gyisanam du'ong n gnas ong du 'gro bar mi 'gyur// ngan song gi

drims kyang mi gosaso// mi'i mngal du'ang mi skye'o// lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los sgyurab 'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer pa'i longs

spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gisakyang sems can de bskyud par mi bgyi lags so// nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas de ji ltar gyur kyang rung/ blan med pa yang dag par
pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogasaso//
Ar+ya amaN+Dal kanAm mdzAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
skad bdag gis thos pa dusagacigen/ bcom ldan 'das glu 'dzinan/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga gnus na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhug

ti denus byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rani chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i'ikhord nyid du'adus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langasanas/ chos gos phrag pa gcig

cugazar te// pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder logs su thal mo sbyarab btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// gal te zhusan zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ran chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rin chen snying po zlabasnang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang/ ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas
khyod kyisams ras par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'amaM/ rags kyi bu mo gang la la zhigadakyil 'khorab rgyad pa bgyid par 'atshalan/ des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod skya bo mang/

po la shin tuphan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshu sapa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir/ rigs kyibu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste legs so legs

so[;]rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis/ mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing/ dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyurab/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyisang po nyon cig/ o mune tsumanyA

bIrayAhA/ snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do// o b+hihUM pad+ma pI ya sAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o// om ha ra NasAhA/ byams pa'i snying po'o// o a gan+d+ha ya swAhA/

namamakho'i sIng po'i snying po'o// om sA hirAdza ya A ny+tsa/ kun tubazang po'i snying po'o// o ku rubanaraha sa/ lag rdzo rje'i snying po'o// o'i a rig swAhA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa'i snying po'o// o nisI raMb swAhA/

sgrib pa thams cang rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o// u0f00 k+Shi tihar dza swAhA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyisApe po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gI
dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du u0f8bna cig brjod na/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ myur dublan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khorab rgyad pa/

zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'imado rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tradang/ danaIl dang/ zhuchen gyi lo tsa ba banang+ge ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skadagasar bcad kyis kyang bcosanasagatan
la phab pa//@#// rgya gar skad du/ amr-i talhabanAmasgyur Ni/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzus/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigen/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab byang chub kyi shing drung na/ 'khor rnam bzhi dang/ lhadang/ mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas 'khor
rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gas/ bcom ldan ' sa kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang/ rigs drug gisoms cha thams cad la spros dang/ sman dang/ zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bza' bdang/ bca' ba dang/ btung ba 'di rnams sems can rnams kyi don du byin gyisabarlab tugasol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung

ba zhes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal zas kyi sta du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du shurapo lachos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgrubyung bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur te// yang zla

ba'adzakyil 'khor gyi steng du a dkar po bsams te/ zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang yo byad dugyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du o zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyas shing tshim par gyur to//

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di gsungs so// osawad+harmatAbadzrasid+d+hahU~M/ oM a mr-i tuhU~M/ namasarba takhA ga ted+d+ho/ bishwa mu khe b+h+yA/ sarba thA khaM ud ga te spa ra Na/ i maM ga ga

na khaMswA hA/ onamasam+batathA ga ta a b.lo ki te saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hU~M/ o ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Thasid+d+halo tsa nasarba armasA d+ha nasA hA/ zhes gzungs 'dirjod m thag cu mchodang 'i zhal zas kyis mchod nas/'phags

pa thams cad mnyes pa dang/ sems can thams cad bad bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sogs dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang// chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byan gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang/ bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa thams cad kyi pho brang dang/ sems can thams cad kyi

gnas dang/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dpag tumad cing brjod kyis mi khyab pa brjod kyisami rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang//
chos kyi bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ ti nge 'dzin gyi bdenapa'ibyin gyi rlabs a pha rol phyin pa la sogs chos kyi

sbyin ba dang/ bdagagi zang zing gi sbyin pa 'bade ba dang dga' bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyisalegs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag bzang skyong legs so// dkababa'i spyod pa 'dalta bu byed pa legs so/

pa'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang/ khyim bdag bzang skyong rjesasu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
das kyisagasungs pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to// bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// yi dgas kha nas me 'bul ba la skyabs

mdzad pa'i gzungs/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul sor skya na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas ni dge slongag dge 'dun dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i grangs med pas yongs su bskorab la chos ston to// de'i tshonatshe dang ldan pa dga'

bo bsamatha'azhig na chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhi gnas 'dug pa las/ de'i nub monamagyi chasmad la yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ gzugs spyad mi sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skyem pakhanas

'bar ba/ mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phu ba/ skra'adzis pa// sonamo dang mchob ring la rno ba shin tu 'jigs su rungab zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongasanas/ dga' bo la 'di skad tsos smras so// khyod da ste zhag bdunan tsho'i

dus byas te/ yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// dga' bos des smas pa thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ yi dgas de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag mo'i dus byas nas yidegs kyi khams su

skya bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ci byas n sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ de nas yi dgas des/ dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te khyod kyisasangag mal yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma khrag khrig

brgya stongasnyad la gtor ma byin te/ bram thudang drang srong brgya stong snyad la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bro tshadamar ri'i zhal zasa mchog dam pa phul te/ kho bo'i phyi'i dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byosan/ tshe ring zhing yi/

dgas kyi sdug bsngal dang bral tamatho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// de'atsha dga' bos ya degs kha nas ma 'bar ba lus m sdug pa dang/ shun turd cing sgam pa dang/ kha nas ma 'bar ba dang/ mgran pa mo khab

tsam laskya'ongs pa dang/ sinamo dang mche ba ring zhing rnoba'ang mthong la yid dum 'ong mi'adod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas lus skye bung zhes byed pa tsam du'ajigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te/ myur bar brtsom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad lngas la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs
pa'i dpung gnyena mdzad du gsol zhes/ bcom ldan bodas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag bas mtha'azhig na chos yid la brgyad carimachis pa las/ yi dgas kha nas ma 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba des/
bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// khyod da ste zhag bdunanas nges par tshe'i dus byas te yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur rozhes mchi'o// bdag gis de la thabs cibagyis na/ yi deg

kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhes dris na/ des bdag la khyod kyis yi dgasagang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyad la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa brgya stong snyar

la zhal thas mchog dam pa phulan tshe ring bar 'agyurazhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis jilta bu'i yi dgas dang drang srong la sogs pa dasnyad kyi kha zas 'byor par 'gyur/ donus bcom ldan 'adas kyis/

dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// khyod 'jigs par la byed cig/ khyod kyis yi dgas gang+ga'i klung gi byem khrag khrig brgya stong skad dang/ bram ze da nga/ drang srong lasogs pa la kha zas dang gtor mamang po 'byor pa'i

zla/ thubs ngal yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'ishugs

zhes bya ba yod de/ gang zhig gis gzungs 'dabarjod na/ yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong sud dang/ bram ze dang/ drang srong la sogs tamang po'i kha zas dang gtor ma chog par 'gyur te/ de dag la

sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi dra tshad mas btsal ba'i khri bdun bdun snyad thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bo nga' bram ze'agyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang//

de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes byab las gzus 'di thos pas na// de'i dbang/ sa yi dgas tshad med pa snyad dang/ drangasrong mang po la kha zas dang gtor ma byin par gyur te/ yi dgas kyi khams su

skyes pa de dag kyang sdug bsngal las rnam par grolanasamathoras kyi lhalaskyes par gyur to// dga' po khyod kyis zung zhig/ bsod nams dang tshe'i tshod kyang 'phal zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/

dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// nam/ sarba tathAg ta a ba lo ki ti/ saM b+harasaM b+ha rahU~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu 'am/ ragis kyi bu mo gang la la zhage tshe

ring bar 'dod dam/ bsod nams che zhange'aphel ba dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'adodan/ rtag tu dro'i dus sam/ yang na dus thams cad du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba

mdado// snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la chanam/ phyi bam/ 'khur ba lasogs pa cung zad drig btab ste/ lag pa g.yasapa snod kyi steng du bzhag ste/ gzungs 'di lan bdunobasngags nas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa rin chen mangagi mtshan nas brjod pa'i phyin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas thams cad skya ba/
mang po'i sir sna byas pa midage ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan
@#// nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi degs mang po byad gzugs misdug pabcomazhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas la phyag 'tshal

lo[}]de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i ni gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing 'grangs par
'gyur ro// dbazhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang gral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyiso rlabs kyis/ yid gs mang po'i 'jigs pa thams cad
dang bral te yi dgas kyi khams zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis// dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lasogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tus

gol lan gsum byas te/ gto rama'isnod blangasanas lag pa brkyang stes gtsang mar blugs par bya'o/ de ltar gator ma byin par byas nA/ phyogs bzhinas lhags pa'i yadegasagang+gA'i klung gi bya ma khrag khrig brgya

stong snyadaso so nas yul dbus 'gyuratshalagyi bratshad mas btsal ba'i khri bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro// kha bras de dag yi dgas kyi yid bazhin du za ba dang/ chog 'gras pa dang/ yi dgas kyi khams spong ba dang/

mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tugazungs 'dis kha zas la bsngags tayi dgas la sbyin pa byin na//

bsod nams tshad med pa snyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing/ de lasasangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyad lamachod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par med de tsharing ba dang/ bsod nams dang/ mdangs/
da [0f10 ]stobs skyazhing 'phal ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ mim yin pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ yi dgas ma rungs pa thams cad kyisagatsazhing gnod par byed mi nus

pa dang/ gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gal te gang zhig bram ze dang drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na/ kha zas longs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang dubakang ste/ gzungs sngags lan

bdun bzlas te 'bab chugatsang mar gtor na/ de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zasa mchog dam par gyur te/ desan bram ze dang drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas/ sngags kyi byin
gyis so so nas sngon chad cidang cil dga' zhing mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams su yongasasu gyurabs/ so so nas mthunapar dus gcig tude la tshe ring ba dang/ mdangs dang/ stobs su ldan tabado

zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debasaso// gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong ba dang thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cing/ shes pa minor ba dag tshangs pa'i lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing yongs

su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yangs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasagang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stongasnyad la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa byeduli nas/
par 'gyur ro// gal te dge slong pha bam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyan ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dunal mchod pa byed pa 'dod na/ sngos
dang / ma tog dang/ zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lanati shu rtsa gcig tubazlas te/ dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang/ rigs kyi bumo das phul ba'i zhal bras de
lha rdzas kyi zhal zas sugyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bstod pa dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa dang/ rjes su

yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro// lhamang pos rtag tusrung zhing skyob pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng
