rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo khyod kyis 'dirdzas su chos bzhin yid la byas to/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang/ bsod nams tshad med pa
thob par 'gyur// yi dgas gnasam 'aparab la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#// yi dgasamo kha 'bar mdabugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga//

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul saraskya na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ban/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang/ sems can

'i gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas chos mngon sum du byed pan/ mtshan monum gyi cha smad la
du mdun du yid gasamo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/ kyi kun dga' bo khyod gnangs 'tshab 'gyur te/ yi dgas kyi gnas 'di'i skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos smras ng/ brten pa'i thabs ci yod/ yi dgas

mosasmras pa/ kun dga' bo gal tenang par ya degesagang+ga'i klung byem khrag khrig phrag 'bum byamasAdadag la/ yi dgasarar labang zas dang skom lam ga d+ha'i bra bongom byin te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim

par byasol/ bdag gi mingagisadakon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ deltar na khyod kyi tshong phyir nur bar 'gyural/ bdag kyang yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'thos tematho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// denus

kun dga' bos yid gasamo kha 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la lus sgomapa khamasam rtse 'barab/ ltadang kha bskams pa/ral ba'i phung po g.yas pa// spu dungasanamo rangeba mthong sta/ tshig mi snyan cing yid du mi'ong ba de thos

nas skragacing sngangs te spu zing zhes byas nas stan las langs shani tu'anges pa dang/ shin tumyur ba'i shugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba derasong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
'dar bzhin du bdoskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa skyabasa mdzad dugasol/ bdag ni gnangs srog 'gum par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan
'das bdag gis yi dgasam kha 'barama mthong ste/ khyod gnas 'chibaba'agyur ro zhes mchin/ bdag gis brtan thabs rimachis zhes smras na debamachid nasagal te khyodakyas yi/

ngags gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi byam snyad dag tshim par byas te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas na/ de ltar na khyod kyi tshaphyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi// bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar

bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal dugasol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhashigshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo gang gis khyod yi dgas rnams dang/

bram zi'i drang srong rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyi ma 'jigs shig/ kun dga' bo thams cud du 'od dang ldan pa rgya chen shugs ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod do// des byin pa tsam gyis yi dgas

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bya ma snyad dag tshim par 'gyur te/ yi dwags dang bram za'i drang srong re re la zas dang skom yulam ga d+ha'abru bo bdun bdunubyin par 'gyur ro// deni sngon bram zer gyur pa na//

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ dbazhinagshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od lasangs bzung sta/ res yi dgas dang bram za'i drang srong grangs su bgrangs pa mthadang ches

mang ba dag/ ngas zas dang skom gyis tshim par byas te/ de dag thams cad ya degs kyi 'jig rtenanas shi 'phos nasalha'i 'jig rten dubyas so// kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung la ngo len gyis shig/ namasarba ta thA gta

a ba le ki/ mosaM b+ha ra saMb+har hU~M/ kund/'bo 'dis yi dgas kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ lag pa brkyang sta sgo drung du sbyin par bya'o// sa gol yang brdab par bya'o// de ltar byas n byin mthug

tuphyogs bzhi'i yi dwagasagang+gA'akrug bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag gi bye ma snyed dag tsham par byas par 'gyur te yi dgasare re la'ang yul mag d+ha'i bro bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang zos pa tsam

gyis yi dgas kyi 'jig rtenanasasha'i phos nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dung/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par

khor thug tu bsnyad par bya'o// de ltar byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'agyur de tsho'ang range bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshags pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mi
ma yin pa rgyub 'byung po dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum la sogs pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ gdon dang/ yi dgas rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// stobs dngabartson 'grus dang yang ldan

par 'gyur ro// gzugs dang ldan pa dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang/ dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// bram ze'i drang srong tshim par byed pa 'dod pa des ni/ mchod yon dang/ dbul bar bya ba dang/

snod bkong ba la lanabadunabazlas brjod byas la/ 'babachug la yod pa'i gnas der phyin par bya'o// de ltar byas na bram the'i drang srong gang+ga'i klungagi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag duma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i bza' ba dang
bang ba rnams kyis tshim par byas par 'gyur ro// bram ze'i drang srong de dag kyang dbang po tshim par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis o bde legs su gyur cig cesabya ba'i sgra 'byin par byed/

la sems can de dag kyang bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bram ze'i gzibarjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtag tu tshangasapar spyod par yang 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pagang+gA'i klung gi byes khrag khrig 'bum gyi

bye ma snyad dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// rtag tudagra thams cad shigs par 'gyur ro// ma tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spros sam/ zas sam/ skom gyi yo byad la logatishu rtsa gcig bzlas/
brjod byas la/ sangs rgyas d/ chos dang/ dga' dun la dbul bar bya'o// de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dgoslong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyan ma des phyog

bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhingagasas rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dang/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// bla mar

labyas mgror byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstanapa dang/ lha thams cad kyis kun tusrung bar yang 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo songal ngo lon yang gyis shig/ sems can
thams cad la yang dag par ston cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyisashig cesang sbya'o// yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'ichog rdzogs so//

daodzAmUb le ka taMsaman+ta/ pa ra NarA shi b+ha ba sa ma ya/ mahUm Nidu rud ru/ hrid la rdzal ni hU~M/ 'bab chu'am mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pa'i khyor bar mublugs la/ ye shes skar mda'i

snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ mu khyorab bdu 'bab chu'am chu 'gator na/ sangs rgyas kyispyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dgas ji snyad yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas kyi 'od ng btung ba'i ri mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing

yi dgas re la'ang kha zas dang btung ba yul mgadz+ha'i lnga bye bdun bdun gyis tshim par byas par 'gyur zhing tshud 'thungs pa tsamagyis de dag thams cad yi dgas kyi skye gnas las tharacing bde 'gro mtho rosikyi gnas su
skyabara'agyur ro// skyes pa bam/ bud med dam/ khye'u bam/ bu mo ram/ gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa yi dgas sam/ bya bas/ chu la gnas pa la sogs pa gang gis chu de 'thungs pa de dag
thams cad sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ye shes skar mda'i snying po'o//@#// rgya gar skad du pradzubanin
ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab spyod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sa bdagagis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan zhes
bya ba roreb kyi ngos la bzhugs te/ rirab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis bskor nas mdun du byas te chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhonanu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo
sbyar te/ byang chub sems dapa' blo ldan la gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul ba/ blo dang ldan pa yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab skyed

ba pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bshad pa/ hUMpi tshupa tsapa brnyani/ dzul dzA la mad+ha ban+tani/ d+hi ri d+hi/ bud+d+hibasdun sAhA/ gang zhig gzungs 'di klog pa dang/ 'drib dang/ 'dril 'jug pa

dung d+ha na chub par byed pa dang/ chung du'ang yig 'bru gcig tsam thosana'ang tsho'adi nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyura'o// gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsabs khyor gang la ragipa 'di lan bdun btab ste/

khyimashar ba'itsho'athungs na tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lan cig thub na lnga brgya 'dzin te/ negacig bzhin du shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nyane re bzhin du brjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang
yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// shes rab skyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// #/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'is rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ma ti bshulce/ tathA ga tAdzAn/ dar she nA pradz+nyA pa tra/ gom+b+hir/ bo d+hi maN+Nanusar Ni/ abiSh+Na/ ta mon d+ha/ ka rib d+ha ma ni/
dzaladzal/ pradzAdIpi/ mad+hu pa dan sarba ad+hit+tite/ sumus ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru mad+ha A na ya swAhA/ chog nin rizhing bzlas brjod byas n lobs skyen par 'gyur ro// sman bremanyisIm par bcug ste/
dud pa byungagi bar du bzlas pa byas te bros na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi
gzhi 'di gang gis bzung bas/ chos thams cad bzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du'ang gnod sbyin de la srung pa dang/ skyab pa dang/

smra bar byed la/ de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa mad do// spyod ya the dan/ bud+d+ha but+taM/ jayot+tar/ bo d+ha na ba d+ha ni/ saM bo d+haM/ ma hA saM bo d+haM/ a d+hi bad bo d+han/ ha laha lahal/ hili hi lihi
hul lu shulu/ sachabud+d+had+harmaab bod+hin/ spu Ta spu Ta spu TAni/ sarba pA pa ni/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thanan sAhA/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogasaso//
rgya gar skad du/ ma sUsamA dza sku dra nanAmamahAsU twaM/ bod skad du/ mdo chonapo 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchogagasum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi soraskya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ rag slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don
rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas soms shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong

gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshon phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasadagun dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang tshabar grags pa'i lha dag lhagasanas/

bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsAn bkur byed do// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam dusams te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi

sar skya'i gnas akyin gs tshalan/ dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad ng/ byab byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khurabor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid bar kun tu sbyor ba yongs su
zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bshastag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dunalamyang n las 'das pa dang ldan ba'ichos kyi gtam ston par

mdzad de/ de'i tshonaphyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dgan dbang chab r grags pa dang/ dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhagasanas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ bdag cag

kyang song la/ bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshigs sukhacad pasa mngon par bstod par bya gor mchag snyam mo// de nas tshangasasi kyi lhabazhi po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las

03 brkyang bam/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsamagyisatshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngaralhags te phyogasagacig tu 'khod nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshigs su bcad de
gsol pa// 'dus pa che lagazholab yi/ lha tshogs kun nus lhagasagyur pas// gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la// blta ba'i slad dubadag cag mchis// tshas ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigs subacad de gsol pa//

drang bor gyur pa'isamasakyisan// 'dinadag sbyor rab partson pa// kha lo pa ltar mig blangs shing// dbang po rnams legs sdom brgyad// tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpang phur

bod pa 'obs 'drab 'i// phur bu rab bcomabakro rami tshugs/ dedag srad bral dag spyod cing// 'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar btul// tshangs ris kyilha bzhi pas tshigs su bcad dgasol pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas/

skyabs mchib// de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi zhing// mi lus spangasapar gyur nas kyang// lha yi lus ni thob par 'gyur// tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyidan bag bcum sto'akhod do// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par gazigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'dini kha yin no// dge slong dag skye malha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di

shan tuche ba yin te/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdas de dgal yang 'di lta ste/ daregand ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi
'dusapa chen po 'di khog lta bu dag 'dus ba mgyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma'ongs pa'i dusan 'byung bar 'gyurab 'isangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dpalan da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod par byas/ lha rnams kyi ming dag zung zhig/ gang

dag sala gnas pa dang// gang dag ri khroda gnas pa rnams// sang ge bzhin du tha dad la// samasabasdusamanyam par bzhag byas shing// kun nas 'dus par gyurapasu// spu dag brang zhes byed pa yin// gang dag sa la/

skye gnas pa dang// gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams// sangag bzhin duthadad la// sems bsdusamanyam par bzhi g byas shing// kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes// byed pa bdog gas brjod par bya// yid byang dag cing rab

dang la// rtog med 'chi bdag spangs pa rnams// tshangs pa'i 'jig rtenamathor thug pa// lha dang mi yi bar na'akhod// slob pa lta ba phrag gnyis dang// gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang// stong phrag dum rnam dag gi/
lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag/ mtha'anasamatha' ma me mthong zhing// phyogs rnams thams cad khyab gyur pas// sangs rgyas kyis ni mkhyenanas// de bzhinagshegs pas rnam gzigs te// de nas ston pas

bstan dkababa'i// nyanathos rnams la dge slong dag/ lha tshog sa mngon par lhagasagyurakyis// nges par rtogasashes bka' stsal pa// tshigs su bcad pas mthar chags kyis// de dag rnams kyisong brjod kyi//

lcagacig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni// nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis// ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyi// gnod spyin stong phrag bdun po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang//

gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang na'adus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing/ 'dus pa'i tshil du mngon par zhugs//

gsor can stong phrag drug po kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ sar skya'i gnas kyi nags tshalani// snabs byas te'akhod pa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni'adus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul

ldan zhing bod dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal ni// 'dogs stong phrag gsum po dag/ sur

skya'i gnas kyanags tshal ni// snang bar byas te bkod pa dang/ gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// khadog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong

rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshol du mngonapar zhugs// de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang// gang dag de yi

'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod
sbyin nusrin rgyal po'i khab// yangs palani rtag gnas shing// brgyastong phrag mang po yi// gnod sbyin bsAn bkur byed pa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de yang 'dus pa'i zhing ngu'o/

rdzu 'phrul ldan zhung 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// kun tubashes gnyen lnga brgyadang// rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi

lha gang dgadeganyisa 'khor rnams dang// dganyis kyang ni'adus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// khadog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshol du mngon

par zhugs// shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// driza'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya// den1dulhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag turtsa// gang dag de

yi 'khor rnams dang// de yang 'dus pa'i nang du'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/

gang la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad nu dang nibcudang gcig/ de dag mngamathunagrags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha minagayul 'gyed par// kun tugazhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor

rnams dang// dedag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ lho phye//

00 mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// de na dulhan cig tu// klu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang//

de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhingegrags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu sumang yod de// brgyad

rudang bsu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lhamanagayul 'gyed par// kun tukazhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par

lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshol du mngon par zhugs// nub phyogs mngon par sbyong byed pa// rgyal chen

grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// mngon mig mi bzang zhes bya// de ni nyidulhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ong//

rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhange grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshalanang// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu namang yod de/ brgyad cu dang nibanu dang gcig/

dadagamange mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tugazhan gyi mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul
daldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dgoslong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par bzhugs// byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa//

rgyal chen grags dang ldan ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// mi lus ngan po zhes bya// don nyi du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tsartse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de yang 'dus pa'i nang du

'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhinge 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu namang yod de// brgyud chudang nibasu dang
gcig/ de dag mngemathun grogs pa// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tugazhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhag//

rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhingegrags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogasan ni yul 'khor srung// lho phyogs na ni

'phags skyes po// nub phyogasanan mig mi bzang// byang phyogasanan lus ngan po// rgyal po tshan po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po cha// phyogs bzhi dag ni

skyong bar byed// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan nang grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing//

'dusaba'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dadag gi ni khol po rnams// mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa// sla byed g.yon man sgyum can// sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang// ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu//

de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhanga'ong dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal

nyidi 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin dang// gnod sbyin chen po dang// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang// dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas lhags te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang/

bar dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dodagatso dang// mgrin nganadang nimagul ngesadang// stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang// sgyu rab dang ni rtsol dang// rimanyam gsaracan gang po dang// sang ltung ba

dang g.yon can dang/ gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang// rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang na// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang// tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang// gnod sbyin ring
po'i 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgulagasum pa// 'gronas jisnyad yod pa yin// gang dag di yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang na 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//

kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lhan cig 'byung ba'i glu dang ni// 'jog po dang ni yangs pa'i ng 'ongs/ (kha ba dang zhibagyog
0 @#// mchog dag/ srung byed bgrodang lhan cig lhags// klu bdag phran bzang bu dang ni// yul 'khor srung dang glang bo cha/ 'jigs byed chadang sa srungs bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan ng/klu yang 'os//

gangadag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang nabadusaparalhags// rdzu 'phrulaldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshalazhing// 'dus pa'i tshil du mngon
parashugs// gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len// stobs ldan mig rno 'dab chags#// demi 'dab bzas khra bo yang// mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'os// detshe klu rgyalami 'jigs byin// ston pas

'dab bzang bde mdzad cing// gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la// sangs rgyas skyabs su bar song// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// da pa dang 'dus pa'inang du'o// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha

yodog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'itsho du mngon bar zhugs// lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing// rgya mtsho rten pa'i lha min rnams M// thams cad nor lhas skrag/

gyur cing// mtshol skyabasasu 'du shesapa// thag bzasas dang rab bkra dang// rab sim byed dang btung bzung dang// stobs ldan bun brgyupo kun// rnam snang byed bu'i bu rnams dang// stobs ldan sde dang/
sgragacan bazang// dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags shes// dge slong 'dusapa'i nags tshal du// go cha bgos te lhagasapa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul/

ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dug slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// nulcamo dang bu mo dang// zla bso dang phyi bzhin 'ongs// mdza' bshes

la yang nu lha can// lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs// sa dang chudang rlung gi dang// ma yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te// b.rutshanachogs bdud dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang// ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshalan//

snang bar byas te'akhod pa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhangagrags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing//

'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// khyab 'jug lha dang gzhon can lha// mtshemaganyis kyang lhags par gyur// zla la gnas pa'i lha rnasas kyis// zla ba nyidanamadun du bdar// nyimar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis
yanyid du mdun bdar cing// char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag/ rgyu skar rnams kyisamadun bdar lhags// thams cad bzang po rdo rje can// brgyabyin khyer 'jigs 'ongasagyur te// bcu tshan tshogs bdud dag

kun[;]kha dog sna tshogs ldan po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyin gs tshalan// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang n 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//

kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon bar zhugs// lha motshogs can m dang ni// me lce rtsa 'dra mchi ltas can// zhi bamo dang dka' bzlog ma//
me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing/ sgrub mo dang mtshan chings bzang// bachimadu rnam pa dum dang// gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa// 'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs//
bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// khadog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ sar skyaba gnas kyi nags tshalan// snang bar byas sha'akhod pa dang/ gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de rtag kyang ni'i dus par

lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing bod dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// sngobasangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang//
mi 'drami 'dradam pong// rtsod mos myos dang de bzhin du// yid 'ba'akhrug ma' 'ongs gyur cing// phagamo phagamo chen mo dang// slong mngesam lhan cig lhags// b.rutshan tshogs bsu de dag kun//

kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snangabar byas te'akhod pa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// da dag kyang ni'adus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//

g+ha kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dkar mo rgyugs byed snying rje dang// chos sngon mo yang 'ongs rgyuracing// sa dkar mo la
sogs pa dang// gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur// 'phrogam rtag tumyos pa dang// spel ma rnam pa du ma dang// dag pa dang ni'od can ma// mamo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags// bsutshan tshogs bsu de
dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshalani// snang bar byas par bod pa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing

'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhingegrags ldan rnams// dgaslong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// bde byed dga' ldan 'athab bral dang// nag po btab pa du ma dang// lumabi ni
dang lum bi mchog skaram zhes bya legs smonadang// 'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du// dbang sbyar rnams kyang lhags par gyur// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan padag/ sar

skya'i gnas kyin gs tshalan// snang bar byas ta'akhod pa dang// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// dodag kyang ni 'dus nga ra lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// bdog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/

dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha chogs drug cu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshalan// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang/
gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang 'dus par lcags/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshal du
mngon par zhugs// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/ tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba// kun 'gyed gzhon nu skar rgyal te// so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang/ lhan/
cig 'grogs teda' lhagasang/ gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang// de dag kyang 'dus pa lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing bod dang ldan// bdog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams//
dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshalazhing/ 'dus pa'i tsha 'dug nang bzhugs// dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'brog mamo// kha dog gzugasa mchog ldan pa dang/ khu rnams kyis yongs bskor zhing// de dag rnams

kyi phyibazhi'os// gang dag de 'khor rnams dang// de'ang 'dus pa'itshal du 'ongasaM// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dag slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing//
'dus ba'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dbang po ra bcas rang dbang ldan bacas// skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi// lha rnams de dag der lhags shing// dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so/ zhus/
pos sbas pa'i tshig la ltos// 'dod chags kyisana'adi bzung la// bcing ba gyis dang khyed la legs// 'di dag kun nas yongs sdud la// 'dadeg gson por ma btang zhes// den nag po sde bo
sdo rnams niskul byed cing// khros shing rang dbang med tshur nas// rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te// lag nga sa la brdabasanusani// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ste// de nas lha yi sprin 'phrang
dang/ glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phab// sangs rgyas kyisan di mkhyenazhas// de bzhin gshags pas rnamagazigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/
bdud sde mngon par lhags gyur kyis// nges par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa// brtson par byed pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas// de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas// de dag chags bral yA/
bar rtogs// rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni// slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'// de dag g.yul nas rnam rgyalazhung// 'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin// bar gyi sdomani/ bdun
stong gsar can rimanyam dang// de bzhanigs sbyin chu srin dang/ kun gyi bshas dang rgyal po rnams// de bzhin khel po gnod sbyin dang/ klu dang 'dab babs lhamin dang// tshulhamo dang khyab 'jug dang/
tshogs can mdang sngo bsangs dang// dkar mo bde byed dbang phyug dang/ kun 'agyada gzhon dang 'phrogam dang// dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo// de nas gsang ba'i lha'i bu shin tudabang che
bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas de'i tsho tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo bshad de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di deg gis mdo 'di yang dag pa
bsnyad par bgyi zhing//yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so// de lags ng sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tadu zla/ teng tadzabati/ tsitarI tsitarlab ti/ ta la ta la pa ti/ kham kha ma ba ti/

glu ma klu ma pa ti/ b+had dri b+had dra ba ti/ yashe ya shA pa ti/ rU de rU tapa tI/ tsa pa le tsapa la ba ti/ kha tsekha tsa bA tita/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams
bya/ lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di deng/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa mamachis par 'dzinapar bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung ngo//
thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// gang du klog pa der dgabar
'gyur zhing/ de la dgung lo bdun du srung 'bgyid par yang 'gyur lags so// jitsam 'tshal bar 'gyur pa de tsam gyi dbang char 'bab bar yang 'gyur/ chad nga ra yang 'gyur/ dgungasar 'bubs pa/ra
ba yang 'gyur/ chadapar yang 'gyur lags so// brond thams cad la khyab par bagyisasam chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsalan/ des de'i brind thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ga'o// danas
ts+tshA bcom ldan 'das la// tshangs pas gsol// bcom ldan bas gnas gtsang ma pa/rtag ma gtogs ba/ gzugs stod pa'i lha'i rigs gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang 'di lags la// gsang sngags
kyi tshig 'gi'ang 'di dag lhags te/ 'din 'dir mdos yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA b+ha la g+hal ma la/ dur dul/ ma/ thub pas// kAtsak+Sha ku tsesI/ nImAn khe ra
thoraN+NaM/ bam po po po tasta ka ta'i ke gu rug ro Ta/ gug gu miti/ tarerak+Sha/ sU trem nu pA la ya b+h+yA 'dini bdag cag gi 'ag sngags kyi chogazhil mo lags te/ gang la la zhig/mdo sde 'di dang/
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dideg dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin tam/ klog par bgyid na/ de la mi dang mi ma lags po dag mchibar mi 'gyur zhing/ gdug pa'i ng mi mchi/ sprul yang mi mchi/ dug kyang mimachi/
la/ de'i lus la gnod pa dag gisami tshugs par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ngesrid 'tsho'i bar du 'a byung po thams cad las bsrung bar bgyis par yang
'gyur lags so// gang klog par bgyid pa dang/ ganganyan par bgyid pa de la dgung lo bdun du bsrung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du sU lan/
de'i bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'dod pa'i bdag po thams cad kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag cag gi yul yang lags/
mdo snga'ad yos su gzung ba'i rig sngagasani 'di lags so// tabya thA/ lin de lipi le po pa de nga/nga ka ka ma/ kAtsakAk+ki/ kA tsapingag le/ du ma du ma dus/ taTi Te/ tad traT/ tA NA k+ki/
ko lA kel/ ki ka ko la ki/ sAd+hu su dra ma nu pa la ya thA/ ud gi cha thatsati/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang/ mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur pa
dang/ ma nyams par bazung ste srung ba ro bgyidan/ da ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis pa/ra 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ji tsam 'tshalab de tsam
gyidagung char yang 'bab par 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung sar 'bab par yang 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur lags so/ 'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su
tharapar yang 'gyur lags so// dug 'byin par rang 'gyur lags so// chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis tagator tam 'tshal du stsalan/ desabro nad thams cad1bar zhabar 'gyur lags so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di'ang de bzhin ru/ mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzinapar brgyud cing/ 'dod pa na spyod

pa'i lhagong ma rnams kyisan rjes su yi rang bar bgyid la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyid lags so// tad+ya thA/ b+hi ra bI rab ti/ te Ti toN ga ti/ b+hadadre b+had dra ba to/
ge negon pa ti/ mgreme g+har ti/ nedzAlanab ti/ b+hu te b+hu tang ti/ khor de kho radab ti/ i dan sU traanu griSh+ThathA/ anupA la ya tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'didar//
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dgadum bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyidan/ danajisrida'atsho'i bar du'abyung po thams cad las bsrung bar bgyis par 'gyur lags so// da lam dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang
'tsho bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang du klog pa der jisrid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par bgyur lags so// sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// de la bal gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang
'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyisai tshugs par 'gyur gsaso// sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lags so// gang du klog par
'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar par yang 'gyur lags so// dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nad thams cad
sol bar yang 'gyur lags so// skadapa 'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis tabacingasasaMm gtongan/ bro nad thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po

bzhis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags 'di'ang mdo sde 'dayongs su 'dzin cing grubakha'abgyidapa lags so// rnam thos kyi bus gsol ba/ tad+yathA/ ka re ku ra NI/ mo ra mor
d+hi kAtsakatsi NI/ krimi kri min/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/ bu re/ po'/ pur ti/ ho hor nI/ prahor/ hor nI/ hor nI/ 'phugasaskyas pos gsol pa// kol ka na pa ti/ kasha NI/
make sha tho ti/ gro ba ni/ mi riti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/ tsak+Shatsak+kaNI/ tsak+kabA ki/ na b+hi tir/ tismin/ sham shami/ shaAne to/ bcom ldan 'adas gang zhig rgyal po chen po bsabarjod/

ba'i rig sngags kyi chog zhabim 'di bzhidang/ mdo snga'adi dum bur ma gyur pa dang ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar dusung pa bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ de la 'byung po bslu
cad dang bro nad thams cad kyang slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags so// gdug bsazin ba dang dug thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so// skudang 'amachab 'abazlasabarjod bagyis te
sma bcig sam gtor cing 'tshaladu stsalan/ chog des de la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// danag bcom ldan 'das la/ lhag yin dang nga lhasagaso ra/ bcom ldan bdag bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di'ang mdo sde
'di yongs su 'dzin pa bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ ga le/ gag ga le/ gag pa ga NI khin khani/ glushagyu/ rgyu/ kha na/ kha na/ khan bano/ li da lu po/ lu pa lu par/ bcom ldan 'das gsung
sngags 'di dag dang/ mdo sde 'di dum buramagyur cingam bkol bar bzungan/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung bar M 'gyur lags so// de'i bond thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// lus la dug gis me
tshugasapar gang 'gyuralagrasaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa los subazung ba'i

slad du/ khyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'adas nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing kun tu

gzung ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol/ de ltar narigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyiba'i chos kyi do snga'adi 'bras bu dang bcas bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tubazung ba 'dazhi grub pa yin te/ banyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdosdu'adi grub pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bsgrub ba dag bshad par bya sta/ nyon cig
dang bshad par bya'o/ gnas gtsang ma'iris kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyitshogs dbacasangs mdo sdachen po 'di grub bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ srung

ba dang bsgrub pa dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mdo sde'adagrub ba'akhruba'i phyir bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa// de la rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi grub ba 'di yin no// tAl tul/

tan tal/ tatod le/ ma te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i grub pa ni da yin no// sa lesas li ti/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa na'adi yin no// la de la Ti/ le la ti/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di

yin no// chubu chupu/ rgyu ru ru/ kacib ka tsi/ katshab ka tsati/ donas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa 'di lanano// chum d+hum/ dus d+ha sa/ d+ha sod+ha so b+hare/ d+had+ha re/ d+haro d+hiti/ de la bsrung ba
ni 'di yin no tIretsi'o/ brog la kA rak+Sha/ mtshams gcad pa 'di yin no// bad+d+ha ban+d+he/ ban+d+ha/ si rim ti bat+taM gu khe bats+tshA/ gyagyu/ bit+tA/ grub rgyu te/ ya ma ban+d+hab+hi/ bsgrub

ba ni 'di yin no// po kha sa lha la tutul sa/ d+ha ye ti/ zhag gsum sbyang ba byas pas tshes bcoN+Di'inyanib ra gsang sngags kyi tshig 'didig dang/ mde sgo 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ kha shar gas ]
subaltas la bsrung ba lan brgyabarjod bar bya zhing/ bzlas brjod lanabargya byas 'amadud pa re re labargya rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung byas pa yin zhing/ lanagasum spu zing zhes byed par yang

'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sminab ni ma gtogs so// zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes banuganyis la bcom ldan 'das 'a mchod pa byas la/ skud pa dalag tublangs te bzlas shing mtshams bcad par byas te/

lanabargyabargyad brjod cing mdud pa brgyartsabargyad byas te mtshams gcod par byed na/ lanabadun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro/ kalo gas nus ce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/

de nas mtshams bcad ng/ra shes par bya'o// des de bzhin du sbyang ba byas to/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par khrus byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas taskud pa blangs tanyan thos kyi tshiga rnams dang/

bcoldan 'das kyichog zhib mos lanabadun bzlas te/ bzlas ba rjod lanabargyartsa brgyud brjod cing/ mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la snyad pa lag tu blangs te/ rig sngags thams cad 'an mis bzlos brjod byas shing bsgrub/

bgyisan/ char pa chen po dang rlung chen po'ang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu phyin zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/ skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/ lan bdun gyi bar du'ang brjod par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu sprin cesabye

bdang/ sprinapazang zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/ de'i rkang pa 'amago bos phyag 'tshalazhung/ grub pa sbyin r dang rjes su yi rang bar rang 'gyur ro// de la grub pa 'di dag yin te/ sbyin ni ku ruM ku po zhes bya'o// sprin bzang gi

mibadu yin te 3kar kar ka ra ra zhes bya'o// tshig 'di dag dang skud pa lag tublangs pas// mdo sde dang gsang sngags rnams bsamasan/ gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur go// bcom ldan 'adus kyi

mdo sde dang rig sngags 'di ga thams cad kyis chu bum skud pa la bzlasan/ gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de/ las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang gzhan dag srung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar

bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyisade skad ces bka' stsalanaMs 2 dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'amanang/ra bstod do// 'byung pogang dga' dare ni lcags gyur cing// sa dang bar snangadag la 'khod pa

rnams/// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing// nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tradang/ pradz+nyA ma
dang/ zhuchan gyi lo tsab ban d+he ye shes spro la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtanal phab pa///@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harmAsA ga ra nAm b+hAr Ni/ bod skad du/

'phags pa chos kyirgya mtsho zhigakhya ba'i gzungs/ sungs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang/ 'a thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gtsagan/ bcom ldan 'dus war cha sen drang srong smra ba ni

gas kyi nagasan/ dge slong lnga brgyatham pa'i dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tubazhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'dasol
nyan ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag ngas michos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha phra ba/ brtags pa// mkhas shing

shas bas 'ag par du ba rtogs so// sazhi skye bo mang po la than pa dang/ skya bon nga po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ skyabo phal po che'i don dang/ lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos

kyi 'khor lo bskor to// ngas thogs bamad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyi'i nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs re bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan ng/ blo gros kyi blo dang ldanub/ rtogs po'i blo dang ldan pa// brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa// gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/
spobs baachog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang/ gangedag de 'dzin pa de dgagisanamyur ba kho nar chos lta thob par 'gyur ro//

lta gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur// brjed nges pa med pa 'i dran pa dang ldan zhing/ sa bzung ba rnams chud tha par mi gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/

rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ lag dang/ donadang/ tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas rtsod

gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di deb ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sa rgyas kyis bzhag go/ da ltar b ng 'jog go/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gzhibasdub khyod la bstan par bya ste/ des na khyod kyisam thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro//

thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bzung pa'i chos rnams ni nyams su lenang ra 'gyur ro// nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams ni gzhan dag la khong du chud pa byed do// tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/

'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tudabye ba dang/ dbazhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang/ bla na med pa'i tshig gi rab tungabye ba dang/ sanas sa brtags pa'i yi ge'i tshag gi rab tu dbye ba dang/ nges pa'i tshig

dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tudabya ba'o// de la 'di dag ni gzi byin brtan par byed pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa sta/ glangabazhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ grul bum dang/

yi dgas dang/ sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi rnam grangs rnams dang sman rnams spyin par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag lami gnod
pa d bzhi nagshegs pas gsungs pa/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri ba rnams kyis mnos pa bstan pa yongs su'adzin ngan 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngogs kyi tshig 'di dag nyon
cig khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/ spyod ya thadan kam ke tam nud tse/ ra tirutagran+dam/ thu mun/ na la tu/ a saM ku la spu bu mi anusmar/ i daM ga ma i sha sgyu/ klan anu
ga te/ yAmu la gum b+he/ pasdemagur baya ba/ a s+ya b+hAkyaslabar-ig/ ba lamatha/ shIb ba ripany+tsa ka pras te/ a bab la/ a gra bo la/ shi khu u tsadzume/ udzedzum/ kun dga' bo 'di

dag gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa grub pa dang/ gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs mthong la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ rim gro'ang byed byed pa rnams
'ching/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin bab pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams bzung zhagi/ kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang

ba dang/ kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so// kun dgab bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur 'o// sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mi

'gyur ro// kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phagasakyi gling na gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed cesabya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling nani gnod sbyin cher spyod rus bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo byang gi sgra

mi snyan gyi gling naniganod sbyin rnam grags zhes bya b gnas so// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling naniganod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ (kun dge'

bo gnod sbyin gazhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro// dad ba thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa ma phyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la 'di degand bzhin gyi tshig

drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchogagitshig ga mchog/srog chags 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tsho ba'i tshig rnams zung zhige dang ngas bshad do//

kun dga' bo de la nga' phyin 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so// spyod la the dan/ dan d+har ma hAdar/ haram ba ran/ rud dra tra/ kum tidri tra/ in dra man tu ke/ a ba ta/
sa harA/ san+nAm ti/ i la la ba ma ti/ ab ta/ tar pa ra/ ya bikAs da bi/ a ba tiSh+Tha/ pa ri brta/ i sha brta/ sa da brta/ ka ma kram ti'an/ asi bam la ban haShi/ sha su'i/ d+hur rgyu ra/
ung+ga muk+kA/ oMzla ba tu/bsar gram ti/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i slong bzhipa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyiganod sbyin dang/ 'byung po dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ srul po dang/ klu dang/

dri zad ng/ sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas ba dang/ lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshags pasagasungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thosanas dga' bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyis/

gzungasasngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung zhig/ phyis 'gyod tA re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni// gling bzhi dgan gtsozhes bya// gsang
sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba// de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pagi/ gnod sbyin de dag lhags nasagi/ chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dus//
nyams par gyurapa de la ston// dbag tshadabargyaphrag mang po yang// mthar gyis sunas nasakyang// zab cing don dang ldan pa yi// tshig 'di dag nimanyan par bya// 'di dug chos kun rtsa ba ste// de dag
mkhas rnams nyan par gyis// drag po dag gis thos nas kyang// phyin s mchog tu dga' ba ste// gangal bde dang sdug bsngal med// de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa 'dichags pa med pa ste// sangs
rgyas sazhibasam mi khyab// chags pa med pa bstan pa yi// bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas// nyim sprin las byung ba ltar// donas stang de bzhin snang// 'dil skye mched phung po rnams/ bden dang
byang chub yan lag dang// dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams// sas rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod// de yi thos pa'itshogs rnams gang// nams kyang chud zar mi 'gyur// ma thosachos rnams de dag
thos/ nyes dang nyes min rnams lamakhas// rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/ mig bzang rnams kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang na ston byed pa// dani rtag tusas rgyas bsngags// sangs rgyas
kyini chos rnams la/ khe tsom mi mnga'abaden pa gang// bden des bdag la lung mnos pa// ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la/ byams bsa gnas pa'i bden
pa des// rang gisams dang bzhanasams la// ston par rab tu gnas gyur cig gling bzhi'i gnas kyiganod sbyin dag/ ma dad pa dang dud par bstan// gang la rtogs pa

mi snang ba// de la de kun don ston bgyur// gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang// glang chen snang dang khyadar ra stobs// drag po dga' byed gsod byed dang// zla ba'agomed lus gasod// dnga' sde dang ni

gadang/'dang// srin po dang nas 'dzin pa/ ljang khu kha dang sna pazang dang// ral gri'ispu can bod bu rnams// thams cad grub par byed par shog/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la// gnod sbyin srin po de

dag ni// spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed// rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang// tshig rnams dngani lang bstanadang// sa pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang// yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur// lung mnos pa yang chud
mi za/ rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur/ rtag tudon dang la ga la// de yi shes pa 'thal bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang// tshimajed bdag po tshangs pa yang// de yi lag
bshad nyan pa rnams// de yiyod la dran par byed/ myud ya the dan/ hu kun/ mu kun/ han/ bihaman/ ishasaM kraman/ o sumakha/ tAkaN/ a ga Na/ a briya/ ub+hUm/ kob hi
ra / u du/ dra ba Na tan/ sa gra mo ba hadzag re/ drashog de/ gud+d+ha ban/ ud ta na/ bag Na/ isha kun/ a tul tul/ aTib Ti/ ba ri tsamo sha/ har/ dzag ta/ eb si pramu khaM/
mgo b+har/ bsusazhu/ i tiya/ thAhu/ tsatur d+hI wi ka yan/ ta shum shu/ uglu shu d+ha ra sa hu/ saM gra ha/ ab grwa shu/ abin graha/ pradza brid d+hiyaM// kha shus shu//

ma ka ra ku ru/ rnyas hu/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi na tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// de na thos la rmongs pa med// de shes rab med mi 'gyur// skaramada'ajibazhin nyem bzhi/

zla ba ji ltar snangab bzhin// de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang// mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la rig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshog sang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// spyod la thadan/ tsarad+he bi tsar d+he/
a mi gte/ a tim ti/ pa raha re/ g+ha Nab+he/ hipa ra ma/ mA cha pra tib hAn/ dza ya dza ya/ ma zhu ka/ ba 'bapa le/ ug grab ti/ swa rasAr/ a ba sa re gu gun de/ dra ba brnye/ sam/

a dza ta dza ya// nub la su/ khomasu san d+hen ku ma no// sak+She/ tsApe tsApa/ tsub/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pulu pu lu/ byab pra sa re/ ka ra ka b+hinaD+ha/ bi dzAlidzaM/ a pra tisanad+hi/ nAn num ti/ phran nu ma te/
a ri dasi/ 'u nupani di/ asaM gra ab ti/ rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshigabadag lus la thogs te 'chang na/ gling bzhi ba chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams nuganod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/

grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyurazhing/ dbang du margyu ba rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i
mtha' thug gi bar dubachibar mi 'gyur/ de la chogani 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyibar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dran bar bya'o//
denas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa'anas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/
lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za'abacas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstod do// 'gras pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
khyogar gyi mkhan po su ren+dabo d+hidang/ pradzabarmadang/ zhu chen gyi latsab ban d+ho la shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus tagatan la phab pa//
rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya b+hAmAn bi ne ya kar tAd+ha ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgags selaba'agazungs 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan

du yod pa'i dzi ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po sugang tshogs kyi bdag
bo'isnying po 'dzin ra des chog thams cad dang dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad bkrub par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ namo sgyu ste/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra/
Ta ha ha gri b+hany+dza b+ha/ namo sku ste/ ru ru tsatsal sAhA/ ab+hu tA/ bin du khan mnatsed rnyabar sam gtsati/ hAha la/ mahAhanyid klu ta nan/ sra go ba la mo/
ku ru ku'u/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ nam nam sAhA/ nang rolangs tesngags lan bdun bzlas la/ chu khyor ba gang stong dang 'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang/ bgags thams cad bacings par 'gyur
ro// gsang sngags sgrub 'dod pas skud pa dkar po'amadud pa nyishu rtsa gcig bor te/ lag ba la bcings narig sngags 'grub par 'gyur// bgags thams cad bacingasapar 'gyur ro// gang natshog
kyibadag po snang ba der sngogs 'di lan cig bklags na'ang bgegs rnams bar chad mi byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor de dag thams cad dga' sto/ lha dang/ mi dang
lham yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bcom ldan das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bgags sal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
rgya gar skad du/ A TanA nI ya ma sU trananAm ma hA su khaM/ bodaskad du/ mdo tshan pa kun turgyub dang/ kun tu rgyub ma yin pa dang mthunaba'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la thug
'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dagab ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos
[z/]kyi khu ba deg 'phags pa// g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du mdang/ g.yog 'khor gnod spyin brgya phrag dum dang/ g.yoga 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag/
dum dang ldan pa namasras ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ de'atshorgyal po chen po

rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen po sa gsal bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bu phyogs gcig tu'adu gnas / de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyisan de ma 'tshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyus gang dag 'das
pa dang// da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad la na bag phyag 'tshal// khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs sumami/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang (dge slong ma dang//
dge bsnyen dang/ dgabasnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang/ nags 'dab dag dang/ bsamatha' dag gnasapa dag kyang machis la/ de nas gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa
gnyug mar gnas pa gangadag/ bcom ldan 'das kyigasung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang/ mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lagos pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas
pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod spyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug ra gnyug mar gnas pa ga dag/ bcom ldan
ba ]'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dadar de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang/ dag slong ma rnams dang/ dge bsnyan rnams dang/ dge bsnyan
ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug ba gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par

dad par bgyib dang/ mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phal bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang/ kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthunanga'imado// rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang
nga la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgyacher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung
bur gnang ba mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
a de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu sgrub dang/ kun tu sgrub ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya
cheragasol to// skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing// phraamamachisasarasnyabral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// ma de rnams spyi nad pa lags// gang gi char la brten nas ni// desan nyin mor
brjod pa yi// khyim chen po dkyil 'khor can// kyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyurab// phyogs de mngon par skyong brgyud pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa na// dri za'abadagabo rgyal po ste//
ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bka/ den du lhan tsagatu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// dri b rnams kyis yongs bskor cing// driwa rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bunimang mchis te/
brgyad dudang nibcudangagacig/ dedag ming mthun grags pa'i// dbang po zhes bagyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyisami thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs
sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyena mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod lani// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal
lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod lamimin phyag 'tshal ba// da skad yang dang yang du shog/ de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go tam rgyal la phyag

tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang lags shes skye bomachi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grag
dang ldan pa lags// gang na yid gs zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyisha 'tshal phram can// srog gcod bgyid pa ma rus pa// 'jungs shang mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ phyogs de mngon

par sbyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po nas bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis
yongs bskor cing// grul buma rnams kyisamadunagyisabaltas// dol bunimang mchis te// brgyad cu dang bdu dang gcig/ dedag mngamathun grags pa ni// dbangapo zhes bgyi stobs pocha// lha dang lha min
g.yul 'gyodapa// kun tugazhan gyis mithub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyima'iganyena mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal
zhes// miyis phyagabagyis khyod lani// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni

'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas jig ra pazhabs ldan pa// mya ngana'adas la phyag tshol ma// de ltar lho yi phyogs don// bzang ba lags shes/

skya bo mchi/ phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen gragasadang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa ni// nyim chen po dkyil 'khor can// 'gadugs gang du nug/

bsgyur ba// de namatsho chen zab mo ni// shin tu 'da' ba dka' ba ste// da ni nusngon rgya mtshozhes// skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi// phyogs de mngon bar skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi

bdag po rgyal po ste// ming gi migami bzung zhes bgyi// de ninyidu lhan cig tu// glu dang garagyis rtag turtse// klu rnams kyis ni yos bskor cing// klu rnams kyis numadunagyis bltas// de la bu nim an+d+ri
ta[0f10]brgyad bcu dang nibcudang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa'i// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha minagayul 'gyedapa// kun tu gozhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs

sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas zhima'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shos khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shang phyag 'tshal lags//
bdag la dge pas gzigs su gsol// khyod lam min phyag 'tshalab// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag tshol cig/

sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba legs shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par spyobgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lag/

gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga bzhi ng lhun chen balta mdzes dang// gang nam rnams tsholo// brgya phrag bdub skye 'gyur zhing// de dag mi rmo mo'adebs la// gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing// tsheringamadog/
dang ldan pa dang// nges par yongs su spyod bskyed cing// zas su sA lu kha dog dang// dridang ro dang ldan pa dang// dribada' ma tog tshogs 'dra zhing// lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li

ka rab skol bgyis nas// tshod mar de 'tshal srang chod min// gang name lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrungabar 'gyur ba yin// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod
sbyin badag po rgyal po ste// ming nilus ngan po zhes pa// dan du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor tsang// gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdunagyasibaltas//
dol ba ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bdudang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa// dbang bo zhes bgyi stobs po tsho// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag

rnams kyis rdzogasasangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyima'ikanyen mthong nas// skyes bu cangashes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shang
phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dag bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal la// de skad yang dang yang thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal ba phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma

khyod la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shis skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa//

rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogasanani yul 'khor srung// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogasananimig mi bzang// byang phyogasanani lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dag/ 'jig

rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhadagani skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchib rnams// de dag glang po che'atshalazhing//
phyogs phyogs dag pu rnam par rgyu// dedag nichibs rtadang/ modang/ khyu mchog dang/ mahe dang/ radang/ lug dang/ sbrul dang/ bya dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ gzhon nu dang/
gzhon num la 'tshal zhing// phyogs phyogasadag tu'ang mchilags so// glang po chagacig gis shang rta drangs shing/ phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchilags so// chibs rtadang/ mo dang/ khyu mchog
dang/ mdang/ ra dang/ lug dang/ sprul dang/ bya dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ gzhon nu dang/ gzhonanu mgacig gis shing rta drangs shing/ phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchilegs so//
rdzu 'phrulachen po stobs pocha'i/ gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchib rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dgan skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la
rgyub mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun turgyu ba dang/ kun turtsub ma lags pa dang/ sa la kun turgyu ba ma lags pa dang/ gar bcas sa stangs kun turgyu ba dang/ sbubs can dang/ grong khyer sbubs can
zhes bgyi ba dag lags so// byang phyogs mtshoka bang ka zhes bgyi ba'ang mchis lags so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang/ gos can dung/ gos mchog can/

dang [0f10 ]pad+ma can rung/ pad+mabazang po can dang/ sagazhican zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so// chab rgyun mang po'a gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te// chab rgyun tha dad de
las 'byung// de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur// btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'isprubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang// dbas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs

mang dang dbas mang// bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gada'// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi// pha rol byang gi phyogs tshan// 'dunas bya dkar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis to/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du

zhinga gnas lags so// rkang ma sdum la mchu'aphyangs dang// 'jigs rung lto spu tsan dag mchis// de naljonashing 'bras bu rtag/ rmabya khrung khrungs snyan dang// khu byug sgra skad chen po dang// shing shang te'u

dag sgra 'byin cing// rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang// ko'u kum pa dang chun lag dang// bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing// me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'// lus ngan pa de glu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtsa/

btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rolan/ rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyib yul 'khoramu khyud namachis lags so// bdag ganganamachis pa 'dunas de mikhyu mchog can zhes bgyi sta/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lag
so// de lags ng sngags kyi tshigan 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i li mi li/ kazimA le/ hili ki mA le/ hudu ma/ hu dur dum/ go'i/ gnamyur/ go dohan/ o ka ma ka swA hA/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarab dag gis dri ba rnams dang/ drizachen po rnams dang/ drizo'i sde dpon rnams dang/ dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'dilta ste/ 'dod myos

dga' basamyos pa dang// klu yis myos pa spyan dang ni// 'phrang bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// ma tog myos ba spun rnams dang// rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang//

ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang// rdza'odzin dang ni khu byug sgra// zhum bu rudang gtsug ltadang// gsar spyod bu mo gsaracan dang// pa wasangs dang phur budas// 'gro gnas jisnyed rgyal po lags// de dag bdag gi
skrunalags te/ de dag la bdag driza'adi bdag la 'chi'o// driza'adinibadag mi gtong ngo zhes mchizhing/ de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tsho ba'i drib dang// bdag mi gtong ba'i dri ba yis//
legs par smras pa 'di thos nas// a ka yi dog pa bzhin// de mgo tshal pa bdun du'ags// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lags so// tad+ya thA/ kumUle kunu le/ kunu le/ kumUle/ e hi e/

hi/ sA d+ham tike/ sAd+hab+haNaDini ka/ tiSh+Tha duTAbA to swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyen mgang la la kun tusmyub dngo/ kun tu
rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'imado// rig sngags dang/ srung pa dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don pa'i bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za
'amadrizamo ga/ dritha rgad po 'am/ driza rganamo 'am/ driza'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bumo 'am/ driza'i 'khor pho ma/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ driza'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'imangag gzhug
ma 'tsho bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing grags tshol ba la la zhig la bsamatshizhing/ rkyabar 'greng ngam/ 'bar mchis par gyur/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi red la/ dri bra rnams kyis dri bro 'du ba'i

nang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob sta/ ra'i mgo aN+Da ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gsong ngam/
dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyan m/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang/ kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo rig sngags dang/ srung pa dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba
'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal tesha za 'am/ sha za mi'am/ sha za rgad po 'om/ sha za rgan mo 'am sha za'obu pho 'am sha za'abu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho/
'am sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'imangag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'imangag gzhug ma'atshobar bgyid pa// glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nabar mchizhing/ nye bar 'greng ngam/ nyebar mchis

par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyis sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dag pa/
bzhin du tshal pa bdun du'ags lags so// de lags ng sngags kyi chig nu'adi dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ shAm b+hum/ shAmi li/ nyami lA/ ba tIye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
bdag gis grul bum rnams dang/ grul bum chen po rnams dang/ grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang/ dmag dpon gyi mi brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nya byani kri mi sha// rtsib logs che

dang gsus po che// lag bcudang nis la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang// sprinamadog dungani drimad dang// rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrog/ ral pa can dang stobs bsu dang// srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur
mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba srid// lababazang ldan gsum po dang// tshon kun dang ni mig bkrab bo/ 'gro gnas jisang mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi sban lags te/ de la bdag grul bum 'dini/
bdag la 'tshe'o// grul bum 'di nibadagami gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing/ de dag lago bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshapa'i grul bum dang// bdag ma gtong ba'i grul bum gyis// legs par smras pa 'di
thosan// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ si ra bi si re/ si'i bi sa ra/ si re bas ri/ kitsago le/
ka ra Ni/ big le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang/ kun tu rgyu ba ma
ba lags pa dang mthun pa'imado/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'dinyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum mam/
grul bumamo ma/ grul bum rgad po'am/ grul bumo rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum
gyimangag gzhug pa dang/ grul bum mngag gzhugam 'tsho bar byed pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig 'bar mchizhing/ nye bar 'greng ngam/ 'bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rad cing
gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyis grul bum 'du ba'inang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas/
lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ ge bsAnanam/ dge bsnyan magang la la kun turgyu ba dang/ kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/
rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal tu yid gs sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgad/
po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu yo'am/ yi dwags kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor tho 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag
gzhug ma 'tshabar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing gugs tshol ba lawazhig bar mchizhing/ nyabar bgrang ngam/ rnabar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi red cing gnas mi red la/ yi dgasa rnams kyis yi

dgas 'duba'inang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo aN+Daka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag
lags so// tad+ya thA/ yu mi yumi/ yumi le/ yumi la ba sngayeswAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan star bodag gis klu rnams dang/ klu chen po rnams dang klu'i sde dpon rnams dang/ dmagad ngo/

rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun ngaga'adang// nor rgyas dang ni'adzam bu bzang// sar po dang ni zhi na dang// dbang po'i log dang bkra shis dang/ mya ngan med/

dang mya ngan bral// rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag/ nges yangs po dang ngos bkra dang// yangs pa can dang bkra bdud rgyal// gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang// nag po tshe dang lag 'gro dang// ra skyong dang ni
'jog po dang// g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang// sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni// 'gro gnas jisnyad mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags to/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag
0/ @#// la 'tsho'o// klu 'di nibadag mi gtong ngo zhes mchizhing/ de dag lago bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang// bdag gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis// legs
ma par sas pa 'di thosan// aka yi dog pa bzhin// dza mgo tshal pa bdun du'ags// de lags ng sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lagaso/ tadu tshel mi le/ Atshanyan sa/ cawA calabacas/ calabacag kha'agan
ga/// wA kan/ bzhugapal0ma ldan 'adas 7nyanas dgaslong ngos/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyonanam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la lo kun rgyab dang kun rgyabam lags
mthun pa'imado/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgyacher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'aa/ klu mo dang/ klu rgyad po 'am/
klurganamo 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor pho ma/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mjug gzhug pa 'am klu'imangag gzhug ma 'tsho bar baspyod pa// glegasalta zhing grugasatshol

bal la zhag nye bar mchizhing/ nyapar 'grang ngam/ nyabar mchis par gyuran/ glags mird cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyis klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang
gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhinatshal ba bdun du 'ogs lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyinyan thos dge slong ngom/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge bsonanam/ dge bsnyenamagang la

la kun turgyug dang/ kun turgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthunapa'i mdo// rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'dinyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'donaparab gyid pa de la/
gal telus srul bo 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgad po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/ lus srul po 'bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ lus srul
bo'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'amangagu gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngaga gzhugam 'tshabar bgyid ba/ glags lta zhing gugasatshol ba la la zhig nyebar mchozhing/ bar 'grang ngam/ nyaper

mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyis lus srul po 'du ba'inang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza

ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ A pa ba hazhi/ mahAn ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas kyi spyan sngar bdag gis
gnod sbyin rnams dang/ gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang/ gnod spyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang/ dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta sta/ dbang bo zla banultadang// ba rarwa tsa dgu'i

bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang// mgi nangan dang ni 'gul ngas dang// stobs ldan nor bunor spyod dang// sgra rab dang ni nyalnga dang// rimanyamagaser can gang bo dang// seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang//
gnod spyin ba skyong 'broga gnas dang// rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// driza sna tshogs sde dbani// lcags mdza ngaring dang ma ldan dang// tshig smras po yid dga' dang// gnod sbyin rang bo
ba 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bugasum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas jisnyadamachis pa lags// de dgan bdag gi spyan lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tsho'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni
bdag migatong ngo zhes mchizhing/ de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshaba'i gnod sbyin dang// bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// legs par smos pa 'ad bris na// am+b+ha ka yi dog pa bzhin//
de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hilimi li/ hile ma le/ kidimU le/ hili kIrtimU le/ o tul+li tam+me/ o tusmra tulce/ o g+ha mo
ge/ go dod/ blog ra/ riTasid+d+ham sAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyan ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang/ kun tu rgyu ba ma lags
pa dang mthunapa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug ba rkang ba la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyidirgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal taganod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo
bam/ gnod sbyin rgad po 'am/ gnod sbyin rganamo 'am/ gnodasbyin gyi bu bo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'amaM/ gnod sbyin gyo mngag
gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mga gzhug ma 'tshabar bgyid pa// glags lta zhing glegs tshol ba la la zhig nyebar mchizhing/ nye bar 'greng ngam/ 'bar mchis par gyuran/ glags mi rnyed cing/
gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir ma chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du
'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyinyan thos dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge bsAnanam 1 dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu u0fb1ba dang/ kun turtsub ma lags pa dang mthunapa'i
mdo/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal tasrin po 'ag/ srin mo 'am/ srin po rgad po
'am srinamo rganamo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor tho 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'imangaga gzhug ba 'am/ srinapo'amangag gzhug ma 'tshabar
bgyid pa// thugs lta zhang glags tshol ba la la zhig 'bar mchizhing/ nye bar 'greng ngam/ bar mchis par gyur na/ glogs mi rnyed cing gnas mi rten la/ srin po rnams kyis srin bo 'du ba'i nang dum

michud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi'athob ste/ di'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pabadun du'ags lags so// de lags ng sngags kyitshig 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hi'ihi'i/
dmUl shulu/ yum yu ma li/ yumI lab ti la swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi lus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyus dang/ kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i

mdo/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug ba rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'dinyidi rgya che brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang ba'agyur to// donas
bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsol gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/

dgeslong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin dum dang/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang/ g.yog

'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa namasros pa dang/ nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nos/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gtsug tu'adug go/ de'itshargyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog

! gamathus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang chen pos gsal bar gyur to// rgyalapon po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkangaganyis dam pa rdzogs

la sangs rgyas// blo ldan khyod kyisagang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni dim 'tshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang// da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad la bdag phyag/
'tshal// khyod la bdag ni skyabs sumachi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsAnanam/ dag bsAnam gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang/ nags 'dab
dag dang/ bas mtha' dgan gan sapa dag kyang mchis la/ de laganod sbyin dang mim lags pa gdug paganyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dud pa dag dang/ mngon par ma/

dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon bar dad pa dag na shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang ma ma lags pa gdug/
pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyigasung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang/ dge slong ma rnams dang/
dge bsnyen rnams dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang/ gnod sbyin dang mig lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon

ba ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang/ mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phul bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang/ kun turtsub ma lags pa dang mthunapa'i mdo rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/

sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang/ dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bsaganang bar/
mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ ngas cang mi gsung bsaganang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang/ kun tu
