tha rgyub ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug dang rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol te/ skya bo gang dag gtong phod cing// phra mo mi mchi ser sna
brel/ gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// midi rnamos kyi red pa lags// gang zhig 'char la brten nas// ngesan h+phunamor brjod ba yo// kim chen po'i dkyil 'khor can// zhigadugs
gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs d mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// driza'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi// da ni dulhan cig tu// gludang
gar gyis rtag tu rtse// dritha rnams kyis yongs bskor cing// dritha rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang nibasu dang gcig/ dedag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po
zhes bgyi stobs po che// lharang lhaminagayul 'gyedapa// kun tugazhan kyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shis khyod
la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod lani// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshalags// bdag la dag bas gzigs sugasol// khyod lami min phyag 'tshal
ba de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la ga tshol cig go'u tam rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan nga// mya nganA'adas la phyag
tshol mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogasad ni// bzung ba lags shes skya bo mchi// phyolas de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na la degs zhes bgyib// rgyab kyi sha
'tshal phram can// srog gcod bgyid du ma rungs pa// rlungusashing mi snyan smabgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste//
ming ni 'phags skyes pa zhes bgyi// ngan du lhan cig tu// glu dang/ ragyis rtag tu rtse/ grul bum rnams kyis yongs bsoka cing/ grul bum rnams kyis mdunagyis ltas// de la bu ni mang mchis/
te brgyad cu dang nadicu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun rgyags pa ni// dbang po nas bgyistobs po che// lha dang lhamin g.yul 'gyed pa/ kun tugazhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs

sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi ma'i gnyena mthong nas// skyes bu cangashis khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shang phyag 'tshal lags
bdag la dag bas gzigs sugasol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal// da skad yang dang yang du thos/ de slad bdag gi 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la
phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tsholamachi// de ltar lte ya phyogs de ni// bzang pa lags shes skya bamachi// phyogs de mngon par skyong
bgyid pa// rgyalachen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/nyim chen bo dkyil 'khor can// tigadugs gang du zhug 'gyur ba// desan mtsho chen zab mo

ni shin tu 'dar bar daka' ba ste// da ni musngon rgya mtshozhes// skye bo rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i// phyogs de mngon par sbyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste//
ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// da nin du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu// klu rnams kyisan yongs bskor cing// klu rnams kyisanamadun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te//

brgyanudang nibadudang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags ba na// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha minagayul 'gyedapa// kun tugazhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//
sangs rgyas kyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lugs/ bdag la
dge bsagazigs su gsol// khyod la mchin phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u tum rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs
rgyus rig dang zhabs ldan ng/ myang 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzung bu lags shes skya bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid nga// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa/
lags// gang na byang gi sgrami snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen lta mdzes dang// gang na mi rnams tshe len// brgya phrag bcub skye 'gyur zhing// de dag mi rmam 'dabs la// gshol yang 'chang bar mi bgyidi

cing tshar ng mdog dang ldan pa dang// dus bar yongs su spyod bgyid cing// zas su sA lu kha dog dang// dridang rodang ldan pa dang// dri dang me tog tshogs 'drazhing// lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal//

nali ki ra bskol bgyis nas// tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min// gung na mo lce rtsa'adra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi// phyogs du mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//
gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// da nin du lhan cagi tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag turtse/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing// gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis
bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad nu dang ni banu dang gcig/ de dag mang mthun grags pa// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub la//

de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyima'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchogakhyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing/
phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs sugasol// khyod la mimin phyag 'tshalapa// de skad yang dang la/nga du thos// de slad bdag 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag
tshol cig/ go tam rgyal la thug tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rag dung zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi/ de ltar byang gi phyogs de// bzangab lags shes skya bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par
skyod bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dpaldan pa lags/ da phyogasanani yul 'khor srung// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang// byang phyogs nane lus ngan po//
rgyal po chen po da bzhinug/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs patsho// phyogs bzhiragan skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchib
rnams// de dag glang po che'atshal zhing// phyogs phyogs dgacunam pa'i rgyu// de dag ni bas rtadang/ ngamo dang/ khyu mchog dang/ mahadang/ radang/ lug dang/ sbrul dang/ bya dang/ skyes pa dang//
bud med dang/ gzhon nu dang/ gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing/ phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang 'chi lags so// glang po chagacig gisashang rtadrangs shing/ phyogs phyogs de'og tu'ang mchi lags so// sa

rtadang/ rngamo dang/ khyu mchog dang/ ma ho dang/ 'dang/ lug dang/ sbruladang/ pyadang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ gzhon nu nang/ gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rtarbasashing/ phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi
lags so// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchib rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la
sgrub mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyub dang/ kun tu bam lags pa dang/ sa la kun tu baalags pa dang/ gar bcasas steng kun tu rgyu ba dang/ sbubs can dang/ grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyib dag lags

so// byang phyogs namatsho kapibang ka zhes bgyi ba'ang mchis lags so// nub phyogasanagrong khyerasar pa gsar ldan dang/ gos can dang/ gos mchog can dang/ pad+ma can dang/ pad+ma bzang po can dang/ sa gzhi

can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so// chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'imatshamachis te// chab rgyun tha dadade las 'byung// de la dgung char 'bab par 'gyur// btsanapa grong khyer
u shi ra'isprubs kyi b.rolan/ lus gnas dang ni gnos yangs dang// de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyu lugs mang dang da gsamang par snang mkha' la bya ltar mda'// btsun pa grong khyer spu
can gyi pha rolo/ byang phyogs na 'dunas bu gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhig zhus/ saso// nang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang sadang// 'jigs rung lto skya can dgamachis//

dan ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rmabya khrung khrung sgrasnyan dang// khu byug sgra skad chen po dang// shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing// rma bya rnams kyi sgro dang dang// ko'u dum pa dang chu lag dang// bya rnams sna tshogs
skad 'byin cing// me tog sprang rtsi'i ro 'dug// las ngan po daglu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig ste// btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rolan rgyal po dpa' bo zhas bgyi

T+Tha pha yul 'khor mu khyudan mchis lags so/ bdag gang namachis pa'i 'dun sa de ni khya mchog can zhes bgyi// bag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag
lags so// tad+yash+tsa/ i li mi li/ i la mal/ ki Ti yA le/ hi li kiTi mU le/ hu du me/ phungur du ma/ go ragan d+har/ go da hani/ mo ka mo ka swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
bdag gis driza rnams dang/ drizachen po rnams dang/ driza'i sde dpon rnams Mdang/ dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod r bgyilags so// 'di lta sta/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang// glu yis

myos pa sbyin rnams dang// 'phrang bsamyos dang sbrang rtsisamyos// me tog myos nga sman rnams dang// rtag tu myos dang dpal gyisamyos// noragyisamyos dang dga' byed dang// usprul pad+ma zla ba dang//

ja 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra// tumabu rudang gtsug lta dang// gser spyod bu mo gsar can dang// pa wa sangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag bdag gi spyan lags te// de dag la bdag

dri ba 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri ba 'dinibadag mi gtong ngo zhes mchizhing/ de dag lago bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tsho ba'i drib dang// bdag mi gtong ba'i dri ba yis// legs par smras ba 'di thos nas//
a u0f97ka yidog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshalapa bdun du chags// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ u e/ ku cule/ ku tul/ kutule/ e he a hi/ sA d+ham tika/ sAd+ham tika sA d+ha

b+han+d+ha na ko/ tiSh+ThaduShAbAtos satwA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma bam/ dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsanamagang la la kun turtsub dang/ kun tu ba ma lags ba dang mthun
pa'i mado/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyurab 'di nyid rgya cher lungamanos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal tadri ba ma/ driza mo 'am/ drib rgad po 'am//

dri ba rganamo bam/ driza'i bu pho 'am/ dri bra'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ driza'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri ba'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshabar bgyid pa// glags lta zhing rmugs

tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchizhing/ 'bar 'grang ngam/ nyebar mchis par rgyugan/ glags mi rnyed cing gnasami rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyis dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo
can du'ang gnas mi 'thob sta/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan bdas kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam//

dag bsAn ma gang la la kun tu sgrub dang/ kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyurab 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don bar
bgyid pa de la/ gal ta ga za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgad po 'am/ sha za rganamo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho 'am/ sha tha'i 'khor mo
khamagaza'imangag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshabar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nyebar mchizhing/ nyabar 'greng ngam/ 'bar mchis par gyur na/ zlags mi ldan

mtsho cing gnas mi rnyed la/grwa za rnams kyis sha za 'duba'i nang du mchirami chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcangalongon du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ da'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so//

de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hUm shum/ snyami le/ shu mi la/ ba triye swAt+ta/ btsun ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang/ grul bum chen po rnams
dang grul bum gyisde dpon rnams dang/ dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang 'byin kri misha/ rtsib logs chedangagasus po che// lag bcudang nas la rgyu// g.yon

ka phyogs nag po dmar po dang// sprinamadog dang ni dri med dang// rnab ring dang 'brug sgra sgrog/ ral pa can dang stobs b.rudang// srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba spyad// la ba bzang ldan gasum

po dang// tshon kun dang ni mig bkreb bo// 'gro gnas jisnyad mchis pa lags// dedagazhi bdag gi spyan lags to/ de dag la bdag grul bumo 'di ni bdag la 'chi'o// grul bum 'dzin bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchizhing//
de dag go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshaba'igrul bum dang// bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bumachis// legs par smras pa 'di thesan// aN+Da ka yi dog pabazhi// de yi mgo tshul bdun du 'gas// da la

gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ si'i bi sir/ si'i yi sa re/ si yis ra/ kr-itshaka li/ ka ra// pa ga le swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi na thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am//

dag bsnyan nam/ dag bsnyan ma gang la la kun turgyub dang/ kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'imado/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung
mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum mam/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgad po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bumagyi
'khor po 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshabar brgyad pa/ glugs lta zhing thugasatshol ga'ang 'a zhig/bar mchishing/ rkabar 'greng
ngaman bar mchis par gyuran/ glogasamirId cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyis grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchi mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i
mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyinyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag pasnyan nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun turgyu ba dang/
kun tu sgrub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/
gal te ri dwags sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgad po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'amaM/ yi dgas kyi bu po 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor lo 'am yi dgas kyi 'khor mo
tshe kham/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngaga gzhug ma 'tsho ba'abgyid pa// gags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhage 'bar mchizhing/ chub r 'greng ngam/ 'bar mchis bar gyur na/

glags mi red cade gnas ma rAd la/ yi dgas rnams kyis yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal pa'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo aN+Da ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa
bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ yum yume/ yu ma li/ yu ma lA ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gse klu
rnams dang klu chen po rnams dang/ klu'i sde dpon rnams dang/ dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang lta dga' kun dga' dang// nor rgyas dang ni
'dzam bu bzang// sar pa dang ni zho na dang// dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang// mya ngan med dang mu nganapral// rab grol dang rgyal po bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ngos bkudang // yangs pa can
dang bkrab dun la// gdangs ka che dang skur dga' dang// nag po che dang lag 'gro dang// ra skyong dang ni 'dzeg po dang// gapa na phyogs de nyazhinanyag pa dang// sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa na//
'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// dadagan bdag gi spun lags ta/de dgal bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// klu bdunebadag mi gtong ngo zhes mchazhing// de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la
tshoba' klu dag dang// bdag ma gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/ legs par skyes pa 'di thos no/ ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so//

tad+ya thA/ tsi le ba po la/ go rA ginad+ha ni/ ma gi/ tsaN+DalaswAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam// dgaslong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dag bstan ma gang la la kun tu rgyub dang/
kun tu rgyubam lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu bam/
klu mo 'amaM/ klu rgad po 'am/ klu rganamo 'am klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu'i 'khor pho kham/ klu'i 'khor mo bas klu'imangag zhug pa 'am/ klu'imangag gzhug ma 'tsho bar bgyid pa/

glags lta zhing glegs tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchizhing/ zhu bar 'greng ngam/ nyabaramachis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyid [' ]/ klu nad kyis klu 'duba'inang du mchir mi chud cing/
[gi ]/rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo saN+Da ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong
ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dag snyan nAm/ dge sAnam gang la la kun turlub dang/ kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ ga sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o
'gyur ba 'di 'dem+macher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyud pa de la/ gal talus srul po 'am/ lus srul mos/ lus srul rgad po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am//
lus srul po'abu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'amangag gzhug ma 'tshabalabgyid pa//
glags lto zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchizhing/ zhabar 'greng ngam/ nyebar mchis par gyur naM/ grags ma red cang gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyis lus srul po 'du
ba'inang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po 'a pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'do
dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ a pa/ ba han/ bahAn/ ba tI yi sAhA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang/ gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang/ gnod spyin gyi ste
dpon rnams dang/ dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta sta/ dbang po zla ba nu lha dang// ba ra dwa tsasbyadagu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang// mgrin ngan dang
ni mgul nges dang// stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang// sgra rab dang ni nyalnga dang// ri mnyam gsar can gangapo dang// sang ldong ba dang g.yon can dang// gnod sbyin tha sbyong 'brog gnas dang
rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// drib sna tshogs sde dang ni/ lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang// tshig lnga ser po yad dga' dang// gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul
gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji sAd mchis pa lags// dadag nibadag gi spyan lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di nibadag la 'tshe'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchizhing/ dadag la
go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la'atshaba'i gnod sbyin dang// bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos ne/ a ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas//
de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni dag lags so// tad+yathA/hil mi le/ hil mi le/ kId+himU lo hrile kI d+himUle/ o tum pa tum ba/ o cum ba tumape/ o ge mog/ ga dehi/ b+hingag+ha re/ ra sad
tume sAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slongangam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dgebastananam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu ba dang/ kun tu rgyub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo//
rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don bar bgyid pa de la/ gal taganod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo
'am/ gnod sbyin rgad po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag
gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tsho bar bgyid pa/ glogs lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nyabar mchizhing/ nyabar 'greng ngam/ 'bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rad cing
gnas mi nad la/ gnod sbyani rnams kyis gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'ipho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du
bags lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyanathos dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge bsAn nam/ dge bsAnam gang la la kun tu rgyab dang/ kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun
pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po kham/ srin mo 'am/
srin po rgad po 'am/ srin mo rgan mo 'am/ srinapo'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor tho 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngaga gzhug pa 'am/ srani/
po'i mag gzhugam 'tshabar bgyid pa// glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig tabar mchizhing/ nub 'greng dum/ nabar mchis par gyuran/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyedal/ srin po/
rnams kyis srin po 'du ba'i nang du mnir mi chud cing/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'imago aljaka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang
sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+yathA/ hilehile/ gulu hu lu/ yum yu melaM/ yum lAbi tI ye swahA/ zhes rgya cher smras nas/ nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// de nyid du mi
snang bar gyur to// dag slong dag khyod kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma yin gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon

bar mdad po dag mngon bar dad pa' bya ba dang (mngon par dad pa rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir kun tu sgrub dang/ kun tu rgyub ma yin pa dang mthunapa'imado/ rig sngags dang/ srung ba
dang/ sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba'a'agyur ba 'di nyid long zhig/ zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ badzem ldan 'das kyisadiskad ces bka' stsalanas/ dge slong de dag yi rang sto/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// tharasdomani/ aki/ dus/ yutsa a hihi/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang/ go rims bzhin du/
sbyar ro// mdochan po kun tu rgyu ba dang/ kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dngamathun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzen mi ri dang/ pAtshabarmadang
ma zhuranagyi lo tsab ban d+he yo shas sdu lasogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pa g+ha/ bod skad du/
'phags pa sprin chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nya dga'
gnas ni/ nor bu rin po chadang/lagyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsigs pan/ dge slong gi dge 'dunachen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang/ klu'i rgyal po'i
tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ []dga' dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ madros pa dang/ gzi can dang/ chu lha dang/ 'jog po dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang/
klu'i rgyal po btang zung dang/ sa srungs kyi bu dang/ mdongs bu dang/ dpal gyi gzi brjid dang/ dpal bzang dang/ glog gi 'phrang ba dang/ gtsug na nor bu rin po chadang/ gtsugan nor bu thogs
dang/ snang ldan gtsug phud can dang/ gtsug phud 'jab can dang/ klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dbang po'i mchod sdong dang/ 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ bkrashis ldan dang/
dkyil 'khor chen po can dang/ lag gi 'gro chen po dang/ skar mdog dang/ zla ba'i gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyi blo grosarang/ zla mthong dang/ klu'i rgyal bo legs mthong dang/ shin rtsabartan dang/
mgul nanor bu dang/ sbyin khyung dang/ char rgyun dang/ rab 'jom dang/ rnam par 'jom dang/ mthu bsgyings dang/ gdangs ka chen po dang/ dbyangs thab dang/ klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang/
rnam par sgra 'byin dang/ ut+paladang/ tshul chen dang/ gshol mda' 'dzin dang/ sna tshogs sdadang/ zhags pa chen ngo dang/ klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab ma dang/ kun tusnang dang/ rnatshub dang/
dung dang/ dar dar dang/ klu'i rgyal po u pa da ra dar dang/ bde byed dang/ lag 'gro dang/ lag 'gre chen po dang/ dri ma chen po dang/ 'phur lding dang/ sog mamed dang/ 'phyang ba dang/ srin bu
gnas dang nag po dang/ klu'i rgyal po dbang po de dang/ 'dam bu dang/ nyaba'i 'dam bu dang/ dung thogs dang/ 'gro lding dang/ rab mdzes dang/ glang chen sna dang/ rnon po dang/ sar skya dang
glog 'bar dang/ glog 'od chen po dang/ stobs lha dang/ chu stobs dang/ klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang/ bdud rtsi can dang/ mu stegs can dang/ ba cha ma'i 'od can dang/ gsar
mdog sgra dang ( gser 'od dang/ zlaba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang/ ki'od dang/ 'char ba dang/ ba glang mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ gshin rjadang/ dgo
tshul dang/ sbal pa dang/ ngang ba'i gzi brjid dang/ mu khyud dang/ sa 'dzinadang/ mgo stong can dang/ gtsug na nor bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong pa dang/
sprin chen dang/ sde bzang dang/ sa skyong dang/ mos byin dang/ rnam par dul ba dang/ dga' ba 'byung dang/ chu srin kumab+hir dang/ chu srin kum b+hi la'i gdong dang/ dug 'dzin dang/ klu'irgyal po
myur gdug dang/ pad+ma ka dang/ mjug ma dang/ rab 'phyang dang/ 'jigs byed dang/ gzi brjid mdzesadang/ mgo lnga pa dang/ bal li ra dang/ shing rtas rgyal dang/ klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang/
klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang/ mgo bo che dang/ pim pika dang/ bi tar dang/ mgyogs 'gro dang/ klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang/ klu sdadang/ gzi chen dang/ 'dam bu byin dang//
klu'i rgyal po sgrag byed dang/ 'od 'bar dang/ mgebadun pa dang/ sdong chen dang/ mthong dga' drang/ rab tucher gtum dang/ dri mdu gzi brjid dang/ ma bzang dang/ drag po
chen po dang/ 'od 'phro phung po dang/ klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang/ khro bo drag shul can dang/ rin chen nusbyin chen drang/ nu sbyin sprin chen dang/ dbang po'i 'od dang/ rkang pas
ka 'thung dang/ sprin zla dang/ rgya mtsho'i sprinadang/ ma tog dri chen po dang/ ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang/ klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang/ tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang/ sprin chen
07 snying bo dang/ kha ba can dang/ dpal gyi snying po dang/ sbyin mthu can dang/ mtshan mo 'dzin dang/ chu spyan dang/ nusbyin chen po dang/ klu'i rgyal bo gzi brjid mi 'dra dang/ sprinagyi dbang
phyug rgyal po dang/ khromad dang/ sa'i bum pa dang/ klu dba' dang/ chu 'dzan dang/ sprin gdugs dang/ ing gir gdong dang/ klu'i rgyalapo gzican dang/ sprin las mngon 'byung dang/
klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang/ chabyadamadzes dang/ lus chen dang/ spyang lta dang/ zhi ba dang/ dpa' ba dang/ gsar ngang can dang/ mchog tubartsonadang/ dug drag dang/
dbyangs snyan dang/ klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang/ rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang/ rnam par g.yo dang/ 'brag sgra dang/ rje sgra dang/ bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang/ dga' bar byed ba
dang/ 'brug sgrogs dang/ dpa' sde dang/ srid mod kyi bu dang/ rgya mtsho'i klong dang/ klu'i rgyal po lon po dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus kyi 'khod pa dang thabs cig tubazhugs so// da'i tsho klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langasanas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar ta/ dusachog las
balha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga lab de logs su thal mo sbyarab btud nas/ thag la gus pa dang phu dud chen po byed pas/ ma rtog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/
byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ babrab dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dang/ dar gyilda ldi dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ sil snyan dang/ bag rdob pa dang/
glu dbyangs dang/ rin po che'i tog dang/ rin po che'i lha lnga dang/ mu tig gi 'byung ba dang/ klu'i ma tog dang/ mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dbag tu mad pa grangs med
pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogasagacig tu'adugago/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul
phrag rab kyi rdul snyad kyis// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyikhams rab 'byam rgya mtshothams cad dang/ sa dang/ chudang/ mdang/

rlung thams cad kyi rdul brag rab kyi rdul rnams dang/ gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la'ang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams
cad las yang dag par 'dus pa/ grangs med/ dbag nyamod/ bsamagyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa lus yang dag par 'adas ba dag dang/ lus re re la'ang lag pa

rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag cu med pa// grangs med padag byin gyis brlabasanas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdulagyimare re las kyang mchod ba thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi
0 gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang nubasems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'dilta ste/ kun spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho'i sprinam 'dres pa dpag tumed/
grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal dumed/ tshad chud/ brjod du mad pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabasanas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprinazlums kyis/

ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang/ 'od zer stug po dang/ khrimadang/ zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyidakyil 'khor gyamatshosprin rnams dang/ ri bo tshe thams cad kyi 'phreng ba/

dang/ ma tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa mya mtshona rnams dang/ phyom dang shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ sposadang

bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tuston pa rgyu mtshospun rnams dang/ sgrathams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i smyamatshosprin rnams dang// spos thams cad kyi shing ljon ba rgya mtshosprin rnams kyisanam mkha'i dkyil
kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtshodapag tumad/ grasamad/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal dumad/ tshad mad/ brjod du med pa ma
'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' rgya mtshothams cad la bsti stang dubya'o// bla mar bya'o// rimor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yul thams cad du bkod ba rnam par snang bar byas
ka/ dpa'i snying po can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtshosprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bste

stang du bya'o// blamar bya'od// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// thams cad kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od

'phrob 'barab dar ldan ng// sangs rgyas langs par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho snguna rnams dang/ kun tu sgras 'gangs pasas rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal bo rgya mtshospyan

rnams dang/ kun nas sgo 'in po ma'od zer gyis sas rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ 'khor gyidakyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i

rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ 'od 'phros sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sngona rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum kyi sas rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i

ka nor bu rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshospyin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// blamar bya'o//

rimor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che dang/ spos dang/ ma tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsigs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i kha dog mtha' yas pa thamA

cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsigs pa rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsigs pa rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras

pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ ma tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprani rnams dang/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams/

kyisanam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyisabarlabasanas/ phyogs bcu kune 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsigs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/

na po che thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis rab tubargyan pa bkodapa dum kun tuston pa khang pa brtsigs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tubargyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa/

brtsigs pa rgya mtshosprina rnams dang/ sgo kun tum tog gi rta babs dril bu'i drab dpyangs pa myamatsho srin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sa/

dbang rgya mtsho thams cad labasti stang du bya'o// bla marabya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// gsar dang rin po che sna tshog sakyi tshom tshom dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi
desang ge'i khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyis ge'i khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ an da nib dang badzam bu chubo'i gsar gyi pad+masna

tshegs kyi snying po can gyisangag khri rgya mtshosAni rnams dang/ nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi sang ge'i khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyalamtshan gyipad+masna

tshog sakyi snying po can gyisangaga' khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ ran po chesabargyan pa'i ng d+masna tshog sakyisnying bo can gyi seng ge 'i khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ and relamadzes ba 'barab 'i 'od zer ldan pa'i

pad+ma'i snying bo can gyi seng ge 'i khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ bod zer 'bar ba bdami shes pa'i gzeb phreng dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'isnying po can gyis dga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rinapo che'abab thams cad

byung ba'i pad+ma'isnying po can gyisang ge'i khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rin poche babarab mchog dmapa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyisang ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'ad

zeradang ldan pa'ipad+ma'i snying po can gyi sangaga'i khrirgya mtshosprinam 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebasaba'adunagyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshothams cad

labasti stang dubya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// spos dang nor bu sna tshogs pa thams cad kyi shing ljonob rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ kun nas sgo lemo las thal mo sbyar ba'i spun 'byung

kha'i sbosakyi shing ljon pa myamatshosban rnams dang/ shing len pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tuston pa'ishade lenapa rgya mtshosbyin rnams dang/ ma tog thams cad kyi sbyin rab tu 'phyang

ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ bkodapa thams cad byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shariljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rin po che'id 'phro ba thams cad kyidakyil 'khor rnam par

snang par byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsanadan thams cad kyi phyi mar kun tu ston pa'ishang ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi

bkod ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gis thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa der ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yi/

du 'ong ba'i dubyang sakun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyisang gi khrirgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal

po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyisang ga'i khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyanapa'i snying po can gyi sang gab khri myamatsho sprin rnams dang/ na po che sna tshogs bod 'phroba'i

sgron ma'i 'phreng ba'i snying bo can gyi sang ge'i khrirgya mtshospyin nams dang/ kun nas sgrarin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i sAd po can gyis deb khri rgya mtshospren rnams dang/ spos dang/ me tog dang/ pad+ma
@#// thams cad kyi 'phrang ba rin po che'i snying po can gyisang ga' khri rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi gdan bkod ba kun tuston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po

can gyi sangaga'i khrimyamatshosprin rnams dang/ bkod pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba rab turapyadas ba'i rtababs stags bus rab tu brgyanab rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyis ge'i khri myamatshosprin rnams dang/

nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang phyi ma'i mdzod lo/dpa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying bo can gyisang ge'i khri cha mtshosprin rnams dang/ spos snatshogs dang rin po che'idrilabugapo ka'i dra ba kun nas brgyan pa zhim snang bar

byed ba'i snying po can gyisang ge'i khri myamatsho sprin rnams kyisanam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub samasadapa' rgya mtshothams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla

mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ and mIl gyi ze ba can gyis me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho

srin rnams dang/ spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi blare rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rin po che'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'thul rnamabar ston par snang ba'i

dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla'i rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkodapa thams cad snangab kun tu ston pa'i blare rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ me tog thamasacad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i

zhi bo che'is re rgya mtsho smin rnams dang/ dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun turgyas par 'gengs pa'idrab bla re rgya mtshosmane rnams dang/ pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i shog bu'i

sIrapo can gyi bats+tsha'i dra ba'i bde rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ gsal gyi thob can gyi 'od zer snang ba'irgyalamtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha'

las pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtshosbyin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyisabarlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpagang chonamatsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la

bsti stang du bya'o// blamar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu rin po chesna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtshosprin rnams kyis nam mkha'idakyilakun du khabs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin

potshobcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i ma tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyigadugs rgya mtsho sprina rnams dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dor ba thams

cad kyisAde rje'isgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs myamatsho sprin rnams dang/ 'an po tshosnatshogs kyi'od 'phro ba'i 'phrar ba'i gdugs rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ nor bu rin po che rdul kun t+tasnang bas rab tu

brgyan pa 'dril bu'i dri ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ nor bu thams cad kyi sdong bu'i yal ga'irgyan gyigadugs rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rnam rnam par snang bar byed ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i
nor bu'i rgyal po dang/ spos dang/ bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ tsan dan gyi phyama'imadzod kun tu rgyas bar 'gangasang ba gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/

sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen ngo snang bar byed pa kun tubakodab rgyas par 'gengs ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sngunim 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub samasadapa' rgya mtsho thams cad labasti stang

dubya'o// blam bya'o// rimor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po chathamasacad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rin potsha'od 'phrob thams cad kyigazugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho

spyanem 'dres pa rnams dang/ me tog gi sprinasnang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ rinapo tshathams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyisprul ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya
mtshosprin rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mtsho sprin rnams dang/ kun nas sgosangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i bod kyi dkyil

A 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ bat+tachu dang/ rin po tsho'i rigs dang/ nor bu rin po cha'i rigs dang/ nor bub rgyal bo thams cad kyi'od zar gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ sems can gyi

gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i bod kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshosprinanams dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu'abyin pa dang ldan

pa'i bod kyidakyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor myamatsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang

byung chub sems dapa' rgya mtshothams cad b bsti stang du bya'o/ blamar bya'o// rimor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thams cad kyimadzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad
kyigazugs dang/ sgrudang/ dridang/ rodang rig bya'i 'od zer rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rin po che thams rud kyi bod 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprina rnams dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa

rgyas par bgengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ me tog gi khang babatsugs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer
rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ na rothams cad kyi rdul gyi bodazer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ bskal pa gcig nasagacig tubargyud pa thums cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bsasems can yongasasu smin par byed

pa sgrogasar can 'od zer smumatshosprin rnams dang/ rin po chami zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang ma tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston

ba'i 'od zer rgya mtshosbyin m 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' myamatsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya// rimar bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che 'od 'phro ba
khadog mthagayas ba rgya mtshosbyin m 'dres pa rnams dang/ kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgyachen po bkod pa

snabar byed nga 'i 'od 'phror rgya mtsho smana rnams dang/ spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprana rnams dang/ bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

sprul pa'i'od 'phrob rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rin po chesna tshogs kyi shangag zaba'od 'phrob rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ gos thams cad kyi'od 'phro ba rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ byang chub sems dabab

mkhaM las pa'i spyod pa dbyangs canor bu'i rgyal po'i'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprinam 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sams dang 'gang mnamatsho'i sprin rgya mtshothams cad labasti stang dubya'o// bla mar bya'o// rimor bya'o// mchod par bya'o/ spos dare me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis

mi khyab pa rnams dang/ rin po che bod 'phro ba thams cad kyipad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ nor bu rin po chekha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyidakyil 'khor myamatsho sprin rnams dang/ rin po che thamA

cad kyikhadog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtshosprin rnams dang/ rin pochodang/ spos dang/ tsan dan thams cad kyi phyam rgya mtshosprina rnams dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtshosprin

rnams dang/ nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing snag pa mdzes pa'idabyangs can mtsho sman rnams dang/ nyimabi 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi 'phrang ba rgya mtshosbyin rnams dang/ ni po che'i mdzod mtha' yas

pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang/ thams cad kun tubazang bo'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sbrani rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyalatshothams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//
bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal khong dag gis yang bcom ldan bdas la lan gsum bskor ba byas tezhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stanal 'khod do// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen ngo phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lamakyistobs can g.yogamatha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprani
bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyidakyil 'khoragadugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling
bder 'ongs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'ispyan bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyidakyil 'khor gdugasalta bu'i rgyal bo snyan las langs te/ bla gos phrag bgacig tu gzar nas/ dus
mogayas pa'i lhangasal btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'dasag 'khab de legasasu thal mo sbyaranas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// gal tezhub zhusan lung bstan pa'i slad du/
bcom ldan 'adas kyis bdag bskabs khyen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrubcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs u0fb1sa labadag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'asakyis/ klu'i bdag pog log mtha' yas rgya mtsho'isprinabakod pa'i gzibarjid kyidakyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
klu'i bdag po tsadang ci'adod ngadris shig dang/ ngasadris pa de dang de'i lung bstanapas khyod gyisams rengs par bya'o// de skud cesabaka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i bdag po g.yog
mtha' yas rgya mtsho'isprin bkodaba'i gathibarjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'adasaji ltar n klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun/
chadapar 'gyur/ bdeb thams cad dang ldan pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzamabu'i gling 'dir dus dusasu char gyi rgyun 'babs par 'gyur/ rtswa dang/ shang gel ba dang/ snyan dang/ nagos
tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad s bar 'gyur/ bdud thams cad yang dag par skya bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzibarjid kyidakyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i
bdag po khyedasems can thams cad la phanapa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legasaso/ klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par
rab tunyon la yid lazung zhigadang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// klu bdag po chos gcig dang ldan n klu thams cad kyi glu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
chos gcig pu gang zhen/ bdi lta ste/ byams ba'o// klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams namos mo'atshig/ mtshonagyis ma tshugs/ chusami 'khyer/ dug gis mi tshug
pha rol gyi dmagatshogs kyis zil gyis minon/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sadapar 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur/ bsod nams chen
bo'i gzi brjid kyis gzican du 'gyur/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenagyis mi brdzibar bgyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong nadagab bar 'agyur/ 'grob thams cad du thag thogasAmed par 'gyur//
sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad bdang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bdeb thams cad dang ldan pa dang/ mi'i chos bla ma rtogasanas lus zhige pa'i 'og tutshangs pa'i 'jig rten du bar 'agyur te//
klu'i bdag po lha dang mi'i byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go/ klu'ing dag bore bsan byams pa'i lus kyi las dang/ byams pa'i ngag gi las dang/ byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis
gnas par bya'o/ klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya sta/ des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed//
bdeb thams cad sbyin par byed de// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun babebs ra ra byed/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ smanadang/ nags tshel dang/ lo tog thams cad skyabar

byed do// klu'ibadagapo de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhin/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra ni d+ha ra ni/ u d+ha ra ni/ sam pra tit+tatA/ bI dza ya ban/ sad rkya pra ti sar hA/ dzAnub ti/
ud de pAdAnib+hinAmAni/ ab+hi sha tsanI Ab+hi byu hur/ shu b+ha ba ti/ A dzim du/ ehIkum pA lan/ b+ha hAhar klo shan/ rlonA pA bom/ sho d+ha ya margan/ nIr ka/ d+harmatAut+tA/ lo ka bi ti
ma' rA dzas dukhA/ sham nAsarba bun+d+ha a ba lo kanA a d+hiT+ThitaM/ pradz+nyAdzAnab+he swAhA/ klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs
bkod ba gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa// ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa/ gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse
[zs/]mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang rigs kyi de bzhinagshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o// de dag gis klu thams cad dang/ klu'i rigs thams cad
dang [0f10 ]klu'i rus thams cad dang/ klu'i cho ragisathams cad dang/ klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang/ klu'i skya gnas thams cad dang/ klu'i rgyal po thams rud dang klu'i bu mo thams
thad dang/ klu'i thog 'khor thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do// klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sbyin chen po la phyag 'tshol lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinag shegs pa klu'i rigs las byung

basprinagyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprinagyi chu 'dzin la phyaga'atshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang laldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag
'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag
'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshagasapanam mkha'adapag med laphyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbcom ldan 'adas de bzhinagshegs pasprinatshan mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom lda'/
de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa sprin gyidakyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs ba sbyin gyi 'od la
phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa sprin chen sangagal phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa sprin chen gadugs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshags ba blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las
byungab snang 'byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gabs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen basil byung mi dga' rab 'joms
sgrozabasgrogs la phyug 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bdal la phyag 'tshal lo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i nusngun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
'dasadabazhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dapa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasab sprin rgya chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag batshal lo// bcom ldanu'adas de bzhin gshegs pasprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza'amanabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa sprin gyis lo tog skyed le phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin shags pa sprinagyi gnas
la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan bdas de bzhin gshegasab char sprinagyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinag shegs pa sprin chen
spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dras de bzhinagshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs panor bu rin po
banibadzra zamal//che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprinaltar rnam bar 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa sprin
gyi rlu ba laphyag 'chalal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyaga'atshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa sprinachen po ltar nam mkha' mthonas bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal
'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'adasade bzhin gshegasab bsnyams pa'i gzibarjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan/

'dug de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegasab chu'athor sprina chen l phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa
sprina chen N+Damatsho'agangs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun cu'agabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhagashagasab sprinagazugs

mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashagasal dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasala'isangs rgyas sbrani chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa'i dzamabu'isprinagyidang la gyigany+dzi brjid bod/
mdzar ba sprin gyi'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas/ klu thams cad kyisdugabasngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang/ bde ba thams cad
dang ldan pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'babs ba dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gel pa dang/ smanadang/ nags tshal dang/ le tog thams cad skyed par byed do// de nas
bcom ldan 'adas la/ stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i klu'ibadag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan ra sa

slad ma'i tshislad ma'i dusan/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'diracharami 'bab pa'i tsho/ gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang/ mi bzad pa'i dus kyi gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tsho dang/ chos ma

lags bas skya bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyitshe dang/ nad dang 'chiba'i dus kyi tshodang/ skur ma ma rungs ba gnas pa'i dus kyi tsher mas kyi nad dang/
'tshob dar/ gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa de lta bu'i gzungs kyigs sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ gang dag klu thamA

cad l yang dag par bskul 'debasapar 'gyur ba dang/ lhathams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa la 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig pa lo'agyu
ngadang/ gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang/ zhib dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang/ rgyuskaram rungs pas bgyis pa rab tuzhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das

kyisachar ba'i bar chadalngagasungs pa gang lags pa dedag thams cad selaphar 'gyur ba dang/ 'dzam bu'i glanga'adir char pa'i rgyun legs bar 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi mas
bcom ldan 'adas mchog tuthugs rjedang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phanabar thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdagade bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal 'go
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ klu'i rgyal bo g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/
klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshags pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legasaso// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la
yid la zung zhig dang/ snying rje chen po'as byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bskyings ba/ dba' bab tog ces bya ba'i gzungasasems can thams cad kyi donadang phan pa dang/ bdeba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis gsus pa/ byin gyis brlabasar/ rjesasu yi rangs ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/ char chesanagacod/ 'chiba'iganod ba rab tu zhi bar byed/
klu thams cad sku lab byed/ lhathams cad simaparabyed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan bar byed do// tad+ya thA/ ma hAdzAn
ab b+hA sanI/ AtatsholagasmaiDi TabakramA/ padrasaM gA ta// par ma ba ra dza/ nirmal gu Naka tu/ sArapra b+he/ bi ma laM ga yaTI/ b+ha ra phyur/ saMlha ra saMb+ha ra/ du dum bu/ han/na//

mahAprab+hi khaM d+hA tu matAmo hau0f00 d+hakAre/ pradza ya'adad+ha/ pa ri bA ra Nami tra/ ma drishrI ras naskan d+ha/ mi trim bum+b+har/ dzral tshul/ dzal dzal/ tshalamabu d+har dzalam bu d+ha re/ bo rlung ga kusu ma/

ngasha b.le/ tsetur dub bar bye/ a dasha akhe Nikabud+d+had+harmi'u b+ham ting t+yA rAshi/ shu klad+harma sam ti/ gamag+hi ra bi ra dzi// bi ma le/ bishe kha phra ba te/ ni nupra b+had+harma/ sarba lo katshe
[Sg]par srab r/ a nu ta tar/ a sang ga/ b+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hir ni'i/ rlur d+hu ra/ shAn tam te/ shAn ta mA re/ tsar tsar/ tsir tsir/ tsu ru tsur/ par mabud+d+hanum te/ ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra
mi tisAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ de nas 'dzam bu'i gling/

'dir cher dbab ba'i phyari klu thams cad kyisnying po brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal ba bya'o// spyod pa the dan/ sa ra sar/
siris ri/ su dusu ru/ nAgAnAn/ tshab dzab/ jib ji'i/ dza bu tshu bu/ klachen po dag tshur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi bdenapas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu bod
cig tsar tsar/ ri tsari/ tsung tshu ru/ klu'i bdug bo chen bo dag tshur shog/ kyi klu chen po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi bdenapas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig/
ba rab r/ biba'i/ bu rub ru/ sasargyus kyi bden pas klu thams cad dagug par bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang/ snying rje'i sems dang/ dga' pa'isams dang/
btang snyoms kyisams dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ bden pa dang/ bsam pa chen pos/ klu'i bdag po dag tshur shog
sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shagi/ b+har b+ha ra/ b+hi'i b+hi ri/ b+hur phyur/ chu chen po'i chudang//
sbyin gyi nubanang ba can lagagis 'grob chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'isams kyis tshur shog/ ston pa'i bstan pa dmab dran par gyis shigaM g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ b+hi Tig+hoTi/ glu tha glu zu//
drag shul can khro bo shugs chen po dang ldan ng/ dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'isams dang ldan pas tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i
gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/ ta Ta tu Ta/ ti Ti ti Ta/ tu tuN+Da/ nor bu rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa/ sprul gdug ba'i gzugs can rnams/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
byin gyi rlabasadran par gyisal/ rdo rje'achangag bdenang/sa 'dzam bu'agling 'dir char ngob cig swA hA/ ka la ka la/ ki li kali/ ku lu la/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa/ sbyin
chen po brtsigs ba'i gzhonapa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba las tshur shog/ byams pa'isams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyirgyun thong zhig/ de bzhin gshags pa'i bden pa dang//
dbazhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ lagan rdo rjes bsgo ba/ ral ral/ ra la ra li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gas 'gro ba thams cad khyed rnams gnyid med par dus gsum kyi
de bzhin gshegs pa'ibaden pas/ g+ham g+ha ma/ g+him gyi mi/ rgyu mu rgyu musnyatA/zla thams cad dgug go/ byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sams sngon du 'grobs ( nA ra nAr/
ni rini'i/ nu runu ru swA hA/ mon bo sna tshogs su gyur pa mgostong pa/ mgo dang mig dmarab/ stobs che ba'i lto 'phya chen po rnams dgag par bya'o// [>>lag gis 'gro chen po dag
mchog tu thugs rjecan/ bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyisabarjid pa/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ dbazhinagshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig/ ga Dag Da/
gi Di Ni/ gu ru du rgyu sA hA/ stobs dang/ pha rol gnon pa dang/ gzi brjid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams thob
cig shor shar/ shi ri shi raM shu ru shu ru swA hA/ kya kyi klu chen po rnams rang rang gi rigs dang cho ragis dran par gyis la/ ma bkol bar lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i ban gyi rla/
kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thobcug swA hA/ tshangs pa'i bdenupa' byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobacigasAhA/ brgya byin gyi bdenang sa'adzam bu'i gling 'dir
char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ rgyal ngo chen po bzhi'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag brgyud po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chur rab tuphob cig
sAhA/ klu chen po dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i bdenubs 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cigasAhA/ klu chen podag lan cig phyir bong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i char rab tuphob/
cig swAhA/ klu chen po dag phyir ma 'ad ba bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swAhA/ ka chen po dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig
swAhAklu chen dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i
gling 'dir char ba phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di char nub tu thob cig swAhA/ lha thams cad kyi bden
pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyisashig swAhA/ klu thams cad kyi bdenapas sa chen bo 'di'i char rab tuphob cigasAhA/ gnod spyin thams cad kyi bden bas sems can thams cad srungs shig
sAhA/ dri' thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/ lham yin thams cad kyi bden pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa thams cad rnam par zlog cig swA hA/
nam mkha' lding thams cad kyibadon pas klu thams cad byams par byos la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char chen po'i rgyun phob cig swAhA/ mi 'am ci thams cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhibar
gyis shige sA tA/ samasacan thams cad tshim par gyis shig swAhA/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bden pas las shing rgya cheba'i char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/ bder char la sgrib pa lnga po lang
dgapar zung zhig swA hA/ mi thams cad kyi bden pas mi thams cad l yongs su srungs shig swAhA/ ka ra ka ra/ kiri ki'i/ ku ru kuru/ da ra da ra/di'odi ri/du'adu na tan tu/ nangon To/ chu chu chu4/
shin tu mgyogs mar bzhudam/ sprinachen po'i chu'adzinam/ sprin ldan ma/ sprin chen ldan m/ sprin chen mu'adzin ma/ sprinagasalam/ sprina'abyung ma/ dus sprinam/[]nagyi 'byung gnasam/ sprin sgrogs
ma sprin bzhugs ma/ sbyin gyi cod panaldan ma/ sbyin gyi 'phrang ba mnga' ba/ sprin gyis rnam par brgyan ma/ sprinabacibasam/ sprin la gnas bcas ma/ sprin gyi snying po//
sprin gyi ral pa can/ smina'od ma/ sprin gyi 'khoraldan ma/ rgyachen sprin bzhugs ma/ mchod phyir sprin thogs ma/ lo tog 'ongs sgrub ma/ risul na bzhugs ma/ klu'iyumabcom ldan 'das ma/
sprin chen dpal ldan dakar mdog can/ bsil regam/ tshub ma chen mo spyod yul ma/ klu chen rnam par rol mdzad ma/ bcom ldan dasam pon tAbcud kyis len drug 'dzinam/ sas rgyas

kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir cha'arab tudabab tugasol sA hA/ g+ha rag ra/ g+hir g+hi'i/ sgyu ru klu ru/ g+hari Nig+hir Ni/ grum lhum sgyum/ grum sgyu ma glu ma glu ma rgyu ma grumazlum ri/ ngabudagu dang
ldan m/ sprin chen 'phrang ldan m/ glog tshogs 'phrang ldan m/ lag gis 'gro thamasacad 'dzinam/ sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabasamaM/ dug drag po thams cad spyod yulam/ sprin bkod pal
bcibs ma/ 'brag sgrogs ma/ sgra sgrogs ma/ klatshogs la bskul ma/ lhamo sprin chen 'phrang ldan m/ klu thams cad la ma bshol bar de bzhin gshegs pa'ibyin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling
'di'i char phob cig ces bskul lugasol swA hA/ ya ra ya ra/ yi ri yi ri/ yur yur/ dzarang dzi ri dzi'i/ ru tshur tshur dzAr/ gu 'gu cu/ gu ru ku ru/ ga Na ga Da gi Nig Di//
harahor/ hi li hili/ chu lumul/ ta la ta la/ tili tili/ tul tu lu/ han han/ ha da hud/ pa tshabatsa/ grahA gri sh+tsa/ mar dma' da/ pam rda/ praporasha big+ha nUn/ mo tre yapa ya

nupIt+taM/ bud rnoburad+d+haM/ bud rgyu/ su bud+d+ho/ har pA pan/ sarba tAnAn/ a d+hisha ya pa tsam/ sarba bud d+ha nanad+ha ri Nid+ha'i/ shub+ha mA te/ gu rtagra pA Ni/ mahAdzAno/ la gi/ shu klad+harmas skya pa/

tat+taM/ mahA nAd+hut+titrile katshoN+Dib+hag ba ti/ bud d+ha ma triAbA rA ya sarba kA tANI/ 'a glo shA nA ma/ bar b+ha'i/ banata ra ba sin/ d+hud+hur/ d+ha d+hu ru/ sham sham shAn tam sa/ char gyi bgegaM
klu chen pa rnams la yang dag par bskul lo// klu'i rgyal po chen bo g.yogamatha' yas rgya mtsho'i sngon bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgya la bo la yang dag pa'i bskul lo// 'dzam

bubazlongo 'dir char lob tuphob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nya dga' bo la yang dag par bskul lo// badzamabu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yang dag par bsal

lo rta'am bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphopa cagi swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la yang dag pa bskol lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal pogazican la yang dag par bskul
klu chen po rnams la nad pa lags l swAhA/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin
[/ ]le 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha la yang dag bar bskul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swA hA klu'i rgyal po 'jog po/
la yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang dag par bskul lo// badzamabu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal
ponor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo// badzamabu'i gling 'dir char reb tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po btang bzung ba yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig sba

klu'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bu'agling 'dir char rab tu thobacig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po nu tul yang dag par bskol lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swA hA/

klu'i rgyal po dbal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphab cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po dang labazang la yang dag pa'i bskul lo// 'dzamabu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cigs/

klu'i rgyal po glogagi babrangs la yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphab cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsugan nor bu chen po la yang dag par bskul lo// badzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab phobaci
sAhA[0f10 ]klu'i rgyal po gtsug nanor bu thogs la yang dag par bskul le// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal bo snang ldan gatsug phud can la yang dag par bskul lo// 'dzam
ba ]bu'i gling 'dirachar rab tuphob cig swAhA/ de dag la sogs bklu'i rgyal bo thams cad la yang dag pa bskul la/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab chu phob cig swAhU/ nAgenAge/ mahAmAge/ g+ho re
mAnas/ nAgasrid pa/ d+hAmA ku la u gra ro Sha/ patsand tedze/ bo gro/ aTi bshi/ ahi go ra/ ki' sing ga le/tsalcale/ lo la hi/ ma hUban ki re/ klu la bsha/ ro tA bA sin/
rtsa mAsini/ lha Nag+ha Na/ shi kinI/ kan kan/ ga Nag Na/ ma hAg Nag Ne/ par bar/ bi'i pi'i/ pu ru pu ra/ spyatshano/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mahAb+hog/ ma Nid re/ phi ri phi'i/ pu ru bur/

bar bar/ bar bamadzalam+bad+hari/ sham+busham+bu/ ba ta/ ci ma be/ d+hud+d+haM/ d+hi d+hu me ba/ mag+ha pra b+he mi b+ha ba b+hin/ d+hakaM d+ha ka/ d+hakod+hulwa ba/ g+hanAg+hanA/ zhikin/ kan kan/ gnag Na/
ma hAmAg ga Na/ nir tan+tu/ phra dzar ta ka rimasAnAdidA ye/ rgyu mazlum/ blum pA la tika/ ga ri b+hu dzig mi/ bika TasaM ka Ti/ go rabi rdzanibadzib+ha Ni/ glu thams cad dgug go/ sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ dus gsum chid bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang/ byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chararab tuphob cig swA hA/ namasarbaburad+ho
b+husid+d+hanuman+tapA da ni swA hA/ 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdostong phrag brgya ba las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba le'u ste drug nurtsa bzhi'o//
char chen dbab bar 'adod na/ bla gab med pa'is phyogs gtsang mar blar sngon pobre/ bdan sngon po dbyang ngo// chos skya ba lus bkrusal/ yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas
shing gos gtsang ma sngonapo bgos la/ spos drizhim pos bskusanas/ zas dkaragasum zos la/ stan sngon po'i stong du 'dug nas/ khe shar phyogs su blta sta/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams
cad lagasol ba btab nas/ sprin chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyan mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklags par bya'o// nusngon pos bkang ba'i bum pa gang ba ban gzhag par bya'o// gtor ma dang/
bdug pa dang/ ma tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro// de la chos sa bas phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar bya sta/ shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgagasum pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor

[%/ ]sna tshogs dang bcas pa pa'i lci bsaphro bar bya'o// lho phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo ljapa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bribar bya'o// nub phyogs su khru bdun tsam du kru'i

rgyal ngo mgo bdun// klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu ru// klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// chos
skyabs rang gi lus bsrungasaM la byams pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la snying 'asams bar gazha gnas / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab la/

wa/ klu rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/ 'di'i tshiga'o/ gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i[& ]/ sbrenachen po'i rlung dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klag na/ nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun
tshunachad gdon mi za bar char 'bab par gyur ro// rgya mtshonidus las yol yang srid kyi/ thub pa chen po'igasung rab charagyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang yon
tan la gnas te/ 'cha'ala'i tshul khrims dang/ shadang/ cha la sogs pa longs su sbyang bar bya'o// 'o thug dang/ zho dang/ lo tshe dang/ 'bras chanabu 'am can la sogs pa dang/ mar gsum
zazhing bklag par bya'o/ de ltar 'grub par 'gyur to/ thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa bzhin du the tsomachod par bya'o// 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa/ rlung gi dkyil
khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhib chog dngabacasab rdzogs so///rgya gar gyimakhanubo dzin mi tra dang/ shI len dra bo d+hidang uchan gyi lo tsa ba banang+ge ye shes sdes bsgyur/
cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcosanas gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yamahAmag+hab+ha tamaN+DalasarlanAgasrid yan/ bod skad du/

'phagasapa sbyin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang nubasams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
thos b.rus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtshochen po nanor bu rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na/ klu stong du tshang ba'i klu'i tshogs chen po/ klu thams cad kyang/

'phrul che zhing/ klu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di ltaste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po nyo dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po yang dag sgrul dang/ klu'i rgyal po glog 'phrangasaMnadang klu'i rgyal po

tsa gzi can dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po dang/ klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang/ klu'i rgyal bo dung dang/ klu'i rgyal po ala'adab dang/ klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzangs dang/ klu'i rgyal po stobs

lcapa/ kyis rgyudang/ klu'i rgyal po glog 'byungadang/ klu'i rgyal bo snang ldan gatsug phud can dang/ klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rnam par 'phruladang/ klu'i rgyal po sprinachen rgyas byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang

klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang/ klu'i rgyal po skur mda' gtong dang/ klu'irgyal bo dus min sgrogosadang/ klu'i rgyal bo 'brug skad dang/ klu'i rgyal bo glog rab tugatongadang/ klu'i rgyal bo sa 'dzani dang/

klu'i rgyal po sog ma chod dang/ klu'i rgyal bo legs mthong dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'brugachen sgrogs dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'od chen lam dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjod

dang D+ha klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang/ klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal 'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal bo rnga sgradang/ klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par sgrogs pa'i skad dang/ klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang

klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpalamagrin dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang dang/ ku'i rgyal po sha nyo sgra can dang/ klu'i rgyal po dang dang sgra dang/ klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang/

klu'i rgyal pochar 'byung dang/ klu'i rgyal po rlung chen rnam par 'phrul dang/ klu'i rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang/ klu'i rgyal po smad dkris bzang
dang/ klu'i rgyal po bkra shis deng/ klu'i rgyal po sprin rgyas dong/ klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byed dang/ klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis 'gags pa'i rigs dang/ klu'i rgyal po ligs par 'gengs dang/

klu'i rgyalapo rnam par rtse dang/ klu'i rgyalapo nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'od pathangs dang/ klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang/ klu'i rgyal po don yod dgabadang/ klu'i rgyal

bosprinagyi dkyila 'khor gyis legs par 'gebs dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub dang/ klu'i rgyal po sprin las chu'abyin dang/ klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang/ klu'i rgyal po rlung 'byung dang/ klu'i rgyal po

'khrug par byed dang/ klu'i rgyal pogatsugananor bu dang/ klu'irgyal po chen po de dag dang/ gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang thabs cig tubazhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang klu'i spro 'phrul chen po dang/

klu'i rnam bar 'aphrul pa chonabosanam mkha' la di ri di'i sgrogs shing/ rdzi char chen po rab tubaphebs te/ bcom ldan 'das la srinubya ba dang chos manyam pa'i phyir lhags so// kye klu chen po dag/ kludag tshul shog/
mu'au lu/ tsatatsata/ pa Ta pa Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta swA hA/ glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung zhing rdzi char chen po'i rgyun thong la char phob cig/ kye kye klu chen po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang/ chos

kyi bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyibadenabadranapar gyis shig/ klu chen bo dge tshuratshang tshur shog/ 'dzam bu'i gling duchar rab tuphob cig/ gru glu rgyu da murumur/hihihihihi/ tsu mnaM/ tra mahAnA ga hrid ya/

sawanAgAnaM kASh+Thasalcod yo/ shigAnan+darasAhA/ sprin chen bo rnam par 'phrulara'i rgyan bkodar dgagasar snam gyi mtha'a'abon thams cad chon gyi lnga ldi mdzes bau tig gi rgyana'aphrongarab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho

chen po'i sprinadagadong lha'i po ches mdzes bar byas pa'i gzhal med khang ma tog rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho chen posprinadag gisanam mkha'idakyilakun tukhebs pa byin gyis rlobs la/ rin po che'i sprin rab tu

'phyang zhing lha'i ras bcos gang bo mu tigagi rgyana'aphrong myamatsho chen po'i sprinadagadang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabasakyisgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprinadag dang/ de bzhin gsheg

nga'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkodab bsam gyis mi khyab ba rnamab snatshogs yang dag par ston pa'i ri bo chab korab chen po'ostsamatsho'i sprinadagagisanam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs/ sprin chen po

rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sgrogasapa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang/ rinapo chesna tshogs kyi lha'i bu 'dril bu'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs ba rgya mtsho sprin dag dang/ bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byin cing ma tog gi char chen po rab tu

babebasab rgya mtsho chen po'i sprinadag dang/ rgya mtsho sngonachen pos sgra cher sgrogs shing/ lha yi tsha rab tu byung la mu tig gi lha sde rnam bsnatshogs zhu'aphyang brgya mtsho'isprinadag dang/ gsar skud
kyis brgyanaba'isnang ba chen po can gyi rtsachos namama'i kun tu khebasab byed pa rgya mtsho bosprin dag dang rin po che tshogs 'phrong ba'i 'od kyikyil 'khor gyisanam mkha' kun tu khebs par byedong

khamakhasab rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang/ snang ba dang ldan pa'irgya mtshochanabo ba sgras kun tu khebs pa'i mtshon nabo'i sprin dag gisi nam mkha mngonapa khebs bar gyis shig/ klu dang klu'i rgyal po thams cad
tshur shog/ sabastang bdir 'brag sgra sgrogs shing chaphobacig/ chaparab tu'o ba ci/ chakun turab tshu pob cig/ diri'i ra sgrogs shig/ glog chen po snang pa ras chuphyung zhika/ 'du zhing kun tu'adul

tog padar dar zhing 'dug ste/ klu'iskadachen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing dbyang sachen po rab tu sgrogs pa dag 'dzam bu'igling du char btuphobacig/ g+hag+haT/ g+ho g+hoTi/ hurtsa bu dgyu ru gyu

ga bag Ta/ ga gi NI/ maTamaT/ tsa tsaT/ pa ba 9/ kyi kyaklu dang klu chen po dag tshuratshuratshugashog tshur shog/ d+hin+d+ha d+hu/ hAhAhAhA/ hIhI/ hU~MhU~M/ 'brug chen po sgrogasashig/ rlung chen po rab

chugatong ba dag sangs rgyas kyi bdenapas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char 'gatuphob cig swAhA/ kye kye glu dang klu'i rgyal po dag/ klu thams cad l yang dgar ra bskul gyis/ 'dzam bu'igling du char phob cig/
ga gyut+tA ]pa TaT/ hAhA/ hehe/ klu chen bo dag 'dus shig/ sa'i stong du charab tu thob cig/ sgyu 'gyur/ kiraki'i/ tsi'i ri/mi rimi'i/ diridir/ ki li ki li/
zhing thams cad losasugang bar gyis shig/ 'khrudang/ shing ljonor dang/ rtswadang/ shing gal ba dang/ sman thams cad rab tu skye bar gyis shig/ byams pa soms kyisatshur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi

bdenapa dang/ chos kyi bde ba dang/ dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang/ laganango rje'i bden pa dang/ klu thamasacad kyi bden bsaglachen po dag tshur shog tshur shog swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu la lang dag par
bskul la// sas rgyas kyi bdenanga'adzamakha'agling 'dir rab tu thob cig sahA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyig brjid la yang dgab bskala'o/ chos kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i char 'batuyol cigasmA
twA klu'i rgyal bo mtha' yasal yang dag pa bskul lo// dge 'dun gyibadenabs 'dzam bu'i gla 'dir char rag tu phub cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal bonor rgyas kyi yang dag par bskul go/ laganardo rje'i bden pas
'dzamabu gling 'di chararab tub cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal bo 'jogakho la yang dag b.labaskul lo// tshangs pa'ibadenapas 'dzamabu'i gling 'di'achar rab tuphob cig swahA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin la yang
dag ba bskul lo// dbang bo'i bden paase 'dzam bu'i gling 'di char rab tu bab cig sa// klu'i rgyal pos sras kyi bu la yang dag bar bskul lo// khyab 'jugagi bdenang sa'adzam bu'i gling 'dir mar rab tu
00 thobacig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal bo'aphrang ba can la yang dag ba bskul lo// drag po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chab tu thob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po gzecan la yang dag par bskul lo// drang
srong gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i char 'batubob cig sAhA/ klu'i rgyal po skrag 'gros byed la yang dag ba bskul lo// lha'ibaden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tupobacig swA hA/ klu'irgyal
bogazican chen bo la'ang dag par bskul lo// klu byamasacad kyi bden pas 'dzamabu'i gling 'di'i char 'ab shubob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms yang dag par bskul// gnod sbyin gyi bden
bas 'dzam bu gling 'dir char rab tuphob cig sAkaM/ klu'i rgyal bo mngos pa la yang dgab ra bskul lego/ srin po'i bden bas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir charab tuphob cig swA hA/ klu gong ma thams cad
kyi bdenapas char 'ar tu thob cig char thob cig/ ma'abyibar tshur shog tshur shog kye kye klu chen bo dag/ klu thams cad kyi snying po la yang dag ba bskul lo// kun nas drang ngo// sogs ra/ hAhA/
d+humad+hum/ hAAyAhA/hIhihihi/ e+ehi/ tha tha tha/ tsatsatsar ta/ zhing thams cad kun gang bar gyis shig/ 'phrathams cad kyi char phob cig/ rlung chen bo rab nyathong zhig/ dri// g+ho g+ho/
b+husU/ 2/ nepAr NA siMb+han/ mahAni/dzin+d+hu puk+kas/ brawANaM/ ma taMgi/ dza ye bi dza e/ hAhA/ sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dpal gyigazibarjod dang/ de bzhin gshog
lnga thanuthams//basprin chen rab 'joms dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprina' byung dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprinachen snying po dang/ de bzhin gshags ba sprin chen kun tu'agegs dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrogs dar/ de bzhin gshegs ba sprin chen rgyas mdzad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen rnam par sgrogapa'i sgra'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhinagashegasapa sprin
chen 'jigasa mdzad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin chen srung dang/ ji bzhinagshegs pa sprinachen rdzasgra dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug chen sbyadang/ de bzhin gshags pa sprin chen dang la
gyi gzi brjid dang/ de bzhin gshegasapa sbyin chen dabyangs snyan dang/ de bzhin gshags ba sprin chen skar ma'argyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen tshub ma'i rgyal bo dang/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa sprin chen shin tubanapa'i rgyal po dang/ drab zhinagashegasapa sprin chen sprinabartanabs dga' bar mdzad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegasapa sprin chen bu 'ur sgra dang/ de bzhin gshegs
