basprin chen 'jigs pas 'jigs mdzad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen thog tog rab 'degs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnam par 'phrulapa'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhinagashogs pa
sprinabakra shis kyi ched dang (sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabasadang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyi'i/ dbazhinagashogs pa sprin chen snying po thams cad la yang
0 dag par bskul lo// dkon mchogagasum gyi bkalung gis/ myur du shog cig// kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag tshur shog tshur shog/ hu lu hulu/ su musu ru/ d+ha pa rnyapa/ g+har g+har/ thuru b+hu ru
ma 'phyibar sangs rgyas kyi bden pas tshur shog/ chos kyi bden pas tshur shog/ dge 'dunagyi b.ron pas tshur shog/ klu thams cad dang klu chen po gong ma gong ma dag gi bdenapas 'dzam bu'i gling
'di char phob cig/ al la zhes gar byed cing/ a la la zhes glu len pa dang/ a la la zhes pas bla'i rnam bar 'aphrul pa chen po byed cing 'du la/ chor gyi rgyan chen po 'babs shing/ klu chen po

rnams kyi chos kyi skra yid du 'ong ba ston pa dag/ gu lug lu/ nAgAnAge/ tsanatsaT/ nAgarI/ Any+tsa/ hIhI/ nAganA ginInAge/ sarbanAg/ bany+tsa malhan/ mAr Ni/ mare ta ro ti/ tare/ ta ra ta ro 1 ta re/ ka ba le ka

ga bkri tadaMrI/ b+ha lAnAge/ A kaT/ A kaTany+tsa/ mAbi lam ba tha/ ba r+ya dzAr/ g+ho rarApi Ni/ kAle/ a kA le/ gardza ta/ sarbameg+habagurma Ni/ sany+tsad ni/ sawakhyecun/ apU ra Ni/ tsakratsakra bcu/

hIrihiraM/ b+hage lhag/ smrar smar kla li kA li/ mahAkA li/ dri da ya/ pa bi sha/ a te/ ma tre/ sarbanA ga A karma Ni/ pU bal pU ra ya hU~M hU~M/ ratA tra lab kuwitaM/ badzra/ babadzrapAni/ ka la sho d+hi

ro[0f10]nAgatubin/ su ru po/ b+hog lho ge/ mahAb+ho mahAb+hogi/ b+hog rubu/ ta ya ba le/ panaNi/ sarbanagasalcod niswAhA/ na mo rat+tetAyA ya// namany+tsalcabadzrapA Na ye/ ban d+haban d+ha/ su rupe/ kA la ru
pisAhA/ chos sgrubs thog ma khonarasrung ba'i chig byas l/ chos gos kyi rgya ra lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bor nas// rlung gi da kyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying

bo zhes bya ba 'di zhag nyishu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyunam chad par bklag par bya'o// shar phyogs su nib lang gi rtsibs klu'i rgyal bo'ago gsum bzhes bya ba'i 'khor dang bcas te khri bar bya'o// lho phyogs sun klu'i rgyal po

tshe rab tusgyus byed ces bya ba mgo ljaba 'khor dang bcas te brib bya'o// nub phyogs sun klu'i rgyal po snangaldan gatsug phud can zhes bya ba mgo bdun pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs sun klu'i rgyal po spyi'i

bskul zhes bya ba mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// bla'i dang/ gos sngon po dang/ rgyul mtshon sngon po dang/ lha bshos thams cad kyang ston par bya'o// klu thams cad la dbab pa ni mngar gsum gyis bya'o//

mngar gsum gyi dgang blags badun yang klu'i snying pos sbyanasrag bya'o// sprin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris techal gyi rgyun 'bebs te phan tshun thugatsang mtha glog 'gyur bar bya'o// 'dir dbab pa'i khur ba bkra shis

ldan dang/ panatso dang/ sha dang 8 kusha dang/ sbrang rtsi las byas pa'i zas mchog rgyas pabya'o// de nas chos sgo bgatsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos pas rlung gidakyil 'khor gyi le'u glu thams cad kyi sI po bklag

par bya'o// de nas klu rnams dang po'i nyin mo nasakhams te/ de'i ri'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing/ sgra yid du 'ong bdag 'byin bar 'gyur te/ le'u 'di la the tshom dang panas par mi bya'o// gal te rgya mtsho dus tshod las

[z/]yolan/ 'dibang char las yol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan bdas de bzhin gshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyisnying po btsugs ba rnamapar bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
kho dbcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas sprinabadal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan bdas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'isangs rgyas 'brug bsgragasal phyag 'tshalal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin badzag la phyag 'tshalalo// bcom

ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprina rnam par rgyas mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// pacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas sprin gyi yan lagamadzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan badas de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas nalta bu'i na bza' mnabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das do

bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rags pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin gyi 'bru bskrun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'phrangs
can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'thoral phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas sprinagyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasaba'isangs rgyas sprina'adzinal phyag 'tshal lo// bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan bdes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyis

byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas sprinagyi nub la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sdud la phyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug nges par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal la// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad bade legs su gyur cig/ 'byung po thamA
cad labyams par gyuracig/ dud 'gror gyurapa thams cad 'jigasab med par gyuracig/ na'agro thams cad zhi ragyur cig/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par selabal phyaga'atshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thamA
cad kyi cho// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i cho ga 'di grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA spa tu tu/ spu ta spu ta/ spyaT spu Ta spu Na sAhA/ char mi 'bab pa'i tshadag slang ngam
dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsanam gang la la zhig gis mgo bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos labyams pa'isams dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'adi dag yi ge rabris nasagadanagatsangam la bzhi g sta/ phog

bo'abadunagyisanamamakha la gyen du 'dug cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'imtshan rnams lanalnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mchod pa chen po byas te/ zhag bdunagyi ba'adurgyun ma chad par byas nachar 'bab par 'gyur ro//
phagasapa sprin po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//@#// rgyugar skad du/ Aru nAg rA dzashrI
ratsanAya d+hA raNi/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'irgyal po gzican gyis zhusapa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagagis thos pa dus

gcig na/ bcom ldan 'adas yulam gadz+han lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs te/ de nas klu'i rgyal po gcican kha dog shin tu'aphags pa dang ldan panamasros pa dang 2 bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor
song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'adasakyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nye/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri 'din/ ring po dag dge slong rnams la 'tshon/ dal
bdagagis ji ltar mi'atshabarab gyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i rgyal po legs so legs so// 'di

lta bu ni khyod kyis bya ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir dug dang sman chen po bco brgyad po 'di dag gi ming zung zhagi/ tad+yathA pan re/ ka raTe//
k+Sha ka lu re/ bo dang gam te/ bid dum te/ araT ]taratar/ taru kyi/ dgudan/ a tad ha/ tshal dze la/ pha la/ shaTasha Ta/ ku lin ku li/ ekarakIta/ rigApish+tsa/ dge slong dgasu zhig dug dang/
smanachen po bcobargyad po de dag gi ming 'dzin pa de'i lus la rims kyis mi tshugs/ dug dang/ mtshon dang/ byad stams dang/ ro langs dang/ nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa/sami

tshugs so// de laring po dag 'tshabar mi 'gyur ro// su zhig 'di dag 'dzin bde dzesrid 'tsho'ibar du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzi
kha can girangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyisagasungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzican gyisazhus ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
kha/ rgyagar skad du/ grahamAtraka nAmad+huraNi/ bod skad du/ gzab rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyerachen pon/ lce dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srinapo dang/ dri bra dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci drang/ lto 'phya chen
bodang/ bdud dang/ nyim dang/ zlab dang/ mig dmar dang/ pa wasangs dang/ phur bu dang/ gza' lhagapa dang/ sngonapa dang/ smragacan 'dzin dang/ mjug rings rnams dang/ rgyuskar nyishurtsa brgyud la

sogs pa mang bo rnams kyis bstod ba/ rdo rje chen po'i mtshig gi byin gyisabarlabs kyis rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs so// byang chub samasadapa' dum dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems

ba'a chen po phyag na rdo rjedang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdordzagatum po dang/ byang chub sams dpa' samasadapa' chen po rdo tshasdadang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chinapo phyag na rdza gzhu can

dang/ byang chub sems par bsams dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' samasadapa'i chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang/ byang chub samasadapa'i sams dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang/ byang chub sem/
dba'asamasadaba' chen po spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun dugazigs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang//
byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang/ byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang/ byang chub
sams dba'asams dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chan po 'jam dpal gzhon nudang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po byams pa/
la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'duna rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to// bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang/ bar dudage ba rang/ tha ma'
dge ba dang/ tshig 'bru bzangapo/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to// de nas phyaganajorjes 'khor de dag la bltas talangasanas/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyisabarlab/
kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mas bskor babyas taphyag 'tshanas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bsams pa dang bcas pas skyilamokrung legs par bsanas/ 'khor dedag la'agying bag tu
bltas te/ rdorje'ithamo rang gi snying kharab zha gnas / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadapas gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasagaza' mi bzad pa/ mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ drag shul can gyi sams
kha dang ldan pa/ khro bo/ khrobo'i gzugasarAnadag/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa// mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid cing/ kha cig nor zas 'phrog par bgyid/
khacig srog 'phrog par bgyid/ sems can tsharing ba kha cig ni thung ngur bgyid do// de ltar sems can thams cad laganod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi
[ns/ ] rnamagrangs gang gis sems can thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas sems can thams cad la phan/
par[S]ba'iphyiragasang chen pas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ gza' mi bzad pa'i
gzugs can shin tu khro ba dang/ shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyi mchodapa dang/ mchod yon dang/ bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang chesagasang bongasa bshad do// de dag mchod
bsamachod gyuratsong// gnod pa byas n gnod byed pa// gza'ade kun gyi kha dog dang// ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang// lha rnams dang ni lha minadang// mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang// gnod sbyin rnams dang

srinakho dang/ mi rnams dang ni mi ma yin// drag po gzi brjid chen po dang// khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i// gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dag/ rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nasasnying rje rnam par rol pa zhes ba'i bod zarab kya sta/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so// dunas de'i mod la nyim 'asogs pa'i gza' thams cad las te/
bcom ldan bdas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pal lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshalam dus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyarab byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan
00 bya/ 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgabar rdzogasaba'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'dasakyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gisabadag
cag rnams la sogs pas chos snab rnams labasrung bar 'gyur ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ zhib dang/ bde lags su 'gyur ba dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang/ chad pa spang ba dang/ dug gzhil ba dang/
ba/ dug gsadabadang/ mtshamasagacodapa dang/ sa bcing b rnams bgyid bar 'agyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang/ gsang
sngagasabaka' stsal to// omad+mo lha ya swA hA/ o nIt+taMsha ba sAhU/ o ragakumArA ya satwA5 ob+hogab+ha ta ye swA hA/ o a su rod tamA ya sAhA/ o kr-i ba u0f9fyasA hA/ o a kr-i tapi yA ya sAhA/

otsatiSh+Tha te swAhA/ lagan rdo rje 'di dag ni gza'adagu'i gsang sngags kyisnying po bklags pasagrub pa yin te/ khadog dang mthunepaspos kyi dkyil 'khor sar btsugs pa sopa'idabus su mchod par bya'o// kham
ba'am zangs la sogs pa bam/ gsar ram/ dngul gyi snod dumachod yon phul nas/ re re la'ang bzlasabarjod brgyartsa brgyad bya'o/ lagan rdo rje de'i 'og tugaza' rnams kyi yumazhes bya ba'i gzus kyi gsang

sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod bar bya'o// de nas gza' rnams thams cad srung bar byed bar 'gyur// dbul po'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// tshozad pa las tshering bor byed bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong dang/
dge slong mdang/ dge bstanadang/ dge bsanam dang/ gzhan yang sems can gyi gsagang yin ba dang gdagagirnalam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par bachiba'i dus byang bar mi 'gyur ro// phyagon

dodzagaza'anams kyadakyila 'khoragyi dbus su mchod par bya ste/ nyin gacig bzhin du klog pa'i byed pa'i chos sbapa gang yin pa de lagaza'akhrams cad badag 'di kun gyis bsam pa thamasacad yongasasu rdzogasakhabyed
par 'gyur ro// dedang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbulakha'angasel thar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhanagshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yumazhes khyab bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas l phyag
batshalalo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshalalog/bsam ba thams cad yongasasu rdzogasapar byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyaskar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gza'i khyim bdugs
tadu sh+'a/ obud+he buSh+Tha/ badzrab dzra/ pad+mepad+me/ sa ras ra/ swar swa ras ra sma ra sAhA/ na mabapang+kAr pa// namasarbagragAN+NaM/ sarasha pa ripu ra kA NAmowat+taNaM

nAmodAdag ranAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ o'atshobud+he/ ba badzra/ parlobade/ sangs ra/ sbas ra sa sar/ slar smar/ ba kr-i Ta/ bikr-iT ArimAraM/ Ardaya mdzol/ glu ta yag+ha ta ya/ sam+babaskrun/ ku ru ku ru/ na
tsunadand/ b+hin+tab+hin+te/ klu pa ya bal/ shAn ten te/ dran tedAn te/ pA pa ya dwaya/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdaganyid myur du bstan dugasol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang 'o/ somasacan thoms
cad la srung du gsolasrung du gsol/ gza'athams cad dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod ba zlog tugasol/ bcom ldan 'dasam 'phrul chen po mnga' ba snang ba'isems can rnams bsal
du gsol/ bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam dugasal tsan Ni tsanaNaM/ tu ru tu ru/ tsan Ti tsi Ni/ sumusu mu ]mu tsumutsu/ b+ha g+ha be/ uklu u gra rU pe ]pUr ya kU ra la/ ma

sarmasatInAlcam nor thi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi ti sa ma ye swA hA/ o sAhA/ b+hUt+tasA hA hisAhA/ d+husAhA/ d+hiswAhA/ pad+mab+har pa sA hA/ A da tA ya sAhA/ somU la sA hA/ d+ha ra NIs tuya swA hA/

b+hi hapa ta ya sa twA/ shu kA ya swA hA/ zhi rAyasahA/ dwahab sAhA/ katapo sA hA/ bud+d+ha ye sa hU/ badzed+har ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+hA ra la sAhA/ kumArAyAA hA/ sarbagra hats+tsha swAhA/ sarban kA trel+laAhA/

sarba dA da sha rA shi ni sgyu sAhA/ sazhwa u padra bo zlus hA/ osarbapi tre hU~MhU~M phaT swA hA/ phyagan do rdzo'i din gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyigasang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thams cad kyig yin no//
za' rnams kyi gsang sngagasakyi tshiga'adi dag ston zla tha chur yar gyi ngo'i tshis bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/ tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te

gzung bar bya'o// danas zla ba 1'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags n de dag la le dgu'i bar du'achiba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo// gza'i 'jigs ba dang/ skar mda' lhung ba dang/ rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi
gyur ro// tshe rabs dran bar 'gyur ro// gza' thams cad mchod ba byas bar 'gyura'o// gza' thams cad kyis 'dod pa sbyin bar byed do// danas bcom ldan 'das la/ gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal to/
legs so legasasozhes gasol te mi snang bar gyur to// gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///@#// rgya gar skad du/ gra hamA tI ka nA ma d+hu/
ra Ni/ bod skad du/ gza' rnams kyi yumazhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das 'brog

gnas kyi grong khyer na/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ ma mkha' lding dang mi 'am cidang/ lto 'phyichen po dang/ bdud dang/ 2ma dang/ zla ba dang/ mig dam

dang/ pa wa sangs dud/ phurapa dang 'a gza' lag dang/ sngon pa dang/ sbagacan dang/ mjug rings dang/ rgyu skar zhi u rtsa brgyad la sogs tomang po rnams kyis bstod cing/ rdo chen po'idamatshog gis byin/
gyis brlabs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge 'i khri labazhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs cig sa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan ro dang/ byang chub sems dpa' soms
dpa' chen po rdo rdzogatum po dang/ byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhucan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
rdo rje'i bdag po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang/ byang chub sems dang sems dang/
chen po pad+ma'i tog dang/ byang chub mams dba'asams dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po bad+ma'isnying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'
chen po pad+ma'ispyanadang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurab dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byas pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dag
'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun du bltas ba la chos ston te/ bkod pa chen po rgyan gyi yid bzhin gyiner bu zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dag ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang
bo/ ma'adres pa// yongs su dag pa/ yongasasu byang ba'i chos ston to// denus phyag na rdo rjes 'bor de dag la bltas te langasanas/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das

la lan brgya stong dumar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshalanas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bsnyams pa dang bcas pa'i skyilamo krung legs par bcasanas/ 'khoradi dag la 'gying bag tshubaltas te/ rdo rje'i thal morang
gi snying khar bzha gnas / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzab mi bzad pa'i gzugasacan/ drag shul gyi sam dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i gzugs can dag sems can
masal 'tshe bar bgyid/ mthobatsan par bgyid/ mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid/ kha cig ninor rdzasa'abrog/ kha cig ni srog 'phrog par bgyid cing/ sems can tsharing po rnams ni tshe thung bar bgyid
ba sta/ de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod pas 'tshabar bgyid pa de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gisasems can thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis
bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyis snying rjebaskyadanas/sems can thams cad la bab dang bde ba'i phyir gsang chen ngs kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin
gshegs pa la zhub byed pa dan legs so legs so// de'aphyiralegs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang/ gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ shin tu khro bo/ shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnam
kyi mchod pa dang/ mchod yon dang/ bzlas brjod bzang po gsang babs kyang ches gsang bas bshad do// de dgamachod pas mchod 'gyur zhing// gnod par byed pa gnod byed pas// gza'

de kun gyikha dog dang// jiltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang// lha rnams dang ni lhamin dang// mi 'am ci dang glu dag dang// gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang// mi rnams dngan srul po dang// drag po gzibarjid
@#// chanapo dag/ khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i// gsang sngags dang ni mchod pa dag/ rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyis thugs ka nas
T+Tha snying rje rnam par rol pa zhus ba'i 'od zer bkye sta/ gzab rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so// de nas de'i mod la nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad langs te/ bcos ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
shAkya thub pal lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag srog la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams tshog
pas/ chos skyab rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang/ yongasasu bskyang ba dang/ bdalegs su'agyurab dang/ mtshon cha spang ba dang// dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/
sabacing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasab shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang/ gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM ma g+hoSh+Tha yaswAhA/

opasIt+taMsha ba swAhA/ o rak+tag ku mA rA ya satA/ mo bud+d+hAyasAhA/ oMb+ho ga spa da ya sAhA/ o asu rot+tamA ya swA hA/ o kr-iSh+Thab ra Na ya swA hA/ o a kr-i ta pralA ya swAhA/ o rdzu tashe be swA hA//
0lan rdo rjebadi dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying pobaklags pas 'grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang mthunapa'i spos kyidakyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o// kham pa 'am/
thangs lasogasapa 'am/ gsara'am/ dadul gyi snodadumachod yon du bas/ re re la'ang bzlas brjod brgyatsabargyad do// 'gan rdo de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi

tshog lan bdun brjod par bya'o// desagaza'athams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// dbulapa'i gdon thams cad lasatharapar 'gyurayo// tshe zad pa las tshor ba byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdodzad ge slong
dang dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ gebastanam dang/ gzhan yang sems can gyi rigasagang yin pa dang/ gang dgagi rnalam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin bar 'achiba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/

khaganardo rje gzaba rnams kyidakyil 'khor gyidabusasumachod pa byas te/ nyin gcig bzhin du klog pa byed ba'i chos skyabagang yin pa de lagaza'athams cad badag nyid kun gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par

'gyur ro// de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba'ang ngesal bar byed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thubapasogaza' thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungasabaka'astsal pa// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal le/

rdo rdzo'achang la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma'achang la phyagabatshal lo// bsamab thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'igaza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// smyoskar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gza'i khyimabcuganyes rnams la phyag
brkya
'tshal lo// tad+ya cha/ bu d+habur+Na/ badzrab dzra/ pad+ma bad+ma/ sarasar/ sras ra/ sAs ra/ sma ra smar/ bkra Di/ bkra Di/mA 'amAr/ mgar/ g+hA ta pa// glu to// sarbabig+hAn/ ku ru ku ru/

tsun tsi/ b+him+man+te/ kApa ya k+Shapa ya/ shAn+ti/ bAn+te dwapa ye/ bcom ldan 'dasam bdag yid myur dubastanadugasol/ bcom ldan 'dasasgyu 'phrul chen po rnams 'duladu gsol/ bdag gi sdug pa rnams skam du
gsol/ tsats+tshA/ sumusumu/ mtshuutsu/ b+habab+hab/ ukre/ rU pA ra ya/ pUr ya/ mamasamaMsat+tAnany+tsamanorathasarba tathAg ta ad+hiT+Thitasam ya sAhA/ osAhA/ busAhA/ hId+ma sAhA/ d+hi swA hA/

pad+mad+harA ya sat+tha/ A di t+yA ya sahA/ d+har rtisu la sAhA/ bud+d+hAya sAhA/ dr-ihayu dA yayahA/ u kA ya swahA/ kr-ibar NAyasAhA/ rA hub stah+pha/ ke taposAhA/ bu d+hA ya swAhA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+mad+ha rA ya/

AhA/ kumArab swAhA/ nok+Sha ta trA NAn sAhA dAdagar bInAsAhA/ sarba u pA dra pAnaMswAhA/ osarbabatsi hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyogs rdo rje 'adi/geza' rnams kyiyum zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston

zla tha chung gi yar ngo tshes bdun nas brtsams tags sbyong dpeldan 'byas nas/ tshis btsubazhibab dugaza' rnams la mchod bcas te gzung bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya'anyin mtshan thog thagabaklags n de la
gzabazamasacad lamachodarabyas par 'gyur ro// gzakhamasacad kyis cib dod pa sbyin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gatha' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te/ legs so legs so nasagasol nas mi snang
bgyur to// kazab rnams kyi bu zhes byakha'i gzungs rdzogs so//// rgya gar skadadu/ Ar+yab su d+ha ra nAmad+d+hA ra Ni/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun
zhes ba'i gzus/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad l phyag 'tshal lo// 'askad bdag gis thos pa dusagacig na/ bcom ldan 'dasako'u shamaban tsher ma can zhes bya ba'i nagasu mchog chen po

nadag slong brgya tsam gyi dag slong gdego 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpagomasadapa' chen po// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa 'batumang po dang thabs cig tubazhugs te/ de'itshako'u

namabi'igrong khyer chen pon/ khyi'i bdag zla babazang ngo zhes bya ba/ dbang po nye bar zhib/ yid bar zhib/ bu pho dang bu mo mang ba/ gza'amamang po dang ldan pa/ dad cing cher dad pa zhig gnas pa de/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba desong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das zhabs la go bos phyag 'tshala'ago lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas phyogasagacig tu 'dug go/ phyogasagacig tu'adug nas khyim bdag
slob bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das 'khadiskad ces gsol to// gal te zhusanas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyin/ bcom ldan bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas la bdag phyogs 'galazhig zhulags s// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po 'bad
skad ces bka' stsalato// khyim bdag khyod ci dang ci 'dodapadris shig dang/ khyod kyisaji ltar dris pa'i drib lung bstan pas ngas khyodakyi sems ras par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ khyim
bdag zla ba bzang po/so/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so legasaso zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar manyananas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu dbul po gyur pa las/ jiltar dbul ba/mchis par 'gyur zhing/ bro nad kyis thebasana'ang bro nad ma mchisabar bgyur ba lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po

la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyiradabul po'i denadu'adri/ ngaskad ces bka'astsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag bla babazang ngo sa'adiskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
nadabukhab dang/ gsob mang ba dang/ bu pho dang bu mo ma ba/ bza' mi mngapo dang ldan pa lags te/ 'islad dugang gis sems can dbul bo rnams kyi dbul bam mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ bond kyis thebs pa/

rnams khrond ma mchis par 'agyur ba dang/ noradang/ 'brudang/ mdzod dang/ bangamadzod mang po dang ldan b bgyur ba dang/ sdug pa dang/ yid du mchis pa dang/ mthong na yid du 'thad pa dang/ dbang phyug tu/
'gyurab dang/ sbyin bdag mdzod bsami 'tshalazhing/ dbyig dang/ gsaradang/ nor dang/ khru'i mdzod dang/ bang mdzod rnams dang/ nor budang/ mu tig dang/ rdo rje dang/ brgyadang/ dung dang/ man
shaladang/ rudang/ sale sbram dang/ dngul bsama'atshalacing 'khyorapa 'gyur thadang/ khyigabusmadudang/ bza' mi rnams brtanapar 'gyurab chos kyi rnamagrangasadabacon ldan 'das kyis logs pa bshad
dugasol/ daskad cesagaso la bdang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang bo labadi skad cesabakab stsal to// khyim bdagabs pa'idusabaskal pa grangs med gdasapar gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus
na/ bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar Dogasakha'i sangs rgyas gab dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdeba'agshegs pa/ 'jig rtenamkhyen ng/ skyas bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/

banamadar/ lhad mi rnams ston la/ sangs rgyas khacom ldan 'das rdo rje'achang rgya mtsho'ibyang sazhes bya ba 'jig rten dubyung ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhinagashegasal de las/ nor kyi rgyunazhes bya ba'i
gzusa'adi thos te/ bzunga'abacangs/ bkags/ kun nub bar byas/ rjes su rab byas shang/ gzhan dgala'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstanate/ rigs kyi bu da langs d bshadapa
bya'o/ rigs kyi bgazusa'adi'i mthusainamasa rnam pa mtho'atsham par byed do// mim yin b rnams rnam pamatho'abar mi byed do// gnod sbyin rnams rnam par 'tsham pa mi byed do//
srin boms rnamapa'i matho'atshamapar mi byed do// yid gasa rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// 'khra rnams rnam bar mtho mtsham par mi byed do// 'byung po rnams rnam

cha par mtho 'tshamakharamibyed do// grul bum rnams malaramatho'atsham par mi byed do// brjed byed rnams rnam bar mtho 'tsham pa mi byed do// gnonaponamasa rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// lus srul

tshathapo rnams rnam bar matho 'tshab par yi do// lha rnams nam bar mtho'atsham par mi byed do// lhag linanamasa rnam bar mtho 'tsham par mkhyad do// zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang/ zas sugacin 'thungab
rnams dang/ zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang/ zas su sha za ba rnams dang/ zas surlag 'thungab rnams dang/ zas su zhig zab rnams dang/ zas su rkang za ba rnams dang/ zasasu snabs zla ba rnams

dang [0f10 ]bras sugator khung nas 'bab pa 'byungab rnams dang/ zlasasudabugs rngub pa rnams dang/ 'byungabazaba'i bar rnams rnam bar 'tshob mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bunoragyi rgyunagyigazungs 'digs kyi
skyabu'am/ rigs kyi bu mogapagi khyiman yodadam/ snying layod dam/ mgan yod dam/ glegasom du chud dam/ thos par gyur tam/ kun chub bar byus sam/ bklags sam/ gzupangam/
rjes su yi rang bar byas sam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tubastanama'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la yun ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ dge ba dang// grub pa dang/ bde ba dang 1lo
legs par 'gyur ro// su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyadanalanaganyis sam/ lanagasumamam/ lan bzhibatonanade'i lha yi rangs te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bstanapa ' dga' ba dang/ chos gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang/ deg bdunagadags pa byas ngas dga' ba dang/ chos smra ba la dga' bas lhagapa 'ibasam pas/ bdag nyid 'os te/
'bru'achar 'bebs so// na mobadzra d+har sAg ranirago khaya/ ta thA ga tA// tad+ya thA/ o su ra bab+hadra ti/ oM ga le/ maMg la/ maMg la ba te/ a le/ a tsal/ ar le/ atsa ba le/ ud ka tA ni/ ud
b+hedan/baspapa ti/ rlon pa ti/ d+ham bra ti/ grim ti/ bralhabati/ am le/ bimal/ namale/ bu ru su rang/ su rlupa maMle/ bim le/ tsale/ atsan ste/ anan tete/ binan sdu/ bi shwa kasha/ bi shwani

sha/ aM ku re/ maM ku re/ prapaM ku re/ bIram/ bIr ma/ bid+hame/ ri'il/ du dum/ kha kham/ ta ta re/ ta ra tar/tar tur/ babadzrab dzra/ bam/ Ta ka Ta ke/ tha ka thake/ uka ka buka ko/ [B]ke ta ra ke/ abarta

na bar n ba danibadzra d+harasag ra ri glo ba/ tathAg tu ma nu skyarasarba tathAg tu/ sat+ya man s+sar/ n+nams man slar saMgasarkyaanu sa ra/ ra ta pa ta/ pu ra du ra/ sU rayapA ral/ myur Ni/ b+har b+ha ra Ni/ am/

sumog li/ nyan tamati shub+ham ti/ma galab+hani/mahAm ti/ b+hadrab te/ pra b+hAb te/ sutsan+d+ram ti/ Agatso sam ya ma nusma ra/kA/ Abar Nim smar swA hA/ prab+hAb ma nu sma ra swA hA/ dedi ma nu sma ra swA hA/
te dzom nu sar saratA/ bidzaya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ hrad pa mnu sma ra swA hA/ sarbasatA yin pa mnus+sar sAhA/ o bAsad+hare swAhA/ oM bA su grwa yi sa hA/ oMIpA su swA hA/ o bsu swA hA/
rigs kyi bu 'di ni nor rgyun ces bya ba'i gzus te/ gzungs 'di'i chus mu ge dang/ nad dang/ 'tshings 'byung bar mi 'gyur// rigs kyi busuzhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sasargyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyunagyigazungs kyigasang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub gcig btonan/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i don du bdagagi khyim mam/ gnas gtsang ma'i bang mdzod
dam/ gnasagang dubang rung bar de bzhinag kags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan dan gyis dkyil 'khor gru

phyogs bzhir byas te chub gacig btonan/ gros kyi bde'i khyimanor dang/ 'bru dang/ gosar dang/ dngul dang/ yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshod tsamagyis gang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang gnod pa tha

cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyirarab tu bsgrimasa'anor gyi rgyun gyigazungs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogasashig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig
dang des khyod kyi yun ring po 'dzin dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gasol te/ khyimi bdag zla babazang pos/ bcom ldan 'das lasanor gyi rgyun gyigazungs
'di thos nasatshisazhing dga' la ma zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes ta/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag gisanor gyi rgyun ces bgyi bablangasalags/ gzungs su zin lags/ bzung lags/ bklags lags/ kun chub par bagyis lags/ rjes su yi rasapar bgyis lags so//

gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dgopar rab tubastanabarab gyi lags so// de'iskad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla babazang po bang mdzod rnams yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos//
bcom ldan 'das la la babum phrag dumarab skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyi/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'

bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga'abokhyod songal khami bdagazla ba bzang po'i khyimanor dang 'brus longasasugang ba phunasum tshogs pa dang/ mdzod chen po dang bamadzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos/ de nas tshe//

dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyaltar mnyananas/ ko'u sham ba'i grong khyer chen pog lab dang/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po 'khyom ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhugs pa dang/ nor dang 'bras

yongasasug ba phunasum tshog sapa dang/ rin po che phunasum tshogs pa dang/ yo byad thamasacad kyi mchod pa chen po dang/ bang mdzod rnams kyang yongasasugang bar mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang tshim zhing dga'
lamakhu zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga'anas duga'abadung yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das lab der song ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yamtshan du'adzin cing dga' ba dang/

yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyimabadag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang 'bru phunasum tshogs pa'i rgyu
gang lags/ rkyenagang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dag 'borags kyi bu khyimabadag zla ba bzang po dad cing mchogatudad la dge ba'i bsamab can des/ nor gyi rgyunagyigazungs 'di bzung

zhingarab tubaton te/ blangs shing bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rangs par byas shang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyir// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun

gyigazungs 'dilong zhig/ chongasashig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ zur zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang/ de ni skyabamang po la phan pa dang/ sbyongo

mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten lasnying brtse ba dang/ skya bo phalapo chadar/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyidanadang/ phanapa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro// kun daka' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni lta dang
bcas pa dang/ bdud dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcasapa dang/ lha dang/ midang/ lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ngo// lan gnyis su bton

bak+kha tam/ lan gsum du bton kyang 'gal ba byed pa de ni gnas med de// kun dga' bogazungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi phyed pa yin no// kun dga' bo 'di dag nisems can dage ba'i rtsa ba zad pa rnams kyi
lam du grags par mi 'gyuranA/ glegasabamal yig 'drib dang/ yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ni de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/ gzungs sngags 'dinisimasatsan dbul
bo dang/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang/ 'jigasab dang/ samasacan sdang bsaganod par byas thamasacad kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisagasungs ba dang/ bshad pa dang/ rjes su yi ras pa
dang [0f10]ratung ba dang/ bsngags pa dang/ bkrol ba dang/ gsal bar mdzad pa dang/ bskyod pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs ba dang/ chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ snyan par brjod pa dang/

go bar mdzad pa dang/ bsnyad bab phyira'o// de nas dang ldan ng kun dang/ bo stan las langs te/ de'i tshathal mo sbyar nas ched dubarjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sas rgyas

bcom ldan basamagyisami khyab ste// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// bsam gyis mi khyab pa ladad rnams kyi// rnam par sminapabang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad

mkhyen// chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba// ye shes pa rol bgrodapa byon gyur pa// sas rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo tsham zhing dga' lamagu zhing yi rangs nas
rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde bskyasanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/
bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo'adi'i khyim bdag zla ba bzung bos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ nor dang/ 'bu dang/ rinapo thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar yar zung zhig/ de bzhin

tsha gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyunagyigazungasazhes bya bar zupazhig/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis de skad ces bka' lanos/ modang ldan ng kun dga' bo dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' dedag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/ drizar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstod/
do// 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogasaso/// #// de nas bcom ldan 'dasamanor rgyunama'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/ dang po ra zhig dbu

zla tha chung gidakarabo'akhyogs kyi tshos gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chuborasong sta/ nas niuma'i bar du chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dug l/ nAm la sngon duphyogs par yongs su brtagasal dzasnyada gnas akyi

bar du bzlas pa bya'o// bza' ba thams cad spangs te nyon mongasashangasmra bcad byas te/ nubabadun dubazlasapar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasama'i thang sku'ang dbu skra ma gtogs par gur kum dang tsan dan

gyis byug pa bzhinubamo bar ms te/ chur khrubadun/ zheng du khrugasum sta/ khrubcudang bcasabal tshon ma lus pa gso skyongadang ldan pa'ilcabazos bcom ldan bsamamadog ljangasarasna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis

brgyanapaM/ phyag g.yas na 'bras bu chen pobasams pa/ phyag g.yon ban sgrub pa po rnams la ster ba ni bo che'i za ma tog mu tigadang/ rdordzapa lam dang/ bskrurlab 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan phyago/

byung dulha'i bu yin po che'i chara mngon du'ababasaMbazhin bakhya'o// g.yas logs su dang lachen mo pad+ma'i phyagacan sgrub pa po lanyabaradagos pa la gnas al bzhinab byago/ g.yon logs su pad+ma'i dpal rin po che'i

sim pagang babya'o// khog tu sgrub ba po pad+ma'i lag pa can bya'o// de nas thabasku skugadung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi rung dunub phyogs su kha bstan la bkram ste/ de nas bar spyod pa'igator ma ma gtogs pa

mdzod kyibazhes pa'i ng dbul zhing drizhim po me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la/ tsan dan dang a ka ru'i bdug pas bsreg par bya'o// zhun mar gyi mgam brgyadabul bar bya'o// de nas stanagacig la gnas

la bcom ldan 'dasama'i zhal la dmigs la nubamo mtshan yalabazlas babyas na/ de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su skyes bu chen po tsam gyinor rin po thams cad kyi rgyuna'abab cing khang pa gang bar 'gyur ro//

yang namtshan mo phyadan chu'i nang duzhugs la brgyad brgya bzlasaparabya'o// zla bgacig tugacig gi sbyor bas nor gyi rgyun 'babarar 'gyur te/ mishes par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyur ro// yang na rgyal po'i dkor mngon
par 'dod na nyin monu'i nang du bzlas pa bya zhing/ mtshan mo'i khyad nu til gyi spyan srag brgyad brgya byas na rgyal rigs las rnyed pa chen po 'thob bo// yungs kar mar la bsres nas skrun/

sreg byas n rgyalapo dbang du byed do// kun tu ra'i sbyanasregabyas nargyal po'i blon po dbang du byed do// kha cigagis ni sbyorab gang gis mtshan mo bcom ldan badas pad+ma'i gdan can dran par byas n sbyin bdag chen

bor gyur ro// yang na sgrub thabs chen po bshad bar bya ste/ mo'aphrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshesagacig nas brtsams te/ zas ji srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drungan thang ka nub

phyogs su bstan la dgram zhing nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bgragacing/ mtshan mo stan gcig la gnas pas nub yalagyisabazlas pa byas na nor gyi phung po chen po rAd de/ 'thor gnod byas kyang
mdzad par mi 'gyur te/ lha khang chen po bya'o// chog 'di'i cha'athul dkar po'i phyogs labazlas pa byas 'khor los sgyur ba'athobacing/ bcom ldan 'dasamanor rgyunam dngos su mthong zhing phyir mi ldeg

ba'i byang chub sams dpar 'gyur ro// ji ltar de ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing/ kha ma tho ba'i zas chang dang 3sha la sogs pasbyangs shing mtshan mo bzlas pa byas n dbul por mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
khadas la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang/ zla ba bzang po yongs su dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don dugasungs pa la mngon par bastod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//
loraN+NaN+DayA ya// o bAsut+tare b+hAtA/ snying bo'o/ namo 'ad+d+ha tra yA ya/okAsu sAhA/ zhaba'i snying bo'o// na mo rat+tatu gA ya/ o bAsu swAhA/ 'uba'isnying po'i yang zheba'i snying
ba'o/ tha'amo sbyaragung mganyis dar/ nasasrinalagaganyis dang/ mthobu chungaganyisagashibs tasdigasamatshub banatsunasbrul la/ mthebachugasarung zhogikhastsolate/ rtsamo gnyis rgyab spyad de
khab ltabu byas la/ gung mo rtso dpa la mthobamozung gcig de'i 'og tu gyur to// rag pa bcas pa ni rab tu bzungaba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa ste/ lasaThams cad sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'dasamanor
rgyunama'i gzungs 'di/ thub pas gsungs pa'o// namorat+tatAyA ya/ okiyi shika ri/ d+hanakarid+han ka ri swA hA/ bsgrub par bya ba'i sngags so// rigs pa 'di'i dang po ra zhig dam tshig gi phyag
naser mo rnams thal mo sbyaral mtheb chen dbus gcig ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// chos la/ sams ma ya ka ra/ mahAs ma ye swAhA/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags

so// phyagargyud nyid la kuyo dang sdigs mdzub tshigs gsum babaskul zhing mthe'atshuganyis cung zad phyir phyung ba ni bcom ldan 'adasama'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'idabab pa dang/ bsdu ba dang/ bsgrub bya'i sngags kyis

bya'o// phyag rgya de nyid la sdigs mdzubaganyis brkyang banim tog gi phyag rgya yanite/ obasu N+NasAhA/ me tog gi phyogargyad nyid lasagung mo brkyang b ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya yin te/ sngagasani/ obasud+hareswAhA/
phyag rgyab nyidal 'od bskyab phyag rgya yin te/ sngagasan/ o bAsurnyam tigril swAhA/ phyag rgya'adinyid la mthe'u chung gisanamomathaba chen gyis bkab sta/ sor mo gzhan nams
[C ] bamtshanyir rubyas ba nimama'i phyag rgyas/ sngagasan/obasud+hariTisA hA/ san sogan ladu byas la mthe bongaganyis logasasu sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya// sngags ni/ o bAsut+tar NisatA/
lhagam bar spyod pa nyishurtsa ba'i sngags kyisathumo gi phyag kham/ sngagasakyis bsgrub par bya'o// bcom ldan 'adasama'ithang ka'ichog nyams pa med cing/ skra nyams pa med pa skudar mchadapa'i
sa zhing dumathogang gi tshapanyid laring dumatho do byas te// stong dbcom ldan 'dasabri/ g.ya saMsu'aphags baspyanarasagazigs/ g.yon du rdo rdzo'achadabya/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi'og thang ka'idabus su
bcom ldan 'das ma bris te/ gser gyimadog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ gos srab mo'ishakag mnabs pa/ dbazhin du gos srab mo'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi sham tha

rgyudang ldan nga'o// de sakhog phyogs su sgrub pa bo lag mchod pa'i tshog bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos gtsang sbra byas gos gtsang mgyonate/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad bya'o// de'i mdunang bstanab 'bum phrag

gcig byas laji ltar 'byor pasamachod pa'i tshig bya'o// de nas sgrubab po dang ldan pas sgrub byas te/ zhing gi dbus su thang sku bzhugs su gsol te/ dridang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ nye bar les spyod
ba'i gtor ma byas pa brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// thang ka'i 'og tu lan brgyartsa gcig gis sngags byas pa'i bum pa chus yongs sugang bgazhag pa'o// bum pa'i chus gtor ma btang zhing/ glang bu dang

thong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bar bya'o// glang bu'i mgul pa dang thong 'dzin gyimagul pa'i m rtog gi 'phreng ba gdabs par bya'o/ de rnams kyimadun du sngags pas chu'i rgyunazhang la lanagayas logs su bskor bar byos

ni sngags pas mdun dubagro zhing// sngags pa'i rtingani zhing chor 'gro bar bya'o// phyisas bon 'debs pa'i dus su chog bsabargyad brgyasngags las bon spar ba gang la lan bdun bzlas tezhir gtor bar bya'o//

sabonagadab pa'i chogabo// nga nizhing rngaba'i dus su yang chog 'dis bya'o// chog lhag pa ni 'dir dge slong bzhi la zhang gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod kyi ston mo byas te/ danas sngags pas mang pa bdun bzlas pa

byadacing/ rngabanile tog rtsa ba ba'i cho ga'o// dgayul 'chag pa bya ba'i chog bshad par bya sta/ g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngagasarasarang nyid gtsang sbra byas 'gosakatsang mgon la shar duzhalabastan
ti skugazugs bzhugs sugasol la dradang/ ma togadang/ bdug pa dang/ yang na bar longs spyod pa'i gtor mas la bzlas pa byas te/ 'bru'i phung po mtshams bzhi gzhon nu mgasar du bag

mabyas shing khyo yodapa'i bud mo dbazhi la ston mo byas la/ desgod kyi mthar zad pa med par gnas so// de nas skyes bus 'bu 'jal zhing grangs byed pa 'dapral ba la sngagasadagod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
ma'i sngags de skad du smra bcad byas la bzlas pa bya'o// ji skad duso la bltasan gnyis 'gyur du'agro bar 'gyur ro// de sad dus pa bya'o// de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'ching

pa'i mi la sogs ba bos shing sbyin b 'am/ dgo bdun la sbyin bar bya'o// g.yul 'chag ba'i choga'o// ngani'abru bang mdzodadu 'jugapa'i chog bshad babya sta/ dang po'i zhagi mdzod sgro g.yas g.yon du 'byung po

gnyis gatse'abugasus pa byang b/ dbang po 'phyang ba/ g.yonapa'i lagan 'bru'i snodabazung zhing 'bru smyug bzhin pa/ gsar gyi mdog rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o// mdzod kyi khang par yang dri

dang/ byug pa dang/ mchod yon sbyin zhing/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ bdanal sogs bas bcom ldan 'dasama'i thang ka'i mdzod kyi nang du gzhug bar bya'o// de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyunagator bzhin pa'i sngags pas

bgro bar bya zhing/ de'i rgyabanas donas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o// de'i rjes la 'bru'imadzod khang du phyag rgyugazhi ba bya'o// de nas mdzod kyi khang pa'i sgo ru dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas 'dri dang/ ma togadang/ bdug pa la

sogs pas mchod do// nor rgyunama'i gzungs rdzogs par bklag par bya'o// gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thang ka'i mdun dudanas skyes bus 'bu phyir 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'drab r bsams la/

gur kumagyis grog la sngags bris la/ spyi bor bcings la khagos kyis bkab la nyim re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o// mdzod khang gi sgo runyin r nor rgyunamazhes bya ba'i gzungs kyisadabaklagapar bya'o// sngags pasabasgrub
bya'i sngags lasal/ dus gsum dubargyad brgyabazlas pa bya'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'adasamanor rgyunama'i rtog pa rdzogs so//ka@#// rgya gar skad du/
Ar+yag Napatidzrad ya// bod skad du/ 'phagasapa chogs kyibadag po'i snying po/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgyalnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs cig tubazhugs// de nas bcom ldan

bdas kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo gang la 'tshogs kyi bdag bo/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug gsung bo 'dzinan da'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de bzung bas dgos pa 'grub
cing/ gsang sngags thams cad kyang dngos grub 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ namosU tamahAg Na pa ta ye swAhA/ ogag kaThagatsogakagag/ og Nang ta ye swAhA/ og Nab+hipi ta ya swAhA/ o ga NashA rA ya swA hA//

o ka Ta ka Ta/ ma TamaT/ da rad ra/ bid ra bi da ra/ hanahan/ krig krish+tsa/ d+habad+d+hab/ b+hany+dzab+hany+dza/ stamathu stam/ dzam b+ha dzam b+ha/ mo hamoha/ dahidahaM/rA tA pa ya rwapa ya/ d+ha nA di sid+d+him+me pra yatsa/ sam

mnu sma ran mo stu tem hAmudratsan ra swA hA/ oku ru ku ru sIhA/ o su usbahA/ o mu rumu g+hAhU~M/ pA ba Atibasu puku ru swAhA/ o ab+hu ta ban duk+Shab+hi ta tsit+tamahAsamAgatsAti/ man+tab+ha la/ ma hA ba la/
ma shAb rlu kram mashAhasta/ mahAd kyi ya/ pra b+ho de rUsisAhA/ tad+yathA/ o ku ru ku ru/ tshu ru tsu ru/ o tu ru tur swA hA/ ogaThag kagagats+tshagats+tshagats+tshag on tshon ma sa//
kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo'am/ dag slopangam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dgebasAnanam/ dgabasAnamagang la la zhigatshogs kyi bdag bo/ chogasakyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'dirtsomazhing/
gsang sngags bsgrubs pas/ dkona mchogagasum mchod du yul gzhan du 'gro 'am/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jugan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lam tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas te/

tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di bklags las thams cad grub kyis/ 'di la the tshomam brazhig/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ khrag khrug dang/ yul 'khrug pa thams cad kyi nang du'ang dran par byas na/
thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin dunang par langasanasatshig chub tonan thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog pa/8
mi 'gyurazhing/ thag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan r 'i 'khor de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/ dri thar
bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngonaparab stod do// 'phags patshogs kyi bdag ngo bsang po rdzogs so//rgya gar skad du//

ni/ ma hA ga tapa tita nAm/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba// 'jig rten dbang phyugal phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag/
dgyes// gzugs brnyanaman+d+hal gru bzhiragazhag/ zla ba drug tumachod par bya// lha yi 'khor los sgyur ba dang// tshe 'di nyidal skal ba mnyam// bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ longs spyod lha dang

mnyamapa dang// tshe yaparangaba'i mchog tu 'gyur// mi la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur// lha yi bu yang bronabazhin 'gyur// bdag gis bsob nyanapara'agyur// klu yang de yis bsgo banyan// bran bzhin las rnams

byed par 'gyur// lha 5 las spyod mnga' ris las// 'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal ba can// gdul bya dbang gis sku sprul pa// lha chen tshogs bdag chen pos bya// dngos grub

dam pa mchog sgrub na// mthu stobs phun sumatshogs ldan zhing// longs spyod yi dbazhin baphelab byed// 'jigs rten phan mdzad lha yi lha// gang gis mchod pa dngosagrub yin// lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud
las/dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o/// de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dag bya sta// bu yi lcibs legs par byugs// 'jam zhing mnyen la dbus
mtho ba'i// dbus sutshogs bdag sku gzugs bzhugs// ma tog dkarapos de la gtor// bdag nyid gcar bur byung byas te// log 'drenagazugs kyis yang dag mchod// per ta ka zla ba drug/ nyin re bzhin du
dus gsum du// gsang sngagasab rgyu ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs// bsam pa thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur// o ni bkra shis dpal dang ldan// gsang sngagasamago

lagazhag par bya// yid bazhin nor bu lta bu yi// dngosagrubastar byed yi ga yang// de 'og gral lagazhag par bya// tim lta bu'i yi ge yang// de yi rjes la bklag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po//
yig mchogan blang bar bya// gsal byed yi ge dang po yang// de yimajug tu brjod par bya// rin chen sa gas nas// las kyi yigisAzhes bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gsang sngags bzlas// lha chen dungosagrub
sgrub ba'i rgyud las/ lha'idangos grub kyigasang sngags bstan pa'i le'ag+haganyis pa'o// 'a/ da nasatshogs kyi bdag po bshad// tshogs kyi bdag po sku mdogadakar// glang po che yi mgo
bican// mche ba ya gcig chag ba dang// phyagagayas 'phug bsnams pa dang// byi ba'i gdan la bcibs pa dang/ na po cha yis sku brgyan pa// zla ba tshes pas dbu brgyan pa// 'od gsal ba/ 'od zer 'phro
ba/ mdog bzang ba/ khadog bzang ba/ gsus pa chab/ rgyun gyis spyad pa gro/ dngosagrub sgrub ba'irgyud las/ tshogs kyi bdag po bstan pa'i le'u stagasumapa'o/skade nas
skarab rgyalagyi nyin bar m tog dkarapo blangs te tshog sakyi bdag po'i sku gzugs bris te/ kha dog dkar po klu po'i dbu can thug g.yas la phug bsnamasapa/ g.yon pa na rin po che nor bu bsnams pa//
gsus pa chab/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// zla ba dang phyi ba'i khri la bzhugs pa mkhas pas bya'o// de la dil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag la zhal phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid log 'dren
gyi gzugs kyis yang dag par mchod do// tshogs kyi bdag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su tshogs kyibadag po dkar po

glang po che'i mgo can/ byi ba la non pa// migagasum pa/ zab phyadapa 'dzin pa/ g.yasen la phug dang dgra sta 'dzinapa/ g.yonapa tri shA la dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i
mdzub mo dang gungamo brkyang la mdzub mo bkug lagung mo'i tshigs su gzung bar bya ba nitshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o// tshogs kyibadag po'i phyag rgya bstanapa'i le'u lnga pa'o//denas gsang

sngags bstanapa ni// o ni dpal ldan mago lagazhag/ de nas yid bzhinanor bun// rani ngo ma yA yi ga bri// statshan gsal byed dang po yang// de yi rjes su bri bar bya// dbazhin gshags pa'i mtshan dang po//
dbyangs yig brgyad pas mdzes par bya// gsalabyed dang po yag yang// blo yis blangs te yid kyisaphri/ sde tshan gsum pa'i gsum pa la// dang bo'abazhi pa sbyar bar bya// sde tshan bdun pa'i gsum pa
la/ gsum pa'idangapos 'og tusbyar// yid bzhi'i nor bu'i yi ge la// bzhi pa'i lnga pa zla bgazhag/ dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan par bya// bzhapa'i gsum pas de nas brjod// dngos grub sgrub pa'i
yi ge ni// de yi rjes la khribar gu/ gsang sngagasadrag po'i yi ge yang// kun gyi mthar brjod par bya// gsang sngags 'di yi dngos grub// 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid kyis byin/
dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tshogs bdag chen po'i gsang sngags bstanaba'i le'u ste drug pa'o/// de nas gazhan yang gsungs pa// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yi//

mtshan gyigasang sngags zhes bya ba'i// dngos grub sgrub pa'i snying po/ dubal dang yogri yi gaste// o zhes bya bamago la bzhag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i yig las// khyima'i yi ge 'og tuspras// dbyangs yig drug

pa'i 'og tu sbyar// thig lenAdas brgyan par bya// mtshan gyidang po'i yi gzhi// de yi rjes la brjod par bya// bzhi pa'i lta ba de nas sbyar// lta pa'i dang po bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/

'byung ba rlung gi yi ge yang// dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan pa ni// de yi rjes la bribar bya// zhiba'i yig 'bruganyis pa yang// kun gyi mthar ni brjod par bya// mtshan gyi gsang sngags zhes bya ba// 'dod pa thamA
cad grubyed yin// mtshan gyi gsang sngags bstanapa'i le'u ste bdunaba'o///de nas gazhan yang bshad par bya// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par ni// ma tog dkar po'i rtsa ba blas// tsanadan
dkar po dag las// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs// mtho bo gi tshad tsamabya// gsus ba tshelaphyagabazhi pa// mkhas pas byas te legs bar bya// rin po che yi snod du gzhug/ dkar chen mngon par
gsal ba'i tshe// nang gi ma yis sku khrus gsol// gsal zhing dang la yid du 'ong// dridapaldan pa'i bum pa yis// ma tog dkar po'i dri yisani/ bdagachal ldan ras khrus bya'o// de nas de ma thag tu//
dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drangs la// me tog dkar po dpalabar bya// la thug 'dur bcas pa yi// gtor mchen po'ang de nas dbul/ spos dang sridang mar me dang// lha bshos dag gis mchod par bya//
gsang sngags 'dis la phug dang/ la du dang/ chudang/ dkar gsum gyi gtor mas tshogs kyi bdag po la phul te/ spos dang me tog rnams kyang dbul/ de ltar byas n phyis bgegs byed par mi nus so// tshog
kyi bdag po'i mchod pa'i le'u sta brgyud pa'o/'/de nas la phug ces bya ba// ro brgyad ldan pa'i nyung masta// zas rnams kun gyi mchog kyang yin// ro mchog brgyad dang ldan pa yi// kha dang

skyaradang bska ba dang// mngaradang tsha dang lan tshwa'ir// bzhun dang bro mchog che ba yang// nad sna brgyad kyi gnyenapo yin// mkhris ra bad kan 'dus pa dang// khrag dang chusar ma nub// rlung dang rims nad kun
lo phan// bdi'adra byungaba'i kha zas med// lha rnams kun gyi mchuyang 'gul// dngos grub 'grub pa'i zhal zas yin// tshogs kyi bdag po mchod par bya// la du zhes bya'i zhal zas ni// mngar gsum
'bras bu gsum bani// de bzhin zhim pa'i spos kyis bran// bag zanagyi ni ril bu bya// kho ma mar dubatsosabyas la// tshogs pa'igator m chen po bya// maradang 'khur ba mngar gsum dang// mthun pa'i zhal
zasasnatshogs kyis/ tshog sabadag chen po mchod par bya// de ltar tshogs kyibadag ngo la'o/ tshogs kyibadag po'is gzugs lagapa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhugs la/ sams
gzhan dus langs par bzlasabarjod 'bum bya ste/ lazug lasngags kyis btab statshogs kyi bdag pomachodan/ tshob dinyid la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal bo dang bsod nams mnyam par 'gyur ro// ma tog/
dkar bos mchod na rgyal po la sogs pa lamakhar mi 'gaga'o// rgyal bo lags bsgrub par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blonapo la sogs pabadag gi dbang du'adusabar 'gyur// dngos grub sgrub pa'i zhal zas
bstan la 'a ster ba'o//denas chog bshad bar bya// dngul zhes bya pa'irin chen la// tshogs bdag chen po'i gzugasakhyas te// yid bazhinanor bu lag na thogs// dkyil

'khochen po khru gang tshad// rina chen m tog dkabo bkram// gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas byas ngas// nad dang sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur// sheladang dung la tshogs bdag sku// mkhas bas dziltar 'abyor par bya//

sdug bsngal thams cad sal bar 'gyur// rin chen shelasatshog sabadag sku// mthobong ginAtshad tsam bya// san bra zhes bya ba'i sngags/ rig pa 'bum du bzlas byas te// shel gyi skud khrus byas nas// skam rgyal
gyin par// bdag nyid shar tshu kha bltas nas// gos dkar gyon te khrus byas la// thal sbyar yid kyisagasol bgadag/ bdag la gnod pa'i bgags gang yin// shel gyis de ma 'ong ste// miga'o 'gul rab tu
bzhugs// bdag nyid khrus byas shar du blta// dza pa dang rkun ma// gang yin me long nang du'abyung// nga tshad yisangos zina'agyur// tshogs bdag shel gyi sku de gi/ mchodab rab gsal legs byas la//
nagAku runas phya ba'i// rig pa 'bum du bzlasabyas na/ nad dang sdug bsngal gyis nyen la// sku dbastan pa tsamachasani/nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur// sdug bsngalalas kyang thar bar 'gyur//

zhi chen po'i chog yin// che nagasazhes bya ba la// tshog sabadagachen po'i sku byas te// rgyalagyi nyin pamig phye nas// mchod dang rab tu gnas pa phya// ba ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngagasan// 'bum phrag
gcig tu bzlasab yis// skugazugs bzhugs bgi khyim dgi/ nor rnams thams cad 'phal bar 'gyur/ gsal gyi tshogs bdag mthong ba yis// bgegs rnams thams cad nor 'bul 'gyur//
bgegs kyis gnod pa mi nus te// rgyal pobazhin dumachod par 'gyug/ gsar gyi tshogs bdag gnas pa las// sa phyogs rin chen char pa 'debs// gsar gyi tshogs kyi bdag po la// bgegs kyi rgyal po
thams cad kyis// nor rnams thams cad 'bulab yin// bdag nyid phunasum tshogs par 'gyur// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugasa mchog/ byas pa'i yon tana rnams la// gnod sbyin rnams kyis gter kha
'byed// skya ba 'di dang phyim la// rtag tu yo byadabalabama'agyur// nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bus// rgyal bu bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed// de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag gi/ skugazugs dkyil 'khor rgyu
bzhir gzhag/ b+ha ga zhes bya gsang sngags// bzlas pa 'bum du byas r yis// tshe de nyid la dngos grubani// ci'adod pa ni spyin par mdzad// lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni// sgrub
pakho la stsolabar mdzad/ shin thugs rje'i bdag nyid pas// dpal ldan tshogs bdag thugs rje can// thugs rje'i phung pos dbul ba skyob// nor lha chen po'i bdag nyid 'di// dar dmararas la legs
bris te// rgyalagyinyin par spyan phye nas// gang gi khyim du bzhugs b de'i// sa phyogs de ba shasi'agyur// zangs la tshogs bdag chen po'i sku// mkhasabs legs par bazo byas te// tsan danadamar
pos byugs pa'i sa// maN+Dal stang dulegs par gzhag/ ban du ka yi ma tog dang// pad+ma rA ga rana chen dang// ma tog dmar po kun gyis mchod// bru zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bzlas// rgyal po'abumo

dbang du 'gyur// lha yi bumo klu mo dang// mi 'am ci li butsho dang// thumakhre'ibu mo mtshan ldan mo/ mchog tu gzugs bzang gus bar 'agyur// branao bzhin du bsko ba nyan// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog

skyagazugs dgal brtenanasagrub/ mchod ba tsamanyis 'byung ba yin// gzhan la patshogs bdag chemo'isku// rin po chayi rgyu las byas// dkyil 'khor stong dubazhugs byas te// ran+tasid+d+hi zhes bya ba'i/ rig
'bul dubazlas pa bya// sa'og gtor rnams ston par 'gyur// ci dga' bar yang skyod bar 'gyur// tshogs bdag chen po'i rgyud las// rgyal bo lasogasab sgrub pa'i le'u stebcu pa'o//

de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// drag pochan po drag shul can// sangs rgyas thugs 'khyolasong dbu// glang chen gzhon nus zhal skyid pa// spyan gsum mchab bzhi dang ldan// phyag bzhizhabs bzhi ku chen gdan

dbang po mchab dkar bo 'dzin// de bog zhagasapagayon na// dgra sta ga kha tsA rtso gsum 'dzin// mthong ba gsus pa che'o// de lta bu yi tshogs bdag sku// 'khar ba khro chu dug 'bu// rgyal gyi nyin rarab dwa gnas //

des na sgom zhing sgrub pa// dkyil 'khor bya ba'is brtags ba// le'u tshadagu pa'i dkyil 'khorabi// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// tshogs bdag chen pos bsgrub bya mnan// zla ba'i gdagal

yumadang ni// gnyis su med par dgod pa'i bya// de'i ming A ka re ste// jorjephag gdong ma zhes bya/ dgra sta banadalagan thogs// khrag gis gang bgatso la stob// shar phyogasakyi labutshesar bo la khams gsum gyi bdag

bo la phug dang gri'adzin pa'o// lce phyogs kyi 'tshesngon po la gnod sbyin chen po rdo rdzomam shAre ba'i gdeng can dabyug todang thob 'dzin pa nag po'o// ba phyogs kyi le'u tshadamar bo laganod sbyin gyi bdag po sprin gyi bdag ces bya ba

dmarapo chus gang ba'i sprin phung dpazhags pa 'dzinaba'o// byang phyogs kyi le'u tsheljang khu laganod sbyin gyi bdag po nor gnas zhes bya ba ljang khu dbyug to dang rinapo che'akha TIg thogs pa'o// byang shar gyi le'u tshe dkar po

bgegs kyi rgyal po yin pa ka glang po che'i gdong mdung rtse gsum pa dpal phug thogs panag po'o// shar lho'i le'u tshe dmar po la yi dgas kyi rgyal po drag po zhes bya ba dgra sta dang thod pa ral po thogs panag po'o
khronub kyi le'u nag po pa sprin phung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba sprin thung dang glog gi 'od dubacas ba lag ba gnyis kyis thogs pa'o// byang nub kyi le'atshanag po la bgegs kyi rgyal bo log 'dren

sna yonazhes bya ba glang bzhi'i sna can rtse gsum dang thod pa skam po'i nang dul phug dungashas bkang ba thogs pa'o// lha rnams la klu'i rgyal po brgyad bka' nyan pa ni klu'i rgyal po a ba ladang/ b.ru ca dang/ dungaskyong
dang/ 'jog bo dang/ rigs ldan dang/ mtha' yas dang/ pad+madang/ bad+machen bo rnams so// sha chesgor rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung/ lho sgo 'phags skyes po/ nub sgor spyan mi bzang/

byang skor rnamathos sras rnams skumadog dkar ba dang// sngo ba dang/ dmar ba dang/ ljangakhur shes par bya'o// lagazhanor bu rin po che'ire/ ralagri'i re'o// 'di rnams kyi chung mni mi brogo/ 'di ltar bris
ba'i byang shar dugasad ba'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la/ de'i nang du dgrakho gzugs smra tshil las byas pa 'ad pa/ gnag pa/ sku zed ba/ til mar gyis byugs te/ snying khar ming rus bris la gzhug go

de'i skor ro sgra las byas pa'i thag pa gdags so// de ltar byas nas gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la/ ladu dang la phug dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dang/ gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la nyasha dang sgog btsong du sbyar ba'i

dmar gyi gtor ma re re bgam/ gla chen po brkyang la gtor ma che ba gcig dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi re re bya/ gal tam 'byor na che ba gcig bya/ lha bshos re re dbul bar bya'o// gzhan yang drag po'i rdzas
wa spyang ki'i thod pa dang/ zi nag po dang/ skatshe dang/ chungos kar dang/ nyungasanag gzhag par bya'o// tshogs bdag chapo'i de la 'khor gyi le'ustabalugacig pa'o///de nas gazhan yang bshad/

bar bya// sgom pa'i rim pa 'di lta bu// mabyung 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas// shin tu gsang ste bsgrub par bya// yi yi rang bzhin stong pa las// snangababa'i bzhin hUmed pa// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon 'byung// ming gi

sngags las rab tubaskyod// khro bo'i sprulapas stong gsum bkang// 'od bsdus thogama'ihU~Ml 'dus// chogasakyibadag po chen po de// 'gro ba'i don du bzhes pa// khroba chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yum dang

'khor yang rdzogs bar bskyod// phubargyad klu brgyad mas dpa'i tshul/ rgyal po de bzhin khrobo'atshul// ya la lhadangaming las bskyed// 'od zer tshul gyis spyan drangs la// dzad ng rdza ke'aphro 'du dang// sr-idang hU~Mgi gsang

sngags dang// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyus spyan drangs la/ nus ba'imathudang ldan par bya// mchod dang gtor ma btab par bya// bal gri'i khA la sngags// snying po dag dang spel bar bya// sgom pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
nasagasang sngags rgyal po ni// dbyangs yig gsal byed dag las btu// dang po bzhi pa de rjesabri// bzhiba'i lta gralagazhag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i yig dang// de yi rjes su bsam par bya// de

bzhin gshags pa'i mtshan dngabo// de yi rjesasu brjod par bya// del dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan// dgu pa'i yi ge dag dang// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar ba yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/
yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la// dbyangs yigaganyis ba spurab r bya// tim yin yi ge dang// bzhipa'i lnga pa de nas bri// de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan// kyis bcibazhipa'i yi ge la// dbyangs

[A ]yig bzhi pas brgyanab bya// lnga pa bzhi pa'i yig la// gsum ba'ilnga pasbyar ba// bzhi pa'i dang po'i yi ge la// dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyanapar bya// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la// de yi 'og tu sbyar bar bya// rinapo che yi

tsa yi ge dang// las kyi yi ge mtha' mar brjod// tshogs bdaga chen po'i rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dod pa thams cad sgrub byed yin// gnod sbyin brgyad kyi gsang sngagasani// ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa// tshad ma zhes bya la sogs dang/

paMzhes bya ba la sogs dang// ban ya ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ b+hir zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ hUMzhes bya ba dang/ trazhes bya ba// brgyad po la hUM dang phaTakyisamatha' rten pas srog gi snying po'o// klu yi snga/

ming las bskyad// o dang hUM phaT dang ldan bar bya// rgyal po chen po'i gsang sngags ni// b+hazhes byab dang/ b+hi zhes bya ba dang/ b+ha zhes bya ba'i sngags su 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyi gsang sngags 'byung
ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//kabasgrub bya dgug pa'i sngagasan/ mdang klu dang ka dpa la// ma dang dang b+har b+he// tridang ra dang tshadag gis// sha trAsridzaning zhes// lan grangs mang du

bzlas par bya'o// gnod sbyin bargyad kyi gsang sngags kyis// dgra bo'i bla rdo blang bar bya// de nas bla rdobasreg par bya// de nas bla ro mnan par bya// chad pa'i gsang sngags rgyal po ni/ dol dang klu dang ka dang la[}]mdang hu ngang

b+her ba// de ba yak+Sha ya ma dang// nAg nAg thum ril yang// chage mo dgra bo thum rel ya// sa ya zhes kyang bskul bar bya// de nas gasad pa'i gsang sngagasani// ma dang nyudang nyer ba// yak+ta la sogs gong dang mthun//

de'i rjes 'di skad brjod par bya// nA sha yan lan gnyis so// sha ya ts+tshatsA Na tra la ya// nag ya ku trimA ra ya// han kra rim pa gnyis// banA ya ka dzib+hinad+ha// tan+ta kAr de nas brjod// che ge mo mA ra ya zhes pa/
h+phahUMphaT phaT/ drag posags pa sngags kyi le'u sta bcu bzhipa'o/// de nas yang ni drag po'i sngags// o bihU~M b+hi ba b+hisachab bi mAsha ya hrid mi ta ya/ hUMtsi tu pa tu/ phra ma ru tA ya/

nyen han/ grabyAkr-ik+Sha pa tsapa tsa/ braglabrah+ma/ brah+maya phrag+ha ya/ hUM hUMphaT phaT/ 'khar ba 'am yang na zangs dag la// log 'dren chen po'i gzugs byas la// de la rab gnas mchod pa bya// dgra bo'agazug

bar n 'og tu gzhug/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i stanadubya// dgra de 'chibar the tshomamed// yang ni sbyor ba'i las rnams ni// dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs so// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku tsan dan nam rin po chal byas
te rdarab gnasabyas la mchod ba phul te/ ser ba gcod par 'dod na/ sar ba'i bdag po rlung lha dang chu lha'i gzugs byas te/ sprin gyi gzugs dang/ 'brug gi gzugs byas la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gdan du
mnanapar bya'o// bdag nyid kyis kyang mnan par bsams te/ hika tsan+dazhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlasan ser ba chod par 'gyur ro// yungs kar yang phyogs su gtor bar bya'o// sar ba 'babs par
'dod na/ chu dang sprigyimaN+Dala mngon par bris te/ tshogs bdag chen po 'brug la zhon bar bsgoms te/ bdag gi bka' nyanabar bsam/ gsang ba'i rdzas su bya ba la// lcags phye gsar phye//

zangs phye rnams// gnamachu'abras kyi lus spras te// sarab jitsam 'dod pa'i dbyibs che chung byas la khrag gis byugs la bdun dang bdun phrag mang du byas te/ ka kag ki ku'i thod pa'i nang du blugs te sprin gyis/

gabangar bya'o// ka ka'i thod pa la sngags bro bar bya'o// rim pa gsum mo// rtan gyi rdzas kyang gzhag par bya'o// bri thub+ha ri na ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa dang kaka'i thod nga 'i/

ra nang dusarab dngos su gsum mam/ bdunanam/ brgyad byung ba dang/ dgra'i yul du bskyal te/ sngags zlog nas bzlas pas 'bab bo// gal tem bab na tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku dbu thur la bstan/ zhabs gyen la

bstan pa dgra bo'i yul gyi dbus su sba'o// mod lagarabo'abab sta/ bya ka lan taka'i sgo nga tsam dang/ dbyibs dmarapo sha pa'i rlig 'bras tsam pa yun ring po bab bo// le tog 'dzoms pa'i sngags ni bru zhes bya

ba'o// de gcod par 'dod nan sku dang ka ki ma phyung ba'i bar 'a nyimar rer 'bab pas dbyung bar bya'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku la mchod pa dbul ba' bya'o// gsang sngags kyang dbu zhabs mnor bar rin po che 'brang ba brgya

rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// sku khrus gsol ba bdag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol lo// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ tshogs kyi bdag pos byed pa yin// phyag 'tshal dang la ldan tshogs bdag dgye//
0 phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan zhi khro che// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i le'u stabatsolnga pa'o//tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud
dngos grub 'byung bzhes byabalcogasaso// rgyagar gyi mkhan po dripo ka ra shAtshanas/ 'jig rten dngos grub ched du ni// rgyagar yul nas bsnams nas byon// rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas la btang/
nas rgyuda'adabasam pas sgrub pa yin///@#// rgyagar skad du/ khrimashAkA la targyu/ bod skad du/ dang lanagapo chen po'i rgyud/ dbang gi lha mchog sku la phyag 'tshal

lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gtsang na/ shar lho'idur khrod chen po hahadrag cudagod pa'i gnas shing tsan dan gyin gs kyi tshal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba ma ma yin phomo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du/ dpal nag

pochanaro zhes bya ba yin ya kalasogs dbakhor gdug pa can rnams kyi dbusan skya 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa nag po chen po zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ de'i tshade'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig

rtenakyikhamasan mthar byed rta'i rgyal po nas byab rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'a khor gyis bskor te/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas/ oMbadzrakro d+ha ha ya g+hi bgaM

sulusul my-igaM/ zhes brjod ng sa/ dur khrodadadadrag tudagodapa'i gnas niasanag po chen por nga dbang mad par mtha' byed rta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog snying po 'di mdongs gsol du phulaM
khaa badzam hA kA la hU~M trapi bi nA ya kahU~M hU~M phaT/ ces phul lo// dbala'am bo chen po ba rgyud las/ gleng gazhi'i le'u ste dang po'o/ltade nas rgyal po mig mi
bzagis/ mthar byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad cesazhesol to// omo pad+ma khros pa'i bdag nag po chen po drag shul con/ kas ba'i sgrubar bshad dugaso/ mgon po bsgrub bar bya ba gang// gsad cing lus
srog dbye ba dang/ mgrubashis bstan ba dang// mgon po'i rtags dang sar ba rnams// rta mchog chen pos bdag la gsol/ zhes zhus paso/ de nas pad+ma bros ba yis// nag po'i sgrub thabs ched du brjod//
mtshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sangs rgyas bastanang bsrung slad du// gza' skar tshes grangs gis gal// dur khrod lasogasashing gcig tu// bsod nams tshogs bsags byas la// nag po chen po//

bsgrub par bya// yungasa'amasanag dag la// stags bu gru bzhi byas nas ni// drismos khrag gis chag chag bya// dbus su grugasum zla gam ldan// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// dadabus bod chen nang duni// sha lngasnying

snasobargyan pa yi// gtor ma bshos bu phrug tshad// de lamada'agazugs dam nag dar// gri snying tsaka li yang gzugs// de nyid mgon bo'irtanadugazhag/ Da ma ru yi pags pa'i nang/ dmagon po'i srog sngags bribar

bya lte yanang du bla rdos grig/ spos dang rgyun gtor gtang bar bya// dkona mchog spyi la mchod pa bsham// danas pad+marab dag bsgoms la// thugs ka'i silas 'od 'phros pas// bla masangs rgyas la sogs pa//

rang gi mdun du bsam byas la// mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya/ namadag bdun gyi 'og tuni// tshadamadabazhi po bsgom par bya// btangasoms la sogs paM raM tri// bad stangs yi ge hU~Mlasani// nag po zhal gcig

phyag drug pa// gri gug 'phro ba Da maru// thod pa mdung dang zhags pa rnams// g.yasagayon ril bas bsnams pa'o// sbrul dang rin chen rgyun gyis brgyan// sku smad ba ti khra bo gsol// stag lpagasazhing ge
sham thams can// gtum kho sbyin gasumamachab gtsigs// dbral bar dri yi thig les brgyan// phyigatsug mi bskyodasprul sku bstan// de ltar bdag mdun gsal bsgoms nas// spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa

bya gtor ma dzal sogs pas// nag po tshel glinapar bya// mgon po'i thugs ka'i hU~Mlasani// srog gi yi go g.yas nas bsko// khor yug dag gis bzla bar bya// o badzram shA kA la klok+She trapid+d+haM bi nA ya ka hU~MhUM
phaT/ de skad cesani ba brjod pas// nag po grub pa'i rtags rnams 'byung// dpa' nagapo nabo'i rgyud las/ bsanacing sgrub pa'i le'u staganyis pa'o//de nas yang dag bishad byab//

sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig ba dang// rnal khyor bar chadabyed pa rnams// nag po chen pos bsgral 'dod na// stags bkru pen byas nas kyang// drag po e yin ng du ni// pho morabs chad thod pa'i nang// gzugs

ri spra tshil dag la bya// ming rus dgan bkodanas kyang// gsad dang nab skabs dang sbyar// mgon po'i sku dang dam rdzas rnams// kho dang kha ladagod bar bya// phag thodanang du thun rdzas blugs// rtag gtor rgyun gtor gay+Ya
dang ga yon/ gsang sngags 'di yisagasad par bya// oMbadzraa Akal k+ShitAbihU~Mb nA yaka hU~MhU~MT/ omahA kA lA ya shAsanau pa ha ri Nia kha a pash+tsam kA le sa yaM i daMrat+ta tra a pa ka

ri Ni ya di pra ti dzisma ra si tadairaM/ pya[%]kha kha khAhi khAhi/mA khamAr/ gro kr-iSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+hA/ han han/ da ha ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ nam kan dgra bo mA ra ya hU~MhUMphaT phaTaM/ hU~Mbi nA ya ka las bi hU~MhU~M dzas ma bub/

ya ka a mu ka bri srog hur thum dzamar lazed/ drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis brab/ zhag bdub du smra ma bya// de la rtags rnams rdzogs pa 'gyur// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lus srog dbu ba'i le'u
sta gsum pa 'o/// de nas yang dag bar bshad bya// lasamatha' sbyin sreg dmagis brtul// rgyugasum dbus sugadug nga 'iging/ dbus sunag po bakhor bcas bskyed// ling kagator ma
dmardzas rnams// nag po'i zhal du dbul ba@#// sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg pa// agi tshularaM las rdzogs// thalar rlung dmar dag la bskur// amut+tAnamyur durlag/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/
mthabartul ba'i le'u ste bzhapa'o///de nas yang dga bshad byab// de ltar bsgrubs kyang mgruban// gcig dang gnyis lanan tanabaskyad// de ltar byas kyang ma grub na// sa gsum
bgagasum dug gsum la// khrusang ba yigazugs kyitshad// glu gsum dbus su nag po'i gzugs// spyi tshar dag tulding du gzhug/ bris sku dmardzas bla ro rnams// rang gi gsum mal gyi 'og/ dug dang tsher mas

stazhasadagab// thunardzasakhrab cing sngags 'di bzlos// obadzra b+haha ya gri ba hAhulu yulu hUMphaT/ phaT hU~MhUMka yanAbihUM tAkye klu la kAm 'dzuo/ de skad brjod cing thun gyis brab// de la rtags rnams

rdzogs pa dang// de nas gso ba'i cho ga bya// khris sku blardodam rdzas rnams// spos chus bkru zhing sngags 'di bzlas//o bae shAkAl kyi kA tra bihUMbin la ka hU~MhU~MphaTasos sos sAk+ka/ de skad byas la gan
sun mgon po'i gzugs kyang spos chus bkru// gru gsum dbus su blangs byas la// dgrabo'i ngarasasnying khara gzhug/ zhag bdun bsgrubs ladagra libaskyal// amu ka ni myur du rlag/ dpal mgon po nag
po'irgyudalas/ mgruban sngogs pa'i chog dang gso ba'i le'u sulnga ba'o///de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bya nago 'phur zhing lding ba dang// mo nang a tsa ra dang ni// dgabashas ban d+ha

slob dpon dang// 'od dang sgra dang khang pa'i tsho// mgon po'i sku dag dngosasu mthong// dgra la dmag drangasasems can bsad// minag dag la snying stobs dang// mdzango dang ni sbrang po dang// byanag thung la
lhung ba 'byung// dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sar ba dbab pa'i las byan// mon namamadzacan thod pa ru//
khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris nas kyang// rigs lnga klu yis bon dgod// rtsibs mchanasar sranaming rus dang// yul du thob ces bya ba bri// de mthar 'khor la rtsibs dgul// dregs pa'i sngagasanibribar bya//
rgyab tuchung yin yul ming dang/ rlung gi snying po brib ga/ bdag nyid pad+ma khros par bsgom/ gsang sngags 'di yis gnad la bor// oM badzram hA kAl TIk+ka tAbihUM banaya ka[%]hU~MphaT/

ba nAg snying gzur/ bsu thug khog 'grilany+nyo/ de skad cesan brjod la// kungasakAratus nag skatshe dang// khrag dang dug gis thod pa brag/ lo'abrasarlung khyer rtags byung na// dgra ya la ril du dbab pa'i gru//
gal te bajig skan phung ko dpal mgon bo nag po'irgyud las/ sarab dbab pa 'ile'u ste bdun pa'o//de nas yang dag nges gsungasar// og 'khor 'dus ngomatshar can// ma
chos dam can sgrub byed na// dmatshig ' gnas sdom pa gzung// gtor ma dag la brtson par bya// dam rdzas blardo lus labasral// zhes gasus pas/ rgyal po mig mi bzang lasogs pa'i 'khor rnams
yi rangs nas/ nag po chen pos bstan ba srung bar khas blangs nasami snang bar gyur to// dpal nag po chen po rgyud las le brgyad ra rdzogs so// pa/ rgyagar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzradang/ bod
kyile tsa ba phur bu 'od kyis bsgyurab 'o// #// skyagar skad du/ Ar shAm hA kA lanam d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes ba'i gzungs/

sangs rgyas dang byang chub samasadapa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring bor ma

ma'ilen pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung nabazhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der legasasu lta'i sdod bon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag po/ mahAkA la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyuga'adu bang sgyur ba dpa la mgon po nag po chen pos
bcom ldan 'das kyizhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu bdug sta 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol/ nadabram sacad dang/ rims
thamasacad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ mi ngas thamasacad dang/ 'byung po thams cad dang/ nyes bar bsgoms bathams cad dang/zhes par bltas pa rnams steng dugazhana'athubadabad byed la thug pa man chad
bcing bo 'og tun sems can dmyal ba 'jug pa yan chad bcingago/ thud ka khol khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo// gzhan yang/ o ham A kal gnagu tasA hA/ namahI ma hA kA la gan du ti//
yAu0f10mo lo gnaNin/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la hile ki teki tani/ tsi tsi de ni sAh+pha/ 'dabaton pas gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/ dug gsum nad kyi smanapa/ rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog

shing/ rnala'abyor kun gyi dgralha/ bdud 'dul rnams kyidabang phyug/ srin po lang ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nasazlog pa/ lham yin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glogam snying rdul du rlog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan
bsrung bar khasaNasashing damathasaso// 'phags ba dpalamagon bonag bo zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs/
rims nad thamasacad las thar bar byed pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po chen po skyes bu gnagaseram ba rnon po/ mcheb chen po/ rims

[DI ]nad thams cad las rnam bar thapar byed pa brjod par bya ba sta/ phyogs gang dang gang dubaltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ han han/ rAdza d+hu tan/ dadad ha/ rAdzAd+hu ten/ btsa pa tsa ra dzA/
