d+hu ten/ gnyakra be ba shupa'ipAre/ bsub rigod+hane/ ipany+tsa ra tsan+tAlan/ han han/ o saMb+hanisaMg+ha/ shi ro mu'u/ tsak+ku muny+tsa/ sho dramuny+tsa/ g+ha Namuny+tsa/ dzihA mu'u/ kaN+Namany+tsa/ grub muny+tsa/ brit+tA muny+tsa/

kA Tika muny+tsa/ kukAmuny+tsa u rumuny+tsa/ dzanomuny+tsa/ halta muny+tsa/ bdomuny+tsa/ u0f00ga khya muny+tsa o gra pra t+yaMgamuny+tsa a bas ra/ ar+ya b+hAmuny+tsa/ gats+tsa dzAr mu to// bdag la sa hA/ odza lamA u0f00gu la hU~M/ sarba
dzA nanab/ 'phags nagab chen po'agazungs/ rimasand thams cad lasa rnam par thar par byed pa rdzogasaso// @#/smyugar gyi mkhan po pradza bamadang/ zhu chen gyi le tsal ban d+he ye shes
bos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//@#// rgya gar skadadu/ de bim hAkA linAmad+d+hAr Ni/ bod skad du/ lha monagamo chanamo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dang 'thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'disad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon bzhagan byang chub kyi shing drung
na bzhugs so// de nas 'dodang 'a khams kyi dbang phyugam bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mnag chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das la lha monagamtshan mos gsol pa/ btsunab bcom ldan bdas kyi zhabs la phyaga'atshal ba'i rig pa 'di'abulan/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/

denas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcamamo lha mo'agamo chen mos stong du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chadabacing ba'abya'o// 'og tunasems can dmyal ba la

thug pa lan chadabacing bar bya'o// thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni'i la thug pa tshun chad bcing bar bya'o// de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM ru ru bi tiSh+Tha ba tosaM ru ru ro ru pa tit+tabA to sa sAhA/ 'di

bton pas rims dang/ nad dang/ mi ngas dang/ nyes bar b ltas pathams cad dang/ mdzad ng/ phol mig dang/ g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sAhA/ lha mo nagamo chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs
ka@#// rgya gar skad du/ ya ba kAl phramanAdza tan ka la/ bod skad du/ dpal lha monag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'irgyud/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi

mag bdag dbalaphyag na de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dusagacig na/ rirab kyi rtsomo tshub 'gyur gyi tshal chen bon/ bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na rdo rdzolus bskal ba'im ltar
'barab/ srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/ nyim stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so// 'khor nib byin dang/ sha bo dang/ srin po dang/ ma mo'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis

ba bskor te bzhugs so// de'i tshonadapal phyag na rdo rdzobad+ma'igadan la gzhugs te bka' stsal pa// 'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin sna brgyud nyon cig/ 'dodapa'i khams 'di bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i sring

zhi mo zhes bya ba rgyalatshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ khyed kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig/ bstod pa kyisashig/ ngas kyang khyad 'byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal ba dang/ 'khor

gyin ng nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan las langs te/ dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i smonas bstod pa// sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol na//dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher sbyangs nas//lam gyi khyadapagong

mar brdzogs kyang// mtho ris skyes gnas rnams la dge bcu yi// tshul gyis dona mdzad phyirolabasgyur ba yi// dpal ldan lhamo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas// sku tshe

ring zhing gzugs byad phun sum tshogs// gzhan gyi lanachagasaganodapa'i rkyen dang ldan// 'chibadago'ajoms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma byin lenapa'i tshul la rab sbyangs pas// bsod nams tshogs kyis

longs spyod phun sum tshogs// gter gyi longs spyodami 'gri'u rab brtan bas// sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams sra ba dang// mngalagyigrong khyer dman las rnam

para'aphags// srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste// dge sbyong chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs brdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnamasminagyis// gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso// gsung mchog

mdag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te// bden par gsungab khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrama'i skyon spangasami phyed 'khor dang ldan// nyid la rnam par 'dul ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// lha dang lha minabadenang/sa 'dula mdzad m//

dkar mo'i 'khor tshogs khyodal phyag 'tshal bstod// ga 'khyal spyasaba'i yon tanaspyin pa yis// ting 'dzin rtse gcig migamobar chad spyas// dgos 'brelatshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma// byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod

la phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal kheras sems sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis// bab tshig 'jam lhamodabyangs snyan// tshig rtsub gshiba'i gnyen po byed pa ste// ngag rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang sem

brnabasams spus pa'i khyadapani/ 'dzin ba'i rnam rtog rnam paspyasapa'i rtags// bdag med rtags susang ges rnab brgyan// brnabasems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung ba'i yul gnod sems rnam par

spangs// phyi rol yul 'jiganyis mdachos su gzugs brnyan khyod// gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags// sprul gyi rna rgyan can la phyaga'atshal bstod// log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnam spangs te// sangs

rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'igazugs brnyan khyod// de lta rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can// spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshol bstod// 'jig rtan 'din las gnyis ga ma dag/ mdag mi dge bcu las n gnas ong grub//
dgaba'i gab bculasamathorosagrub// lasa'adi dage bdang por rab spyas pas// gong nas gong ma'is la rab gnasakyang// dgobcu'i rtagasadamanapa'izhiba'adIbastan// gdug pa'i tshul can

'grob badrena mdzad ma// bstod pa ba'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/// da nasadapal lha mo nag mo tshan la/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnamathosasras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa// dam pa/

rnams kyisabagrod pa'i khyad par ni// tshogs kyis sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis// gnyen po shes rim par sgom pa la// mthar phyin b lagshegs pa'i don mchog lags// de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan 'adan/

'diltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te// dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab bsags pas// dang po sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzinabanyis// rab tudagababa'is don dmani// rnam par mi rtog skya mang tshul gyis gzigs//

dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par// rang mas sa gnyis dag la rab brten nas// de bzhin sagasum dag pa'i pha rolason// rangasams bzhipa'is la cher bsgoms pas// lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son//

gsems jug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas// bdun pa lani thabs kyi pha rol son// rang sems brgyad ba nyid la char bsgoms pas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid// dgu ba la yang stobs kyi pha rol sgrub//

de yi stobs kyis ye shes 'phen bar 'agrub// 'di dag rnam par rdzogs pa byas nas ni// sangs rgyas pa la sminaba'i smon lam can// sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma// 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston cing//

gdugab 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grubashes// de nas mi 'amaci'i rgyalapo ljon pa rta mgo can gyis// dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo
nasabastod pa// dpal ldan lhamoganyis sumed pas// don dam sprosabral chos nyid 'di las btsal// don dam kun rdzobaganyis su med pasabaden// 'khor ba myang naganyis su med pas zab// sems can s sargyas/
gnyis su med pas 'phags// las dang rnam sminaganyis su medabasabastod// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis mdang sa smin// yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi ngang// spos dang spros medadon dam dbyings kyis
bsdus// bsod nams yashes gnyis medatshog sachen te// mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod// bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ningang tshul gcig/ gzung dang 'dzin paganyis mud zab mo'i mthu// mtho ris

dranaso gnyis bral dag ba'i zhing// bzang nganaganyis mdarangabazhin gcig gis bstod// bskyang mad rdzogasapaganyis mang lhun grub mchog/ sems dang phung po gnyis mang sems nyid de// sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis/

med grub pa'i ngang// bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchogagacig gis bstod// yab dang yumamakha'aganyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don/stong dang mi stong gnyosamang zhiba'i ngang//

gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis mdabarjod pa med pa'i ngang// lus ngag gnyis mdasems nyid gcig tshul// rtsol byed rtsol byaganyisamed donagacig pas// rnam par spros med don dam dbyings
kyis bstod// mu stags sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas// dbyings dang rig pa gtes ma donartogs te// srid dang rnam grol yang dagudon gcig pas// thams cad gnyis mad skul

phyag 'tshalabastod// phyid nangamadaganyis medagacig gi ngang// sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul// snang dang mi snang gnyis med zhacig gis mthong// gnyis mdaden mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di
dag rnams ni donadam zab mo'itshul// spros pa med pa'idon dang 'brel ba ste// 'di rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal// 'diltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog// de tshada'i dus na dritha'i

rgyal po zur phud lnga pas/ dpal lha mo la 'phrin las kyi sgonas bstod pa/ sems nyid 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i khyad pa ni// sems nyid gdan mad cing sems kyang med// don dmaspros bral kha dogagazugs kyang

med[}]kun rdzob sgyum tsam du rang gi sams// 'thun par bstanapa'izhibadabal lha mo// zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// zhiba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gcomonaM// rtags kyi skumadog dkaramo shAn tumadang

kun chuzhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dgra dang nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// mthunapar bstan pa'i rgyas pa'idabal lha mo// rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshulatsan// rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis
bskobagatsogon// rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjod// na ra rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzad// mthun par bastan pa'i dbang gi dang la
lha mo 3dbang mdzad dabang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can// dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtseme ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dmar po shan brjid// kun chudabang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
bdag gind dang dgra rnams dabang du mdzod// mthunang ra bstan pa'i drag po dpa' lha mo// drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can// drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gce mo ni// rtags kyi sku
mdoganagamo shin tubarjid// kun tu drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag pos sod// khyod kyi rang bzhin ci yang ma grub la/ ltar 'dzin nyid cir yang snang bo
ni/ 'phrinalasa rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad ba lags// bdag kyang las bzhirangabazhin lhun grub nas// khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtsonapar shog// de nas dang la lha monag mo la/ klu'i rgyal

bo dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstodapa/ gsang sngagasarnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma// yon tana rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir// rtags phyag rgya 'di ltar
bstananga'o/ khamasagasum gdul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon// mya ngan mi 'dra'i rtagasasu lcags sgrog mnga'// bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan// gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir ldes dkris//
byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas gsal// shesarab rtogs phyir lteb nyims brgyan// dugagasum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang// bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan na bu lebasnams// dbang drag
rdzogs phyir ral pa khamanag sngag/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir no dpal mchebagatsigs// 'khor pa lcags la bstar phyiradakanasgra 'debs// gdug pa zhe la gnyen phyir sdang mig bgrad//
thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyanatsadamar/ goms pa'i tshog sa mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ mamo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// sku gsung thugs rtags phyag rme kha Tu gsol// sku gsum
rdzogs byed thod pa'i 'phrang bas brgyan// drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshub mas brgyan// nyonamongasasrog phyirame phunganang nabazhugs// 'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs 'du shing la brtan//
lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi dka' bzlogs// dpa' brtan brtan phyir stag gi sham thabs mnabs// bstan pa srung phyir dragamo'achalugs rdzogs/ nga rgyal dbang sdud bdagamed sgra sgrogs phyir// thabs

kyisan mgayas pas nagags brgyan// zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab sun chagayonapa sbol gyis brgyan// bdu byadami rtag rtags su dril bu sgrogs// chags phyir rngam mdzad rak+ta'i

rba klong 'thung// dam tshig srung phyir zhing lcags rgyan du mdzad// thadad las rnams 'dul phyir rmabya'i 'phrul// nyonamongasasgrib pa'itshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas// yeTashes rig rapa'i tshog sa rnams shar ba'i
phyir// rang bzhin gnasa mchogabyang shar mtshams brtan// dbu ma'is la gnas phyir dre bu zhon// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir mi yi tshul// mkha' 'gromamo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/[]

baTha grul bum gyi rgyalaposbrul mgo dgu pas// dbal lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ domadamaganyisamed byang chub sems min yang// srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya// rangasams rnam dag/

dragakho'igazhal yas khang// rak+ta khrag gi mtsho'akhyil ba las// keng rus thod 'phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan// sumadog gnag larab 'jigs khromo rgyal// sngonamoral pa 'dzings pa'isprul 'gyur ba// sku yi sal
ba dpal ldan n ma// khru gsum saranag zhal gyi dbyingasasu bzhengs// yon tan rgya mdzad seramamakha' la bzhad// 'phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod// gsugi sprul ba dpalaldan re ma ti/
gragasumadamar nag zhal gyi byings nas bzhengs// daa mo chen mo dam chen gtumaas// dbang gi 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgyamachom// dragapo 'joms
mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// 'grojug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyis// bstan pa rgyas mdzad m la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byon gyis rlobs// de

nas dpal lha mo la/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyis donadam ba'i sgo nas bstod pa/ spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang// thugs kyi thugasa mchog rnamadrag bden pa'i las// gdod nas gnyis med

nam mkha'i snying po ni// dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhinakhyad par gsal// 'diltar rnam dgabarjod med ngo bo la// byis pa rnams kyibastod pa byed pa ltung// blun po rnams kyis dngos bor rab brtags nas// gzugs
[7 ]@#// ma tshul dugangazhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i don lasazhugs chudakhyod nyid la// tshig dang yig sgo nas bstod pa rnams// nams kyang grol bar 'agyur ba'i chos nyid min/ gdod nus/

pa gnyis madabad chanamagatogs pa// khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrulal// don dubazung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams/ khyod la brtenanas thams cad btub par 'gyuraM// gang zhig skyo ba med ba shes
bar ng gdod nasagasamad snying bo bsgromanusan// gang zag des nakhyod tid bstod pa yin// khyod kyigazugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis// bskal pa grangasamed bdas par rab bltas kyang// khyod kyi
gzugs dang 'doga mthong inug/ gang zhig gzugs sus 'dzin rnams kyisa mthong/ sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyis// khyod ni bos kyang bskal pa ramithosate// 'di dag sbas pa'i rnal 'byor de
yisagi/ khyod kyang bos 'de yang khyod kyis thos// gang zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod sgrub pa'i// blun po de yisanams kyang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs pa'i samasakyis khyodamachod nas// mchod

nadangosagrubade yisagaterathob 'gyur// khyod ni rgyal bamang bo'i yon tan sdur// chos dbyil na rgyal rnams dang mol// zabam dbuma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir// mimajed 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir//

phyil tshul gyis thams cad badrena mdzad// khyod kyi skunibadiltar rab bgesang// sgrib bamang bo stong nyid ngang du gshegs// stong nyidadam pa stong pa yang dag khyod// stong paganyisamad shesang rnams kyis
0 bstod// 'diltar b stodan bstod bar bgyuragrangs pas// khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang// byis pa drang phyir don 'di ltar bstod/// de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal bo rdo rje gsar
migacan gyis// dpal lha mo la bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i don// thabs kyitsho'abruganam mkha'amakha' la spyod/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprul ba khyod nyid la// sgo gsum rdul snyed
dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// bdagagis khyod ni mchod pas mabasgribs kyang// dbal ldan dngos grub dam pathob bya'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i yon tanamakha' la char babs pas// mchodaba'i tshogs
'dasadabang po rgyal gyur cig/ dpal ldan khyod ni dag sdig bdag po ste/ bdag gi lus ga yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs// khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa/
byabamadzod// khyod kyi khyad par yongasasu 'phags pa ni// 'groba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs/ dgaba'athun phrag dog med pa'i sprosaragi/ rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul// 'di ltar
yon tanaldan pa'i sku mchog gi/ nagasobazangamo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu'adus gsum kun tu 'gro don la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskur bar spobs// yang dag khyod kyi yon tan/
sku mchogazhi gdug pa 'dul zhing bstanababasrung ba'i phyir// sems can zad pa'i m rgyurab r dun// myang nama'ada' bzhugs parogasol ba gdab// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang/
@#//rjes su mi'angs bskul zhing gso btags// dge ba 'di yis n gnas ong stongs gyur te// thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen khor ba so// de nas dbal

ldan lha mo nag mol/ nam mkha'i lhaphran rnams kyis bstod pa/ bskal pa ma ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// rlung nag dgu pa'i klong 'khyil bo brang nas/ macig 'dod pa' khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ bdud kyi
yum lag ni rdzob lcamagacig ma// dpal ldan lha mo re ma ti// nagamo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can// mthing nag gcer bu brag gi ral ba ca// khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni// don dam dbyis
kyi skyod ba mdaba'i rtags// dbu skragams nasagulon du'akhyil ba/ lam kha ba lasprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbu gtsug ral ragatsaka rtsa'akhyil ban/ don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i
rtags rab pa'i gsab nas me stag 'phrob// thugs sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags// dalabod rlon 'phreng ba bcings bani// thugs rje'i sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags/ g.yA

naseng ge 'gying zhing mchod ba ni// smanamo thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// g.yonan sprul mgo gdengs ka'aphyar ba ni// zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtogs// spun chagasar gyi dril bu'akhrol ba
ni sas rgyas kun la son sgrub byed ba'i rtags// spyan dmar pasdang mig bklad pa ni// srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags// zhal gyi drag bo hom khung gdongs bani/ bstan pa 'jig
ba'i lasgrol ba'i rtags/ rdzogadug mcheb zur gsum gtsigs ba ni bsgral ba'i zhing ba dus la sgrol ba'i rtags// sku la zhing snag sa g.yang gazhi gsol ba ni sa pa ba bas/
yang dag chos rang don dam ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen ko rlon snams byed dkris pa'i/ thug pa mchog gi donadang ldan pa'i rtags// reldan g pos snams phyadang kris ba na// 'jig rten 'di na che btsan
ldan pa'i rtags// lte ba'i khung nas nyim ba char bzhi// sdug bsngal rgya mchog ting nas skamasaba'i rtags// spyi bo'i gtsu gnas zlab bachab// dug gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags// zhabs la dbang
gi lcagasasgroga'akhril ba/ thabs dang shes rab zung du 'bral ba'i rtags// phyag g.yasashang lang nag po bsnams pa na// sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// phyag g.yon thod rlon dag chen

bzung ba ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags// bong bu gar phyin phyogs zhon ba/log par lta ba'i somasatsan sgrol ba'i rtags// srinapo'i ag mas snga ru byas pa na// srin yul lang ka
bu ngas 'dul ba'i rtags/ sbrul nag rkun pos kor med byas khagi/ zhesnang dbang gis dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i rtags// rus sbal nag mo'i thob du btang ba// klubadudanag po dam la btags pa'i
rtags// sngashagayas babadud kyi khram bam// dmatshig nyamasal khram la 'debs pa'i rtags/ shar nad kyi rgyal kha btagasaragi/ bstan pa 'di la gnod ba'idagra// nad ka 'babs sha'i
thubya// dam kha bsgyur ba'i rtags// don dam bdudakyirtags suzhagakhoras btang// chugs rje chags pa'i rtagasasu rak+ta'i thig les brgyan// 'dul byed 'phrin las rtags su thal ba'i
mtshan ms gdag mcho'abumakhris khran du kholabani// khams gsum khyab par 'phrin lasa mdzad pa'i rtags// ma cig khas me 'bar rgya mtsho skams// rdo rje 'phyar bas gi batshog saro 'phan//
bdag gisabatsunabasalhakho khyod la bstod/// de nas yabashashin nag khosadabal lha mo la chab 'i yon tan7sgo nas bstod ba/ g+hakho dpal ldan m khab 'gronag mo khyod la// rgyunadu til

mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig m ste/ bonya rnams bskyengs shing malugs mang po khachang byed m// rgyan du skur sgrog lcags la byas kha gcig gis rkang ba mdzes par brgyanar sta// mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas

gro ba de ninag mo khyod nyid yin b shog/ral pas bdaganyid mdzes par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtshon don dge su yis shes// bakhor ba 'jig ba'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag dub 'thul ban//

nagamo mchab mibaslad khyod kyi zhal du'agrokun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur// lhatsholag na'athor thogasab khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrodadagyes// khyodanagayog bcasamya ngan
mad cing 'tshiba'i 'jigs pa ma ra par drilabu'i sgra la sgrogs// khyod ni dba' bo dag gi mgo bcad g khul du mtshonagyis bsadag gi/ mgo'abrang lag nathogs shing gar stabasabaskor zhing lag pa brkyang

bskum che// rkub tshos chel klu dbang gshibs pa'i skags bcis shang laganamadungadang ni// bdanathogs shang khragagi chang gsar myos de mig rtsa dmar bor byas// mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni 'byung

bo phalachen kun gyis mthong// rkang ba'i gos korlon mtshan basarlas pas snams kyi phyed na de rjes dkris// mi yi rgyum gsar pas zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing khrag zhag tshom bus thig les brgyan// mi shasosar/

cham chom bra yin mi ri'icod panamago la brgyanapa ste// bdag la skyob pa'i dragamo misha thogs khyod sn gnas ma mthong gzoda mthong an// bdud dang srin mo mamo rnams kyang mig rtsa rigarig sngangs shing khyod la 'dud//

lhamo bzangamo lus madog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la na// brgya byin sogs kyis bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud// lha rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams 'jug phyi

rab bculabs na nab yagacig la// brang gis 'gro ba sprul mgo gdengs ka stong dang ldan zhing phud sgrogs gcig gis brgyananas rgyun du byas// yagacig lanas nig ge mtshungs mdu thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor

zhing gzhi gnon pa'i snying gin// phyogs nas rgyuba'i nyimaM zlag lha mo khyed kyi rked nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon// rgya mtsho glong nas 'bar nu rnams skams par byed pa nus nga'i bud mad thamA

cad zhi mdzad ma// lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka'abazlag naagamo mind phyugs nad kun la 'jigs pa med// macig dang ldan lhamo khyed nyid la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstodapa/
byabyad bgyis/ de nas dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la// bram ze mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod ba/ ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo// jorjelha monag mo che//
mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ bdagagis btsun par khyod bstod kyis// bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas// yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags// ma mor grags shang 'jig rten skyong/

dba' rtuladrag spyod brtson 'grusatshe 'thab g.yul las rtag turkyal// gshin N+Di'i sring mo yin par bastod// gos su da gosasngon po gsol// sdug dang mi sdugachalugs 'chang// spyan mig mthong na mi sdug
kun tu sdang// dadacing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud// re bag ri bragazab mo'i gnas// re'agab tshal dang shi la gnas// re 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas// lha mo'i gnas rtenade ru'acha'// gnas de ri dang/
tshab dgon du// rtag tulha mo khyod bstod na// de yi dgongs pa skong bar byed// bdag gis rtag tu bstod byas na// bdagagi bsamab grub par mdzod// rmabya'i sgro la rgyal mtshan byas// gang zhig rtag
bstan srung bar byed// gnag lug phyugs rnams 'bal bar byed// sangag stag dang spyang ki yis// rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang// rdo dril chen snyan par sgrogs// byin te dril chen snyan par sgrogs//
lana'aga' 'gan tigAl thogs/[0f38]khagab nyi zla'i mtshon 'bul// ma gyi tshes dgu bcugacigan// de yis dus su mchod byas na// lha mo khyod las lhag pa med// bdud 'dul lhamin srin mor ston// dgra

dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed// bud mad nang na mchog yin te// tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra// rgyal bo'i baban pad+ma'adra// zhalabazang zlobanyab 'dra// tshul rgal nagru zam 'dra// 'phos po rnams kyi

gany+dzanabashes 'dra// lhadang lhamin g.yul 'gyed tshe// lha mo khyod kyi lte ba// lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas// lhadamag dkar po rgyal bar byas// lhamayin rnams pham par byed// lagan mdung dmar chems
so chem// ru mtshonabadanam ltar 'bar// dgra 'dulag yul bzlog khyed la bstod// de nas drang srong chen po ko'u di rgyas/ dpal lhamo la dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa// 'jig rten gtso la
rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nanganakhyod ni rtag tu mchog yin te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod// byed bzhin sdugams kun gyis blta bar mos// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab
brgyan// mig yangs 'das skyes sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod nams ye shes snang bklags pas brgyan// dparan rin thang mang ba'i nor bu 'dra// deng bdag pad+mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang// sems la
bsams ba thams cad bagrub bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes kyanem bkra shis pa// pad+ma lta bur ni rnam par dag/ lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/ mtshan ma yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan//
drimed ye shes kun nas rab mdzes pa// dran pa rnams kyin nas mchog tugyur// ji ltar sengashegacan gzan mchog gyur bzhin// sngags bstod tshig ni 'dilas 'byung ba ni// bsam ba'i dngos po thams cad
khagrub bar shog/ ces bstod de// gdenas dbal phya gzhu rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsalal/ khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so// da yang bstod
ba 'di dagagadan sgoms shig/ yid la rtagar zlogashagi/ lhamo 'di la bstodapanang la bstod pa yin/ gsargyu sa thams cad la bstod pa yin no// lha mo da dag kyang mi bde srung bar byed do// skyob par
byed do// ci'adod pa'i dngago grub star lozhes bka' stsal ba dang/ 'khor de rnams rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rgyan gyi char chen bo phabanas so so'i gnas su 'khod do// bstod
ba'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs sog@#// rgyagar skad du Idiwi kA li asha ta ka/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo' mtshan bargya rtsa brgyud pa//
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dba' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dusagacigen/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po ri'i bzhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang nub
somasadapa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do// de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas naso bcom ldan 'dasakyi spyan
sngaraphyogasagacig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dba'as dbang chen po sogakhartson 'grus so/ bcom ldan 'adas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin
ma'achalags kyis 'jig rten pa'i dona mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la dgongasazhas/ dpal lha monag/
molagazigs te 'di skadatsos gsungs so// thos bsam sgomal cher gnas pa'i// 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can// 'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog/ dbal ldan lha mo nag mo 'phags// byang

chub sems dpa' sprul ba sta// saltar snyan pa'i gzhir gyur pa// yon tanasdud byed chudir 'dra// byang chub smin byed mi ltakhu// dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo// shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste// khyodazhi
'phyur chen po 'dra// 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod// bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i// las dang rnam sminadag la mkhas// nga rgyalagazugs kyis 'dul bgoms// shes rab snying
rdzo'i lam du 'gro/ khyod nibal pa bzang lta bu// dpalan yid bzhin norabu'i chu/ kun l phanapa'i dpag bsam shing// nyi ma 'drab khyod lags l// zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhig/ ming mi

bong rwa dang 'dra/ lagi rgyur ni' bor ba 'dra// u dum ba ltar khyod dkon yang// bdud rtsi lta khul yongs tshim mdzad// 'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags// rang bzhin med pa'i tshos kyang ston// chudang nam
mkha'i tshubal ltar// gdul bya'i sridagasum cis kyang 'dul// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong// dam pa rnams dang yang dag gcig/ dam po rnams kyi lam du 'gro// lha momamo gnod sbyin mo//
grinamoklu mog ba mo// bdudalo 'khyung logrulakhum mo/ dragamo rngam chu'aglog 'gyur ma/ rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma// mkha' 'gro gtumamo zhing sgrol ma// zhi rgyas dbang dang
drag khos 'dul/ dkarasalcanganag dmar gang ston// rnam par brgyad kyidabyibs kyang byung// 'grob dragakho'itshul yang ston// phung po lnga yabarjod par nus// dbang po tshimakhyad lul lnga bar ston//
rtenaci'abrelapa'i spyod pa mkhas// yul can rnams zhigasod ma lags// de bzhin dgra rnams gasodapa dang// lus can rnams zhigasod la brtson// sems nigasodab mad la mkhas// 'khor ba las
ni ring song/ de bzhin gshegasapas lung bstan te// byang chub sams dpa'i mtshan rnams dang// 'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal ldan m// dam chos 'dzin ba rnams l byams// o AhU~Mrab kA'i

sam latsha/ (kanicha 'am sAhA/ ming brgya rtsa brgyadaganga'adzinam// yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang thob// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su mi skye zhing// byol song skyes bs klogasami

'gyur/ lus 'aphagasakanasas myas pan// thog lasogs pa mi 'bab cing// sgra snyan du rlung gis min// de bzhinib glang spyod du yang// chu dang rlabs kyis 'khyer ma nus// kham bu'i gling du kang skyes ga
snachogs gnod pas nyon mi 'gyur/ bdod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang// skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur// bsam gtan bzhi yi skye gnas su// tshad med bzhini'aphel bar 'gyur// gzugasamed gnas
khabo yang// don medanani'i skye ste// 'dushesamadaparanamasakyang min// 'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su// khamasagasum tshul bdag don spyod// rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur//
sems 'dzin bza byed do// nyonamos rtsa bdug bo dang// de bzhin nyeb nyi shurang// mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyug/ bskal pa thas medam bor song// ma khom brgyadaduskyo mi 'gyur// chu

stogasartsod pa bzlog pa dang/ chu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing// tshoring nad mad dbaladang ldan/ sdug bsngal bskal ba mang bor yang// nams kyang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing// myang ngan bdas pa thob bya'i
phyir/ nyan thos sa rnams ston ba dang// rtenababrel bcuganyis shes par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni// rab dga' drimad 'od byed 'phro// sbyang dka' songona'agyur rang du song// mi g.yo
legs pa chos kyi sprin// sangs rgyas sachen rlanamad// bcuganyis po yang 'thob 'gyur te// kun tu bod dang bdud rtsi'i 'od// nam mkha'i 'od dang rdorje'i 'od// rin chen pod dang pad+ma'i 'od//
las kyi 'od dang dpe medas// dpal ldan s dang shes rab 'od// thams cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste// bduganyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang// 'di byungan myur du thob// sa rnams m thob bar
du yang// 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang// shes rab snying rjeldan gyur cing// chos la dga' ba rnams kyis srung// dngos grub thob ste de bzhin gshegs// rin chen lasubyung thob ba 'gyur//
dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang// dpal ldan stsalonag mo yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyadagang 'dzin pa// yon tan brgyartsa brgyar thob ste/ sku gsung thugasan grub nas kyang// khams
gsum chos kyi rgyalapo gyur// zhes gsus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ded gdang/ dbal ldan lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la rjes su yi
rang zhing mngon par bstod do// dpal lhayonag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyadab lonAtanarang bcasapa rdzogs so/ @#// lha'i dbang po brgyabyin gyis bstod pa//
dus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang// bdod chags zhe sdang gtimugagasumakyi rgyus// sdig min las grub lha dang lha ma yin// dmyalatshog sal ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'dir/ sha khrag dmar la rol
ba'i lha mo khyod// lha yigayul ngo rgyal bgazhalaches las// lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod/ ces bstod do// rdzogs so//@#// dkon mchog

gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang

ldan b 'phags panam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ badzramakhu/ ban+d+habarje/ badzamabu bud d+hadze shun+ya tA pra be she/ pe rotsan gany+nyo/ baspyodri la/ a ba bo d+ha na sA hA/ chog ni rtag tu bzlas
brjod byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas ba thosara'agyur ro// bdud thams cad dang/ dgrathams cad dang/ log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// bachib 'bags pa 'od dpag
mda mthong bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegasab thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dba'asam dpa' chen po thams cad kyang mathobar 'gyur ro// ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du skyobar 'gyur/
lcogasaso// khyo/ o badzaA yu hU~Ma/ 'bags batshedapag med kyi snying po 'dirtag tubazlasaam/ sngags chab kyis dbang bskur mtshonur bar 'gyuyo//
u0f00du byedu man+tapa/ apa rami ta A yur tse nasaMbaro tsa tis/ 'a (@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa rimi ta A yuradza namAm mahAyAn sU tra bod skad du/
'thags tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med zhas byab theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdi skad bdagagis thos pa dusagacigano/ bcom ldan badag

mnyan yod na 'dze ta'i tshalamagonamed thas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na/ ragaslong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyidage slong gi dge 'dun chen podang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bu dum yong thabs
cig tubazhugs so// de nas maldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dbal gzhonanu gyur ba la bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal staragiphyogasana'ajig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tumed ba la sogasal zhes bya ba zhig
07 @#/ yod da/ den dbazhi gshegasapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa ngashan ta rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/

tsha'adzin cing tshe mthar phyin bar bzhes te/ samasaca rnams la chos kyang ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams nitshathung ba las tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste//
dedagalas kyang ba'achor dusam yin pa'i chiba' bstanato// 'jam dpal sems can gang dag dbazhinagashogs patshe dpag tumad pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa longs subarjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
grangasa'adi lagir badri'am/ yigarab dur 'jugagam ming tsam yang nyan tam/ klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyimama'achang bar byed dam/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba

rgyu rnams kyis mchod bar 'gyur ba de dgagi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshale brgya thub par 'gyur// 'jam dang lasems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpagatumed bshani ta rnam par nges pa gtsi brjid kyirgyal po'i mtshan

brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur ba de dag gi tshibang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag tshobrad kar mtshan 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe'ang rnamapar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas rigs kyi bu ma/

ba gsakyi ba mo dang bar 'dod pa de rag/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tumad pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ ya gi' 'dri'am/yi ge 'dire bajuganade dgag yon tanadang legs par 'gyur ba 'di dgago/

onamo lhag ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su binaM ita te dzor dzAya/ ta thA ga tA ya ad+ha tesamyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ya bu rtsemahApa tshe a ba ri mi ta pu N+ya a pa ri mi ta puN+ya dz+nyAnasaM b+hA ro pa// oM sa

saMskal pa ri shud+d+had+haglugagan samudag te swa b+ha ba bshu mnyan ya pa ri bAre swAhA/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgyartsa brgyad po 'di dag gangala' zhig yig 'dri'am/ yi ger rIb 'jug gam/
glegs bam 'bris te khyimana'achang ma/ klog par gyurapa de'i tshibradar las tshel rgya thub par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig/

rten gyi khams yon tan ra gtumar pa la sogs par skyo bar 'gyur/ oM namo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ra mi ta A yur dzanasubini'i tate dzorAdzA sa/ tathAg tA ya arta tesamyakasaM bud+d+hA ya// tad+ya thA/ o ba

pu khyimahApu N+ya a pa ri ta pu N+yaa pa ri mi tapu ts+tshadzAn saMb+hAropatsitaM/ oMsam+basaM skur parishud+d+had+him+mate ga ga nasaud ga tasub+hA ba shud+d+he sa hAn ya ba ri pUreswAhA/ yang de'i tshesangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu

rtsadagasadagos ba gcig dang dbyangs gcig gsitshadapag tu med pa'i mdo sde bdagasungs so/ on mo b+hagab te/ aparimi teAyuradz+nyA na su bi ni ta tedzo rAdzAya/ tathug tu sa adzatisaphyag saM bud+d+hA ya/

tad+yathA/ oM pu N+yabu tsamahAbu ts+tsaaparimi dpu N+ya a ba ri mi ta pu N+yanasaM b+ha ro pa tsitaM osat+'asaM skar b.rishud+d+had+ham+matagag na sa mudag taswa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ham na ye b.risA re swA h+pha/ yang debi sangs rgyas khyab
phrag brgyadanurtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tumad pa'i mdo sde 'dagasusaso// oM namo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur nas pan spyitate dzorAdzA ya/

tathAg tul ad+ha tes myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ o du skyob rgyam hAmu mya a pa ri mi ta pu N+yaa ba'i mi ta pu N+ya dzAnasaM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oMsam+basaM sku rab rishud+d+had+ham+ma te ga ga na sa mudag tas b+hA ba bi shu snyom ldan pa pa'i bla
ra sAhA/ gang de'i tshogs rgyas byi ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyang sagacigs tshadabag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'degasas so// onaob+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta kU luratshanas bta

tedzomadzA ya/ tathAg tu la arta tas mya ka bud+d+hAya tar+ya zla obu N+ya bu tshemasApa skye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya a pa ri mi ta pu N+yatshunasaM b+ha ropatsite/ e sadz+dzasaM sku yang ri shud+d+han+tam+mateg pa na samud ga te swa b+ha ba shud+dem hUM

nam pa'i 'i sAhA/ yang de'i tshisangs rgyas bye ba phragadrug cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gtsug dang dpyang sagacig gis tshe dang ga tu med pa'i mdo sde bdagasungagaso/ on molhag ba te/ a pa'i m ta A yur dza nasu ba

spyi tatadzomadzAya/ tathAg tu ya an tesamyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya k+Sha o bu N+ya bu ts+tshamahApa myaa pa ri mi tabu tshe a pa 'am tapa tshun saM g+ha'o pa tsi te/ oM sam+basaM sarapa rishu d+ham+martaga gnas mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi

dbud+d+himahAn ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshosangs rgya sa khyi ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgos ba gcig dang dbyang sagacigagasitshadapag tumed pa mdo sde bdagasungs so/ onamo b+hagab te/ a par mi ta a yur dzAn

ca00 su yi ta te dzo rAdzaya/ tathA ga tA ya artasamyakasaMbud+d+hAl/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+yabats+tsham hA gu skye a ra 'am ta pu N+ya ang rim ta pu ts+tshadzA nasaM b+ha'o ba tsita/ oM sam+b+hasaM sku ra nga gi shaN+Dad+hamadeg gnasaud ga te

sAb+hAb bi shud+d+hem hAn ya ba 'bare swA hA/ 5dngade'atshosangs rgyas bye ba phragababcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyang sagacig gis tshe dpag med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsus so// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa'i mi ta

A yur dzan su bzhita te dzor dza ye/ ta thA ga tAyas te samyaka saMbud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o bu N+ya bu skye ma hAbu mya a ba ra mi tapa skye a pa ri mi ta pu ts+tshadzAn saMb+ha ro pa tsati/ o sad+d+has sa ra pa ri shud+d+had+ham+mate ga gnas

mudag te swab+hAb rishud+d+himahAnas pa'i ga'i sA sh+tsa/ yang deb tshosangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis dgongs bgacig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsusaso/ oM namo b+hag ba ta/

a pa ri mi ta A yur dzan su bi nita tedzorAdzAya/ ta thA ga tA ya arda te samyakasaMbud+d+hAya/ tad+yathA/ oM pu N+yamu skye ma hAbu lce a pa rimitabu skye a pa ri mi ta pu N+yatshunasaM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sargyusaM skar ba ri shud+d+ha

d+hats+tshategagan samudag te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+hem hAn la pa ri pAr sAhI/ yang deb tshisangs rgyaso byel braganyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis dpag tu med pa'imades 'di gsungs so// tshon mo

b+hag pa te/ a ba rimi ta A yur dzan subanita te dzorA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ag+ha te samyaka saM khut+tAl/ tad+yathA/ o phu rgyab rtsom du skyol ba mi tadu skye a pa ri pu ts+tshatshunasaM b+ha ro ba tsati/ oM sam+b+ha saM skal

parishud+d+had+ham+mateg gnas mar ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+hemanaya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang deb tshosangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang+ga'i klung bcu'i byil snyad kyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyang sagacig gis tshe

dpag tumed pa'i mdo sde 'digasungs so/ oM namo b+hagab te/ a rami ta A yuradzan su bani spyi ta tedzo rAdzAm/ tathA ga t+yA ya artsi de samyaka saM bud+d+hAya// tad+ya sh+tsa/ o pa bu N+yam lta bu mye a pa ri mi ta

pu skye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya nasaM b+ha ro pa tsitaM/ osarlasaM skarang shud+d+had+ham+mateg gnasamudage te sa b+hA ba ba sha mnyan ya pariba'i sA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gor badri bam/ yigir

badrir bcug na de tshe zad pa lasatshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur to/ cho'ang rnam bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// son mo b+ha ga pa te/ a par ma ta A yur dz+nyAn su bani ta te dzo rAdzAya/ tathA ga tA ya arta samyaka saM

bud+d+hAya/ dngash+tsa/ a bu N+ya bu rgya ma hApa tshe a pa mi ta pa tshea ri mi ta pu ts+tsadzanasaM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ sam+basaM skur pa shud+d+had+harmateg ga na sa mud ga te swab+hAb bi'ang+ham hran ma nga re b+baye swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu
mdapo'i mdo sde 'ad segir badri'am/ yi gera'adrir 'jugan de sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song ga sa gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dunam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/ de nam du'ang mi khom par skyo bar

mi 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ onamo b+ha ga ba te a parimita A yur dz+nyA na su bi nishI te dzo rA dzA ya/ tathAg tA ya arda te samyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu Ni

bu skye ma hApa mya a ba rimi ta pu rgya a pa ri mi ta pu N+yadan saMb+ha ro pa tsite/ oM sam+b+hasaM sa ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha ma hAn ya pa ri bA re swAyA! gang zhig tshe dpag med pa'i mdo sde 'di
yigarab drim/ yigera'adri bajugan des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong badrir bcug par 'gyur/ oM namo b+ha ga ba to/ aparimi ta A yuradzanas bani ta tatshorA dzAya/ tathAg tA ya ardatisamyas/

saMbud+d+hus/ tad+ya thA/ opa pu ma g+ha pu tshea pa ta pu skye a pa ri mi ta pu dzAn saM b+har pa tsitaM/ osarasaMskur pa rishud+d+had+harmateg ga na sa mud ga te saM b+ha ba bi shud+d+hemahAn pa ra yig sA hA/ gang zhig tshe
dpag tumed pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'bri 'jugan des chos kyi phung pabargyad khri bzhi stod byed du bcug pa dang rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/ onamag+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur

dzAnasung tatedzorA dzA ya/ ta thAg tA ya ad+ha te samyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ya bu smyamahApa lce a pa'i mi ta pu N+ya a pa ri mi tapu dzAnasaMb+hAropa tsi te/ oMsam+basaM sar parishud+d+had+harmate ga ga na

samud ga te sad+hAb bi shud+d+himah+phun ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dorag med pa'i mdo sde 'di dgar 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jugan re'i mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i ng yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro//

onamo b+ha ga ba ti/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su bi ni ta tedzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ad+ha tesamyaka saMbud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ o pu my-ipa ts+tshem hApu my-ia par mi ta pu skye a pa ri mi ta pu N+yatshunasaMb+haropa tsi te/

da kasaMsam+b+hasaM sku ra pa ri shud+d+had+harmate ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+hem na ya pa ripAre swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na deb sdig

pa'i bung po ri rab tsam yang longs su byang bar gyur ro// en mo b+ha ga ba te/ aparimi ta A yuradz+nyAn sub nita te dzo rA dzA ya/ tathAg tuya an+nate samuka saMbud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ oM pu N+yapa skye ma hA

du mya a pa ri mi tapa tshe a pa'i mi ta puN+ya dz+nyAn saMb+ha rong tsati/ oM sam+b+hasaM sa ra ba ra bud+d+hat+tam+mate ga ga nas mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ham hAn lama'akhA res k+ka/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di
yig 'dri'am/ ya gir 'drir 'jug med la bdud dang/ bdud kyi rigs kyilha dang gnod sbyin dang/ srin pos glags Mbaltas kyang glags rnyed par ma 'gyur ro/ mon mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta

Ayuratshan su+i ta te dzo rA dzAl/ ta thAg tuya ag+ha tasamyakasaMbud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ o pu ts+tshapa tsem hA tshe a pa ri mi ta pu skyo ang rim tapa dzAn saM b+ha pa tsitaM/ o sawasaM skur pa 'a 'ud+d+had+ha

teg gnasatshadag tes byub gshaN+Nam hanaya pa'i ri sany+tsa/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yigir 'dri'am/ miger 'bri 'juganade 'chiba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgashinurtsa dgus

mnatsum duchos ston po mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gos de la phyag rkyang bar 'gyuyo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'agro ba mdzad bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang/ som nyi dang/

yid gnyis m gzhig/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ra mi tAA yur dz+nyA na su bani sany+tsita tedzo rA dzA ya/ tathAg tA ya ar te samyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+yasu tsem h+phapu N+yaa pa ri mi tapu smyo a pa ri mi ta

bu ts+tsha nasaMb+hAropatsitaM/ oM sam+b+hasaMskarab rishud+d+ha d+ham+mate ga ga na saM ud ga te sa ba bshud+d+hem snyan ya pa ri bA re sa hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag yod pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug
nargyal bo chen po bzhire'i phyibazhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang/ skyab ba dang/ sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ onamo b+hag ba to/ a pa ri ta A yuranabubani ta tedzor dzAya/ tathA ga tA ya argate

samyakasaMbud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ obu skyepa tshe mahopa tshe a pa ra go ba ts+tsha ab rali ta bu mya tshan so b+ha ro ba tshe te/ o san+dasaM sku phapa'i phribaT+Thad+ham+matega gnas mudag te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+hamanyan ya pa ri ba'i sa/
gang zhig tshedapag tumad pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi gor 'drir 'jug na de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag meding sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ag rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/

on mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dzanas binishIta tedzo rA dzAm/ ta thAg tA la ad+ha tasamyaka saMbuts+tshA ya/ tad+yathA/ o du my-ipa ts+tshemahApa tshe aparimi ta pu N+ya a ba ra mi ta pu N+yadzAn saMb+haro pa tsi te/

osan+dasaM skar pa rishud+d+han+tamaha ga ga na sa tshud ga te swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ham han a pa'i b+hAre swAh+pha 3sa phyogs gang du mdo sde dkon mchog 'di bodriba'i sa phyogs de 'a ngamachod rten du bsgyur te/ phyag byabar yang
'os par 'gyur ro// byel song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang ri degs gang dag gi rnalam du grags par gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon

bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// on mo b+hagab te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dzanasu nita tedzorAdzAya/ tathAg ta ya ad+hate samyaka saMban+d+haya/ tad+ya thA/ o pa pa ts+tshem b+hAbu smyo a par mi ta pu

a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyAn saM b+ha rob tsiti/ oM sam+basaMs ra bshad+d+hamateg gan samud ga te swa b+hA ba bshud+d+hemahAn yapa'i khAr sA hA/ gang zhig tshedapag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger badri 'am/ gar 'dir

'jugan de bud med spyi'is sunam yang skye ba mi 'gyur ro// onamo b+ha ga ba te/ ar mi ta Ayur dzanasun tsita te dzon dzAl/ tathAg tA ya ad+ha te samyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/o bu rgyusu my-imahA bu skye

a pa ri mi tapa ts+tsaa ba me ta pu ny+tsadzAn saM b+hA ro pa tsite/ oM sam+basaM skur ba'i shud+d+had+ham+mategag na sa mudag to sra b+hA ba bi shuT+ThAm tAn yaba'i grwa los hA/ gang la la zhag gis rtsis kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kar bab pa

Na'aga' zhig sbyin pa sbyin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khamasasan po chasna bdun gyis yongs su bkang te sbyin pa phun par 'agyu// nyon mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa mi ta A yur dz+nyAn suwinishI ta

tshe rAdzAya/ tathAgatAya a samyaka saMbat+tAya/ tad+yathA/ mo bu rtsam skyemanyapa ts+tsaa pa rimi ta pu N+ya a ba'i mi ta pu N+yatshanasaMg+ha pa tsati/ o sany+dzasaMskurang rishud+d+hat+tatagagan samudag te swab+ha ba bi shud+d+ham snyan par

kAr sAhA/ gang la la zhig ches kyi rnam grangs 'di'imachod pa byed par 'gyur ba des dam pa'i chos matha' dag mchod par 'gyur ro// u0f00name b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su bzhita te dzor dzAl/

tacha ga tAl an tesamyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ tad+yathA/ o pu ts+tshapu N+yamahA pu N+yaa par mi tangu ts+tsaa pa'i mi ta pu N+yatshanasaM b+ha rob tsi te/ oM sarba saMsku ra parishud+d+had+ham+mAtig gnasaud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+dom gAn yala'i
reswAny+tsa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na re bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thamasacang skyob dang/ lag par dad sel dang/ 'khor ba 'jig dang/ gsarathub dang// 'od srungs dang/

shAkya thub pa'i b sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyimachod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pabasod nams kyi phung po'i tshad bkrang bar nus kyi/ tshedapag tumed pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po ba tshad/

nibagrang bar minus so/ onamo b+ha ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yuradz+nyA na su banita te dzo rA dzA ya// ta thAg tA ya an+natesamyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu Tub smyom Apa tshe a pa 'am tu bu skye a pa ri mi tapu N+ya dzAn/

saMb+har tsati/ oM sam+basaM skur pa ri shud+d+hat+tam+matal gon samur ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he mahAn ya pa ri bAre swAhA/ 'di lta ste/ dpar ni rin po che'i phung po bab tsam sbyangs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi

phung bo'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi[7 ]tshadapag med pa'i mdo sdebadeb bsidanams kyi phung bo'atshir nibagrang bar mi nusaso// oM namo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn u ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta

an sumuka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ a bu rlobu tshum 'bu skye a pa ri mi tubu skye a pa ri mi tapa ts+tshadzAnasaM g+ha rob tsati/ oMsam+basaM skarapa ri shuT+Than+tam+mateg ga na sa mudag te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haM

ma hAn la ba pA re swAhA/ 'di lta ste/ dpe nits+tshamatshochen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thig pa re renas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshedapag tumad ba'i bde sdur de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi

nus so// onamo b+hagagate/ apar mi tAAyur dz+nyAn suwininy+tsita tedzorAdzAya/ tathAg tA ya ad+hate samyakasaMbud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ o pu skyepa tshemahAdu a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya a pa ri mi ta pu ts+tshadzAn saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/

oM sam+basaM g+hA ra pa shud+d+had+ham+matag gnasaud ga teswa b+hAb bshud+d+ham hAn ya ba ra b+hiye sA gA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdosde 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/bsti stang du byas te mchod pa/

byed par 'gyur ba desaphyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhinagshegs ba thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa yin no// onamo lhag ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dzanasu birIhU~M

tsha ta tedzorA dzAya/ tathA ga tA ya ad+ha te samyaka saMbud+d+hAya/ tad+yathA/ o bu rtsepa tshumakha pu lce ar mi ta pu ts+tsea pa ri mi ta bu ts+tshadzAn saMb+har btsite/ oMsam+basaMskur pa rishud+d+ha d+ham+mate ga ga na sa mud ga te pa b+ha ba bi

shud+d+hem hAnaya ba'i bA'i sAhA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyisaMsangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge s sbyin ng 'i stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khye 'jug pa na// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgranagragasabar gyur
07/ tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// ma ma sang gas tshul khrims stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pas/ tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bzod
pabastobs kyis sangs u0fb1sa nga dag 'phags// mi yisang gis bzod ba'i stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bzod nga 'i stobs kyi spun grags par 'gyur// brtson 'grus
stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi sang ges brtson 'grus stobs rtogs te// sAng rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug ban// brtson 'grus stobs kyi sman gragasabar 'gyur/ bsam gtan
stobs kyis sangs rgyas lang dag 'phags// mi yi sangagasabasam gtan stobs rtogs te// sAng rjecan gyi grong khyer 'jugapa na// bsam gtan stobs kyisgrazhi grags par 'gyur// shesarab stobs kyis
sangs rgyas mngadag baphags// mi yi sangags shesarab stobs rtogs te// sAdirje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// shes rab stobs kyi sman gragasapar 'gyur// en mob+ha ga ba te/ a pa'i mi ta A yur

dzAn su bani tatadzomaya/ tathAg tA ya ka tesauka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ o bu pa tsem shupa mya a pa ri mi tapa tshe a pa ri mi tapany+tsadzAnasaMb+haropatsa/ os/saM skur pa shAN+Nad+hamata gan mug te swa b+hAba'i

buts+tshemahAn la 'bAre swAhA bcom ldan 'asadagyes shing de skad cesabaka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i
'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan bas kyis gsungs pa la mngonabar bstodado// 'phags batshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg ba chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgyugar skad du/Argyaa pa ri mi ta A yuratshan nA ma ma hAyanasU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang yashes dpag med pa zhes byub theg pa chen po'i mdo//

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// bde skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod na rgyal brgyal byed kyi tshalamagonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' 'ban/
ge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcagasum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tumang po dag dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal steng gaphyogs 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpagatumed pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ denade bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
pas nags rgyas dang yazhes dpag tu medang shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// tshe 'dzin cing tshamathar phyin pa 'bazhed de/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to// 'jam
dpal gzhonanu gyur pa nyon cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can rnams tshe thung ba lo brgya pa bstag ste/ de dag las kyang phalacher nadusam yin bar 'achib bstanate/ 'jam dang lasems can

gong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang langashes dpag tu med bde'i yon tan dang bsngags pa longs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ ming tsam yang
nyan tam/ klog panas/ glegs bam la bris te khyimana'achang gi bar du byed dam/ ma tog dang/ spos dang/ 'phrangab dang/ phyi ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo

brgya thub pa ba'agyur ro// 'jam dpal sems can gang dag tshodang ye shes dpag tu med pa shan tu rnam pa gdonami za ba'i rgyal po'imtshan bargya rtsa brgyad thos pa dedagatshe'ang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/

mas can gang dag tshe yongs su zad kar mtshan 'achang bar gyurapa de dag gi tshabang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring por 'dod pa dag/ de
bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dang ga tu med pa de'i mtshan bargyartsa brgyad nyan tam/ yiger 'dribam/ ya gar 'brir 'jug na/ de dag gi yon tan dang legs par gyur pa ni 'di dgago/ omo phyug

wa te a ba rimi taA yur dz+nyAn su bi nita tedzorA dzA ya/ tathA sa t+tA ya achu tasamyakasaM bud+d+hA ya// tad+ya thA/ esadz+dzasaM skur pa ri shud+d+had+ham+mate gagan samud ga te sub+hA wa bi shud+d+hem tAn ya pa ri wA re
snga shA 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bamtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhag gis yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'bri 'jug gam/ glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam/ klog par gyur
na tshazad bs tshe 'bargya thub par 'gyur ro// des thos nas de bzhinagashegasab tshodang ye shes dpagatumed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
yon tan dpag tumed ba la sogs bar skye bar 'gyurayo// onamo b+hagawate/ a pa'i mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su bi nita te dzor dzA ya/ tathA ga tA ya a tesamyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ osan+d+ra saM skur

par shuts+tshan+tam+madagag nasaud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+homahAn yapa'i bar sA hA/ yang de'i tshosangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang dbyang sagacig gis tshodang yengashasadapag tu med pa'i mido sde

'digasungs so// oM namo b+hag wa to/ a pa'isi taA yuradz+nyAnasu banitate dzo rAdzAya/ ta thA ga tA ya arta tes myaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ oMsam+b+hasaM sku ra pa ri shuts+tshan+tam+mate ga gan sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa

bi shud+d+ham na ya pa ri bAre swA hA/ yang reb tshosas rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tumed pa'i mdo sde 'digasungs so// onamog+hagi wa

te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dzAn su binishI hatedzorAdzAya/ tathAg tul ag+ha te samyakasaMbud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sam+b+hasaMsku ra pa rishud+d+ha d+ham+mateg gan samudug te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+hemadran ya pa rihAre swAhA/

yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdunacu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyang sagacig gisatshidang ye shes dbag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'digasungs so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur

tha7 dzan su bita tedzorAdzA ya/ tathA ga tA ya arta sauka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ oM sam+b+hasaM skar pa shuT+Thad+ham+mate ga ga nas mud ga te sa b+hA wa bi shud+d+hem hA na ya pa ri wA re b+hAhA/ yang de'i tshesangs

rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshedang ye shesadapagatumed bab mdosnga 'di gsungs so// yonamo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A yuratshanas bzhi ta te dzor dzA ya/

tag tA ya arta tasamyakAsaM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sam+basaM sku ra ba rishud+d+had+ham tegs nas mudag tes b+hA wa shud+demahAn yapa ri wA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshesas rgyas byeb phrag lnga banu lngas dgongs pa

gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shesadapag tumadapa'i mado sngabadiyasusaso// oM namob+ha ga wa ti/ a ba ri mi ta A yur dzan suban hUM ta te dzo'adzA ya/ tathA ga tA ya ad+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/

tad+ya thA/ oM sam+b+hasaM sku rab ra'ad+d+had+ham+mate gagan samud ga te swab+hA wabi shuSh+ThamahAn ya pa ri wAre swAhA/ yang de'i tshesangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhibasurtsaltas dgongs pa gtsag dang dbyang sagacig gis tshodang ye shes/

dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsusaso// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a ba ri mi ta A yuradzAnasub nita tatshorAdzAya/ tathA ga tA ya ad+ha tasamyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oMsam+b+hasaM sku ra pa ri shud+d+hA

d+ham+mategagan samudag sa b+hA wa bi shud+d+hem hAn la pa ri wAre swAhA/ yang de'i tshosangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu mod pa'i mdo sde 'di
gsungs so// onAmo ga wa te/ aparimi ta A yur dz+nyAn su banihU~MdadzorAdzAl/ tathAg tA ya arta te samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oMsam+b+hasaM skar parishud+d+ha d+ham+ma tog

gnas mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ham hAn ya pa ri pe swAhA/ yang deb tshosangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyungasagacig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tumed pa'i mdo sde bdugasungs so//

inamolhag wa te 2 a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su bi nita te dzorAdzAyA/ tathAg tu ya achu te samyaka saMbud+d+ha ya/ tad+yathA/ oM sam+b+hasaMsku parishud+d+had+ham+matog ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+hemathAn pa po/

wA'i sAhA/ yang de'i tshosangs rgyas bye ba phragagang+gA'i klung bcu'i khyim snyad kyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dbag tumad pa'i mdo sda'adigasungs so// onamab+ha ga wa ti/ a pa

mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su binany+tsita te dzorAdzAya/ tathAgatA ya arga te samyaka saMbuN+Daya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sum+b+hasaM skarab shut+tan+tam+mate ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa'ishud+d+ham stan ma bar wari swA hA/ gang

zhig tshe rang re shes dpag tumad pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gar 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ 'changan detshozad palas tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ tshebang rnam par 'phal bar 'gyur ro/ on mo b+hag wa

te a pa ri mi ta A yur dzan su bi nitseta te dzorAdzAya/ ta thA ga tAya ag+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sam+b+hasaM sku ra pa rid+d+hishaN+Nan+tateg gnas mud ga te swab+hAwa bi shud+d+hemadan ya pa ri wAre swAhA/
gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri bam/ yi ger 'brir 'jug na/ de sems can dmyal ba dang/ phyolasong gi skye gnasadang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang skye bar mi

'gyur te/ nam du'ang mi khom pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad duskyeb dran bar 'gyur ro// on mo lhag wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su bi nitatedzo rA dzA ya/

ta thA ga tA ya ad+ha te samyaka saMbud+d+hal/ tad+yathA/o sam+b+has skur pa ri shud+d+hat+tam+mate gagan samud ga te sub+hAwa shud+d+hem lhan la pariwAre swAhA/ gang la la zhi'i shis tshe dang ye shes dpagatumed pa'i mdo snga'adi
yig 'dri'am// yi ge rab tsor bajug ka/ res chos kyi phung brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dri bcug par 'gyur ro// onamo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta Ayur tshunasub tate tshorAdzA la/ ta thAg tA ya a

tasamyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sam+b+hasaM sku ra pa ri shuny+tsacha m+mategagan samudag te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+hem hAn a pa ri wA re pAhA/ gangazhatshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gerab dri'am/ yi ge

'drir 'jugan/ des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/ onamo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn subanita te dzo rA dzA ya/ tathA ga tA ya

ad+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya cha/ o saNasaM skurapa rishud+d+had+ham+mate ga ga na sa mud ga te sAb+hAwa bi shud+d+hemanyan ya pa ri wAre swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shesadapag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ge'i 'dra ba ma/
nga@#// yi ger 'brir bcugan/ de'i mtshams med pa lta yongs su 'byabar 'gyur ro// oM namo b+ha ga wa te/ a bar mi taA yuradzAnasu bi nishAtatedzar dzAya/ tathAg tA ya ad+ha te samya ka/

saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sam+b+hasaM skur pa rishud+d+hat+tam+mate ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+homahAn ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger badrab m/ yi ger
'drira'ojugan/ de'i sdig pa'i phung po rirab tsam yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+hag wa to// a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su banita te dzorAdzAya/ tathAg tA yas te samyaka saM bud+d+ha

ya tad+ya thA/ o sadz+dzasaM skar bshAn+tan+nam+mate ga ga na sa mud ga te swA b+ha wa bi shazlum hAn ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dbagatumed pa 'amadorda 'di lo gar 'driban/ ya rab drir 'jug/
na de la bdud dang bdud kyi gsakyi lhadang/ gnod spyin dang/ srin pos rlags bltas kyade glags rnyed ba'ame'agyur ro/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yuratshanasu bi nAshita te dzorA dzA ya/

tathAg t+yA ya arma te samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA oMsam+b+hasaMsar pa ri shud+d+had+ham+matig ga na sa mudag te pAb+hA wa bi shud+d+hemahAn ya pa ri wAre swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde
'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yiger 'odrira'ajugan/ do 'chiba'idus kyitshisas rgyas bye ba phrag drug nu rtsadagusaM mngon sum dulung ston par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag skyong bar 'gyur/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'grobar mdzad bar bgyur te/ 'di la the tsomadang/ som nyi dang/ yid ganyis ma byed cig/ oM namo b+hag wa te/ a ba ri mi ta A yuratshunasubanita

tedzo rAdzAya/ tathAg t+'a ya ad+ha tesamyaka saMbud+d+hal/ tad+ya thA/ oM sam+b+has skur ba ri shud+d+had+ham+mateg gan sa mud ga te swab+hA wa bishun+tsam can ya pariwAre swAhA/ gang dag tshodapuyang shas dpag tuyod
pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger badri'am/ yi ger 'dri'ajugan/ rgyal po chen po bzhis de'i phyi bzhin du 'byung zhing/ bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ spyod par 'gyur ro// onamo b+ha ga wa te/

a ba ri'i taA yu dza nasu bani taterAdzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ad+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+yathA/ oM sam+b+hasaM sku rab dz+dzIshud+d+had+ham+mateg ga na samudag te sa b+hA wa shud+d+himahAn ba pa'i wAre swAhA/
gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tuyod pa'i mdo sde 'di yagi'adri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jugan/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tumed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye

bar 'gyur ro// onamob+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni shi ta te dzo rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya an+natesamyaka saM bud+d+hAya/tad+yathA/ osan+d+ras sarapa ri shud+d+had+ham+mate ga gnas mudag te sub+hAbi

shulhemasAn ya pa ri wa re swAhA/ sa phyogs gang dumado sde 'di'i dripi'i se phyogs de'ang mchod rten du 'gyur te phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang rarigs gang dag gi rna lam du
grags pa'i gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// oM namo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa rami ta A yuradz+nyAn su

bani ta te dzor dzAya/ tathAgatA ya ad+ha tasamyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ oMsam+b+hasaMskarapa ri shud+d+had+ham+mateg gnas mud ga te swab+hA wagishAts+tshem sAn ya pa ri wA re swAhA/ gang zhig tshe dang leshes dpag
mad pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gar 'bri'am/ yi ger 'drir brlagon/ da bud med kyi dngos por nam du'angs bar mi bgyur ro// omo b+hag wa te/ a ba ri mi ta A yuradz+nyA na suwinishi ta te dzo rAdzA ya/ tathA ga

tA ya aju tasamyag saM ban+d+ha la / tad+yathA/ oM sam+b+ha saM skar parishud+d+hat+tagag nAsamud ga tes b+hA wa bshud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ra wA'i sa shA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shesadabag tumad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs

'di'i phyir kar sha pa Nagacig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdunagyis yongasasu bkang ste sbyin ba bya par bgyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te///

a pa rami ta A yur dz+nyAnas bi nItate dzorAdzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ad+ha tesamyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+yathA/ oM sam+b+hasaM skurapar shuN+Nad+harma te ga gnas mud ga tesA b+ha wa bishuN+Dam hAn ya pa ri wa re swAhA/
gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa 'byed pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ oM namo b+ha ga wa to/ aparimi ta A yur dzan su bsadetatshorA dzA ya/ tathAg

ya ad+ha tesamyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tar+ya// oM sam+b+hasaM sku 'apa ri shud+d+had+hagatag ga na sa mud ga teswa b+hA wa bi shud+d+hemaskrun ya pariwAre swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dbar nad bzhinagshegs pa rnam par gzigs/
dang [0f10 ]gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ log par dadasal dur/ 'khor ba 'jig dang/ gsar thub dang 'od srungs dang/ shAkya thub pa la rin po chu sna bdun gyis mchod pa/
byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tumad pa'i bsod nams kyiphung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar minus so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur

dzAn su bi nitAte dzor dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ab+hatesamyaka saMbud+d+hAya/ thA/ a sam+b+hasaM sku ra parishud+d+hat+tam+mag ga nas mud ga tes b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hAn yapa riwAre swAhA/ 'dilta ste/ dpar

nari'i rgyal po ri rab dngamanyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang yo shes dpag tumad pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni

bgrang bar mi nus so// on mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur nasu binany+tsita te dzorAdzA ya/ tathA ga tA ya ad+ha te samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o sadz+dzasaM sku ra pa rishud+d+had+harmatug ga nas
mud ga taswab+hA wa bi shud+d+hemahAn ya pariwAre swAhA/ 'dilta ste/ dpe na rgya mtshochen po bzhichus yongs su gangaba'i thig pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tumed pa'i bsod
sa @#// nams kyi phung bo'i tshad nibagrang bar minus so// namo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yuratshanasu yin Ita te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ad+ha te samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/
tad+ya thA/ oM sam+b+hasaM skur pa d+hi'ud+d+harnyam teg gan sumudag tesAb+hA m+bab shud+d+ham yun la pa'i wAre swAhA/ ga bzhi ge tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo 'di yi ger 'bri'am/ yisor bcur
'jug gam/ gus po'abyas temachod par byed pa de dag gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyus kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod ba byas pa yin no//

on mo b+ha ga wa te/ a bar mi ta A yur dzanasu bi niny+tsita te rA dzA ya/ tathAg tA ya ad+ha tasamyaka saMbud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ esaN+DasaM sarapa ri shud+d+had+ham+mategag na samudag tes h+phu wa bi shud+d+haman
pariwAre swA hA/ sbyin ba'i stobasakyis sas rgyas yang dag baphags/ mi yisangags spyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas// snying rjecan gyi grong khyer bajug pa na// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi smran grags par
'gyur// tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag baphags/ ma yisang gis tshul khrims stobs rtogs nas// sang rjecan gyi grong khyer 'jug pan// tshul khrims stobs kyismin grags par
bgyur// bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas la dag 'phags// mi yisangags bzod pa'i stobs rtogasanas// snying rjecan gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags pas
0'gyur/ brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyus yang dag b.lags// mi yi nges shes brtson 'grus stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pan// brtsona'agrusastobs kyi sgazhigrags
parab gyur// bsam gtanastobs kyis gsargyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi sangags bsam gtan stobs rtogasanas// sAri can gyi grong khyera'ajug pan// bsam gtan stobs kyi sgrazhigrags par
'gyur// shes rab stobs kyisasangasargyus yang dga' phags// ma yi sangashes shes rab stobs rtogasanas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug ban// shes rab stobasakyi sgra ni grags par

'gyur/ oMAmab+hagawa te/ a pa rimita A yur dzanasubanitate dzo rAdzAya/ tathA ga tA ya arta de samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+yathA/ oMsam+b+hasaM skur pa rashuT+Thad+ham+matagagan samudag te swa b+hA wage
shuN+Dim dwan sa pa ri wAr sA hA/ bcom ldanubadus kyis de skad cesabaka' stsalas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lha dang [. ]mdang/
lham yin dang/ drab rebacas pa'i jig rten yi rangs to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// baphags pa tshe dang ye shes dang ga tu mad pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
(#// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yuradzAnashrI da ya nAm d+hA ra Ni/ bodaskad du/ babags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tumed pa'i snying ro zhes bya ba'i gzus/
sangs rgyas dang byang nubasamasadapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gcus bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'graman//
dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chonapo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ rinas bcom ldan 'dus kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas//
ge slong de dag bcom ldan bdas kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan bdas kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bkab stsal to// 'di nas nub kyi phyogasarolan// bde ba can gyi 'jig rtenakhams// den
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa tshodapag med// su zhig de yi mtshan barjod na// de na de ru skye bar 'gyur// 'chiba'i dus su ston pa ni// dag slong dge 'dun bcas te
mthong// den bud med yod pa min// mngalana gnas pa yod ma yin// rin chen rnams kyimarlobs// rdzu baphrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// zas dang gos dang smana rnams dang/// chos gos
mal tshalhungabazod rnams// sems kyis bsam ma thag tun// de dag mod la 'byungapar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bzhugs bab saMngs rgyas rnams// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod// de ltar
sangs rgyas bsamami khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam ma khyab// baphags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab// bsam mi khyab la dad byas nas// rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab// rnam dag zhing

du skyabar 'gyur/ dge slong dag de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshedapag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/

rgyal rigs su skyes so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshodapag med kyi yab na 'khoralos sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to//

de'i yumanagazi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i btsunamonargyal rigs bzang skyom zhes bya bar gyur to// dag slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshodapog med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to//

rim gro pa ni snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshags pa tshedapag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tugyur pa nibazang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog

dang [0f10 ]brtsonabagrusa chen pod ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pachen po zhusabya'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpagamed kyi bdud ni mchodapa'i rgyal po zhig bya bar gyur to// lha sbyin gyi ming ni dang ba
zhes bya bar gyur te// dgaslong dag de bzhin gshegasapa tshedapagamed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri lod do// dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te/
de bzhinagshegs patshodapag med kyi mtshan legs par bzungal/ zhag banusangs rgyas rjesasu dran pa yid lam yangs par sgom zhing/ bajig rten gyi khams bde ba can n bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gsheg
pa tshedapagamad rgyun du yid la bya'o// dpal 'chimad rdzasgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dabang rtag tubazlas brjod bya'o// nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag
lngas phyag byas la/ somasacan thamaMsacad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshedapag med bsaman/ zhag bcu bdas pa'i dus su de bzhin gshagasapatshodapag med mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs
bdun bzhugs babisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngosan/ da 'chiba'i dus kyi
tshade bzhin gshegs pa tshedapag med mdunan bzhugs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'isangs rgyus kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dgeslong dag 'chimad sgra'i rgyal po zhes
byakha'i gzungs de gang zhen/ tad+yathA/ shab lo/ a ba le/ sam dza le/ nAdzasha/ nir dzA te/ niruk+ti nir mu khe/ dzAl par ts+tshe da ni/ su kha ba ti nir de sha/ a mr-i te/ A yuragar thu
nasehAni/ amr-ite/ A yur pra sa rgyuni/ nir bud+d+hiA kA shazhir de she/ A kAshanir dzA te/ A kAshanar khu sha le/ A kAsha nur dar shane/ A kAsha a d+hiSh+Thane/ su khab te a d+hilan/ rwa ba ni'i

de she/ tsatArid+hamabra sAd+hane/ tsatAriAr+yas tapra sA lhani/ tsat+tArimAn b+haban pra sAd+hani/ b.labIr+ya pra sA d+hani/ rnam+mats+tshadane/ ku sha le/ kusha lanir shi/ kusha la pra tilen/but+taku sha

nyawa le bi shud+d+hapa byus/ d+harmuka ra Ne/ niN+Date/ ni ban+d+he/ bim le/ bi ra dze/ rA dzas/ ra sa rgya/ ra sa gla pa le/ rAsA kra/ a b+him+me'u/ ku le pra ti ku le/ ba ku le/ dan+tisu dan+ta tsit+taM/
su pan tsit+taM / supatiT+ThitaM/ su le su a kI/ d+ham+matsarnyam ba le ba la/ anu sha a ba le/ bud+d+ha A kA sha gu skye byaSh+Tha/ A kA sha nir gu Ni/ a mr-i ta dun du b+hi sA re sa/ dge slong dag/

dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chimad rdzasgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skadabastanapa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogasagatsang zhing phrim med

par de bzhin gshegs pa tshedapag med lam tog dang sos kyis mchod par bya// byang chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang/ byang chub kyi shang phun sum tshogs pa'i ng yid la bya'o// de la'ang 'dod pa bskyed

bar byas te/ 'dod pa dang dad pa byas n de bzhinagshegs pa tshedapag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dgad bzhinagshegs pa tshe dpag med kyishangag rgyal po narin po cha'i pad+ma

rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shang de me tog dang 'brasabu phunasum tshogs pa'o// pad+ma'i gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rin po chadums bskor ba la de bzhinagashog
patshadapag medabazhugs so// g.yasan ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ g.yonanan byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'itshogs grangs med/
saTha @#// pas bsko'a'o// dad pa'i rigs kyi bu bam/ rigs kyi bu mogapal la mos pa dang/ dradapa dang/ gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la nipo tshesna/
bdunagyipad+machen po dag la rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag dge slong pha bam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dag bstan pa bam/ dge bsnyan ma grangal la bcom ldan bdas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
mad de mtshan yang dag par 'dzinapa da lam 'jigs ba ma 'byung/ chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung/ dug gi'ajigs pa mi 'byung/ mtshonama'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung// gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung
srin po ba 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo// sngon gyi rnam par sminapa ni/b.la'angamagatogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ thams cadra dang ldan pa'i
'khor de dug dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zarab cas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phagasab tshodang pa shes
dbag tumed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///rgyagar gyi mkhan po pu N+yasaMb+ha wa dang shuchen gyi lo tsa ba pa tshab nyim grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
tshu/ rgyagar skad du/ b+ha ga pan ami tAb+had+hAr Niman+tA/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das snangabamatha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
0 ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod pa de/ a mi tasaM b+hage/ a mi tapi kAn taM kare/ a mi ta ga gan kIka

resaN gle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan nibaskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i ng 'di lan gsum bazlas brjod byas n sgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro// lan nyishu rtsa gcig

bzlas na rtsar bzhib ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsab bskrun par bgyur ro// bcom ldan 'das snang bamatha' las rjes su dranapa la phyag 'tshal 'go/ namo rat+tA
tra yA ya/ ma hIduhike swAhA/ lus land byung ba dang/ nad khong bskams su gyur kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/ bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs nanadamed par 'gyur// gzus sngags
degasus ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs to/ bcom ldan bdas kyis gsungs pa la mngonapar bstod do// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs so//
bcom ldan bdas snang thamatha' las de bzhin gshegs par bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ am te/ ami tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/

a mi tab kAn+ta gA mi ni/ ga ga na kIrtika'o/ sarba gle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tanani bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i ngalanagasum bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig
pa phyago/ tishu gcig tubazlasal byas na rtsa ba bzhi'i lta ba'ang sdig bayongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stongaladage ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang 'gyur ro// snag
mgrab yasarjesasun+danapardzogasaso//@#// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ba leki tishar parladzAlamU la tanArAdzanAm/ bod skad du/ 'phags kha spyan

sagazigs dbang phyug gi tshababargyud kyi rgyal po pad+madra ba zhes khyab/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags ba spyanas gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dngawonab le gus par phyag btsalalo// bdaskadabadagagisi

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan badas him la ya'i tshal chen po tsan danasdong bo dang myu gu rgyas pa'i dkyila 'khoragyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ bdilta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs

chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang/ tshedapaldan pa kun bagad gzhon nu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa Ari'i bu dang/ tshe dang wan
pamo'abagalamyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la sogs pa dgeslong dgo bdunachen po stong nyis brgya bcudang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'dilta ste/ pad+madakar po dang/ nyi'od dang/

gzungs kyidabang phyug rgyal bo dang/ parlabaspyanadang/ ye shes dbang phyug dang/ pad+ma'i ribang phyug dang/ rdo rje'i snying bo dang/ rin chen snying bo dang/ kun tubazang po dang/ sgrib pa rnam par so'abad du
nam mkha'i snying po dang/ byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/ phyagan rdo cha dang/ blo gros mi zad pa dang/ rnam mkha'i mdzod dang/ blo gros mtshodang/ mthu chen po
thob pa dang/ zla 'od dang/ dra ba can gyibod dang/ spobs pa btsugs pa dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cudasalabiklogros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'isams dpa' chen pograngasamad pa dang/
gzhan yang gtsor byams ba la gnas bab dgeslongamang bo dang/ dge slong mamang po dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dgabastan ma mang bodang/ lha'i tshog sadwang/ klu'i tshogs dang/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang/
brib dang/ lha ma yin dang/ namamakhab lcing drang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ grul bum dang/ shazad ng/ mi dang/ mam yin pa bye ba phrag drug dang/ khro boman po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/
rdo rdzogashin rdzogashed dang/ rdordzogazhan kyis mi thub pa dang/ rdo rje mgron/ rdordzabagazhasamathar byed dang/ sdotshog tsug tor dang/ rdo rjeganod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdun cu dang/
spyan mdang/ mAm k+Shadang/ mthozabadakar mo dang/ sgrol ma dang/ 'od zer can dang/ dbyangs can m dang/ phag zhal mdang/ khroganyer can dang/ ri khrod mdang/ gsalam dang/
nor rgyunam dang/ dkaramo dang/ yid bzangam dang/ rnam par rgyalam dang/ dpal 'phrangamo dang/ sa'adzin bzang modang/ rdo rjadabang phyug ma lasogs pa stong phrag drug brgyadang thabs cig tu
za @#// bzhugs so// de'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan bdas lam ma dang/ bkur sti dang/ rim gro bya ba'i phyir mchodapa dumasamachod cing bsngags pa du mas bstod pa byed do//

nusabcom ldan 'dasakhrub ba chen bo thugs rje chen po yongs su bcugazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasnyoms bar zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs m thag tusachen bo rnam pa drug tukunos shing ltas bco brgyad du gyur to//

de'i ltas de mthong nas lang ka'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs zhigatusAms pa dpaldan nas rang gi 'khor dul dang lhan cag der lhags so// de nas bcom ldan bas kyis sgra sgrogs kyisams kyis rtog bathugs su chud nas sku'i gnas

thams cad nas bod thab bye ba phrag dumabyung ngo/ 'od zer de dngas g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang gsal kha'agyur to// de'i tshesgra sgrogs snyams pa dang bcas pas de 'khor
thamasacad kyis 'dzamabu'i gling duyamasaMnd sogs pas rnam par 'tsho ba de thugs kyis longs su dgongs nas/ byang chub sems dpagasems dapab chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdong bsu

gcig ra dusrongarig sngagasa'achang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lhanAcig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngaralcagasanasazhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
