nas sangs rgyas kyi mthusalha'i tshogs rnams kyin ng nas lha'i bu rinapa tshapad+ma'i dra bas brgyan bzhes bya ba bzhangs tathal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen po 'phagasab spyan rasagabrigs dbang
tshog sathams cad kyis// mkhal gas phyag/ thub pas nam mkha'i mdzod mnga' bas// bzhengs 'tshamathalamasbyag ngo mdzes kyi// bstan pa la yang mag 'byung gi ri tiya// byin/

ba ba phyug la 'di skad cesasmras so// kyi mamagon bo thugs rjecan// rig sngagasa'achang ba'i tshogs dang bcas// cheba'i byin rlabs ldan pa rnams// sgra sgrogasasAms pa gzhom ba dang// nyon mongs da nas
gdon ba dang// sems can rnams la phan dang// bdag la shanitusman pa'i phyis// sku dang rjesasumathun pa yi// rig sngagasasbyorab khyad par can// snying po dam bshad du gsol// de tsho 'khor
tshog sathams cad kyis/ mkhab phyogs me tog char gyis bkang/ bcom ldan thub ba'i dbu lani// na chen m tog gdugs su gyur// lha rnams gtsang mar sbyar ba yi// yon chab badug spos dri
dang bshos// ci'abyor dad pa'i stobs kyis phul// thub pas nam mkha'i mdzod du brlabs// lha yi bu mo dum yis// rol mo sa'i snyan 'aphanagadugasadang// ma rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang//
lha ldanubazab dums mchod// de nas magon po spyan ras gzigs// bad+ma gzhon nu'i zhal mnga' bas/ bzhungs 'dzul thal mo sbyar nas nii// ston pa la ni bdi skad gsol// sgra sgrogs bzhinigyisasnyam
pa dang/ yang ba dang rtsal gyis dregs pa ste// bdenalegs brtsamalas byungaman//shin tulog pa las kyang min// sngon du sangs rgyas gadong mdzes kyi// bstan pa la yang mgo btang pogi/ bsod
tha @#// rlabs sngon du byed mod kyang// grasam tshul khrims bral bsan// srin po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang// 'khor bcas gzhan laganod 'gyur yin// ngas ni ngang tshul dbyung ba'i/

ma lus kyibade gshegs sbyin pa dang// sgrub brtsonalegs byas mtha' yas pa/ spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs// gang+gAklung gi rdul dang mtshungs// de skad 'bras bu de brtsams te// dang po'i las can ji

snyad la// phanagadagasagazhi'i bya ba'i phyir// cung zad bsdus nas brjod bya ste// legs par nyon la yid la zung// sngon tsho'idas dusabaskal pini// gang+gA klung bcu'i snga rol gyi// che 'das pa yi snga rol na/
bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// mnad pa'i sngonubya ba// 'jig rten ston pa byung ba'i tshe// bdagagi khyim bdag drag por gyur// thubapa de la ragi sngags mnos// thobam thag tubaskal pa'i
gros/ bzhi khrisnyad kyi 'khor ba bsnyil// de rjes bskal pa gang+gA klung// byabasnyadagacig snga ron// bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// thogs med brla brgya yi spyan// gtsug tor yon
tanarab rgyas pa'i// 'od zer rgyal po zhabya ba// bajig rten ston pe bzhugs pa'i tshe// bdag nyid drang srong bdag por gyur// rig sngags 'dimanos bsgrubs pa yis// phyogs banu'i sangs rgyas
rtsa zhal mthong zhing// yodachos l bzod pa thob// de rjes 'das dus bskal pa ni// bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rolan// bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du//
ma tha/ ston b byung ba bdag gisamanos// dam phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// bdag 'dabang bskur lung bstan mdzad// khyod kyi sngon du bskal pa'i grangs// brjod mi lang nasarig sngags phyir//

yang dag stong phrag stong snyadakyang// dang ba'i mchod sbyin chen po byas/ bye ba phrag grangs banugatsag tu// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs// de dang de yi rnam smina mchog/ sangs rgyas
zhing khams rab 'byamadu// yang dang yang du byung bar 'gyur// phyis 'dren pa shAkya zhes// mimajed 'jig rten khams 'khrungs tshe// molul las kyang khyad bar du// larigs klung du skyes pa'i gag/
gtan la 'dud baphel bya ba'aphyir// mtshan mo munonag sprin rum du// skad cig glog 'gyuji lta bar// ga sngags 'chang ba gdong banugacig/ yan lag stong dang ldan pa la// spyanan chig stong sum cu
pa'i mtshand ldan ba'isku'abyung 'gyur// de tshe skal ldan l la zhig/ mtshan nasabarjod cing sku khamos// rig sngagasazlom pa bo gzhug/ 'jig rten 'dodapa kun grub cing// phyizhang ye shes nyis
'gyur ro// lub bstanade skad thob pa'i phyir// sangs rgyaseb khrag khamug ga grangasasAd zhalasagasus pa yi// rig sngags snying gdong btsugacig/ mthu chen thogs pamed pa ste// 'grol
sman tsayabadab dang// nad kun sabyed sdigakun spyong// bkrashas med pa kun zlog cing// mi'amamatshaan kun sel// sami'achidabangan sems zlog/ rtag tudapal dang sems bde thob//
mya ngan sdug bsngal lasal// rtsod bakhrug thamasacad zhi ba dang// bdud dang gdonabagags zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten smon pa kun brlabacing// bdud dang bar chad mtshonamand//
dbyig pa rdeg dang bcing bdang// btsonarar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal// gsodasarakhrid dang yan lag gcad// migababru mtshon gyis gtsags pa dang// chu dang me dang rlung sagayos// dug dang byed
stams ro langs dang// chom rkun mis yin rnams ganon// rig sngags 'di yis bsrungs ba dang// len dang 'dzinadang brib dang// klog dang kha ton bshad sogs rnams// brtson la 'jig rtan lha
bcas dang// bdud dang tshangs pa dag sbyong dang// bram ze bcas pas gnod pa med// sngon gyi las drag yod pa yang/ byang zhing bsrubs te mad par 'gyur// nges pa'i dngos po 'di lags pas
gnas mngon sum yid ches par// rnam par rtog med sams kyis rlung// de slad skyabs dang skyob pa dang// srung dang dbugs 'byin dpal mgon dang// glingadang khang khyim 'di nyid yin// nyo'ing
sa phyogs srid par// mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang// 'byung po rnams kyis 'tshob med// gang gi sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalamachod// skyabs su 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags// mngon pa'i dga'
zhi gzungs sngags 'dis// nyi uphyagacigabarjod pa la// phyogs brnyesangs rgyas ma lus pa// mtshungs par yi rangs legs pa sbyin// rtsab bzhidang mtshams med lnga// ma lus ga kun byang
bar bgyur// gnod sbyin srinapo sogs snang yang// gzungs dang byams pa snying rje'i sems// dang po bskyangs bla med kyi// byang chub sems mchogasal dgod// gang+gA klung brgya'isangs rgyas kyi//
mtshan nas brjod cing bstodab bas// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bumogang// bdag gi miyarjod dran byed cing// rig sngags rgyun du brjod n de// myur du mchog dga'i sa'athob cing// lag pa'i mthalenas

mthong ba ltar// blamadabyang chub myur du 'byung// rtsegacig dranapas gus byas te// rtag tunang par sngar langs nas// chos bzhin dun dge dgyes te// brgya rtsa brgyad dug brjod pa// tsho'adi'i phan yonabanu
thob 'gyur// rtag par lus la nadamad dang// lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyis srung// no'abrun chegosard dang// dgra sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang// gza' rnams bkur tsange 'gas btsuna'athob//
dug dang 'dug shin gdon bral dang// lus la dri'am kun dga' dang// bsam nganamasnyan rjod byed dang// rims nad bral zhingadagang sla dang// dusamina'achibasangs par 'agyur// gzhan yang yon
nabazhi thob ste// bamikasangs rgyas zhal mthong dang// mkhal 'od 'byungalhasamachod dang// nam yang nganabagror mi 'gro zhing// bde ba can nam bde 'gror skye// ga sngags 'didang sangs rgyas
kyi 35shesasnyadepo 'dzin ba la// byang chub sems dngasangs rgyas kyi// ma bar tha pa'i chos sgo'athob// bskal pa dumar dag bsags dang// rig sngags 'di red 'gyur ste// dad ldan
khrel yod ngo tsha shes// blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che// mdog dkarangang bzang gsong bor smra// sams 'jam lus ngag dal bar spyod// bamal gus brtul zhugs che// srid pa chung
zhing spyi la dga'// sas rgyas gusashajisams bcas pa// nyin mtshan rgyun dug sngags 'don// bdubazhi'amani bco lnga dang// khyad par dunatshes brgyad la// gso sbyong sku yi mdun du blang//
skyonamadatsan dan dkarasogs shing// rigs bzang lasas sku gzugs saMm// yang nas rdo ran chen sogs// bzang las bde bar gshegs gzugs bya// yang na ris su bris kyang rung// sku gcig du
bam lha tshogs kyi// dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la// mngon sum bzhin du dmigs byas na// myur du mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur// yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa yi// bum pa mu dang bcas pa la// sngags
brjod bsadi'adod don kun// bgrub 'gyur the tshomami bya'o// nad dang 'phrodapa'i sman rnams la// sngogs bzlas bathab bam byugs pas sam// bdugs pa tsam yang gnod pa sel// sradabu bam gos dag dang//

phyagargyas gadangs kyang de bzhin no// 'dodapa gang dang gang la yang// ma yi las kyi sbyor bar bya// gsang sngags 'don badzin yid byed la// bdag kyang rjes su 'jug par bya// de skadagasungs pa'i de ma thag/

byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs kyis/// sngags kyi ngo bo nyidlani// ched du brjod pa 'dibarjod do// e marang bzhin med pa'i chos// snatshogs gzugs su snang ba la// brjod rtog bral ba'i skad cig ni//

sa zhi ba'i che ba nyid yin no// sradang dngos po med pa la// dgres par byed pa sgom pa bye// dmigs pa mthar thug med mthong ba// denusgom pa'i 'bras bu'o// kun tu bzang bo'i gsang sngags kyi// don la ched du
'di ltar brjod// am skugasumatha dad par// lus ngag yid kyi donalas byung// don gcig pa ya rnala'abyor gyis// skyugatsag tuni nges par gzung// gang lagang na skyed pa la// 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang
mod kyang// tshigags brjod pa'i sprul tsam ste// ye shes sku la dbye bamed// sgrib pa rnam sel las lani// ched du brjod pa 'di ltar brjod// e ma dngos po ngo bo nyid// ma byung ma skyes ma 'gags pa//

skye 'gag lta bu'i cho 'phru'// sku des phyag rgya sngags su snang// yon tan muya rlabs bzhin du// skyabab de lags l bar byed// nan tanagyisanadi nyid kyang// sgrub med par khong du chud// byang nubasamA
dngas snying gis// rgyul ched du'adi brjod de// am rang bzhin rnam dag la// thogs mang blo la mun ng 'i dbyis// rnam rtog bag chags kyis dkrugs nas// blo buradaka'aganag las su snang//
dkar bosangs rgyas chos dge 'dun// de la sgro btags byang chub sems// de las byung ba'i 'phrinalas kyis// nyon mongs las kyi sgrib sbyong byed// mgon po byams pas sngags sgrubakyi// lam lached du 'di
ltar brjod// e mgadod nas grol zhib sams// tshulta' dang bar snang mod kyang// sna tshogs 'gro ba'i gzugs byung bas// mnab thibs por rnam par bsgyur// denyid sems kyi snang ba'i phyir//
'bad rtsol med pa'i sems kyis grol// rtsom pa'i sems kyi dri mas// drim med pa'i sams 'ching bgyur// nam mkha'i snying pos sngagasamang la// ched du 'di ltar brjod par
mdzad/ em stong pamtshan ma bral// kha dog dbyibs bral chos nyid dag/ dga' ba'i sems chen gsal byed pa// shes 'bachen po'i yi gi min/ mtshan dang ye shes bde ldan sku// gang gang don dud snang

ba// snyade rdzachen po'i ring shugasakyis// 'byung bgyur yig ta yi don// byang chub sems dang ba pad+mosan// gnasal ched du 'di ltar brjod// omasgyu rkyenanam mkha' la// nyizla skar rgyun bakhor ba yis//
'a bsal nas nyin mtshan bye brag brjod// nyonamosaa rig sradalen gyis// 'du byed srid pa'i las bskul te// rnam shes ming gzugs skya mched drug/ rag tshor skye rga shi sdug bsngal// gsal byed dag/
pa nyid kyis dag/ phyag na rdo rjes bsdus donul// ched dubarjod pabadibarjod do// em zab cing rgyachob// sngags mthu blan madra pa ni// sangs rgyas mu stags kyisami shes// shes pa nyid kyang rdzas
mad la// shes byardzas su ga la yod// shes dang yul gyi rnam par ni// rtog pa'i gzung 'dzinagyis bsgos// de zad nasapa grol bar 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha mo'atshogs// spos dang me tog
'thor byed cing// snyan pa'i sngags kyi glu lisan/ mgon po spyanas gzigs la bstod// o bcom ldan magon po thugs rje spyan ras gzigs// zhal grangasamadog dbyibs dum cir yang snang
stong dang brgyud dngabcugacigajug dang gcig/ byams ba bzhi l bzad mangababa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// spyanama'i bye// o 'badagyes zhal mngog dus cir yang bgyur// la la byams pa snying
dza dga' ba'i zhal// la la 'dod chongasasar snachen po 'i zhal// khrosnangagatum chags lta ldan phyag 'tshal lo// mAm kI'o// o phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas dbang bskur rdzogasapa'i zhal// gtan
bamadapa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag/ mdzad b grangs medachub pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' dkar mo'i go/ o[0f10 ]mdzad pa thugs
rje'i dbyings la thug med kyang// rtsom pa rgya mtsho rgyunam 'chad mdzad pas// zhing rnams mtshonam bar spyong ba yi// mgonapo spyanaras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ma'o// o
nyim gzi ldan 'od zer 'gyed ba ltar// 'jug dgongs mi mang la kun rtog mun bral yang// bskal pa rgya mtshor khyad par don gsa'aba'/ mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od zer
can ma'i 'go/ o sams kyirgyud bgogamya ngana'adas pa'i tshe// 'dod chags byung ma thag tu sha' ba ste// nyon mongs chu ba bcad nas pha mtha' mad// mgonapo spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal
lo// dbyangs can no// o nyonamosabadag tubazung na 'khor bar skye// de la yang yang bgasan ngan 'gror sku// rang bzhin med par shes nas grol bar 'gyur// mgon po spyanas gzigs
la phyag 'tshal go phag gdong mgo/ a chos rnams dag par mthong namatho ris 'thob// gnyis 'dzin rtog pa chad na mya ngana'adas// skyama'i sims dang ldan nagazhanadon 'byung//

mgonapo spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// khro gnyer spyan mchi'o// oMrang tshul sbyod la chags pas sa bonabul// gzhan tshuladaman par brjod pas zhing sa tshig/ lus dan gtsang sbra tsam las byang chub
ring mgon po spyan gzigs phyag 'tshal lo// sa 'dzanimaba'i// o bdag lta mun pa'i dugagis brgyal ba la// bdag med phyogs bral ye shesabadud rtsi'i sman// pha rol phyin bcu spyod dang rtogastsol/
mdzad// mgon po spyan ras gzigs l phyag 'tshal lo// dugasalam// o d+harang tshulabazang spyod nga rgyal zhen pa med// gzhan spyod btang snyoms byams nas rang sems sbyong// srod med bzod ldan
ngang gis rgol ba lags// mgon po spyan rasagazigs la phyag 'tshal lo// ri khrod ma'i// o khrel yod ngo tshashasashang gtong la dga'// dad dang thos ldan tshul khrims shes rab bzang// chog shes
! 'dod chung 'di dang gzhan du phyag/ mgon po spyanaras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ nor rgyunama'i// o yi ge 'dremachod sbyin nyan klog dang 'chad// kha don 'dzin sems sgom brtsond la chu'agi/ khrus
sogs sgrunga gnas adaka'agatsang yon tanasolag/ mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dkaramo'i'o// o rang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spyod// 'jig rten 'jig rtenabarasamachod dam

pa'i dzin// thos bsam sgom brtson de nadagra las rgyal// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par rgyal ma'i glu// so/[0f10 ]tha dad kyi 'ching dbyer med grol ba yi// thabs dang shes rab bde/
chen byang chub lam// rnam thar yeshasamatha' yas dpal stams// mgon po spyan rasagazigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal 'phrengama'i klogo/ o/ bsam pa bzang po gser gyi sa gzhi la// byang chub
phyogs chos dpag bsam shange chen bakhrungs// ye shes thugs nu rgyun rlana mdzad b// mgon po spyan rasagazigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ yid bzang ma'i glugo/ sgra sgrogs 'khor bcas 'das gyur te//
rlung gsabatab pa'i lha dang mtshungs// thalamo spyi bosbyar nas su// ched du brjod pa 'di gsol to// o[0f10 ]mgon po rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gtso borab tuchab 'i lha// bsod nams du mas

bskyed ba'i sku// gshesamatha' yas thugasamanga' ba// blo ldan sridamathara mdzad pa po// tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad// gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che// mdzad spyod mkhob mnyam spyod phyag 'tshal//
denas bcom ldan thub pa ches// 'khoral legasaso legs so zhes// o A hU~MbahU~MAhAbacas// yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs// lcags kyu can gyis nyar nas// klu phyugs 'bum phrag 'dren pa ltar/

ge sbyong kun slo dkarangosayi// byang chub rin chen gling 'joga mdzad// 'apags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma drab zhes bya ba las// gleng gzhi le'u ste dang po'o//
thub pa che// mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// yan lag chashas thams cad las// 'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag/ jugacu drug

nubamatha' gzhal ba// grangasamed dag bkyeba'a mdzad// zhing khamasagrasamadabadunagyi mtha'// phyogs banum lus thams cad du// bod kyis gang nas 'od de las// snyan pa'i tshigs bcad 'di snang ngo/ sangs rgyas

dang ni chos la brnyas pa spangs// le lechadang spyod pa mchog 'dzin sbas// 'gyodadang chos la ma nges 'byed pa spangs// nga rgyal modang 'dod chags sbyor pa spangs// 'gro rnams med na byang chub lam med de// 'grol

brtenanas byang chub che thob 'gyur// byang chub cholam thugs rjechen po ste// 'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar gyur// de skad grags pa'i ri mthaka/ phyogs bcu'i zhingashezhugs sangs rgyas sras// brjod kyis mi lapagatso
bo mchog/ spyanaras gzigs dbang grags med tsho// thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// ma mdzad zhing bder lhags par gyur// 'di nas shar phyogasazhipa khamasan/ grangasamad bdunagyi mtha'anyen gnas /

zhing khams song ste sbyangs par ni// sangs rgyas sangag rol pa yi// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// sbyan ras gzigs dbang sage'i sgra// mdogadakar nyal gyi ri 'drab// byang chub sems mchog byeb phrag
bcu dang lcan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyurab zhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba dum byas/ 'dab ma stongadapaldan pa yi// dngul gyi ma tog du mas gtor//

tshadebar gshegs so rdzogasasangs rgyas// bod ther ngomatshar ldan ba dang/ rmadang chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam b.lagayos ba'agyur// khro ba'i gtimug mun pa bcog/ shes rab matha' yas
gsal bar mdzad// bdag kyang snying po 'di yis thus// 'phrin lasa'adi nyidagro/sa'agying do// o saMhanAngahU~MphaT/ snying bo deskad phul nas kyang// thub pa'i ga la de logasasu// bakhorathacas dgab
ba'i tshul gyis// khubatsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// lho yi phyogs kyi zhing khamasa mchog grangs med bdunagyimatha'anyid kyi// zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na// sas rgyas rin chen dpal
bzhugs pa'i// drung du byadazhubasams dpa'i gso/ spyanasagazigs dbang yid bzhin gyi// norab bakhor los sgyur che// gser gyi rabo'i mdog 'dra ba// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag khacudang
lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyurab zhinadu zhing bde'i byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa// phyag 'tshal bskorob dum byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// 'an[]nags gyim togani// myatshadum

'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegasaso rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zar ngomatshar ldanub dang// rmadabyung tsho ba'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gropa'i sar sna'aching ba bcad/

sbyin pa'i 'byung gnasagatachen rdol// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM pad+ma d+hu ra d+ha ke hUM phaT// snying po de skaphul nas kyang// thub pa'i ga la de logs su//
@#/// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis// pus btsugs thalamo sbyar nas bzhugs// nubakyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams parlobajug
ban sangs rgyas pad+ma 'byung gnas bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ spyanaras gzigs dbang thugs rjecan// pad+manit+taAragatso// pad+ma ga'i 'brab// byang chub sems tshogs byub/
phrag bcud lhan cig mkha' lag shigs// glog 'gyur bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan magonapo thubapa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba dumakhyas// 'dabamo stong dang ldan ng pa'i// pad+ma rAgami
tsha togani// byamadum 'thomabar mdzad// bdaba' gshags so rdzogs sangs rgyas// da zar ngo mtshar ldan b dung// rmadabyung chen po'i tshogs bcas kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro
pa'i'adod chags 'dam rdzab bskums// tshul khrims byugasmos char du phab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrinalas 'dinyid grogasabgyid do// o pad+mardzogs te shwa ra hIhUMphaT/ snying po//
de skad phul nas kyang// thub pa'i ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i lagyisan// pusabatsugs thalamo sbyar nas bzhugs// byang gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchogra/ grangs med
bdun mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams rdo rje bkod ba// sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs med bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// thugs rjechen po
sa ni/ mi bshel// panachemar gda'ipo 'dra// byang chub sems tshog seb phrag/ khanudang lhan cig mkha' lagshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin duzhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan magon po thub pa 'a//
phyag 'tshal bskorab dum byas// 'dab ma stong dpaldan pa yi// mchata yi ma togani// rgyatshadum 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshagasas rdzogasasangs rgyas/'od zer ngomatsha raldan pa dang//
rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i le lo'i nags tshal bsregs// brtson 'grus bskul ba'i me dpung sbar// bdag kyang snyadi pod yi
mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs brgyad de// or[Y]a gra a pra tidapahU~MphaT/ snying pod skad yulags kyang// thub pa ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni//
pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// byang shar phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' 'dakyi// zhing khams gter chen brtsegs ban// sangs rgyas don
yod 'byung gnas bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems pa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ rje btsun don yod zhags pa can// shel gyi ri mdog 'dra ba// byang chub
sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcudang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhun duzhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa ga/ phyag 'tshal bskor bo du ma byas// 'dab ma
stong dang lcanupa yi// ban chen shel gyi ma togan rgya chen du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegaso rdzogs sangs rgyas// bor ther ngomatshar ldan pa dang//
rmad byung chen po'i tshogs bshad kyis/// zhung rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i zhe sdang bo bcom// bzod pa'i nyimalhang nger mdzad// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus//
phrine'os 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// o d+hAkhrolakya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra tihata h+phahatshuphaNasA hA/ Ang po da skad phul nas kyang// thub pa ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga'
ba'i tshul gyisan// pus btsugs thalamo sbyar nas bzhugs/ shar lho'i phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdunagyimatha' nyid kyi// zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas
smanagyi babyung gnas bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpatshigatse// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rjebatsunas la halache// du sha ra kirab badra// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/
tshazla bcudang lhan cigamakha' lagshegs// glog bgyur bzhin du zhing bdir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba dum byas// 'dabam stong dang ldan pa yi// pushar ka'i ma tog ni/
rgya chod ma thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs sogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer mtshan ldan b dang// rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yosapar gyur// 'gro ba'i phrag dog dug/
sdong sprul// bsam gtan bdud rtsi rgya mtsho rlabs// bdag kyang snying po da yi mthus// 'phrin las de nyid klogasabgyid do// e ha laha lah+phapad+magam+b+haphaTasAhA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang
thubapa'og la de legs su// 'khor bcas dgongs ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mosbyar nas bzhugs/lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khamasa mchog/ glangasamed bdun gyi mtha'anyidan// zhing khams

pad+mas brgyan pa na// sangs rgyas pad+maTisnying po bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgonapo spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rjebatsunapad+ma rgyam gyi lung// zangasamathun gyi ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems mchog

byeb phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkhag lagshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan magon po thub bal// phyag 'tshalabaskorab du byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// bsam zhun gyi ma toganI/ rgya che du

ma'athor bar byed// bde bar gshags sordzogasasangs rgyas// bodazerangomatshar lcan pa dang// rmad byung chen po'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnamapagagos ba'agyur// bgro ba rmongs pa'i thibs po bcom//

sna tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen b// bdag kyang snying bo'i yemathus// 'phrin las 'di ture grogs bgyid do/ opad+ma a laM kA ra hUMphaT sAhA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang// thub pa'i ga la de logs sa/ kho'abacas

dgababa'i tshul gyis na// pusagatsugasathal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// nub byang phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangasamer bdun mtha' nyid na// zhing khams la rgya zhes bya bar// sas rgyas dam tshig dpalabazhugs so
drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang na// dzebatsunaro chos dbang phyug/ nor bu dung gi kha deg 'dra// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bdudang lhan cing/ mkha'

lagshegs// klog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan magon po grub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba dum byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// sdug gi snying po'i ma tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// bde

bar gshegs so lcogasasangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang// rmad byung chen po 'itshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i mnarasams zhenang gsal// mthu stobs chen po'i

tshadorjesabatab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// o padzad+harmad+ha tu[%]sA hA/ snying po da skad yul nas kyang// thub pa'i ga la de logs su// bakhor bcas dga' ba'i tshul

gyisan// bsagatsug thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// steng gi phyogs kyi zhing khamasa mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mthab nyid na// zhing khams gtsug tor brtsigs pa na// sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs//
drung du byang chub sems dpa'igatso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// haharihare la// zhon zhes rab tu grags pa yi// rdzobatsun chos kyi gtsug tor de// in+d+ra nI la'iriba'i mdog/ byang chub sems
[/ ]tshogs bye ba phrag/ bdudang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskorang du ma byas// 'damam stong dang ldan pa yi//
in nIla'i me togani// rgya che rum 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang// rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par
gyur/ 'gro ba'i log lta'isgrib g.yogasasel// dag pa'i smon lama 'khor lebaskor// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin lasa'adir grogs bgyid do// o b+ha hU~MhahU~MswAhA/ snying po de skad phul
nas kyang// thub pa'ig la de logasasu// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyisani// pus gtsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// bog gi phyogs kyi zhing khamasa mchog/ grasomod bdun gyi mtha'anyidan// zhing
khams za ma tog mdzesan// sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhugs so// chung du byang nubasams dpa'igatso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ ljobatsunamagrin pa sngon po rgyal// an da rAl gyi'i bu/

badra// byang chub samasatshogs bye ba phrag/ banu dang lhan cigamakha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan magon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// bdabam stong dang ldan
g.yi// and rale gyim tog ni// rgya mdu ma 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshags so gas sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang/ rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos

par gyur// bgro ba'i shes bya'isgribanagasasal// ye shes ralagris rtsa ba phrags// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogasaM bgyid do// om Nipad+mehU~M/ snying po da skad phulags kyang
thub pa'i ga 'de legs// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pusagatsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// spyan sagazigs dbang tshogs 'dusanas// rig sngags mthu chen
bachad pa dang// gzhan don rdzogasapara mdzad pa deg/ shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun// phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis legs so byin//

namamakhabasnyan pa yis kyang bkyang// de'i tshe phyogasabcur bzhugs pa la// khro bo'i rgyalapo ma lus rnams// sa stangs thams cad gar gyisabakang// g.yas brkyang g.yonabargyad zla gam dang// zlum po gru bzhi
gru gsum 'gros// mchong dang gyad mchongs hril po dang// jobs dang btsir ba'i tshul gyis su// bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad// lag pa thal sbyar phye btsums bkyed// sor mo gsog bsnol

gcig 'khyudadang// kun bstsol kun 'akhyud kun gdangasaM dang// rgyab bsnol res 'khyud kun 'akhyud dang// mos res 'khyud bsgrungs kun bsgrung dang// mnyamagazhag dang ni mchog gi rgya// saganen skyabs na mchog

spyisogs// phyag rgya dumabagegasats+tsala mdzad// gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// gdong banugacig pa zhes bya pa// snga named nga 'irig sngags rmad// ngomatshar
byung zhes thos ma thag/ las kyashan bdar gyur nas// rgyal mchog gtsobodrung lhags te// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug stabangaskad gsol// gang zhigagadong banugacig pa yi/ 3/

rig sngagasalenAcipa'i dzin pa dang// rgyun du'adon dang yid la byed// bajig rtenamagonapo spyan ras gzigs// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams// gang gis yid la byed pa 'am// yang na ji tsam dran yang rung//

dgeldan rigs kyi bu de ni// phyogs banu'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sras// byang chub sems dpa' masakyi bshes// rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab// byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te// bdag cag rnams nidi yi 'bangs/

skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste// bsod namasa rnams kyi gter ldan zhing// de yi tshul khrims ral ba med// mi skya ba don yod de// lha gnas dga' gnas sprugasab tu// yashis bod zer bdud rtsi 'dzud// 'jig rten 'di

yand rigs dang// gdon rigasadzisnyad lod pa'i m// rig sngags byad stemasam lus pa// delatshugasapar mi 'gyur ro// chog bzhin du spyad pa yis// tshangs pa'i tshatshad gnasas kyang// shabasems brgyalamad pa
ni gnas 'pho tshul gyisamathorasi 'jug/ rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang// rgyal ba rnams 'chos nyan cing// rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig cu// stobs dang mi 'jigs kun bsdus te// mtshan dang

dpe byad ldan gyur nas// skad cig glog 'gyu jibazhin du// gro ba ma lus dag byed cing// zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'irgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las
lhabyung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas laganardo rdzobadzin// bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la// phyag 'tshalaphyogs su 'khod nas ni// gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol// phyogs
banurab zhugs ng rgyal dbang// mgon po spyanaras gzigs dbang kun// rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon// bgro gathugs brtsa chen po yis// snying po byin rlabs ldan lagasol//

rmad du byung ba'i snying po la// phyogs bcub rgyal ba sras bcas dang// 'gapa 'dzina rnams 'athunapar dgyes// 'on kyang 'grom gzungs dang// dngos grub thams cad myur ba dang// snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir//

mgonapo thugasarje rnams kyi// byin rlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags// badren pa de 'di bshad du gsol// rig sngags ma zla ba'i 'od// nuba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed// 'gro ba thugs brtsa mdzad ba dang// bdag
la phanaba'i don slad du// rgyal ba mya ngan nadra bas// rtsabashigazungs sngagasa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// sdig kun myur sgrol bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//
skugasung thugs kyi thugs rjelas// sbyan ras gzigs dbang sapage'i sgra// rtsa ba'i rig sngags bdagasungasaso// na mor tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba latagyur la/ bod+hisat+tA ra// mahAsan+d+hAya/ mahA
kA Ni kA ya/ tad+yathA/ o aka bka Ti/ ni ka'i/ TikaTe/ ka Ta ka Te/ ka Tabar sAhA/ yon tan ye shesatshogs rnams kun rig sngags 'dis ni nges par skyod// khyad bar dunamadzanadal// rtswa

las byung ba'i mibazhin no// rtogaldan rnam shesabargyad kyi gzhi// sbyor phyin maNaya g+ham pa brgyad// bsaraskya yi bdud rtsis byugs// yan lag bcuganyisamago bcas pa// sngagasagras byin gyisabarlabs byugs

nas lhag ma gan lag thig le bya// cung zad rtsa la mang bsan// dus dus sum brgya drug cu'achad// nyimagrangs kyis dag nas ni// lo gcig dus su rtog ldan gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dpal skyid

'tsho ba zlog pa yi// ting nge 'dzin bsnyoms zhugs nas// skugasung thugasakyisdo rje las// mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'digasungs so// moran+natrayA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lekati shA rA ya/

bod+hisatAya/ mahAsan+d+hAya/ mahA kAruNikA la/ tad+ya thA/ o tsakrawa tipad+ma tsin+tam NidzAl mahApad+me ru ra tisAdzAl A karayahihUMphaT swA hA/ bajig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// glo bur gnodape gsal ba'i phyir//

bdun phrag sngagasagrangs dang mnyam pa'i// nyung kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad/ rang gi lus sam yan lag la// mchodadangabacas pas gdags par bya// de la yang yang gsol ba gdab// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches//

khamasagasumadabangadubya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyomasazhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi derdzalas// mgon po pad+ma gar dbang gi/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'digasungs so// namorat+na tra yAl/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te
mahArU ya/ bod+hisat+tAya/mahAsatA ya/ ma tu kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sasat+tAbAsanAg d+hin/ namasaNasatApisanA/ Ahar Ni/ nam sarbasatAb yo d+ha ra NAl/ namasaM b+ha pra shan ya/ namasachasatwa bo

b+hitsit+tikaMsan ka rA ya// namasamasarlaban+d+han dan ka rAya/ nams rmas pa san/ A ha ra Ni/ namasarbaan+d+hekA ra bi d+hanAa kA ra/ namasarbab cu d+har nA dza pa sha pa ta ye mahAyog yonIshA ru ya/ has has+yanaM
dal[0f10 ]namas+saM tA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki tihAramu khod ge raMshib bar// nAg/ yak+Sha rAkAs/ shakya pad+ma ka pA la ya 3bi mahishAr/ nA ra yanas nid/ ku bar/ sa su ran/ mAtrig/

namas+saMtatra/ badzra khu Nas phrod pa// ha ya gribanAm mamahrad ya/ nA wan+ti mib pra me yo tasAd kaM a bahaM/ sarbabi nA ya ki amog+haM/ sarbakam b+hi le/ binA ya kan/ tadu thA/ o ta pu la/ tanu ta la/ bi tar la/

sarba bi kaka/ sarba bud d+ha bidani/ pradzAtopa te/ an 'khis la ka/ aT+TatAs keshwarAya/ a tob pra bi ta ya/ badzrakhu banit+tatita/ tsa tepa du da la/ brjod shAn+titati/ si tam du tag tapranam tab kA ra bar

du da ma gsaM b+ha kan klur/ sa bcu btAha ka ra/ par mashAn+tika ra/ bud d+ha bo d+hA yati/ b+ha ga bi ha ya grwa ba sarbab tu tshod ya/ mAbartagam/ la rgya khadra/ lahAro// man+tan/ rakArak+Sha/ At+masAstitanamany+dzAn/

sidad+ha sod+hu/ sarbakarmadzam/ sid d+ha sadi/ dehid/ A A ye sha/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ samagralaa pra tihata/ rdzun blun/ birnyan bi d+hun/ ma tha ma tha/ pram tha pra ma tha/ sarbapa rakram kr-itAn+tagro/

kAkhor da duralaM gi tahi/ ma shi ka/ bi' ka ta/ sAshadi/ ping chu log ab+hi tsar/ bshAka ra nas ni+taany+dzan/ tsakumo hanatsin+ta/ pishi gsan ra/ nir+ya a pa rAgrosha ka ra Na/ a pa tAsal/ mahAbargyus/

rinadz+hadakanaM/ sarbab+hu b+husachasad+d+hanaM/ rak+tar//mA mnu t+tad+ham+masaMg+ha a dzA time kamahIg+ho/ ku ru ku ruphaT/ ha ya grwa ba phaT/ badzrangota ka Ta b+hirab pa ra sen thaT/ ya ka tsitamAm ahid shi ge pa ya kra min to/

maMtra yaM tra saman+ti/dzal ri dzu ti/ ka khord kurbadinaM/ sarba dzam lo dra pra titwA ya phaT/ nams dulcagra botasA ra nA yahal glibasi d+d+haM tum man+d+ha pa rAnaswA hA/ o amr-i tod b+habA yahU~MhUMphaT phaT swA hA/ nams/

sa// sits+tsaM tu mo san par nIsany+tsa/ grang zhig klus non spyi la na/ dung gi me tog sngags stong gis// byin gyis brlabs nas gul bdug/ lus la thogasan legs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// thogs

chad sems dbang zhes bya bgi/ ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// sku gsung thugs kyidzo rdzolas// mgon po thugs rje ibashol ba'i// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungasaso// namorat+na tra yA ya// nam Arab

leka te shA rA ya/ bo d+his ya/ mahAsatwA ya/ ma hAkArANikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ namasamab+him tsakaraM/ sarba ro ga dra shamad ka raM/ sarba pAd+hinab+ha ra ka raM/ any+dzak+Sha Napa des satAny+tsa/ tArAsamyaka t+tarA/
pyadasha dag bo d+his b+hunamasamyaka saM bud+d+hako kaM/ a hanamasi daArub katishAr shud d+hat+tAr NimashAkar TikA ra// a grab taM/ mahAkA ru NikA ra a gra nAmadzral sa tikA ra/ mahAka ru

pasaoM taharaMtu/ tad+yathA/ mo dzaT dza Ta/ dzi'i Ti dzu dza/ rarer ra/ ro rir ra/ ka la ka la/ ka li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hAkAru NikA ya/ sam+batathA ga ta/ mahAsaMgra1/ anuharanA/ argyas Mng+g+ha la/

ehehi/ tsa ta tsa ta/ tsititsiti/ tsututu/ sarbabo d+hisatra/ pra Nid+hanagrib+ha kA ra a nusan+d+hA ya/ mahAkAru[P]kA ya/ saM gru ba e rgyahi/ ra la ra la/ ru lu ru lu/ rgyun bkAsamA d+hi/ sam ba tI b+hi raa lho
tiSh+Tha/ tsa la tsal/ tsalitsil/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pod+hibi d+he de e hi/ budad+hopudaD+ha/ phudarnyas te na/ d+harmas rkyen/ saM g+ha sa rkyen/ o Ta sgyu smra/ sajamahAm khri tAnipa ran+tu//
mahAkaraNamagaMAmasarbarAganib rayan/ bun bu zha(bi bun ba bun/ mthatha/ pramatha bram tha/ o Tasbo s+sa/ a byahi/ mAms shadu yaM tu/ karmabasho ng+ha la/ mahAkAru NikA ya/ mahUpad+ma nAtA

ya/ pad+ma a bA la sAhA/ shAtaAdzA ub ban+d+ha ya swA hA/ kar ri NiswAhA shu b+hadz+he swAh+pha/ tsakru sahA/ ya me sUt+tA/ oMd tsab bdad+he sgyusany+tsasaM spa tsheglo budad+he sAke/ adu pa duu0f38blo ba d+hi

sAhA/ padake b+ho bya b+hiSh+ThasAhA/ bi b+hi dbye ba de sAhA/ sAb nipradzIka byeb dbyas hA/ blum oM ti ri ka sha tsar byAb+ha d+ha b+husAhA/ tad+ya thA/ o dwaT duT/ tAtitra ti/ rUtu d+hu tu naAmasarba b+ha la/
b+husajoa pa drabob+hu/ rakArak+Sha ku ru swAhI/ gras gras su hA/ ma tha mtha/ pra ma tha pra ma tho/ han han/ ha da had/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nam Ar+ya ba lo ki tiArA ya// bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma sUsaya/
ma hAkA ru Niklu ya/Adz+dzA pa ya tisAhA/ shang ka ra yi sabonal// stong du bzlas nasadri chu dang// lhan cig skyang sa'akhyug ran// lhagand drag po ba joms par byed// de nas bcom ldan thub pa
ches// rig sngags sprodagatongagazhom pa ya/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po don sogazhags pa yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags de gsungs so/

'a0 nams la rlu a nu ga tapra tiT+Thitib+husalpabud d+ha bo d+hisatre namapa bye ka bud d+haAr+yab kasaMgany+nyo/ a tIta anA ga tapra tutapaNIts+tshe/ namasamyakag tAnaM/ namasamyaka pra tipamahU~M/ namashar pra tI

pu wAya ma hAm ta ya/ na ma A ya tre ya pramu khe b+h+yA/ ma hApo d+hisatAsaMb+heSh+Tha/ namasu pra tiT+Thita/ sha len+darA dzapra ma khe/ sarbatathAg tasgyu argyud byas myaka saM bud d+ha b+ho b+hag bdo b+h+yA/ namasub/

bamyusu pa tipas binan+taArarAdzA ya tathAg tul// namasaMhabi kI Di ta rAdzA la ta thAg tAya/ nam Ar+ya am tAb+hA ya ta thA ga tA/ namasu pratiT+Thitam NikAT rA dzA ya tathAg tuya/ namasaman+tarasmyud ga ta

bi kA TarA dzA yo tathA ga tAya/ namo bi pI na tathAg tA ya/ na mashi khrin tathA ga tAya/ na mo ba shwa b+hu dzatathA ga tA yaM/ nam kla kun dru ya ta thAg tAya/ namakan kamun ya ta thA ga tAya/ nam kau khyapA/
ya tathA ga tAya/ nemashAkya mun ya tathA ga tAya/ ad+ha te samyakasaM bud d+hA ya/ ta thA/ oM mu ne munimahAmun ya swA hA/ osamo samamahAsam rekArakaaM sams t+taM shAsarba pA paM bshamane swA hA//

namasu pa'i kirtitanAm b+he ya'i yatathAg tAya/ namasaman+ta a wa b+hAsabi dza tisaMgrwaya shri ya ta thA ga tA ya/namain+d+ra ke tud+hadzad ye tathAg tAya/namorat+thapa lha so shul rAdzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ namo a pra taha ta

b+ha btsunAdzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ namopi kAn+tagAmin tathAg tA ya/ namo bud+d+hAya/ namon+tamAya namasaMg+hA ya/ namo a tIta anag tapratutapar rgyu bud d+ha b+ho b+ha ga ba ta tad+ya thA smitibarnyan/ ma ti brnyan//

ga ti badz+dzani/ b+haM tibarnyani/ pradzaban+tan/ bra tib+hanaban+tani/ ma brnyani/ pi pa bya rgyu wa ni/ sarba bo b+hipak+Shad+hamabargyun/ sa ka la bud d+dad+harmapa ri pU ra NI ya swA hA/ na mo rat+tatrayA ya/ nam snyaca

awa le shA rA ya// bod+hisatAya/ mahAsat+tAya/ mashAkA ru Ni kAl/ namoa hAsam pAb+hA ya/ bod+hisatA ya/ mahAs twA ya/ ma hAkAr NikA ya/ eg+ho namany+dzi tAi daM Ar+yaa wa lo kiteshwa ram khod shwa ra mu khod

gA a mogatAshar dzAnAmagrid yaM ta g+hag tAsaMmu khe b+hA tamahatapa'i dzom rgyu a hamadAnAm bayi mi sid+d+han tume man patAsarbab+ha ye sbyomamasarmasatwA nurakA b+ha btu/ tad+ya thA/ o tsar tsar/ tsi rici'i/
tshuratshur/ ma rama'/ mi rimir/ mu ru mu na/ mahAkAru Nika/ sa rasar/ si risi/ su chos su/ tshur tshur/ tsiritsir/ ba par/ ba ri pa'i/ ma'i ma ri/ maApad+mahasta/ ka la ka la/

ki li ki li/ ku lu kulu/ ma hAshud d+husatA/ bu bu h+phu/ bo d+hibaD+ha bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya// ka Thaka Na/ ki NikauNi/ puN+Dang/ bar m shud d+ha satra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki'i kir/ ku ru ku ru/ mayu sbru ma prasta/
tsalatsal/ salcalasastsal/ bi tsal ba tsal/ btsal phratsal/ azla aN+Da/ b+har b+har/ b+hi'i b+hir/ lhun phyur/ ta ra ta ra/ tir tir/ cur d+haru/ e h+phahimawAkAruNika/ ma hAng shu pa ti pa 2 d+hare/
d+haran+tar/ d+hiridz+hiri/ d+hu ru klu ru/ tar tar/ sa rasar/ tsar tsar/ pa ra par/ bar bar/ maram 'o/ lar la ra/ harahar/ hAhAhItI/ hUhU/ o kar brah+made 2ra/ d+ha rAd+har/ b+hirid+hi'i/
rgyur d+hun tarata ra/ sa'asar/ tshar tsar/ na nar/ bar bar/ har hur/ rami sha tas hasu pra timaN+Ditasha mIr/ dzA la dzAl/ tapa ta pa/ b+has b+has/ blas ma/ lhag wA so ma/ Ad kyi/ yam//
bar Na/ kuper/ brah+mahU/ bla yu/ agi/ d+hand/ da bar khrig Naa byar tsitatsar Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mur rgyu ru klu ru/ sanata ku mA ra/ 'dra/ bAsapa/ blta/ d+hand/ bA yu/ agi/ ri'i/

nA ya ka/ banA ya ka/ khu tshub bi d+hab kha d+har/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi'i d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha rathar/ g+ha rag ra/ ya ra yar/ la ral ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa rang ra/ sa ra sa ra/ bar par/ bar dwa la ka/ sa man+ta

wa le ka ta/ bil kaMta/ lekashrar/ mahashur/ tib+hubashwar/ saM gu Nasam AlaM kr-i ta/ a wa lo ki tishAr/ ma busu gu mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ mulcamuny+tsa/ rak+Sha rakAnAMsams twaMny+tsa/ sarba b+hU ya
byu sarbabadrab be sazlobasarba byas rbagra he sam+bayA d+hisarlaba'i b+husawadzAre a paM/ ba d+habaiD+han/ tANan/ tadzan/ rAdzataskar/ ag+ni/ ud ka/ sha ba rim tsaka/ ka Thaka Na/ ki Ni/
kyi rtaku tsar tsar/ ci'i phyir/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la/ bod+b+hag/ tsacur ar+yas byas M pra kAsha ka/ tang tapa/ tam tam/ dam dam/ samasam/ ma sam sa/ d+ham d+hamamahAkA ru Nika/

mahAtamo an+d+rakA rabi dz+haman/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU pa ka/ mal mal/ mi limi'i/ mul mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha khang Tha/ Ti Ti TiT/ chu Tu rgyu/ ri wi Di/ nu'u zhu Tu/ an ya tsarma kra tapa ri ka ra/
e himasAkA ru Nika/ IshAr/ mdeshwar/ ma hAb+hatag NasaMb+ha ka/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki'o/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra par/ ha ra ha ra/bar ba ra/ 'a sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/
ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku ru ku rgyu/ maTas Da/ mahAbi shud d+ha bi Ta ya nibAsin/mahA ka ru Nika shI tayapa pIta/ rat+tau kuT/ mAlA d+har/ sawadzA sarasi kr-i ta dzan mu ku Ta/ ma hA adab+hu to/

kam la a tsAkr-ita kar tal/ rgyun/ samA d+hi/ bimo klu a pra kamyu/ ba lu sa tAsan+ta tiparipA tsaka/ mahAkAru Nika sarba karma A wa ra Nabisho d+ha ka/ sarba dza tshan pa'i tUr ka/ sarba byA d+hi par mo tsaka/ sa
tAAAyaripUr ka/ sarbasatAAb+hAsan ramosdus te sAhA/ amo g+ha la sahA/ a mo g+ha pAshA ya swahA/ a dza tA ya AhA/ apa rA dzi tAyasA hA/ a mi tAb+hA ya swA hA/ a mi trAb+hA sut+tA ya swA hA/

sArasaMrgya pa mdzanA ya swA hA/ ab+ha yA swA hA/ ab+ho a bra d+hA ya swA hA/ dzamA ya Any+tsa/ bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ya bi dza yA swA hU/ bar ng+ha ya sAhA/ bar pra da ya sa twA/ a kA lam phyu pra sha mnA ya swA hA/
idany+tsame karmaku mun sU tes hA/ or Ner NahU~MphaT/ oM dza yahUMphaT/ o pradzi sAhA/ o shudza ya swAhA/ o hri/ rwa lokya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra tehatahriha hUM phaT swahA/ o bsu ba ta

sAhA/ o A ro lika snahA o ba shule bdule sAhA/ o aro loka hri hri[]hUMphaT swA hA/ naya tas niya ta tha da na ma ashu b+has+ya me b+hag+ha ga bI karmaNo ashe kha tathAk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hU~M/ o pad+mahAsta ya
ba/ swahA o bud d+hi d+harma saM g+ha ya swA hA/ rabs chad thod b.re bsregasas// nyungs kar ser po dri chur bcas// bskyodade myu gus sngags stong brjod// 'bras bu la ni khri brjod bya// sa thogasan
byad snyoms sogs// nad dang gdon rnams myur du sal// gzhan dag las rnams gang la yang// bdun bdun gras kyi sngags kyis sbyar// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// ltas 'gro bas na reb rgyal
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgonapo ha laha la ya// rtsaba'i rig sngags 'di gsungasaso// namorat+tatrayA ya/ nam sarba bud d+ha bo d+hisat+tA ya/

sarbasu re shA rA ya/ nam A ba lo kiteshwarA ya/ ma hAsan+d+hA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ namomahAsgra ma prat+ta Ar+yam ru Ar+yaaSh+ThahU~M/ ar+ya badzrapa Niah+phakaM/ b+ho d+hisatAm hAsate blu a te nam/

gritaM/ b+hagab+haM/ Arub le kitaM shA ra hUMsrid yasarbakarma pa da/ sarbagra hod/ na ka ra/ b+ha ba amar NibanAsha ka ba shAtaM/ pyad yasbyo daMhi bo had+hisatAm hAbo d+hisatwA/ pra ya bo d+hi sat+tha/ hahAl Artsub le ki

teshwarA la/ pa ramamo tratsitakA ru Nika/ ku ru ku ru/ kamag+ha ma bahaMgamab ya ti/ mahAbi dza yan+ti/ b+hun d+hur/ b+hur d+har/ tsa yaM tramaM tra/ mom r+yad+haM/ sarbasatwab+ha ya/ prad sa ha ra ha ra/ ha'i b+ha rgya
nodash+tsa/ bA bA bAbA b+hA pAnA ga ku ru ku ru/ tur ru/ g+haregyur/ su ru sur/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu'u/ su pras d+he/ satAm bam la/ phal phal/ mAn+ti/ A ba lo ki tishA rA ya// par ma kA ru Ni
ka krit+ta dzAnaD+ha dza TA mu ku Ta bi lamash+tsa/ pral/ tsale tsa le/ ma lam la/ ka la ka la/ ha la ha la/ ga lag la/ ta la ta ta/ du la da la/ nalan la/ tul tu lu/
gu lu hu lu/ hi li hi li/ habo d+hisatwA/ nam skya rAnu shub+hUhU/ thigyur ku ru/ phrad ya/ a nus+sar/ sa ma ya a nu sma ra/ idaMmi karuMku ru/ mnor thamed/ par pur ya/ sid d+haM tu/ ma maM tra
ba tAnisA hA/ snga bar khrus byas gos gtsang gyo// bcom ldan spyan sngar nyin re bzhin// ba lcis la ma lhung bas// dgyil 'khor gru bzhi lhamapa ni// bcu gsum bzlas nas phyug par bya// lhag mas nad
rnams thams cad la// byugs pa tsam gyis sos par nges// zla badrug gis bdud rnams zhi// 'dod pa thams cad skongasagyur te/ mtshams med lnga byas mis kyang 'grub// gal te 'grub par ma gyur na// bdag/

gisamatshamasamad las byas te// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun basrungasayin// snying rjesasnying rdzacan 'grub 'gyur// snang bas khros pa 'grub 'gyur te// rtag pa'i gnas 'dod blo gros can// rnam par mi rtog

btangasnyoms kyis// 'dod pa kun 'grub zhen pas byin// yid la byed pas bachi bar 'gyur// sa'u po che yi lcag mal// rebasregs thal ba khri phrag bdun// bsngags nasagatogab char ches pa// char pa myur du
bachad par byed// drichu gla rtsir bcas pas nai// sprul gyi gdug bsel bar byed// lte baphya'i rigasangangasgreng dgod sogs// 'jigs pa rnams ni 'grib pa'i phyir// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// shes

mawa rab rnam grol zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyomasazhugs zhas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdzolas// mgon po pad+margyan lung gi/ rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// morat+tatra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya ba le ka
teshwarAya/ bod+hisatA la/ mahAsan+d+hAya/ mahA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+yathA/ nam Ar+ya ami tAb+ha la/ tathAg tu ya/ ad+ha he samyakasaM bud d+hA ya/ namom b+hasmA pApA pa bo d+hasatA la/ mahAsatwAya//
mawAkA ru NikA ya/ namo ba pu kha bsal/ su pra til/ sUr+yasha ta yi/ sgurasha tas ha sra/ ab+hi ker/ i b+ha ba ti muts+tshaye/ mahAm Nim Ta kuN+Dal alo ra d+hAraNi/ lhag ba te bang+galA le/

sar pheka a pA ya shaman ye/ bibib+hasu bsam be sha daab sha sachasatA pa ri mo tsa kAya/ b+hum+b+hab swAhA/ mahAlekaT+Ta rA ya/nam smra mir pa dra banAsha ka/ rAge be shi mo h+phadzAl sham ka sha sam shan

kAr/ rak+Sha ka sarbaa b+ha ya dun tipa shAman kUr/ sarmas ma shan kAr/ sarbaAsha pa ri pU raka/ sarbatathAg tasaM baM d+han ka ra a tsehi/ mahA bo d+hisatAbard/ pad+ma a ba lo ka saM budab+ho/ mahAkAruNi

kA ya dzahA mu ku Ta/ alaM kri ta/ shir ma Ni/ ka NakarA dzratA/ badz+dzab cha myaa laM kr-i tasha rIr am ta ta dzaka ma a laM kri tu pra b+ha ra Nashatas has a pa lasha takA ya// mahAbo d+hisatAb rad/ bdaM khad ma/

bi nA sha ya bi nAsha ya/ ma h+phayan+tami kesha ka pa ta/ a ba bo d+hib+ha/ bo lhiyaM tra/ gas tsar/ ka pra ma than kar/ bur kha pad+ma bu rib/ saM pra ra Na/ b.ru shAsI ha/ bar bar/ dzas tan Da pa rAbri ta//
su thu@#// d+hamarnyam/ sa masam/ rlur d+hu ra/ pra shasam dra shasam ya/ ki kir/ b+hi ri b+hib ri/ tsi'i/ siris ni/ sumusuru/ d+hiri b+hiraM/ bi b+hiribi d+hi ri/ pi pir/ mu mu su/
mu ya u ya/ muny+tsamuny+tsa rgyu nu gyu/bi rU pi cu/ d+hu ru d+hur/ ga yag ya/ glu ta la klu ta ya/ has pas/ pa shAs pahAs/ nAg bi bi d+ha ke shas san/ harahar/ saMha rasaM har/ du ru dur/ ma hA maM

rgyu ga la ka ra Ni/ sha ta pras/ ka ba a ba b+hA sa ta pi bi d+ha bas shas ka/ rag kAm mahabo d+hisatwA/ b+ha rab+ha rasahA/ thub ba sha dang shu dag la// khri phrag bzlasanas 'thungs pas// shes rab chen po 'phal
bar byed// nad lamathun pa'i smanadang sbyar// pad+ma'i rtsa pa karar bcas// nyishu gcig gam yang na bdun// sngags brjod snga bar med par bya// de yang dbyangs snyan shes rab 'phel// danas bcom
ldan thub baches// dgongs pa bla med ces bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rje rdzalas// mgon po rdo rje chen po ya// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// namor//

tra yA ya/ nam A ba lo kitishar ya/ bo t+tisatwA ya/ mahUsatwA ya/ mahAkAr NikA ya/ tad+ya thA na mo b+ha ga ba te/ ba ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ad+hatosamyaka saM bud d+hA ya/ sarba A dzA ba/ an+d+ha kA
ra/ Am yi tra/ tad+yathA/ o sa d+ha nas d+hani sidi d+ha sidaD+ha/ sid d+hadz+har/ b+ha ga ba te/ bar Mpar/ klashadaban/ a lam Nisha ma ya/ sarbapA pajishud d+he/ d+ha man d+ha ma ni/ mA lA
ma tsar a bigatsar NehAkaMud+hi/ khar dra te/ sazakla sha dwapa ni/ bi d+hamanA/ bidam Ni/ banA sha ba h+phesha/ banA sha ya pa rlasha ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ bu ras bi ma la bad+hi/ sarasar/ si risi ri/
sur su ru/ pra sa ra pra sar/ bris rab sar/ AyAm i tis hA sa t+taM/ tsit+taM kA rAm/ abar NakA pa yAm tisu b+hu ta bi sha la/ pAshab ni par mi tAb+hA dzAnag ca ri/ pA sha sha ba ti/ shamA le

ni kA ra Nago tsA'i/ mahAdzAn a b+hi'i kam tisubani todaD+ha/ hehab+hagab te ma tAkAr NikA ya/ ku rug ru/ bisha d+ha sa bo na/ mamasam+basatAb+ho ma hA ka ru NotasA d+haken/ sany+tsasany+tsa/ sa brtag/ saMb+ha

lab roha yame/ mahA karu TikA ya/ bi dza ya pa ri shud d+hA ya amu ka'i u ru bi dza yan/ sa rasar/ meg+hag te/ mAmAmA/ bod+hitsita tis ma bud d+he ma san+takha/ bo d+hi mi ri karaNi/ bud d+hab+ho d+hi pAde//

naraka pra ta tir ka gi tudu khagu la ni/ dbam nu khyug tisaM bod ni/ bag taklasha samAnu d+had+harma/ pa ri pUr Nibadzad+harmasid ts+tsaM mamahUpa tAni sa hA/ sngabar langs nas khrus byas te/ skyilakrungamanyamagazhag
phyag rgya can// yid kyis phyag 'tshalishu gcig/ dordzachos la dad pasabarjod// brgyad dang banubazhi btselnga la// gos gsar gyon nasagaso sbyong byung// me tog tsan danadakar sogs mchod// don
grub sdigs shesarab 'phal// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// bdud rnams 'joms pa rdo rje yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di
dgasungasaso// namorat+tatra yA ya/ nam Arubale kite shar ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ mahAsatwA ya/ mahA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+yathA/ na mob+ha ga wAte/ ami tAb+hAya/ tathA ga tA ya//
ad+ha te samyaka saM budad+haya/ nam Arub lekatishA rang/ hari har big+han d+ham ka/ bod+hisatA ya/mahAsan+d+hA ya/mahAkAru NikA ya// i li li/ li tsil/ e cul/ kurtsami ku ru ye/ si'i si'i/
bsi'i/ tsar ya/ bishar/ g+ho ro/ d+har/ tAiNi/ ma tagi/ puk+kasi/ ka Ta ya/ mA latsan+d+hal/ bur malin/ tsi li tsi li granas mdaman ku ru/ tsan+d+ramu khi/ lagrum Naya ma ti/ Achudak+shin bud

d+ha sarbaban+d+hanaM/ mAm pa/ sarnyan de sarbabid+d+hanaM Ishu ri swA hA/ namasarba ta thA ga tAnaM/ sarbaA pa ripA ra kAn/ tad+ya thA/ o hahaha/ mams/ d+hi ri d+hir/ hi'i hir/ kr-i ti pa kr-itaM/ sarba pA k+Sha yaM ka'i/

a ba le kwa ye kA ru Nika/ bo d+hitsita tu mnasi kur ba ya li kA ya/ nam smar smar sa man+tayapU// sar+ya a d+hiSh+Than kro ti tanas rkyen/ sa tsab tsin+taM/ sajaakAm/ par pU ra ya/ bud d+hak+Sha tram

parisho d+ha ya// mam kany+tsa/ pihathanorba bud d+ha ad+hit+tA naM sa hA/ tad+ya thA/ o dza tedzeta/ mahA dzi ta yaM/ mA ma kA ya/ du kyur sem+b+ha b+ha ga dusu ra stam+b+hamano du gyur stan+d+he/ d+hata lnga paN+NaM/ tata sarba kA ba ya/

A le ka ya/ ba le ka ya sarbatathAg ta d+hariTAN+NaMtsamahU~Mbit+ta klu med po das dat+tarikAt+taM/ ma rUmad+hu/ a ba b+hA sa ma d+ha ra Ni/ sarbam ku sha la a b+hib ra da don ma/ser ta thA ga tA ma ar+ya ba le kiteshwa

0 ya/ bod+hisatu ya/ mahAsatAya// mahAkAruNikAl/ sma ra pra tidzA ma shAs tAsi d+d+haMchu maman pa desak+Sha/ sngags 'di gur kum tsanadan gyis// greg la bris sku'i mchod rten// sku gdung bcas par bazhug
bar bya// yang n sku gdungabacas pa yi// spyanarasagazigs dbang sku lagadags// tshesabargyad nas nii nya yi bar// bum pa mchod pa brgyad bshams te// dri ya kha dog sna tshogs pa'i// 'o thug zho dang/
'brasachanamar// tsan dan dkar po drig pur// gtor ma dkar dmar bcas pa'o// gtso'i mdun dudape medas// g.yas su dung can bajigs sam g.yon// sna ma'am tog brgya rtsa brgyud//

gtor zhing dus gsum mchod de bku// sdig sbyangs rmilam bod du babar// bdud rnams zlog par byed pa la// rtsa gsum sor brgyad tshad ldan l// thod pa skam po sor drug ste// dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga ba//
sang ldeng yu ba khru gangab// de yi rten yang sor drug ste// den zur brgyad ldan pa la// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+maral gri lcags kyu mda'/ mdung rnams g.yas nas bskor ba bkod// nyishu rtsa
gcig brjod bya ste// mtshan mo sngags su gzugs babya// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dug gi tshogs rnams 'joms pa la// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// rdzobatsunamagrani pa sngon po/

yi/ rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'digasungasaso// namorat+na tra yA ya/ nam ArUb le ki ti shar ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ mahAsan+d+hAya/ mahA kAr NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sathaban d+hanatsA dan ka rA ya/ sarba pA paM
sa mu trertsodan ka rA ya// saman+tAd+hipra shaman kar ya/ sarbai pa drabi binIshan ka rU ya/ sawab+ha zhu tAnA ya tasu namas+saM ta/ iu0f00 Arub le ki te shwar tA banI la kaN+NanAmadri da

yamAbcu yi khyu mi sarba aNA sAd+hanaM/ shu b+ha ba tanaM/ sajusat+tAnaM/ bA pA mArga bi she b+ha ka/ tad+ya thA/a ba le ki le ka ma ti/ lakag ti/ e byahi/ ma hAb b+hisat+tha hubo d+hisatAhe/ mahA bo d+hisatwA/

hadra la bo d+hitwA/ hem hA kA ru Nika/ rma 'phrod yaM e byahi/ Ar+ya a ba le ki shA ra pa ra mem titsit+takAru ka/ ku ru ku ru karma/ sAd+ha yasA d+ha ya bat+taM/ da hid hi ma/ arigamaM ga ma/bihog mi

hAsid sgyu/ lo gshwa ra/ shudu hudu/ bI ma hAdIny+tsan+te/ d+harad+har/ d+har/ shwar/ la tshwa la/ bam lAm la mamAte/ A ba lo ki tishAr/ krit+tadzin mu ku TawaM lho ta ga rlur lam+ba pra laM ba bi lau ma

sid+d+hA shud+d+had+har/ ba lab lam hUb la/ malam lam shAm la/ dzAl dzAl/ ma hAdzAl/ kr-i thakA laMt+tayak+Sha krit+ta dngasha cha sgyu tani/ habad+mahastadza ya kAr Ni/ sha tsar shAr/ kr-iShAs kr-i tayadzopat+ti ta 2e
hiwA rAhamu khi/ tipu ra daha neshwa ra/ nArAyaN/ bal rU pa be 'phyur/ hoNil kASh+Tha/ himahA/ hal hel/ bi khani tu/ lo ka s+ya rA ga bi lA nAshan/ dwa'abi ban shan/ chohab kha nAshaninurmakA Na/

yulu hulu/ muny+tsamany+tsa/ musumu'u/ hAlAhalA/ mahApad+manAb+ha/ sarasar/ si risi'i/ su ru su ru/ bu glu bu rgyu/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tawanI lakaN/ e phyi nyin la kaN+Dae bye hib masgra tis hamu kha/

dus has/ muny+tsamuny+tsamahAaThawAnits+tshadinaM/ aphyihib+ha blo mahAsid d+ha/ yokIshar / ban d+haban+d+hAbA paM/ sAd+ha ya sA d+haya bit+taM/ smar suM b+ha g.yaM/ le ka ba lekasiM/ tathAgatwaM/ da dwahi mdaru Ni/ pra sa rgyu

ya mas shA/ sidad+ha ya sAgA/ meshAsid rgyu ya sAhA/ sid+d+hi yo gAshwa ra ya swA hA/ nIlakaN+Daya sAgI/ bArAhamu khA ya swA hA/ saMhamu khA ya swA hA/ mahAn rasaMhamukhA yasatwA/ sid d+ha bi d+hanA ya swA hA/

pad+mahaste yasAhA/ mahApad+mahastayasAhU~M bahas ya swA hA/ mahAbadzrahastayasAhA/ krol sarba kri tA la dzA pa tI tayasAsh+tsa/ mahAkA lamu ku Ta d+ha rA ya sAhU/ tsakra A yu d+ha d+harA yaMswAhA/ sha kha shab

d+hANIdan ka ra ye swA hA/ b+ho d+han ka ra ya satwe/ b+ham skan+d+hodashaspyi takhaMwadzan ya swA hA/ b+ha ma shAstabag+hatsanibs nAsAhA/ loki shwarA ya swA hA/ mahAleka shar ya swA hA/ sarbasid d+hishar ya swA hA//

rak+Sha rakAmI sAhA kur rakAmud+d+hihU~MswAhA/ na mo b+hag wa te Ar+ya pa lo ki tishar ya/ bod d+hisat+tAyaM/ mahAsatwA ya/ mahAkA ru NikA la/ sid d+haM tum man+ta pa drasatwA smug bum len spur len dang//

gshol dang bo 'ad+ma ka ram// gsar gyi snod du khur bcasapa// maN+Dal dbus bzhag sngagasakhribarjod// mug khri rdo yi kobabur ni// nu bcasasnga dro brdar byas nas// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod de//
khong du 'thungs pas dbyig dug dang// spyir dug lan cig skyas dug rang// bza'anyes tsam yasal rgyug/ dug rigs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sogs pathe tsom ma ba'o// dad can shes
bu bragamathub skyob cing// dka'aphrogab dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi skye lapo bsgralo bculing// stobasabcu rgyas ba'i khazhanawasngags dgod bya//
ba bgasapa spyan ras gzags 'asnas pa'i dngos// 'a dra bas nams skal bar ldan pa'i masang/ ltas ngana rnams ni myur lam gyi a ljang khu/da nyis brgya nyer bdun
rab ldan pa'i mi// rtsaba'i gsang sngags gang la yang// nan tan rtse gcig tubarjod na// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig dad pa'i lcags kyu dang// blo yi ra
bar ldan pa la// lha klu 'bum phrag mthas skyobacing// dkarapo dgab kun slong sams// byang chub rin chen gter thob par// sngags kyi mthusana mdzad pa ste// sngags la nyes dang med pa la//
bstananarang nyid nyams par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'irgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma drab zhes bya ba las/ rigs kyi khyad par gyi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste gsum ba'o//
de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas bsdus pa'i dngos// 'jig rten mgon po banu yi ngang// stobs bdu rgyas ba'i rang bzhin can// pha rol phyin bcu lhun grub pa// sa
banu gcig tu rdzogs nas kyang// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab mdzad pa'i// banugacig pa yi tshan nyid yin// bsod nams skalabal ldan pa'i mis// rang gi lus la sngags dgod bya// sngags dang bcas pa'i

de bzhin du ni bsam par bya// lce yistang du yi ge mchog/ b+hayig dmar po 'od ldan pasam// sing gi phyogs su shugan bo// lte bar hayig ser po ste// de bzhin gsang bar holjang khu// bshang ba'i gnasasu
ho sngon po/ dpusamaganyis las soraskya// rkang mthil yig halcang sar// lag mthilaganyis latsudakar po// lag ngar la ni sngon te/ dbu bab yi ge hU~Mbakod bya// yi ge'i tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas//

gang dang gang yang rung ba yi// rtsol pa rnams la 'jug par bya// rtsolabade dang de dag kyang// sngags kyi byin rlabs las bstsal zhing// lus kyang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid// sngags kyis bskyed pa'i lus nyade ni// sngags

dang bcas pa'i lus su 'gyur// sngags kyi lus kyi gsa rnams kyis// zhing khams du ma sbyang sanas kyang// 'gro ba rnams kyi lus su ni// 'gro ba grol ba'i spyod pa na// kun bzang mchogadang mtshungs pa ste/

'gro dang dbyer med don rig 'gyur// donadam lus thob pa'i thabs// ngag gi rig par gyurapa yis// rig 'dzin zhes bya'i dngos po ste// de la gang gnas de yi ming// rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste// sangs rgyas
mu stegs pasami shes// lhag dang bcas pa'i rtsom pa ni/ shin tungul ba nyid yin te// ngalab nyid kyis gos pa'i lam// bgrod par dka' ba de spangasanas// shin tubag yangs bdaba'i lam// skal
dman yang dag sgrub 'di la// nan tan du ni 'jug par bya// ston pasade skad gsungs pa'i tshe// 'khor rnams dga' nasathalasbyar te// mkha' lame togagator nas kyang// mgon po spyan rasagazig
dbang gtso// thams cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te// bskorab dum byas nas kyang// gdong banugacig bzhes bya ba'i// zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la// 'dzum bzhin dun bltasanas
kyang/ bsaba'asams dang ldan pa dag/ pus btsugs thalamo sbyar byas te// phyogs bcur rang rang bde bar 'khod// de nas 'jig rtenamagon pos ni// 'gro ba'i don du rig sngags gsungs/

bdagadangagazhan gyi den rdzogs phyir// las kyi sbyor ba'ang tha da do// nyamoratatA lA ya/ naArA dzA nasA ga raborotsanA/ byAharA dzA ya/ tathAgatA ya Arda te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ namasarba tathAg tu rgyu//

achad ny+tsasamyakasaMbud d+he b+hU/ nu ma tsa3rlu ba lo kiteshwa rA ya/ bo lhisat+tA ya/ mahAsan+d+hAya mishAkA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA o rgyur d+har/ d+hari d+hi'i/ d+hur d+hu ru/ iT+ThA ba/ tsale tsa la/
pra tsal/ pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma/ pa re a lami la/ tsi tidz+wa la ma pan ye swAhA/ shud d+ha ya sAhA/ ma hAkA ru NikA ya swA hA/ 'digasungasatshonas chen dag/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos par 'gyur//

tsa ba'i snying po stong brjod pas// dngos grub ci dang ci'adod 'grub// gzhan yang sngags pas kun gyi dbur// sngon gyi phyag 'tshal bzhi po brjod// na mor trayA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyAn sA ga ra'i rotsan byuharA

dzAya// ta thA ga tAya/ anye to/ samyaka saMbud+d+hAyaM/ namasarbatathAg TIsh+tsa ad+ha te samyakasaM bud d+heb+hunam Artsub lo ki te shwa rAya// bo d+hisatwA ya/ mahAsan+d+haya/ mahA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA//
ha ra hur/ i li mi li/ tsi li tsil/ kha le hal swA hA/ dkyilab khor nang du 'jug pa'i sa// chu dang gesal bdun bdun brjod// khrus byas gos gyon nang du 'jug/ snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang

bsam// namo rat+tatra yA ya// nam Ar+ya dzAr sA ga rabe ro tsanA/ byaharA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ namasarba ta thA ga te b+huad+had samyaka saM budad+he/ namaH A ba lo kiteshwa rA

ya/bo d+hisatAya/ mahAsan+d+hA ya/ ma hAkAru TikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+hu ru b+hur/ harahar sa/ bdun phrag re re btab pa yis// spos bsrags pa dang mar me sbar// na mo rat+na tra yA yaM/ na ma Ar+yadzAn/

grwar be ro tsa nA b+hUha rAdzAya/ tathA ga tA ya// ap+pate/ samyakasaMbud+d+hA ya/namasarba ta thA ga ta ad+ha tap+phasamyaka saMbud d+hasgyu/ nam Arab la kiteshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwaya/ mahAsan+d+hA ya/ ma hA kAru
DikA ya/ tapyab+haM/ sisi'i/ b+hiro d+hir/ sid+hisid+hi'i sa kA/ mo tig byug pos me tog 'phreng// bdun bdun brjod la sku gzugs la// gtor dang byug dang gdag par bya// namo rat+na tra yA ya// nam snya

dzAnasAg rape rotson b+hu harAdzAya tathAg tA ya ad+ha te/ samyakasaM but+tA la/ namasarbatathA ga ta argud byusamyakasaM bud d+he glu nam Arab lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisat+tA ya/ mahAsan+d+hAya/ mahA kA ru
kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ os d+hesAD+ha/ so hisodaM/ so duso du/ bshos gtsang me tog 'brasebur bcas// nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas ni// zhal zas rnams kyis rnam par mchod// namo rat+na tra yA ya//
nam Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga 'bo ro tsa na rgyu ha rAdzAya/ tathA ga tAya/ ajatesamyakasaMbud+d+hAya/ na masarba ta thA ga te argyud byusamyaka saMbudab+he/ na ma Artsub le ki teshwa rA ya

bod+hisat+tAya/ mahAsan+d+hAya/ ma hAr TIkA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa mA d+his/ tsa le tsa le 1 tsu ru tshuru 1 su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru swAh+pha/ me togadakarapo'i shing dum du// sum cu bzhimar sbreng phyir// zhag
gcig spangs nas nyin gcig gam// nangar nubabarare re la// sngags rab tab nas bsregs nas gzod// midagos pa rnams bsgrubasan 'grub// na mo rat+tatra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yadzAn sA ga rab ro tsa na byu
rAdzAya/ tathAgatAya/ ad+hate/ samyaka saM bud ya/ namasawatathAg te ad+hadangaHsamyakasaM budang+ge/ nam A ba lo ki tihArA ya/ bo d+hisatwA yaM/ mnyAs la/mahAkAr Ni kA ya// 4
tad+ya thA/ o i li mi li/ pi li til/ tsal teli sAhA/ nu'amathakhab yusakar la// khanabadunabasngags nas phyogs bzhir gtor// sa phyogs nye ring gang du yang// mtshams gcod pa yi mchogalags so//

namo rat+tatra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya dzAnas ga rab ro tsa naglu harAdzAya/ tathA ga tA ya/an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ namasarba ta thAg te smyaargyud smyusamyaka saM bud d+he/ na ma Arab lo ka ti shA rA ya// bo d+hi
satAya/ masat+tAya/ mahAkI ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ obi tipi[']ti/ ti'i tiTaM/ pe deb de/ ka tsaka/ b+hag don/ Arab la ka tishwa ra ya/ samasat+tanaMswAhA/ sku sogs slar yang spyan drangs dang//
0 rang nyid gnas nas lhag don phyir// chu la lan bdun btab pa yis// bkrus nadagos pa de dag 'grub// namo rat+ta trayA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dzAnas ga ra pa lo tsan byu harAdzAya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/
samyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ namasam+batathAg te b+hu ardad byusamyakasaM bud b+heb+hunam A ba lo ki shwa ra ya/ bo d+hisatwa ya/ ma hA sat+taya/ mahAkAr TikA ya/ tad+yathA/o badzahU~MhATihe/ 'jig rten
'tho la rab dgo'abs// zas skom byin gyisabarlab pa'i sngags// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// skyagasung thugs kyi rdordzalas// mgon po zhal ni banugacig

pa'i// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'degasungs so// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ nam Ar+ya dz+nyAn sA ga ra bde tsa na byuharA dzAya/ ta thA ga tA ya// ab+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ rumasarbatathAg te armad byu samyaka

saMbud d+he b+hU/ nam A ba lo ki tihArA ya/ bod+hisatwAya/ mahAsat+tAa/ miwAke ru NikA ya// tad+ya thA/ namasamabyA d+hAb+hihisarba a haMbudad+ho pra sa kes glu b+ho/ namo rat+tatra yA ya// nam Ar+ya dz+nyA nasA

ga ra bi ro tsen byu harA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/arda/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ namasarbatathAg ted+d+he/ arjod sgyu samyakaM saM bud d+heb+ho/ ra ma Arab le katishwa rA ya// bo d+hisatwA a/ mah+phasal/

mahA kA ru NikA yaM/ a b+ha ya d+han/ sarbapa tag+ha ra tA na ka raM/ sawaA yag pany+tsi pa sha na ka raM/ samabi shudaD+ha kA lag+hAbaha/ baigra hA/ bla ma Na ka ra/ sarbapA pa/sha ya ka raM/ sathab+hu da ba lo/
sha mad+hen/ dud sA d+ha na/ dud mi taM/ sarbabihUM bi nA ya kAn/ bo d+his tA karaM/ par tsa kra/ durab+huk+Sha/ sha ka b+ha ya sa ra ka raM/ sA d+hing// nag/ yakA/ gan d+hawaM/

ba a su ra/ ga ru Ta/ kin ra/ ma ho rag/ sarba dka raM/ sarbapa shAtsaka Da b+ha/ su kA d+hag d+ha kratsaka li ra ba Da la/ ma ga la/ ba nA ga kAr/ na mo nA thA ma hA ka ru Na/ e ka da shamu kha sba//

lngas b+hu dzesAny+tsa/ sran// tad+yathA o DAka ri/ u dI hArin po tsi trau khi/ a ka sa mu kha/ sachas glu ma hAr tidzamut+taM/ sa ha sra b+hu dza ma hAni// mahU~MAhin laM kA ra/ ma NikuN+Daya sanat+taM/

bi tsit+tamA la d+he'i/ tsan+d+ra su// a ter ke A kA sha ga gnatsa ri Ni/ maM ga la sha rid+d+himu te pe pit+thapra NamaM ga le/ b+hur mi trakA ra Ni/ tshuru tsu ru/ shi ta rA te da mu ru mar/ a banAtate/ hur u ru/

b+ha prany+dzamu khaM/ ku ru ku ru/ tsi tramu khi/ A de ts+tsha pA sha par Ni ni/ dzib+han/ tshag+had+hani/ sawapA Nini/ sarbapar+yar b+he/ ma snyani/ a mo g+ha pA shahasta/ sam b+hA ya pa tsa ya nIr tsadi/ ag+ha bi shu/
ud ka pA ye/ pra ma nI/ ka khor dA naM/ bAn/ o hi'i hir/ dzaya kA'i/ ba la kar/ rnyan ka ri/ ta tsas kar/b+hi b+hi/ pra shamani/ yun+d+ha nA pa ra tsakAshu ma nipa ra s+ya/ banan mu de ta ta

ra na pra b+han b+he la/ ma Nim Ni/ ma hAm Ni/ ma Nid+har/ drelaka AlaM kA ka ra ti pA Na ka re/ tipU Nag ra bi daM san/ bar b+han/ pa ta trapA NinaM/ sachab r+ya karmaNi/ sud ni/ sajabya d+ma ni/ pra sha ma Na/

mi sAhA/ otsalami li swA hA/ tsili tsi li sa shA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ si lisilas shA 1tsil tsa la swA hA/ tsin la ma ti swA hA/ u ke sha paM ga la ke te rnye ma zhumu khi sAhA/ oM ka ra ka ra/tsar tsa ra/
sar sa ra sisi ri/ su rusur/ muny+tsamuny+tsamulcaya/ prashAm la bra sha ma ya/ dmu d+hod d+hAr NisA hA/ tsit+tanir mA la ka ri phaT/ a sur nar ki ti ta phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ ska ti'i phaT/

sa sran tre thaT/ sarbab+ha dra d+har nu ma/ tsitaphaT/ sarbab+ha ya bi mo kA NipaT/ mar tsakra na pa ra NiphaT/ pa ras mus gru pa ci phaT/ sawakri bya ka mas du'u phaT/ sarba bya b+hipra sham ni phaT/ sarbabyu

d+hibi nA sha ya phaT/ sa grahotabyin phaT/ 2kArakAnaM/ sarbabud d+ha bo d+hisat+tAnaM/ sapar sa par/ naMtatsa ga ra su mnaM/ sarbapra ya pra ti b+husawayut+ta dusti tuny+tsasaMwaN+Dit+taka khor da/ sarbaphashi
byusarba kA ya b+hI ta sitsi pakArokAmAsatwA/ sa su dza/ sahasran dra e kar shamu li/ A ba lo ki tAbyArAya/ bod+hisat+tAya/ mahAsatAya/ ma kA ru NikA ya/ sid d+haMtumaman+d+hapa drani sa twA/
rdzobatsun zhalanibadugacig pa// sngags 'di yon tan mtha' yas te// gang la 'di ni gtsug tor du// yid bzhin nor bu phyogs dang mtshungs// 'chang dang klog par byed pa des// mtha' yas yon tan rnyed
bar 'gyur// nad dang gdon rnams sal ba dang// khyad par dunasdig kun 'byang// ba dkar mo yi bdud rtsi lngas// mal 'jam po lnga byugs la// gtsang sbra ldan pas dbus sun// shing sku ring bsrel
ldan bagazhag/ gzhan yang ring bsral ldan pa yi// skugadungabazhini phyogs bzhir te// tshad ldan pa yi bum pa// lnga po dbus dang mtshams su sta// gas lnga'i mdog dang

phyag rgya can// sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod ba dang// srid bu tha dad bro bar bya// ci'adod phyag rgya bris byas te// tshes gcig nas banubazhi'i bar// 'dod la dmigasanas sngags brjod de// bzhi khri rdzogs
nas bco lnga la// 'dod pa gsolagadab khrus byas nas// ci 'dod gyur du grub pa dang// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang// rnam ba'atshe dang mi mthun pa// khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur// sngags
brjod yon tan mtha' yas rnams// bsdus nasasgrub bo ldan 'gyur// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang// gshis ngan shib bco ldayod// skyes bzang
bco lnga thob par 'gyur/ mu ge rgyal po'i chad pa dngo// dug dang mtshonadang g.yula'abyed dang// stag sogasasbralasogs gcan gzan gdug/ dugacan zas dang mchus 'ati// srog chags bdun
ka dung nyalanyesadang// g.yang byed dang nalha badres gtsus// gsor mi rung dang bdag lcab rnams// da lanam yang mi'i rigs so// rgyal bo choldan yul skazhung// 'phags pa bzhugs dang dus bzang
tshul// bshes gnyan bzang dang dbang po tshang// dag la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan// bran khol bzang ninor mangs rtag/ gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dod sbyor/samasabader 'jig rten skyong bas
wa/ srung// sangs rgyas zhal mthong don zab brtags// gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed// snying rjearim 'khrug pa dang// yon tan dran nas spro ba dang// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang//
jul du 'byung ba'i blo yas 'phel// tshul bzhin ma yin yid bral dang// bka' lung sde snod dang ba rnams// yang nas yang du rgya bar 'gyur// ji ltar sbres pa'i gnasa mthong na// sngags 'di rang

bzhin med par byas// os b+habashum+b+hasarbad+hamAm+bab+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ 'dzin pa drag po'i blo byung tshe// sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bya// o Ar+ya tA dz+nyA na badzras b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ gang gis lus ngag
yidagayon// sngags 'dis brtan por byin gyis brlabs// osawatathA ga ta kA ya bat+tabadzrasAb+hA wa At+mako3haM/ gang la gnod yod samos ldan dang// ngang gis sa gzhi 'gags yod pa//
bsal phyir sangaldeng dkar pon// brag las skyes shing gzhon pa las// so'ajug tshad ldan phur bun// brjidaldan rtse mo rno dbal can// mgo bo kod pa rgya mdud tshul// sor tshad phyad phyad ldan
pa la// zur na bcu drug rkud pa la// sor gnyus zur brgyad ldan pa'o// soragasum zur gsum rtse rnob// dbal mtho nyung zad bar reg pa// ngos dang skabasani zab pa ste// sngags kyi byin rla

ldan b brgyad// khang pa'i zur dang phyogs bzhi por// g.yas su phyogs pa gzugs par bya// na mo rits+tshatra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya dz+nyAn sA ga ra bi ro tsanabyu ha rA dzAya/ namasarba ta thAg tA ad+hatib+husamyaka
saMbud+d+hAya/ nam Arab lakiteshwarAya// bob+hisat+tA ya/ mahAsan+d+hA ya/ ma hAkAru NikAya/ na mashA badzra kod ya/ bulu hulu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ banad+habanaD+ha/ han han/ da had ho/
pa tsapa tsa/ awaM tahUM phaT/ ltas na thams cad bzomasab dang// gnas khang byin gyis brlab ba dang// tshodang les spyod rtag pa dang// dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang// dang po thal mo sbyar byas
rgyu ti// phyis lagagayonasdigs mdzubabacas// o dang a la la ho// zhes brjod cing khang ba yi// nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas// de nas hUMsgras sa gol gtogs// des o AThabadzad ng//

skrun pa Ni ahaM// rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~MphaT brjod/ shin tu'ajamapa'i stanalani// rdo rje lamo krung gis gnas// bsrangs te'i gnasna rtser phab// dal ba'i rlung ldan dkan lan// lce yisanung zad reg pa'i
bya/ltab nung zad 'khum pa yis// sams nibagayod gnas par bya// rtog pas rinam rtagamin// gtsang ba ma yaname gtsang min// bdabam yan sdug bsngalamin// bdag dang nga' min bdag med min//
a blang dang dor ba'i bajigs tshogs min// sems ma yin zhing sems byung min// phung khams mchod mdam yin// yid min rtag min chad pa min// mun pa ma yin shes rab min// 'gromani'ongamen
gnas ma yin// sna tshogs sprinaglog rumani// 'dod gzugs du masgyur byed pa// mkha'akhyunganam mkha' lanithim// bgro'ong ston pa 'dod bskul b// medamod na yang de ltar spyod// yul gyis ma skyes
'kha/ dbang po min// dusakyisam yin gtanas man// rgyu dngad bzhin rtenagyis min// gnas skabs gzhan song de lamed// da bsams pa'i semanyid kyang// gang nasam khongs ga mi gnas/ gar

yang ma song brtags na stong// brtag par byed ng rtog pa tsam// dngos rnams brtags pa ming tsam ste// kun rdzob tsam du ming ni ga la// rten nas rang gi sems bzung na// drod kyi bzhi ba dang po'agazug/

byung ba'i gnyis ba de la brten// de la dang po gsolas bskor// dngapo'i bsolngasamanan pa ste// bcu drug pani grogs sugazhag/ yi ge drug 'khrub pa'i// sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te// 'od zer rnam pa
drugadang bcas// rlung rdug gis nadabang byas nas// yul rnam pa zug la 'jug/ yul drug dag gi dbang byas nas// nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas// nyon mongs rgyus par 'gyur ba yin// phung bo
rnam pa drug dang ldan// phung po grangs kyi dbye bsanaM// mnalag drug drug 'phabar 'gyur// yan lag rdzogs ba'i grib mas ni// rang bzhin dag pa'isamasasgrib byed// sgrib gnyis golas 'thug po/
gsal ka'i re ba dang bcas pa// rtag chad gnas su bzhugs pa go/ srog rtsol bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyi'i snang nub par gyur// rtsol dang bral nas dga' skye ste// yi ga la ni sangs gnas 'gyur/
mig gsal ba'i 'od zer/ ba spu'i khung rnams thamaMsacad nas// sems dang bcas bldang 'jug ste// slar yang thog la bsdus nas// yig nyid kyang madamigs so// 'dzin pa de las thos/
nas kyang// sgyu ma'i rnam pa rjes dran// da lagoms nas ting 'dzin ni// nyams bamadapa thob bar 'agyur// ting 'dzin brtanagyur nas ni// lus bas rig ba 'dzin pa thob/
rig 'dzin de la gnas niasan// blamado byang chub de thob 'gyur// skad cig de la rdos rnams ni// nam mkha'alta bur d gnas kyang// mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod// rtenani spyan ras gzigs dbang sta
( lus 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo// yanalag phyagan rdo rje ste// mgodang thod ni ma pham pa// gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam selanyed// nyazla kun tu bzang po ste// somu me rlung nam mkha' dang// ma
shes nyid dang bcas pa'o// thams cad dbyer mda'agyurab ste// bsam gtanal mi gnas ba'i phyir// stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya// sems klong bsanangs pa 'grub// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar
( gyi// dusani rtag pam 5na te// mi rtog sams nyid 'bralagyuranas// dusal tha dad ma rtog go/ nyima'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang// nam mkha'i phyogasani ji lta bar// sems kyang sams kyis btsal
bar bya// gzhan zhig skabs 'byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma drab nas bya ba las/ thunamos gisngags byung ba'i le'u stabazhi pago/
de nas drang srong gnas niasani// sna tshogs gzugasaldan zhes bya ba// bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi// byang nubasams dpa' rig 'dzin zhig/ rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la// dkyil 'khor
rud du lhags nas ni// rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod// phyag 'tshal bskor bdum byas// thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// ston pa la 'di skad gsol// omatha' yas spros la
nyar zhizhing/ dazhi mdzad du zhi rab spyod mdzes// rtog bcom rtogamakhyen rtog yongs zhugs// ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo// zhi las zhi bgyur mtha'ababyung ba// chos rnams kun mchog zhi tshos
che// spros med las sbyos dkarab nubya// mtha' yas chos la phyag 'tshal lo// grol gyuragrel mdzad dag pa che// dag bar spyod pa gtsang mamagon// tshogs rdzogs tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyag
tshogs rteg bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo// rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas brgyan// 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o// rtag pa don chen rtag zhugs la// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal//
khams gsum bag chags kyis dkrugs pa// thibs po'i ling tog zhugs pa rnams// mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang// sams lags lamyur shin tu dga'// mngon sum med larjod bral yang//
lkog tugyur pa smos ci dgos// lhag don mngon du byed pa la// phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog/ mngon sumathob ldan ming nas kyang// don la sems kyi gsal ba skye// donagang yang yang goms ba lha/
sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste// bde gsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu// sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o// blo dman rnams kyi 'jug ba dang// 'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang// snon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur
phyir/ gzugs bar nabyung tshul bshad du gsol// myur du 'jug dang grol bdang// myur du byang chub cher 'gyur zhing// gzugs brnyan dgu ba'i tshul 'byung can// 'dren pas de
ring bshad du gsol// mkha' sprin rtag pa med po la// mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar// rnam rtog gis dkrugs sems la ni// su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur// dmigs pa'i mtshan magasal byed
pa gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste// legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing/ byin rlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'drenapagatsos// lcags kyi dbang po bkram nas nii/ (gzug
brnyan dag ba'i tshul byung ba// nga lasamanyam par brtsonapa ni// legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog/ rig 'dzin byang chub sems khyod legs// lcagacigasems kyis mnyanAnas kyang// legs par gsung/
pa yid la zhog/ khyod la yang dag bshad byapa// byani rlabs dgyes pa'i gzugs brnyan dang// tshon gyis ras su bris pa 'am// rin chen rigs sams rdo bam// shing la byas na mchog bsngags//
dngapo'i las can sems can la// dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang// byin rlabasa mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po gsal zhing drang// gzhon zhung chag gsamadapa la// bsang
zhing dud pas bdugs nas ni// dad ldan ngang tshul bzang bas bzhag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku// bco brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la// gdan khri dag sor dgu ste// rgyu ba yolasor tshad drug gis
bskyod// bzhes daldam bag nyams dga' ba// rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyis brgyan// g.yas kyi dang po bgrang 'phrang ste// gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag/ g.yon pa dang po pad+ma dmar/
gnyis par li ba spyi blugs thogs// zhal gyi grangs ni bcu gcig l// mdun gyi zhalagasum mtshan bzang can/ byams bsnying rje dga' ba'i mdas// dkar bodakarasar dmar skya bo// g.yon
gyigasuman khra bo'i zhol// sgrog pa'i madangs dang ldan pa ste// dmar dang dmar ser lebarganano// g.yas su gtum pa'i khro zhalagasum// sngo dang sar dang ljang khu bo// rgyab tu khro gtumamadog dmar
ba[;] skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal// khro bo'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs// mig gsum dbu skya sarapon// gyen du thor tshugs bcings pa'o// stong du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zhal// byu ru bcag

ba'i mtshan 'dra ba'i// dbu yi cod pananang rnams su// 'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams// re re bzhin du bzhugs bar bya// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang// rnargyadamagul rgyan dpung rgyun dang// lag

rgyanas niame dor bcas pa// doshalarkang gdub ska ragasacan// rgyan dang na bza' mdzes pas brgyan// danas yang dag bshad bya ba// ris ma dag la dga' gyur nas// yid gzhungs dal spyod khro ba med// srid
chung shes rab snying rje che// thabs ldan rim rgyud la mkhas// bsam pa bzang ldan tshul khrims bsrungs// 'drichos bzo la gzhungs pa yis// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bri// gzugs bzang yid
dal gtsang ldan pa'i/ dbu mos bkal ba'ims 2nadi/ tshon bzang ngur smig mdeg bya 'o// 'thas par bcugs te 'jam por bya// thig gi phyogs mthashad nas kyang// sa sku tshonagyis

gzugs banAn na// tshad la mkhas pa tshad ldan pa// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// dkar po wa yi shes 'dzin te// dmar po sems rtsol li khri 'o// sngonapa ram dang mthing shing sta// ser po ba bla dag pa yi//

nag posnag tshanyid yin te// lcang khu rams dang ldong ros sbyar// yang naspyang mnyid kyis byas// smug rtsirams dang skyogs spyar te// gzhan yang tsags sbyar bar bya// sbyin dang bral na grub par 'gyur//
nga spenasaradang ka pa ta// lam te dang than dzar// de dag so sor sbyarab yis// gsal zhing dkrugasamed dag par byed// a tapas na snan par byed// gan togs ni rtago par 'gyur/ rgyas pa'i gru
bzhaslobazhi pa// ma ngan sgo gcig pa yang rung// dkyil 'khor charim gsum pa 'am// yang naganyisasam gsum yang rung// dbus su gdang ni bcu gcig na/mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri// shar du
spyan rasagazigs dbang gi/ dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso ba can// de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi// phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o// wer ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ki/ dkyil 'khor shAka thub gtso bo nyan
lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa 'o// nub tu rig ma'i dkyil 'khor na// sams dpab bzhi bzhir bcas pa 'o// dbus su rdo rje dbang mo yang// mdun du rdo rje

sa rtag ba ste/ g.yas su rdo tshodapal 'byung ngo// rgyab tu rdo rje dpag med de// g.yon du rje dzaden grub bo// shar du lha mo spyan man// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po 'o// rgyab tu

rdo[Z]chags pa ste// g.yon du rdo rje legs pa 'o// lharanalha mo mAm ki// mdun du rdo rin chen no// g.yas rdo rje nya mi ste// rgyab turdo rje rgyal mtshan no// g.yon du rdo rje bzhi d pa yin// chub tu na bza'

dkar mo yang// mdun du rdo rje chos yin te// g.yas su rdo rje rnon po yin// rgyab tu docha rgyu zhes pa// g.yon du rdoN+Di smra ba'o// byang du lha mo sgrolam yang// mdun du rdo rjel sa yin te// g.yas su rdo rje/
srung ba'o// rgyab tu rdo rlaganod sbyin te// g.yon du rdo khu tshur ro// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dang 'a rnams// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste// g.yas kyi dang po rang rigasazhugs// gnyis pa

thams cad skyabs sbyin te// g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang// phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i/ sngagasanor baphrang la nga 'chang ba'o// bakhor gyi lha mo de dag kun/ datsal

gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang// lhag ma gong ltar shes par bya// byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang// khro mo bzhibazhir bcas pa 'o// dbus su rdo hU~Mbyed da// sngon po ut+pal

yi mdog/ mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste// g.yas su ro drag mo go/ rgyab tu rdo rje brjed byed pa 'o// g.yon du rdo tshemathu chen mo// shar gyi 'khor le'i chartsibasal// khro bo gshazhi rjegashed po nag/ mdun
dudo rjod bang zhalam// g.yas su rdo rje khyab 'jugamo// rgyab turo rdzo gzhon nu ma// g.yon du rdo rje skur byed ma// 'khor lo'i rtsibs gnyis pa la// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub sag/

mdun du rdo rdzogazhag byed mo// g.yas su roN+Dil chen mo// rgyab turodzazla ba mo// g.yon du rdo rje rnon pos// bas gsum rdo rje gatsug tor gsar// jo rje khromo khrag 'thung mo// rdorje rlung 'dzin chen mo

dang// rdo rjesdang byed mor bcas pa'o// nub kyi rtsibs la ltamagrin dmar// mdun du rdo rje chos byed mo// g.yasasu rdo rje zhi ba mo// g.yon du pho tshol byed ma// lnga pa'i rtsibs la de bzhin du// khro'o
bgegs mthar byed pa ljang// mdunadu rdo rdzogasor byed ma// g.yas su rdo rdzogatum mo// rgyab tu rdo rje ro langs ma// g.yon du rdo rengs byed m// rtsibs drug 'khor lorabri ba ni// rdordzaganod/
mdzes rgyal ljang ste// mdun durdo rjeudabang mo// g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ma'o// rgyud tu ro mtshan mo dag/ g.yon du rdo rjemakha'adabang phyug/ de ltar rdo rje khro bo khro mo rnams// kun kyang
