zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o// khro bo phyag gnyis mda' gzhubakang// g.yas nabatson kha TaM dang// thob rdoN rgya gram dang// 'khor lo gtun shing do tsha rnamaMs// rang rtags phyag smyu'achang ba'o// g.yon na
sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'o// kun kyang stag gi sham thabs can// khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// g.yasanagri guganang te'u ste// g.yon na thodakhrag kha TaMbo/ zhing lcags dag gi chos gos te// gzig gi

sa bags ba'i sham thabs can// khro bo'agayonan sgag pa'i tshogs// de rgyab chayi snam bu la// phyogs der lhamobazhi bzhi dang// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bzhi// phyogs rer brgyad brgyadabakod blta//
sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhengs pa'itshul// dbazhin sgo bzhengasamasaa mchog/ lcagasakyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// bababasam rang rtags phyag rgyagayas// gnyis pa ma 'jigs phyag rgya ste// g.yon
pa phyogs mdog pad+madang/ gnyis pa dar gyi chos gos so// kun kyang sgog nyams ldan par bri// de rgyab dkyil 'khor malan/ shar du brgyaban glang chen zhon// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// gnyis

pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can// g.yon pa phyogasamadog pad+maste// gnyis pa rang mdog 'phrang ba bri// de yi g.yonatshangs ba sar// ngang pa'i khri la bzhugs pa la// g.yas kyi dang po nyim 'chang// ma
phyogs su nam sgra ste// mdog dmarar zhonam dpupa'i dzin// lho yi phyogs su gshin rje sngo// thod dbyug bzung pa mnyen// bden bral du ni srin po gnag/ rtse gsum bzung nas srin po chen/
nub tu nu dkar bo// klu yi khri la sbrul zhugs bzung// de yi g.yon du sa bdag dkar// bum pa bzung starus sbal zhon// lhain phyogs su rlung lha ljang// ba dan bzung/ sha ba nyon// byang du
gnod sbyin mi la zhon// ljang nag phyag nogater sgromamo// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// rtse gsum zung sa khyu mchog zhon// sgo bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs kyi kha dog go chacan
pi wa ral gri zhags pa can// rin chen dabyug togs kyis 'chang// gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgyas// g.yon pa pad+ma bgrang 'phrang na// phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o//
kun kyang sgog nyams phyogs kyi mdog/ rim bzhinastag gzig dom sangaga'// khri la bzhugs pa'i gamigs pa can// rang rang phyogasakyi sgo la// srung brtson shin tu'agrub bko/ dkyil
'khor chab rgyad khor yug tu// bza' shing ma tog des shang dang/ mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshalags b tu// mdzes pa'i bya tshogs dud 'gro dang// lha yi bu dang bum sogs// dog klu dang gnod

sbyin dang// dripha grul bum du lo lo// rel lo byed pa dum bri// 'di ltar dad na la las ni// 'jig rtenaskyong ba'i nang rol du// gza' dang rgyu skabasusanu drug/ rin chen ba la gnas / smin drugapad+madakarapo
'chang// sna yisamago ut+pal// nabaso padadakar lag tIshAl// rgyalabagrang 'phrang skag sprulanag/ mchub shes gramanyamagazhag/ ma bzhi pad dkar dbodabyugab// nag pa bad+mas ras// sa
gabo tilhamatshamasabus// smonanirdo ts+tshaskyabasangabyug ste// mustod ral ba musmad pad/ bzharigasa' 'khor lo ste// globazhin nuphyogs mon gru dang// mon grashel sgong khrums stod kyis// ral
gri khrums smad ku mud// nam gru bdan tha skor gyis// sharil ba ltar brug sramano// zla ba ku mud dkar po ste// zhis pad+ma dmar bo 'o// mig dmar mo la phung bo ste// gza' lhag ut+pal sngon po'o//
budabus chos kyi glegasabasamo// pa wasangs nibagrang 'phro bzung// spyanapa lag na ral gri 'chang// sgragacan badud rtsi'i gzhong bu'o// nang gi glu yi char gtogs// bkra shis lha mo brgyad yin te//
stag/dga' dang rgyalam shar// don grubamadangami 'am lhor// nub tu bde ba bde dga'am// myur grub ma dang gtan ma byang// rtse lnga rtsagasumado tshe dang// sngonaposar bonachen dang// dkar dang
dam dang ut+pal dang// ut+pal stodar ku mud// dang po phyag rim bzhin 'chang// skyabs sbyin pad+mabagrang 'phreng na// lhag ma rnams kyis rim bzhin 'chang// de dag thams cad phyogs mdog ko/

rgyas pa'ispros pas skyo na yang// lnga bcu brgyadadam sum cu bdun// nyi shu dgu'am nyishu lnga// bco lngadag bam lnga bsagacig/ yi ge phyag rgyagazugs brnyan tshogs// sprul pa'i sku yi tsho 'phrul te//
ragis jiltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyi byin rlabs nyid du 'gyur// bdagshegs sku dang po tidang// phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya// nyams sam drims gos pa ni// bkrus dang bshig nas dag
byed ga/ rtog pa med pa'i sams kyis su// delabasodanams dpag tumad// gzugs tshogs stobs sman 'gyur yang// de yis bsod nams mtha' yas thob// 'phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba//

bzhinagshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de// de bzhin nyidade stong pa nyid// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang// mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste// sgyum rmi lam lta bu 'o// gum cuganyis dang brgyud chu/
yigabarda dang spros pa'i sku// longs sku bsod nams mthun 'bras// sprul sku las kyi rnam smin 'dras// kun rdzob donadam mtshan nyid ldan/ dug dang ma dag skal ldan la// bad/
la gshegs 'phrin lasagazugs sku gnyis// tshogs gnyis la ni sku gsum byung// rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong// lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min// dmigs med nam mkha'i khams rtog pa//
rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku 'o// rtag chad med pa'i rten 'brel// skye 'gag med par thugs chud pas// yid kyi rnam shes 'jug lam gyis// bsam gtanagoms pas shes par bya// dad pa'i lcags
klu shes rab can// lha klu 'bum phragadakar po'asims dge// kun slong byang chub gter gyi rin chen nor// thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los sgyurab 'byung// samasakyi dbus su gces phyir dal

tshospyod bas/ dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyad bdu// pad+ma'i dra ba phyag stong gsi brgyan par// myur dusgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams// bsdus brtson dang byas ldan pas gces su bya// bla ma'i

lung yod snying rdzogabaldan pa// rgyal dang rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas// 'jig rten skyong tshog sa dga'ab smosab dgos// 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma drag
zhes byapa las// gzugs brnyana'abyung ba'i le'u sta lnga pago//denas dga' ldan gnas 'khrungs ba// bskal pa du mar tshogs bsagasapa// reg pa gsum ldan lha yi bu//
mdzes pa'i tog ces mtshan gsol ba// spyanarasagazigs la cheradad nas// bzhengs te thalamo sbyar byas shing// 'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas// mgrin gcig tuna'adiskad gsol// o khams
gsum kun gyi blakhagatso/ 'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// sagasum ye shes 'od po che// bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// sen tan kun gyi 'byunga gnas mchog/ rig ldan bade ldan byin nus+sa
can// g.yung drung rtag pa dmachos gatso// kun rtogs sal skyob phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par brtse ldan spyanaras gzigs// byang chub samasatshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal// bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas/
bad 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal ba du mar bsags pa yi// thugs rje ye shes las byung ba'i// rig sngags 'phrang babyin rlabs can// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ sam
na rnams la phan don phyir// phyag rgya 'phrin las ldan par gsungs// las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing// nyon mongs bdag rgyal gyis bcings nas/ le leser sna 'dam rdzab can// khuradang ldan
pa'i sems can rnams// myur du grol bar bya ba dang// thugs rje nyimabakram byas te// srid bdam stug po bsam pa dang// myur dusangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir// lha dang gsang sngags byang ba dang//
'phrin las sbyor ba ldan pa dang// brgyud pa rgyun gzhan med pa yi// sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung bshad dugasol// rig sngags rjesaMganang med pa ni// bsgrubs kyang 'brasamed ngal ba ste// 'dren pa
med pa'i shing rtan// 'khor lo bzang ngagang du phyin// nyonamongasartsa ba gcad pa'i phyir// gi sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs// bdag 'dzin goma'abigs pa'i mdung//
sdug bsngal mtshoskam sumache/ kun rtog rdul phung srag pa'is// shes rab me toga'akhrubaba'i rgyan// nad ngan kun solasman mchog ste/ bag tshogs sel ba'i sridamed bu// bag chags bkru ba'i chu rgyun
ti longs spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid// 'khor ba largalagru gzanges te// nyes pa kun sel rlung dang mtshungs// de nas bcom ldan thub bam// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas chen gyis// srab
'jamarang bab ljags bkram nas// tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyisagasungs// 'gro la thugs rjechen po yis// sngags 'byung brgyud pa'i rim 'byung ba'i// cho ga dam pa nyan brtson pa// shin
tshulegasaso lha yi bu// nyams dgabadag bas phyogs su// sa yi chamanyamadakyil 'khor ltar// pad+ma'i gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni// tshon sna ma lus rnams kyis// mgon po spyan ras gzigs
ma dbang sogs// sas rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// rig pa'i lha mo khro bor bcas// 'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i// sku kham phyag rgyabakod pa dang// mchod pa'i tshogs kyang dgram par
bya/ mar ma yonatshab byug spos dri// zhal zasagator s sna tshogs dang// gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang// rgyan dang na bza' lhab lhub dang// sil snyan me tog 'phrang dum// yid 'ong mdzes
[ra/ ]pa'i tshig gis brgyan// slob ma gus pas bla ma la// yon phulabartson byas 'di skad gsol// sems can kun gyi sams kyi gnyen// dmus leng lam leg las 'drenapa// rab ribasal ba'i thur ma can//
bdag la 'drenapa'i sgrol ma sogs// shes rab snying rje skya ba can// thos bsam sgom pa'i gru gzings can// las can sdug bsngal musbyol bgi/ thabs brtsonamanyan pa khyod phyag 'tshal// byang chub
lam mthong dpag yas thugs// 'gro rnams thar lam rten gzigs pa// dge brtson dge la bskul ba bo// dge bcu med bdag la stsol// dam tshig sdom gnas ngang tshul bzung// bag yod dbyangs
mkhasalhung ba med// chos don gnyer pa'i don skyab bo// skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la stsol// dpa' brtan zhi dul spyad pa yi// dga' slad slob dpon 'adi skad brjod// o gtimug rnam dag bde
gshegs thugs// rnam par snang mdzad skyabs su mchi// zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rjathugs// mi bskyod pa la skyabs sumacha// sarasna rnam dag longs spyod gter// rin chen mdangs ldan skyabs su
mchi 'dodachags rnamadag pad+ma'i gsung// bod dupagamed la skyabs su mchi// phrag dog rnam dag 'phrin las rgyal// don yod rdo skyabasasumachi/ ArA gnas medamakha' dang mnyam spyod
ba chos dbyingasachos la skyabs su mchi// skye med skya snang ltar sgrub chos// 'phags lam brgyad la skyabasumachi// don gcig tshogs lam banuganyis grangs// gsung rab yan lag skyabs su/
mchi rgyu 'bras snang ba'i so sor rtogs// nyan thos dge 'dun skyabs sumachi// gcig gam tshogs spyod rdzu 'phrul che// rang rgyal dge 'dun skyabs su mchi// snying rje
shes rab byang chub 'brel// somasaMchen tshogs la skyabs sumachi// gsod dang chu rdzun 'khrig spyod dang// tshig rtsub phram ngag 'khyal dang// brnab sems gnod sems log lta spyod// thar pa'i srog
gcod banu po spongs// chang 'thung til mar 'tshiralas dang/ mgar dung rgya skyags rtswa shangagacod// srog chags tshogs dang mgo zlum 'tshong// mtho ras lus kyigags chen spyong// rtags dang
phyag rgya 'dra ba bag dang// rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/ bgrang 'phreng 'dzan pa'i yo byad sogs// 'gom dang bshig pa gtan du spong// mchod parnying dang sgog pa dang// 'bags dang lhag
mar gyur pa dang// sha dang dman pa'i lag gi zas// srog chags yod pa'i mu rnams spongs// de nas bzung ste ji srid pa// byang chub snying por thug bar du/ sdom pa yin tshul khrims dang//
dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang// sems can don byed tshul khrims sogs// nam dum der brtan poragazung// lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing// rdo tshodra'i bu phyag rgya gzung// 'gro la zang zing mi
'jigs skyabs// chos kyi sbyin pa ci 'byor stsal// theg gsum tha dad chos tshul rnams// mi 'gal sbyorab sargyun du spyad// lus ngag yid dang los spyod bcas// sar sna med pas
mchod 'os mchod// lha dang lha mne gsang ba pa// rigs 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rgyu// des spyod dam tshig dam pa rnams// sdom tshul brtan po gzung bar bya// 'gro rnams kun la snying brtse
dang/ yi dgas rnams la gtor ma sbyin// dzam+b+ha la ni chu yis mchod// yi dgas dag kyang nusamanyes bya// de rjes slob ma rab dga' nas/ ci 'byor lhadang bla ma mchod// dga' chon las sbyor
slob dpon dagongs// snying brtses bdag la gzigs nas kyang// lta dang sngags dang ban brlabs thabs// de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs bzhugs pa'i/nyams
dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che// yid bzhin lengs spyod charadu'abab// khang chen der ni bdag 'jug 'tshal// skugasung thugs kyi rdo rje can// zab mosangs rgyas spyod yul ba// spros bral dmigs
sumed pa'i don// lam chen bdag la stsal du gsol// de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa// de nyid bcu sbyar mkhas pa pos// g.yon pas chos gos rtse gzung ste// 'a ga nga g.yes chos phyag rgya
can/ gsang bstod 'dzum pa'i 'od mdangs rgyas// dad ldan pa 'di skad brjod// o/ bushog theg pa chen po yi// khyodan tshul chen snod yin phyir// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams//
khyod la nges par bstan par bya// skugasung thugs kyi rdo dz+dzacan// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rjegasang sngags rab bsgoms pas// mtshungs pa med pa 'i yi shes rnams//
shAkya seng ge dang 'a bos kyang// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyamamed kyis// bdud stashun tu bzad pa'i// dpung chen dag kyang 'jis bcom mo// 'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs
bya'i phyi'i// 'khor lo bskor nusamya ngan 'das// de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir// bu yisablo gros 'digyis shig/ sngags dang rdzasakyi bsrung ba dang// lhumI rten mig de la mchod// u dum ba ra'i
ma tog ltar// 'jig rten du na kun makhyen dag/ brgya lam na ris 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang nami 'byungang// sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni// de bas kyang ni ches dkon te// gang gisatshul
min sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed bar nus// bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig/ gang la sdig khur tsa yod pa// lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang// byin brlabs tsam gyis byang gyuran/
blo gros dri mamed pa las// spyod tshul brlabs pa zhugs nas lha// ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcad nas// mtshan ldan snyani gzhan don spyod// bdag nyidachen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa
[= ]mtshungs med de yang red// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas// bdag nyid chen yaM khyed rnams M// gang du skyes kyang gzung ba'i phyir// de nas khyed rnams theg chen rigs// sha stag tun skye nges
te// theg pa chen po cher 'byungag/ dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di/ gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang// bde bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// dbas stsol brtson par gyis// slob ma kushag
ba yi// stan la nyal nas rmilam dri// bsang dang sbyar ba byas nas kyang// chus bkrus 'di rnams bklags pa dang// bkra shas dun bkag byas te// gdong pa dar gyis bcings nas kyang//
'bras kyi me tog 'phrang ban// lha yadakyil 'khor dbus su der// slar blangs mgo la bcang bya ste// pad+maldan rags mtshan gyis brgyan// mag bya de la lha rnams dang// byang chub phyogs chos
mtshan ma yi// yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba// mchod rten lha tshogs bcas pa gdan// yid ches dang ba mngon byas la// ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa bya// de nas dag pa'i sras de la// ma
ma lan mar me ltar// 'dod pa'i lhan sul bar bya// brjod pa dang bcasa'abre'ang yi// rtsa ba'asnying po nyasnying tshogs// sngags kyang gsal bar sbyin par bya// zhib shel gyi 'phreng ba ste// rgyas
pa la ni a ru ra// dbang la lung thang dmar po shes// drag po ra 'am ru rag sha/ bo de tsis ni las kun byed// sngags bcas btsal nas mgo la bcing// hU~Mdang bcas pa'i rdo rje yang// lag
bags su gzhag par bya// stodagayogs kr-it+tas ris// snyadagayog sa kha dog sngon po'o// dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste// zhal zas snod nupas brgyan// sems can kun don spyod
pa'i rdzas// thub pas bkra shis bzhed pa'i rtags// gdugs nyabum pa dpal be'u dang// rgyal mtshan 'khor lo pad+mastsal// nad sel bde byed 'tsho ba'i phyir// 'dod yon phyogs rigs
grub pa'i rdzas// gi wang dur gal khri zho// la lasbrang rtsi a rur// ka ra wIr 'bras bu rnams// hizhes dag pas stsal bar bya// gur kum ga pur gla rtsi dang// ba yi 'o
ma sbyar byas nas// tshig 'di lce lagazhag par bya// o/ yanagar nges pa'i tshigayi dang// mga rnam grangs chos rig dang// dri ba lan lten skyobs pa rig/ phyi nang mtshan nying donarig shog
badzod+hamapra be sha/ o bcas brjod cing lce lani// lan gsum rdo rjegazhag bar bya// hiyi ge dmar po me 'bar bsam// gang la goms pa de 'byung zhing// goms pa gzhan gyi dbang med na//
rtog pa'i 'byung bachad pa'i phyir// kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad// dmigs pa'i rten gyi sngags la yang// byin rlabs tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la dbang bskur thob 'dod pas// phyag
na 'khorale'ochang la dmigs// ting 'dzin brtanal rdo rje ste// dpal thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs// gzugs bzung 'dod pas pad+ma lta// spobs pa 'dod pas ral gri'o// gzhan don
'dod pas rgya gram ste// rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur// shes rab 'dod bas glegs bamamo// khangapozang gsan mi'i rgyalapo// thubagazugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam// thal sbyar bas ni 'gro
bsabakur// 'khar gsil byams dang snying rjeskya// lcags kyus 'jig rten skyong bas srung// rin chen ze'u 'brus lce bdar 'gyur// dril bus skad snyan byed par bgyur// bgrang 'phrangags lub
mtha/ bstan 'thob// khri rkangagis ni'u dbang 'gyur// lha sogasagadug pa dung yin te// mdung rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal// pad+ma dmar pos lha ru skye// ril ba spyi blugs tshangs ris skye// srin

mdog lngasanidrang srong skyo// ma long gis nilha zhala mthong// pad+ma rA gas ye shes skye// pad+ma sngon pos dag pa'i zhing// pad+ma dkar pos dge tshogs 'phel// ri bos bu dang bu mo 'phal// dgra stos
bdud kyi bar chodasal// 'khor dang sems mthun 'khri galas// thub kyis dgra dang gcan gazanabajoms// rdzalab dkar bos sdig pa 'phyag/ me tog snyams nad sel byed// rin chen madas
ni yid 'ong grogs// gzhus ninoradagob thang red// chu shel dug dang tsharigasal// mi 'jigs spunagyis 'jigs sgra 'joms// dgra la rdo rje gatun shing ste// rdo rjenag po bdud 'dul 'gyur//
rin chen ral gris rig sngags bzlog/ ltob na la lhung bzad d// rims nad sel byed zhags pa 'o// 'bru 'dod pas na 'bru'i snyam// nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phug/ yang na lung bstan
'dod ngasan// mgo lasas rgyas dmigs par// mngon par shes pa lnga 'dodan// sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya// de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
brla bzhi l// sa yi snying po la gzigs nas// sa yi go rims 'di gsungs so// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pan// gsang sngags thams cades bdun te// gsang sngags rang sngags
ma @#// sbyaras// rigs 'changs dang 'gas gsalas// ragis mchog sa dang 'gas chen s// phyag rgya chen po'i sa rnams so// gtsug tor chen po'i sangs rgyas// gnas
skabs rngug targyalabasagasungs// kun tu bod dngapad+ma'i spyan// yagi 'khor tshogs chen s// rdor 'chang ye shes bla ma'i sa// rdzogasasangs bde ba chen po'i sa// sa yi snying pos gsol pa//
rgyu mgon bo 'phags pa thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ byin rlabs lcags kyu lta bu s 'khor ba'i btsonar nas// klu phyugs 'bum phrag drubaltar dge ba kun song gis// byang chub 'anachen sal
jog mdzad ngo mtshar che// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo bar dra ba zhes bya ba las// byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//denas tshas
pa'i 'jin rten du// rab dga'i tshul du'akhrungs pa'i lha// ting 'dzan yasapa zhes ba// rtogs pa rgya che'ab pa zhig/ 'khor dang bcas ba bzhengs byas te// me tog rin chen rigs byung ba// ston ba'i
phyogs su char bzhin phab// mkha' lagadugs kyi bu re bkang// 'khor dang bcas pa mgrin gcig tu// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// lag rdo tsha do rdzo'achang// rdo rje thog ba bla med pa'i
rdo dzarig 'dzin mchog grub pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir// bdag dang sems can kun tu yang// dngos grub 'byung ram bshad du gsol// la la gsang bar gyur pa yis// bla ma'i rgyud don
bral mod kyi// sngags rgyud sdig pa 'chad byed 'gyur// snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye// gdams ngag med pas 'gro ba bslas// dngos grub med bas bstan pa gzhug/ srid pas lan cig
sogs par 'gyur// gnyis pa dmyalatshog sangan 'gror 'gro// la las kyi skye mched sgo// dbang po rten kha ramaramyur la// gdam ngag rgyud tshul yod mod kyi// chos tshul bzhin du spyod byed cing//
gangal dbang du bzub yi// bu 'drabs kyang banusagyur nas// snang ba 'alanas rtsodapar 'gyur// des kyang gnyis ka dmyal sogs 'gro// la la thos chung shes rab dman// rmongs pa
gzhan rkyenang rgyal can// bstan pa dang ni'achad byed la// skyon spyod skyabs dmyal sogs 'gro// la lami dge'i bshes gnyen gyis// log lam 'jug pa'i rjes 'dzin can// yang dag lam
smod brtson pa dor// log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro// la la bsam med sngags brjod med// mar me bdug spos gtor ma sogs// 'byung pos brlabs te bdag nyid dang// bakhor bcas
tshathung les spyod 'grib// la la 'dod sred gtum rdebache// mkhas gzhan dag la phrag dog gis// sgro skur tshul 'chos chos la smod// rang nyid lta ngan sgrub la rtsod// ther zug blo yi mun pa/
can/ 'byung po drag po'i rigasasu skye// lal ser sna rab 'jug pas// lha dang bla ma tshig gas bstod// zas dang longs spyod rgyan gos dang// me tog bdug spos gtor ma sogs//
[r ]u// nyung du mug tshulargyun stsolan// sa skom dag gis gdungs pa yi// yi dgas dmanapa'i rigs su// sa nas yang du skye bar nges// da phyir de dug sbyangs nas ni// ya rabs
bsam pa bzang ldan pas// tshulabazhin blangs tethos bsamagyis// gtan la phab du ma 'khrul bar// rjod cing yid 'byed pa dang// btsog med par brtson byed pas// 'gro tshogs sgrol
byed thabs thob na// rang don 'ba' zhig smos ci dgos// de nas 'gan dze N+Digatso// ye shes mtha' yas mapa' ba'i skus// 'gro la snyingabacar rab gazigs nas// gsang ba'i skad kyis 'ad/
skad gsungs/ dang las mnyan par brtson byed pa// shin tulegasaso lha la bu// lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i// ting 'dzin pa yis bshad bar bya// khyod nyid rtse gcig yid kyis
ni// legs par nyon la yid la zung// shin tur ba cing rgyatshaba'i// dam chos thob pa shin tudaka'//rgyun chadamed pa'i thugs rje can// spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po gtso// rang gi
sems la bskyod par bya// gni dugasalan dngos grub 'gyur// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa yi ge'i byang chub sems// gsum pa sgro btags ming tshogs sams// bzhi
pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sims// lnga pa byin brlabs rgyas 'debs sems// sgra dang drag cha'i tshul 'byung bar// gtsobo'i 'khor gyi khyad par gsol// dbus suyi ge o la ste// shar du hUM lta
lhor nis/ nub tu hU~Myig byang duhA// rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed// lha ni gang du'apho 'gyur bas// dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'byung yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyis// rigs pa rigs
kyi phyag rgyas 'debs// rigs kyi lha tshogs pho mo rnams// nyams dga' dabenapa'i tshul gyisas/ phanatshun du ni bltasanas gnas// ldes bgan bza' 'phyang 'phrul dang// 'phur ldingasil snyan/
rin chen tshogs// dum tshog sakyis brgyan bya ste// lal ldem bzhengs bsgyings dang bcas// la la rdodz+dzaskyil krungabacas// la labat+ta'iskyil krung ste// lasams dpa'i skyil krungacan//
la la khro stabs brkyang bskum can// la la zhal phyag nubs kyang mang// la la zhabs gnyis yin te// galazhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis// lal pad sdong bats+tshacan// lal pad+mam 'jigs
phyag/ gutade bum pa 'kharagasal dang// rnga yab legasaso skyabs sbyin phyag/ rdo rje dril bu mda'a gzhu dang// 'khar nga shange nga rdza rdzadung// zangs lcags rdodangs pa'i ng// rang zlum rkad
nyag leb phyal che// nu'aphrasbom yangs dog pa dang// ralagrinubri gra rings dang// gri leb gri zlum bri klog dang// sta zur sta lebaphyal sta dang// sta chung gzhogs sta 'bigs sta dang// zlum
sta 'phrad stagazhar sta dang// mdung dang rtse gsum 'phan mdung dang// 'khor lo kha Ta gtugashangestsogs// sIm tig bu ma tog rang// sdong bu la'adab yal ga dang// ba dan pad gdugs rgyal
mtshan sbyangs// rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom// 'khor la glegs bam at+palago/ de lasogs te mchog mtha' yas// phyagats+tshastangasud tshang ba'am// brgya rtsa brgyud/
dam bzhibanu drug/ nyishu gnyis sam bcuganyis drug/ bzhi'amaganyisasogasamos pas 'byung// phyagargyabacings ldan phyag rgyas// des nilha la rgyas 'dabs byed// goms pa'i stobs
kyis phyag cha// sangaga'i sgra nisang ge zhen// rgyal po rol pa'i stabs tshulatsun// rtse gsum sprul dang mi 'jigs phyag/ pad+masdong bcasaral gri'abar// dpa' bo'i lcags kyu thod pa'i// nang
babadunagyisacha gnas pa// gtum podragapo 'od ldunam// g.yon du klu yi dbang phyugamo// pod+madang ni zla ba'i stong// phyogasamadog sems dpa'i skyil krung can// yid bzhin nor bu la bcibs//
zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang// rdo rjebad+marin chen phyag/ skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can// 'khor ni sems dba'i skyil krung ste// mdog bzang sgog pa'i lha[W]ni// yid myur
rin chen bzang modang/ dbang rgyal mo dang rtonamo// rin chen pad+ma zla nyil// 'khor lo grogs kyi tshul du ko/ pad+mo'abyung gnas rma bya zhon// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldem bag can// pad+ma skyabs
sbyan lcags kyu dang// ril ba spyi blugs phyag na'achang// sgog mo 'phrongam glu gar ma// pad zlasems dpa'i skyil krung ngo// mi bskyod pa na mkha' lding bcibs// ral gri bats+tshamada' gzhu
ba00 dang/ skyabasasbyin gang ba'i bum pa thogs// bzang 'dzinamadung rnam spyas ma// sa srungasam dang rab brtanamo// de dag gong gi chabyed mtshungs// don yod zhags pa klu stangasabazhugs//
rin po chedang zhagos pa dang// skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'char ba'o// sangagamo dang glang po laM// rtagadong khyu mchog gdong ldan m// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la 'o// hal hal rusaM sbal stangs//
ngo hril bu skyabs sbyin dang// chos kyi zam tog 'chang ba'o// nyi 'od m dang zla 'od ma// chudabang ma dang nor 'phrangamo// dge ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o// mgonapo pad+mo rgyan lung tshe// musen
stong du rol pa'i tshul/ Da ma ru dang bgrang 'phrang dang// mi 'jigs phyag dang lcags sgrog go/ lug rgyud ma 'khor los// gsang ba mo dang rang bsral mo// glangagasor ro chos dbang byas/
chos kyi 'khor 'chos 'chadaskyo// skyabs sbyin pad+mapo tir bcas// dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma// sil snyan s rnams bad zlar ni// phyed krungam bag tshuladu 'o// rdzobatsun chos kyi
gtsug tor ni// ha ha rihar nyon// zhal gsum phyag brgyud pa la// 'khor la rdo rje mada'a gzhudang// pad dkarab grang 'phrang skyabs sbyin dang// bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'chang// mkha'

lding gdongam shar 'i gdong// nyi zhal zla zhalalhamo 'o// mgrin po dga' gonyi dga' sto// zhal gsum phyag drug bad+madang// po ti skyabs sbyin bagrang 'phreng phyag/ seng ge 'i gdongamo klu shalamo// dga' byed
mo dang srog byed mo// pad zlarasems dpa' la krung ngo// dbus su mgonabo gdong banu gcig/ gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin paso// sngags srung ba dang grub srungasam//
lagang ltar tshabyad phyogs mdog go/ phyogs bzhir 'khorale'ichalan// gtso bosems dpa' bzhi dang bcas// shar du rdo rje dbang phyug na// thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug/ rdo rje phyag rgya gtor/

sgrom can// kun kyang bad+ma zla ba la'o/ lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste// grub chen dbang phyug dang phag zhal// grub pa'i rnal 'byoradabang phyug dang// gru 'dzin dbang phyug ces bya'o// nub tupad+ma'i dbang

phyug ni// skyes bu sang ga'i zhal dang ni// pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag/ co bran rgyus mdzad ces bya'o// byang dudam tshig dbang phyug dang//'khor lo 'chang dang stag lpags 'chang// kun grub dbang
phyug sgra dung 'phul// phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog can no// 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang// rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po// kun tugrogs pa'i lha chen rnams// bstan la dga' ba dgod par bya//
'jig rten 'jig rten 'dasadon du// rigs bzang skya babazhes dgongs pa// bskal pa bzang po 'dir 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stong yang dagod par bya// de ltar rgyas par spros pa na//
lha rnams gras ni rgya che bar// chig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha// mgon po gdong bsu gcig pa yi// lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'o//
spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor banu// 'jig rten dbang gi dkyil 'khor lnga// rig pa'i mo'i dkyil 'khoralnga// rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun// dkyil 'khor de dag re re la// sems
kyi dkyil 'khor lhamang ste// rang bzhin gyis nyi shu lta// rgyu 'bras tshul du rnam pa dgu// ye shes mal lnga yin te// chos nyid de bos gcig tu rgyal// gang gang mos pa de dang de'i/ dkyil
'khor rnam par sbyo ba'am// gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas// khamasagasum rgyal por longs spyod che// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur// gtsang sbra chezhing
dadasems can// rtsegacig sgrub la nan tan rtsol// blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod// ngag snyan ngang gis khro bamad// g.yo sgyu 'dod brkamagayang bamad// lus gadul zhing thos pa mang// nga rgyal
saras chags patshad/ gtong phod snying rje drag ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs la gang dmagasanas// de yi snying po rtsa sngagasalaM// bar chad med pas rab brjod nas// gzhan la phan phyir smon lam
brjod// spyanas gzigs magon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe// khro bo chen po'irdzu 'phrul gyis// de dgamyur dusal byed shog/ spyan ras gzigs magon phyag 'tshal lo//
gangakhand ramisagang byung tshe// gso dpyad sman dang sman par na// bdag nyid gyur nas myur sel shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// mu ge'i nang du 'byung 'gyur tshe// phyogs gcig
nas nia rnamagayos nas// bras skom rgyun chad med par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang du 'khrug pa che 'byung tshe// rang dbang gis ni sems gyur nas//
bdebs phan tshun sdum par shog/ sbyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gcig la gcig za dang// zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe// de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig/
spyanabasagazigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// yi dgas zas skom gdungs pa dang// log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe// nadabral bdud rtsi kun snang shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo//
'gropa'i skyabs dang thabs makhas dang// shes rab rgyu dang ldan nas kyang// thabs kyi sdug bsnga la grol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims zhags ldan lam 'a rtag
mya ngan 'das pa'i rabo 'dzag/ 'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jugashog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// ngan song gnasa rnams mthong nas kyang// der phyind rnams zad pa yi// gnyen
po so sor 'byung bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// dmyal rnams tsha grang bcad gtubs tshe// ge chache dang bsil grib dang// drod kyi 'od du 'gyur bar shog/ rig sngags
yang yang brjod pa yis// yang dag lamanyid rtogs par shog/ kun 'byung sa bonarul nas ni// sdugabasngal phung po skam par shog/ mgon bo mya ngan 'das thob nas// 'jig rten phyogs
wa0 banur rab grags 'gyur// de nas yang dal/bshad bya ba// bsnyan pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas// dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir// sgrub pa la brtson par bya// zla ba dkar po'i
tshes gcig nas// khrus byas gosagasar gyon byas nas// sku gzugs bzang po'i mduna'adu gnas // sbyang ba gnas niAnyin gcig la// dus gsum sngags 'dabargya rtsa brgyad// brjod cing ci 'byor
mchod par bya// chos brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni// dbenapar gdan khri bzang po la// sku gzugasanub tugazigs nas gzhag/ bza' btungananga' bas sbags par mchod// a ka ru dang du ru ka/
bdug pa rgyun dubasrug bar bya// 'bru dkar bomabiwas bza' zhing// zhag gsum bzlas pa ci nus bya// de nas zhag gsum bar du bdug/ 'os zho dang 'bras chana'atshal// lha la mchod pacher bskyed

nas// byang chub shing rung stong rtsa brgyud// du ru ka limar du sbas// dum bu'i re sngags re dang// byang chub sems dpa'i drung du bsags// sa yang g.yo zhing sku yagayo// stong zhalanas ni snyan ba'i
sgra legs so legs so rags kyi bu// khyod ninan tan brtson 'grus can// 'dod dmanadon gnyer gang yin pa// mkha' la 'phuraram rkang mgyogasasam// drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la//
bdag dang skal mnyam 'dod na yang// dering nyid du stsal bar bgyi// bco lnga'i tshis la sku gzugs te// bdagshegs ring bsral yod pa yi// mchod rtenanang ma rung du bzhugs/ gso
na @#// sbyong blangasanas sbyang ba yis// skya snar ma tog brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags rebarjod pas sku la brdeg/ de tshamadun zhal rtsa gnas// 'brug sgra chen po lta bu 'byung// sa chen rab tu
la galobar 'gyur// de tshebadag nyid mi skago par// sngagasabasgrub rjes su dran bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'ache// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rjechadang ldan
bu la bdag nyid kus pas phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// mgon skyabs re gnas gyur nas kyang// 'gro ba kun gyi re 'dod rnams// tshul bzhin dun skong bar shog/
detshe'adod pa stsal ba la[+-- ]lha klu tshogs kyis bar chad med// sngags kyi 'dod don kun grub yani// bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo// phyag 'tshal rten la skor ba dang// mchod rten rtsig
cing dkyil 'khor ni// rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir// rgyun chad med par brtson pan// dag byed smon lam rgyas pa ni// de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur//
de phyir smon lam mchog ra bshad// gabal dag spyod g.ya' ba yis// le lo can ni bdud bzun gnas // gya tshom zhing chos la smod// bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de phyir dmangs
gsag del ba can// long spyod can ni ring du song// ser sna le lo nga rgyal can// bgamed g.yeng dngabacas pa ni// bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam pa// zhugs dang slar la gtang bar bya//
ba/ 'phags pa spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma tAb zhes bya ba las/ das grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas nadadang gnod pa sogs// sdugs
brjod tsam gyis bsal bar bshad// nad gdon gang dang gang la yang// sngags pasadragacugasal babal// rang gi rtsagacigasams kyis bzla// dang po snying rjer bcas pa yi// sngags kyis nad dang

gdonalas srol// de tshemachod la brtson par bya// smonand nyi re ldang ba dang// nyin ganyis pa 'amanyin gasumang// nyin bzhinyin badunaldang ba'i sims// 'byung po mkho'a'agro sha za'am// smyo byad brjed
byed lus srul bo/ 'dre gdon drag pos bgyis mod kyang// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur// yang nasad bu kha dog lnga// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud ldan mgul lam dbub gdaglu/
khanam thobasags pa yi// sgrib kun zhi zhing byang gyuran// bgags sogs nad lta smos ci dgos// bde brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sras dang 'bras kyi 'phreng ba dang// shu ba phalamig rmamadze
dang/ rnam dpal lhog pa g.yanalasogs// ma rungs pa yind rnams dang// ralagrimadabamadung lasogs pas// myos sa ma de yis nyan pa dang// sbrul dang sdig partsangs pa dang// bung ba
mchu rnonalasogs pa'i// gdug pa rnams 'galan bdun dang// brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod// yang nasasara'ajim pas byug/ de yisanadalas grol bar nges// bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa
yi/ gzhogasagacig phyogs sund langasasam// rna ba 'on nam sna bsubasan// brgyartsa brgyad du bzlas pa 'am// 'brumar zho dang ru rta dang// lanabadun brjod nas/
babs byug dang// zos shing nang sngar byugasan// sos par 'gyurab r the tsam med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// nyi'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang// bsrung dang lam 'gro bskyab ba'i
phyir/ byin rlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'dogasungs// na mo but+tA yagu ra be/ namo d+hamAya tAyin/ namasaMg+ha ya ma sUti/ tib+ho pa sAhAnAm/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di brjod pas// sdig kun byang
zhing nadanamasazhi// lam dubakogs bdud mi phrad cing// rtag tu sems dga' dam pa 'thob// byang chub sems dapa' zla 'od kyang// bsrung ba'i don dusngags 'di gsungs// sham ta/
he ru shaho/ Atshub te/ sur te yaM kiT/ bar ma te/ su ru te/ kAl Ta te kha ma te swA hA/ tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig/ nasar btagasan nad sel 'gyur/
la gzhan yang yon tan grangs med 'thob// sbrulatsirmani sgo phyi la// bdun bzlas rma khar btab na som// seng ldeng stag gzig dom dred kyi// pagasalanyishu tsagacig bsngags// brjod
nasagra khrims can la bskon// de ma thag tu mis sel 'gyur// globugadon gyi nyenapa la/ lan bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug/ ldong ros yungs karalan tshudakar// sbyar nas niyi shu rtsa
0 gcig brjod// nad pa'i mal bzhabs nas bdugasan// 'byung po 'bros te nad las grol// tilamar nang du ru rtabatsos// khyugasapa gzhogs nad rnand dang// zhagrum myur dusal bar
byed// yang na rtsi maral bya// tilaar lte bar bsusab yis// myur du bu thon 'gyubar nges// lcame rtsa shamathon par nges// du ru ka dung spyi mong sbyar// snying nad drag po sel bar
'gyur// ba'ogamo'i lci drinagyas// rmakhar glan namasatshig sos// srin bu rang tsho snying la za// rtadakaragacin la khyor gang 'thung// des ni srogachags bud par 'gyur// 'brasal rams
kyi lom yi// khub bskol bas byugasab@#// bong bu'i rtug ba gsarapa btsir// nyal kar mig tu blu gnas os// mtshan mo grangs la skudadakara'o// de lu nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// brgya
rtsabargyud brjod shudagudaka// dpang par btags pas g.yul las rgyal// phug ron ralam nyishu brgyad// bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang/ shing sgrog la sogasagrol bar
nges thal ba'am khyim lanasngags// stong bzlasam tog srin bu glol// gdonadang yams nad zlog pa la// dri bzangs chu la bzlasaM nas bkra// bud med bu 'dod don du ni// stong bzlas bamar
btung bar bya// bya ba sbrul dang rus sbal// phye mgator nuphyugasa rnams rengs// ma gnadangashudag dang// lha dang go stod sgrung tsa sbyar// sngags 'di yis shesa'ab baphal// na mo rat+tatAyA
ya nam Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwarAya/ bo d+hisat+tAya/ mahAsan+d+hAya/ mahAkA ru NikAya/ tad+ya thA/ khAhi khAhi/ ba la tisA hA/ na mo rat+tadrayA ya// na ma Ar+ya a ba le ka shA
rwa ya/ bod+hisatwA ya/ mahUsatwA ya/ mahA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o pad+me/ mahApad+me phu/ pad+ma la tsan phu a mo g+ha ba te/ namoa dota ku tA ya/ sa sar/ gtsaka// a laMak+Sha rogonA
sha ya sAhA/ nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang// thal bsam na phyi rol bskus// migand thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// skud pa dkar ro mdud pa bdun// sngags bdun bzlas pas na bo
T+Tha yi nad rnams thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// gur kum ka ra tshamanyam bas// sna yind ni sal bar byed// a ru ra yi phya ba dang// sbrang rtsi bsras pa'i bdag pa sani// so yi nad dang lce yi nad//
thams cad 'joms par shes par bya// oM hUMshrIhU~Mu ke phu/ nyi shu rtsa gcig mul bzla// 'thungs pas ma zhubaganod pa sel// na mo rat+tatrayA ma/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tiA rA ya/ bo ng+hisatwA
ya/ mahAsan+d+hA ya/ mahAkA ru ThikA ya/ tad+ya ShA/ oratAshe/ ma hAtsaShA/ a su ramarta ka/ tshul dzAl/ tsin+da ts+tshin+da/ hu'u ur/ kiraki ri/ han han/ sarbaren+d+raka/ banarten/ mAr ya
mAr ya/ sarbagrahaM swA hA/ sngags 'dimatshal gyis bris nas kyang// mgul du btagasan nad rnams sol// gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis// las rnams de dang de la sbyar// sbrang bu srinabu/

sbrul lhag pa// g.yan bshu bskyo nad la// sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gis byug/ gang zhig btson du zhugs pa la// nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas pa la// tsanadan lde gu snying khar byug/ gang gi mig nad sel ba la// shing
mngar chu'am spos chu'am// bal sha'i khu bas bya// rna bal ni til mar gyis// gzhan gyi yig gsal ba dang// 'thab mo gshagasa'abyed bgyurab bs// bum pa'i chu yisagadong pa bkru// gang yang byis pa

sru ba na// seng ldeng phur bu so bzhi la// pad+magaragyi dbang phyugadang// don yod zhags pa'i sngags ring dag/ stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas btags na// tshering nyid dubadabar spyod// ba lang rwa dang po so 'chal//
shing kun dang sbrul lcags pa dang// 2sabal sa bon grung po dang// de bzhin du ni sarapo gnyis// dus kyi phugs g.yangs pa'i skra// byila'i rtug pa braha ti// shug ba bya rog sgo nga dang// lang tshig
panale sham// da dur dang lhan cig sbyar// de rnams bsras pa'i dudapa yis// pags rnams sal phyir ru tra ye// dudapa banu drug ces bya ba// pushal tsed ba ba dang// btsan dug gi ni sbrul shun
gyis bdugasanarasasand thams cad sel// nadagazhan dag kyang sel ba'aphyid// ba lang lciba'i khu ba na// so ma ra dza'i phyi ma gdab// yig yiyis byin brlabs nas// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i
sngags/ brgyartsa brgyadabarjod 'thungasabasani// dug dang rimasanadasal bar byed// skyarab bskol ba'i khu ba na// so ma ra dza'i phyi ma spur// ra'i bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshad// yid bzhinanorabu'i
[p/ ]@#/// sngags brjod nas// zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams// zos kyang lus la gnod pa med// 'o mar yung ba sran cig bskol// so ma ra dza blugs te rgyud// so sochang/
'khahala'isngags// brgyartsa brgyud sngagasagrasatshang ba// brjod de blud na skyags nas/ ]/dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyuro// khyim gyi dud pa rgyamatshudang// skya du dmar lamar bcas// phyam
mgasar sbrang rtsebacas// har chen po'i rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad kyisibatung bar bya// sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed// udag ru rtaa karu// yung ba bong dkar po rnams// don
yod zhags pa'i sngags kyisam// byugs pas dug nad thams cad sol// rgyamatshu srung gang mer srang gnyis// gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol// rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs//
dug nad thams cad sal bar byed// rgyamatshwa tshwa gsum mar srangabazhi// sbyar to li bshol sngags brjod nas// byugs nas reg pa tsam gyisazhi// sdig pa sprul gyis thon ba la/ dku ma ra deng
sar bo gnyis// lcamatshamyang tshwa sbar bcas la// gar dbang sngags dang muyos bzung/ dug nad thams cad sal bar byed// sar po gnyis dang ldong ros dang// go thal gur kum le brgan rtsi/
pad+ma rgyan lung sngags kyis btung// dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed// gang lagaza' dang rgyu skar gyis// 'tshob byungan de bsal phyir// pad+ma 'dab brgyud maN+Dalagyi// phyogs dang phyogs
[p/]mtshams dbus rnams su// mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// mkha' lding gzugs su bsgyur ba la// sbyan rasagazigasadabang banu gcig gis/ gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkud// nyim zla ba
lag 'dzin pa'i/ khyab 'jug gis ni byiba'i gzugs// mnan pa'i mkhastengamig sman mdog nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs// mig gsum ldan pa brjod pa'i lus// rin chen lnga yi sder/
gshog can// rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas// nyam bye bas brgyan pa'i bod// snying khar nyi ma 'od 'bar la// hU~M yig nag po sngags kyis bskul// spu rnams gzings kyis gyur nas kyang// phyogs
banur rdo rje khyab bar 'phro// gza' dang rgyu skaramog byas te// gdon dang klu rnams bsag par byas// thugs rje mi bsholag yi sngags// 'brug sgra lta buragasal bar brjod// gang yang grangasamed
stong phrag na// las rnams thams cad sngags 'dis 'grub// mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa las// klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya// de la mgrin pa sngonapo yi// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas
ni/ sa stangs gtum bo klu yigadon// dus nges par sel bar byed// klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsags// 'gro lamadzend gtong bar byed// mkha' lding dmar po sbrul tham// me tog thod
ba kha TaM ga/ g.yonan bachang sta g.yas ban// ral grim 'od 'barab 'chang// mgon po seng ge 'i sgras bskul nas// dba' rlabs bskal ba'i ma dang mnyam// sbrul dang rin chen dbyug to can//
mkha' lding sha za'i gdon la ni// mgon po ha li'i sngags kyis bskul// mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni// ljang khu ral gri phurapa 'chang// pad+ma kri sngags kyi
bskul// las rnams gang dang gang la yang// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o// dzaltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas// lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgyu// ngo bo nyadikyis mtshon pa yis// sngag
dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur// da na phyag rgya bshad par bya// sku yi mdun du langs nas kyang// rkang pa g.yas pa yud tsam bskam// mgaganyis so sor thung du brkyang// gungasrin so so
mthil dubakug/ mtheb mdzub dag naso/nor brkyang// gru khug lag mthil mdun dubastan// 'gro 'am 'dus kyang dgra dpung las// rgyal phyir sngags 'dibarjod par bya// namo rat+tatrayA
ya nam Ar ba 'o ti shwa ra ya/ bo d+hisat+tAya/ ma satwAya/ ma hAkA ru NikAya/ tad+yathA/ o a ba te/ pa ra pa te/ a byehi sAhA/ yang na sngon ltar lus bsangs te// snying khar
thal sbyar spro ba bsnol// mdzubamo gnyis bsgrongs rtsomo sprad// mtheb gnyis mdzub tshigs dang por bkug/ lag mthil sung zad mareg pa// gzugs sngags gang brjod phyag rgya 'o//
bgegs kyi 'tshab byung ba'i tshe// sngags dang phyag rgya'adis bsal bya// namor t+na tra yA ya/ na ma ArUb lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hisatwAya/ ma hAsatwA/ ma hA ka ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA
07 a sam+pan+nam Nimat+tAlA ya// e bye he pa rim shud d+ha tA ya swA hA/ yang na sgom la 'jug pas na// thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo/ lus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar// mdzub gnyis bkug
lartse sprad nas// de lamatheb gnyis gzhar bar bya// 'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges// yang na lag gnyis rgyab spyad nas// sor mo rtse rnams reg par bya// mtheb gnyis brkyang nasam tshug
nga sbyar// smin mtshams su gzhag par bya// na mo ratAyA ya/ nam A ba lo ki teshwa rA ya/ pod+hisat+tAya/ ma hAsan+d+hAya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba duShAnamo badzra ya me
sa/// khyad par du nalha mthong 'gyur// ya ngan bsgrung stamanyam gzhag rgyu// snying khar bzhug lasngags 'di brjod// namorat+tatAyA ya/ nam Arab lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisat+tAl/ ma hA
sat+tAya/ mahA kA ru NikA ya// tad+ya thA/ oM sarbadeb a na le swA hA/ glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin// yang mibasgrung ste rting pa sbyad// lag gnyis kyis 'jigs byed tshul byu// tsa sngags gang
rung brjod pas nai// ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur// yangen pad+ma rgyan lung gi/ rtsa ba'asngags kyi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag gis/ mthe bo'i san momanan byas te//
mthe'u chung rtse mo'agung mo sprad// gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgyas// dgug na mdzub rtse bskul zhing dgug/ yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dgug/ g.yon pa slar gtang bya ba bo// na mo
rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya lo ki teshwarA ya/ ba d+hisatA ya/ mahAsatA ya/ mahA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o brash+tsa a byehisA hA/ yang na sobatse rnams bskyang na/
mdzub mogayasapa lha chen rnams// yang n phyag rgya bad bcas la// zhizla gza'abazung dus su ni// gzungs sngags bamar labazlasanas// phyag rgyas btabanas zos pas ni// shesarab
('phal dang tshe'aphel nang// nad med gzugs dbang thob par nges// 'gres te rkang gshibs thal sbyar nas// mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa// snying khar gzhog bya spyan ras gzigs/
yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya// mchod sogs las kyi sngon 'gro ba'o// de bzhin sdig bshags la yang ngo// mdzub bkug mthe bong sen mor bcas// lag gnyis rkyab sbyad gar dbang rgya//
thal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor brkyang// mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o// mdzubamo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang// ma bshol ba yi phyag rgya 'o// lag gnyis rgyab spyad mtheb gnyis barkyang// bdug pa
bzang la sngagasa'adi bzla// namoran+natra yA ya// nam ArUbalokiteshwarA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahAsat+tAya// ma hA kA ru NikA ya// tad+ya thA/ moratashAri naa laM kA ra mgatedza su pra tsaka bishu rA

[% ]dzA la/ tad+yathA/ orat+tirate/ tatashareta ta tasha ratwA/ bra temaherany+tseprab+hA te/ rat+tagany+tsisA hA/ sngabarab rgya rtsabargyad brjod de/ no yang thob ba'i gtor rnyed 'gyur// 'gro gzhan badag la byams
0 'dod na// so shing la ni nyi shu gcig/ ldob skyen 'dod bshu dag la// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas snying khar sku// gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas// gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs kyang babros//

maNasarlabud d+hat+tamasaM g+hA ya/ na moran+natra yA ya/ na ma Arab lo ka tiArA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya// mahAsatwA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo badz+dzapA Nis/ tad+yathA/ o hupi upa/ ka pa/
du ba pra kA ya ni sAhA/ rnam grangs 'dug pes sangs rgyas 'dug/ lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya// yan lag g.yas pa'i mthe bongani// lag mthil bzhag nas sor mos dgab// rnaltag
byaranasamadzub mo ni// brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang// g.yonapa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// dusam yin par 'chisogs zlog/ lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang// sor mo bsnol te
bkod pa las// mtho bong mthe'u chung so soran// spyad de sprad pa shes rab rgya// oM sarba saM sho d+hanaswA hA/ de bzhin bstsal te bkwan pa yi// gupaganyis nang du bshibs bsgrungs pa//
mar me'i rgyaste sngags 'di'o// o tup+ta 'tshan sa hA/ de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis// rtse spradabasgrengs pa bdug spos so// o d+hu pa d+ha ta sa hA/ rnying sprad sor rtsarang sar dgug/ byug
pa'itshulan byug pa'i rgya// o cha lab t+ya sA hA/ rting sprad sor mo gyen du bgrod// zhal nas 'thor tshul bshes kyi rgya// on gi phyi sra ti sAhA/ lag gnyis bkug nas rtsa brgyad spyad// mthe
'a@#// bong gyenadu san pa na/nabaza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o// o bsaraNisAhA/ snyim ba kha phye bteg pa'i tshul// domastsal ba'i phyag rgya'o// a I klogi sa ka lag tapa ri wA re taM/
ba ra ki baa a/ a ba tAraMte/ a ba pa raM ti/ al ta nA da sha di ka lo ka pA la/ sa pa ri wA re b+hu i daM ba liM grib+hawA/ khA daM tubib tu/ ya tha khaM ya the waM hU~MbahosaM tri sarba sat+tAni//

kr-itiku ru/ ku ru ba shi ku ru/ A ba ra Na ku ru gu pa ti/ karota dzaM tu hU~MhU~MphaT/ Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwa ra s+ya/ A pa ya ti sna h+phu/ o AkA ro mu khaMsarba d+harmA ts+tshospu bya nuta pa notwAta oM A/hU~M phaT
swAhA/ o hi dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya swAhA/ longs spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la// chugatsang rtag tu sbyin pa bya/ gsaA hU~Mlo ki shwa ra d+hun smiM tika rA ya swA hA/ yid s mas la sra ra sras//
ci phyirachudang bcasaM pa sal// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang// 'byung po yi rigs kun bartson 'gyur// sems kyi lcags kyu ldan bya ste// nyon mos
sams la rab drang ste// lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba// kun slong byang chub rin chen gyas// las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyod// mdzad pa rgya chen kun grub 'gyur// 'phags pa
sbyanarasagazigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma drab zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad kho'o// de nas 'khor dkyil 'khor nas// byang chub
00 gams dpa' sems dba'am// nyiba'i snying po zhes bya ba// 'khoragyi tshogs dang bcas bzhag/ mchod ba'i bkod pa chen po dang// bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yang// bcom ldan 'das la
mchod bar byas// bskor ba du ma byas zhus kyang// phyag 'tshalags ng bstod phyogasagacig mchod// pus btsugasathal sbyar 'di skad gsol// mgon po'i yon tan kun gyi rgyal// ye shes rmad
kyi 'byung gnas gtso// thar pa'i lam chen nyi shur rgyal// 'drenab rgya mtshophyag 'tshal lo// mtshan dapamathar thug med pa'i sku// gzi brjid rgya chemakha' khyab la// blo gros yangs pa'i nam
mkha'i can// sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs dbyangs du ma bsamayi khyab// nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha'abakang nas// tshad med ban 'gab gnyis byung// gsung gsang ba phyag
'tshal lo// ting 'dzina rnam thar bsam gtan sgo// bsam yas bsam du medabasam pas// bsama'i khyab ba'i shes rab dang// thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nyonamos
'ching gcod khagi/ ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed b// kun rtog dra bsel ba yi// sgronam de ring bshad du gsol// ces rnams mun pa'i 'obs su lhung// nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyis skrag/
rang rgyalags ng ba'i bzed dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' 'aching bas 'gas// nyonamongasamanga' bdag gsang sngags la// shes rab snying rdzo'i sbyor ba yis// bag chags bcas pa gtan
bya @#// spong ba// thabs machod du ma bshad dugasol// dems bcom ldan thub pa ches// 'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas// tshangs pa'i dbyang sachen gsung snyan pas//
nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas// shes rab snying rjer 'brel ba yi// sbyorapa'i cho ga du mgasungs// bsdus pa'idin du byas b 'di// nyima'i snying bo nyanapan// legs so byang chub sam
dbabache// dbal dang ldan pa khyod legs so// rtse gcig gus dang bcasapa yi// sems kyis legs nyon yid la zung// nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs// shani tu dga' ba'i sa las// dkyil
'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya// chu bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// shar ram lho yi sgo btod bya// dkar posarapo dmar bo dang// ljang khu tshon gyisabribar bya// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// dkor
po'i lte bar 'tsham par dmar// mu khyud gnyis dang ldan ba 'o// gser dngul zas sams nyid la// bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra// khagayel zhabs tshod zhum pa la// shin tu gtsang mar bkrusanas
a kyang rtag bur gur kum chu gang dang// gla rtsi gi'u wanganulis bkang// byang+gisang g+hiha sa der// ka rikar na de ba ko/ nas 'bras tal gro chonasran dang// gser dngul rgyu ru mu tig dang/ dman
shal lin tarin chen l// bumapar stsalas rasadakar gyis// mgul ba bcingasanas kha rgyan yang// dri zhim shang khom tog gzhag/ me tog 'phreng dang bcas pa de// pad+ma'i dbus sugazhag nas
kyang/ rgya mtsho che'abor 'khrug bas// dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas// 'jig rtanadabang gis gang ba yis// sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigasanas// sngags kyi mthu yis
sasargyas nas// dgongs baN chen skyes gyur te// legs so bkrashis 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi// lha mo tshogs nang glu len dang// bkra shis du marjod bar gyur///
detshamakha' la ye shes kyi// 'od zer bye ba khrag brgya yis// shing chen yongs su smin pa las// bdud rtsi char chen 'babs par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin// rgyal dang rgyal sras
mchod par bya// skaram la sogs 'babab 'am// tshegagatsu gnas azhin yi bar// sngags kyi 'brongab brjod par bya// lha la yang yang bskor ra bya// las rnams gang dang gang la yang// lha
yidabagyur sbyar bar bya// de dang de ni lasa rnams l// ci bdabar yang gyurab@#// phranatshog salas laspyanama'i sngags// lkog ba 'brum ba la sogs la// mibashol ba yi sngags kyis
sbyar/ gdon rigasazlog lagaradabang ste// khyad stobs rigasngagasazlog bal// don yod zhags pa'i sngogasakyisabakru// shes rab 'phaabarda chos// klu nadaha lahalasasal//
tshe 'thol pad+ma rgyanalung ste// mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phelakhyod// harichen pos bdug spos te// gdong banugacig pas glo bur sel// seng ge 'i sgrasan mdze nad sel///
rnal 'byor ye khyad 'dod pas na// yid bzhin no'abu sngags kyis bkra// bkra shis rolamo dum dang// gtsang sbra gos gsaraldan ba yis// snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan/
pasabakru// myur du sgrib pa 'bying ba dang// 'dod yon kun grub sngags 'phrong na// gang dang gang yang sbyar bar 'gyur// phran tshegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zla ba gzas bzung gyur pa'i
tsho marasrung gicig ni dngul snod gzhug/ sku gzugasamaduna bzhi g sngagasabarjod na// zla ba sos nas mar bslangs te// thos sam lus la byugs pa yis// nad rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur//
ldong ros gi'u wang chamanyamapas// sku yi mdun bzhag sngags stong bzla// nusabakris dpral bar thig len// khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub// chu dron sbyar nas lus bkrus na//
nad dang bgegs rnams dag par 'gyur// bse'abras la brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlasanas khro zhal g.yas la rgyug/ dgra dpung phyogs su bstanan ni// dgra g.yul shanitu nyos par 'gyur// bal bu
'bras bu sngagasarer bcas// bal bu le labargya rtsa brgyad// sku la chung du bsregs pas ni// mi phams phyugasand thams cad bachad// skud pa gtsang mamadog dmar po// sngags rab tab pa'i mdud pa
bdun// zhalagacig stang zhal brtags nas ni// nad pa la btags rimasand zhi// sngags re mdud pa nyishu gcig/ mdun shal stonga bzhi g blos btags pas// mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro las gdon/
ba ni/ drag pos zin pa 'joms par byed// gal te des kyang gsosan// mdung ra brgya rtsa brgyud brjod nas// zhal gcig mdun la dbur btags te// blangs te btagasananges par grol// sdug bsngal/

nad pa kun rings brdungs// khyim du badre gdon 'jigs zhugs nas// 'bru resngagasare thang 'broma'abras// skumadun brgya rtsa brgyud bsgrags te// gong ltar sgrub pa'i skud pa yang// lus la btags na nges
bar grol// mimadza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang// byad stams drag bo zlog ba la// sku la spos dang me tog mchod// pin ya yigazugs mdun du// blaba'i 'brasabu dgraming sreg/ sngags remadudab

brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud ldan gayon gyi khro shalagadags// zhag bzhilenanas sku las dgrol// mdud pa re re'i bar du ni// sngags brjod cingagacapar bya// padag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong// rdzas dang sngags
kyinus pa'o// brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// mdudape sngags re brgya rtsa brgyud// mdudunas mdud bzhag stang btags pa// zhag gtsagi lan daklolalus btagasan//
las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub// gang zhig bsgribs pa'i gshegs ldan pas// las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing// dus dus bkrami shis byungan// gtsang sbra 'am nubazang bo gnyis//
brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjod// dang pos sku gzugs bkru bar bya// gnyis pa yin ya ka bkrus// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas// rang nyid nasabakru bar bya// bar chad byung nas 'dod/
kun 'grub// maltar stsal pa'i gdonabasal phyir// byi la'i mgo'amathal ba dang// sa bzang nugatsang sbrus pa'i sa// khyi la yin gzugs byas te// sku yi mdun du bzhag nas
kyang// khro zhal/yon bar srad bus gdags// rtamagrin sngagasani stong phrag khrab// gzungs brgya bzlas ba'i ral gri yis/ dom bu brgya rtsa brgyad du gtub// dum bu re re sngags re dang// deng gi
nang du dor bar bya/ de dag gnod bgatan dusal// mig nad sna tshogs ma lus la// 'bras bugasum pa zhig tubatags// sbrang dkar khyen 'tsho'i nu zhor bcas// bubatsasagasarapa'i bud med dang//
khyi bag dag gisamathobyas nas// thub bo 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags// sngags stong 'dasanas sbyar ba des/ mig blugs namig 'bras skya/ migand thams cad sel bar byed// mig rnon dag
kyang thobab 'gyur// lhagamam inakhron ba'achus// gu gul ga pur tshamanyam bskol// khyobagang 'dag par gyur pa des// chub 'i zhal gdangs sngags stong 'das// bkrol nas ril bu byas med
na/ hal ha la'i dug 'joms 'gyur// glang po dkar po'i gi'u wang ni// mthing buma bzhi gnas sku yi mdun// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas gnalag bskul g/ dpral bar thig la byas rgyuran// lha klu 'byung
bo'i mi rnams dgag/ khyoshugam mthun rtag pa la// ngur ba'i mjug sgro sku mdun du/ stong bzlas lag tublangasanasa'adum// chu bskams samocha med na// ling ga'i drung du sku bzhugs la//
[/ ]cher mchod nas sku'i mdun du/ stong brjod chus skyes chagachen 'babs// gang zhag charatshar ng 'dod na// 'gog bar snyoms zhugs phyag rgya bcing// sku yi mdunadu rtag par na// a ka ru nag
bdug bsogs/ mchod bsargyun dumachod bya zhing// brgyad nas nyapar sngags stong brjod// mig gi mngon shes sgrub pa'i phyir// drizhim da kyil 'khor gru bzhi la// rgyal mtshan ba dan kha dog bzhi//
zlarolol bdakar po yi// dbus su pad+ma lta bris te// ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs// tsan dan dkar po'i dri chudang// bdug pas rgyunadumachod par bya// bamadog saraskya'imar gyisan/

sgron ma'i 'phrang bsamachod par bya// mna'i ka shu dang// pad+madama' dang sngon po dang// rgya mtshochub kyi dbu ba dang// nya rkun nag po'i myu gu dang// mabarlabs pa dang gu gul dang// ku ban sa dang

gi'u tsab dang// gur kum dmar dang sa ra po dang// tshab gsum dang chamanyam brdungs// de rnams phyad tshadakla rtsi dang// ga bur stsalanasaM re ra'i tshad// sngags ni stong phrag re'i gras// sku yimadun
du brjod bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzha gnas // sngags khrir bcas te kalan// zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal// sku yi stang zhal btags nas ni// mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab//
'khar ba'i thur masamig tustsal// ling thog gaman mchoma'ag/ sbyin dakaraspyin damar g.yos ba dang// klad pa nadang mig nad dang// glo bur long dang thabs pa sel// nyin ganyis bskus
don lus kyi nad// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhisal bar 'gyur// gsum pas gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad 'byang// lngasan rtsod pa'i g.yul las
rgyal// drug pas rmangan byad stamasasal// bdunapas glo bur 'chibamed// bdun phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob// gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur// bzhi pas gnod sbyin lnga pas
tsho klu lja bas lha mi srin po rnams// drug bsamakha' lding ribadunulha// bdunapas naag bo chen po 'grub// brgyad pasamamo dgus gter mthong// banupas 'gro ba'i sman por 'gyur// bcugacig
lhami'i khang pa'i phyin// bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srongakhyim// banu gsum klu yi khang par phyin// bcu bzhisum dugasum pa'i gnas// bco lngamtshan mo kun mthong ste// bcu drug khams gter mthong bar
'a[% ]nges// bcu bdunardo rjes gzhi dang// rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med// bco brgyad pa ltar mgyogs// banu dgus rgyal sras kun mthong gyur// nyishus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis// lung bstan dam
chos bshad par 'gyur// nyishu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// legacig gis sangs rgyas kyi// zhapakhams du mar phyin pa dang// dam chos nyan dang zhing sbyong 'gyur/
mig sman sbyor ba bla med 'di// sas rgyas mu stegs can la gsang// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs sman gyi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang 'gro bas lus pa'i// 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed nyon//

ca gakhur gla rtsi gi'u wang dang// gur kum dzA ti'i shi dang// ka tan la dang sug smal dang// tsan dand kar dung pad+madang// gsar gyi me tog ut+pal sngo// re re la yang sngags stong bzla// sbrang rtsi dkar po
lhan cig bsna// dkyil 'khoradabus su sku yi zhal// dubum la gi gdags bya ste// tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar// nyin re sngags stong brjod par bya// mchod pas rgya cheramachod par bya// bstad/

dang gsol ba gdab par bya// dge slong dgotshuladage bsnyan gang// bco lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla// de nas gtsang ma'aganod bzhag ste// dgos pa gang dang gang la yang// lhan de dang de dag sbyar// gang
la bgegs kyisaganod gyur nas// brlagar gyi sngags kyis bdun// mgo bo'i nad yams bsal ba dang// ha laha la'i sngags bzlas pas// gso la sogs pa 'dul bar bya// gzhan dag dga' bar
'dod bsan// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phrong sngags kyis// mig gi stong du byug par bya// rgyal po rgyal mo sogs ba// phomo dbang du bya 'dodan// rdordzachos kyi 'phreng sngags kyis// dpral bar
thig le bya ba'o// mdze la sogs ba'ind lani// sang ga'i sgra yi 'phrang sngags kyis// lus la reg pa bde bar byug/ long du zhugs pa'i nad lan/ hariman po'i sngags dang chus// rang gi khong du btung
khar bya// byad stems rig sngags zlog pa la// don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bdug/ dugand sel lamagrin sngon te// sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni// gdong bcugacig pa nyid kyi sbyar// rgyal srid
thobang ra byed pa ni// mgon po pad+margyanalung ngo// de nas sbyong ba bshad bya ba// 'byung po sha zamakha' 'gro dang// lus srul po dang brjed byed kyis// nyin gcig nas ni nyin bdun
bar glo bur ba yi yims rnams dang// rtag pa'i rims dang drag po'i rims// bcun byed la sogs rims 'gas dang// glo burab dang rtag pa'i gdon// nad drag pon jo snyad dang// dug 'gas mas
rgyudang lba ba dang// 'bras dang lhog pa mdab 'dang/ shu ba stodang 'brum bu'i rigs// phalamig med pal ldog la sogs// mngon du gang dang gang snang la// sngags stong bzlasaba'i 'jim pa ni// sku zhal
dbus la btags nas ni// mchod bsamachor de sngags khri brjod// chos gcig nas tshes brgyad bar// gsol ba yang mi gdab byas nas// tshes dgu'i snga drod grol bar bya// bdun nam nyi shu rtsagatsag
brjod// byugs pas nad rnams thams cad sol// chog de ltar ldan pas// smand ru rta'abru mar byug/ yang naglabar sngags bcasagadags// phyis ba don gyis nyen pa la// 'brum raman
srad bu bya// dud bgro lanimunyid dam// yang na srad bu bya ba ste// rtsi mar dag gis mchog tu 'gyur// sbyor rnams gang dang gang la yang// sku byad mtshan dab ldan pas nai// me long nang gigazug
ltar damigs// gsol ba btab pas 'grub par 'gyur// dang po skye mched drug ldan sems// thunamong rogs can srab 'i khams// gnyis b mos dang ldan bani// thunamong kun tu zhugs pa'i
gas// gsum pa rig pa'i rtagasalhan b// rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// ba ba lhagasams 'thunaldan zhing// gsang sngags sngon du gyur pa yi// lta pa blang dor med pa'i sams//
drug ba padagagazhan dbyer med sems// bdun pa chos rnams rgyal ba'isi mas// brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'isims// dgu ba rten 'brelatshab snang soms// bcu bamtshan bral grub ba'isam/
bcugacigamtshan bral snang ba'isims// banuganyis chos kyi sgo yisams// bcu gsum lhag pa 'byungaba'isams// bcu bzhishes bya mthar thug sems// rgyas dang gsal dang khyab pa dang//
rtagasadang 'gyur med rgyas pa'i// gnas skabs bcu bzhir rab tu rtogs// sems rtogs gyur nasas rgyas chos// rgyud kun tu na rgyal bas bshad// 'od zer lcags kyu khyud mo'i bar// spros

pas lha klu 'bum phrag dge ba kun slong sems// dkar po skyes nas byang chub rin chen gling// thob mdzad blos bsgyur bdini ngomatshar che// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagi rtsa ba'irgyud kyi rgyal bo/
bad rlabazhos bya ba las// skul brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o/// de nas 'jig tshun skyong ba'i tshogs// rgya chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// shar M lheb mtshamos na bzhug
ba yi// nan ka zhes la sogs// drang srongatshog sa rnams mgrinagacig tu// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadagasol// o/ kun makhyen ye shes nyi ltar lha// mtshan dpe du mas brgyan mdzad pa//
(spun@#/ bdud las rgyal ba rkang gnyis mchog/ 'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zhib tshagasakhral 'od gsal ba// rgyun chadamed pas 'khor lo'i tshul// skyegan bachilas sgrol
zhing// rnam dag sgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal/ sa chen sa chen gazhan rnams kyang// sa la 'dren mdzad tshog sa chen rdzogs// rgyun mi 'chad du sku 'byung ba// thal sbyar bus btsugs phyogasagacig/
'khod// de nas rgyal ba kun gyi lab// dbang phyug chen po'i mchog lha// sbyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rjecan// 'grol thugs brtse'i slad du ni// rig sngags thanamadapa gsungs// sngags de myur
du 'grub pa dang// yongs dang dga' sel ba'i phyir// ma yi las la rtenaba'i phyir// sbyor ba'i rim pa bshad du gsol// de skad gsolanas drang srong tshogs// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas kyang
mchod pa'i char chen phabapa ste// thal sbyarab sagatsugs phyogs gcig 'khod// de nas rgyal sras kun gyi yab// 'gro ba'i gnyanagatsag 'dren pa'i gtso// sbyin srog las kyichog 'di// nan tan
dun bka' stsal to// sa bzang dri bzang chu bcas pas// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya// 'bras phye bamar 'bru bzang rnams// shi rtsi shi'am brgya rtsa brgyad// bsngags pas nad yams
gnod pazhi// nad la mar lhag nyung zhig btung// nadagazoragang yang 'joms par 'gyur// yang nababruman phyom 'am// sa 'am smra tshil gzugs byas te// slad bu khro ba'i zhal btags nas/[]
0 rigi sdugs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do// ral gris gtubasanas nasrogabya// brgya phrag lngasan sdang byed nyams// yang na dug gisagazugasabarnyanagatum// dug khragazhim bshing bsreg/ drug cu rtsa
bzhi'i grangs kyis// tshar bcad ba yid bang du 'gyur// 'byung bo drag po zhen pa la// gu gul yungs kar de ltar b sag/ bal pos 'u'i smyug ma la// bu ram sbrang rtsi zhe mar sbrags// sku yimadun du
bgrags pas nai// 'band yams 'chad par 'gyur// gu guladakar po nyishu gcig/ bsregasan byang chub sems dpa' gug//zhomar sbrang rtsi lung tang shing// nyishu rtsagacig sku bdun bsreg/

sachen rgyal sras kun mnyam ba'i// 'phrul chen po des red 'gyur// gang gi bsod nams rgyas 'dod na// dri bzang chu dang sa gtsang la// khru bzhi khru gang dkyil 'khor bya// dribazangasheng la khru gang/

batshig/ oSh+Thasha ka lus kar sbyang// 'om zhimar a kAru// tsan dan dkar po dmar po dang// dri zhimamathograng tshad kyi shang// 'bru bzangatshadadang bcas pa dag/ dang por sngags stobazlasanas kyang//
brgya rtsa brgyad du bsgrags pa yis// tsherang nad med rgyal srid 'thob// stong gsa'ajig rtenapa dag 'grub// khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin te// 'bum gyis gzugs khamasa mngon du 'gyur// sal sa rgyal
sras kun mthong zhing// mngon shes drug dang ldan ng ra'agyur// byams rgyalab kun mthong zhing// zhing khams dum sbyong bar 'gyug/ gzhan yang phran tshegs las rnams la// ngesad nyishu rtsa gcig
[EPi ge]// nas// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du sbyar// sngags dang lha la sems brtan bya// nad yams drag po bsalalag/ gtso bor 'bras bu gsum sragago/ gdon chen rnams ni bsal ba la//
gagul sgog la sog/ brtsabargyad du bsreg par@#// rmilamanganadang mtshan ma ngan// phratshond dang gdon rigs la// durab yungs kar mchog tu bshad// 'thu rnams gang dang gang 'dod la//
'bru gsadi nyid spyin srog khya// char pa dbab par badodarasan/ datsam pa kadang rnam gsum dang// mngaragasumanAgags dang// dbang bo lag gi sbyin sragan// ci'adod char ba babab par 'gyur//
lca gal te gcar bar 'dod pan// thal ba de ltar khungs kar gyis// nan tan phyogasabazhir gang dbang gis// sngags kyis yang yang gtong bar bya// yungs kar goms sbrang rtsi dang// 'bras yos kyis ni
byis ba sos// gduganam rigs sa'ajigs pa dang// khyim srung bar 'dod pa yis// bdadamarapo'i sbyin srag ni// nyi shu rtsagacig khon bya// sems bzang snyags ring bdod bsani// tsan
tsha/ danadakabo'i sbyin sreg bya// phran tshegs lams nad btsal// lem tsam gyi sbyin srogabya// phyuganadasalab bdod ba'i tshe// ngo mam tog dkarab cas bsreg/ nadan ngagadon bcasasol
la/ mngagasum 'bru bzag pur bas// durab dkar bo'i las shing rnams// dri bzang tshocan rnams ni// ma tog bzang bo'i shing labasraka/ gdonand zhi bar 'dod pas// 'bras bu
[z/]gsum sogs shing rnams basrog/ gdon thun lamangagasum dang// dur ba dkar bo bsrags pas zhi// rmi lam ngan dang ltas ngagang// 'bras bu mar bsngags sel bar byed// gos dang stod
spyad rdzas dang lus/ gzhan glib ngan pasagos pa la// 'bras phyom dang spos dkar dang// me tog dkar po bsreg par bya// ting la byed kyi ma tog bsreg/ mig nad thams cad sel bar byed//
mi su lin rtsa bar b cas// bsragasanamabadasal 'gyur// tsan dan gla rtsi bamar bsrog/ sa yind rnams thams cad sal// mu zi gu gul ril bu bsreg/ so dang rtse yind sal 'gyur/ so
mdzad ng kur// bsngags pas skye nad 'joms par dris// sbrang rtsi tsan dan sha kur// bsregs pas glo nad sel bar byed// 'bras bu gsum dang zhog lta// bsregs pas sange nad sel
ba byed// busu sbyang dapagyi dbaka/ bsngags pas mchin pa'i nad sel 'gyur// me tog kha dog lngabasregasan// phob la sogasanang khroland// ma lus thams cad zhi bar byed// lus madzes
g.yang thob par 'agyur// nor 'dod pa sa nasar ldebamar// ba sar zho dang mar bsrag bya// gosamadog gang dragang 'dod la// de dang mtshungs pa'i m tog dang// sad bu sorani bcuganyis la//
gang mdog de dngamathun pa yi// dri zhim dag la bsag par bya// rnyed 'gyur the tsomami bya'o// pri yang ku dang ka ling ka/ pad+ma'i zab pa stong la// bsreg cing gsol ba gdab pas na/ dgater gyi
longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur// 'bras dang myu gu'i 'bras bu sogs// bsregasan longs spyod brtan par 'gyur// dan khod ba la 'bras bugasum// brgya bsregs bu dang bu mo 'phel/
'bras 'osa'abasaba'adodapas kyang// sri ka dzAtes tog dkar// bdakar 'os shom bcas// bsregasabs 'khord dmag dpung 'phal// de'abumagrangs kyis rgyal srid 'thob// mar
gsum bal ba'i 'bras bu la// 'bum gyis rang nyid rgyal por 'gyur// sngagasamathu rgyas pa'i don dun// namapa'ishang lamar dpan// yungs kar dkarapo sbyang bcas la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg/
bar bya// gang gis rgyal po 'khor dang bcas// dbang du bya bar 'dod pa yis// yungs kar rgyalaba' yungs kar bcas// brgyasun drug tu bsag par bya// gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang 'dodan//
myong mod pa'i lamashing la// 'brasabu gsum dang gur kuman// stong phrag gcig tubasreg par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs dbang byed pa la// 'bras bu gsum pa'i shing lan// 'bras bu gsum
dang gu gul la// stong phrag gnyis su bsag par bya// lha rnams dbang du bya 'dod pas// a ru ra yi shing gsar 'a/'o ma zhomar sbrang rtsi la// sum stong bsregs pas lha dbang bsgyur/ sgra
a bud medadabang du bdod bsan// til dang 'bras sogs phub ma la// 'bras dang rang byung brgya rtsa brgyad// bsags pas bu mo dbang du 'gyur// byis pa dbang du 'dod pas ni// pri yang ku yi
smyanesreg bya// las rnams gangadang gang la yang// de dang mtshungs pa'i sims kyis sbyar// zhi bzhi ba'i yid kyis te// bskal bzang blo ni rgyas ba la// chags dang 'dunasems ldan pas/
dbang du gyur la thatshom med// khro dang bcasaba'i yid kyisazhi// drag po'i las su 'gyur ba yod// brtanapo dal 'byor ldan ba'izlo// rgyun rtagasagasal yod gyur bas// ji ltar bcas bde
'grub kyi// gzhan du yang de ltar min// mig la skyon zhugs lus kyis ni// dngos gang gsal bar lta ba ltar/ smum dang ni bral gyur nas// sngags kyi byin rlabs snang ba med// lus ga yid
kyi sgo nas kyang// rnam pa kun tums la// smod pa 'bad de sbyang bar bya// skyed bas dmyalasogs na'agror 'gro// bla ma'i ngag las byung ba dang// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyamachod// o
du sbyar dzAl ti sadasmulatsani sarba argyusAd+han sAhA/ bsang gtor dang shadagam pa'i sngagasaso// o la tshalan sany+tsa sbyar ba'i sngags so// nams mnabud d+ha naM/ o ag la
Aditse Abisha mahAkr-i'i bya ka bya bahanAya wAhA/ mchodamar gyi sngags so/ o sawapa padaha'adzaya sAhA/ tAla'i sngags so// osaNasaMpad sAhA/ nodang zanadam pa'o/ sobadzra
b+ha ru gu ru swAhA/ ut+pa la'i 'o// o badzaphun+ta ye swA hA/ 'bras lo// o'adzaa pra ti ha ta badzraswAhA/ sha lo// oMbadzra dzAl hA/ lag bzhigyi'o// ob grwa le khu ye swA hA/
( @#/ mar gsum dang da karagasum gyi// obadzram hAb glu ya swA hA/nas kyi'o// oMm thub lA ya swA hA/ sran mam sha'o// oM badzragas+sari sAhA/ gro'o// u0f00 badzra ArA/
sAhA/ u dumawara'i 'o// o titi blami sAhA/ byang chub shing gi'o// oM badzranAya sAhA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o// oM badzranaMkA ya swA hA/ anu'i 'o/ o ANahAhU~M/ thams cad bsang ba'i 'o// chusaniyaM
bar byed pa dang// rdul sogs mun r zhi bar byed// zhi bau yi dkyila 'khor ba'o// dkar bozlum po kho na'o// sas na shang 'brum tog/ bskyad dang dngos po rgyus bar byed// rgyas pas yi dkyil
khor ltar// ser po gru bzhi pa na'o// rlung gis skadadang 'byed pa dang// dbang du byas nasagayo bar byed/ dbang la rlung gi dkyil 'khor ltar// zla gam dmar po'i ba dog go/ mesan smin cing srag
pa dang// drag shul gyis niya lab byed// drag po gru gsum ma'i dkyil 'khor// nang dmar rgyabananag por bya// mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ni// mun pa'i sgrib pa zhi bar byed// zhi lhashar du bltas
pa ste// dpalaldan gos kyang dkar bo 'o// nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe// dngos bo rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir// rgyas pa byang du bltas bya ba// gos saram ljang khu shis// nyim thal nas mtshamamo
ni// dbang dudangos bo 'gyur ba'i phyir// dbang la nubaphyogasabaltas pa dang// gos kyang dmar ser rab tushas// nyim lhor brgya'i dus su na// shin tu thung ba'i chu yisan// rtswa sogs dngos rnams
0 bsadanas kyang// desadang 'thor dang dengs pa dang// bskams dang g.yongs dang dub pa dang// ba phyugayos dang bcas par 'gyur// mngon sbyo b+hel phyogs bltasanas// gos kyang sngo dang nag po
bya// tsam la ka dang du tu ka/ lag skyes pad+madakar po dang// ku mud dkar bo zla sang rnams// tshugatsang dang bar bcas pa dag/ zhibab las lamachod par bya// maN+Danu ga ba la// sumu le dang
asas dgu gsaramadog chen po ru dung dang// tsa'ul saradang bad+ma sar// nubo tshan kho chung bcas ba// rgyas ba'i las la bsngags pa 'o// mu phyin dang man du dmar// lo yi cha dang nya sha/
rnams// sin sgyur dang pad+madamar// ku mu ta'agi dmar bo rnams// lu ma'i chu dang bcasal sta// dbang gi lasal mchod par bya// ut+pal kem ka dang// ur khye ba dang ma mig/ dzumong
sbyin la mgo bo dang// bganadan Dod bal rnams// khron pa'i tshudang lhan cig tu// mngon spyod las lamachod par bya// sA ludakar bo thanadang zho// pika smosan zhib la// su lu dmar po'i zan bo
mo yodunadamar po dbang la go/ grodang cha shasar ba'ican// tshulu kani rgyas pa la'o// nas dang bra bo'izan gu gul// btsos pa'i sha dang lhan cigaste// dragakho'i las de zhal zas dang//
bdug sposabye bragags par bya// tshimar dngani as la// sdong bur ldan ba'amaraman// zhiba'i las la shin tushis// lang na pad dkar stong bu yi// lam shin tudangs ma dang/
sa ri hi yisdong bun// rgyas ba'i las shin tugs// yang na ba yi lag cha// na ke la yi mar dar na// bang dmar po'imar dang ni// dbang gi las la shin tushas///
mang nab pa mar 'o// yung dang tsilamar dang ni// tsirta'i sdong bu mar me ni// yang nagasoma'i shun pa yis// mdogadamar dal zhing gsal ba na// gangs ri'irtsi ltar dkar 'bar ba// bar pra
smagul sposadakar dri// zhib las ni 'grub par 'gyur// mdog dmar g.yo yang mog pa la// nyim thal ka'a'i rtse b.ru// sheb sgra ma li ka la'i dri// dbangag las 'grub the tshom med// mdog

ser mi g.yo dngas ba la// nyi ma shar ba'i ri ltar 'bar// lhab sgra tsam ba ka yi dri/ rgyas pa'i las 'grub the tshom med// le brgan mdog ldan 'khyil zhing smyug/ hur sgra rul dri bro ba dang// nags kyi
ri bo ltar 'bar ba// mngon spyod las la 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten ting 'dzin ldan 'grubapa'// drang srong rigs la dpagamed kyang// mes yi lha nibazhibanuba'i// sbyin srog las la sbyong bar
bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin can// bcu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya// gnya'an ka dngas be ka/ tu kAse'u myasmyo to dang// ltob yid skyes khro bo dang// dmar po gri tachom li// b+hi su ya ki
bcu gnyis po// phan 'dogs la sogs lasal sbyar// zhiba'i sbyin srog thal bas ni// 'byung po phra mo zhi bar byed// dbang gi thal bas 'byung po 'ching// rgyas pas 'dod pa'i las sbyin byed/
ra ba'i rtsi la gtor bar// drag pos 'byung po sel bar byed// mam kyi gzhung du gtor bar bya// zhi dang dbang gi zhing phyogs dang// rab d mos tshal du gtor// dag par byed pas nubo

ltar// rgyas pa nyima'i dkyil 'khor dang/ (ga par byed pa rgya mtshor//lhun srog gis ni lha mnyes shing// sngags sgrubasngags kyi las rnams 'grub// drang srongatshog rnamA thams cad dang// driza'i tshogs rnams thams cad
dang// babyung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni// sbyin sreg gis ni rab dga' nas// rnal 'byor grogs byed srung ba dang// skyob phyir tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing// nad med longs spyod rgyas
pa dang// bsam pa bzhin du 'grub bar gyur// 'phags pa spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo pad+ma nga ba zhes bya ba las/ ma lhabarten pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o
de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba// mkha' la yig smralanas ni// 'gro don snatshogs mdzad pa zhig/ 'khor bcas dkyil 'khorader lhagasanas//
phyag 'tshalabaskor ba du ma byas// mchod pa'i sprinagyis rgyas bar mchod// phyogs gcig 'khod nas ston pa la// mgrin gcig gsungani snyan pa yi// 'di skad tshig ni gsolab 'debs
so/ mtshan dang dpa byad brgyanapa'i sku// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// chos kyi longs spyod jisnyed pa// rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal// gang la mkho bde gtso bo//
'dren pa gzugs brnyanadum 'chang// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad ba'i sku// bde ba che la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub lam// phyogs chos byang nub sum cu

bdun// stobs dang mi 'jigs brtson mdzad pa// chos rnams lhun grub sku phyag 'tshal// rnam dag rgya mtshor ldan rnams la// thugs rje rgya mtshorgyun byung bas// zhing khams rgya mtsho sbyong mdzad ba'i
mgon po spyan rasagazigs phyag 'tshal// sngags dang rdzas dang phyag rgyaramis// sna tshogs kyisan don mdzad phyin// theg pa kun las khyad par du// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags//
nanatanasgrub ba smos ci dgos// sngags dang phyag rgya'achang bas kyang// nad dang gnod sol bskal pa yi// sgrib rnams 'byung pas khyad par 'phags// dbul po rigs dang dman pa yang//
zhugs m tha gnas bde ldan zhing// nung zad grubanas nius mthun// dpagamed babyungabs khyad par 'phags// mgon po bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpal chen yang shes kun gyi mdzod//
bod zer nyig 'bumagazi can// 'gro la'adren gtso dad dpon gyi// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags dang phyag rgyun bcas pa yis// 'gro la sna tshogs phan don du// ji ltar 'gyur
mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thubapa ches// pad+ma'i spyanagadangs 'dzum mdzad nas// tshangs pa'i gsung na snyan pa yis// 'gro la phan phyir 'di skad gsungs// dag byed
phyag rgyasngags dang bcas// 'gro la phanaphyir zhus pa na// legasaso rdzu 'khrul 'khor ye tsho/ shesarab 'chang ba khyod legasaso// samasadapa' chen po de phyirangs/ khyod la ngomatshar legs
par bshad// khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// legs par thung la rlachor sbyos// ras sam grog shing shun gang// 'jam zhing nag risamed pa la// gur kum gi'u wang sen rtsi dang// tsan

ngan gyisan phyag rgyabri// bad+ma'adab brgyad mu khyud bcas// 'od dang ldan ba bri bar bya// rgya bsgyur dang po ste// gnyis ba snyir d+hi'i spro// gsum pa rgyur rgyur ste// i ti biT+Te bzhi lta ba// tsa la tsa la
gnyis bri'o// pra tsa le gnyis drug pa'o// kusum dang ku su ma// pha dun pa brasi tA brgyad b la// b+ha lai li mi li/ gsom ti dza dang// sAhAr bcas pa dbus su'o// phyag 'tshal
bcas sngags mtha' mar bri// rab rdzogs sngags kyis ltar dmigs nas// gtsang ming mchod pas mchod bya sta// sngags stong brjod pas lus la godags// 'din srung ba'i mchog tu
'gyur// nadra dang yams nad gdon rnams dang// 'jigs ra brgyad las skyob par nges// rig sngags zlag naas khyad par du// rdoN+Didakar po rtsilngal// 'od kyi ra ba zlum po ga/ ri moganI

dngabacas pa gi/ rwa rnams la nihU~Mganyis bar// rig sngags zlog dngabacasapa'o// lte bar o b+hiswAhA'i bar// bdag nyid srungs zhes bribar bya// mu khyud dang bor bri bar bya// gzagis dbang yid bzhin nor
sngagasaso// gnyis par gadong bcu gcig pa'i stags// gsum bar bad+ma gar dpag/ sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya// gal te nad yams zlog pa la// 'dab brgyad
pad+ma mu khyudagasum// sngon ltar yig bkod pa la// mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi sngags// gsum par rten 'brel sngags bris nas// lus sam mgul du thogs pas na/// nad rims dang ni lkog
'khrum sogs/ rlung gis rdul bzhin sol bar 'gyur// donasatshag de thos ma thag/ lhaman bumond bdag mo// sa du de ba zhes bya ba// bzhengs rtathalamo sbyar byas te// bumo khrisanamagrin gcig
bcos ldan 'dasal 'di skad gsol// rdzobatsun 'groba'i gnyen gcig tu// mgon bosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bdag gi sngags 'di gang 'dzinapa// gal te 'brumand byung nani/
bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro// dmabaca' 'di ni dranapa bya// de ba la bya yi ka ka ba ni ta// sum ya bi lAs ka ka ra Ni// ki shunabany+tsa tA li han yi// kan ka tatsar Ni/ la mind man tsa
lami pand khunarwa/ dwatsa patatA tsit+tand daM/ sa sku de wi me b+ha wa/ lha mos de skad gsol ba thag/ mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// o o b+ha bi ta/ bita ti miti/ gtsa ka ra a mu
kas+ya ka bya/ lo hi tago d+harma kAku re swAhA/ byin rlabs ldan ba'i sngags de ni// rgyun du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// o hanaserU pa d+ha ris hA/ srad bu mnyams dkar po la// nyishu/
gcig mdud bkabya// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhibazlasanas kyang// lus samagul du gdags par bya// kr-i hi tig tika ta tha paka shika/ ta thA ya wA tsal dahUM hUMphaT/ sranam rdog bor ra la// brgya rtsa/
brgyad brgyad bzlas pa yi// 'bru bdun thum bo byas pa zhig/ dribazang bcasalamagul duthogs// mas nad kun dang 'buman gnad// shin tugadug ba kun sal bgyur// de nas yi sngags
'chang ngamo// dbala'abrang gsan bodi skad gsol// bdag gi rig sngags 'di chos ba/ isand kund bralabar bgyur// namo rat+tatra yA ya/ nam A ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ bon+tis tA mi/
mahAsatum/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ na mobadzramA ra bi dza yA ya/ tathA ga tAya/ ab+hate samyakasaM bud na ya/ tad+yathA/ oMbadzrapatshe mahAbadzra/ sarba b+hir thA/ han tan badzra/ sarbadzAr
brashaman yas hA/ mi skumarus smyo rtes dang// gu gul sungs kar sgog skya dang/ shang kun gla rtsi'i 'khor lo// rtsibs brgyud phyogs bzhir hI/yig khri// mtshams bzhir bris te dbus
su ming// sngags 'di mu khyud dang bo la// gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa ya sngags// bris nas lus sam mgul ru thogs// nad rims thams cad sol ba dang// rnal 'byor kun dang ldan pa
'gyur// degs sbyanaras gzigs dbang gis// 'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol// rang byung can gyi ras lan// son rtsis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ba/ mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri//rtsibs
