bzhihI lagason bskor du// hITag tsa shaM ku ru hUM// mu khyud dang po mgon po ni// bad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o// gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po 'phreng// gsum pa lcags kyu
kyi shugacig/ dbusasub lagi b+hir bcas bri// lhadam nyid kyang dam byed na// 'gro ba gzhan lta smos cidagos// gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang// bgegs kyi gnod pa sal 'dod pas//
rtsagasumadorgyagram ste// dbus su spyanabasagazigs dbang mgon// bats+tshagatsug tor sngagasabri'o// rwa rnams kun la hU~Myigan/bgagasamingau tsa tayibaskor// mu khyudadang bo spyan rasagazigs/
ha la ha la'i sngagasakhri'o// gnyis pa khro bo skad sngags// gsum pa bgegs dgrasngags bris la// derlabame yi phung bo// gang zhig 'khor lo 'di bris pas// srad med bu ltar mthu cheba'i//
gdugab can lang thor byed na// thunatshogs 'byor ba smos ci dgos// gang lasar sna rnam tshogs shig/ las sbyod 'phalab mi 'gyuran// phunasumatshog saldan darab 'aphel phyir// skyob ba'i phyag
rgya bshad par bya// rgyal po'amani'adunal// gtsang ldanurab bzang blangs nas kyang// dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug/ legs babargyan nas thig btab ste/ dachur kum dang nag rtsi lasi// ban
bdababadu jug pa// phyogasabazhir bdab maradapalapheb ste// mtshamasa bzhi 'i yid bzhinanor bu zi// mtshams brgyad la ni yi gegang// o dngabadzrad kahUM/ yig drugagasabaskor bar bya//
mu khyud dang bor mi bsholasngags// gnyis pagadong banugacig pa'i sngags// gsum pa ut+pala'aphrang ba ste// yang togartse 'am mdzod bzha gnas // gsol btab mchodan longs sbyod 'phel//
dmadagang zhig tu 'dod pas// dbazhin pad+ma bdababargyad pa// phyogs bzhir b+hi bri mtshams su drang// dbus su khu ru'i gzugs shig bri// phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu// sngags bu
rtsol bcasakhribar bya// mtshams bzhi o dang amar// dzIwanatI ye swAhAs bskor// mu khyud dang ro spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags// gnyis bar gdongabcu gcig pa'i
sngags// gsum pa uladamar do'abrang// bod 'phro rtag pa ramachod pa dang// phul du byung bstod pas bstod// gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlasan// bu stsol 'gyur la the tshom med//
srung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang// bu slong ba li phyag rgyanI/ smin drug snang ba rgyal bri// lhag mams/ci bdar bri// gang zhig sems skor yid mi dga'// glo bur mi mug skye 'gyur na//
ba khadabam bzhib yig/ dbus su rang gzugs mtshan mthig/ 'dabam roljamadog bzhis// gdong banu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ u khyud lan spyan ras gakhrigs// don yod zhags pa'i
sngagasabri'o/ gnyis par rdo rje'i 'phreng ba// de'i rgyab 'od kyi 'phreng ba bri// rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gdab// nadasam tsharing bsod nams 'bal// gang zhig shes rab bdod bsan// dpa'
be'u rgyalapo 'du ma'i// triligany+tsa tu sngags 'disabaskor// o dang klu la de ka la// ma nisA hAzhes pa bri// da yacha rgyab 'khor ba// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngagasabri//
de rgyab 'od kyir ba// gang gis 'dib changamachod pa la// nad dang gnod pa kun bral te// dug dang rims nad 'joms ba dang// shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// yul du la tog nyams ba

zlodang/ thog 'brug sar brgod pa dang// kludang sa bdag gnod pa ste// degasal sbyor ba bshad par bya// shing shunadakar bo ma nyams pa// nyams dga'i nyi rim sbyor ba la// rdorje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa//
mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya// gnams yan hUM yig la// o dang dzin ti ti te// hU~M phaTacas ba'i sngags kyis bsko// mu khyug dang bo'amagon po che// gdong bcu gcagi pa'i sngags 'phreng bri// gnyis
bar thugs rje chen po mgon// mibashol ba la sngagasakyis bskog gsum bar rdo rje'abrang ba dang// me gi 'od dang ldan bar bri// phyag rgya'adi nibastatsamagyis// klu li rgyal bo mthu ldan rnams//
'khor dang bcas talus khaskams 'gyur// gang gi khyim dugadong pa dang// ma he sogs yamasand can// bsal ba'i thabs kyi phyag rgyuni// brtan par drang srong tshogs rnams nyon// ko pi da mi'i
shing la ni// khrug khru ga nyisadabyibs gru bzhi// gas grugs ga sogs med pa la// shin tu srab 'jag sor gnyis cha mas// shing de ni rta babasagazugs// 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas

[s/]ba yi// btsugs pa'i g.yas zur dang bon// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste// gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po'o// gsum par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser// bzhi par pad+ma dkar po 'o// g.yon zur dang ro ra pad+ma dmar//

gnyis pa ut+pal sngon po bo// gsum banor bu bzhi rgya gram// nang khong dun pad+ma bya// 'dabamabargyud pa 'od ldan pa'o// lta ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la/ o dang pi sha tsa pa// sha bar sajab d+hi// prasha/
gnas hAzhes// khaM yig la bskor ba bri// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// gdong bcu gcig pa'i gus bri'o/ gnyas par chos kyi gtsug tor gyi// rtsa ba'i 'phrang sngagasakhri bar bya// rgya skyegs
dang mi mtshal yin te// de la shing sbyin rgyug par bya// mchod dang gsolagadab sngagasaragazhi// bdun stong ri ra brjod byas nas// sgo gong la gdags khyung 'jug tshe// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal
lo// rta phyugs dmas nad ma lus la// rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs bcasakhagi/ bajig rten mgon kyi 'gi sngags mthus// myur du sal bar mnan pa dang// zlog dang bcing bar brjod ces brjod// phyag
bdagachen po skyong ba ltar// glang bo rtabong mahe tshogs// rtag cing nad dang gnod pamad// shin tu 'phel zhing rgyalabar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad byab// dmag dpung chen de 'jigs pa la//
khyad par ru ni skyob pa yi// thug rgya sbyor ba mnyan par gyis// yung bas zas sam shing la// pad dkar stong du kha TaMdang// ral gri 'od ma bribar bya// de la gdu bu gsum gyis bskor// dang po
gdong gtsugacig pa'i sngags// gnyis pas nag ge'i sgra la sngags// gsum par ya chen bo'i sngags// de rgyab cha yi rab nyi// 'di la gsol ba btab nas ni// g.yul
ngor khyer tezhugs pa dang// dgra dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur te/ rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur// longs spyod spyir ni byang bltas bri// dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste// g.yul zlog pan lhor bltas
bri lhag ma rnams la shar b ltasabri// dkar ser dmar dang sbo ba yi// dbyibs zas dang gos shes bya// 'dzumadang rngam dang dgod dang khro// bzhin gyi rnam par bshad pa yi// sngags
dang sngags kyi 'od 'phrang dang// lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang// snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang// rgyan yang de ltar shes bar bya// kun kyang rin chen pad+ma'i gdan// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa ni//
sngags kyi yig 'bru'i sgyu rnams bzhugs/ sngags rdzogasanas ni sngags su dmigs// gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang// rig pa'i lha mo'i tshig
rnams dang// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang// spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang// khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang// brdzig rten skyong bgrags ldan rnams// rtsa 'dod
las rnams ma lus pa'i// grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni// tshul bzhin du ni sgrub pa la// brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang// the tsom du ni mi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
ci/ dbang phyugag tsaba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+madra ba las/ phyag rgya labarten pa'i le'u sta bcu gcig pa'o///de nas mkha' la gshags pa yi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i drang srong
mchog/ mtshan dapa du ma rgyas pache// nyim gong bu zhes bya ba// drang srong dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ 'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rjecan// sbyan ras gzigs dbang mgron po la// sangs
rgyas tshigags 'di skad gsol// o/ 'od zer du mther zugag/ srid 'dam stug po skam byed rgyal// yon tan lo shes kyis brgyan su// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/
gsung snyan yan lagabarjod bral chos// bag chags ri bo snyile mdzad rgyal// skye 'gago bral ston sde snodagasum// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// skye 'gag gnod bralamanyam
gzhag pa// ting 'dzin shes rab 'bal mdzad rgyal// ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas thugs// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs sman dang sngags sbyar nas// lha yi
gongabu'i ril bu ni// 'aN+Dig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grubam lus rdzogs ba yi// thugs rje'i nyim lhas mdzad pa'i// mgon po pad+mas bshad du gsol// 'gro rnams ma
yig 'dam la zhen// srid pa'i thag pas rgyagramabacings// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pas g.yogs// nga rgyal phrag dog chu thos g.yos// na rtog log lam g.yang sar lhung// bag med
ser sna'i dug gis myos// sdug ba'i khrims rnam par rgyal// bag chags thum po'a'i sa mnan// mgonakhyod thugs rjes ngal ba med// nyes pa'i rgya mtshobasal
ba'iphyir// shes rab thabs 'byunga bshad du gsol// de nas 'jig rtenamagon po rje// thugs rjethugasadapagamanga' ba yi// thugasadam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bur bcas// khyad par gsung 'di bka'
stsal to// mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang// rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes// 'das dang ma 'ongs donashes dang// mtha' yas shesajug las spyod pa// dngos dang rtags dang
cha mthun gyis// rnam pa bco brgyad nag tu'agyur// phradong yang dang mchod par bya ba dang// bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur ba dang// gar yang phyin yang 'dod dgus ldan pa dang// dga'
mgur gnas tadabang phyug yon tan no// rnam pa brgyud kyi dpe bya yis// longs spyod dbang dang lus larab ng// tshol dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang// tshul mibying mkha' la 'gro/ dus 'og
'gro dang mi snang ba// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// dngos po gang dang gang bsgrubs rnams// ril bu lasanIbabyung gyur gyis// gzhan n myur du 'grub ma 'gyur// byang chub sems
dpa'iril bu ni// mtshams mad lasogs byadabs kyang// red ma thag tudangos grub 'gyur// nyadang dbang ldan lha yi sras// ma chos dbang du byas gyur nas// 'byung po sha za lha man me//
tsam/ mamamakha' 'gro 'byung po klu// dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can// sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngos grub bzang po 'dod pa yis// khyad par ril bu 'di bsgrub bya// gi'u
wongadang nilig bu migaM lde ros bzang por sbyar ba yis// rilab rgya sran tshad byas nas// snodagatsang nang du gzhag par bya// sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na// sngon chad ma mthong snang ba 'am/
slathosasamani bde gshegasagazugs// yid 'ong mngon du byung ba sogs// mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas zla bgazas bzung tshe// ci 'byor mchod de snyim par bcug/
bzlas brjod byas nas nyishayin// dubara'athul dang drican 'gyur// dud 'thul lus la byugs pas kyang// snang ba dang bod gzugs can dang// 'dzam gling phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang// longs
spyod che dang ldan 'gyur te// shi 'phos dga' ldan gnas su skye// drim tsam gyis lus byugs kyang// 'gro ba thams cang dbang byed cing/ thos pa 'dzin cing sgyu rtsal mkhas// shi nas 'dzam
glibabadinyid du// lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni/ 'khorab gzhon nu'i rigs su skye// yang na mi yi rgyal bo 'am// glang ponyid duskyabar nges// 'bar ba lus M la bskusan lta// rig sngags
'chang lus nyisha mdog/ bskal pa nas da bdod dgur spyod// 'jig rten kun tu thogs med rgyu// mkha ldangs 'og chubran 'gro// sangs rgyas kun nas phyin nas kyang// dbang por
gnasata rgyal po gnas// sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod// 'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig rten khams// gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu// 'jig rten 'jig rten
das ba yi// bdag nyid yid du 'od 'dod pas// rgurakur ga pur gla rtsi dang// gi'u tshangabasags nas sngags stong bzlas/ brdungs te phyamar byas nas kyang// sngags stong bzlas te chu gtsang gis//
ri'i bu rgyasunAtshad byas nas// re re la yang stong stong brjod// rlung dang nyimam reg par// bsams nas gnod gtsang gzhag par bya// ri'i bu tsam zhig mur na yang// rgyal po blon po 'khor bcas kyis//
mthong n bu bzhin gzigs 'gyur na// tha mal skye bos smos ci dgos// nor rnams gzhan gyis star ba dang// bsgob la ni ngag btsan 'gyur// ga bur gu gul gi'u spangadang/ tsan dan gan dpa rje dang//
gla rtsi dag lta chamanyam du/ re re sngags stong bzlas nas su// brdungs teral bu byas pa dag/ g.yonapa'i zhal la gdags par bya// bdun nas nya ya bar du ni// sngags bzlas pa dang mchod par
bya 3bdugs pas nad dngagadon rnams sel// mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang// rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang// blon po la sogs dbang du bsgyur// khar bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong// gdam pa
thams cad don yod 'gyur// spyi bor btagasan byed snyoms dang// g.yul las shani tu rgyal bar 'gyur// gal te byams bdugs pas kyang// sdig pa thams cad 'byang 'gyur te// kun gyis mthong

[4a/j]dang dga' ba dang// gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod// ga pur gla rtsi gur kum dang// tsan danagla rtsi ka ko la// spos kyi rgyal po pad+madang// ut+pal sngo dang tsanadanadamar// re re la yang stong bzlas/
nas/ dachamanyam phye ba'i gdung bcas// ril bu tsan ka tshad bya// grang bsams byas nas lus la 'chang// gling bzhi na khyab rgyal srid 'thob// kra ku la yi thang nudang// ldong res ba dang ut+pal/
sbyo/ mtshodabu ba gi'uwang dang// yung dang sbyar ba gur kum dang// ga bur dang ni gla rtsi gsum// re re la yang sngags stong bzla// de nas sku yamagul btags te// stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya//

mig nadasolan mudang sbyar// sond lani ka ka ru// rnaba'i nad la ru rta ste// tsa t+pal mu tig mig nad la// gro ba'i nad la bag ka/ glo nad la ni ba le ka/ sha ka ra yi thang dang sbyar// rlung nad la nimar dang
sbyar/ mkhrisand lan tig tadang// bad kan la ni lha dang sbyar// mdzind lan dug mo zungs// ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa// slangasand rnams la thugabo che// bgegs dung yams nad sel ba la// gu rkul
dang bcas 'dug par bya// ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni// nam yang brjod bar mi nus so// gu gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i// bal bus bgegs tshogs sel bar byed// kesu rtsadang sgo'u gsher dang//

ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum// ser bo mu thi bya ma rnams// sbrang rtsi dang bsras 'bu bya// pad+magaradabang sngags stong bzlas// zlos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te// nad dang gdon dang dgras mi tshugs// 'dod
rnams thams cad bgrub par 'gyur// ta kA'i rtsab ba ru ra// skyu ru radang til ta la// mnyams srin bya'i khrag dang na// ril bu byas nas mig la byugs// klu dang yi dgas
khang pa dang// sa 'og thams cad mthong bar nges// byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce// nyin gcig spos phor nang du bzhug/ gnyis pa ra gsum dang 'byung// bzhi paroli bu tshel tshan gtso//
lnga pa sbrang rtsi'i nang du ste// drug pa dngul chu'inang du gzhag/ bdun pa rigs ngan thod par ni// byi la'i khrag gis bsdus la gzhag/ bskams nas bya dang sbyang ku'isha/ lhan cig rang ga khar
bcug na// de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur// gzhan yang yon tan dpag cumed// leng resargyan du bsus pa dang// dzA ti lo mas bon bcas// ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa las// bar snang la
ni 'gro bar nges// pan du ma dang ki ram dang// ma ka ri dang sum tam// pra ban ta ma'iri'i bun// nyizlagazas bzung dus su med// shesa'ab phul du 'byung ba ste// thosab 'dzin 'gyur
smos ci dgos// gabu wang sa hA tsa na dang// sa tasbyang g ril buny+tsa// sngags stong bzlas nas khar banugan// 'das pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur// ga'uwang sug pa yi dang// ba ra A
ta tahasur// ar du sbrang rtsir bcas// ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzlas/ mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes// gzhan yang nd bdon byed pa yi// ril bu chen po bshad par bya//

pas/ rgyal dang rnam rgyalan gu la// kanab+han gu li dang ni// mu tia ba yakhani// i pa yan tu ka ra// gan d+ha ka dang dri yang ku// 'khor lo cha dang 'khor le dang// bit+taka Ti de bzhin du// so ma ra tsa unan te//
rer la yang sngags 'brang dang// kham+martsa brgyad du brjod par bya// de nas brdungs tesbrang rang bcas// byis pa lanidapung par te// bu 'dod mo la mgul par gdags// 'di btags pa yi de ma
thag/ 'jigs pa brgyad dang nad las grol// bamar shudag ba lcir bcas// lcags kyi stod du btsos ba yi// rim du a ma'i 'bras bu tsam// sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de// phyis
nyishu gcig brjod nas// stabar ming bas shes rab 'bol// namorat+na tra yA ya/ na ma A ba lo ka ti shar ya/ bo d+his tA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o shud d+he mr-i taMb la
bod+ha ni sa hA/ srod dang thoras dge spyod dang// duwasgragasong po dul bag can// khrus la dga' zhing dri bzung bstan// spyod lam rab zhi khro ba med// rtag tu sngags brjod brtse sems can// spyan
ras gzigs dbang lacher dad// gdung bag gdong la mchim can// lung thob bla mar rab dga' bgi/ skyes mchog de larab dag zhing// 'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang// 'byung po la sogs
smos ci dgos// rtag par rang gi yid la ni// snying po gsang sngags bcang bar bya// nye ba'isnying po lus dag pa'i// lha yang rang la nye bar byed// rtsopa'i sngags rnams brjod mong ba// khri dang
'bum dang sa ya dang// sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de// kha cig las yang ba'i dung na// lnga tsam gyis na de grub yin// las la sbyarab bdun dang ni// bcu bzhi nyishu rtsagacig dang//
brgyudang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs// dem thag tu chu'i yin te// nung zad pa namar gyis bya/ brtan par 'gyur ba ka ra ste// chos brtan pa la srad bu yin// sman dang sngags kyis sal byad de//
rilabusa'ang du skyod byed yin// sngags sgrub pa la mims pagi/ bdun du rtsoman de dag rnams// de skad gsungs pa'i ng ma thag/ rdo tshesnying po nyi 'od dang// pad dkararin chen snying po dang/
pad sbyin gazigs kyi snying po dang// ma shiso dbang phyug pad dbang phyug/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams// rang rang sde dbung sdor bcas pa// 'khor gyidakyil 'khor chen po rnams//
'jig rtenadabang la cher dmigasanas// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bakram byas te// rin chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yi// mchod pas naam mkha'i gtor rab bkang// rol mo dum lhab lhuka
dang// sil snyan lha yi tshog sa rnams kyis// sbyin madzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar// bkod bamatha' lasabasham byas te// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ mgon
g+ha bgyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams// spyan sagazigs dbang gsung snyan la// yi rang skyes nasamtshan chen brjod// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod rten che// 'jig rtenadabang po dbang phyug
che// pad+masems dpa' pad 'byungache// rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa chen po chos rgyalagatso/ blo gros chen po sems dpa' che// pad+ma 'chang ba pad+madang la// pad+ma'imagon
khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma las byung dam pa'i yid// pad+ma gsal mdzad dug mdzad po// pad+ma'i rje dam pa'i sku// khyod mchog spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba kun chen thabs po che// chamanyam
ga'abadagongs pa che// dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal// bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam chen makhyen chen theg chen po// rnal 'byor chen po mas chen ngo// bde stsol bda mdzad gab mdzad

che// pad+ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo// chos mnga'i donamanga'apad+ma rgyal// dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin// rmad byung chen ldan chos ba'achang// chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
sams dpa' mchog sams dpa'// rin chen sams dpa' chos sems dpa'// dam tshig sems dpa' lasasems dpa'// kun makhyen sums dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten dang 'bo dpa'
bo mchog/ rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad ma// bajig rtan gsal mdzad 'jig rtan don// 'jig rten mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten yig kha dogatshe// yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog/
yi ga'irang bzhin yig gzigs// yagi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// pad+ma'i phyag rgyapad+ma'i lag/ legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin pa'i// sas rgyas tshogs te sangs rgyas chos// sangs rgyas khyod
phyag 'tshal lo// tshad med che skusangs rgyas su// gzugs bzang bachang ldan rdo rje gzugs// gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba// snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo// ga rtsomagon
rgyal bo pad+ma'i dpal// chos kyi dpal mgon badren mdzad pa// tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug mgon// tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag 'tshal la/ 'chegs gtso bo snang ba mchog/ 'od chen

mdzad par rang gsala mdzad// snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon// snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che// chos kyi spyan ni gzigs pa che// ting nge 'dzin po la shesamatsho/

rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang sgyugatso// mkhan po chen po sangs rgyas sras// rgyal thabs bar s pa khyu mchog che// sangs rgyas dpag med phyag 'tshal lo// drag po chen
po brtul chen po/ ha la chen po seng ge 'i sgra// mgrin sprinagar gyi dbang phyug gtso// ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyud gang// 'chang la nad med bgegasamed de//

tsha[ ]dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong// yang yang lhar skyemya ngan 'da'// de skad gsungs nasablo ldan rnams// ranga'ang gdan la rnam par 'khod// de tshe phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos// bdud rigs

thams cad mog por gyur// de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la// rtogs pa'i ga shes ngo bo nyid// nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so// kun tupazang bo'i sbyad tshul can//
dkar lamabanupa rnam spro ba// sems can gang du 'dod sbyorab 'i// gsani rigs chen thams cad pa'o// lus ngag yid bdu spyod bdun// rgyunama'achadadu gyur mod kyang/ ngags pa yin gzugs
banAnamathus// sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzinab yi// lha 'goms pa lha mthong ngam// mngon shes dang bo sems gsal bas// mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che// sams snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa//
mtshan ma pho mo la sogs pa'i// mngon shes 'jig rten gsal mthongs// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste// brtan ba'i ye shes las byung ba'o// dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam spyod// sems dang/
sems dpa' dbyer med dang// zhe lam sgro skur chad pa dang// sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog dang lam// bzhibazhi lhun gyis grub pa dang// rten 'brel zab dona mngon gyur pa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rig
kun mchog/ mtshan med ting 'dzin la gnas nias// rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang// rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang// nges tshigachos don spros pa'i 'thag/ rdzu 'phrul du ma spyod yul la//
rigs chen yongs su grub babs// mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan zhing/ sams kyi snang ba du marab sgyur// dngosa rnams sgros spangabasdu spyod pa// rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis// chos skukun
snang kun tu 'odo// bde skur snang ba paNa'i spyan// ya'i 'khor lo latshogs che// mtshon byamtshan nyid ri blo'adzin// zag mad la shes bla ma'i sa// 'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen s// de ltar drug
ni sangs rgyas kyi// sachen bla mdamatha'a gnas so// ngo bo sprosamad chos sams pa// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go/ sems can sams soms byang sems
'dzin// nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so// sems can mi gtong tshul khrims srung// sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum/ yong gi sngags grub gzhan gyi sngags// bar mi gcod dang 'gro ba la//

byams pa sgrub dang snying rje sgrub// sgrub par byed pa'i sgrubazhi'o// dben pa bstanadang 'du'adzi spong// thos pa bsam zhing de don spyod// phyi rol sngags spyoba'i sdang skyong// dadag sngagasasgrub rgyulnga 'o// dad pa/

dun pa gsal ba dang// phyinong sngags lam spyod dang// sprosamad ston pa'i gzhung 'jugs dang// theg chen mado gzhung 'dzin pa dang// sngags gzhung tshol bam skyo dang// dgaspyod brtson dang phyog pa 'o// bzlas dang

sbyin srag mchod gtor brtson// phyi roladaka' thub gdung med dang// snod bcuda'ogamin gnas lha dang// bum pha rol phyin yul lha// 'gro ba mibaslachos m khyad// theg dmaname lenapa dang bdun/ nyan thos rang

rgyal blo ldan dang// rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul tsom med// lhadang bla ma'i bstanabakur dang// dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang// ser snamed dang gtong la dga'// gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yang dang// gzi brjid

dbang che'i lus thob dang// grags kun blo ldan bargyud bo blta// skur ba med cing bden par smra// bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste// brgyad pa de yang sgrub pa'i rgyu// rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid// gang
0 zhig lcags rgyu bzungabasaganyis re nas// klu phrug 'bum thug 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems// kun slong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad rgyu// rtag par 'chang na gnas 'gyur byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom
ldan thub bachos// blo ldan rnams la bka' stsal pa// legs so lagasosems dpabache// gang dag de dag de bzhin du// bde 'dod rnam par g.yeng ba dang// das ni sdug bsngalamyang n 'das// gdung
bachags sdang 'khrug pa dang// des na leg pa'i chos 'dor yang// dge sbyong leg ltas tshangs pa'i gdon// sngags leg spyod byed rig 'dzin gdon// gdul dka' dag largyunarangs so// skya ngan 'jigs
phyir blo zab spyod// gang ga khyiman rgyud 'ad yod// bradang bklag dang mchod pa dang// ramagrachad zhugs 'byed la// bkra shis tshering dpal 'byor bsgyur// bcom ldan 'dus kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal pa dang// byang chub sems dpa'i sams dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dang// rig pa'i lha mo dang// khro bo du ma dang// nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang// lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za
bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'irgyud kyi rgyal po bad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las// sbyor
ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis ba'o/// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'irgyud kyi rgyal po pod+ma dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//

dgu@#// pa'i'abyung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab pad+ma rgyas pa'i kha che'i yul bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por pan+titachen po so ma shrI b+hab zhes bya ba dang/ bod kyi le tsab/
kyur dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha drod yaMnAm ma hA yAn sA tu 1 bodaskadadu/ 'phags pa

ts+tsha don yod zhags pa'isnying po zhes bya ba theg pa chanapo'i mdo/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das po la ke'i ri'i rtsa mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la dung/ ta ma la dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ mya nganamad pa dang/ a ti mug ta ka lasogA

pamang po dang/ sna tshogs pa'i ranipacha'i sdong pos yang dag par brgyun par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong phrag bco brgyad dang/ byang chub sams dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu
kha dgudang/ gnusagatsang lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i
bu rnams gatsor byas nas chos ston to// da nas byang chub sems dpabasams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sten las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tukazar
nas pusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i snying bo zhes bya ba yod de/ gangasngon bskal pa dgu banu rtsa gcig na'ajig rten rnam par gzigos ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ 'jig rten gyi dbang

po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/ gang yang bdagagi dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi

lha'i bu brgya stong mang po'ang 'dus so// blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod zhags pa' ya shas kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tured do// gzhan grang gi tshe bcom

ldan bangs gzhi'i phyogasagacig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtogs bar bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'itshes phyogs de dbang phyug dang// dbang phyug chen po dang/ tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag
bcuganyis kyis bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbadapa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro// gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig pu de mchod rten du

'gyur ro// sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro// de bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' gapa'i dir don yod zhags
pa'isnying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// gang la cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa// sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par sbyod pa// 'phags
pa lasarapa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de/
gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyuran/ bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid sbyang bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i skya ba 'di'i las yongs su dag cing yongs su zad par
rgyur 'gyur ro// phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro// rims nyanagacig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyani gsumo pa 'am/ nyin bzhi ba 'am/ de'i phyir khrag tu 'khru ba 'am/ tshadapa 'am/ lag pa na ba ma/
rkang pa na ba 'am/ mgo na ba 'am/ hal hul yis btab pa 'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ 'brasasam/ bya'a'abras sam/ g.yan pa 'am/ mtshan
tsha ma rdol ba 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjod byed dam/ khyab par na ba 'am/ gsod pa'i m/ 'ching ba 'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ bsdigs pa 'am mi snyan par brjod pa 'am/ mdor bsdu/
na bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha lam/ sams kyi sdug bsngal lam/ rmilam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems can dad cing lhag
drwa/ par mos pa rnams shin tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang/ rigs bzhi pos ji snyed dubadag la skya dang g.yos kyang mchod par byed/ gang 'di'i don
yod zhags pa'isnying po nyan par byed pa dang/ don 'dzin par byed pa/ 'chang bar byed pa/ klog par byed pa/ 'dri bar byed pa/ 'drir 'jug par byed pa/ kun chub par byed pa/
sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs tazlos par byed/ sngags kyi tshig 'di sams par byed pa dang/ dor bamad
pa[0f10 ]gzugs med pa// rnam par mi rtog pa/ yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/ yun ring du 'byung ba mad pa/ rgyumed pa/ gos pa med pa/ mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba mar pa/ phung po lnga
dung bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis na sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o// de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro// khyed kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro//
jisnyad po tir bro ba byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mang pos bya ste/ phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa 'am/ rjedapon gyis 'jigs pas sam/ gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug
pas sam/ gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugagi byin gyis brlabs su mkhas pas shes par bya'o// de dag rna bug tu de'i sgra grags par 'gyur ro//
bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ gang la la'i skyes bus tsan dananam/ ga puraram/ gur kum mam/ zla tshibs zhing brgyad cing rdzob 'am salabazhebs nan bdag nyid la phyogs na//
tsha/ de la tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gur kum mam/ gla rtsibasnar ba 'am/ brgyad bsadaltar dri 'pho bar m 'gyur ro// yang dri zhim po'ang de nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de lta kho na bdagagi den yod
zhags bawisnying po 'di la'ang gang la la zhig gis 'phya zhing sod pa dang/ ma ltar dzisnyad bdag la smyudang g.yosamachod pa byed pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan bas dmu rgod kyisems can de dag
gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad par 'gyura'o// bdod bas dka' ba'adzin par brjod da phyim la yang ngo// khong dang gang du skyes pa de dang dar tshul khrims dang/ ting 'dzinadang/ shes rab dang/
bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dridang 'bral bar 'gyur// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed/do// gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyibu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/
dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsAnanam/ dgabastanama'am// de las gzhan pa kha cig don yod zhags pa'isnying po chad du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyud la sbyang bar gnas par byas te/
lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying bo tsheg tu mi brjod bar ye ngasasu bzla ba na/ de la bcom ldan 'dasa mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yonanyishutham pa so sor 'dodakhor bya'o/ nyishulo gabazhen/

gang de'i lus kand mi 'byung ba dang/ las kyi dbang gisand byung ba'angamyur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// snyam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dkur bar yang 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar gyur// dbang
po sbubs su nub bdang nor nad par yang 'gyur ro// nor yodakha'ang rkun pos 'khor bar mi nus so// mas 'tshig go/ chus mi 'khyer ro// rgyal po'i yid kyis kyang 'thog par mi nus so//
pa'ilas kyi mtha'argyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus lanu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyurare// rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// la bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po chu'am
thal ba la yongs su bsngags te phyogs dang/ mtshams dang/ stang dang/ 'og gi gzhi la bcong ba byas na bar 'tsho ba thamasaMcad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi
nus// sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// dgra yis 'jigs pa byung ba'ang gyur du zhi bar 'gyurar// mi yis 'jigasaparami 'gyur ro// khyab par napa'i 'jigs pa dang mkha'
'groma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa drag po'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ma dang/ chu dang/ mtshon gyis 'chiba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar
srung ba dang/ skyob ba dang/ sbad par byed par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes pa de deng der byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur// phan
son nyi shu bo 'di dag so sora'adod par bya'o// gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor 'thob sta/ brgyad po gang zhin/ 'chiba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
dge slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par bgyur ro// bde bar tsho'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// mthong ba 'khrul pa med do// lag pa g.yob pa med do// bshang ba med do// gcibamad
do// rlung gi rnam pa med do// shin tulegs par gnasashing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kha'og tu bltas nas tsho'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// 'chiba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu
brjod bar bgyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshesaganyen dang 'bralapar mi 'gyur ro// nyin rezhing dusagasum du lan gsum

bklag btabya'o// chang dang/ shadang/ btsopa dang/ sgog skya dang/ bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du srung bar 'dod pas de rnams spang bar bya'o// don yod zhugs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi

u rnam grangs 'disems can rnams lanus sam mi nus shes par byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o// slob dpon gyis so snyami bya ste/ gang gi phyir phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
yin no// sems can gyi don gyi ched dusangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dba'adege 'dun du'ang 'gyur ro/ sa bzhi byang chub tu brjod lasems dpa' ni thabs te/
ma/de nyib dag gis sems can kyi de nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di rjes su zlos share snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rjod par byed pan 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan
bdang/ bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang/ sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi'ang phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dabang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di dag pa'isems can la khyodakyis bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/ de bzhinagshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo// phyima'i tshaphyema'i dus na
byang chub samasadapa' rnams kyis pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyanami badzums par gyur pas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gson cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
'di bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang mo la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang/ skye dgu'i tshog sachen po la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ rnam par thar

pa'i don spyi phyir yang ngo// naa la d+hA a nu ga tapra tiT+Thita sachabud+d+ha bo d+hisatre namabra te ka bud+d+ha Ar+ya shra ba ka saMb+he glu / a tI ta a nA ga ta pra tuta pany+tse na ma 7samug tAnaM//
na maH samyaka pra ti nanAnaM/ nam shar dwa tipu tAyAm tAm ta ye/ nam Ar mi tre a pra mu ba byAm hAbo d+hisatAsaM g+he b+h+yaH namasu pra ti ta sha la rA dzapra mu khe sarbatathAg ta argyud

b+h+yA samyaka saM bud d+hi sh+tsa b+ha ga bad namasu bats+tsubats+tsha su pra ti b+hAs banar ti kA rarA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/namasi tapi ke Ti tarAdzAya/ tathA ga tA ya/ nam Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ nam/ su pra tiT+Thita ma

kA lA dzAl/ tatshugag tA ya/ nam saman+tar spyod ga tashra klu khro rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ namo bo pa 'u ni tathA ga tA ya/ na mashi khan tathA ga tA ya/ namo dpi b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma kru kuts+tshan dA yu/

blo ta yA ga tAya/ namakan ka mu nA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ namakAkhyapA ya/ tathA ga tAya/ namashAkya mun ya ta thA ga tA a/ ad+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swAhA/ sha me

sham ma hAshamer kAr kAmIsaju sasarba pA paM pra shi mne swAhA/ namasu par kA ta mAm d+ha A ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mas man a wa d+ha sa ba ji saM grwa mashA pa ta dzA ga tA ya/ nam/ a ka tu rgya pa'i yi

b+ha ga tA ya/ na mo ra t+na bra b+hA se bar rAdzAya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ namo a pra ti ha hab+hi 'dzarA dzA ya/ tathA ga tA ya/ na mo ba kAn+ta gA min tathA ga tA ya/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmAya 3namasaM g+hA yA/

gu namo a tItaanA ga ta pra tapaneT+Tho/ sarba bud d+ha bo d+hisatIts+tso/ b+ha ga bad/ tad+ya thA//tipatshan/ mati dz+ha/ ga ti brnyan/ d+hItib+hAn+tan/ pradzA brnyan/ pra ti b+hAn badz+han/ d+hAnAbarnyan/
sAman+d+ha ya bats+tshan/ ba pa na wargyun/ sarba bo d+hi pakarma paN+Nani/ sakal bud+d+ha d+harmapa ri pu ra Niya sAhA/ narat+ta tAAya/ na ma Ar+ya a wa lo kiteshwar a/ pod+hisit+taya/ mahAsam/
ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo mahA lcam prapA ya bo d+hisatwAm/ ma hAs tu ya/ ma hA kAr NikA a/ a byonam tu/ i daAr+ya a ba lo ki tishA ramu khod gIts+tsaM/ a mo g+ha pA kAdzanAmagrod yaM/ tathA

oM mu khaM pa redaM/ ma hatipar Tam r+yaa hami dAnAmA paN+DayaM khyam/ sid rgyun tu lha pa rA/ sarba kAr Ni/ sarba b+hu ma blo ma ma sathat+tanA rak+Sha b+ha ban/ tad+ya thA/ o tsar tsar/ latsa/ tshur tshur/
mar mar/ ma ramar/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hAkA ru Nika/ mar sa ra/ mi yisi'i/ su ru su ro/ tsuphur/ rini'i/ ba'o/ pa'i pa'i/ mo ra/ ma hA pad+ma// kal kal/ kil kig
ku lu lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwA/ bu d+ma bu d+hu/ bob+ha bod+ha/ bo d+hi bod+hi/ bod+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ Naka Na/ ki Ti ki Ni/ kuN tuN/ par m shud+d+hasatwA/ ka ra ka ra/ kir ki'iku'u ku'u/ mahA snum
bsta/ tsal tsa la/ sacul salcal/ btsal yi tshul/ dratsag dra tsal/ a Ta Ta a Ta Ta/ b+har b+har/ b+hi b+hir/ grub sgyur/ tar na/ mi'i/ tur tu'u/ a ma hA kA ru Nika/ ma hA/
shu ba tipi d+har/ d+ha ra d+har/ d+hared+hi'i/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ taratar/ sa rasar/ tsar tsar/ pa ra par/ bar bar/ mar mar/ lar lar/ han han/ bA rA hIti pU hU/ oM kAr drah+pha be 'ad+ha ra/ d+har
ba/ @#// rnyan// d+hi ri d+hi'i/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tar tar/ sa ra sar/ tsar tsar/ yor yor/ bar do ra/ hang har/ rasmi sha ta sa ha sra pra timaN+Ditaha ra/ dzA la dzA la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+has b+ha sa/

ma/ rgyun sbrum/ b+ha ga wan som/ A datu/ ya ma/ b.ruN/ ku ber/ brah+manA/ pA yu/ ag+ha/ d+han da/ dob/ ro 'gan pas phyur tsita tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tshur tshur/ mu ru mu ru/ sgyu ru gyur/ sanata kuA
sbyor ru dra/ bas ba// d+hand/ bA yu/ a ri/ nA ya ka/ banA ya ka pa du ba bi d+ha ba 'ad+har/ d+har d+har/ d+hiri d+hi/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tar tar/ tha ra thar/ g+har gyur/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la
ra// han han/ bar pa ri/ sa rasar/ bar ba ra/ bar dA ya ka/ saman ta a wa lo ki ta/ b.le ka ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma gyur/ hrib+hu ba gshwa ra/ sajagu khas ma a laM kr-i tA/ a ba lo ka shar/

mu gumu tu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mul/ muny+tsamuny+tsa/ rakA ra tshwa sangasaN+NaM/ sarba g+ha ya b+h+ya sh+tsa sajo pa drub byA/ sajopa sa ts+tsha/ sarbagra he ts+tsha/ sarba bya d+hi d+hu/ saja ba ba sarba dzA'i smyaa paM/ pa d+ha ban
rtan taTan/ tan/ rA dza/ taskar/ agaM/ u da ka/ ba/ shaphyu pa'i mo tsaka/ ka NakaN/ kaNishi Ti/ ku tshadu rta/ tsar tsar/ tsir ro/ tshur tshur/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la/ bod+mad+ma tsa tur Ar

sa ta saM pra kAka/ ta pa ta pa/ ]tam tam/ dam dam sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+ha ma d+ham/ ma d+hA kA ruNika/ ma hAta mo an d+ha kA ra bi d+ha man/ ShaT pA ra mi tApa ri pu ra ka ]ma la ma la/ mi li mi

/mu lu tshu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ tha tha bzo/ Ta Ti/ tshu'u cu/ zit+tati/ thu'u wu/ e na ya tsats+tshakr-i ta pa kar/ a hi ma hA kA ru Ni// AmashAr/ ma he ltar/ ma h+pha sgyu tag NasaM b+hany+dza// kar kar
ka ri/ ku ru ku ru/ bar pa ra/ haratar/ pa ra bar/ sar ar/ mar ma ra/ karakar/ ka Ta ka Ta/ kiTaTi/ ku tshu ku shu/ ma Ta baT/ ma hAbashud d+ha biTayanadA sin/ ma hA kA ru Ni kI ta

madz+nyA u pa dItaM/ rat+namu du3/ mA lA d+har/ sajadzAshir/ sIkr-i tadza mu du Ta/ ma hA ad d+hu ta/ ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ rnyan/ samAd+hi/ bamo kA a prakamyu/ ba sus tAsan+tatipa'i pA tsaka/

ma hA kA ru Nika sarba karlu a wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sawadzAdzAn pa ra pU ra ka/ sarbabya d+hi pa rim tsaka/ sarbasatAAsha pa ri pUraka/ sarbas tAs mAshus ka rin ma/ stu te sAhA/ a mo g+hA ya swAhA/ a mo g+ha

pAshA ya swA hA/ a dzitA ya AhA/ a pa rA dzi tA ye swA hA/ a mi tAb+hA ya sa tA/ a mi ta b+hAsu tA ya swA hA/ mA ras bra mdzanAyasatA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yi drwa rA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/

ba dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ bar dA ya swA hA/ bar bra dA yaM swA hA/ a kA lan+d+ri tupa sha nanA ya swA hA/ i dalcam kacha ku run mo sku tes hA/ or khar NahUM phaT swA hA/ oM dza ya hU~M phaTasA hA/

o dra dzi sAhA/ a b+hi dza ya swA hA/ oM b+ha tri lokya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA shA a pra ti ha ta hI/hahUM phaT swA hA/ oM ba su ba ti sA hA/ oM A lo ke swA hA/ o ba bu le ba hu le sAhA/ o A ro lika hIhIhU~M phaT
0@#// sa tA[;]na a ta a na a ta re da ni ya ang du b+ha sum b+ha ga wan kam+matshos she yatakAyaM ku ru sna twA/ o pad+ma hasta ya swA hA/ oM ban+d+had+ham+masaM g+ha ya swA hA/ bklags pas las thamu
cad 'grub pa yin no// dus gsum du bzlasan mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// a ka ru'i gdug spos dang/ thakhabo dang/ chudang/
dungs ka dang/salaphreng gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo// rims nad tham cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o// nad thams cad la mar ram/ mar nag gam/ tshul yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o
lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas kacud cing srung skud kyang bya'o// lton pa 'tshwachus nyams par byed pa 'an/ 'jim bag gam/ chus kyang bya'o// mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba/

la bcing bar bya'o// so'i nad la ka ra wA ra'i so shing gis so// mtshams bcing ba lon tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan te shu rtsa gcig ga par du yongs su bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings
te phyogs bzhir gdab par byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no// thams cad du srung skud dam/ tshu'am/ thal bas bya'o// gza' thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o// mas thams cad
la skud pa dkar pos bya'o// sbrul dang/ srin bu dang/ ba spu byi ba dang/ lhog pa dang/ gru pa 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pa po ling dang ldan pas bya'o// mig gi nad la dri zhim pos nub ma/ rgya

skyogs kyi chub ma/ sbrang rtse 'am/ shing mngar gyis bya'o// rtsod pa'i dus thams cad du rtsod pa da nga mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o// yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tsho la//
yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de chus kyang gtor bar byas na sems can thams cad
srung ba yin no/ ta bar 'tshab thams cad dung yams rnams zhi ba yin no// phyag rgyatsan dan gyi thig 'de la lan nyi rtsa gcig gi bar du lo ngas su bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do//
rtag tu bzlas na khyim srung ba'o// pad+ma sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad kyi srung ba'o// tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang/ 'byung po dang/ rgyus thams cad las srung ba'o// rgyal ba dang/
rnam par rgyal ba dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ na gu la dang/ dri'i na gu li dang/ d+har ni dang/ mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang/ dbang po' lag pa dang/ dri'i pri yang ku dang/ ta ka ra dang/

'khor la dong/ 'khor latshon po dang/ rnam par gnon pa dang/ so ma rA dza dang/ su nad da zhes bya ba sta/ de dag gang yang rung ba la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongs su bzlasanas nior bu lta bur byas
nas mgo bo dang dpung pa la bcing bar bya// byis pa rnams kyi ni mgul du'o// bud med rnams kyi ma doms su bcangasan rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par byed do// g.yang med pa nyams nas bu'ang
ster ro// nor bu 'a di bcangs pas thams cad du bsrung ba byas pa yin no// dug dang mes mi tshugs so// dug gis byas pa'i ng skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nad byung ba' nga mi skyo zhing myur du zhi bar
'gyur ro// gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur go// rlung dang/ sprin dang/ thog na chus rengs par byed do/ ka ra wIra'i lcag mas na las thams cad byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po

mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do// de nas sgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i chogani tshon sna ma lus pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyag ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ ri dgas kyi bags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// lha bzo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas

ltari mo bri bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la ma tog dkar po bkram ste/ drizhim po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o// nye bar spyod pa

ma brgyad dang/ nya par mkho ba drug gi curtsa bzhi dang khrag mad pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug spos bsregasal rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar
gnas pa 'am/ dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o// de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltasan de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro//

ba jigyi du 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ldong ros samamig sman la yongs su bzlas te ma la bskus na de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha'

la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nga' dzi rab tu'athob bo// sgrub ba bo gang 'dod pa de bas khyad dozhes byago/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa de dag dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang/
lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zer bcas pa ba 'dzagi rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba thug
pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// ]rgyagar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzradAng/ bod kyi latsakha ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus gtan la phab pa'o//
rgyugar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA shaphrad yaM ma pAnanAm d+d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhagaso pa'i snyang bo zhas bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sams dpa'i dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa na thos thams cad la phyag
tshal lo// yang dag par song ba dang/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal la// blo gros chen po shar dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sog
ma pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhinagashogs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
pa'i tshal 'go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rdzachen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal la// mthun po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la

phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi kha nas brjod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su sbas pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bgyi ba da ltar bdag gis bshad
bar bgyi'o// bdag gi sngags kyi tshig dang dgos pa thams cad na grub par gyur cig/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig/ tadu/ o tsa la tsan/ ci ra tshuru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/
mi mi'i/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ri si'i/ su ruu ru/ tsurutsur/ ci'i phyiraM/ bar ba'i/ bar pa'i/ ma ri mi ri/ ma hA pad+ma tasta/ ka la ka la/ kil

kili/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shudad+ha sa twA/ bud+d+habud+d+hA/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bo d+hi ri d+ho/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Thaka Na/ kiNiki Ni/ kyi ku rgyu/ pa ra ma shud d+has tA/ kar ka ra/ kiri ki ri/
kur/ ma hA sbrum pa lta/ tsal tsal/ sany+tsa la sa rtsul/ bal ba la/ a Ta Ta eT Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi b+hi'i/ b+hu ru b+hu nu/ tar tar/ tir tir/ tur tur/ a tsahim hA kA ru
Nika/ mahA pa shu pa ti ba ra d+har/ d+ha'i d+har/ d+hi'i/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra tar/ sa ra sar/ tsar tsar/ pa ra pa ra/ bar bar/ ma ra ma ra/ la ral ra/ har har/ hahAhitIhihUM/
o kar bragla bshad+ha ra/ d+harad+har/ d+hi'i/ d+hu ru d+hun/ tar ter/ sa ra sa ra/ tsar tsar/ nor nar/ bar bar/ haratar/ ra smisha ta sa ha sra pra timan+titarAr/ dzA la dzAl/ tapa tapa/
b+has bla sa/ snum b+hAm/ b+ha ga wan som/ nA di tu/ yam/ ba ru Na/ ku ber/ bra ny+tsan+tA/ bA yu/ agi/ d+han da/ dab/ ri ga Naa phyur tsa ta tsar Na/ su ru su ru ]tsu ru tsu ru/
tshurum ru glu du gyur/ sand kumAr/ dudra/ bA sa ba// d+han do/ de yu/ agi/ 'a[R ]/ nA ya ka (ban a ka ba dub bi d+ha bo sho d+har/ d+ha ra hUr/ d+hi'i d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+husu//
ta' tar/ par thar/ g+hor gyur/ ya ra ya ra/ lar lar/ hor ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa'/ ba ra ba ra/ bar dA ya ka/ sa man+ta a wa lo kiMta/ ba lo ki ta/ lo ka shA ra/ mahor
khyi rgyu ba rnahA/ sarba Nas ma a laM kr-i ta a wa lo ki tishAr/ mu tu u su/ mur mu ru/ tshu a u ya/ mulcamu'u/ kI h+phadIg+haM/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang//
khanod pa thamasacad dad/ nad 'go ba thams cad dad/ 'khrug ba thams cad dang/ dug thams cad dang/ nad thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ da nga yin dugasad
btsadeb dang/ rtog pa dang/ slob dang/ rgyal bo dang/ ma dang/ chudang/ dug dang/ mtshon las yongs su thar bar gyur cig/ ka Thaka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ du Na/ tsar tsar/
'i ri/ tshur tshur/ in dri ya/ bal/ bo ts+tsaM ga/ tsa tu raAr+yas pasaM pra kA sha ka/ ta pa ta pa/ tam tam/ da ma dam/ sam sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ d+hamarnyam/ ma hA kAruNika/
mahA tamo/ an d+ha kAr ba d+haman/ ngab pA ra mi tApa'i ra ka/ mal ma 2 mi li mi li/ tshulumul/ Ta Ta Ta/ khaThaT+Ta/ TiTiTi Ti/ 'ubutshu/ [RB]ti TI/ 'u tu'u/ e ne ya tsarma
kr-ita rakar/ ar+yahim hA ka ru Ni ka/ nAyakar/ mahashwa ra/ ma hA shu tag Na saM b+haN+Daka/ kar kar/ ki ri kI/ ku ru kuru/ bar ra/ han han/ bar bar/ sa ra sa ra/ kar/ kaN+Da ka/
ki kiTi/ ku tsu Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta ma hA bi shud d+hag yan ba in mahA kA ru Ni kr-i ta ya u pa ta/ rat+namu ku Ta/ mA lA d+har/ sawa shar si kr-i ta dza'am kuT/ ma hAad b+huta/ ka ma lam

l^akr-ita kar ta la/ rgyun/ samA d+hi/ ba mo ke/ a pra kim/ ba dusatAsan tati/ 'a pa tsaka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarbakarmaa wa ra Na bikod+ha ka/ sarba dzAdzAn pa'i pU raka/ 'jabya d+hi pa ra mo tsa ka/

sa satAka shA ba'i bka/ sa sa tA sa nAshAsan ka ra namo sgyu teswAhA/ amo glu ma swA hA/ a mo g+hA ba shAmasU tA/ adzitI ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ am b+hA a swA hA/ a mi tA b+ha mu tAl sa twA/

Ason pAm donA la A hU/ a b+ha lA ya sU tA/ ab+hal dra rwa pa sAtA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya swA twA/ dza hA bi dza yA ya swA hA/ bar dwaa sa twA/ bar pra dA yA ya swA hA/ akA laI tu pra shamanA yaswAhA/ i dalcem kar+Na

kun mosku te swA hA/ oMr Nar Na hUM paT/ oM dzadzi / oMdzra d+hiswA hA/ oM hU~M dza ya nA tA/oMhi/ hA lekyi pa dza ha a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha tahaha tshulaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i tshog naa mo g+ha pA/
sha'i gzus bum pa la bzlas pas mi bgags kyis bams ba 'aa/badre gdon gyis zin pa 'am/ byad 'og tu chud pa 'am/ bud med sbyor ngan ci bu med pa 'am/ bumi 'tshob la sogs pa la phan par bya ba'i

phyir chog byan/ 'bab chu'i 'gram mam/ shing gcig pa'i rung ngam/'gagyi bzhi mdo bam/ khang stong la sogs pa'i dbus nas da kyil 'khor gyis blang bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba/ sgo bzhil/nub phyogA

sam/byang phyogs kyi sgo btod pa zhig tshon rtsi dkar po sna gcig la des bris te/ dbus su pad bad+madakar po 'dab ma brgyad pa zhig bris la/ gser dngul lam khungs kyi bum pa ma zhum pa mi 'dzag pa a/ kham
pa'i bum pa gsar bso btang ba'i ga bo dang ri mod pa gcig spos chus bkang ste/ rin po chesna lnga/ smanasnalnga/ 'brus rtsa lnga blugasal/ mgul ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma bcad pa dang mo togag
baphrang bas bcings te/ khar shug pa 'am thangashing gamago lcogs bcugal ma tog dang 'bras bus brgyan pa gcig pad+ma'i steng du bzhags la/ gzungs klog pa nyid 'phags pa spyan ras/'phrangs chang 1
gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bsgyur tu/ bum pa 'dzane chen rdzing bu bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsamasal/ chu de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po gcig byung bar bsams te/ pad+ma de la 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yi ge dkar po bsams te/ yi ge de las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu gyur par bsams la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ gang bsgrubs pa'i de ngos
tsho po grub par gyur cigaces gsol ba btab pas/ a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs mang pos bum pa de 'ang lan bcu gsum du tshig gzhan mi sna bar bzlas te/ bum pa debi chus de'i spyi bonas blugs na bgag
dang gdon la sogs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// de la gos dang bcas pa spyi bo nas blugs la/ blugs pa'i tsho'ang gzungs klog pa dang klog par bya ba gnyis kas kyang lus phyi nang gnyis dag pa
dang 'dra gdon las thar par sems rtsa gcig tu sems shing bklag go/ gas gshor ba der nga yugs dor ba'i thabs su bor la/ gos dkar po gsar pa gon te/ spos dang me tog la sog

pas lus brgyan pa de nyid lan cig dkrugs pas lus bsrungs te bkra shis kyang bkrag go/ dkyil 'khor de'i kho ra khor yug tu 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyang so so'i ming smos tesbyan drangs la mchod nas/ las

gang bsgrub ba dekhrub bar gyur cig ces smon lam btabanag/ mchod pa rnam pa lngapa gcig gis mchod la/ 'byung po phala rnams la'ang gtor ma rgyachos sbyin no// bdag bsrung ba dang mtshams gcad pa'i ng a
tshog+ha dpo'i gzungasado nyid kyis tshul bzhin dubyas na/ dbang tshes brgyad la bya ba'i rigs so// chog 'di bgags kyis brlams pa la sogs pa gong du smos pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tum
zad kyi/ mi tham la bal byas na'ang i bgags dad khyad stems kyis mi tshugs/ nad 'go bsam thabs/ dpal chazhing bsams so cog 'grub par 'gyur ro// rin po che sna lnga lo gsar/ byu ru/
mu tago/ dung/ shul/ smanasnul/ sang hi/ byigaM/ gi ri ka'i/ rmis ha sa de ba/ 'bru sna lnga la/ nas so ba/ 'bras so ba/ til/ gro/ mon sran/ ma 'o// 'phags pa
don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///@#// rgyugar skad du/ ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha bA ba ra ma ta kha Ta pU ra pU ra yanAm d+hA ra Ni//
bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thamasacod la phyag
'tshal la// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phag
kha skyon nas gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha pAgam hAdAn pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ya hU~M/ dA na da nA/ ba pa d+ha na/ ba raM / sajusatA u pa
b+ho ga/ takhag ta/ ma hAdAn/ pu dzam glu pra btul/ tar tar/ tAr ya/ ma hA ma NihU~M phaT swAhA/ bden don yod zhags pa'i sbyin pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa'i snying po chen po ste/ gang

gas yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa'i ng byan dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
rdzogs pa 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'apags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal la// oM a mo g+ha shI la dwasaM b+ha ra saM b+har/ b+har phyur/ ma hA shud d+ha sa twa pad+ma bi b+hu peta/ b+hu dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ saman+ta a wa lo ki te hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi
man lag brgyad bzung nas smad bar gnas pa byas te mi skya bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tudrangs pas brjod par byas so// danas don yod zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam

gyis tshod la tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing/ phyogs bcu'i

[74]'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig nyim re re zhing gzungs 'di dran par bya dan/ dan rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dag slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par

gyur pas sbyang bar gnas ba byas te/ gzungs 'ad ba zlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshog/
pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dbab chen po snying rdzachen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha kAn tisarba po d+hisatu
kam Ni/ kA Na[E]NamahAm tIru Na/ saN+Dasatu ba tasal/ ma hA kA ru Nika/ sarba sa tA kA ma NahUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pas sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa dang/ bzod pa chen po
dang/ snying brtse ba dang/ snying rdzachen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa dad/ byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i'i nags dang/ byadang/ ltag 'gro la sogs pa gang dag 'das pa gang
yin pa dang/ gnus pa gang yin pa dang/ skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams lasnying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par bya dan/ de sems can
dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhing/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// namasas
rgyus kyi shi nga yongs su dag pa'i gnas par gyur kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams can la phyag 'tshal//
'do byachub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po snying chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma hA dAr+ya a mo gru ba lo ka ti/ pa ra ba ra/ draDu bAr
ma ba la/ ba la bal/ ma hA bo drug/ ba la/ ba dz+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'ad dus rtag tu dran pa 'am/ yongs su dag cing skye ba'i yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis mod la brtson 'grus kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gang 'di yid la byed pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i sna 'ga' tsam byas pa'i ng dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ myur bar
'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ brtson pa chen por 'gyur ro// dus
gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po snying rjechen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
oMsats+tshatawA ga ta ma a mo g+ha ka ru Na/ rgyun/ sa mA d+hi/ mazla ba mo/// a prakamyu ka/ tshur tshur/ hU~MphaT sa// gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du yid la
ca7/byed pas rtse gcig tu dran par byas nA/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzo gas bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor rab tu thob/
par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs bar 'gyur ro// bzlos brjod byas pa tsam gyis nod la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi d bzhi n
gshogs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalal// byang chub sems dpo' sams dpabachen po snying chen po dang ldan pa 'phas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha ma hA

pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA a ba b+hA sa sa b+hA ba/ sa maM ta sar Na/ bud d+hi pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man budad+hi/ a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA ba lo ki tA tsekA kAm b+hapradzA/ bar du ma Nam hA pradzA/

pad+ma d+hA ra Ni b+hu dzi hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dgo ba'i blo chen po rab tu
'phel bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyunam 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa na
'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byad tsango/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab kyi blo dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug/
dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs
su nyams par ma gyur// byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa rasangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi da bzhin nyid la yang dag par rdzas susong ba zhes bya pa'i da
khon nyidadabab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro//
ma byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so////
btaany+dzashAwarmadang/ la tsab dag slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus tagatan la phab pa'o// lo tsab chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/
tshu/ rgyagar skad du/ da sha b+hU mid+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ sa nu pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang sngags la 'jigs pa
rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba na/ o zhes bya ba don yod zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad gsang sngags pa ga gcig pu 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar
[j]'bum dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// sngon sdig pa bsags pa'i sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung las phyag dan gtor ba nga zhi 'jig/
par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// den thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gnyan yang dgyes par 'gyur
la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do// gsang sngags oM zhes bya badrananas tsho'abos pa nA 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags
yi ge gcig pu'o// o d+hu/ mi ga gtis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gnyis pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan ldan 'dug par 'gyur zhing
mchog thams cad rdzas su sbyin par mdzad do// sngoge pa thams cad kyang rnamapar dag par mdzad do// sngon gyi las ngan gyi rlud kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dngad phyuganor du bzang po'i bu dbang
du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// mi gang gis kyang phyi zhing bar chad byad nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas kyang ra gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob
par 'gyur ro// yi ge gnyis pa'o// o pad+ma/ gsang sngags yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad+ma yas pa'i dkyil
[s/ ]@#// 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdunan bzhugs par 'gyur ro//
'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad do// don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams
ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do// yi ge gsum pa'o// oM pad+ma d+hI/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas n sa bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phag
pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shang dpud pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad l/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par
mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog/ khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thamam cad yongs su dag ste// rang gi ngo bo thams cad shan tungum med par yongs su dag go/ mib 'jig rten ba danas tshe 'phos

nas nga 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// phyir zhinganams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// sa bzhi pa'o/

o pad+ma b+hudze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas n sa lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla na rab tu ston par
[c]mdzad do// sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes pa'i sgra sbyin par bgyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po/

chen pos te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyod pas/ rig sngags 'chang khyod tshab paso nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs bar

bskyod par 'gyur zhing/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bskyod par 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya chen pob rim par phyi

ba 'grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad sbyangs kyis byas pa thams cad gyis shig/ yid la bya ba'i sgrib pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du de dag thams cad shin tugrung par
dgyur ro// sa lnga bgo/ o pad+ma la ki/ gzungs sngags yig drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob sta 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur
stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston par mdzad/ dbus
'byin pa mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan des/ rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de
rig sngags 'chang khyod ga se ngas rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshugashog/ las byas pashin tu yongs su zad cing/ khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo

rnams bcad/ khyod kyis sa sa rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phya/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon rang rigs spyin na khong du chud/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi

snying po dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor na grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams n phya ba'i/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad/

byos shig/ oM pad+ma dzal hUM// mi ga bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba grub par bgyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang ba ngas lus h+phun/

rgyu du'abar bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyis gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'a jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi
gnas rnams snang bar byed cing/ khong dang gang du bod zer chen 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs ba dag bab pa las ma tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyul/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par/
'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba gsar gyi kha dog can dpung pa brkyang skyo/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang
ga spyi bor 'jogatsang legs so zhes bya ba phyin nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po gsang ba brjod kyi chog mchod

ba'i mchog yin// 'don 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gcas ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa pad gtsug tor gyi snying po yod dag pa'o// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyi dkyil 'khor mtha'

ngag rdzogs pa dang/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po' chog zhib mo dang/ don yod zhags pa'i snying bor sprul pa grub kyi/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig
o a mo g+ha ma Nibang/ gzungs kyi snying po yi ge brgyud pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus hAn tu yongos su dag cing dram med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po cham shel ltar

phyi nas shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/de ltarig sngag 'chang lus longs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/byang chums med pasems dpas chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus
yongs su dag par rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bor ston cing/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du gnas pa la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbug 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog
ba mdzad/ legs so zhes byaba'ang spyan par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag babasam pa dga' ba la zhugs so// rig sngags 'chang sangs
bya@#// rgyas kyi zhing mdzad manyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rtan rnam par lta par tshur shog/ der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par ba gyur ro// khyod kyis don yod zhags
pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang 'grub kyis/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i sgrub pa dam ba bya ba thams cad rgyas shig/ oM padolatshon du ru hUM/ gzungs sngags
yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston tsang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par byed/ rig sngags 'chang gi
spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad do// legs so zhes bya ba gang sbyin pa mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po la gsaso legs so// khyod kyis dang zhing sbyangs pa'i las legs par
bsgrub par byas so// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub pa grub ste/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshog zhib mo bsgrub pa dang mdo snga dang
lung dang bcas pa bsgrub pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa'i bstan pa gang yin pa de dag grub pa yin no/ o bablob ba ba ma le hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ga bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas n phyir ma
ldog par gyur nas sa bcul bas par 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi skye dgu dag 'danade bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par
'gyur/ don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar bgyur to/ the tsom mi bya'o// gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'din don yod
zhags pa'i snying bo rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gas sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhon/ gtsang ma gtsang spyi spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/
byams pa'i soms dang snying skyes pa/ bden par smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad ba che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'den bzlas brjod kyi
chog yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to// sa bcu pa'i gzungs phan yon dang rtog pa rdzogs so// ka@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a
mo g+ha pA sha kawAnA dza ba d+hinam/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal bo'i tshog zhes byab/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
de nas byang chub sems dbab sems dang ba chen bo ba phags spyanas gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bdaskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan bdas deng bdag cag gis 'tsho
gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis shing bsngags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i tshig zhib mo zhes

mo bgyi ba 'di nyid skya bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ rjes su brtse bar bgyi babaslad du brjod par bgyi yis gson cug/ oM pad+ma sku ma hAa mo g+ha pA sha ta yA sa ma yA hri da ya/
tsar tsar hU~M/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba ste/ las thams cad kyang bgyid pa 'o// o da bya saM pun ga ba la ga ki kA Ni hU~M/ mkhar gsal gyi rig pa ste/

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas sgra tsam gral sa pas sems can rnams ngan 'gro las thar par 'gyur ro// o pat+ta pU ra ya a mo g+ha ba to sa man+ta pra b+ho sA/ lhung bzed kyi rig pa ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

sku bzlas na bdud rtsi'i rnam par 'gyur zhing/ gang gis thos pa rnams ngan 'gro las thar par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya thal mo lhan cig tu dam du sbyar ba las slar pad+ma'i tshul du bgyisanasamadzub mo nor bu lta bur
lho bgyis te/ gung mo yadi tsam bkug pan yid bzhin gyi nor buchen pob rgyal mtshan gyi rtsi mo'i phyag rgya sta3 lag pa spyi bor gnas nas bzhag pa spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i rig pa 'di lan bdun brjod

do o r+ya d+hA a nu ga ta/ a b+hi Shany+tsatunaM sarba tra ya d+hika pad+ma ma Nisu pad+mo phal mo g+ha sarba ta thA ga tA ya a d+ha tahU~M/ rig pa 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa
0/ thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por yang ba gyur ro// rig sngags thams
cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi gtsobo gcig pu'i gnas sudang bgyur bar the tshom ma mchis so// o pad+moN+DiSha
ba ma le hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gsang sngags kyi snying po yig bcu pa 'di snying sdudang ldan bar bgyis te/ bzlas brjod bgyis na byang chub lasaphyir
ma ldog par 'gyur ba nas/ sa bcu la gnas pa 'bar du 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag gis 'dani de bzhin gshigs bgo zhes rjod par 'gyur la/ ban mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byung
chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te// don yod pa'i zhags pa padu'i gtsug tor drim med pa'i 'khor lasoskyar bar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi snying
po yi ge bcu pa 'di ni yon tan chen po tshad ma mchis pa rnams dang ldan bar rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'daso kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ded bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu

gzungs sngags kyi snying po 'di dgan yi ge 'bru re re tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyuran/ rigs kyi bu gang gis ched du gnyer te/ chos ngal zhing dub par
ba zlas brjod dang/ sgrub pa dang/ tshogs tshul bzhin du rgyas par sgrub pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i bad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po khro
bo'i gzungs sngagasaram bar phyi ba gsang sngagaso chen po Ag bcu pa 'a de 'on cig tsam drananamaM/ bklags sam/ ming tsam yang bzungan/ dus tshigs 'ga' rer dran pa tsam gyis kyang sems
na de'i mtshams med pa'i las byas pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bur gzhol ba tshobaskal par gnas par 'gyur ba'ang las thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thums
cad kyang rab tu zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dgatsang dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrub ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang pAl bar 'gyur/ tsha'aphos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
khams su pad las rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur// ma bas thams cud du skya ba dran par 'gyur/ nam yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bsal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los sgyur
ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i cho
ga'o// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag nardo rdzogasang sngags kyi rtsa ba don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dri ma med
pa gsang ba bde rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsnyan ma ba/ nga la las lan cig tsam yang dran par
yid la khyod tsang/ yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rdzachan po dang/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i blo dang/ dmigA

ba dang ldan pas sems can gang yang rung ba'i rna lung du brjod na sems can de dag ngan songadu skya bar mi 'gyur te/ de na gnasamad do// sems can de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang ldan
par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod nand thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod n rims dang/ 'brum bu dang/ 'bras dang/ lhag pa dang/ ma dpal dang/ g.yan pa
dang/ rkangashudang/ mdzend thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan bzhi brjod na dug dang/ dbyig dug dang/ khyod dang/ gshod byed dang/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
lan lnga brjod na bslab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ brgyad pa dang/ gshags su gyur pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan drug brjod n 'dzags pa thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/
rams thams cad dang/ pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan bdun brjod na dus ma yin par 'chib thams cad dang/ sems can gyi 'tsho ba dang/ yams thams cad rab

byabya da tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjade lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re bzhin du tshig gzhan mi sna bar snying po bad lan bdun dran pas bzlas pa bya'o// lag na rdo rje gang la
la dag 'daltar sdig pa mi dge ba bcurab tu spyod pa/ mtshams mang ba byed pa// dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa/ 'phags pa'i gang zag la rab tu banas pas de dag sems can dmyal bar gzhol bas tsha'i

dus byas khar gyur ba dang/ dge slong gang la la dag rang gi bslab pa'i sdom pa dral ba/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral cing zhag pa dang/ mkhan po dang slob dpon la ma gus shing 'khu ba dang/ dam pa'i chos la

rma 'byin pas tsho'i dus byas par gyur nas/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dag gi don du byes gtsang ma la lan grangs bdun bdun pa zlus nas/ dur khrod du bor ba'i ro dang/ ro bsregs pa'i rus pa
'am/ dur mchad du bcug pa'i'i 'am/ nus pa la bye ma des gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gang nasoms can rnams kyi dus ba gang dag yod pa de dang de ngag tu bye ma des gtor ma thug tu/ de dang der phyi mas
phog pa'i bams can de dag rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dung/ dud 'gro dang/ sha za'i skyo gnas dang/ gnod sbyin gyi skye gnas su skyes par gyur na'ang de dag deb yod la tshe brjes nas thams
cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi'i gnas su rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur zhing/ phyin chad nam yang sems can thams cad dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/
gzugs sngags yi ge bcu pa 'ad nyid gro ga bam/ ras sam/ shog bu la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcugan/ gnas der srog chags rkang gnyis pa dang/ rkang bzhi pa dang/ rkang mangs pa dang/ skong

med pa gang dag nyo bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa tsam gyis de dag gi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing mtho rage su gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ra dgas dang/ bya dang/
wa dang/ khyi dang/ ne'u le dang/ grog sbyar dang/ sbrul dang rus sbal dwang/ lag bgro la sogs pa srog chags phra mo gang dag gis mchod rten de'i grib ma la bgrims pa thams cad kyang grib ma phog

tsam gyis de dag rnams kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing/ de dag thams cad kyang mtho ris kyi 'jig rtan du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// bud dung la sogs pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod
byas nas gnas mthon po'i rtse mo nas dung de dus na sems can gang dag gis dung de'i sgra thos pa'i skyes pa bam/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am ( lha 'am/ yi dgasasam/ dud 'gro'i
skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur zhing/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad nas chos thos te rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sems
can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang/ gang dag bsnyen gnas la rab gnas pa dang/ gang dag skyabs gsum bar gang bzung ba dang/ gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dag ldan pa dang/ gangadag
blabya// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas yang dag par bsdams pa de dag gis sgra de thos na de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
ya rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de brjes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyo bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod
byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'om/ dkor sa 'am/ skya bo'i dbus sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdug par byas na/ gang dag de'i dril bsnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang las
blo dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku longs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos gos la rab tu bdugs nas lus la gyon na gang zag deb/
sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis bag chags kyi dri ma dang/ sar sna dang/ nyon mongs ba'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro//
gos la bdugs te bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag gi gos la rab tu bdugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po dang btsun mor bcas pa rnams dbang du
'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i ngag bdun gyi dbus su zhugs na dge 'dun thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// skya bo' tshogs chen pob nang
[z/ ]du zhugs na nor dang longs spyod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhinganachod gnas chen por 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// tsan dan gyi bdug pa'i tshog go/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa las/ pad+ma'i
gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///de nas khro bo'i rgyal bo cha'i rtog pa rab tu bshad bya ste// don yod rgyal po rmadabyung tshe// kun tu dngos grub thog med ni/ dkyil 'khor

kun tu dbang bskur bas// sdang ba thams cad rab tu bajoms//bdud dang bgeg dpung rnam par 'jig/ gnod spyin srin po gsang ba ba//'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros// bsam pa thams cad pal rdzogs byed// o b+hU kuNi
da A mo g+ha sa ma ye/ a b+ha wA maM sarba bid a mo g+ha a ga a sgyu ma kahU~M/ mi 'a'i mi li sa twA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// de nas sku gzugs kyi chog na dngul la khro bo'i rgyal po sor
bcuganyis kyi tshad tsamashin tu mdzes shing tshad dang ldan pa/ gdong gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ rgyal po 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bor brgyan pa/ zla ba tshes pa mgo la thogs pa/
gdong gsum gyi dang bo khro ba/ g.yas cung zad 'dzum pa/ g.yon gad mo dgod pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po na pad+ma bog ma noral gri 'phyar ba/ g.yon dang po na zhags pa//
