bog man mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rgyal po'i rol stangs kyis 'dug pa/ gcan gzan khro bo'i pags pas smad dkris pa'o// g.yas
phyogs sun lha mo sgrol ma u la thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// g.yon phyogs sun lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal monon bu rin po chathogs pa// rgyan

thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/ 'jig rten dbang phyag gi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa lag na sbos phor thogs shing bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das la khyon du lta ba'o// yang na ri
mor bri bar bya sta chog bzhin no// gzugs brnyan de dag gi drung du bag lci bas byug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing/ gur kum gyis mchod yon bya ste/ ma tog la sogs pas yang

tsho dag par mchod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor deb steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhugs su gsol te/ deb drud du bzlas brjod stong phrag brgyad bya// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rkang
bas phan tshun du 'chag par bgyur ro// gzugs las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ legs so zhes sgra 'byin par 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsam

so cog thams cad dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags ba snyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro kho'i rgyal po rang gi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// dran
pa tsam gyis chod la dngos grub thams can bgrub par 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// bklags pas las thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ grub pa sman

cad ston par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po tshan po ba zhags pa nas bzung ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon chad bsags pa'i bsod nams dung las kyi bsgo skal thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// tsho'i

mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po thob pa dang che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// padranas bzung ste

pa zlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ral grinas bzung ste bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur

ro dartsa gsum nas bzung ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rked pa nas bzung stabazlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon
gyi rabs dran pa 'gyur ro// rgyal bo dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ bdag nyid ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nor rnams lta bar gnas ban 'gyur ro// cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas te khro bo'i rgyal po'i dedu la bcingasan nges par dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur te/ bde la the tsom dang ade gnyis bskyod par mi bya'o// bzlas brjod dang sgrub pa 'di dag bsan ba phags pa spyan ras gzig
dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal bo'i gzugs kyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du byon te/ cad gos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga las phyung
[s]'a// ba rdzogs so//gapan+ti taany+dzashawarmadang/ latsang dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa la ki te shwa ra i ka dasho mu kha nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ ba phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs//
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang du mas yongs su bskor te//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der son gnas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sud po gdong banu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdu gtsug gis gsungs pa lags te/ de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang/ bond
thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang/ sdig pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlolog par bgyi ba dang/ ma zhug
pa rnams dang bar bgyi ba dang/ bgags dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bsrung bar bgyi ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/
yongs su bzung bar bgyis pa dang/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur par bgyis pa dang/ chad pa spangs pa dang/ mtshon chaspangs pa dang/ dug gzhil ba bgyis pa la// gang la la zhig 'gal
bar bgyid bra de ma mchis te/ de na 'jig rtan lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs ba dang bcas pa/ dag sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag gis ma mthong ste/ ston gyi las kyi
rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs lags so// snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po bad ni de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan bangs bdag gis dran lags te/ bskal pa gdu'i klung gi bya ma snyad kyi snga rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma nga rgya'i
spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'dzoms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byang ste/ bdag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las ba da mnog lags te/ thos ma thag tu
phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshAgs pa thams cad mngon du gyur nas/ mi skya bi'i chos la bzod pa 'ang thob ste/ de ltar bdag gi snying po 'di ni gcas lngas brgyad pa lags so// de lta lags
pas rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang ba dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying bo 'dang rjod par bya'o// gzhan med la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o// nang par langs nas bcu
rtsa brgyad btonan/ tshor dA la yon tan bcu longs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bro nadam mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang/ des bsgrams tshal bar no drung 'bru dang/ dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ dgra thams cad lugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang/ rgyal po'i tshogs
pa rnams gsong por smra bar sems par bgyur ba dang/ lus la dug gis mi tshugs pa dang/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang/ rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang/ mtshon chas mi tshugs bar 'gyur
bdang/ chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyud par mi 'gyur ba dang/ zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus khyad par mi 'gyur ba dang/ jus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags so//

kyang gzhan yang yon tan pa zhi yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang/ ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ yang bo ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i
dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang/ 'dunas sha mi bos nas kyang 'jig rtan gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ 'du nas bskal ba gang+gA'i klung

kyi bcu'i bye ma snyad dag gi snga rol gyi sadaches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa man da ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung sta/ den bdag khyim par gyur bas 'di bzung nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyi'i bsil lug

caya/ so// bad pa ga gas snying po 'di bton pas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje ba jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so// gang dag bcang bas bcings pa/
rnams dang/ gang dag bcang ba la thug pa rnams dung/ chab dang/ zhugs dang/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'das gnas pa dang/ bskyab
ba dang/ skyabs dang/ dpung gnyan bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang srani bo sdang ba rnams kyang sang pa 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang snying rdzabasams su brgya sta/ blan med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di nang ltar rdzu 'phrul chab lags so// lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtshams

ma mchis pa lnga po dag kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyuran/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum la dge ba'i rtsa ba
bskyod byar 'gyur ba lags na/ bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci ba tshal te/ bsams pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi// su zhig bdag gi slad du tshos
bcub zhabam bco lnga la sbyang ba bgyis na/ de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyel bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mang ba dzin pa ni don mchis te/ sangs rgyas bya ba phrag 'bum
gyi bas lhag lags so// bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par bgyur/ bond thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur//
ya sgrib pa thams cad dang/ lus dang/ dag dang/ yid kyi rtas par spyod ba thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig chog bzhin du sbyor ba bgyidAn de dag gi sug par
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod soms can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis
soms can thams cad bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod bar nus te/ ngas kyang snying po 'ad ba zung zhing rjes su a ring ba byas kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smyos shig/ de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
snyang po 'ad smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyAn sA gA rwa ba po tsan myu ha rA dzA a/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ardate/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na masatwa b+hA ga ta ardato/ samyakas

bud d+ha byo/ na ma Ar+ya ba la ka shA rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha b+ho'i/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ Ad tipa/ tsale tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsali/
[po/ ]ku su me ku su ma ba ri/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma ba na ya pA tA/ 'di'i tshig ni sgrub mi dgos par las thams cad byed de/ rnams nyin gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang//
nyin bzhi pa dang/ 'byud po dad/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ 'dra dang/ lus srul po dang/ bad byed dang/ lnga ba dang/ 'bras kyi phreng ba dang/ bas bldags la sogs pa dang dug dad/
phol mig dang/ g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags te bsku'o// lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar bgyid do// byas pa gdon gyis zin pa lana'abru mar ro// rnab
bro 'tshal ba la ni ru ma dang 'bru mar ro// sna bro 'tshal ba la ni gru btagason des zhi bar 'gyur ro// bro nad thams cad 'bang sgyur bar bgyi skya bklags pas 'grub bo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug na la bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///#// 'phags pa zhal bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ma'an yod 'od ma'i myu gu'i dkyil ba bor na/ dag srong gi dge 'dun
chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcudang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni gtsobor gyur to// gzhan
@# yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan ma tshad med pa stod dang/ lha dang/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/
lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto ba phye chen po dang/ grul bum dang/ sha za dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po dag gis yongs su
bskor nas mchod cing rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar bus te/ gsang sngags brjod pa la chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug drang srong rig sngags 'chang bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyispyan sngar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la mgo bos phyag byas te g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cazigs gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la rig sbrags
kyi snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba mthun bod ldan pas nags rgyas bya ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa mchis te/ deng bdag gis sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyi ba dang
bro nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang/ bkra ma shis pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang/ rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dgag pa dang/ dus ma lags par 'achi
ba0 ba thams cad bzlog ba dang/ ngan sems can rnams gdul zhing dang ba thob par bgyi ba dad mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dag bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang khon dang bcas pa rnams 'dun bar
bgyi ba dang/ bdud dang gdon bgegs rnams zhi bar bgyi ba dang/ sems kyi ston pa rnams mngon par bsgrob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'jig
rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dag sbyong dang bram zer bcas lo la sogs pa gang gis kyang rig sngags 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang/ 'du len
pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang yi gar bris nas stsal bar bgyid pa de dag la bgags baspyod pa dang bdud kyi bar chad dang/ mtshon cha dang/ dbyig pa dang/
dug dang/ byad stems kyis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so// bdag gis rig sngags 'ad gnas pa'i phyogs su rang yang rung nye'ang rung ste// ji tsam du mtshams bkum
pa las 'das nas gnod pa bgyid du mchib ma mthong lags te/ sdig pa'i las nges par rnam par smin par gyur pa na ma gtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das des dngos po bad ngos
par de lta bu la gas par rig par bgyis nas mngon par yid ches pas blang bar bgyi'o// rnam par rtog pa ni mi bgyi/ de ltar bgyis na gdon bgags thams cad thag ring du spong bas lta bar
mchi zhing glags rnyed par ma 'gyur lags so// rig sngags kyisId po ba de nas ngs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bsngags pa brjod cing/ mtshungs par rjes su
thugs ra ngas bar mdzad pa lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ bskal pa

gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad kyi sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad brgyab spyan thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gtsug tor yon tanarab tu rgyas bab 'od zer
gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba la jig rten du byung sta/ bdag de'i tshodrang srong du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de las rig sngags 'di mnos lags so// rig sngags 'di 'thob pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar gyur/ mi skya ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i ng thob par gyur pas// rig sngags 'dimathu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so// de lta bas na yongs su dung ba dang ldan
pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa dag gis rig sngags 'dra'in pa dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don par 'tshal na gus pas gams rtsa gcig tu dran pas bcangs
te rtag par nang par langs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la phan yon rnam pa bdu 'thob par 'gyur lags so//
00 btsugang zhe na/ rtag par lus la dro nad ma mchis pa ma 'gyur ba dang/ rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung par 'gyur ba dang/ nor dang/ rin po tshe dang/
gos dang/ zas bas pa ma mchis pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ dgra thams cad thul zhing 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ a rabs btsun pa rnams kyis bkur zhing gsong
por smra bar 'gyur ba dang dug dang 'dre gdon gyis ma tshugs shing gnod pa bgyid bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ mtshon cha dang dbyig pa thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par ma 'gyur ba dang/ chab kyis
bgum pa'i dus 'gyid par ma 'gyur ba dang/ zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa'i dus brgyad bar mi 'gyur ba drag lags so// gzhan yang
yon tan gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshosangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang/ rnams kyang ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ ya nga ba ma sangs/
pas 'dus pa'i dus bgyud par mi 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde pa can du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ 'danas bskul

pa gda'i klung datsu'o bya ma snyad dug gi snga rol dag ga yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas man da ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung lta
[7 ]// de'i tshe bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas de la rig sngags 'damanos lags te// rig sngags 'ad thob ma thag tu bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsIl lags
so/ rig sngags 'di klog pa dang 'dzin pa dag gis gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'a ya shes kyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi sgo
thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag btson ra dam por chud pa dang/ mtshon char stsal ba dang/ 'gum la sdug pa dang/ chab dang/ zhugs dang/ rlung dang/ chom rkun
dud/ dug dang/ byang snyams dang/ mi dang/ mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bgags thams cad las yongs su skyob par bgyid pa lags so/bdag ni 'di'i dbang
gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang/ skyabs dang/ yongs su skyob pa dang/ yongs su srung ba dang/ dbugs 'byin pa dang/ gling drang/ khang khyim du gyur pa lags so// rig sngags
'dab mthus gnod sbyin dang srin po marungs pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bsngazhing yongs su bzung nas sngar byams pa'i sems dang snying rdzab sems bsnyad du sa' nas da derjes la bu
nam ma chis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di'i gzi byin chen po' mthudang ldan pas gang la la zhig gis lan cig tsam
pha5bzlas brjod bgyis na'ang rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci'atshal lags/ gang dag sangs rgyas
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las dag ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig sngags 'di thos par 'gyur lags na/ lan ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang [. ]ji skang bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta
smos kyang ci'atshal lags/ gang la la khrag gis gdugs mtshan du rig sngags bde klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ 'dzin par bgyid na bdag gis de drag gi smonab tsamachis pa yid bzhin du
bgrub par bgyid lags so// gang la la zhig gas zla ba phyad cing tshes bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga la sbyang bar bgyis te/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/
sams rtse gcig tu bdag rjes su dran par bgyis nas rig sngags bad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyal bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdagan rig sngags 'di
dbang gis ming btsun zhing thos par dka' bar gyur lags te/ gang la la zhig gas sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i mtshan nas brjod cing yid la bsams pa dang/ gzhan yang 'ga' zhig
(gas skad cig tsam du bsam pa thag pa nas bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par gyur na/ de nyid kyi yon tan mnyam shing mtshungs lags so// bdag gi ming nas brjod pa de dag thams cad
[p ]@#/ kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur/ bond thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur/ lus dang/
ngagadang/ yid kyis nongs pa zhu byang bar 'gyur na/ bdag gas bstan pa'i rig sngags bad len pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don pa dang/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos
kyang ci'atshal lags te/ gang zag de dganA bran ma mchis pa ba byang chub lag mthil na mchis pa bzhin du khong du chud cade legs par 'gyur bar rig par bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ byung chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi du khyod kyis sems can thams cad la de lta bu'i byams pa dang snying rje'i
bsam pa bskyod nas rage sngags chen po 'di rnam par phye ste bstan pa yin pas/ khyod thags bda'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi sdug bsngal dang/ sgrib pa dang/ bgegs dang//
bajigs pa dang/ lus dang/ dag dang/ yid kyi ltos pa las yongs su skyob pa bur par byas nus sems can thams cad blon mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rnam par 'jog pa/
yin te/ rigs kyi bu nga' nga rjesasu yi rang nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongs su gzung gi/ khyod kyis sbos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug stan las la ngas te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa 'a btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rig sngags 'ad 'don pa gang
lags pa des 'di skad du/dkon mchogagasum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshags pa ma shes rgya mtsho rnam pa snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dzugs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug thugs rdzachen po dang ldan pa la gus pas phyag 'tshal te// zhes brjod par bgyi lags so/ tad+ya thu/ oM d+ha ra d+ha na/ d+hi ri d+hi'o/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ aban+d+he/ rtsolatsale/ pra tsa le pra tsa
lo/ ku su me ku su ma ba ra/ a la ma li/ tsa tA tsati/ dzA la ma dwapar ya shud d+ha tA sa tA/ ma hA kA ru Nika ya sA tA/ bcom ldan 'das bden rtsa ba'i rig sngagasalags te/ gang la la zhag
gas rjes su dran zhing bzlas brjod bgyis na/ gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du ba phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
kha phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang ba so mas dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal
la/ tad+ya thu/ hahahaha/ i li mi li/ tsal po li/ khi li hil swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na che ba dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshalan
sngar khrusabagyis te/ de'i rjes la sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab pa lus la gtor bar byas nus bsang bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btang ste gzod bgo bar bgyi lags
so// dkon mchog gsum la se bar phyag 'tshal la// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshag
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rjechan po
dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal la// tad+ya thA/ blun rgyu ru/ ha ta haha sa tA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na be ga spos dang mar me la gdab pa'i sngags legs te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pog
spos bsregs te mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshesngar sngags 'dasi pog sos la lanabadun btab ste gdod pasreg par bgyi'o// mar me sbyar bar ba tshal na yang sngar sngags bajis 'bru mar la lan bdun btab ste
gdod mar me sbar bar bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag
'tsha' la// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dbab sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ sa ri si ni/ d+har d+hi'i/ sa'i d+hi ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma tog dang/ byug spos dang/ 'phreng ba la gdab
pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas me tog dang/ byug spos dang/ 'phreng ba dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshesngar sngags 'dis me tog la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la gtor b
bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis byug pos la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la byug par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis 'phrang ba la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la brgyan par bgyi wa so//
dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus bar phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang
ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal la/ tad+ya thA/ sa tes te/ sa tes ti/ su d+hu su ngu su tA/ bcom ldan 'das 'ad ni sangs rgyas la mchod cing dbul pa'i zhal zas la gdab
pa'i sngags la sa te/gang la la zhag zhal zas dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu la sogs pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshesngar sngags 'dasi lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btab nas de'i rjes la gdod
mchod pa bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal la// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po 'a pags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
thugs chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal la// ta y+Yo/ ma si tus/ gu ru gu ru/ tsar tsar/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdan yam shang la gdab pa'i sngags
lags te/ gal te la 'a zhig gong du bstan pa'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis bgyi ba mchis te/ sngar sngags 'dis me tog yag pa'i shing la lan gcig gdab par bgyi'o// zhugs 'bud par 'tshale na
lags shag tu me tog sha ta'i shing blangs nas dum bu sum cur gtubs te zho dang/ mar dang sbrang rtsib nang du sbangs nas zhag lon par bgyis te/ gdugs re dum bu re re blangs nas sngags lan re
btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor bar pa// de dag thams cad pas par bsags lags nas de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci mchis pa brgya 'gas so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
baphags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal la/ tad+ya thA/
A li mi la/ ba lo to li/ cel hil sa wA/ bcom ldan 'das 'dan mtshams dbu ma pa'i sngags la gas te// mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngar sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btapasdu
phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// yang na yungs kar ram thol pa gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gter na sams kyis nyirang jitsam bkum pa mtshams su gyuranas
yongs su srung bar bgyur lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag
'tshal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phags pa spyan
tsha bya@#// nas gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad [. ]ba ba ba ti/ te ba ti'i/ ci/ brtswa bats+tso/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/

Ar+ya ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ sa b+hus b+ha sa d+ha ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag slar rang ga se nas su mtshapar bskul ba'i sngags lags n bgyi ba tsa na chis pa bgyis lags nas/ bdag slar rang gi
gnag su mchibar bskul ba'i tshe sngags 'dis chab 'a lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor na bdag slar mchab r 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di ni dengos
grub mkhon du ma gyur lags kyis kyang las su bgyi ba rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pas sems rtse gci'i tubazlos brjod bgyis na smon pa rnams kyang mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so// gang zhig
smyos nang gdugasar lan re ldad pa 'am/ gdugs gnyis shang lan re ldang ba lan/ gdugs gsum zhing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs bzhi kwing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdon 'byung pos bgyi pa ban
mkha' 'gro mas bgyis pa bam/ sha zas bgyis pa 'am/ lus srul pos bgyis pa 'an/ smyo byed kyis bgyis pa 'am/ brjod byed kyis bgyis pa bam/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs/
kyis bgyis pabad rung ste/ nad pa de dag la sngags bas lan brgyad btaban 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gal tesgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags lan re bzla zhing rer mdud

de brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas nad pa'i mgul pa bam dmud pa la btags na khan ma tho ba 'asgrib pa zhu byang zhang blond kyang sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te skangs pa dang/ 'bras kyi 'phrang ba dang
shu ba dang/ phol mig dang/ rma'adzags pa dang/ g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur tam/ ral gri dang/ mda' dang/ mdung la sogs pa phog ste smyos par gyur
tam sbrul dang/ sdig pa dang/ rtsangs pa dang/ bung ba dang/ gdug pa la sogs pas zin par gyur na sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas te btaban sos par 'gyur lags so// gal taslab pa lce ba
zhig lagason dogs ser po'i 'jim pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bro batshal ba'i dmigs su phyugs na sel bar 'gyur lags so// gal te rlung nad na ba 'am/ phyogs gcig pa langs par
gyur tam/ rna ba 'on pa bas/ sna 'tshubs pa bam/ rlung gis zin pa'i nad la sogs pas bro 'tshal bar gyur na sems rtse gcig tusngags 'ad bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa de dag la lan brgya rtsa
brgyad sngags kyis btaban nad sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te sgrub pa lci ba zhig lags n 'bru mar dang/ chab mar dang/ gro dang/ ru rta rnams bskol te sngags lan bdun btab nas lus
la bskus sam/ rna ba dang snar blugs sam/ batshal du stsalan brond sos par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang bro nad gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur nasems rtse gcig tu sngagu
'di gdab par bgyi 'o// angan bdag nyid kyis bzlos brjod bgyis nA 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gal te rig sngags 'di sgrub par 'tshalan sngar sra zhing ba phan skyon
ma mchis pa'i tsan dan dkar po las/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs srid dumatho byad dang dmachis pa/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pas pad+ma' brgyan dang ral
ba thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas bgrang ba phrang thogs nang 'jigs pa ma mchis pa stsol ba'i lag tu ston pa gdong gdugacig par bgyis te/ mdun gyi gdong gsum ni byams pa
ba dang nying ljadang bcas pa ba mtshan dang ldan par bgyi/ g.yon phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni khro bo'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni mche ba dkar po gyen du 'phyang ba'i mtshan
can du brgyago/ sgrub kyi gdong gcig ni khro gtum che zhing rab tu dgod pa'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// spyi bo'i gdong gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal gyi gzugs can du bgyi'o// mgo rgyan de dag thams
cad kyin ng na sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i lus zhi'og la la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par bgyi'o// gzugs bgyis
lags nas smon pa rnams grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ sbyor ba bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par blangs te/ zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas/
tsa 0 tshes brgyad kyi bar du gdugs gcig la dus gsum du sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ yang na dbag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyi'o// deman chad gnas dben pa gcig tu stan gtsangan
bting ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga gzugs brgyus pa kha nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la nyams kyis ci 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dug gis mchod nas/ a ka
ru dang du ru ka 'ba' zhig bsag par bgyi'o// rnal 'byor pa de 'bru phya dang 'o ma'i zas 'tshal nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gdugs gsum pa la thug pa'i bar bgyi'o/ da slan chad
mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa'od snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o/ rnal 'byor pa de zas dkar gsum po 'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ 'bras chan 'bab zhig 'tshal
bar bgyi'o// byang chub kyi shing blangs nas gzugs de'i nadun du zhugs sngar bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang shang de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyud du gtubs te du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du blangs nas
gdugs gcig la dum bu gcig blangs te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas par gyur na/ de'i tshes chen po rnams rab tu g.yo bar gyur la/ de'i
dbang gis sku gzugs bgyis pa de'ang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi kha nas sgra phyung nas rnal 'byor pa de la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod
ka@#// kyis bad ltas nan tan brtson 'grub kyis gyon pa rnams yongs su gnyer bas bdag gis khyod kyi smon pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// khyod bdun nam mkha' la 'phur te bgro ba ma/

ang na khyod rgyu zhing 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa'i m/yang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po byed par gyur pa 'am/yang na bdag dzalta ba bzhin du dang dbang thogs bamed pa nyidadu bya'o/zhes bsngags pa brjod pa
wa bgyur lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba dkar po mar gyi ngo tshas bcolnga la byang chub soms dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gdod bcugacigapa desangs rgyas kyiring bsrel dang

tsha bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tu sbyang bar bgyis nas su mna' ma tog stong rtsa

brgyud blangs te/ ma rtog re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste/ thams cad bas pAb bar du bgyis na/ deb tshagazugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gdong gicog pa'i kha nas 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur la/
pa'i dbang gis sachen po'ang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur bas/rnal 'byor pas de'i tshord gsams bde bar bzhag na// skrag cing 'jigs pa ma spyad par dag sngags dang smon cing sgrub pa gang lags pa 'ba'
zhig rjes su dran par bgyis te 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug blugs 'don po dang ldan pa la gus par phyaga'atshalal/// bdaganam

bas/ zhig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur nas sems can thams cad kyisaMms kyi ko pa rnams lo ngas su skong bar 'gyur zhes brjod par gyur na/ de'i tsho na ras gzigs dbang phyug gas ji
ltar smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur te/ ston pa rnams stsol ba 'tsholha dang klu la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar chad dang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la
gza' zhugs pa'i tshochab mar srang gcig blangs te dngul gyi snod kyi nang du stsol nas gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du bzhag ste// stags bdas bzlas brjod bgyis na zla ba'ang snga mkho bzhin du skyab+ha
'og tu gyur pas// de nas blangs te 'tshalan lus kyi blo nad rnams ma 'byang ba gang yang ma mchis lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas ldong ros dang ga'iwang chamanyam par bgyis te/ gzug
bgyis pa de'i mdun du bzha gnas sngags 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab kyis sgrus nas dpral ba la thig le bgyis na don rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sngar bstan pa bzhin du
chab don po dang sbyar te khrus bgyis na bgegs thams cad dang bro nad ma rungs pa thams cad bsal zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gal te pa la gyi dmag tshogs kyis ga yul 'phrog
par gyuran/ spyan ci mar rtsi'i 'bras bu gcig blangs te sngags 'di'i na brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas gzugs bgyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong la byugs te/ dgra'i phyogs su kha bstan na
dgra'i dmag tshogs rnams drung du ma bar ma 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gal te yul phyogs su mi dang phyugs la rami nad byung bar gyur na/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i
ska mdun du shing shug pa'i zhugs dus la// gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te/ dum bu gcig blangs nas yungs 'bru'i char gyis bsus te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas
zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dmar po la thag mdud pa bdun mdud de/ mdud pa lanar mdud cing sngags lan re bzlas nas nang gi gong
na mchis pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la brtags na rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ti/ rims nad zhi nas sngags zug kyang 'grol bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang glo bur du mkha' 'grom

dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin te bro 'tshal bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa gcig mdung de sngags lanar bzlos 'dra mdud par ra mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rjadang ldan
pa'i gdong ga spyi bo la btags nas zhagalan tuslar krol lanang pa'i mgul du btag san bond sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te las kyi sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags tesos par ma gyur na sngags smug de
ga blangs nas ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snga ma'i gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur ba 'ges so//

[ ]gzhan yang gang 'a la zhig bro nad rgyun rangs kyis btab nas sdug bsngal zhing sos bar ma gyur tam/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa khyim du zhugs par gyur na/ dun lug thang 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyud blangs
te gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du ba thum bu re re blangs la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud
lta burtsa gcig mdud do sngags lamA ro bzla 'dimadud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi ba la btags nas zhag lon te/ slar bkrol nas nad pa mgul
du btags na bro nad rnams 'byed zhing gdon bgegs ma rungs pa rnams 'byor zhing 'gyas par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang mi mdza' ba dag gis glags btsal bar gyur tam/ 'thab cing rtsod
pa dang byed stams kyis gnod pa bgyis par gyur na/ ma tog dang pog spos la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing ba na ya ka'i gzugs kyi mdun du zhugs su ra nas 'un ti

'bras bu 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyud blangs rtasngags 'a na re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang skudapa dkar po la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzlas shang mdud

pa re re mdud nos gzugs de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong ga spyi bo la btags nas zhag bzhi lon te/ slar bkrolo la skud pa de blangs te mi mdza' ba de'i ming nas brjod de mdud pa re re nas se so tha
dad pa smras nas ri de la'ang sngags lan re bzlas shad re re nas gtugs te thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyisan/ ma mdza' ba de dug cebagyi'o 'tshal mi 'byon cing rang nyid skyabs
chasu mchi bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig legs ba'i dngos po 'grub par 'tshal natshonapalnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzla shing mdud pa
re'i mdud nas gzhan mang gzugs gyis ba mdun du sngags lan bdun gyis btab ste/ byams pa dang snying rdzudang ljon pa'i gdong gi spyi la btags nas zhag lon taslar bkrol nas bdag nyid
lus la btagasan smon pa rnams yid bzhin du bgrub par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig sgrib bab bgags dang ldan pas legs bab dngos po rnams phal cher smyon pa yodi
bzhin du bgrub par ma gyur tan/ bkameshas ba'i dngos po dag dus dus su rgyunam chad pa ni 'gyuran sbos chab kyis gzugs bgyis pa de bkru bar bgyig/ gzhan yang chang la lan brgya
rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste ban ya ka'i gzugs bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste rang nyid kyi lus la gtor na/ sgrib pa dang bgegs
thams cad zhu byang nas smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smos pa
[-- ]dang / 'khor mang po thams cad kyis mthun par skyes bu chen po legs so legs so// sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir 'bag stags 'di snus pas bdag cag kyang rjes su yi rang
nang yongs su badzan par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas ba khor mang po thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
phyag byas te rgyas par gyur te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so////zhu chen gyi la tshub bcom ldan 'dus kyi de
lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpa las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa///#// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa'i zla 'dzanan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na rin po chab kod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs shing/ bcom ldan 'das rin po cha'i srang
ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ khri de ni rin po che'i mchog sna tshogs du mas smras pa/ rin po chesna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis yongs su brtsigs pa/ lha'i ba dan sbyangs pa ste/ de'i
(tshesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangaga'i wang nyid la bzhugs nas 'dasAm dgongs te/ das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dzin pa gzungs bshad gol ma tshig snyam du
bdagongs so// byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sar
dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dang ba sman gyi rgyul bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sde dang/ byang chub sems dpa ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang da

byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang/ byang chub sems dang ba pad+ma'i spyanadang/ byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po tsho'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a
dpal gyi snying po dang/ byang chub sems dbang rdo rje'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
ba bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang/ dra bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po rnam
thos kyi sras sha stag dang thabs cig go/ 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa gang dag gis nyan thos dag gis sa bcu spyad par gyur pa// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dang/
sha tshangs pa dung la sogs pa tshas rig kyi lhag bu du ma dang/ lcab bu sa 'tshol sogs pa lha'i bu du ma dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'phags skyes po la sogs pa du ma dang/ lha dang klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ ma dang/ rtsim yin pa du ma dang/ klu'i rgyal po nus pa'i dra ba la sogs pa klu
rgyal po dum dang/ lhab bu mo gzhon nu'i mig la sogs pa 'dod pan spyod pa'i lha du ma dang/ dgon pa'i lha du ma dang yang thabs cig go/ 'babachudad/ mtshodang/ mtsho branadang/ khron po da
chu klung dung/ chu klung chen po dang/ sman dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gol ba dang/ nags tshal dang/ nags khrod dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ khyim dang/ chudang/ ma dang/
rdul gyi ra dang/ sa dang/ rgyal po'i khab dang/ mchod rten dang/ dra gtsang khang la sogs pa na gnas ba'i lha thams cad kyang don 'dus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor chen po debanangan bdug pas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon pa shes pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis mtshor bar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams khyab par snang bar byas shing/
stong gsum gyi stongachon po'i be jig rtan gyi khams 'di'i nga gsar gyi kha dog lta bur byas so// lha dang/ klu thams cad dang/ lha mchog thams cad kyi khang pa dag kyang khrol zhes g.yos so//
muklung dang/ chu klung chen po dang/ rtsamatsho chen po dang/ ra khor yug dang/ ri bo ra ra ba dang/ rdul gyir dung/ ra nag po thams cad kyashin tu g.yos so// zla ba dang
nyim dang/ rin po che dang/ ma dang/ gzod dang/ rgyu skar gyi bod kyang mog por byas so// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos ltas rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ ltas
ny+nyA ston ma mthong ba la the tshom skyes te/ de stan las langs te thal mo sbyar te/ rdzu 'phrul ma don par shes pa'i ltas 'dasus bgyis zhes/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas kun
pa/ deng su byang chub yang dag mthar thug gyug/ thams cud ldan pa'i 'od zer su yis btang// 'jig rten mgon po tsan+d+rid phyogs bsus/ zhung rnams gsar mchog 'dra bar gnas par gyur//
stod gsum 'di na cislad tshig pa 'ad// dong 'di'i su zhig gsani dbang thob lags// sngon chad ma byung rdzu 'phrul stobs sus bstan// su yis bdar ni zhing rnams g.yos par bgyis/ bslad lha dad
klu rnams khyim 'khrugs shing// gzhal med khang mchog dag kyang rab 'gul dang// thams cad skrag nos rnam par blta zhing mchis// ci yi slad du stongagasum g.yos pa dang// gang gis
lha 'khor 'dir the tshom skyes gyur deb// rgyudang su yi mthalags ma 'tshal na// ci spyod rdzu 'phrul mngon shes bstan bgyis pa// rgyal ba byams pa'i thugs can bka' stsal gsol// bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ kyarags kyi bu khyod la sogs pa 'di ltar shes par gyis shig/ da ltar 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub
soms dpa la soms dpa' chen po mang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ 'di ni bskal pa du ma nas 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin pa/ byams pa dang/ snying dang/

thabs la mkhas pa bsgoms bas sgrub pa dang gzungos kyi sgo rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa ste/ soms can gyi khams thams cad la zhi ba dang bde bar 'dod pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po 'di phyung ngo//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de nas de'i tsho byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug stan las langs te gos legs par bgos nas/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar tab de skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag losnyade sngon po'i rang bzhin gyis gsang sngags snying ltar bzung ba mchis te/ sems
can gyi khams thams cad kyis phan pa dang bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang/ sdig pa'i las thams cad dang/ las rtsa ba rnams 'byung bar bgyi ba dang/ bgegs dang mi khom pa rnams yongs su
spang bar bgyi ba dang/ dge ba'i phyogs bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang/ dge ba rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang gnod pa tham
[rg]@#/ cad yo gsu spang ba dang/ mchog thams cad myur du lo sa su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dad brjod par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du blugs rjes
bdag la sa par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyarags kyi bu shin tu snying rdzachen po dang ldan pa khyod/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/
gsang sngags gang brjod par bdod pa 'di da ltar legs par khyod kyi dus la bab kyis myur du sbos shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang rjes
su thugs rang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa ba bgos pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa
bskal pa du ma 'das par gyur pan/ 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od khror skyong gi rgyal po dag par gnas gzhis bgyi ba byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i bla ma des bdagal
byams pas dran par bgyi ba dang/ sems can thams cad la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du thugs rjechen pos snying lta bu 'di yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ ma ba zlog pa dang/ rgyas par bshad de/ gsur
gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag bdag gi mgo la bzha gnas 'di skad ces/ kyarigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma 'ongs pab sdig can gyi dus kyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ sId
lta bu'i gsang sngags 'di cung zhig ces bka' stsal to// bdag nadab tshathog ma nyid du sa dang bo la gnas par gyur to// bde lan bdag gis gsang sngags bdu len cig thos pas de nyid nu gnas
bzhin dus brgyad pa nges par rtogs par gyur to// bdag gis debatshosnying la bab pa dang/ dgab ba dad/ yadi bde ba thob nas/ de nyid du bdag gis smon lam 'di skad btab ste/ 'di ltar
bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ zhi bar bgyid nus par 'gyur zhe na/ da nges par bdag gi lus la lag pa stongadang mig stong yongs su rdzogs par
gyur cig ces bgyis pa dang/ smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu de nyidan mchas bzhun du/ lag pa stong dang mig stong yongs su rdzogs bar gyur to// phyogs btsudag nus chen po'i nga rnam pa drug tu
g.yos so// phyogs bcunas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bod zar song stong bdag gi steng du bkyanas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtan gyi khams mtha' yas pa snang bar gyur to// da slan

tshad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das du ma 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang dang yang du rad cing thos te/ de dag gispyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di bzung ngo// yang dga' ba dang mgu ba du ma skyes par gyur

to// bdag gis bskal pa du mar skye ba dang 'che ba nges par rtogs par phyi mo thob par gyur to// de slan chad rtag tu brjod cing bzung ste bskyed par ma gyur to// gzungs sngags bad bzung ba'i don bdag gang
dad gad du skyes par rtag tusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar bdalas rdzus te skyes nas/ ma'i mngal du skye ba bzung bar ma gyur to// dge slong dag/ dge slong ma 'am/
tha dge bsnyenanam/ dag bsama'am/ khyab 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig brjod cing ba dzin par 'tshal ba des/ sems can thams cad la byams ba ba bsam pa dang/ snying rje'i bsam pa sems bskyed/
par bgyi 'o// thog mar bdag brjod bab 'og tu smon lam chen po 'di skad gdab par bgyi// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rjecan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges pa shes rab chen po'i
mang thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyad rdzacan khyod la phyag 'tshal la// bdag des par sems can yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
sI'i rjecan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges bar myur du thabs la mkhasal thob bar gyur cig/ btsunapa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rjecan khyod la phyag 'tshal la// bdag nges par shes rab
kyi grur zhugs par gyur cig/ btsun ba spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug snying rjecan khyod la phyag 'tshal la// bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgyan las rgal bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyanas

la gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag tshul khrims kyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing 'am myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rjechen po na

khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pab re'i 'dzeg par gyur cig btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du

'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig tu gyur cig/ gang gi tshabadag ral gri'i ri de la
'gro ban/ ral gri'i ri de bsnyel zhu zhug bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshabadag ma ma mur gyi nang du 'gro ban/ ma ma mur de rang mdu par gyur cig/ gang gi tshabadag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du bgro ban//
sems can dmyal ba rnams rad bzhin gyis stongs bar gyur cig/ gang gatsho bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba na/ yi dgas rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshobadag ldum yin gyi gnas
su 'gro ba na/ de dag gi sams rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshabadag dud 'gro rnams su 'gro ban/ de dag ma shas chen po'i de kho na dang thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar smon lam do skad btang nas/
dad pa dang ldan zhing sams kyis dran par bgyis la bdag gi ming brjod par bgyi'o// de nas yang bdag gi slob dpon 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rtag du dran par bgyi'o// de nas

gsang sngags 'di brjod par rigs so// nub gcig la 'di lan lnga brjod na bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang 'chab bsags pa'i las lci ba stong phrag brgyadang/ bya ba stong phrag bcu bsags pa rnams spong bar 'gyur/
byang bar 'gyur ro// yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha dang ma thams cad snying rdzachan po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di ji lta ba

bzhin du brjod cing 'dzinan/ gal te de dag 'gum pab dus kyi tsho phyogs bcunas sangasaN+yas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i stod du phyag skyong zhing 'di skad cas khyod gang du skya bar 'dod/ gang dang gang
ya du smon lam ba rtab pa der song zhig ces gsung ngo// mang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'am mi ma lags pa gang zhig sang rdzachen po'i rang bzhin gyi
gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin la/ de gal te ngan song gsum du lhung bar gyur na/ bdag bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar ma gyur cig/
glu gang zhig gis gsang sngags bad brjod cad bzung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba ma thob na bdag sangs rgyas su ma rgyun cu/ yang su zhig gse gsang
sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ des ting nge 'dzani dang so so yang dag par rig pa du mam thob na bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig/ yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing ba zung la/ tshe gcig

ka gis yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs na/ 'di snying rdzachen po ba ring bzhin gyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par mi 'gyur ro// su sdug pa bgying pa dang ma dang nga ni ma gtogs so//
budamed suzhag dud med kyi chos la yid byung nas// bdag skyes par gyur cig ces 'tshal te// sAng rdzun po'i rid bzhan gyi gzus sngags bag la da brjod cing bzung la/ de bud med kyi lus
las ma rgyun cung/ skyes pa b.lus ma thob na bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te 'dzin par bgyid ces de la the tshom cung zad tsam zhig bgyis na/ gdonam
'tshal khang yid la bsamo ba bzhin dum 'grub bo// gang gis dge 'dun gyi bza' ba dang/ blug kha dang/ non dang/ 'khru phrogasasam/ chud gsan to/ gang la sangs rgyas stong
gas bshags su gnang bas bshags su lags kyang bshags par ma gyural/ gal te gsang sngags 'di brjod kyis/ sdig pa thams cad babyang bar ma gyur na/ de'islad dudag bdun/
gyi rdzas su spyad pa dang/ chud gsanApa dang/ phrogs pa des phyogs bcu dgon rab tubyung ba thams cad kyi so so'i mdun du mchasal bshagasan/ de'i mda'i bshags par 'gyur ro// gal
tade ltar gsang sngags 'di brjod par gyur na/ phyogs bcu dag tu gtogs pa'i rab tu byung ba'i 'dus pa rnams de la dbang yin nozhas su zhing las thams cad kyang bshags bar chud par 'gyur ro//
sdig pa bcu po thams cad dang/ mtshams med pa lnga dang/ 'phags pa ba gang bgo rnams lami snyan pa brjod pa dang/ dam ba tshos slong ba dang/ dus lags par zas 'tshal ba dang/
bslab pa nyams pa dang/ mchod rtan dang/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang/ dag bdun gyi rdzas chud gzon pa dang/ tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas pa sems can
rnams kyi tshul khrims khams par bgyid pa dang/ de la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba thams cad dang sdug pa thams cad ma lus par 'dud par 'gyur ro// ga nga the tshom 'a tshal ba ni
ma gtogs te/ dge sdig pa chung du dang/ las yang ba'ang 'byang bar mi 'gyur na/ shan tu lci ba lta smos kyang ci'atshal sdige pa'i las shin tulci ba rnams byang bar ma gyur tu lags kyang/
yun 'di mo zhigenas nigs rgyas kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro// yang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal tami 'am ma me las ba zhig gis snying chen po'i

rang bzhin gyi snying bo bad brjod par gyuran/ de skye ba bzang bo rnam pa bco lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ gshis ngan du ba gam pa rnam pa bco lngani myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bcol gang zha na/ dang po ni ging
phyogs pas sug bsnga la tu 'gum par mi 'gyur ba/ gnyis pa ni gang chad pa ngan pas bo cad bab tshor bas nyam thag pa'i gnod pa dag gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// gsum pan degra dang/
khon mchis po dang/ phyir zlog pa rnams kyi dug dang/ mtshon gyis 'gum par ma bsgyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang dmag gi g.yul 'gyed par zhugs pa'i tsho'agum par mi 'gyur ba'o/ lu pa ste
gang stag dang spyang ki la sogs pa gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis gsud pas 'gum par ma 'gyur ba'o/ drug pa ni gang sbrul gdug pa dang/ rtsangs pa dang/ srog chags utsalang gas khrin nas
'gum par mi 'gyur go// bdun pa ni gang ma dang chus 'gum par ma 'gyur ba'o// brgyad pa ni gang dug tu 'gyur 'tshal bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// dgu pa ni gangasrog chags snatshogs kyi dug gis
bgum par mi 'gyur khago// bcu ba na gang rmongs pa dang/ rnam par g.yangs pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ nyal bas 'gum par ma 'gyur ba'o// bcu gcig pa ni gangar dang/ shing dang/ g.yang
sa dang/ god pa las ltung bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// kharuganyis pa ni gang khyad kyis 'gum par mi 'gyur bgo/ bcugasum pa ni gang dag lha g.yon can rnams dang/ 'byung po sngagi pa can/
rnams kyis blugs bltasaM ngas 'gum par 'gyur ba'o// bcudazhi pa nu gang gsor mi rung ba'i nad rnams kyis btab nas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcolnga pan gang bdag la bdag gsod pas 'gun

bar mi 'gyur bsto/ gang snying rjechen po boreng bzhin can tu/ gongasnying rje chen po ba ring bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de la/ gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye

ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga'ang thob par 'gyur to/ dang bon gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du chos dngamathun pa'i rgyal po rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa na gong 'phags pa'i yul du skye ba spab/
[s g]bya// par 'gyur bgo/ gsum pa na dus bzang po dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang rtag tudag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// lnga pa ni gang
ma dbang po mthu ba dag tshang ba'i lus kha thob par 'gyur bgo/ drug pa na se du dge ba'i phyogs la sams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba go/ bdun pa nag nga tshul khrims nyams par mi 'gyur bgo/
brgyad pa ni gang ga nyan bshes rnams dang bran g.yog rnams kyis bye brag shos shimathun par 'gyur ba'o// dgu pa na gang yo byad dang/ nor dang/ zas rtag turgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur go/
ba bcu pa nang gzhan gyis go ba yang bsko pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gcig pan ga nga nor dang yo byad ma 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni gang
sgyur bsams pa soms dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gsum pa nigang lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba'o// bcu bzhi pa ni gung sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams mthong zhang chos kyang thob par 'gyur ba'o// bco lnga pa nageng chos thos pa dang don thub mo shes rab kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ste/ gang la la zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sung po 'di

brjod cig 'dzin pa des go nga du sosapa ba sku b rnam pa bco lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du lha dngame thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod cing bcang bar bgyi ste/ de la skyo ba bskyod par mi
bgyi'i/ tade nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gcigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad sbas nas// de'i rjes la 'khor mang po'i debus de nyid du 'dus ste/ lag pa gnyis mnyam par thal/
mo sbyar nas/ sems can thams cad la snying rjecano pob saMms bskyed de/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas/ rgyas pa chen po'i kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po'i
rang bzhin gyi snying bo gzungs sngags chen po gzhi mdzes pa 'dasmras so// namo rat+na tra yA ya/ namaAr+ya a ba lo ka shA rA ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ ma hAsatwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ so
sawaban d+hanats+tshadan kAr ya/ sarba pA pas mu drotso'aNakar yo sarbapa d+ha brag mnaka rA ya/ saa d+hupa dra ba be negan ka rAya/ sa/b+ha nyid yatur Naka rA ya/ ta spyan ma/tA A do
Ar+ya a ba lo ki tar/ tab nal kanAm pa ra ma srid pa/ mA ba ya khyim/ sarbaarmasAd+hAnaM/ shu b+hatso tanaM/ sarmas tAnaM/ pA pa mArgab ked+ha na/ tad+ya thA/ a
ba lo ki te/ laka ma ti/ lokag te/ e bya hi ma hA bo d+hi satwaM/ he bo d+hi satwA/ hi ma hA bo d+hasetA/ badzra ya bo d+hi satwA ham hA ka ru Nig/ sgyur da yo/ o rtsehi//
Ar+ya ba le ka teshwarAya/ par mam tItseti muNi ka/ ku ru ku ru karma sA d+haya sA d+ha ya bi bu nad hidahi/ mae raM ga maM ga maM ba hog ma/ sid d+ha yo gi shwa ra/ du dubum pItItsin+taM
d+han d+har d+hur blo shwa radzul ba me la mA/ Ar+ya a ba 'aka teshwarA//nyarab+ha hA/ pa kr-it+ta dzani dza mu ku zla/ a laM kr-i ta/ sha rAne lam phralasmra ba ba'irtswa/ ma hA sad d+hashud
d+hartar/ bal ba la/ ma la ma la ma dam la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hAdzul/ kA/ kaMwapa sha/ nanItan/ ha pad+ma ha// dza a karA/ nashAtsa rashwa ra/ kaulas dra kr-i ta yadzopa
to/ a ce has tA ni/ ma tAb ma hA par bsu ba/ khri ru ra hanishAr/ nArA ya Naru pa/ ba la ge ga tshur/ honA li ka a h+phatamahA/ hal ha la/ phyi ni ta lo ka sgyu
rA ga gi ban shan/ dwa khab kha ban/ mo ta satwegan/ nani'i o klu Na hu lu hu lu/ murtsamu cu/ nubu mu hu/ halA ha la/ ma hA pad+man d+hu/ sa ra sa ra/ si'i si ri/ su rusu'u/
sh+tsa bu rlabats+tsha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha yAmI/ tab nA lan+d+ha ]e hi/ ba ma[] ta/ ma hA sing ha mu kha/ dus has/ muny+tsamu cu/ ma tA NA nits+tshing na/ e myahi b+ho b+ho ma/ sid d+ha yo gi/
shwar/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ btsan sA lha ya/ sA d+hu a/ ba hrun sa smaran+taM/ h+pha b+ha ga bA na/ la ka ba lo ka sto/ ta thA ga tA/ da ha da hi ma der shanaM/ kA mas+ya dganaM/ pra sA d+ha ya ma

tshan/ sna tA/ sid d+hAyaM sa tA/ mahAsadi d+hA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha yo gAbI ra ye swA hA/ nA la kits+tshaya sa// bar ha mu khA ya swA hA/ saM hAmu tra ya gtA/ ma hApa nar so dAmu takha ya swA hA/ badzra ha/

07 ya swA hA/ ma hA padzraha ma sa twA/ sIr d+ha bad+d+he d+harA a swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha bdu d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma hAyA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+mahas yasAhA/ kr-isatsakr-i ta mdzopa bA trA ya swA hA/ ma hA

mul mi ku d+ha ra ya sA/ tsakA u d+harA ya sAhU~M/ shang kha shildan ni dan ka rA ya swA hU~M/ bo d+han ka rA ya swA hA/ bAmany+tsi taskyek+kAdakr-it+tadzanA ya swA hU bA ma hA sa twA g+hatsarmaN sAnA
ya swA hA/ la kashwarAya sAhA/ ma hA kishar ya satwA/ sarba sid d+hashar ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rakAmI sA twe/ kunurak+Sha udzAnaMswA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te// na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti
shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatwAl/ ma hAsan+d+hA ya/ ma hAkA ru Ni kA ya/ srid ts+tshan tum/ man pa dA na ste hA/ o / lo kyi bi dza a/ a mo g+ha pA sha/ a pra ti ha tahAT+Thiha hU~M phaT swAhA/
danas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po 'di brjod nasas chen po ni rnam pa drug tugayos so// rab tu g.yos so// 'og la la// bur bur ro//
bar snang las rin po chadang 'dres pa'i tog gi chara mngon par bob bo/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rjes su tshugs rang ngo// bdud dang gzhan mu stags thams cad
sngangs skrag ste spu zing zhes byed par gyur to// 'khor de thams cad na so sor 'khras bu thob ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir bong ba dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba dang/ dgra/
bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig nas dang po thob bo// khacig nas gnyis pa// khams gnas gsum pa/ kha dag na so bzhi pa/ kha cig nas lnga pa nas/ kha
gnas bcu pa ba bar du thob go gang dag gso bla na med pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sa mas can de dag kyang dpag tu med do// de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/
zla gos legs par bgos nas/ gus pa bsams kyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpang ba 'gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'daskad ces smras so// kyakyi las mdzad pa chen po legaso
legs so/ khadag kyang 'das pa'i dus nA de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu mad pa dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyurati/ bdag gis de dag tu chos kyi rnam grangs dang gzungs
sgo snatshogs dag kyang thob na/ bdag gis snying rje chen po'i ring bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi thogs pa med pa chen bo 'do'i thos kyis dbyang chub sems dpa'i las mdzad pa chen po de'i
lug dang/ rtags dang/ la dang/ mtshan nyid nges bas bshad du gsol/ bdag la sogs pa 'khor chen bo 'di thos par 'tshal zhing smos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa/
tsha spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas/ tshangs pa chen po la 'daskad ces smras so// kye khyod kyis thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir dri ba bad byas so/ de
nyon cig dang mdor cung zad cig kho bos khyod la bshad par byago/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gas 'di skad ces smas go// bad ni snying rjen po'i sems so// 'dinamtshungs shing/
mnyam pa bsamasago/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi sams go/ bdan chags shing zhan pa med pa 'gams go/ bad na stong pa nyid du lta bsamagaso/ 'di ni de ste stang du byas shing gus pa bsams
so/ bdani ma ba khrug gas shing skyon med pa bsams so// 'din bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ soms de dag la sogs pa ni snying po 'di'i mtshan nyid dang tshul yin pa de lta shes par bya'o//
de ltar tshul 'dis spyad par bya// bsgom par bya'o// tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so bdag la sogs pa ba khor 'das snying bo 'di'i tshul dang mtshan nyid deng sun tshad ma 'tshal to//
da slan tshad ni glang po/ mi bskyod par bgyi go/ byang chub gnas dpa ba 'phags pa spyan ras kha zigs dbang phyug gas de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
la la zhig snying bo bde brjod pado 'dzinan/ des byang chub kyi sams chen po yangs pa bskyod pago de ltar yi dam bcas nas/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus gzung bar bya'o//
zas dus dus su bza' ba dang tshul khrims dang ldan par bya'o/ sems can thams cad la ma nyam pa bsams bskyed par bya rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngal sa 'dibarjod par bya'o
gtsangamar gnas pas gnas par bya'o// khrus legs par bya go/ gos gtsang ma bgos lalha'i ba dan dang/ mar me dang/ bdug pa dang/ mi tog dang/
ma gtor ma'asogs bas mchod par bya'o// sams rtsa gcig dug zung bar bya'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o zhes de skad ces brjod par bya// de ltar gzung bar bya'o//
bon tang byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang/ lha'i dang srong dum 'ang der bgro sta/ dbang byed cing dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyur// kho bos kyang
de'i tshe mig stongagaso sgrub pa po da la blta go log pa stong gis snga zhing bzung ngo// 'jig rten gyi mdo dang/ yi ge rnams len cing 'dzin kyang nus par 'gyur re// gan
mu stegs can thams cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang/ rig byed rnams kyang nges bar rtogs par 'gyur ro// gang lazhag gsang sngags 'di brjod tsang 'dzin pas ni bajig rten
na 'byung pos khyung bab nad kyi rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gangasu la byung yang rung sos par byed do// des zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i nad gang yang rgyud do// yang 'byung po 'am lha rnams la'ang
rgol ba na yod par 'gyur ro// bdud kyang phan par byed do// gzhan mu stags can rnams kyi phyogs lkugs par byed do// gal te'i gnas ba bam/ dgon pa na gnas pa gang zhige kha

ton byed dam/ bsam gtan byed pa la de na gnas pa sdig pa byed pa dang/ bgegs byed pa dang/ gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang brgyud po sna tshogs gang dag sems 'khrug par byed na/ snying po 'di lan cig brjod pa/

de dag thams cad bcings par bcug go/ gang la la zhag tshul 'di bzhin du lags nga sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzanin/ srog chags thams cad la snying rdzabaskyed par bya'o// da'i tshe kho bos kyang lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po

thams cad dad gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rdzol rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs la bsrung ba bgyis te phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// mig gi 'bras bu dung rang gi srog shulta babazhin du srung bar 'gyur go/

tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa// gang zhig dad pas snying po 'ad// kha yis rtag tu 'dzin pa yi// sgrub pa po la dus kun tu// soms la srung ba gyis shig ces// khung bumig dang de bzhin du// stobs

bo che dang lu gu rgyud// lha yi dam pa lcags kyu dang// lagan rdo rdzong sgo bar bya// kho bo'i snying po mchog 'di ni// dad pa sa rtag tu badzan pa yi// sgrub pa sdig dang bral ba la// khyad cag srungs shig skyod+ma

shig ces// dbang phyug tshe dang khyab 'jug dad/ nor gyi bu dang drag po dang// kum ba ri dang sar skya dang// de dag rnams la kho bo bsko// gang zhig rtag tu dod pa yis// gsang sngags 'di tshod 'dzin byed pa/ 3
rig sngags 'chang la mi g.yel bar// som la shig srung ba gyis shig ces// lnga rtson dang ni de da mchog dang tsan da la dang sum la// ba ngag la dang ga shirdzal// kho bos lung gis bsgo bar
khya/ gang zhig rtag tudad pa las/ kho bo'i gsang sngags 'da'adzan cing/ rtag brjod ragi sngags 'chang ba la// bsam pa gyis shige srung ba gyis// sgrub pa po la srungs shig cas/
bden pa po dang so brtsigs dang/ mdzod bdag dang lha mo dpal// de dag kun la kho bos khasgo// gang zhig dad pas kho bo yi gsang sngags bad ni rtag 'dzin cing// rjod byadaragi sngags 'chang ba
zla la/ soms shig srung ba gyis shagicas// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang// lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang// sum cu gsum dbang ro langs dang// mang po 'dzin la kho bos bsgo// kho bo'i rogi sngagrwa
'di'i chang la//soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// gnas lnga dwagan gnas pa gi/ gtsang ma ba gnas kyi lha rnams dwang yang dag shes dang nor bu bzang// de dag rnams la kho bos ngaso// gang zhig
dad pas kho bo la// gsang sngags 'dzin rtog 'dzin cing// rjod byed gi sngags 'chang ba la// soms ge srung ba gyis shig ces/ rgyal po rnam thos bu dang ni/ 'brog ma bu dang bcas pa dang// yul

khor srung dang skyod byed dang// mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes dang/ skem byed gzhon nur gyur pa dang// de dag rnams la kho bos ngasgo// gang zhig rtag tu dang ba yis// rtag tugasang sngags 'di 'dzin cing//

rjod byed rig sngags 'chad ba ga/ soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// dga' bo nyi dga' krug nyiso dang// stobs kyi lha dang rgya mtshodang// drang srong nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo/

mas/ gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags bad 'dzin cing// rjod byed dgi sngags 'chang ba la// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// klu yi rgyal po ut+pal dang// 'phrul chen lto 'phye che/
rnams dang/ lhamanam ci dri za dang// de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags bad 'dzin cing/ rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shing srung

ba gyis shig cas// chudang ma yi lha rnams dang// sha khra rnams dang glog dang sprin// chu la bum dag dang mkha' lding dang// de dag kun la kho bos bgo/ khade bar byed pa'i lha g.yog bakhor lnga brgya dang

ldan pa khyed thams cad dang// de bzhin du lha dang klu'i rgyal bo rnams dad/ lha dang/ lhab bu mo la sogs pa dang/ gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa rnams kyang gsange sngochen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di/
bzlas brjod byed pa de'i phyo bzhin du 'brongs shige/ gnod pa so'acig/ srung ba gyis shig/ gal te sngags pa mi zhig ri dang nagasatshal stong pa thames po dgan gcig pur grogs med par lana'ang /

bde bar byed pa'i lha de dga' da ga'i khor dang bcas te srung bar byed do/ yams kyi nad rnams dang bgags rnams kyang zhi bar byed do// gal tor khrod du lam stor bar gyur na gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod/

byas pa dang/ bdo bar byed pa'i lha dang klu ba rgyal po de dag mi gzugs kyis de la lam ston par byadad// gal te ra dang/ nags dang/ dgon par son la chudang ma med par gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis do
la bsrung ba'i phyir chudang ma ston bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khas yang dag sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa

la gzhigatsang bsal ba'i phyir zhi bar byed pa'i tshogs su da cad pa 'di dag smras so// gal ta'abrog dang ra khrod rnams shig tu// stag dang sbyang ni gcan gzan khro rnams dang// sbrul dang rtsangs pa dang mkha'

ny+nyo bgron// khong yang 'di thos sngags masdus ldogog par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho klung mtsho sngon 'thum gnas na// dug ldan sprul dang sbrul 'dzin byed pa dang// chu srin gnod sbyin tsho+udang ku ba ra// gongs na bang
gsang sngags thos na bajigs par 'gyur// dmag dpung chen po 'digyi dang 'khrab pa dang// nor 'phrog chom rkun rnams dang brodan yang// dad pas rtsa gcig sams dang byams pa yis// gsang sngags bzlosan

zla/ sdig byed ma nus ldogo/ rgyal po'i khrims can gorar bcug pa dang/ btson rar lcags dngashing sgrog bcugan yong// dad pas gsang sngags bden brjod byas na// rgyal po bdag nyid de la dga' bar 'gyur///
gal te dug can nags sam khyim gangan// dugacan zas yod der ni son gyur la// dad dang ldan pas bsang sngags mchog brjod na// dug rnams thams cad rgyu gnas bdud rtsir 'gyur// gal te bud med dus
lu thogs mi phyin cing// g.yon can bgegs kyis na bar byed na yang// dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na// 'byung bo 'bros shing bde bar btsa'i bar 'gyur// 'byung po sdang dang gnodasams

tsam/ klu rnams kyis// gsad pa'i tshod du gnod pa byas na yang// dad pas gsang sngags bden brjod byas na// tshe yang 'pha la zhing nad rnams la byang bar 'gyur// gal te 'byung pos skrangs nad byas pa dang
bas bldagasand dar bu la rnag khrag can// dad pas rtag tugasang sngags 'di bzlasan/ gsang sngags mchu yis thams cad mad par 'gyur// sems can r ba cusdang bas gosad pa'i phyi'i ]/lag yodang
sgyum las rnams byed na yang// dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjodon// de drung skyam ba mkhan po 'gro ma 'gyur// dam pa'i chos nyamasasems can rtog pa can/ 'dod chags bcings shing lagabs
rmongs rnams dang// zhimtshan ni drang ma ni rtogaldan zhing// khyo dang lhan cig mi dga' bud med rnams// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pas 'byanyinus te// 'dod chagasAmazhesems n drang por

'gyur ga la tesnying bo bde yi mthu brjod na// khaskal pa gcig gi me thab ma phyin mi 'gyur// tshon skud sna lnga pa la snying bo 'di'i nalnga bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyashu rtsa gcig bzlas la mguladu

gdagaso/ snying po bden sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dbu btsurtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o/ gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed l/ yongs

chu rdzogs par bgyur ba de dag la/ myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyi'i gsungs bgo/ gang dag sangs rgyas nyid du sems bskyod pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems skyod par byed do// gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bum
byug klob pa de dag kyad myur du thob par byed do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi nusan/ lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa jisnyad ba khod pa de dag kyang sam

snyad par byed do/ gang speg pa chen po'i chos la dbang bo rnams dad pa ma rnyed pa de dam/kyang thob par byed do// nang bo bde ba methus thog bachen po la thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phal bar 'gyur ro// gal te
wA gos pa zhig yodan 'ang kho bo bsnying rje dang thabs la mkhas pas thams cad grub go/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan/mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba d gnas ems can gang

dag gnas pa rnams kyang/gal te snying po 'di blos na sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems dpa ba gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa de dag kyangs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas gyi byang chub kyi

bar du'athob par 'gyug// skyes bu chen bo bamitshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//zhakyi sdig pa can gyi a mas dgang dag gse snying po 'du len rig
la// drang po ems kyi bsam pas mos shing sbom por 'gyun go/ dag sbyong ga'i dras bu pazhibang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhAn du 'thob go gal te de ltar bzod naslong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten kyi

pa khams kyi khyo ning na yod pa'i ro ding rdodang/ rtsig pa dang/ ri rab dang/ ri khor yug rnams kyang g.yo zhing rdul phra rang bzhin du phyi mar 'gyur ro// rgyam tshogon po bzhi'o khol zhing 'thon par 'gyur ro// ga

te de dang de'i ba gam yo na sems can gang dag la bod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// gang gi tshabad la dam par gyur pa dedag gse nyame nyi shu rtsa gcig tutshul

khrims dang ldan par byas la/ snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na yAde la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma mad pa'i tha ma'i me thab len gyi sdig pa las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar

'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gsangs rgyas dung/byang chub sems dpa' dang/ brgya byinedang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rtan skyongab dang/ lhab drung srong dang/ gru'i rgyal po thamA

cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mi 'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags bdakha ton byed pa de 'babau'am rgya mtsho khrus byas na/ den srog chags gang dag 'khod pa la des rag pa de dag gi las shAn tu lci ba thams

cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ tshophyome lasangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par pad+ma las rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur/mngal nas skya ba dang/ drod gsher las skye ba dang/ sgo nga las skye ba'i skya ba 'dzani par mi 'gyur na/ gang bde

'dzan pa dang/ rjod pa dang/ klog pa lta ci smos/ 'don tsari rjod pa lta'ang ci smos/ rlung gang gas rig sngags 'chang la rig pa ba rlung des sems can gang la la reg par gyur pa'i las lce le h+phams cad 'byang bar

bgyur ro// yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur go// rtag tusangs rgyas myong bar rgya bar 'gyur go/ bad ltar yang shes par bya ste/ gang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba'i bisod nams kyi rnam par smin pa na bsam gyis mi
@#// khyab 'i dpag tu med do// gang la la snying po 'di ba rjod pa de kho nas tshig dag ba ba na deg pa ci byung yang rung ste/ de thams cad bdud dang/ gzhan mu stegs can dang/ srung ba'i lha dang//

klu dang/ 'byung bo rnams kyis yongs sudag pa'i chos su thob par bgyur ro// su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la thams cad sangs rgyas su 'du shes skyed cing gus par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

sh+tsa gang+ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i khyim snyad kyi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs shing yongs su bzung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes bar khyago/ de nas ngs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyisnyeng bas snang

bar 'gyur bas ( lus 'od zer dang ldan pa shes par byago/ gang snying po 'das sems can rnams yongs su skyob par snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du

shes bar bya'o// gang la ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtanadang snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gangastong pa nyid kyis shas kyis sems can rnams la lta ba da nam mkha'i snying po'o/

mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang la rtag tu lha dag dang lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de ma 'jigs pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyunama'achad pa de gtam sna tshogs kyi mdzod du/

shes par bya'o// gang yams kyi nad rnam gsum dang dus ngan pas chud ma zod pa de rtag tu gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing zlog mi nus pa de'i mo'i

gab mdzod ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa shes par bya'o// gang rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso bar byed pa de sman gyi skyel po' mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba' 'byung ba
danamano par shes par bya sta/ de'i bsod nams kyi bsngags pa ni mtha' yas so// gal te rigs kyi bu mar gyur pa zhig yun ring po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo'ang bde ba 'dod na des thog mar bas
mah+phab dben pa'i gnas btsal bar bya ste/ der 'dug par bya'o/ gtsang mar mtshams legs par gcad par bya'o// gal te chu la bzlos brjod byas sam/ yang na zas sam thug pa rim/ snun nam/

bdug pa laso sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// mthu yod par 'gyur// mtshams bcod nus pa 'gyur ro// rjes su mthun pa'i chos len pa 'am 'dzin nus pa la 'gyur
ro thams cad 'grub par 'gyur go/ de la mtshams gcad pa ba chog ni 'di yin te/ thog mar ral gri lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad par bya'o// yang na chu gtsang ma la//
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ste/ 'dina mtshams so// yang na udus kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor n mtshams bcad par
'gyu/ a ngan ji tsam 'dod pa sams kyis khyan gyis brlab par byago yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan teshurtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mtshams gcad do// yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa la bzlas
dbarjod byas la phyogs bzhi'i brisan brams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// chog bduse lenacinge 'dzin nus par gyur na bdag nyid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sus snying po 'di'i

ma mang thos pa dag bskal pa dumang skyo ba dang bachab bsags pa'i las rtsa ba rnams kyang byang bar 'gyuran/ su'adi rjod cing 'dzan pa lta cesmos/gang zhig 'di rjod cing smra banus pa de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dum
wA la mchod cing bsod nams dang dag bab rtse ba bsags pa yin par rig par bya'o// gal te chog 'das sems can gyi khems sdug bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed nus par gyur na/ma don/ de sngon po

la dang ldan zhinge 'ang po ma thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang des sems can jisnyada mthong bdang/ sems can so so la brjod pa dang/ de la gang dag gis thos pa'i ng
byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur go/ rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang dag ba'amatha'an brjod m nus pas dpag tumad par 'gyurar// gal te lus bsdams shing zas dus su za bar gnasal dag zhing drang po'i
sanas kyis brjod pa nusan/ des de'i tshesems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ched du sngon gyi las rnams bshags par bya'o/ bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags bar bya'o// gal te de ltar goms shang
a rgyun mi 'chad par snying po 'di brjod na/ des tshe'adi la dge sbyongag 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur/ dbang po rnab dang/ blo dang ldan pa dang/ bsam gtan la blo skye bar 'gyur/ sa bcu'i 'bras bu

thob pa la mi da ka'i bar gyuran/ 'jig rten pa ba bsod nams kyi 'i khras khu nung du 'a rdob pa lta casgos/ cadeng 'i dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par ma 'gyur ba med do// daci'i phyi'i zhan/ byang chub sems/

dbab 'phags pa spyan ras ga zigs dbang phyug ga snyade rjechen po dang smon lam chen bo zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu stobs rgya chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/
la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byungal/ ul der gal te rgyal bos chos kyis yul bsrung zhinge rgyatshab dang gtsangamar byan sems can rnams skams las mi gcod do//

nyes par byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o rgyal bo des lus dang sogs kyis brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la/ zhag bdun snying rjechen po ba red bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na/ yul der yam
kyind ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lo tog thams cad kyang dunasum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/ gal te sa ris so sor ngag rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas

ba'i somasaM na rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang/ ma yongs ma dag ba bar gyur pa dang dwagand byung ba dang/ chu dus sum te bab pa dang/ der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por ma 'gro ba dang gal te sde'i pab las de
