snyad byung na rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas te/ gong du khams kyi nad byung ba de legs su bzhan bstan togazhag go/ shane tu dad pas bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang/ zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o// de nas rgyal po des sange po 'ad be rjod pa ba phyi'i nyin zhag bdun du brtson 'jug
chab rtan por gnas par byas na/ sa rase so sor dgu thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur go/ rangarang gi yul la dgag par 'gyur/ sems mjund ra 'gyur/ phan tshun grogs su 'gyur/ mi yongs dang

rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhange legs par byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba spyod par 'gyur go/ lha dang rnams kyang yul grung bar byed de// char yang dus

su 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grung bar 'gyur ro// lul na gnas pa rnams kyang bde ba dang yid bde ba skyo bar 'gyur ro// gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang gnod pa sna tshogs
byung ngam/ bdud dang 'byung po g.yon can gnas pa 'khrugs shing smras 'am/ skur ba 'debasas// gnod pa dag byung ngam/ nang gi mimathun pa chen po bamachung du dag byung na ( deb tshospyanaras gzigs

dbang phyug lag ba stong pa dang mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la/ shin tu dad pas snyang bo 'di'i na stong bzlas brjod byas na/ gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
'kha ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di'i ming cizhes bgyi/ ji ltar blang bar bgyi/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ kun dga' bo sangepo

ca bdeb mang named du yod de gcig na rgyur dam med pa yongs su rdzogs ba zhes bya// de rjen po thogs pamed pa zhes kyi bya'o/ sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob pa zhes kyang bya'o// tsho'aphel bar byed pa
zhes kyang bya'o// ngan 'gro'i len rnams par 'jug ba zhes kyang bya'o/ las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya go/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o// sems kyi rjes su mthun bar

dbang ba zhes kyad bya// sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya ste kun dga' bo de ltar zung zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang snying po drang po bad ston pa'i byed chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab sul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa ba chen po spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/ mdo 'dzin pa zhes kyang phyogo/ 'od zer dang mag dang/ lag pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthun dpag tu med cing bsam gyis ma khyab go/ bad ni khengs ba'i bskal ba dpag tumed pa'i snga logs su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos sbyang ba ba sangs rgyas bcom

ldan bdas zhes byago/ de nasong chen po dang smonalam gyi debang gis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir 'dirje byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su snang ngo// byang chub sems dang 'a rnams dang/ mi mjed
[ng ]kyi bdag po tshangs ba dang/ lha ba dbang po brgyabyan dang/ klu'i 'khor dang/ khyod thams cad kyis de la mchod pa rgyas shage/ de la brnyas par ma byed cig/ lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag

tumachod ba rgyas shig/ mang yang rjod cig dang/ dgaba'i rtsa ba skye zhingesdig pa dum bang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus zhig skye shi bab 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig

b+hU rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'adzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sunor bu dang/ 'bru dang/ rinapo tshe dang mo byad

tshe 'dod pa des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs pa la lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su nad sna tshogs kyis btang ste/ nad med par 'dod nga des don yod pa'i zhag pa thogs pa bal ga nga la bltas te

'dug par byago/ su lta na ba des rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te bsam par bya'o// nu 'byung po rnams dang bgags byed pa'i lha la sogs pa gdul bar 'dod pa des ni ngo tshab de' grag pa'i lag pa
lag pa la bltas te 'dug par byago/ gu 'a dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud 'dul bar 'dod pa des rdo thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas 'dug par bya'o// su dgra tshar gcod par 'dod pa des rdo rjecan gyi ba tun gang
tsha/ thogs pa 'garal pa ltas to 'dug bar byako/ suthams cad du 'dzags bar gyur te bde ba ma thob pa des mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/su mkhe na zhing mthong ba nyams pa/

des na dus ni po cham shol klogs pa 'a 'gapa' bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su tshaba'i nad kyis btang ba dang dug 'thungs pa des nor bu rin po che chu shel thogs pa'i ga pa la blta par bya'o// su bdag po/

dang/ rnyed pa dang/ go 'phang 'dod pa des rin po tsho'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag pa la bsam par bya'o su grogs po sdul bskyar du phrad par 'dod pa des rin po che'i mdal thogs pa'i lag pa la dmas par bya'o/
su lus la nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa des me tog gi so ma thogs pa gi lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ su lus las kyi slob pa'i sdug pa rnams zad par 'dod pa des rdzayab dkar po thogs pa'i
lag pa la blta bar bya'o/ su nye du dang/ gnyon bdang dang/ budang/ chungama rnams dang sems mthun par 'ded pa des ral de bangegs thogs pa'i lag ba la blta bar byago/ su stag dang spyang ka dang/
gcan gzinam rungs pa sbyong bar 'dod pa des phub thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ dgu phyogs thams cad du dbang phyug rnams kyis glags lta ba yongs su spong bar 'dod pa des dag su
thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par byago su khyi budang bumo dang/ bkol bar 'dod pa des sor mo la ra thogs pa'i phyag rgyab rig pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su bsod nams dang dge ba sna

tshogs byed ma nus pa des pad+mad kar po thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya 'o// susangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar bdod pa des bad+ma sngon po thogs pa lig pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'ogo/ su ye shes
nyan/ chen po thob par 'dod pa des ban bo tsho'i mi long thogs pa galag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya go su khyogs bcub sengs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa des pad+mathogs pa ni lag pa la

sa bltas te 'dug par go/ gusa'i ga ga ge ter rnams thob par 'dod pa des ne po che'i zam tog thogs pa lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ surang srong gi 'tshol bar 'dod pa des tshon sna lnga ba sngonethogs pa'i

wA la grwa ba la bltas te 'dug par byago/ sutshangs rab kyi lha banir du skye bar 'dod pa des ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su lha baning du skye bar 'dod pa des ma 'a mdog la dub de da thogs
ba'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su yul gzhan gyi dag phyir phyogs par 'dodapa ngas rin po che'i mdung rtse gsum thogs pa ba legabal bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su lha dag dang/ lha dang/ yongs

su skyong ba thams cad dgug par 'dod pa des dung thogs dbalag bal ba ltas te 'dug par bya'o/ su lha rnams dang ba khyung bo rnams la bsgrub byed par 'dod pa des khri'i zur shing lta bu thogs pa'i 'a ga pa la bltas
rta'adug par bya'o// su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis myur dulung bstan par 'dod pa des bgrang nor bu thogs pa b.lag pa la bltas te 'dug par byago/ su skad snyan

'khu/ nga tshangs pa'i sgra lta bu 'dod pa des rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ (su dogs pa thams cad dag par 'dodapa dang rtse 'dod dang/ mkhas par 'dod pa des phyag rgya/

[58 ]'ani ngo tsha thogs pa ba lag pa la bltas te 'dug par byago/ su lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ rgyal po rnams kyis yo ga su srung bar 'dod pa des lcags kyu thogs ra ba lag pa la bltas te 'dug par byago

su sems can thams cad la khyams pa dang snying rjes khyab par 'dod pa des 'badu gsa'i thogs pa b.lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ sus can thams cad kyis bsta stang bya ba dang dran par 'dod pa des phal mo

gyur ba ba lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ su tshenabs tshe rabs susangs rgyas dang ma bral bar 'dod pa des sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par byago/ su skyo zhing skya ban sas

sa rgyal po'i rtse nas dang khang babs su skye zhing/ ma' ngal du ma skye ba 'dod pa des sprul pa'i gzhal med khang grogs bab lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ su mang du nyan pa dang mang du slob par 'dod pa des

glegs bam thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// chutsho'anganis bzung stes so rgyas nyid kyi bar du yade ma ldog par 'dod pa des 'khor lo thogs pa b.lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// sum 'dzage/
pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam ba bzhase 'gro ba mi pa ba dod pas mchog sbyin pa 'phyig la bltas te 'dug par bya go/ su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams myur du byon te/ phyag gis mge la/
khul cing lung ston par 'dod pa des mgol sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhugs pa la bltas te 'dug par byago/ su 'bru dang 'bras bu la sogs pa btab cing bskyod pa rnams lunasum tshogs par 'gyur bar 'dod
0/rgyu ba des rgun gyi snya ma thogs pa'i lag pa la ba ltas te 'dug par bya'o// de la sogs pa 'dod pa dngos po rnams rnam pa stong du 'ge par bya ste/ mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin// de/

ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis snying bo 'di ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rgyun na 'chad par 'gyur bar dge ba'i sems kyis zung zhig/ long
zhige rgyas par ston cig/ de lta na snyadepo 'di don chen po byad pa yin no// khams gsum n sems can ji snyid 'khod pa ni lus la nad gang dag yod pa de gal te gsang sngags 'dis gso bar byad na/ nad
med par ma 'gyur ba de gang yang med do// snying po 'daseng skal bo la bzlas brjod byas na de la yal ga dang/ matog gis ma dang/ lam dang/ 'bras bu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur na/ sams yod pa'i

sems can bde bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ badril thatshom za bar mi bya'o/ kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i mthu stobs ni brtag par mnyes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bas na yon tan rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin to//

sngon gyi dus dag na dag ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pas na mong yang gos na mthong ba lta ci smos/ khyod la sogs pa'i 'a khor chen po bad dang/ lhadang/ chu dang/ ma rnams kyie snyade po 'di la rjes su yi rang bar/

byakho gang gis zlos la song ba des na d+hA'i klong dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sbyong bar 'gyur ro// su zhig snying po 'ad le the tshom skyod cing yid ma ches

[d ]pa' mo de ni/ yunang bo nas rnyed pa las rab tu nyams nas bsu la ba chen po brgyad sto nga dunganabagro rnams su 'khyab par 'gyur ba dang/ mngon par 'byung pa mi 'thob pa dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas mi mthong

ba dang [0f10 ]chos ma thos pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rnams ma ma thong bar shes par phyago/ de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor chen po derang/ brgya byin
dang tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ 'byung po gnas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad rang lu dga' ste/

bka' bzhin du ba dzan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nye bod kyis rig sngags de srung ba'i phyi'i gsang sngags 'dasmras so// sangs rgyas gtsol phyag 'tshal lo// skyong pa ba chos la phyag 'tshal lo//
dge 'dun chal phyag 'tshal la/ gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// sus tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod// de sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bgags khyod nga bdud dang ma phrad par bsgyur//
yams kyi nad rnams ni bar 'gyur ro// nyin gacage la dus gsum du brjod cade/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshorangs gzhan n gzugs dang ldan par skya ngar 'gyur ro//
sems can rnams dag bangar 'gyur ro// de'i tshabyang chub sems dpa'i zla 'od kyis rig sngags 'chang de srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'dis mo/ sha ma ta te dusu te/ AyAl te/ u tu ti/ shakhri
pa rman+yate/ atu 'o/ kul tati/ kha ne Ta swA hA/ gsang sngags 'don lanas gsungs pa go gsang sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas brjod pyad na/kan dang

ma pa ba skud pas bcing ba bya ste gsang sngags 'chang gang dun bar gyur pa der bcing ba'i byako gsang sngags 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas k+tAng+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs te/ bdag gis kyang
wA da rigasngags 'chang rnams srung ba'i phyi'i snus so// bgegs dang yams kyi nad thamasacad zhapar byed do sdig pa thams cad dung nad b+bems cad byang bar byed do// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral
bar 'gyur ro// dge ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis snum pa'i gsang sngags 'din da bzhin no// ma nor ba de bzhin no// don yod bgo/ subyang chub sems dapa' 'gugs par 'dod pa des gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan nyi shurtsa gcig
bzlas brjod byas te bsregasan byang chub sems dpa' del 'ong bar 'gyur// su zhage bya la 'gadon gyis zin par gyur na bu le 'a mego rus blas te bsregs la/ sa gtsang ma dang thal bzhade mo dang

ga/ bsres te chus sbrus la bya la'i gzugs byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhe stong ldan gyi me dun du ur mo'i sdel gral lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ ral gri des bya le'i gzugs de brgya rtsa brgyud du

[j]ga tubs la dum bu re re la'ang lan re bzlas brjod byas shingemade nas kyang brjod na/ srid 'tshong 'ber du ma ldang po/ su zhige hal ha la'i dug zos na des gu gul gyi bdug pa dang ga pur bsams tu khron

ba'i tshulhag mar ma gyur pa dang/ bskol ba khyod gang tsam lus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'khrungs na dug las sos par 'gyur go/
su zhig sbrul dang srog chags u tsalingags zin par gyur na/ lha phya la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas tarmakhar ngatab na sos par 'gyur ro// su zhig sdig pa 'chib dang skur pa 'debs pas mi gzhan la
'tshon dris sa gtsang ma 'am/ bag phye 'am/ snga tshar las deb gzungs byas la// byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du dur mo'i rel gral lan brgya rtsa brgyad dus gcig tu bzlas brjod/

byas te snying po brjod la dum bur gtungs te/ de'i mi n gnas brjod cing lan brgyartsa brgyad sbyine srogabyas na dga' bar 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mdza' bar 'gyur ro// su zhig mig nyams te sdongs

babasir dugyur pa dang/ su zhig mig gi 'bras bu bstod du lang thog byung ba dang/ mig ru skyes tatsha mthong bar gyur pa des a ru ra gcig dang/ ba ru ru gcig dang/ skyarur gcig zhib tu btags la sbrang rtsi dkar

bo dang/ khye'u nu bab 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya sta sbyor ba ni tshis ngas rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing/ bu gsar du btsas pa'i bud med dang/ khyi dang/ phago gis ma mthong bar byas la ral bur byas te/
khyu/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ gnas dben pa rlung ma 'ong bar 'dug ste/ nyame bdun gyi bar dustsanade ma'i 'o ma dang/
sbrang rtsi dang badza'abamag tu blugs na/ mig gi 'bras bu skyogo ling thog med par 'gyur zhing legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// su grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa'i ched du stag lpags sam/ gzig
wA legs sam/ dred lags sam/ dom lpags sam/ sbyang lcags la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ grangar ba rims kyis btab pa la bskonan rims sos par 'gyur ro// seng ge 'i pags
ba nakhrims cad kyi mchogago/ gal tasbrul gyis zinanam dotod kyi sgo bcad la lan nyi rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ dug gi mkhar bzhag na sos par 'gyur// su zhig snying na zhing mi dran nam 'chi 'dod
bar 'gyun/ ri slam tu ka'athing chusAraka tsam tshugatsangan dang bskol te phyed du pa dang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'jungs na thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro// bud med kyis bskol bar ma byago/ su
ba zhig 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin tam/ mami yin bas btab pab nad kyis btab par gyun/ gu gul gyi khedug pa la 'gatishu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te snar blugs so// yang na bong gi rtog pa
tsam gyi rol bur byas la'an nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas teb ba'o// shadang ( chang dang/ sgog pa dang/ 'thab mo spang// 'on tang sos par 'gyur ro// yang na ldong ros dang/ yungs ]
mkhas kar dang/ lan tshudakar po bsus la khan shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te// nad bab mol gyi 'og nas bdugasan/ nad gtong ba'i khyung po myur du 'bros te/ lus 'jige cing der 'dug mnus par/
'gyur go/ gal te gzhogs phyed na bam gzhogs phyed nyams sam/ rnab 'onanam/ rkang lag 'gul mi nus par gyur na/ til mar gyi nang du ru rtobacosal/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus
na sos par 'gyur ro// yang na ba mar gcig pu la lan nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsusan sos par 'gyur ro// bud med la la zhig du 'byungashAne tudakan/ til mar lalan ti'u rtsa gcig bzlos

brjod byas te/ lto ba 'am bar bskus na myur du 'byung ngo/ gang gi mngal du bu 'chon shang a po margasrang gci chu khyor de'inang du bskol la phyed lus ba dang/ de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te 'thung
na gnod pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur go/ shamo ma'itsunganabang snyan ng la bzlas brjod go/ lal zhig ga la thug pa tsam dusnyen lta brnags mkhazed na/ du ru ka dang dbyi mo tshabasnyams te bsresal lan
rta'u tshagacig bzlas brjod byas sol bas nang mdel skyogs skyabs kyi bar du byas nasos par 'gyur/ sgrog pa rnam dgu dang 'dang/ changaskad bar khyago/ mes tshig na banag mob lce de sngon mo la lan
nyashu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ rmakha'onanasos por 'gyur go/ la la zhige srogachags rediposnying la zan/ dkar po'agan khyon khyod la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te 'thungasan
0 'gyu// srog chags de 'byung// gal ten tshabs che na khyor gang 'thungs na srog chags thag pa srid 'byung ngo// gal te 'bras drag po byung na rams kyi lo ma brdungs takhu ba bcu la de la/

ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas taMmakhar gtodon rtsa ba dang bcas te 'byung ngo// la zhigamago la sbrang bus zos par gyur na/ bong bu'i rtog pa gsar du byung ba btsari te/ khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa

y+Ya gcig tu bzlas brjod byas te/ dgongs su nyal kar mig tu blugs nasos par 'gyur ro// la la zhige 'o ba nan khron bab chu lhag mar ma gyur pa 'alan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa ba nang du lan
tshadakar po la lan nyitsugacig bzlas brjod byas la btab ste/ khyor byed 'khrungs nasos par 'gyur go/ su zhige lamig nag chags sam/ rab rib bam/ tsadamar bar rgyun/ shang sham
chu ka'am btsa tu/ khu ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas lanang du 'gron du bcug ste/ zhag gcig bzhag land par yang ' na bdun bzlas brjod byas te mthog tu blags n phanan// su zhige mtshan mo

'jigs ba de ma bda' skugan/ skud pa dkar po'alan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsagacig bar la mgul du btags 'jigs par ma gyur ro// 'osa rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur ro// khyim

lu/ zhag tu glo bur duganod pa dag byungan/ bal pos bu'i shing g lcag ma sor gnyis tshod du gtubs pa stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ bam dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi snod gcig tu blugasapa drung du bzhag ste/ lcag ma'i
tsa00dum bu gcig blangs la lan cige ra sngags te/ rtse mo ga nyase mar du bsnyugs la srog go/ de bzhin du lcag ma' dum bu thams cad bsregan/ yams kyi nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// las 'di nasengs
rgyas kyi sbyin sngakhyago/ kudag dkar po la lanabargyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ dpud pa g.yas bar thogs na bzang mo bas/ 'gyed pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ shipe'am mya ka ra lo ma dang
bcas pa sor gnyis tshod du gtubasal chog gongan bzhin dusbyin sreg bya go/ nyame gcig la dus gsum dul na stong rtsa brgyad sbyanasreg bya'o// gal te me bdun du de bzhin byas na dngos grub 'thob bo//

'phags pa'i lam yang skya go/ gal te 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po las rgya la par 'dod na lung tang gshing la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas brjod byas la bamar dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyin sreg byas te/ byang
chub sems dar ba mdun du bya go klong dkar po ba bo wang srid gcig ma thang du bsnod du bcug la/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du'an stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya sta/ yan lag rnams bskusaladapral

bar thag la byas na/ 'byung po dang ma thems cad dug kha bar 'gyur// gang dag nyes byung sta lcags sgrog dang shang sgrog tubcug/na/ phug ron gyi rtog pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyud bzlas brjod byas te lag pa la'ang
bsku'o lcags sgrog dang shing sgrog lo la nga rog khar byas na pha par 'gyur ro// gal te khyo shug ma dang chu ltar mi mthun par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa ba mdun du ngur pag mjug sgro la len
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te lus la gos nang srid 'tsho'i bar du ba dum par 'gyur go/ gal te srog chags dag la tog phung bar byed na/ thal ba gtsang ma kha ma bye ma gtsang ma la lan
stong rtsa brgyad pa zlas brjod byas la ma log kun tugatongan/ srog chags rnams phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// gal te srog chags dag shingesrog la phan tshul bzlas brjod byas teshade rnams la gtor na
'bras bu la ma ze'o// de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dbub sams dpa' chen po'i pags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
bdag tsher bas snga ma 'a de sod nams kyi rgyus bcom ldan 'das kyae kha dag la khyod sems can gyi khams thams cad la snyi de chen bo bskyadanas/ phacinge ba dang 'jigs pa thams cad gcod nus par 'gyur
te de'i mthus sems can thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las thar par 'gyur/ zhi ba dang bad ba thob par 'gyur ro/ zhes lung bstan par gyur to// ma 'ongs ba 'dus lnga brgyapa thamar gyur panarages kyi

bu ba ma/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhuge snying po chos kyi sgo 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'dzin nus na/ de'os kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'grub par 'gyur/
ku ro bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran par bgyi ste/ grong khyer ram/ gongangam/ grong rdal lam/ nags tshe la gangan rig sngags 'chang gnas pa la/ gal teren gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams 'tshe
bar bgyidan/ bdag rtag tu der mchazhing kun tu bsrung bar bgyi lta longs su spong bar mi bgyid do// de'i tshomang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po bo phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gse 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sladama'i dus lnga brgyas thamalasems can pa'i char rlog pa can du 'gyur te/dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing rtag par rgyun du dgo pa'i
phyogs baspyod minus pa dang/ gal te'adzanan ba nga de'i tshe lha dang 'byung bo 'bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gsalhadang mi deng/ lham yin la sogs pa sems can thams cad la sman pa dang/ bod pa dang/
zhi bar bgyid pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis gzungs 'di'i chog de bshad par bgyi'o// khadag gis kyang bdas pa'i bskal pa du mar gzungs 'di la
mchod pa bgyis so/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i songs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dzasod pa rnams kyis kyang gzungs bdal brtenas/ blonamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyir
chub brnyes so/ rigs du 'am/ rages kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtagatugazungs 'di'i dzin cing 'tshan/ da tsha'adi nyid latshig ga rgyun thog sa bamed par 'gyur/ dbang bo rnazhing mkhas ba'agyur/slobs
bamyur bar 'gyur/lha dang mawimasacad kyi mchog tu 'gyur// gang su'i sgridang/tshigs su bcad pa dang grags babang thos shing bdeb dang dga' ba yang 'gyur go/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro//
gang dang gang du skyas par yang sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun yang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshig la'ang yid ches shing yid rton par 'gyur ro// de'ang bad ltasangs rgyas bcom ldan
ma 'as rnams kyi mthu lags par bgyi yo/ bdag nyid kyin m lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dang ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod nas// legs so

wa zhes bya ba rang byanito/ khyod na lha dang ma le sogs pa la phan pa dang/ bad pa dang/ zhi des las kyi lam la sbyor bar nusaso// gal te yunarange por phyir mi ldog pa lta na/ da ngas yeshis kyi phyag rgyas gdab
ba de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'apags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gas dran pa bdag ri glu 'dzan la gnas shing/
'das pa'i bskal pa du mar gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi sgo 'di brjod do// de'i tshe bdud deramachis te/ bdud des 'khor bsdus nas/ ci nas kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi bdame 'grub par bdag ga chos
de la mtho pam par brtsams pa dang/ de'atshobadag gse gsang sngags kyi chos de'i tshogs bdud pham par bgyi// rnam par pham par bgyisaso// gsang sngags 'dobe me thu ni brtag mi

nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab par dge par bgyi'o// de batsho byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gse/ lha dang ma rnams la phan pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes
[no ]rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di skyes so// na maH sarbadzam/ na mo rat+ta trayAya/ nam a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/achatasamyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/na maAr+ya ba la ki te shwa rA ya/ bo dz+hasetAya/
ma hAs taya/ ma hA kA ru NIkA ya/ na mo ma hA sgyu ma tsApa a/ bo dz+hasi tu le/ ma hAs tA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ye/ go ba de la/ ba chen su pra tsit+terata/ a so ba ya/ sur pa sha ta sa ha sraa ti

raka blo b+ha a ba b+his ta ArtayaM/ ma hA ma Ni mu ku lnga ku[B]la/ a lo ker d+hAr NaM/ b+ha ga ba te/ bad+mapA Nayo/ sa rtsal[]ka la pangasha mnA ya/ ba bo d+he mu khas mU bsha/ a b+halngasarbasatA pa
'amo tsakA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o b+ha ra b+hu ba satA/ mahAs la ka ka ra Na ta ma sku mi ra pa Da la nag karA ga de mo tadza lags ka/ shas ka/ samA rgyusan kar/ rakAka/ sarba a pA ya dugo
ti pA sha mnaka ra sajus sa nags na ker/ sarbakAshA pa ra pu ra ka sarbatathA ga ta/ sa ma pa rAnakar/ a byehi me hAbo dz+hasetA pa ra pad+ma Aloka saM b+hu ta ma hA ka ru Ni ke/ dza nA ma ku zla/

alang kri 3/ sha rom Ne kanika rAdza ta badzrab cha a la ngo ki te/ shi ro'i a ma Ni b+ha dzanaka ma la/ a lang kr-i te pra b+ha ra NAr dzanag ta sa has a b+ha le ritIkA yo/ mahAbo d+hA satwas ba ra ba red/
b+ha d+hem brtem/ bgam/ bag ya/ ma hAyan tu/ glesha kab+hA ta/ a ba bed+hab bod+hisatwA/ sangs ra tsaraka/ pra ma than kar/ bu ru pad+ma 1 pu ru Ta nA ga bu sA gir/
zha @#// su ru'asadehu 1 pA re tu ra dza su darda ta ba ra bro taM/ d+ha marnyam/ sa ma sam/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra sha sa ya pra shas ya/ g+hir g+hi ri/ bi bi ri bi bi ri/ phyir mi ri/ sa ri si ni/

su rusu ru/ d+hi ri d+hi raM/ bi d+hi ri d+hib+hod+hi ro/ ba'i bar/ mur mur/ mu khaM mu kha/ mu ye mu ya/ mulcamuny+tsa d+hunang+han/ bi d+hu na ba d+he na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA ya/ gA ya grwa ya//

gad+ha ya ga d+ha ya/ sa ha sa ha/ pas ha pa sa ha/ nan po bi d+ha klo sha dIs na/ nan bi bo d+ha klog bsan/ ha ra ha raM/ saM ha ra sa han/ d+hu ru tu d+hu ru tu/ ma hA maN+Dalasha tapa sa ka/ a ba b+ha

si ta ba bo d+ho dAs na sha ma ka/ sha sa kra/bkru ka/ ma hA bo d+hi sa ta ba ra ba ra dasA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma'i phyag gi rgyan gyi yu ba zhes bya ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a
bdas lha dang/ klu dang/ ma'am ci dums yongs su bskorabs/ rdo rje chen po dang ldan zhing dga' ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i khang bzangs su thams cad kyis mchog gi byang chub sems dpar rnams kyi don du
gsungs to/ sgrib pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'joms pa'o// gang la la zhag gsemanyan pa dang/ blta ba dang/ bklag pa dang/ brjod pa thobanA/ma de'i nyon mongs pa' sgrib pa jisId mchas pa thams

sku cad 'byang bar 'gyur go/ su zhage dad par gus pas snga drobarjod na/byang chub sems dpa' 'phag pa spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba bgyid do// gang ci'atshal ba dag
kyang de bzhin du 'grub go/ su zhig gal te bdag 'khes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas thob par 'tshal ba des gcig tu phyogs dben pa mchasel/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzig/
dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing/ gzhan bsam par ma bgyi bar/ gzungs sngags 'di lan bdun brjod na/ yade la bsams pa gang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de gang yang ma mchis so// sems can
thomasacad dga' bar 'gyur ro// nganabagror mchi bar ma 'gyur go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu rjesasu mngon du dranan/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
byang bar 'gyur ro/ la khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong du tshang ba'i bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur go/ gar skyo gar skyes kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gziges dbang phyug
mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs chen por skyo bar 'gyur// su zhigesnyam pa spos kyis bkang ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun dugatol/ gzungs sngags 'di'ang lan bdun brjod/
na stong gi bsod nams kyi mchog dang/ snying rjechon po'aring bzhani yang 'thob bo// de mi'i 'jig rten 'di'i yang stobs chen po yongasasu rdzogs pa'i thob bo// su zhige 'phags pa spyananas gzigs

dbang phyugag gi dong du lta zhing/ gzungs sngags 'di brjod pa debyang chub sems dapa' mtshan rgyas pa mthong nas/sa cha mamad pa'i ng 'thob go/ 'jig rtenanabangasnang ba bgyid do// tshegacig gse sangs rgyas
bya@#// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong ngo// ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur mchis par 'gyur ro// gar skyags skyes kyang sngon gyi tshor bas dran par 'gyur ro/
malas kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur 'o// su zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa des/ tshes bcolnga'i zla ba rtab la bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad bzung ste/ gos gtsang ma bgos la ring bsrel
dang bcas pab mechod rten gyi mdunanam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ der ma tog sna tshogs gtor bar bgyi/ bdug pas kyang bdug bar bgyi/

'gaM mar me'ang bud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i tshog zungs sngags 'da'ong lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyanaras/

ga gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor dur 'dug ste/ mtshams med pa la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa ma dge ba jisod mchis pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// lus dang ngag dang/ yid kyi las rnams kyang yongasaMsu dag

par bgyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang bshob bo// 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyang thob bo// sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te char dbab par 'tshal nagyen
a dunam mkha' la bltas la gzungs sngags lan te shu rtsa gcig brjod na char 'bab bo// gal tes la bltas teg zungs sngags brjod na/ sa bon thams cad rnam pa bskyar phunasum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
tsaka' gal te 'bab chub sems pa bshel lam/ 'bab chu chen po 'am/ 'bab chu'i dengo 'am/ mtsho'am/ mtsho'u 'am/ma tshoTan gyi 'gram du mchis te brjod na/ chu thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
nad thams cad kyi don du gzungs sngags brjod d lag pas byabasan sos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nyams pa'i mi'i mdun dubarjod nangun pa slar 'thob par 'gyur// khru bsen pa 'amaskom pas nyen pa'i mi'i
gdong du bltas te brjod na/ bkres pa 'am skom pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal ta mtshams gcad par 'tshal na/ des mtshe'u tshub ned du zhugs te der mchis la/ gzungs sngags 'di yi ger bris te/ rgyal
mtshan gyi rtsomo la btagasan/ dpag tshad brgya'i mtshams gcad par 'gyur ro// der nyes pa rnams ma babyung ngo// mtshams kun tu srung ba rdzogs so// da na lus thams cad

bsdu ba'i phyag rgya brjod par bgyi'o/ lus drang por 'greng ste/ rkang pa nyobar mnyan du gzhabasal/ rkang pa g.yas pa yade tsam bskums te lag pa g.yas pa thur du brkyang/ gung mo dang srin lags nyes lag

mdzIkaM du dgug/ badzub mo dang/ mthe bong dang/ mthebu chung brkyang la lag gaphyilo pakan tegazhag go/ lag pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyi'o/ lag pa gnyis ka'i de nga mo bkug la lag pa phrag pa dang mnyam
par gzhag go lag mthil ni mdun du bstan togazhag go/ 'dani lus bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o// su zhig bdud dang/ gzhan mu stegs can dang/ dgra rnams pham par bgyi ba dang/
[7 ]@#/// lam dang po la gnas par 'tshal na/ phyag rgya bad decinges la gzungs 'dabangalananyi shu rtsa gcige brjod par bgyi'o// na morat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yab lo ki teshwar ya/ bo d+hisitum//

ma hAsat+taya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a ba d+ha pa ra ba d+he/ a byahisA hA/ gang gong du phyag rgya ji skadasmos pa de bzhin du lus gnas par bgyis la/ snying khar thel mo sbyar te/ sor mo thams cad

phan tshun thad kar bsnyol la/ g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa rnams la 'khyud par bgyi/ mdzub mo gnyis gyen du nga sgrung la rtse mo gnyis sprad do// mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang
po la reg par bgyi'o// lag mthil ni ma 'byar bar bgyi'o// bad na gzungs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste gnyis pa'o////bskal pa du mar tshar bas su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dag pa lnga/

cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// tshe phyi ma la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sku blta 'gyur ro// gang gi tshesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub brnyes par mdzad par brtsams pa'i tshe bdud kyis
mtho btsams pan/ phyag rgya ba dis btul te/ deb tsho zhi ba'i bde ba dang/ bsam gtanadang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i ng brnyes par gyur to// gzungs sngags 'di nga brjod par bgyi'o// tad+yaglu/ sarbad+ha
ma ran man+dAlA ya/ a ce hipa ra ma shudad+ha satwA ya swA hA/ yang thog mar lag pa g.yas pa 'byon pa ltar bgyisal/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mgo bor thal mo sbyaral mdzub mo gnyis

bkug ste rtse mo da/ mthe bongag kyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis pa la sbrulo/ 'dachos kyi phyag rgya ste/ rnam par grol bar bgyi ba'i smad du bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro//
'dini phyag rgyagasum pago sngon de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mthun par bsgoms te/ da'itshabasam gtana rnams dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par grol babaskos
so yang 'di ni gzhan te bgrang la rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gzhub bo// lag pa'i gung mo dang/ srinalag dang/ mthe'u chung rgyab sbyar te sen mo phrad par bgyi/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyangs rtsomo phrad pa/
bgyi mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshogs gnyis pa la reg par bgyi lagasutha'i nan gnas so bcu tsam gyis baspyod la smin mtshams su gozugasaso// 'di ni mo ga stong gi phyag rgyas bzhi pa'o//

gal taphyag rgya'adi bcings la gzungs sngags brjod na/ skad cig de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dkrigs pa bye ba phrag stong mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag rig sngags

'chang de dag lhan cig spyod cing grogs su gyur pan zhing der nabang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs pa bya ba phrag 'bum dang/ bzhi stong nyi shu mchis so// gangadakyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa desan blta bar
mi rigs te/phyagargyadabo chos nyid do// sul rigasashen//gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid la'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sbyin pa yagos kyis rtogs par btsal ba thams cad
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags ni 'di legs te/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+husajatsak+Sha kanA yan+tu nadA ya swA hA/ yang 'greng larkang pa mnyam par gzhabs te/ lag pa g.yas

pa bkan la sor mo lngagazhabs te brkyang l/ lag pa g.yon pa 'dadabazhin du ba rgyas te bkana'alag pa g.yas pa brgyab la sbyar tasang khar gzhag go 'di ni leg pa stong thams cad bsdus pa'i phyag rgya so lnga/
[%]pa'o/// 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bijage rten gyi khams na bdud dang dag mchis pa rnams thulal// gzungs sngags 'dalegs te/ na mo Arab lo ka shA rAlaM/ tad+ya thA/ sarba dut+ta e

ha a ma sAhA/ yang ba grang ste rting pa phrad par bgyis la/ lag pa g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyil lag mthil bdag logs su bstan par bgyi'o// 'di ni ting

nge 'dzin rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ste drug pa'o/// 'das ting ngob tshan thams cad dang/ chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// phyag
rgya 'dis nu thams cad kyang 'thob bo// gzungs kyi rtsa bab gsang sngags snga ma/ na masarbadzA/ zhes bgyi ba lags so// yang 'greng la rkang pa nye bar gzhanges te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis
mthe bo'i sonamo mnan to// g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin tamatho'u chung dang gung mo rnams rtse mo sprad la/ lag rting dang por bsrang ste/ dgug ban mdzub mo gnyis dgug go/ sur btang nan brkyang ngo// de
ca ltar sa la sngags brjod par bgyigo lag pa g.yas kha 'amadzub mo gnyis n de gug go/ ga yon lab mdzub mo gnyis naslar gtang ngo// mgo ba thob kho g.yas nas bskor bar bgyi ste bod pa'o//
g.yon pas na bsal ba ltar bgyis te slar gtang ngo// phyag rgyu'adis na lha dang klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad bsduba'i slad du dgug pa ba phyag rgya sku bdun pa'o// gsang sngagasan bdalegs te 3

o sazade ba nag an lis hA/ phyag rgyasnga mal rtsa mo bkod de/ lag ting gnyis sbyar ba las yid tsamagazung mdzub mos g.yab ste sngam bzhinano/ 'di ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa chos mnyan pa'i slad du
dgug pa'i phyag rgyas brgyud pago/ gsang sngagasan bdalags te/ oM ma hAbra sgaya/ a bya tis// phyag rgyab de dang gsang sngags bdanagazungs sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/

chos kyi sgo dum gzung ba'i slad dub sdubago/ nyin spyang kis zin pa dang/ zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tsho/ ba maral lananyarig rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ phyag rgyu 'dis phyag rgyas btab la 'thungasan

dbang po rnabar 'gyuro/ nyin gcogi khazhani duchos kyatshigs su bcad pa khri lobs nus par 'gyur go// phyag skya'adi dang chos kyi sgo 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'

khaphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ched du gsungs pa'o// yang 'grong ste rkang pa nya bar gzhibs la/ lag pa thal mo sbyar tesnying khar kha zhag la mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bkug ste/ rtsa ba
[rs]@#// sngags chen po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi// 'ad na byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi nang dang gnon du yid bzhin lta bu'i phyag rgyas dgu pa'o//
ma par lhub gzhal med khadza rnams su 'jugago/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su'ang mchi'o// mchod pa'i don du rin po cha ba stong dag kyang bsams pa bzhin rnyed par 'gyuko/ su zhig chos

kyi sgo 'di'i las bgyid nusan/ danang pa ra sngar langs la khrus bgyi zhing kha gdong bkrus te/ phyag rgya de'i dam tshig gagyisan rjes phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa gdab klong gi bye masnyad mngon sum du

mthong bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa du mas tshe rabs su bsags pa'i sgrib pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya de'i yon tan dang bsngags pani rong khyimang bo/ yang snga ma bzhin
du thal mo sbyar// mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo'i son mo la bcar te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi son mo'ang phan tshun du sgrub sprad la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyisoms la 'dod pa'i phyag rgyalta bcu pa'o/// ca'atshal ba de bzhin du bsgrub bo// des par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// yang

'basha thalamo sbyar ba las mthe bong dang mdzub mo so sor bskyang sta lag mtha'e dbye bar bgyi'o// 'di ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi tshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdab klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bdag la stsol ba ste//
ta0 'das bdag byang chub kyi lam rab tu rtogs so// 'dase rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi// bdan byang chub sems dbang rnams 'gog pa la snyoms par ba jug pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu gcug pa 'o//
yang thal mo stam las mdzub mo gnyis bstan zhing brkyang bas bskul bar bgyigo/ 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'thob pa'i phyag rgya ste
bcu gnyis pa'o////gzungs sngags ni bdi lags taM/ oM sarba bud+d+hasamam byahipar ma shud d+hisatAyAhA/ dan byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong

dang ldan pa lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa'i chog brjod par bgyi'o// thog mar ra rnams dang nye ba sagazhi bkra shis pa'i phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o// der sa brkos pagasog ma dang/

gyo mo dang/ sa pa dang/ mi gtsang ba rnams bsal la/ dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i pa'i lci ba dang bzhi par bsus te thug par bgyi'o// der muzheng du khru bcujug pa'i sogs bu bgyi'o// 'bang dunasebro gang gi

tshad du bgyis la sgo bzhi gtod de/ shar gyi sgor na yul 'khor srung/ lho'i sgor ni sephags skyes po'i// nub kyi sgo namog ma bzang/ byang gi sgor ni rnam thos kyi sras te/ de dag gi gam yor rang rang ga'i khor
thams cad dri'o/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sun byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa// log pa stong dang ldan pa gzhag pa ra bgyi'o// de'i mdun du khredu
@#// gzhags/khri'u'i stong du gzungs sngags kyi cho ga gzhag par bgyi'o// de la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug go/ me tog sna tshogs bkram mo// lha bshos sna tshogs dbab po// der
mchod pa de rnams bzhag ste/ sgog pa rnam dgu dang/ sha dang/ chang mi dbab bo// gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi na nyin gcig bzhademachod pa thams cad kyang gsan pa gzhan gyis brjego/ chog
'das nyin nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dngos po thams cad kyis mchod bar bgyi'o// sgrub pa bo gang dag sngon mthong ba de dag gis dri ber bgyi'o// de sgrub pa po shar phyogs su bltas te 'greng la/ bzungs

sngags snga ma dang po nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du brjod par bgyigo/ sangs rgyas kyi mthar phyin gyi bar du skyo bar ma bgyi'o// thog mar phyag rgya dang po lan cig bsunges la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par

bgyi'o// bcu gnyis pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du bgyi'o// de de'i phyir mi ldog pa brtan po'i sims bskyod par bgyi'o// tshog bdas de bzhin du dgag pa bgyis na thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ro// de'i chos ngs rgyus

nyid kyi ched du nges par drang po'i soms kyis drang por mchis par bgyi// gsang sngags dang lha thams cad rjes su dran par bgyis/ ji ltar na mdun na mig lam na gnas pa lta bu dang phan tshunaganod pa bgyid pa mamachis

par bgyi'o// dmigs pa gzhan ' dmigs par bgyi'o// de'i tshortsaba'i gsang sngags lan stong brgyad cu bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khen tangabyang chub soms dang ba spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug kun dga' bo'i gzugs

kyis der mchis te/ sgrub pa po la rgya'i dod kyi slong zhes 'dri zhing phan tshun sla bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyis mchod pa bgyi bar bsams la/ bdag la dzasadadris pa lan gdab par bgyis// thun med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don dug zungs sngags kyi nang bzhin 'tshalozhes brjod par bgyi// yang na 'di skad du'adi ni lung bstan pa'i dus lags pa snyam bgyidan/thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges

par thugs rjechen po skyad dugasol/ bdag na rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ grags pa mi batshal gyi nam zhig nasems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin dultar b dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur snyam dusams so//

yang 'byung po gnyug mar gnas pa thams cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam dusems so zhes brjod par bgyi// gal te yid la bsams pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na gzhan la ma brjod
par bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te chog 'di grub na bzlas par bgyi/ gcig tu gzung bar bgyi'o// 'di ni bslab pa gcig tu gsang ba'o// su zhig sna tshogs 'tshal ba des a ka ru nag po'i chab
kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyisal/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi// yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya bcu pa'i ng bcing bar bgyi// 'on tang
'tshal ba yongs su rdzogs par med par 'gyur ro// de'i tshaglegs bam 'di bzhin dusems shing/ su zhig bad bzhin du mchod pa bgyid na gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs
yang chog gzhan rtesu zhigabade ba thams cad thob par 'tshal ba des/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i phyag rgyudagu pa ngacis la rtsa ba'i gsang
ba sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// til nag po la lan nyeshurtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mar bsregs naci'atshal ba bzhin du 'grub bo// zhes rgyal po dga' bar bgyi'atshalan des rgyal po gnas pa na mchis
pa yisha de las lcag ma blangs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis la/ rgyal po'i rkyen dga' ra ba der bor na dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems can sdig pa can rnams dang/ dgra rnams tshar gcod/

par 'tshal nadas shing nim pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis temer bsregasanadabang du 'gyur ro// yang chog gzhan te lha dang 'byung pom dul ba de'i slad du/ gu gul dang us kar la lan nyishu rtsa
gcig bzlas brjod bgyis ta mar bsregasan/ 'byung po thams cad bdag nyid tshul bzhin du gnas par bgyur ro/ gang du nad byung na chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis te/ der ba mar la lan brgyartsa
brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la mer bsregasanand zhi bar 'gyur ro// mar de nyid las nyung zhig nad pa la bludan 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sngon yul ko bana' nad byung ste/ nad pa rnams gdugs gcig gnyis bro

tshu 'tshal nas gum mo// de'i tshadabus kyi yul gyi ma bden gyur ces brgya re deramachis te/ sa gzungs sngags 'di'i tshig bgyis nas bsgrags pa dang nad chad do// 'byung po'i rgyal po'ang yul de nas byung

ca' ngo thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i stobs 'tshal te/ gang du rang gi 'khor du pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba der thog ma'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bcings la bcangs la/ gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod bgyis na/ dgra bo chom rkun rnams bdag nyid mi rung bar 'gyur ro// su zhig tshozad pa des 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi/ nyin gcig khazhane mchod par bgyi/ a ka ru

nag po'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi zhing/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// bud med gang zhig bu mi phyonan ba mar la lan nyi shu rtsagacig bzlas brjod bgyis te/
de la blud na zhi ba dang bde bar bgyur ro// gang paskyod pa'i bu dang bu mo dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo batrang po sngon gyi bsod nams rnams kyis brgyan cing/ sems can rnams
dga' ba dang/ mar skyes pa na rtag tu mchod pa'i bos su 'gyur nang bde ba mchog rnams myong bar bgyur ro// su zhig mgan ba des mgo stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgyu bcings la/gzungs sngagrwa thams

cad kyi phyag rgyas ma la phyag rgyas btapanasos par 'gyur ro// jaltar stong gi phyogs kyi lha bde ba myong ba rnams mthong ba de ltabu'i mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// da ni ri mo bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bgyisdu/
ri mo bringeb ched du ras dkar po bgyis la/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdog 'dzam bub chubo'i gsor lta bu pra bar bgyi'o// lag pa stong dang ldan par bgyi'o/ lag pa so so'i legamathalen mig re

'tshan/ @#// mchis par bgyi sta/ sbyin ma mchis pa'i tshon gyis dri bar bgyi'o// tshon rtsibang ka bde tha dang bsre bar bgyi'o// mgo la rin po tshasna bdun gyi cod pan bri bar bya'o// yan lag dang nying/

lag rnams su rgyan gyis brgyan par bri bar bya'o// yang nasal byang chub sems dpa' srid du khru gang ba bris te/ lag pa gnyis bri bar bgyi'o// gong du smos pa'i lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya lnga pas/
rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa bgyi'o// gal te lag pa dang mig stong dang ldan par ma gyur na dpral bar mig gcig bgyi/ ]a 'di ni chog gzhan te/ su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mchod par 'tshal na//
thogamar sa la bri bar bya'o// de ni 'od ltar phru bar bgyi ste/ cho ga snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bgyi// de nas ri mo mkhan bslab pa brgyud bzung ba chab khungasar mchis te/ slar log nas legs par

bkrus pa gtsang mas bri bar bgyi'o// tshon rtsi rung bas chog bzhin bris la/ de'i tshodakyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchis te/ der sbyang ba bgyisal nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tumachod pa'i las rgya cher bgyis na//

de naganus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste/ de la the tshom ma bgyi'o// sad kyis zla ba dang nyim lta bu 'a'od kyang bgyid do// gang dag ba dang dad pas pas mi bgyid pa des namagatogs so//

byang chub sems dpa' lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i chog go// dbazhin gshegs pa rnam ragazigs byung ba'i tsho'ang bdag gis bdud 'dul bab lus mig stong dang ldan pa sprul pa'o// mig pa de las kyang sas rgyus

re'i sprul te/ de dag nangeskal pa bzung po la sas rgyas stong 'byung ba lags so/// lag pa stong las lag pa re re la'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbrel po re'i sprul to// de dag ni 'khor las sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong
khabyung bo lags so// bdud 'dul ba'i chogs kyi nangan/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus n thams cad kyi mchog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang bu 'phags pa spyanaMras gzigs dbang
phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas gsang sngags 'disangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas par bshad n bskal pa bdas kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub somasadapa' 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gas bcom ldanub dus las gsang sngags bad thos nas rab tu dgabalta yarang nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs sngags 'di brjod do// na morat+tarAhaM

tsan+d+haa laM kA ra mArgata dzapu N+ya tsakA bod+d+heyarA dza ya ta thAgatAya/ tad+yathA/ rat+tar/ tA tapany+tsa/ rat+ta pra tim te/ ratapa sgyu ratad ka sAny+tsa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gis gzungs sngags 'di brjod nas/ de'i tshostong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'du shes med 'du shes sad man skye mched la thug gi bar du rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu

gi yos so// 'og min gyi lha'i rosin dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar gyur to// lha'i gnas der 'jigs pa chen po'ang byung po/ ngan song du gyur pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po nyid do zhes s chen/
ka @#// po 'byin cing/ par 'byos tshul 'bros te gar song mi shes so// deb sprul pas ngan song du gyur pab 'khor chen po la 'daskad ces smras so// gal te gsang sngags 'di las 'dab

'deb rgyas par byed na mgo bo rdul phra rab bzhan du bgyis so// gsang sngags 'di'i ma jus nase 'thor ro// rgya mtshon po skams so// lha ma yin gyi dmag pham par bgyid do// 'byung po rnams tshar gcod do//

sdig pa can gyi mo rnams kyang tshar gcodado/ nadachen po dag kyang chad par bgyid do// yul bsrungs par yang 'gyur go/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyang phyag 'tshalal// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig

gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de'i gzi brjid dang stongs yun thung dus bshad par mi nus so// gzungs sngags 'di 'chang zhing rjod pa ni da pa' bar 'gyur ro// phyug pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pa dang/
dbang dang ldan par bgyur// jisrode 'tsho ba'i bar du rgyal po byams par 'gyur ro// ci'atshal ba thams cad 'grub bo/ su zhig bdud pham par bgyid par 'tshal ba des bdug pa gtsang ma la rtsa ba'i
gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// su zhig 'di snyam du bdag la sems can thams cad byams par 'tshal ba des/ so shing lan shurtsagacig bzlas brjod bgyis te bachos na byams

yi// par 'gyur ro// su zhig bdag gi tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur bar 'tshal ba des/ shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis lasnying khar bskus na bsgrub bo// las de dag la'ang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags

brjod do// phyag rgyabang bcing bar bgyi'o// lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar la mthe bong gnyis brkyang ngo// phyag rgya bad ni ji ltar bdag bsrung ba de bzhin du gzhan yang srung ngo// mtshams gcad pa'i ng bgyi'o//
gangazhig tuman chab bam thal ba lag par blangs te lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis la/ bdag gi steng du gtor na phyogs bzhi'i mtshams bcad par yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la
la zhig 'byung po rnams sam/ bgegs dang/ log 'drana rnams kyis mtho btsams par gyuran (bal po saMbu'i shing gi lcug ma la gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dal gyis gzhus nasos par
'gyur// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' so so'i rig pa'i phyag rgya thogs pa med pa sa bcu gsum pa'o/ gosang sngags ni 'di'igs te/ nams brlad+hams glu ya/ nam Ar+yab
lekati shA rAspyabo tsuse/ namo badzrapA Nis+ya/ bo dz+hases+ya/ tar+ya dzA/ d+hu pi d+hupi kA a d+hu bi brashaman sAhA/log par lta bgazhan mu stegasan rnams 'dul bar nus so// su zhigadus gsum
du gsang sngags 'di lan nyenatsa'i 'i brjod pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrug bcul mchod padi'as rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// bud mdangaskye bar mi 'gyur ro//
bachiba'i dus kyi tshongan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mchi bar 'gyur go/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis de'i spyi bor phyag
bzhag ste/ 'daskad dubu ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i khongs so// 'di'i skyes nas dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chibar mi 'gyur ro// 'dir 'byung po rnams
ba kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo// 'greng sta lag pa g.yon pa klu mo bkug pa drang por brkyang// mi 'jigs pa sbyin b.labagyi/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug la sor mo
bzhis mnan// khu tshur bang rna ba g.yas pa'i gong du bzhi g la mdzub mo bsgul bar bgyigo/ brkyang bar bgyi'o// bskum par bgyi// phyag rgya 'dani stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
ba'i las rnams 'byang bar bgyi bab spyod du sus pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya 'dono[]nagacig bzhin dus yal gsum du bcings la gsang sngagos kyang lan bdun bdun brjod na/mtshams mad

pa lnga po dag dang/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang 'byang bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro// sems can Thams cad la snying rjechon po skyas na/ las kyi rtsa ba thams cad tshig par 'gyur ro// grang ga tshatsha'adi 'do'o

banas nigs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyur ro// bakhor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dpag tu med cing mi zad pa'i snying po ba gzungs 'thob par 'gyur// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur

a ro lus l ltas rnam pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus la gnod pa mi 'byung ngo// mig nadadang/ rna ba'i nad dang/ sna'i nadadang/ lcend ma 'byung// phyi dang nang gnad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur

ro/ sngon gyi las mi dag ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gal te char chu 'baban tilanag po la a rag mar gyis smras te rale bur bgyis la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te mtsho bur stsal na de'i
mod 'charab ngab bo// gal te char chos n yungs kar gyi mar gyis snamab mi togasgyus la li bur bgyis te/ lan bertsa pargyadabazlas brjod pa se la mtshe'ur stsalan mar 'chad par 'gyur go/ sor mo

N+Daphan tshunakhastsol te g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams dam du 'khyud lamago bo'i stong du bzhag ste rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bagyi'o// 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten du bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgyu su bcolnga bgo// phyag rgyu 'dis ring bsrel dang bcas bab mchod rten gyi mdun du sbyang bar bgyi/ gdugs nyi shu rtsa dgu'i bar du tsananganadakar po'i
bdag gus dkyil 'khor byug/ lo tog gtsang ma dgram mo// de'i tshe khrus bgyis la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ a ka ru nag pos bdugaM par bagyi'o// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod bgyi'o// 'danod snyams pa bgyi'o// de nas yungs kar dang til nag po lhan cig ba tagasal/ pho mun gang tsam la lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhugs su dor ro// de ltar gdugs
bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig cing/ yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na ci 'tshal ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par nyobar gzhibs te/ lag pa
g.yas pa zur du thams cad brkyang la bkan te dus mo'i skyed du gzhag/ lag pa g.yon pa'i ng de bzhin du brgyago/ bdin byenganubasams dpa' mi 'jigs pa stsol ba'i phyag rgyas bcu drug
kyi phyag rgya 'diring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung dub cings la/ rtsa bab gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisan/ sems can thums cad la mi 'jigs
pastsal ba'agyur ro// yang na 'u tibs bonadang/ yungs kar dang/ shu dag dang/ 'bushade dang/ 'dodigasangs rgyus kyi spyan lnga bam/ bla gab med pa'i phyogs susbyin srag brgyago/ gsang
sngags lanasum cugs bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ me tog dang bdug pasamachod par bgyi'o// bad no gsang sngags kyi chog lags te/ ci rtsom pa thams cad dbazhin du 'grub po// gsang sngags gang mi 'grub

nagasang sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis 'grub bo// rnalem mthong bar 'tshalan gsang sngags bdebangabarjod cing/ phyag rgya bda'ing bcings na ci'atshal ba rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mi bsod nams dang

mi ldan pa gang zhig dngos grub mi thuban/gsang sngags 'di gdugs bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig kyang dusagasumadulan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisan/mi'atshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo// debatsho yang byang

chub somasadapab rgya mtsho na po baning duklu'i rgyal po rgya natsho'i khang par 'dug ste chos bshado// der klusdug bsngal chen po myong dga mthong nas snying rjechan po skyas te/gal te yongs su skyob pa zhig yodan/sdug bsngal

[a ]gyi gnod pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ro snyam mo// da'i tshodang klu'i bu mo tshos 'dod pa zhig gis rin po cha'ajig rten gyi khamasam mdzod gcig r ba gcig phul ba dang/ des kyang sdug bsngal tham cad yongs su thar par

byed pa'i chos bshad do// de'i tsho'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa chub snying pos kun tusrung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so// bame le ma hIb ma le/ o harim hA o ha re/ suma'i ma hasum re
satA/ riges kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di 'dzinan/ de gar mchi bar bdud kyi 'khor gyis sdug bsngal bar bgyid pa'i bar du bdag gis rtag tu kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o//
gang la la zhig glo bur du 'jigs par gyur tam/ rang gi yul lam/ gzhan gyi yul lam/ chom rkun dang phyir rgol ba dag byung na desatshon skud sna lnga pa bcang bar bgyi ste/mdud pa nyi rtsa gcig bar
la/ mdud pa re re zhing yang gsang sngags lan re re bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon pa la bcing bar bgyi'o/ lag pa g.yon pa 'i son lagadang/ gung mo dang mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs
la / mthe bos de dgamanan/ mdzebu chung brkyang ste dag logs su bstan la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyigo// bdinatsang chub sems dbang mig stong dang ldan pa'i kun tu
srung ba'i phyag rgyas bsubadun pa////gsang sngags lan bcu bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ dgra thams cad ldog par 'gyur zhing/gnod par bgyidami nus so// de'i tsho yang
[a.]@#// byang chub sems dpab gangs kyi rol gnas te chos kyang 'chad do// der gnod skrun dang srin po rnams kyi yul na sems can rnams phan tshun za zhing/ de dag la dge babasams

mad par mthong nas/ byang chung sams dbang 'disnyam dunam zhigan 'dul bar 'gyur snyam nas deb tshaden song sta/ ul der de dag gi don gyi phyir lag pa stong dang ldan zhing mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus
sprul nas des bdud rnams pham par byas so/ der gzungs sngags 'di'ongasnasaso// de nas srin po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gan dusongs/ las de bshags nas phyag byas so//
byang chub sems dpas kyang phyag rgya bcu bdun gyis phyag rgyusabatab pa dang/ de'i mod la byang chub kyi lam thob bo// bgrang ste rkang pa phan tshun lta bar gzhabs la snying khar thal mo sbyar te
mthe'u chung phan tshun bstsol la/ g.yon pas g.yas pa la 'khyud par bgyi/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang lan nyinurtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya yongs su rdzogs pa ste bcobargyad pa'o// yid la bsam pa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro// su zhig ngan 'gro drug po dag gi sams
can rnams skyob par 'tshal ba des 'khor lo'i phyag rgyabacing bar bgyi ste/ sor mo bcu rtse spradul lag rting dubye/ sor mo'i bar yang sor gnyis gnyae tsam gyis ma phrad par bgyi'o///
phyag rgya'adis byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid cing/ 'gro ba drug bo dag tu zhugs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bgyi ste/ phyag rgya deb chogago// yang
skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g.yon pa pus mo'i steng du lag mthil bkan te gzhag par bgyi'o// g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyis la// lag mthil pus mopa steng du kha sprul sku gzhag par
bgrogo/ 'di ni byang chub sems dang ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dam tshig yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgyu ste bcu dgu pago// bden rang
bzhin gyis 'gog pa dang mtshungs te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdas rnams phyag rgya bdo gcig pus sangs rgyas kyi byang chung banas so phyag rgya 'dis las mi dge ba thams cad
'byang bar 'gyur// gal tasgrub pa po skyil mo krung bcas te mchis pa la chos rnams mngon du gdab bar ma gyuran/ gdugs bdun gyi bar du dben pa'i phyogs kyi gnas su phyag rgya 'das
gzungs 'di brjod lashin tu dad paso sangs rgyas la phyag bgyi zhing/ gdugs mtshan drug tulas rnams so sor bshags na/ de'i tshachos mdun du gda' bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams
dpag tum mchis shang grangs mamachis par 'gyur ro// yang lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs la g.yas pa'i sor mo bzhes g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs te/ cung zhig mchis
la g.yas pa'i mdzub mos g.yab bo// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gsum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnam pa rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgyas
skya nyishu pa'o////gsang sngagasani 'di lags te/ o ku pe gzo/ ba ku re rtsile tsal/ la le sAhA/ gsang sngags 'di dang phyag rgya 'di ni lhag par rgya chab go// rigs
kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bumo gang la la zhig ci rtsom pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshalan/ gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisan/ yid la ci bsams pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur
ro su zhig gdugs gcig bzhin du goms par bgyidan las rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems mi bskyudado/ rmi lam bzang po dpal du 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub kyi
shing drung na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi por du mthong zhing/ byang chub tulung ston par mibar 'gyur ro/// brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// yang
bgrang sta rkang pa pan tshun bstan la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lagamathil du bkug ste/ sor mo bzhis khu tshur bcangs la snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin bgyis la//
tshal rna ba ga yos pa stong du bzhagaste/ mdzub mos la/yab bo// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gi lha dang klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad po dag dgug
ba00pa'i phyag rgya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/// gsang sngags ni da lags te/ na mo na gan+nA/ na mo dadra ban swA hA/ namo narje la sAt+tA/ e bya hasAhA/ rigs kyi bu 'am//
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyag rgya bad deng gsang sngags 'dab dzin tam/ 'don tam/ klog pa tshar bas bdun dran par 'gyur ro// sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro// dug kyang
gdug par ma 'gyur go// lus la mtshon gyis ma tshugs so// rgyal po'-i ched pas 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo// bskal pa mang por sems can dmyal bar ma mchi'o// sdug bsngal nyams
su ma myong ngo// gang brjod par 'byung po rnam partishu rtsa gcig lhags te gsang sngags 'di rten par brgyur do/ gang gi drung du 'byung po mchib der skud pa dkar po garagos par bgyi ste//
mdud pa bzhi bcurtsa dgu bor la/ mdud pa re re la'ang lan re bzlas brjod bgyis tamagul du btags na bde bar 'gyur ro// gal te yul du yams kyi nad byung ste sems can mang du 'gum
na rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal nas pad+madag blos la/ pang re re la'ang lan pArgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te// bsngags par bgyis na yams kyi nad 'chad par 'gyur ro//
yang skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong dang gung mo rtsa mo sprad do// lag mthil bkan la pus mo g.yon pa'i stong du bzhag/ g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyis la
pus mo g.yas pa'i stang du kha phubasko gzhag go/ sor mo gzhan brkyang la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di na byang chub sam
dpa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyugargyu su nyi shu rtsa gnyise pa'o/// cu'il ba de gzhan du 'grub bo// sdug bsngal las thar par bgyur do// gang gso mtshams med pa lnga po'i
las dag bgyis pa sdig pa re re'i phyir yang/ dper na 'dzam bu'i glinge gsa'i rdul gyi rdul phra rab mtha' dag re re'i bskalaM par sems can dmyal bar mchi'atshal la/ 'byung ba na nges par na ches
pa bgyur na/ des de'i tsho rang bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nyal zas ma 'tshal bar phyag rgya 'di bcingasal/ gsang sngags 'di'ang lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sngon gyi las kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang bar bgyidazhus par 'gyur te/ lhag ma lus pa ni gnas ma lags shinge skabs ma mchis so// yang
bgrangs lag pa g.yon pas rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong chang par bcugal/ lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pabalag mthil nas bzung ste/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
yalta bkyi'o// bdan byang chub sems dpa' dbang dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i phyag rgya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/// dpag tshad stong gi phyogs su mchi'atshalana'ang dkabab mamachis
so// gsang sngags ni dban par mchis la bzlas brjod bgyi 'o/ yang lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung gsen mo mnanal/ g.yas pa 'ang de bzhin du bgyis te/ sog mo/
lhag ma gsum gsum mchis pa brkyang la// lag mthil du bkugs spyi bor bzhag la rtsa ba'i rtse/sangasngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pagyi'o/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul

dang dbang gi phyag rgyasu+i sha rtsa bzhi pa'o// 'gro ba la dbang du 'thob bo//'gro ba la dbang ba 'thob bo// yang thal mo rig par sbyar te/ tha' mo'i nang khong stong du bgyis la mdzub mo gnyis kyis g.yab bo//

'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po ba snying po las spyan drang ba'i phyag rgyas nyishu rtsa lnga pa'o/// gas nga sngags ni 'di lags te/ oMAro lake te lekya bi dza ya// sangadzra pra ma thanasar ya su
waM phaT ma sAhA/ byang chub sems dapa' baphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dngamig stong dang ldan pa'i tshog zhib mo rdzogasaso/ hU~M/ da'adzag
pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan po thogs pa ma mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po bsams rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// bam po dang
sangs rgyas dang byang chub saMms dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gse thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan ba das shAkya thub pa ri po Ta la'i stong//
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga gzhal med khang rin po che bkod pa'i dkyil 'khoran nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i rin po cha'i seng ge 'i gdan/
ma na po cha'i rgyal mtshan dung ba dan dag gse 'khor bar bkod cing sbyangs pa la bzhugs te/ dab tshod bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas kun badzin can bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par
bzhed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ba chen po grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' rin po che'i rgyal bo dang/ byung chub sems dpa'i sman gyi rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpab smana mngon par 'phags pa dang byang chung sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
dang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i bkod pa dang/ byang chub sems dang ba bkod pa chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po
dang [.]byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snyide po dang/ byang chub sems dpab rdo rje snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa banAmamakhabasong po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/
la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang/ byang chungasems dpab 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa sha
stag dang thabs cig go/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dunachen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pas bsu spyad pa tshad med pa grangs med pa dag dang thabs cig// tshe dang ldan pa bodagus chen po ni
gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang tshangs ris kyi lha tshadand pa nyid dang thabs cig ste/ lha'i bu kAn+d+ham ranogatsobor gyur to// gzhan yang lha dngalha'i bu tshad mad pa snyad dang thabs cig ste//
lhang du ku shu ka gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ rgyalachen rdas bzhi'i lha'i rgyal po tshad med pa seng dang thabs cig sta/ lca'i skyel po yul 'khor srung na gtso bor gyur
to gzhan yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am caded/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/ mi ma yin pa
la sogs pa tshad med pa snyad dang thabs cig ste/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ri'i dpal ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu mo tshad med pa snyad dang thabs cigaste/ lha'i
bu mo gnon nub mgo ces bya ba ni gtsomor gyur to// gzhan yang nam mkha' lho dang/ chubo dang/ rgya mtsho'i lho dang/ chumag gi lho dang chu klung gi lho dang/ sman gyi lha da ljon
shing gi lha dang/ nagasatshal gyi lha dang/ khang khyim gyi lha dang/ chub lha dang/ rma'i lha dang/ rlung gi lhadang/ sa'i lha dang/ ri'i lho dang/ gzhal med khang la sogs pa'i lha chad
[ba// med pa snyed kyang so so nas 'dus shing lhags par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bakhor mang po'i nang du gsang ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyis bod
zer bkyi bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ong gsar gyi kha dog can du gyur to// lha'i gzhal med khang rnams dang/ klu'i
khang khyimo rnams dang/ lha'i getsobo rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang rab tugayos par gyur/ chu bo dang/ mtshodang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ ri khor yug dang/ ra reb lhun
po dang/ sab ro deng/ ri smug po rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur to// nyim dang/ zla ba dang/ nor bu dang/ ma dang/ rgyuskar dang/ gza'i 'od rnams kyang zil gyisi

mnan te mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal pos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de dga mthong ba dang/ sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngozhas ngo mtshan
du gyur nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi mtshon ma 'di lta bu 'di dag sus bkye lags nas gsol nas/ tshigs su bcad de zhung
tshu zhus pa// de ni su zhig mngon par sangs rgyas na// 'di ltar 'od zer chen po rab bkyi bas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jigartan gser gyi mdog tu gyur// stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang
de bzhin lags// dang ni su zhigarang dbang thob gyur na// ya mtshan rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu bskye nas// mtha' med sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab g.yos shing// lha klu gzhalamad khang rnams
mi bder gyur// su yi mthu lags rgyurkyenam rtogs pas// 'khor mang 'di dag thecos 'tshal gyur na// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjechen po yis// rdzu 'phrul 'di yi skye skyon bkas
bshad gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyad kyis bad reg par bya ste/ dang 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor 'dus pa 'dare byang chub somasadapa' sems dang ba chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod pa de/ sngon bskal pa tshad med panas byams pa chen po dang snying rje
chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa// gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa snyad shin du bsgoms shing mngon par bslabs par gyur pas/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i
phyire gsang ste bad lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'o stsal pa dang/ de nas byang chung sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dngang
phyug stan las langs te gos tshegs bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde lags su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
la lcags rjen pob sims zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags mchis te/ sems can mang po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba 'thob par gyi bdang/ bro nad thams cad
bsal bar bgyi bo dang/ tshor bun 'gyur pa dang/ phyug cing 'byor pa dang ldan par bgyi bo dang/ sdig pa ma dge ba'i sa dang/ khan ma tho ba lu be rnams yongs su sbyang
zhing bsal ba dang// sgrib pa'i bgegs rnams dang 'bral ba dang/ chos dkar po'i yon tan thams cad 'athal bar bgyi ba dang/ drag bab sa bon thams cad phunasum tshogs
bar bgyi ba dang/ 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bgyi ba dang/ re ba thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du deng bshad par 'tshal na/ bcom
ldan 'das thugs brtse bar dgongs te gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsalapa/ rigs kyi bu khyod snying rje chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba bdod
pa'i phyir rag sngags bshad par 'dod pas deng dus la bab kyis myur du sbos shag dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes thugs dgyes par mdzad do//
tshu bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs debang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags taM/ sngon byung
na/ bab bskal pa 'bum phragatshad ma mchis pa snyad 'das pa de'i tsho de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bodastong gi rgyal po zhi bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i thugs rjechen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs dra zhes bgyi ba gzungs
'di bka' stsalanas/ phyag gsar gyi kha dog can gyis bdag gi spyi bo la byugs te 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu khyod thugs rjechen po'i rig sngags 'di zung zhig dang/ ma'os
pa'i dus ngan pa ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba chen po byed par 'gyur ni/ zhes bka' stsal to// bdag de'i tshagados dang po la gnas pa las rig sngags 'di lan cig/
thos pa tsam gyis sa brgyad pa las yang dag par bdas par gyur lags so// badrag deb de'i dusanas nias rab tudagab zhange mgu bar gyur pa bsladadusmon lam 'daskad du btang lags te//
gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dusan sems can thams cad la snyan cing bde bar bgyid pa'i 'os su 'gyur yang dag pa zhig lags na/ dang bdag gi'us 'di nyid las lag pa stong dang mig stong tshang bar
'byung bar gyur ga/ cas smon lam btab ma thag tu lus las sug pa stong dang mig stong tshang bar byung bar gyur te/ phyogs bcugs chon po rnams kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par
gyur phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyisakyang 'od zer bkye bas bdag gzhes la reg cing phyogs bcuba'ajig rten gyi khams mthob ma mchis pa rnams kyang gsal bar
bgyis par gyur lags so// dengasan chadasas rgyusatshad ma mchis pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dag tugazungs bad yang dang yang du thos shing mngon sum du yang dag par blangs/
pa dang/ gzhan yang dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rangs patshad ma mchis pa bskyod pa'i bskal pa 'bum phragatshad ma mchis pasnyad kyi 'khor ba phra mo las yang dag par 'dus par gyur
lags so// dang slan chad gzungs 'di rtag par bdon cing yongs su bzung nas niam du'ang mibaskyud bar bgyis pa'islad du/ skyob thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas rnams kyistsa nasngar/
pad+malas rdzus te skyes pas mngal duskyabab lus blangs par ma gyur lags so// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyan ma bam/ khyo'u 'am/
bu mo gang la la zhig 'di'i don cing yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/ dang po kho nar bdag la stson la ma 'daskang gdab par bgyi legs so//
spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag sa chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dabang thugs rjechol phyag 'tshal lo// bdag
gis ma shes migan myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dngang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
thugs rje chal phyag batshal lo// bdag gsi thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshol 'go/ bdag na myur du shes rab gru yis
sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rdzache la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsholas bda' bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje la phyag 'tshal
la bdag gis myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thobashog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog/ spyan
ras gzigs dbang thugs rje chel phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyam phyin shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni myur
du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog/ bdag na rel grib re le 'dzag/ ral grib rinorengasIl shog/ bdaganamutshan phrad gyur na// chu tshan ma mur rang shog/ sems can
dmyal bar bdagasong na/ soms can dmyal ba rang bskams shog/ bdagan yi dgas gnas song na/ bkres skom dag na 'gras par shog/ bdag nilha min gnas
song na// ngan sems rang na dul bar shog/ bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na/ rang nyid shes rab che thob shog/ de skad du smon lam btab nas sems
mortse gcig tu bdag gi mang nas 'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de ba'ane gshags pa 'od dpag med rjes su dran par bgyis nas/ da'i rjes la gzungs
sngags 'di mtshan gcig la lan bdun tshang bar gdon par bgyisan/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong snyad du bakhor bar 'gyur ba'akhan ma tho ba'i lto b rnams yongasasu bsal cang 'byang bar 'gyur
lags so// bcom ldan 'das la nang bdaskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan bdas lha bam mi gangal la zhig thugs rje chen po'i tshig 'di bdon cang 'dzin par bgyis na/ 'chi ba'i dus

kyi tsho phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rgyongabar bgyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gangadu skye bar batshal ba ji ltar smon pa bzhin du de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/
lags so// bcom ldan 'das la yang bdaskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rjechan po bo rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ngan 'gro
tsha gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyuran/ bdaganam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar mi bgyi'o// thugs rjechen po'i rogi sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal tesangs rgyas kyi zhing khams
rnams su skye bar ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar ma bgyi'o// thugs rjechen po'i rigasngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tang de 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad/
ma mchis pa snyad thob par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// thugs rje chen po ba rige sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid lasmon
pa thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na/ snying rjechen pob sims kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtse gcigetu ma bgyis pa na ma gtogs
lags so// dud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus kyis yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal ba gang lags pa sa thugs rjechen pob sims kyis gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su
bzung ngas/ gal te bud med kyi dngos po lus yongs su gyur te/ skyes bab lus thob par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// the tshom gyi
bsam pa cung zad cig bskyod par gyur na gdon ma 'tshal bar gang smo na pa ba 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par ma 'gyur la gsaso// sems can gang la la zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang dkor

'phrog cing chud ma son pa de gang lags pa dedag na sangs rgyas stong 'jig rten du byang ba dag la 'gyod pas mthol zhing bshags na'ang 'byang zhing tshangs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i
rig sngags 'di bton pa tsam gyis de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ba lags te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal zas dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor nor
'phrog cing chud gson pa de dag na phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams mngon sum du gyur pa ba spyan sngar bshagasan gdod longs su btsung bar brgyur lags la/ thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'i
tsho tshe phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams der gshegs nas dbang mdzad par 'gyur bas kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams ma mchis
ba lnga dang/ gang zag la skur pa btab pa dang/ chos la skur pa btab pa dang/ gso sbyong bshag pa dang/ tshul khrims bshig pa dang/ mchod rten bshig pa dang/
gtsug lag khang bshig pa thams cad dang/ dge 'dun gyi dkor brgyus pa dang/ yongs su dag pab tshangs par spyod pa sun par bgyis pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa sdig pa'i las lci nga cir gyis/
ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// rig sngags 'di la the tshom btsal ba'i dngos po gcig ni ma gtogs te/ the tshog tshal bar gyur na than khan tho ba chung ba'i sa mang pa tsam

yus yang yongs su 'byang bar ma bgyuran/ kha na ma tho ba lci ba lta smos kyang ci'atshal lags/ khan ma tho ba lu ba dag yongs su 'byang bar ma bgyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub kyi rong nga'i rgyun
0 brgyud par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang ma gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po ba sems kyis rig sngags bde ba don cing
'dzan pa de dag ni dge ba'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga 'thob par 'gyur zhing/ gshis ngan du 'chi ba rnam pa bcolta len par mi 'gyur lags so// gshis ngan du 'chibar mi 'gyur ba de dang 'di lta ste/
gang zag de bkres pas nayon mongs te 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ mtshon cha dang lcag dbyug gis 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ khon mchis pa'i dgra'i sug par bgyi bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ g.yul
ngor 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ stag dang/ sbyang ka dang/ gcan gzanam rungs pa'i khar 'chi bar ni 'gyur ba dang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ rtsangs pa dang/ sdig pa'i khar
'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ chab dang zhugs kyi nang du 'byang zhing tsheg sta 'chibar ma'agyur ba dang/ dug gis 'chibar mi 'gyur ba dang/ byad stams kyis 'chi ba'i dus brgyad par mi 'gyur
ba dang/ smyos nas dran pa nyams te 'chi bar ma 'gyur ba dang/ radang/ ljon shing dang/ ngam grog dang/ g.yangs nas lhung ste 'chi bar ma 'a gyur ba dang/ ma ma rungs pa'i khyad
kyis 'chibar mi 'gyur ba dang/ log bab badre gdon ma rungs pas glags rnyed de bachi bab dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang/ da ngan pas lus la dkris te bachi ba'i dus brgyad par mi 'gyur ba dang
mi ma lags pas bdag nyid la gnod pa bgyis te bachi 'dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags te// thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par
bgyid pa de dag ni gshis ngan du 'chib rnam pa bcol po 'di dag gis 'chi ba dus 'gyod par mi 'gyur lags so// dgo ba'i skya ba rnam pa bco lnga po thob par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ skye ba thams
cad du rgyal bo dge ba dang mjal bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtag par yul dge bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtag par dus bzang bo dang mdza' bar 'gyur ba dang/ rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
mjal bar 'gyurapa dang/ rtag par lus kyi dbang po tshang bar bgyur ba dang/ lam gyi sems la goms par 'gyur ba dang/ sdom pab tshul khrims nyams pa mdegyid pa dang/ 'khor rnams drin gyis
'dre zhing bdun par 'gyur ba dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo khyad rnams rtag par 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag par gzhan gyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang/ yo byad bdog pa
rnams gzhan gyis 'phrog par ma 'gyur ba dang/ yid la smon pa rnams bsams pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur pa dang/ lha dang klu dag ba rnams kyis rtag tu srung zhing yongs su skyob par
'gyur ba dang/ skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyus mthong zhing chos thos par 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag pa'i chos thos nas don zab mo rtogos par 'gyur ba dag lags te/ lha'am mo gang la/
la zhag thugs rje chen po soms kyis rtag tu gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par brgyud pa gang lags pa de dag ni dge ba'i skya pa rnam pa bcolnga po 'di dag thob par bgyid par 'gyur pas/ lha dang
mi thams cad kyis rtag dang ra bton nas yongs su gzung bar bgyi 'a la bsung du ra mi bgyi go/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad sa smras nas/ 'khor
