'dus pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams ba snying rje chen pob soms bskyod de/ 'dzul pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa ma mingab ba'i thugs chen po bsems rgya cher
yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig rgyanom pa 'dirig smras so/ na mo rat+na tra yAl/ nam Arab kotishar ya/ bo d+hisataa/ ma hAsatwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya//
tad+ya thA/ o saphabanad+han tshod na ka rwaya/ sam+bapA bas mudots+tsha4tshakarAya/ sarbapA d+hab+heshaman kerAya/ sam+baa tum dra ba cha shanaka rA ya/ sam+bab+ha ya wAtAr NAkarA ya//
tas+ya/ na mas+saMtA a do Ar+ya ba la ka shA rA ya/ ta banA lo kaNAnAm pa ra ma sdod ya/ ma brtayi shus/ sarba am+ba d+hanaM/ shu b+ha tseta naM/ sarba b+hUtAnaM/ pA pa mArgabapesho d+ha kaM
tad+ya thA/ A lo ke/ a d+ho pa ti/ la ka a ti kAn+te/ e tsa him d+ha bo d+hi satwA/ ha bo d+hisatwaM/ ho ma hA bo d+hasetA/ hi pra ya bo d+hi satra/ hom hA kA ru Nika ma hA sma ra sdod maM/
a bye ha Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ pa ram ma tItsit+tikA ru ke/ ku ru ku ru/ karmasA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ ba rten de nyid hi/ ma a raM gamaM gam/ ba haM gam//
sad lha yo gi pishAr/ du hu du hu/ pAn+ti/ ma hAbAr+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha na/ d+ha re shAr/ tsa la tsa la/ bi ma lanAte/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra/ dza ni kr-iSh+ThadzaTA mu ku Ta/ a laM kaM
sha rir/ lob phra lo ba ba lo ba/ ma hAsid+d+hA ba churnyan(bal ba la/ ma hA ba lo/ ma la ma la/ ma hA malo/ tsal rtsol/ mahA tsal/ kr-iSh+ThabaN/ kr-iSh+Thapak+Sha/
kr-iShA da// naglu tan/ ha pad+ma ha/ tsar tsaran/ phashAr kr-ilcasakr-i ta yatshopa bI ta/ a tso him hA bA rA hanu kha/ tra pu ra da ha pany+tsar/ nArAya Na ba la rU pa de kha rgyur/ hanA
la kaSh+Tha/ a ste/ mahAhal hal/ bakhe ri dzati/ la kas+ya/ rAg baneshanaM/ de 'baDis mnanaM/ mo rab banAnaM/ namokAN hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/
su sunu gu/ 'dul ragul/ hAl hA/ ma hApad+ma nAb+ha/ sa ris ra/ si gisor/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+ha bu rgyu/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha la/ bod+hayAm tabanA'i kats+tshA/ a rtse
hikA ma sbi ta ma hAsihanu kha/ ha sa has mulcamuny+tsa/ ma hAts+tshartsamas+ya/ e byahi b+ho b+ho ma hAsid+d+hapo shA rab+ha Nab+ha NapA tsa sAd+ha yosArgu/ bton sma'i smaratuM/ ha b+ha gakhan
kakaka hU~M/ ta thA ga tAnId rA hi ma dar na kA ma gya dmAnaM/ pra sA d+ha ya ma swA hA/ sid+d+hi ma sA hA/ ma h+phasid+d+hi a sAhA/ sid+d+hi yo gAshar yasahA/ nAl kaNA ya swA hA/
bArAhanu'am sAhU~M/ ma rab rAha mu khA ya swA hA/ nar saM henu 'a yasA hA/ ma hAnasaMhamu khA ya swA hA/ 'dza?haste ya sAhA/ ma hA badzrahasU lasatA/ sid d+hab+hAhu d+haMnAyasA hA/

ma pasade d+ha btits+tshar ya swA hA/ pad+ma has ya sAhA/ ma hA pad+ma has ya mAhA/ kr-ilcasarbakr-i ta ya pa bA tI ya sAt+tA/ ma hAnaM lA mu ku Ta d+harAyasAhA/ tsakAyu d+ha d+ha rA ya swAhA/ shi kha
gad+dani ts+tshad naka ra aAhA/ bo d+han kirAya sAhA/ pA ma skan deshaspyi ta kr-it+ta dzanIm sA hA/ ba mahastabya glu tsamanabA san ya swA hA/ lo ki shwa rAyapahA/ ma d+hA la kih+pha rAyaswAhA/
sarbasid+d+hishar ms raMrakAnaMswA hA/ kuru rakA mut+tAnaMswAhA/ namo b+ha ga ba te Atsub lako shA rA ya/ bo d+hi seTe ya/ ma hAsan+d+hAya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sidi rgyun tu
ma man+d+ha pA danisAnA/ byang chub sems dang bsems dpa' chen po 'a phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'dis ma thag dus chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/
lha rnams kyis kyang nan po che'i ma tog gi char mngon bar phab par gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sas rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su thugs dgyes par gyur/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can
rnams na'ajigs shang sdangs nas spu zing zhes byed par gyur/ bzhor 'dus pa mang po thams cad las kha ga gsan rkyen du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig/
gis nilan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ khacig gisan phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gsan dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ kha cig gis
nas dang po dang/ sa gnyis pa dang/ sa gsum pa dang/ sa bzhi pa dang/ sa lnga pa thob par gyur nas/ sa bcu pa 'ber du thob par gyur/ sems can tshadamed pa stod
na byang chub tu sems bsnyad par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa chen postan las langs te gos tshogs bcos nas gus par thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces skyasaso// kye skyes bu chen po legs so// bdagags sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshags pa 'dus pa tshad med pa stod dag tu chos rnam pa sna
tshogs dang/ gzungs rnam pa sna tshogs thos par gyur mod kyi/ sngon chad nam yang thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rjechen po bsems kyi gzungs chen mo'i rig sngags kyitshig gya nom pa 'di
tshu lta bu thos par ma gyur na/ skyes bu chen po khyod kyis bdag la gzungs bde ba dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad du gsol// bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams shin tuthos par mos so//
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas tshangs pa chen po la sbas pa/ lhab rgyal po khyod thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyi'i de skad du dris pa yin pas//
deng khyod legs par nyon cig dang/ bdag gis khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas skyas pa/ de ni snying rje chen po'i soms
yin mnyam bltasams yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi sogs lan/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sems yin/ stong pa nyid du lta ba'isams yin/ gus pa'i sems yin/
dam pabasams yin/ 'dresapa med pa'i soms yin/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin te/ de lta bu basams gang yin pa de dgan gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya ste/
khyod kyis 'di kho na bzhin du ma ngon par bsgrub par bya'o// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos sas pa/ bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams ni deng gdod gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa khong du chud
par gyur pas/ deng phyin chad yongs su bzung nas brjod par bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi/
bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa des byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po bskyod nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'dab bar dam bca'
yang dag par blang bar bya'o// bdag nyid gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nias sems can rnams la mnyam ba'i sams bskyed nas// rtag par rig sngags 'di rgyun
! chad pa med par gdon bar bya'o// gnas khang gtsang ba nang du 'dug ste/ yongs su dag khar zhus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te ba dan stsas mar me sbar// spos dang/ me tog
dang zhal zas kyis mchod pa byas nas sems rtsegacig tu gtad// dmags pa tha dad ba gzhan la ma dmigs pan chos bzhin du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ deb tsho byang/
zla chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od lta rang drang srong tshad med pa spyod dag der lhags nas dbang byed cing mngon rtags kyang ston par gyur la/ bdag kyang de'i tshomig
stong gse de la lta bar byed/ lag pa stong gse na de la yongs su bsrung nang bya de gyis rlob pa byed pas/ 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag ji snyed ba de dag kyang yongs su bzhi par 'gyur/ mu

stags can gyi chos kyi tshog dang sbyang ji snyed pa thams cad kyang rtogs shing khong du chud bar 'gyur ro// rigasngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa des na 'jigartenanagadon nad
rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yodapa dag gsos nas 'tsho bar byed do// badre srin thams cad la dbang byed cing lha'i bu'i bdud rnams kyang 'dul bar byed/ mu stegs can rnams kyang tshar gcod/
bar byed do// gal te ra'i ma dgon pa na gnas te mdo sde kha ton du 'don pa dang bsamasagatan sgom pa na/ ri'i lha dang 'dre srin gnod pa byed pa dag nan gyis rgyal ka byas nas mas mnyam
par gzhag tu ma rung bar gyuran/ rig sngags 'di lan cig bzlas pa byas n 'dresIn de dag thams cad 'chingar 'gyur ro// gal te chos bzhin du bzlas brjod byas te sems can rnams la snyinge
brtse ba'i sams bskyed par gyur na/ bdag kyang de'i tshodage ba'i lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang/ lag na rdo rjegasang ba pa rnams la rtag par de'i rjes su 'brang zhing yongs su srung ba
gyis shig/ de'i lta 'khor na gnas nas mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du yongs su srungasapashig/ rang gi srog gi dbang po bzhin du yongs su skyobs shig ces bsgo bar 'gyur ro// gang dag la
bsgo bar byed pa bstan pa'i phur tshigs su bcad de smas pa/ bdag gis gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje'achang// bdud rtsi'akhyil ba sma brtsegs lcags kyu can// stobs ldan shang ka ra dang sde
brgyad dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzan srung bar byed// bdag gis dbang phyug dang ni mthu chen dang// ku ba ra dadasar skya'i khedag po drag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar
byed/ bdag gis nor srung dang nitshulhadang// dge rgyas dang ni pa tsi tradag/ btang nas rtag dugazungs 'dzan srung bar byed// bdag gse sa saratsadang ma hAr// ku lan tan ta dang ni/
lngas rtsen dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs badzanasrung bar byed// bdag gas pa pa ka la'i rgyal po dang// dpal ldan bya ta dang ni sar hUr// btang nas rtag tu
mag zungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis tshangs pa dang na sam ba ra/ gnas gtsang sde lnga dag dang mtsho ma dag ba tang nas rtag dugazungs 'dzani srung bar byed// bdag gis brgyabyan
sum cu rtsa gsum lha// spobs chen dpal ldan dang nas tan// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzanasrung bar byed// bdag gse rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang ni// ma mo lha la sogs pa
mthu chen 'khor// btang nas rtag du gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gas rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang ni// mig mi bzang dang rnam thos bu dag kyang// btang nas rtag tu
gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis gsar ma dog rma bya'i rgyal po dang// sde dpon skyishu brgyad dang drang srong 'khor// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag
gsanor bu bzang po dag dang ni// sde dpon chen po sa 'dzani pu la pa// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis dga' bo dang na bsnyen dga' bo// klu rgyal rgya
mtshodang na e la 'a 'dab// btang nas rtag tugazungs 'dzanasrung bar byed// bdag gis lha ma yin dang dri za dang// mkha' lding ma 'am ci dang lto 'phye rnams// btang nas/
rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis chu dang me dang glog gi lha// grul bum bdag po dang ni sha ba dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzan srung bar byed// dge ba'i/
lha de dag dang/ klu'i rgyal bo dang/ ma mo la sogs pa de dag kyang so so nas 'khor lnga brgyadang bcas pa dad/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis kyang rtag par thug/
rje chen po ba rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de la yongs su srung zhung skyob par byed pas/ gang zag de ra deng dgon pa na gcig pu nyal bar gyur pa na'ang dge ba'i lha de dag res
kyis mtshan mo de la bsrungs nas bgegs dang bar chad yongs su sil bar byed do// gal te gcong rong dag du gnas te lam stor bar gyur pa las dge sngags 'di bzlas par gyuran//
de'i dbang gis dag ba'i lha dang klu'i rgyal po dag dag ba'i mi'i gzugs su mngon par stsal nas lam yang dag pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro// gal te ra dang/ nags tshal dang/
dgon pa dag tu gnas pa las chu dang me dag gis 'phongs par gyurana'ang klu'i rgyal po dag gis yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir chudang me dag mngon par sbyal bar 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems
dpa la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzus 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag ga tshod du gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir shin tupasal ba'i tshigs su
bcad pa 'di deg smras so// gapa nage ra dang 'brog dgon song ba las// stag dang sbyang ka gcan gzan gtum po dang// rtsings pa sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang//
mgazungs 'di bden pa thos na gnod ma rkus// gang zhig chu bo rgyu mtshor zhugs pa las/ gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs pa/ gnod sbyin srin po nya dang rus sbal dag/ gzungs
'di thos nas so sor 'byed par 'gyur// gang zhig g.yul sprod ngag yas bskor ba 'am/ chom rkun ma rungs nor ni phyogs pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rjechen po'i gzungs bzlas
na// de dag brtse sems bskyed nas ldog par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thogs pa dang/ lcags slog khong sgrol btson rar chud pa ba tsho// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i
gzungs bzlas na// rgyal pos brtse sems kyis na gtong bar 'gyur// gang zhig byed snyams dug mda'i khyim zhugs te// zas skom dug can gyis ni gsad pa'i tshe// rtse gcig
thugs rjechen po'i gzungs bzlas na// dug nyid zil dngaraN+Das skom nyid du 'gyur// bud med sbrum ma bu nubatsa' ba'i tshe// bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal ma bzong tshe//
rtse gcig thugs rjechen po ba gzungs bzlas na// 'dre gdon byeranas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur// klugadon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas// tshaba'i nad kyis nyen
[z/]nas 'chin nye tsho// rtsagacig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// rimasand bsal nas tshod de bar 'gyur// klu gdon rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang// shu 'bras mi bzad
rnag khrag 'dzag pa ba tsho// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// mchil ma lan gsum phyogs pas skrangs pa zhi/ sems can rtog pas mi dge bskyod pas na// khyad
stoms sngags dang dgras ni gtsos pa'i tshe// rtsa gcig thugs rje chen po' gicungs bzlasan// snyoms gnod de kun gtong ba'i mi la 'du// sdig 'phel snyagis mas dam chos
'jib ga pa na// 'dod pa'i ma chen sems ni rmongs log pas// khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod non nas// zhi mtshan leg bsam rgyunan mo 'chad tshe// gang zhig thugs rje
chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i ma zhi log pa bsoms bsal 'gyur// bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyus brjod na// bskul par rjod kyang mthar thug yong
ma 'gyur// rigasngags 'dalan lnga bzlas te tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa pa'i mdud nas mgul du gdags par bya'o// gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyad kyis gsungs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su ma
rdzogs pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyi'i dang/ byang chub sems ma bskyod pa dag myur du byang chub tu sems bskyod par bya ba'i phyir dang/ nyan thos kyi gang zag

zla gang dag 'bras bu mngon du ma byas pa de dag myur du mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pob 'jig rten gyi khams na drang srong gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tusems na bskyed dang
dag myur dusams bskyod par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can gang dag theg pa chen po 'di la dad pa'i dbang po ma thob pa dag gzungs 'da'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus theg pa chen po' sa bonadang
chos kyatshu gu 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin pas/ bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje'i mthus de dag gi ci dang rtsa 'dod pa thams cad 'byor/
bar byed do// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen pob 'jig rten gyi khams na mun nag gi gnas su ngan 'gro gsum po'i sems can ji snyad gnas pa dag bdag gi rig sngags 'di thos
par gyur na thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa dag ni skyur du thob par 'gyur la/ sa bcu pa'i bar du'ang ma thob pa thob
par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis 'i bar du'ang phyin par byed pa ni phyi re mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpo byad brgyad su'ang rang gi ngang gis 'thob par 'gyur// gal te
nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag gzungs 'di rna bar lan cig thos par gyur tam/ gzungs 'ad spyod cing yi ger bris sam/ drang po bsems kyis chos bzhin du gnas par byed na//
dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ma btsal bar rang gi ngang gis thob par bgyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ni dang/ chu klung dang/ brag dang/ rgya mtsho
chen po bzhi'i chu jisnyad pa dag kyang g.yo zhing 'khol bar nus so// ri rab lhun po nas/ ra khor yug gi bar dag kyang g.yo zhung rdul phran bzhin du 'jig par nus so// den gnas
pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyang thams cad blon med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod par nus so// sems can gang dag tsho'anganyid la smon pa rnanas mngon par 'grub par 'dodan/ zhag
nyi'u rtsa gcig gi bar du gso sbyong dang tshul zams la gnas nas gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas n gdon mi za bar smon ba rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i mtha' nas 'khor
bab mthar thug pa'i bar du'ang sdog pa'i las thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nang dang phyi rolan/ sangs rgyas
dang [0f10 ]byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lha dang/ drang srong dang/ klu'i rgyal po ji snyed
gnas pa thams cad kyis kyang mkhyon cing shes par 'gyur ro// lha 'am ma gang yang rung ste gzungs 'ad 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dgachu klung ngan rgya mtshor zhugs/
khrus byas pa las/ de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i dus lus la reg par gyuran/ sgrig pa'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba thums cad yongs su byang nas zhing
yongs su dag pa dag tu pad+ma las rdzus te skya bar 'gyur bas/ mngal dang/ drod gsher dang/ sgo nga las skyes pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur na/ len pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang//
klog pa dang/ kha ton du 'don pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gzungs 'do 'don cing yongs su 'dzan pa de dag lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te/ gang zagarag lus par
spu dang/ skya dang/ gos 'bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de'i rdzi phyogs su song ba'asoms can gzhan gyi lus la dreg par gyur na/ de dag gi sgring pa dang sdig pa 'i sa lci ba thams cad ma
lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas/ yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing/ rtag par sas rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bsan yongs su 'dzin
pa de dag gi bsod nams dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pan bsam gyis ma khyab par mgi par bya'o/ gzungs 'ad bzlas brjod byed pa'i 'anas jicom dutshig tubarjod pa byung ba dga' ng rung/
mi dga' ng rung ste/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang/ mu stegs can dang/ lce dang/ klu dang/ 'dre srin thams cad kyis thos par gyur na de dag thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi
dbyings nyid du bsgyur bas/ de lasangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i so mas bskyed nas bkur sti dang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'dape don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de
d gnas nigs rgyas kyi sku'i gter nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye masong rnams kyis 'phangasashing gaces par mdzad pa'i phyire go/ gang
zag de ni 'od can gyi 'os kyi gter yin pa rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni byams pa dang snying rje'i
gten yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di ltar gzungs kyis sems can yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de naden pa'i chos kyi sngo stod yin ban rig par bya ste/
gzus kyi sgo thams cad kun sdud par byed pa'i phyire'o// gang zag dra na bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rnams rtag pan
nangon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ninam mkha' mdzod yonepa' rig par bya ste/ rtag par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis soms can la lta ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni 'bri
[z/ ]ka/ pa med pa'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ lha dang/ klu dang/ dge ba'i lha rnams rtag par yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de na dem pab tshig
sma mdzod yin par 'gi par byatsu/ kha nas gzungs kyi sgra 'byung pa la rgyun chadu ba med pa'i phyir/ gang zag de ni rtag par gnas pa'i gtor yin par rig par bya ste/ 'jigs pa gsum gyi
bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ gang zag de na rnam par grol ba'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ lha 'bub bdud dang mu stegs can rnams kyis bshol bar ma nus
pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ rtog par gzungs kyis sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad gso ba'i phyir ro/ gang zag de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas
par ma 'gyur ro/

su dag par bcad de su dag par bcad de/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal rgya'i lo ngasauskyo nas tshe ring ba'i smad yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas dben nga 'i gnas su 'dug nas mtshams yongs
gos la sngags kyis btab nas bgo bar bya'o// chudang/ zas dang/ spos dang/ sman rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste spyod
par byed na gdon mi za bar tshering bar 'gyur ro// gal te chos bzhin du mtshams bcad de chos bzhin du yongs su 'dzin par byed na thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te//
de la mtshams gcad pa ba choganiral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btang ste/ sa la ra mo bris nas mtshams gcad par bya'o// yang na chugatsang mo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/
sngags kyis btab nas phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/ yang na yus kar la lan tshishu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhi'i gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o//
yang na 'du shes kyis gang du phyin pa tshun chad mtshams su 'gyur ro// yang n thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshan sagacad par bya'o// yang na tshon sna lnga'i
skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btabaste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams bcad bar bya'o// de ltar chos bzhin du bad yongs su 'dzinapar rgyuganarang gi ngang gis 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur
ro// gzungs 'dabo meng thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyad kyi 'khor pa'i lanag tho ba'i lce de rnams yongs su 'byang bag 'gyu na/ 'don pa dang 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/
rig sngags 'di bden pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni sas rgyas tshad med pasnyad la mchod cingadzam gro byas la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o// gang dag sems can sdug/
bsngal gyi bgegs la yongs su 'dren pa'i ched du chos bzhin du bden pa gang yin pa de dag na/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas rang por ma thogs par mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya ba/

ma 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// citsam du sems can snang ngo cog gi ched du bzlas brjod byas te/ de dag gi rna lam du grag par byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed na/ gang zag de dag yon tan tshad
mdadapag tu med pa dag 'thob par 'gyur bas brjod kyis mi lang ngo// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tusems dang lus gso sbyong dang/ tshul khrims la gnas nas/ sems can thams
cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nus byas pa'i sdig pa las rnam pa sna tshogs 'tholabashags te/ lanas gzungs 'di myur du
bzlas brjod byas nas sgra rgyun chad ba med par byas na/ dge sbyong gi 'brus bu bzhi po de dag mo'ang nyode la 'thob par 'gyur ro dbang po rnon po shes rab dang ldan pa sgom pa'i thabs la mkhas
pa zhig yin na na sa bcu'i bras bu'ang dka' ba med par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa phran tshegs yongs su gnyer ba tsam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos
ti[0f10 ]de'ang byang chub sems dpa' song rdzachan po dang/ smon lam gyi mthu shing tu zab pa'i phyir dang/ gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu rgya chab 'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na deb ul de ba rgyal pos yang dag pa'i chos kyis yul badzan cang ma rnams bag yangs su bkod de/ sems can stams las mi
gcod cing nyes pa byung ba rnams yongs su bskyabs nas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyis brtson brgyusabaskyed de/ thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs sngags 'di bdon par byed na/
yul de'i gnod pa dang bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal bar 'gyur/ 'bru rnams 'gas shing mi mang po bde bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra dag yang nas
yang du 'ongs te gtsas pas 'bangs mang po ma bde bar gyur tam/ blon po[&]na pos sku bshams nas log par gyur tam/ rims nad byung bar gyur tam/ than chon byung bar
gyur tam/ nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byung bar gyuran/ deb tshosnying rjechen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas nas de'i phyogs su kha bstan to/
spos dang/ me tog dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rin po che'i spyir rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ ro brgyadang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis sems rtse gcig tumachod par bya'o//
gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus bskyod de/ gzus kyi tshog gya nom pa 'di 'don bar byed na/ phas kyi rig rnams rang dul bar gyur nas slar
logs so so nas tshul bzhin du yul skyong zhing/ ul yang 'dre bar gnas par byams pa soms kyis phan tshun gcig la gcig lta bar 'gyur/ rgyal bu dang blon po
tsha rnams kyang su zhu dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur/ btsun mo dang sras rnams kyang rgyal po la sri zhu dang bsnyen bkur byed nga ra 'gyur/ lha dang/ klu dang/ 'dra srin rnams kyang yul desrung
zhing skyong bar 'gyur/ char chu dus bzhwani du babab cing 'bru rnams legs pas mi mang po rnams kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyim du nad chen ma rungs pa dang phrad par gyur
tam ltas ngan sna tshogs byung kar gyur tam/ 'dre suni dwang leg pa'i bdud rnams kyis khyi ma dkrugs par gyur tam// ma ma rus pa dag gis kyang skur btab nas sku bshams
te gnod pa byas par gyur tam/ khyos ma che chung rnams phyi nang ma 'dus par gyur na/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdunadu dkyil 'khor byas
nas sems rtse gag tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid 'a byas nas gzungs sngags 'di lan stong tsang bar bzlasan/ gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa
de dag thams cad yongs su 'byang bar bgyur ro// khacom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// ba
'di'i mang ci lags/ ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa// kun dga' bo ragi sngags 'ad lamang rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ rgya cher
yongasasu rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o// thogs pa med pa ba thugs rjecha na po zhes kyang bya'o// sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// tshabasringe ba'i gzungs
zhes kyang bya'o// ngan 'gro yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// las kyi sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ smon pa rnanas yongasasu rdzogs pa/ra byed
nga'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// sanas kyi rjes su rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// sa gong ma rnams las myur du bda' ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya ste/ de ltar yongs su
gardungs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' dos bde skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chungasonas dwapa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci
lags na/ 'di lta bu'i gzus bstan pa la mkhas par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chubusems dpa' bde'i ming ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces
kyang bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o// 'od stong pa ba mig can zhes kyang bya ste// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i ming dang/
gzarjod dang/ mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ mtshan yang
de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa ba chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin yang/ thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus
tsho mngon ru bstan pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyad dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ lha dang/ klu rnams kyis gus pas
! bkur sti byas nas brnyas par mi bya'o// lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te/ sems rtse gcig tumang nas rjod par byed na bsod nams tshad med pasnyad 'thob par 'gyur/
kha na ma tho ba tshad med pa snyad yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ tsho 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo gal te rinapor sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shang phyug por 'gyur bar 'dod na yodra bzhin gyi nor bub lag la mchod pa bya'o// mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs
pa kyis gtsos par gyur na zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod de// khong par nad rnams yod par gyur na rin po rab lhung bzed thogs pab lag la mchod do// 'dre gdon thams cad/
gdul bar 'dod na'an po che'aril gri thogs pa'i 'og la mchod do// lta ba du'i bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// phas kyi rgol ba'i drag gzhom par/
'dod na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// 'jigasashang bag tshapa'i gnas thams cad las sman par 'dod na 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa' yug la mchod do// mig mi gsal te bod
dang mi ldan par gyuran me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod de// tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsal bar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa ba 'a ga la mchod do// blo thabs 'thon por
'dod na ran po cha' gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// grogs bo mdza' bshes dang myur du phud par 'dod na ran po mgo mda' thugs pa ba lag la mchod de// lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs
par gyur na lcag ma thogs pa lag la mchod do// lus kyi bgegs ma rungs pa ngasal bar 'dod na rje yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du gyur par
'dod na dum po thogs pa 'a 'og la mchod do// stag dang/ 'phar spyang dang/ dom dred dang/ gcan gazanam rungs pa thams cad spong bar 'dod na phub thogs pa'i lag la mchodado/
gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal po'i bgags las thar par 'dod na dgra sta thogs pa'i lag la mchod de// bu dang/ bu mo dang/ g.yog 'khor gyi phyi'i yil gyi gdub kor thog pa'i leg la mchod do//yon
tana rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye napad+mo dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'dodan pad+mo sngon bo thogs pab lag la mchod do// she
ts+tsha rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po cha'i ma long thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du mthong bar bdodan pad+ma dmar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod
de sa'i gtan 'byon par 'dod na rin po chatha ma tog thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// drang srong gi lam mngon par 'grub par 'dod na spyi sna lnga thogs pa ba'i gra la mchod do// tshangs par skya
bar 'dod na dal ba thegs pa'i lag la mchod do// lha'i gzhal med khang duskyabar bdongan pad+ma le brgan thogs pa'i lag la mchodado// phyogs gzhan gyi dgra phyi'i rgol ba bsal bar 'dodan ral

gri dang mdung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// dag pa'i lha 'dre thams cad dgug par 'dod na ran po cha' mdung thogs pa ba la ga la mchod de// lha 'dre thams cad 'khol bar 'dod na thod pa ga 'khar ba thogs
pab lag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur du gshegs nas phyugags byug par 'dod na bgrang 'phreng badzinapa'i 'og la mchod do// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog dam pa thams cad mngon

tsha par grub par 'dod na rin po tsha'i dril bu thogs pa'i log la mchodado// tshig gi sngongs pa gya nom pa dang ldan par bdod na na po che'i phyag rgya thogs pab lagal mchod do// dag bab lha dang klu rnams
rtag par 'ongs te srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'dod na lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag la mchod de// byams pa dang snying rjesems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'dod na 'khar gsal thegs pa'i
lag la mchod do// sems can thamasacad kyis rtag par phan tshun gus pas bsnyen bkur byed cing brtse bar soms par 'dod na glal mo sbyar ba'i lag la mchod do// skya bskye gnas thams
cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i log la mchod do// skye ba tshe rabs thams cad du rtag par de bzhin gshegs pahA pho brang du
gnas nas mngal gyi snying por skye bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod na sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// mang du thos pa'i shes pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na ran po cha'i mdo sde'i
glegs bam thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// da ltar gyi lus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thug pa'i bar du rtag par byang chub kyi sems las ldog par ma 'gyurab r 'dod na phyir mi ldog pa'i gson
gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'ade bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo nastsal pa'i sangs rgyas
thogs pa' lag la mchod do// shing thog dang 'bru rnams grub par 'dod na rkun 'thum phogs pa'i lag la mchod do// de ltar M mngon par sgrub pa'i tshig stong yod kyang/ deng mdor bsdus/
@#// gnas mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu yongs su dang bsoms kyis gzung bad zung la/
'dzamakhub gling du rgya cher yongs su spel nas rgyun mi 'chad par byago/ gzungs 'di khams gsum gyi sems can nad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pas/
gzungs 'das yongs su gsos nam 'tshong gang yang med do// rig sngags chen mo 'disashing skam po la btaba'ang yal ga dang/ 'o ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur
zla na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa/[Q]sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnam/sa gsos na mi 'tsho ba'i gnas nges par nad do/ rigs kyi bu gzungs/

'di'i khyon gyi rlabs dang mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang mthar thug par ma 'gyur ro// sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas dag ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen bskyed pa na 'di rgyun ji'i ni de tsam
mang thos par mi 'gyuran/ mngon du mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lho dang/ mdeng/ glu la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po rgyud rnams ngas gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas
thams cad kyis rjes su yi rangs par bya'o// gang la la zhig gis rig sngags bdal skur pa btab par gyur na gdab klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mnyid kyi sangs rgyas de dag la
skur ba btab par brgyu// gal te gzungs 'dal thetsom dang 'di na chos pa rgyas par gyur na/ nga'og deniban yon chen bo dang gtan dudabral bar gyur pas bskal pa khargya stongasnyad dudan
'gror 'khor zhing 'byung ba'adus med de/ rtog mar sangs rgyas kyang ma mthong/ chos kyang ma byos/ dge 'dun mang mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub
soms dar ba sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lha dang/ glu dang/ badresAn thams cad
bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas/ thams cad kyis rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas bka' yang dag par blangs nas mngon ngarasgrub par gyur to// de nas byang
chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis thugs rjechen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du rig sngags chon po 'dis so// namo but+tagur ba/ na mo d+him+mom hA te/ na masaM g+hA ya ti/
dri bu pas rdzu taM nam/ rig sngags 'di bton na kho nam tho ba thams cadra yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bdud slong bar byed/ bgags rnams sal bar 'gyur bas lan re bton nasasangs rgyas la
phyag 'tshal lan re byago/ de bzhin du nyin re bzhin dus gsum du rtag sngags bzlas nas sangs rgyas la phyag byas na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye ba thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan shan/
tu mdzes pa re re ba 'bras bu rnam par sman pa thob par brgyur go/ byang chub sems dpa' zla bod kyas kyang rnal 'byon pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyi'i gzungs 'di
lcasaso// sin ti ti du so3/ a dzA ma te a tuny+tsa/ sin khiti pa la ti// a ma dzA tu o d+huwA/ kul taN+Di'i many+dzas sh+tsa/ rig sngags 'di lan ldabazlas nas tshon sna lnga'i skudar la
sngags mdud byas to/ gang dun bar gdags par bya// rig sngags bad ni be das pa bsas rgyas gdab krung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyid kyis gsungs pa yin pas/ deng bdagagasikyang nal
sgra'abyon pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang/ bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang/ nad ma rungs pa thams cad yongs su bas la 'bamyor dang/ dag bab chos thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang/ 'jigs shing skyag pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyi'i bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bston ba'i rog sngags 'don yang dag par bdenato mi bden pa tsa'ang mad do/ byang chub sems dpar 'di'i drung du 'ong bar 'dod
na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs na byang chubs mas dang ba 'ong bar 'gyur// gang la la zhig myo labagedon gyis zin par gyuran byi la'i mgo rus bsreg
pa'i thal ba sa gtsang ma dang bsres te/ 'jim pa la khyi la'i gzugs byas nas/mag stong pa ba gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo kri gtsang ma la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ dum
bu brgya rtsa brgyad du bcad nas sngags lan re gdon cing de'i ming nas lan re brjod na gtan du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ khyad snyoms kyis phog par gyuran gu gul dang ga pur cha mnyam pa
byas te/ khron pa'i chugatsang ma bre gang dang bsres nas bsko late phul gang tsam lus pa blangs nas/ mag stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste 'thud
na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gal te sdig pa dang sbrul gyis zin par rgyun bcar 'dzu ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste mkhar bskus na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi ma rungs
ba dag gis rkubashams nas gnod pa byas par gyur nas gtsang ma 'am/ bag zan nam/ smratshol la pha rol po ba gzugs byus te/ mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ra mo ba grol
lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re brjod de lanar gtugs nas yu rol gyi ming nas brjod d/ srogs zinanas dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du byas na pha rol bo dgag zhangs
'tsho ba'i bar du gus pas bkur zhing byams par 'gyur ro// gang dag migand kyis datab ste mge gi 'bras bunyams par gyur tam/ mdongs par gyur tam[ ]ma gsal da ra
gyur tam/ lang tog dkar po dang dmar po dag gis khengs te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/ a ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ skya rur 'brum bu re zhib tu btags te/ 'thab
pa'i tshog tsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med pa/sar du du btsas pa dang/ khyi dang/ phag rnams bsnyen par ma bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod sbrang rtsi dkar bo dang ni'i lam
dang sbyar nas mig la bsku bar byago/ 'o na debang du khye'u btsas pa'i sku zho 'gi/ bu mo btsas pa ni don mi rung ngo// sman da sgyur bani nas kyang mig stong pa ba gzugs kyi mdun du
rgyu lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab sku/ mag la bsus nas zhag bdun gyi bar du khang pa dban par rlung bsus na mag gi 'bras bu skyo ba'agyur pas/ lang tog sngon po dang dkar po
bsal te gsal brgyus par 'gyur go/ gang dag gdon rnams kyis btab ste myos par gyuran stag dung/ bo phar ba dang/ spyang ki'i rigs pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab
ste lus la bgosan sos par 'gyur go/ gal te sbrul gyis zin par gyur na gang zin pa'i mo da'i rna spabs blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mkhas blun nasos
par 'gyur ro// gzer thabs ma rungs pas snying la gzir te bgyi'i thugan ka phyi ta lag pa tsamatshugatsang ma phul gang tsam dang sbyar taM/ bskol nas yul khyad rus pa la lan bdun
ba sngags kyis btab ste cig car blud na sos par 'gyur ro// stsa na debang bud med kyi drung du bskol bar mi bya'o// ro langs kyi gdon gyisong tabanaargyun ring dun par gyuran u ul la lan
shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab su bsregs te snar bdug par bya// yang na ra bong gi rtog pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas mgi tu bcug na/
sos par 'gyur te/ sha dang/ chang dang/ dku ba rnan pa lnga dang/ tshigs ngan pa rnams bsrung dgosaso// yang na ba zla dang/ yungs kar dang/ lan tshu la lan nyi shu rtsa
gcag sngags kyis btab ste nad pa'i khro'i drung du bsregs na/ gdon de'i lus 'jig par 'gyur bas 'jug pa'i thugs mi thub ste 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gal te gzhogs phyed na
zhing na ba dang snasubs par gyur tam/ rkanga' gasdud minus par gyur na ru rta til mar gyi nang du bskol te lan shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar
'gyur// yang n ba'i mnal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngogs kyis btab ste lus la bskus na'ang sos par 'gyur ro// gal te bu btsa'adakrab bar gyuran til mar la lon nyi shu rtsa gcig sdug
kyis btab sta/ bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro// bud med sbrum ma gangadag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na gabusasrang gcig chu phuladaboneng du bskol
ka/ te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas blud na/ sdug bsngal zhing na ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ sha ma 'byung du mi btub par gyur na bang snyan

tshe bad ba thungs na phan par brgyud 'o// glo bur du snyang ka gzer tam bzod par gyur na de na ri nyul gyi gzer thabs zhes bya ba yin pas kun du ru dung pog dkar po ma grubs pa la la na nyi shu rtsa gcig

[$ ]sngags kyis btab sta ci tsam 'byor pa phyin nasaslon du bcug na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sha chang dang dku ba rnam pa srung dgos so// mosatshag par gyur na ba lang ga lco ba dron po la lan nyishu gcig
sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// srin du khong par zhugs te na bar gyur na rta dkar po 'a gecin phul phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btang ste blud na 'tsho bar
brgyun 'o/ tshabs che ba la phul gang blud na sran bu thag pa gcus pa bzhin du rang 'byung bar 'gyur go// shu chen byung ba la lang sa 'u hAbardungs pa'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis

btab steshu babasnying du blugs na rtsa ba rang byung bar 'gyur bas mod la 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mig tu sbrang ma zhugs ton bar gyur na bong bu'i rtug pa btsir ba'i khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags

pa kyis btab ste mtshan mo mgi tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// lto ba na bar gyuran khron pa'i chu gtsang nab nang du lan tshu ma grugs pa 'brum bu nyishu rtsa gcig bon te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags
kyis btab nas phul byed 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro// mag tshag por gyur tam/ mag tu sha lhag byung bar gyur tam/ lange tog byung bar gyur na ka'u khe tshe'apishing gi lo ma brdungs te/
btsir ba'i khu ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ dre'i nang du khar bab dang tsha gcig mtshan gcig sbyangs nas yang lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste mag tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/
gal tremtshan mo 'byung 'jug gi tsho 'jigs sngangs nas ma bde bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mgul du btags
na 'jigs shing sngangs pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang bral ba kho nar ma zad kyi/ bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te khyim
'khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na bal po so'ashang gi yal ga blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te/ mgo mjug gnyis kar mar dang zho bskus nas sngags lan re bzlas
shang ra re bsregs tastong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ de'ang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgos so// shu dag dkar po blangs
nas lo na brgya rtsa brgyadasngags kyis btab ste/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags nag yul don 'thab pa dang 'brel ba'i gtam smra bab gnas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ke'u li
tshod shang ga le ma shas yal ga'ang rung ste/ dum bur gtubs nas mgo mjug gnyis kar ba mar yang dag pa dang/ sbrang rtsi dkar po dang ba zho bsus te sngags

lan re bzla zhing dum bu re re bsngog pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bya'o// nyani gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing dus gcig la'ang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun tshang bar gyur na sngags mkhan/
rang gis mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// gdon mthu bo chogadul bar 'dod na lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste/ bu ram dad sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa
snying sdochen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bsreg par bya'o// ga'u wang srang gcig po glu'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/ 'bags pa snying rje chen po dwang ldan pa'i gzugs
byas pa'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste lus la bsus samadapral bar thig le byas na lha dang/ rgyu dang/ badre srin dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams
cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te la la zhig btson rar chud par gyur na phug ron dkar po'i rtog pa la lan brgya rtsa ngargyud sngags kyis btab ste lag pa la bskus nas mtshon chal byug
na mtshon cha rang grol bar bgyur ro// gal te khyo shug chu dang bzhin du ma 'dus par gyur na byan pa'i mjug ma blangs te/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i
mdun du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas lus la btags na/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams pa dang bkur bar 'gyur ro// 'o tog dang 'bras bu
rnams la sran bu zhugs te rtsa bar gyur nas 'am/ thal pa 'am/ bye ma gtsang ma blangs te lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas zhing ga phyogs bzhi'i gtor na srin bu rnams bgyis pa
'gyur ro// chu gtsang ma la sngags kyis btab ste 'bras bu'i lcenashing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu la za ba'i thugs ma thub po// na mo rat+na tra A a/ sha ra ma hA sha ra/ tu lu tu'u ma sU tu
lu/ oM ku ma hayig ba/ oM ku ma hanapesha ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la la zhig 'bru dkon pa'i gnas su phyin te/ mu ge byung nas zan chad par gyur na khyed kyi meg
btsugs nas lus drang por bsrang ste/ sams rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'dalan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas mig phya shug dang/ lha rnams kyis lha'i zhal zas ro ba skyu dang ldan pas
snod bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur// gal te khyim na gnas pa khri dgos par gyur na snod gtsang ma skyong ra mdun du bzhag nas mgo btsums te kha chus bkang nas lcang ma'i lcag ma
dang rnga yab dang/ lhung bzed la gtor bar bya'o// chus gtor zin nas mig btsums te gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang ga ngang gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod
kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas glengs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bza' bar byasU/ de ltar na 'di'i mthu stobasan bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// zas zos/
thani nas mig btsums te sa ra kha zhes brjod nas zas kyi lhag ma'ang spang bar bya'o// sa thos te stor med nas kyang myur du 'ju ba gyur pas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/
thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa bathob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ngab gzungasan bad yin te/ na mo bud+d+hAya/ na mo d+ham+maya/ na na saM g+ha sa/ nam a dan
na// uka tshadu uka tsa du/ ma ti la lal/ la lu can mi ta na ma swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri bo rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshams bcad
de lus bsrungs nas/ 'khar ba'i lhung bawed chung du zhig khron pa 'a chu gtsang mas bkang ste mdun du bzhag nas gzungs sngags bzlas na gdon maza bar skar ma gsal ba gcig 'ong bar
'gyur bas/ 'ong babri tsho bajigs pa mi beskyed par sems bde bar ma nyan par bzhag nas sanas rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'don par byed na/ dbang bo rno zhing shes rab dang ldan pa
bgyur pas mashes pa ci'ang med par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa ba lam gyi chos kyang ma rtogs pa ci'ang med par bgyur ro// thos pa rgyud pa'i tshoskar ma mchog tu gsal ba zhig lhung
ba bod kyi nub nang du 'ong bar 'du shes bskyed par bya//byang chub sems dpa' spyan res gzigs dabang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher
yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs bam po gnyis pa/// de nas byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbong phyug gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis/ dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung
ngostan ra ra na dzad pa dang/ bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can thams cad lasman par bgyi ba dang/ bcing ba mtha' dag gcad pa dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur
bar bzhad pa lags bas/ deng bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te/ dus tham bsems can rnams yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bdu thos pa'i byin gyi
rlabs kyi mthus dedag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral ba nas bde ba'a'ibras bu thob par 'gyur la gsaso// bcom ldan 'das dus lnga brgya tsam la u lan/ grong ngam/
grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dgeslong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'a sogs res rtag par gdugs mtshan lan drug tu chos bzhin/
bgya/ du yum zhes brgya ba'i gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog cing 'don pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'adra'i
rjes su dran zhing gatho ba'i slad du rtag par rjes su 'brangs nas/ gang zag de dag yongs su srung bar bgyid cing song bar ma brgyad pas 'dre srin thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par ma 'gyur lag
sh+tsa so// gzhan yang tshorabs kyisgrape pa lci ba thams cad kyang dus gcig tu yongs su 'byung bar bsgyur ro// gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgyab chos kyi sgozlums cad kyang myur du yos
su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das la yang 'dasnyed ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma bsems can rnams n phal chen sdug pa'i dri ma lhun stug
cing bsod nams chung bas yongs su 'dzin par brgyad pa zhig mchis na'ang 'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas/ deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyisasems can rnams la
rgyan sman par bgyi ba dang/ sems can rnams la bde bar bgyi ba dang/ lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ched du gzungs kyi chos bshad par 'tshal to/ bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i
bskal pa tshad ma mchis pasnyad kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'ad la brtanatsang mchod pa bgyis lags so// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs bas ngasargyas rnams kyi bar

ka 0dag kyang yum zhes bgyi deb gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rkyes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par brtes pa lags pas// shes kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig

sems rtse gcig tu yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don cing klog pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na de dgatsha'adi nyid la tshig gi spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchis pa dang/
shes rab dang spobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bas/lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang du mchog tu 'gyur/gang dag zos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' zhing thams cad kyis spyi bo btud de phyag bgyid par
'gyur/skye ba thams cad dusangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur/gang paskyes kyang rung ste thams cad kyis mdi ches pas nyan par 'gyur lags te/de dag thams cad kyang sas rgyas
bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi rkyen gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags te/ rang nyid kyi mthun mo lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di ltar lha
dang mi dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba dang/ las kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i ched du smras pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/sa kyang deng
ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab nas/ khyod byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i sems rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldog par mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan
@#// 'dus la/byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug gas ang bad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran la gas te/ 'das pa'i bskul pa tshad ma
mchis pa nas yum zhes bgyi bab gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung dus/ra po kA la la mchis pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi 'khor mang po dang 'gregs nas bdag gi chos dkrug cing/
sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par ma 'grub par bgyi ba bshams pa lha/dab tshe bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'dis da dung mang po rnams btul nas thams cad bdag so sor gyes par
gyur pas/gzungs 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rtag par bgyi lags so// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa dang snying rje chen pos sems can thams
cad la phan gdags shing/ lha dang mi rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub soms dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong

smyanastong dang ldan pa ba yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs lus po cha'i sngags 'das so// namasarba ta thA ga tA a/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma a ma tre b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te samyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma a

rab lo ki te shwa rA ya/ po dz+has tA ya/ ma hAsatwA ya/ ma pA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA snga ma wAb+hA ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikA ya/na mong pu la ba ma na su pra tit+titasaM g+hA ya sUr+ya

sha ta sa ha sra a tri ta ra ka pra b+has pa blu sa ta mArta ya ma hAm Ni sku ku kuN+Dal a laM kA ra d+ha ra Ni/ b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sajal ka a pAsha ma nA ya/ ba bo d+ha nu kha sa ma de sha yarjes satA pa ri mo tsa kA/

tat+ya thA/o b+hAn d+hu ba/ ma hAlo ka ka ra na/ nA tha mo sad rgyu ma re b+harA ban sha karA5/ rA ga rI sha mo hadzul sha ma ka/ gas ka/ sa mA shA sa na kar/ rakAsarba pA nga durbata pA sha man ke rA ya/sa rda ta thA ga ta sngam

pa da na ka ra/ ha ha mahrubo dz+hase tra nga ra da pad+ma la kosaM b+hU ta/ ma hA kA ru NikAdza TA mu ku DA laM kr-i ta sha rI raM/ ma Ni kan ka sha ta/ badzra bai rtun laM kr-i ta sha rAri/ a ma ti b+hA si na ka ma lA lo kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Ni/ la ra

na ma hA du na/ nar na re bsha ta sa ha sra! a b+hi la kA tikA ya/ ma hA bo d+hisi tU yo/ bi d+ha ma bo d+ham/ bi nAkA a ba nAshA ya/ ma h+pha an tre kesha ka ba te/ a ba ba d+ha babo d+hasatwA/ saM sA ra tsu ra ka pra ma than/

du ru 'a pad+ma/ pu ru Sha nAg/ pu ru lasA ga ra/ du ru khasaMha/ ba ra ba rasha yi/su yanasu yarta/ pa ra ba ra/d+ham d+ha na/sa mas ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ prashAs yam shAs ya/gi ri gi ra ba ra ba ratsadri tsar

mu ru mu ru/ mu yu mu u/ mu a nu ya/ mulcamuny+tsa/d+hu na d+hu na/ ba d+hun bad+hun/ ru d+hu ru d+hu/ grwa sa grwa ya/ g+ha d+ha ya g+had+ha ya/has hos/ phra has phrepas( ba ba d+he klog pA sun/ ma na bdag ming 'di

zhes bya ba/ su ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM har/ du ru ti du ru ti/ ma hAman du ru taM/ ka ra NashA ta pa rasi ka b+ha ba bi sa na/ sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hisatwa ba ra daspu ny+tsa/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dang ba sems
dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan bdas la pad+ma chen po'aphug rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'das ma thag tu
rma stong gsum gyi stong chen pob 'jig rten gyi khams nas/'dupashes med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang rin po
chog ma tog gi na mngon par phab bo// 'og man gyi lha dang dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing ma bde bas shin tu 'jigs shing sngangs par gyur to// gnod sbyin dang// srin po dang 'dre

gdonam rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen po byung nas nub tu 'byor zhing khros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i byang
zla chub sems dpas 'khor mang po rnams dang/ 'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis bdag garigasngags las 'da' zhing rjes su 'brang bar ma byang na/ de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag
thams cad rab tun zhing 'jig par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'dis ni re nems 'joms shing rgya mtsho rin po snyam par byed do// lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed ngo//
ka yul 'khor rnams dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar byed do// 'dre gdon dang/ nad dang/ sman gyi dug dang/ srin bu'i dug dang/ log pa dang ma rungs

mi rnams na zhing rab tu zhi bar byeng rdo// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do zhes smos pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjechan po 'a pho brang pa tu dgar ba na bzhugs/
pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ mi 'am col sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis
kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig
sngags 'dis ni sgrib ra' re po shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas (gang la la zhig nyan tam/ klog gam/'don tam/yongs su 'dzin par bgyid dan/ mthong bar gyuran/
da drag la nyon mongs pa sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang par langs nas gus pa'i sems kyis yum/
gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig klog gam 'don par brgyaden/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par deb ris su 'bras nas longs su srung bar bgyid cing/ yodA
su skyob par bgyid do// gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo tshan po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/ gcig du gnas dben par mchis nas/ byang chub
sams dpa baspyan sa gabrages dpad phyag yade la dran par bgyi zhing/ gzhan yid la mi bgyid ra rtag nga ra gtsungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad pos brjod bgyis sman lam rnam

ma 'grub gang yang zhamachis lags so// gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so// mas kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste/

rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par tshadu shos nyabar gzhag par gyur na/ gang zag des skye ba'i gnas bye ba brgya stong tshad ma na chis pa kun tu bsags pa'i sdig pa kho 'os ci mchis pa ded thams cad
zhu byang bar bgyur/ gang thag de bakhor lal sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'a sa spyod par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dang ba spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur/ btsun po'i khyim dag tu skyo bar bgyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par stos sum me tog snyam pa gang tsan byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang

[/ ]phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gter nas/ gzungs 'du 'i na nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyaden/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po ba chos nyide 'thob par 'gyur//

gong zag de 'jig rten na mthar gyis mthu chen po myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sams dpa'i gdong dang/ mig dang/ mtshan dang/ dpe byad la rnam par lta ste/

mi/ gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bden par bgyid na byang rlub sems dpa kha sbyan bas gzigs dbang phyug myur du lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor pas mthong bar 'gyur bas/ dri ma dang bral nas sa dang/
po dang sangs rgyus rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas/ bod kyis 'jig rten gyi khamos gos la bar bgyid pa bgyur/'chib 'jus kyi tshangasam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa//

'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas/tshonubs than sa cud du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa cimachis pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur lags so//

gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla rang dang/ dbyar zla 'bring po dang/ ston zla tha chung tshes gcig nas/tshes bcu'aber du gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po sa tsang/
ma bgos te/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas rang bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan dan dkar po/ba 'ji la ladakyil bakhor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ me tog dang spos/
nam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi smyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar gtams nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
gus pa'i sams bskyed do// rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyidan/ tshes bco lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor gyi nang du/
mchi bar 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor pas mthong ma thag tu mtshams ma chis pa lnga'i khan ma thob na tu lci ba'i sgrib pa su nechis pa thams cad zhu byang nas/ lus dang/ ngag/
pa dang yid kyi las thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang/ dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang/ pa rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang khyad par du 'phags
bab yi shes kyi sa'ang 'thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te dgung char dbab par 'tshal bar gyur na/ gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na
zil mngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so// degs la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs 'gas par 'gyur lagrwa
se[}]tsang po dang chab mag bskams pa'i drung dugazungs 'di lanustong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyidan/ chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags sa so// blo nad kyis thebs pa thams cad kyi
mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis lan bdun bsngags te sug bas byabs na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod bgyis na yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so// gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa ba na dun du de'i gdong la bltas nas gzungs 'ad lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
na bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i'adu shes ngan pa tham cad rab tubasal bar 'gyur lags so/// gang dag mtshams dgum par 'tshalan rdzong chab kyi nang du zhugs te/ chos bzhin du gzungs 'di/
yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar btags na dpag tshad ba tshun chad dugadon bgags ci'ang ma mchis te/ mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyas nas yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur
lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig bzhin du gzungs khad lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyidan/ gang zag de'i bsod nams brjod
kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang skya bo mang po kun gyis byams shing bstan bkur bgyid par 'gyur/ smon lam rnams
yad bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so// gang dag bdud gdul par 'tshalan yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas te/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags
'da' na re bzlosashing lan cag bsreg par byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyisan yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so// gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshalan rtag par
lcang ma'i lcag ma la lan shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcasan thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags so// gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes/
rab dang ldan pas btsal na shu dag srong gcig phyamar btags te/ chab mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas rul du bgyis te/ yum gyi ka cungs 'dis mtshan gsum po 'di lta
tsha/ drod dang/ dud pa dang/ 'od byung gi bar du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o// mtshan ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi rol bu tsam bdun bdunA'atshal nas snying khar yang phyug
bar bgyi ste/ de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du batshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur pas/ bdag nyid kyi lus bsrung ba'i srid du gdugs re zhing kun gyi gzungs 'di lan
brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang ba rgyago/ de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' ma stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun tu sdug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar langs nas
sgyu bagleng ste lus drung por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshinges te/ rkang pa ga las pa cung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o// sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag
gnyis bkug ste/ lag mthil du bzhag la mthe'u chung dang/ mdzub mo dang/ mthe bong na yin par brkyang ste/ lag mthal bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyig/
cha de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyis nas ku nga mo ba kug ste phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyi nas lag ma thal mdun du blta bar bgyis/ 'din lus kun sdud pa'i
phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// gal te bdud dang mu stegs can log par lta ba'i thobis po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'dabagyis nas sngags lan
kyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gdon ma 'tshal bar snon pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gzungs na 'di lta ste/ na mo ra tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ke ta shA rA ya/
bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta a bat+ta/ pa ra bat+te/ a hi a hasA hA/ de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mag stong dang
ldan pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgyan 'di lags te/ stama' lus kun sdud pa ba phyag rgya bzhid du thal mo sbyar tesnying khar pezhag nas sor mo lnga bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas
g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgrungs te rtsa mo phrad par bgyis la/ na the bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshogs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/
'angan kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'ad bgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdige pa'i las ci mchis pa thams cad dus
gcig tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshaphyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag skye bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par
rdzogs par byang chub tu nyeba' tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos grags btsal ba dang/ kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya bad mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang
ting nge 'dzin brtas par gyur to// gzungs ni 'di lta sta/ tad+ya thA/ sarbad+hAr Ni/ maN+Dal/ a ha a hi/ pra b+hA shud d+ha/ sa tApa ya swA hA/ del gsum
ba byang chub sems dapa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyun bed lagras te/ sngar bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug cu rtsa mo sprad la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo ba tshogs gnyis pa'i stong du bkan par
bgyi ste/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang bsam gtanadang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyagargya zhes bgyigo/ 'dus pa'i dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos
cha 'di mngon par bsgrubs pas bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par grolab brnyes pa lags te/ ragi sngags ni sngam dang mthun lags so// gang la la zhig 'dug
re bzhin duphyag rgya bod bgyis te mchod pa bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'agyur ro// de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mgi stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya
ni bad lags te/ langs nas 'gyur rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar gung mo rang/ srin lag dad/ mthobu chung rnams rgyab spradu la mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo sprad nas mthe bong/
gnyis mdzub mo' tshogis gnyis pa'i stong dumanan te/ lag ba gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phyi nas smin mtshamasasu gzhag par bgyista/ bdin mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes
bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'chos kyi sgo 'du bgyis par gyur nas nigs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gya nom pa bye ba phrag brgya stong nyid mthong bar 'gyur te// sas
rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'dur lags so// gang dgadakyil 'khor gyi chos kyi
sgror lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag gis na phyag rgya 'chos kyi sgo 'dame thong du'ang ma rung la chog 'ding bgyir mi rung lags so// rtags mthong ba' byang chub sems dpa' chos dang/
ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba zhig lags na ni ci dang ni smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so// gzungs ni 'di lta sta/ o sarmatsakU karA
ya/ d+hA ra Ni/ in+d+ri ya swA hA/ de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mag stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya na bad lags te/ langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te/ ]
sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa lag mthal bkan gnas somo lngaso sor ban tshun du bsnyen te/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yon pa lag mthil g.yas pa'i stong
du mnananas snying khar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni le ga stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste/ 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud rjesnyad mchis pa thams
cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyid lags so// gzungs sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki tah+pharAya/ sawa dulcao hA ya nAsAhA/ de la drug pa byang chub sems
@# dpa' mig stong pas ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyu ni 'di lags te/ 'agleng sta rtang pa gnyis spradunas sngasug pa lage pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bskyangs te gung mo bkug nas
mdun du phul la/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyis nas/ gung mo bkug nang logs su phul ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya
zhes bgyi de lags te/ 'dis ting nge 'dzin dang/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang/ chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang
tsha dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so// rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o// de la bdunapa byang chub sems dbab mig stong pas lha klu sde brgyad
0/ dang 'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya na bad la gas te/ 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshanges te/ sngar sug pa lagapa g.yon pa ba srin lag gis mthe bo'isanamo la reg/
par bgyis nas// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyis te// mtheb chung dang gung mo gnyis drang por bsgrungs nas rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyis la// lagadar
gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzubamo ni phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o// rig sngagasan bad lta ste/ oM sam+b+hade pa nA ga a dza swAhA/ de la brgyud pa byang chub sems dpa' mgo stong pas
tshangs pa chen po dang/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po g.yar drang nas chos 'dra de'i phyag rgyani 'di lags te/ phyog rgyu snga ma'o stang du lug dun gyi tshogs gnyis phyi nas sug pa la go pa'i
zur sprad de/ lag gathal bkan la mdzub mo na phan tshun brgyudar bgyi'o// rig sngags ni bdalta ste/ oM ma hAbra m+maya a ha a hisAhA/ phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis
ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyu'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shang grangs ma mchis pa thums cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o// gal te nyi zla la gza'o zhugs par gyur na/ chab maral lan
brgya tsa brgyud sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o// yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi 'i/ chab mar phyag rgyas btang ste 'tshalan dbang po rnabar 'gyur bas gdugs gcigol/
sho la ka khri lebs par 'gyur lags so// phyag rgya ba chos kyi sgo mo 'ad ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'aAng pos/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lag gsaso// de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa ba mag stong pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyuna'adi lags te/ 'bring nas snying khar thal
mo sbyar te/ mthe bong gnyis ka lagam thil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni drang por bsgrungs tasnying khar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags ma 'don par bgyid na/ gdon ma 'tshal
bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag tu 'jug par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing ran po chab rgyad stong bsams pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams
la mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mngon par sgrub pa gang lags pa des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te/ phyag rgya

'ad bgyid na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad mngon sum du mthong nas bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyad kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su 'byung
bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du yon tan 'od lta bu'i bsngags pa brjod pa lags so// de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa 'asmon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub
pa' phyag rgyan bad lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis kyis sen mo mnan nas mdzub mo'ason mo na skyong sprad par bgyi ste/
rig sngags ni snga ma bzhin bzla bar bgyig de ltar bgyis na smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las ldog par ma 'gyur lags so// la
bcu gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyun 'di legs te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin dubagyis pa las mdzub mo lnga
drung por bsgrungs te thal mo dbye bar bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i tshog ng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la stsal bas/ bdag blo
namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyidi bzla bar bgyi// de la bcu gnyis ba byang chub sems dpa' zhig
stong dang ldan pas sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgyasnga ma bzhin du snying khar thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o/
rig sngags ni bad lta ste/ oM sarlabud+d+has ma a/ e hi hi/ bra h+pha shud d+ha sa twa swA hA/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i mig stong lag stong dang ldan ba'i dokyil 'khor 'dri
ba'i tshig ni 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dekyil 'khor dang/ rig sngags dang/ phyagargyab chos 'dis ni dus tha/
ma ma'i dus kyi tshe rag sngags 'dzan pa rnams de bzhin gshags pa'i rig sngags kyi ge zungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa' teng nge 'dzin thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur bar
bgyid pas/ rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag bsdams te bre mo gtam rnams skye bar ma bgyi'o// gzungs las 'byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang/
ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshan ma la mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyud par ma bgyi'o// yongs su dang pa bsams kyis dran pa nye
par bzhag nas skad cig tsam du'ang rnam par g.yeng bar ma bgyi'o// gal te kho la gdu bas slad rol tu gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/ sdig pa'i las
sbyong bar 'tshal yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so// gal te yang dag pa'i yongs su dang pa dang/ chos kyi bsam pa gang lags pa des sgom par mi bgyidan/ bgyis pa
rnams chab 'tshal nang don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/ nams kyang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis
[tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs nas dku ba rnam pa lnga rang sha chang 'tsha' bar mi bgyi// gal te dbyin tshig dang/ g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang/ phrag dog ga tshig skyabs gyur tam/[.]
dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag tshudang/ rig sngags kyi cho ga rku bab nongs pa 'di dag khyung por gyur na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sbyong bar mdzad pas/ de
skad du ngas khyod spyas pa ma yin yang gzags shing yongs su bsdu bab 'os ma yin no// zhes gsung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dgan de bzhin gshegs ba thams
cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshage pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum dang/ yang dag pa'i chos dang/ dge ba'i mi tshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyid pa lag/
pas de lta bu ba gang zag de dag ni rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang/ 'dre gdon thams cad dang/ mu stegs can rnams dang/ ba ni ya ka rnams dang/ khams gcig
tu bsdu ba dang/ las gcig la gnas pa dang/ gtan du skyabs ma mchis par gyur pa lags pas/ 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob par ma mdzad cing/ rtag
pa' sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa ba dang/ 'phags pa dang/ lha dang/ drang srong thams cad kyis smod par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so// lan sun/
kyang/ bya// brgyan cing chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyad/ bcom ldan 'das bdag//
gas gang zag re dganams kyang 'grub nga ra ma 'gyur bar mthong lags te/ de ltar ma 'grub pa de'ang bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyi nongs skyon lab/sa pas
don de'i slad du gzungs 'di'i cho ga dang/ glegs bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par mi bgyi/ 'donatsang 'dzan du stsal bar yang ma bgyi ste/ gang dag tshangs par spyod pa
longs su dag pa srung ba dang/ byams pa dang snying rdzabasoms dang ldan pa dang/ sems can la snying brtse zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog
ba dang bdon pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/ yum gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so// chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying bo lags pab slang du rag sngags 'dzin pas yang dag pa'i soms dang/ brtson 'grus kyi sems
kyis lus kyi yan lag dang/ nying lag dang/ rus pa dang/ sha dang/ rtsa rgyus dang/ rkang dang/ mgo dang/ mig la sogs pa'i ng yongs su spangs nas
[n ]gzhan dag la stsal te/ chos 'di yongs sugashe gnas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par bsgrub par 'tshalan/ rin po che dang/ 'bru dang/ dar zab dang/ gos drang/
mal cha dang/ sman dang/ nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yum gyi gzungs dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyab gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/
slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji lta bu bzhin du son sa rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni slad mab dus tha ma la mi sems can rnams la sa=
rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa' khertson 'grus dang/ lta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang/ rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon
par 'grub par bgyid cing/ de dag dus 'dazhes blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nams kyang ldog par ma 'gyur bar brgyad pas so// dkyil 'khor de'ang
gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/ ra'om/ chab mag 'bab pa 'am/ nags tshal gyi drung du'ang rung ste/ nya bakhor kun tu khru gang yan chad na shing gi rtsa ba dang/ dogs ngan pa dang/ gyo me dang/ gor
ma dang/ rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te bsal nas/ degs bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la/ ba lang gi lce le dang sos chab dog saser
@#// po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o// de la dngus kyi gling na zhing du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/

ma dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhi lham par mchis pab weni po che'i 'khor lo rtsiblo brgya rtsa brgyadadang ldan pa gcig bri bar bya'o// gzhan yang 'khor lebadebus su rin po che'i pad+ma kha bye ba 'dab ma sum cu

rtsa gnyis mchis po khru gang ba gcig bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang 'khor 'a'i tha ma 'khor bar 'ong 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// de'i rjes la gling gi zla bzhi'i pad+ma kha bye ba'i 'o 'u bar bgyi'o// gzhan

yang pad+ma re re'i stong du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas/ nor bu pazhi po ba stong du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad de'i stang du byang chub sams
dang ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga gzugs tsan dan dkar po las bgyis pa gcig gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas glang gnyis pa ni zhing du khru gang bar bgyis nas/ sdur glu bzhu'i pad+ma kha bye ba re re
bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang pad+ma de dag re re'i stang du ra rab lhun po'i stan ram pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi snyan la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o// shar

lho'i mtshams kyi stan la na lha mthu chen po bra'o// lha nub mtshams kyi stan la ni tshangs pa chen bo bri'i// nub byang mtshams kyi stan lan brgya byin khri bar bya'o// gzhan yang ngos bzharen rin po

cha tog dang 'phreng ba bcu chug bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling gsum ba na zhing du khru de ba bgyis te// sa gzhi sngon po la gsar gyi thog bkye ba 'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling bzhi pa ni zhang du zu/

gang bar khargyas te/ ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar chad dum bu re re 'anang du'ang bad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang go rames bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i stang du'ang

rdo rje tho ba dang/ rtsa gsum pa'i phyag rgyu dang/ dgra sta'i phyag rgyudang/ gri'i phyag rgya dang/ ral gri'i phyag rgya dang/ dung gi phyag rgyudang/ chu gri'i phyag rgya dang/ zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang/ dbyig pa thog

pa' phyag rgya dang/ gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyadang/ gshAne rje'i dbyig pa 'i phyag rgya dang/ de na ya ka'i phyag rgyudang mtshon cha'i phyag rgyudang/ 'khor lo'i phyag
rgyudang/ sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so rongor bris nas/ phyag rgya de dag kun la'ang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis

pab nang du na 'thab bral gyi lha bri'o// nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa banang du na chu lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du na ku be ra bri'o// shar phyogs
kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor na rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o// nga nas

gling lnga pa na khru la/nga bar bgyis te ngos bzhi kun du 'bras bu'iTen shing dang/ ma togagi ljon shing dang/ rin po che ljon shang rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o// ga zhan yang gru bzhi kun tu lan po che'i ri re ba/

ma lhun po ra ra phra bar bgyi'o// chab sgo bzhare ni rgya mtshochen po'i chib bra bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyi sa gzhan kha dog sngon por bgyi'o// gzhan yang slad nang gi gling

ny+nyo rnams kyi nub phyogasakyi chab sgrobalho'i ngos kyi zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa ba chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan
pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su spyad de kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo snga glegs bam gcig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis
pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi stong du bzhag nas/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po ba dro cheb zhal bu bcu drug dang/ zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ zas dkar gsum
dang shang shog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsalnga dang/ spos chab bre gang dang/ bum pa dar tshon sna tshogs dang/ me tog dang/ ljonashing yal ga la sogs pas kha brgyan

pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang/ ma tog rang 'phreng ba sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang/ mar ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ byug spos dang/ spos kyi rgya ma dang/ de la sogs pa'i sos deb tshe nyi shu dang/ byang chub sa mas
dpa gzugs dras pa'i 'phan dang/ dar tshon sna tshogs las bgyis pas 'phanaspyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o// 'di ltar mchod par gyod pa ba zhal deb dang/ snod spyad dang/ bum pa la
sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang gsar drang/ dngul dang/ 'khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar bgyi'o/ gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma'ang rung lags te/ 'di ltar
yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzher chos bzhin du bri zhing dgum par bgyi'o// gdan dang me tog sna tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o// 'bras sA lu'am tog
dang yungs kar dang/ ma tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi stong du gtor bar bgyi'o// zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig pazhan du gsar du bgyis pa bzang po las mchod par
bgyi'o/ /sngags mkhan de'ang 'byung 'jug ga tshikhrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis khyug ste/ gos gsum pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas
tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ dusu ka dang/ ga pur la sogs pa bsros te/ gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang
ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o// nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs bzhagapa'i mdun du rang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gsum po dag yang dag
par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o// gdugs mtshan du slad rtsol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyel mo krung bcas te mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi ga 'ud+ma
