lan stong rtsa brgyud bar chad ma mchis par brgyus brjod bgyis nas/ gdugs nyi rtsa gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor gyi nub
T+Tha ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ gling gsum pa ba nub phyogs kyichab sgor 'greng ste/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgyu dang po dang/ gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa nas/
bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas sman 'dren ra 'ating nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya btsuganyis pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid
byang chub chen po'i smon lam shani cu brtan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// zhes smon lam btab nas g.yon 'dren par bgyid na/ thams cad nye bar mchis par 'gyur bas lus drang por
bsrung snyam chis nas/ nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad sgrib cing chod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam du 'du shes nya bar gzhag ste/ tha dad pa'i yul lam demigs pa lus
tsho'i sngags snga ma lon lishu rtsa gcig 'don pa bgyid na/de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon
[ns/]mi 'tshal bar man sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/ lus bstan nas niachi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'alus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ dga' zhing badzum bab bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci
zhig dgos/ gang zhig smon ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas/ deb tsho sngags mkhan gyis 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang/ gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyor/
bdang/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyu dang/ sngags kyi cho ga thams cad mngon par 'grub pa dang/ badre gdon thams cad gdul zhung ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gdab
bar bgyi'o// de ltar smon pa rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid la rag par bgyi'i/ gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni be la rag sag gtso ngas la ri mo bsi te
bgyisana'ang rung lags so// smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la a ka ru bsdogs te/ lus po cha'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
nas/ bcu pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgyu snga ma bgyisan/ smon pa thams cad bsams pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so// gal te skye bo/
mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag snga ma bgyis nas lus po cha'i sngags kyis til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab pa'o/
khagyi'o yang na sngags na re bzlasanas lanA'i zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yod pa zhin du dgabag 'gyur lags so// gnod
ma sbyani rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i sngon shange ga yal ga blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' bar bon na dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ma rungs

ba dgrar gyur pa gdul bar 'tshal na shing khong 'a na bakhog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyud tshong rar bgyisan skyabs
su mchizhing thul bar 'gyur 'gas so// 'dre gdon gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na gu gul dang yungs karal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btabanas/ sngags 'a na bzla zhing lan re zhugs su
dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rung dul bar 'gyur lags so// yul phyogs su rams nad byung bar rgyun chab kyi dkyil 'khor grub zhi pa pa rgyas nas/ba mar

cha bzang po la 'an brgya rtsa brgyud sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyud tshang bar bgyisen rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// yang na chab nyung
zad cig blangs te ramis kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsalan 'phral du 'tsho ba la 'gyur lags so// sngon yul ge khyen zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/gang ranis kyis btab pa de dag gdugs
zhag gcig gam gnyis las ma 'da' bar 'chi ba ba dus bgyid par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze ra tsan te zhes bgyi ba zhige snyad rdzachen po skyes nas/cho ga'i sgo 'ad de shams nas yul khams gcig
gi mis kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ ramis gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rkyal po'ang de'i tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slod dusman yon che bar rig par bgyi
lags so// gal te pa rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par gyur tam/ chom rkun dang 'khrug pa byung bar gyur na lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/ rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bgyis na dgra dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu 'amarigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag las kyi rnam par smin pa'i debang gas
tshibs su nye bab tshi 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/ gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas a ka ru bsregs te/ rig sngags 'anastong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/sngags
'an re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi slob pa de dag yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// sngon yul wArANasar khyim bdag cig gnas pa las/ bu gcig
las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas// lo bco lnga lon pa dang/ khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong
[]/ ba las/ khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang/ khyim bdag gis la rgyus de dag rgyas par bshad do// de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya
ngan ma byed par bdag gas bsgo ba bzhin du byosashag dang/ khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ de'i tshobram ze des choga'i sgo 'di tong zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang/ gshin rjes

( khyim bdag dra la khyod kyi bu tsha'i tshad lo bcadrug las mi thub pas/ la bco lnga lon te gcig las ma lus pa las/ deng dug ba'i skyon dang phrad pas lo brgya thub par 'gyurab 'i phyi'i bde'i nga 'ongs
nas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras pa dang/ dbatsho khyim bdag khyo shug bar tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/khyim gyi nor ci mas pa bteg sa/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la phul bas/
mog 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma bu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so// sngar 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dung 1 rdo rje b dkyil 'khor chen por 'an gsum zhugs pa zhig lags
te dkyil 'khor ma 'tshal te/ phyag rgyu bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smyon pa rnams ma bgrub pa gang yang ma mchis la 1 myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
yang 'gyur lags so// bud med gang la la zhag bu btsa' bab tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur na/ chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste btsal du stsal na nang par bde bar 'gyur
nange khyobu dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpa byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dag pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas sngon bsong nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po
kun gyi sAng du sdug par 'gyur/ rtag par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad par 'phags pa dag la long+ga spyod par 'gyur lags so// sems can gang la la zhig mgo nad kyis thebs te sdug bsngal zhing

mi bde bar gyuran/ sngags ma ban gyis byang chub sems dpab mige stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas btang par gyur na mig kyang/
'tsho bar 'gyural/ rgyu dang rkyen des grang zag de lhab mig thob par bsgyur bas lha rnams gsal bar mthong zhing/ longs spyod mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so// byang chub sems

dwapa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs 'dri ba'i chog ni rjes dkar po khru bcu drug pa 'am khru nyi shu pa'i ng rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus n 'dzamabu'i gsar

gyi kha dog can du ba rgyas te/ gdong la mig gsum mchis pa/ sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re ro ba mthal du'ang mig re re bri'o// sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa
nyid na bcobargyad mchis te/ sngar sug pa gnyis kyisan snying khar thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do// sug pa gcig gis ni ngo rdzab blo ba thogs so// yang gcig gsan rtsa gsum pa thogs so// yang
da @#// ga cigags na glegs bam thogs so// yang gcig gsan nani po che'i phyag rgya thogs so// yang gcig gis na 'khar gsil thogs so// yang gcig gsan ron po/
che'i nor bu thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rin po cha'i 'khor lo thogs so// yang gcige gis ni pad+ma kha phye ba thogs// yang gcig gas na zhags pa thogs so// yang gcig gsonI
lcang nub lcog ma thegs so// yang gcig gsen 'od zer kha dog lta 'byin par bgyid do// yang gcig gsanA be grang 'phreng thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rol ba thogs so// yang gzhi/
gsi ni zilo ngar yongs su gtong ba lag tu ston to// yang gcig gas ni rin po cha'i cher sna tshogs 'debs shing ma bajigs pa'i lag tu ston to// yang gnyis na lta ba'i thad kar g.yon pa g.yas
pas mnananus mthal bkan te mchisaso// sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu ba dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad na sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/ sug pa de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha dang/

phyag rgya rnam ba sna tshogs thogs pas/ kha ci gnas ug pa lag pa ba phyag rgya brkyang ba nye ba 'ang mchis te/ so so nas mi mthun pas/ snying po'i med las ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha yin/
po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogasaso// lag ngar lan gdub ker rnam pa sna tshogs kyi brgyan to// lus la na 'phreng ba thogs shing lhab 'on po tsha' gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes

ka/ gsungs pa lta bu 'o// tshon rtsa de dag ga nang du ko bab na stsal bar mi bgyi'o// kun tu ru'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o// gang dag yum gyi gzungs kyi cho ga brgyad par 'tshal nasdur de'i gzugs
ra mor bri'o// gzugs ra mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du brgya 'tshal bas/ ra mo 'dri ba'i gnas khang nye 'khor kun tu tsan dan dkar po'i ched kyis dogs la byugs te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o//
gzhan yang ra mom khan 'byung 'jug ga tsho khrus bgyis nas/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos te nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o// chos bzhin du gzugs brase lags nas kyang/
na mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyuran/ dkya'i 'khor gru bzhi pa gcig yid la ji lta rnamos pa bzhin du bgyis// ba dan dang/ ma tog dang/ zhal zas dang/ zas dkar gsum
dang ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos chab dang/ ma togasna tshogs kyis kun tu khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ rnal 'byor pa dang ra mo mkhan gang lags pa des gdugs gcig
la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams 'thol bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcag tshang ba'i mtshan mo mge stong lag stong dang ldan pa 'a gcugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung
nas nyi zla zil gyis mnan te 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po ba 'jig rten gyi khams mthatso dang tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas//
rnal 'byor pa dang/ ra mi ma khanagang lags pa de dag dang/ goms can gang dag bod kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba bakha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas
ma yongs su dag par bgyur lags so// cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa desAsams rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa na ma gtogs lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ bdag gis sngon 'das pa ba dus kyi tshad bzhinagshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang phyag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams 'dul ba mthong nas
bcom ldan bdas deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po bdi dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang go so nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
re rer mngon par sprul nas/ bskal pa bzang po rangs stong gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur la/ mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re rer mngon par sprul nas/ bskal
pa bzang bo'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i smad du/ bcom ldan 'das khyang chub sems dpa' 'di 'i 'us bdud 'dul ba'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pa legs so// de nas
a bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// ngas kyang byin gyi rebs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod
kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o///byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su/
rdzogs pa'i gzungs bam po gsum po/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rang du dga' zhing mgu bar gyur
pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan la nga mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid
pa mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngos kyang rjes su yi rang gi khyod kyis shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang/
nan byang chub semadapa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di sngags 'di snus pan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ 'du shes med 'du shas med min gyi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams

cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tug sos par gyur to// 'og min rgyalha dang dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar shani tu skrag par gyur to// 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar
gyur pas/ ku co 'don cing shar nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i che nas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi
ragi sngags kyi rjes su ma 'brang zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mge tshal pa 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// bcom ldan bdasa'ag sngags bas na rigs rnams 'joms par
ma bgyis shing rgya mtsho chen po skam par bgyid do// rig sngags 'di ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams srung bar bgyid do// 'ge sngags 'disana'adre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad
dung nad thams cad dang/ mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do// rig sngags 'dasin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags so// rigs kyi bu gang la la
tshag rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyidan/ gang zag de'amathu stobs brjod gyis mi lang// rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang yosasu 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang
ldan pa dang/ nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang/ smon pa rnams yos su rdzogs par bgyid do/ gang la la zhig phyi'i rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal nasos gu gulaM
bsregs te/ bdag gi lus po cha'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la byams par 'tshalan lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/
g.yar khar bcasan khyogs shing bkur bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal nagu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btabasta/ snying khar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis

0bab skyo bas pa thob par 'gyur te/yum gyi ba zungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras ga zigs dbang phyug gi thog kha ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgyan khelags te/sug

ba lags gnyis rgyab sprad de sgyunas mthe bong gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'dis nibadag kyang srung zhing gzhan yang srung bar bgyid do// phyogs gang du mchi'ang rung ste/ mtshams dgum bar
'tshal ba sachab gtsang ma'am thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btabasto/ gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab bam thalo ba sum pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas/de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir
chos bzhin du gtor na/de nyidi mtshams su 'grub par 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dresrin ma rungs pa dang/ lego pa'i gdon mang bo rnams kyis gtsos par
rgyun/ bal po sa bu'i ma lag dang grib logs kyi lcangama'i yal ga blangs te rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhuganand gang yang rung ste mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so// rig sngags

na 'ing lta skyo rnams rbabats+tshA/ d+harmasaM g+hA ya/namaAn+ta ba lo ki tishar ya/ bo d+hisatA ya/namo badzrapA Na ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa bo so ba/ kA yas ba pa la shu pa lasha nAmI hA/gi sngags kyi
phyag rgya 'dis na log par lta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ gi sakyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshodang/ gdugs kyi gung dang/
[r/ ]@#// gdugs khas paba' na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang/ bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam
du'ang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tsha'adas nas kyang n gnas ong gsum po dag dang gtan du 'khral zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo 'a byugs te/ khyod nga'i zhing du skyerar 'gyur khas ma 'jigs shig ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/tshobang kade la'ang blo bur du 'chibar mi 'gyur zhing/'dre gdon dag

gas kyang glugs chod par mi 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dang ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khan ma tho ba yongs su skyong ba'i phyag rgyun 'dalags
te 'agleng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang sku/ sor mo lnga so sor phyis mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bskyang ngo// de'i rjes la sug pa lag ba g.yos pa'i mthe bong laga'athil
dubakugaste/ sor mo gzhan bzhin khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i ljags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni len tshun brlabar bgyi'o// phyag na gdugs gcig
la dus gsum du brgyabar 'tshal bas/dus gcig gi tsho'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod bagyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang/ shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags//
so[j]sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rdzabaskyod par gyuran kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba bgragasan// tsho'adas pa'i rjes la'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po brgyud par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas ba ma mchis pa ba gtar zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/
gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tsho 'di nyid la mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lcal sogs bgro'atshal bar mi 'gyur zhing/ lus kyi nad thams cad kyang yongs su

'khyad bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so// gal te than pa byung bar rgyun til 'bru sog po ba khekhris bu' men dang sbyar te/ 'ol du bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa
brgyud sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzong du bor na dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so// gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brngos pa'i me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ 'i bu bgyis nas lan brgya
rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzong du ber na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams
kyi bdud rnams brtul ba'i phyag rgyan bad lags te/gor mo bcol ma btang ste/g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/ khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po tshabasngags bzlas brjod bgyis
na 'a na ba'i dgra thams cad rang du la bar 'gyur lags so// cho ga 'di nga gyod pa gang lags pa des rang bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rtan gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan
mo tsan dan dkar po'i phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ma tog sna tshogs bkramanas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par mog bor thogs te/a ka ru
bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nyabar gzhag ste/
lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyar bzlas brjod bgyis na 'ad dengos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i len yon dang po mchog lags so// gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsus
te brdungs nas phyi mar bgyis te/ pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btang ste zhugs su 'dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la/gdugs re la'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyud tshang
bar bgyisan/ slad kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dang ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di
lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa lag pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa btog nas pus mo'i stong du bzhag par bgyis te/sug pa lag pa
g.yon pa 'ang de bzhin du ba rgyas nas/rtag par rang bsrel gyi mdun du lus bo cha'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na// myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba 'i ting nge 'dzin gyi/
sgo thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang shing kun dang/ yungs [']kar dang shu dag dang/ ta ta pa'i 'il bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang du bor ta bsreg par bgyi'o// 'di dag bsngags

pa'i ng sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ran/dkyil 'khor nam/gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus bo tshabasngags bzlas te/sngags lan re bzla zhing na re bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar
bgyis nas sos dang me tog dag gis ragi sngags la mchod pa bgyisan/da ni smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon bar bsgrub par 'gyur lags so// gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis ma thub pa dag sngags
'das btab na thams cad klung cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshalan sngags 'dizlas nas phyag rgya bgyis tamag la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thanas
cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so// bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag bgyi'i 'tshal de bzhin du 'grub pa mi 'gyur na/gdugs re bzhin ragi sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa
dgung bdun du tshang bar gyuran tsadang pasmon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngonaklu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho'a gnas su mtsho'i chos kyi 'dun sar chos ston pa na klu
mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang/ klumang bo rnams la sang brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par bzla ba dang/ sems can mang po rnams sdug

bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa 'a dag ma mchis par brgyab ba slad du chos bstan pa las/de ba tsaklu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po ches mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ra ba gcig phul

blob dang/ bdag gsanA de la dum gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgags rnams dang bral bar gyur lags so// de nas byang chub sems dang ba chu shel gyis ragi sngaga'adi yongs su 'dzin pa
ngag la phan gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyi'i sngags 'dismras so// ba ma 'a//ma hA bam la/ u ha le/ ma u ha le/zhum le ma hA gum le/sa hale/ma hAs hale/ tsale tasAhA/rigs kyi bu

bam rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogragang du kha nas kyang rung ste/byang chub sems dpa'i mgastong dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshog bad yongs su 'dzin par brgyaden/bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi
rjes su 'brang ste yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtso bar ma 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhag brel zhing 'phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol gyi degs gtsosasam/

chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid bar gyur na/tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyishu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas da pung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'i

gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang/ gung mo dang/ mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe'u chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags bad lan brgya rtsa brgyar
bzlasan thams cad rang gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangasa'il gnas te chos ston pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i
yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi khrag 'ba' zhig 'tshal zhing/ dge ba'i sems su'ang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang/ deb tshibyang chub sems dbabade thabs la mkhas pas ban gdags shing
soms can 'dul ba 'chid du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pabs bdud la/dul babalus mngon par bstan te/yum gyi gzungs mngon par
'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang/ de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag ga byed du mchasi nas/nongs pa 'thol bshags te phyag khagyis pa dang/ bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas
btab pas/de bla ma ma chis pa' 'am mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// byang chub sems dpa ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyana'adri legs te/'greng nas
sug pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ supakhar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis snol mar btang zhing/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nag lus po che'i sngags lan nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/cho ga/
rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste// thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po/
dag sdug bsngal gyi bgags las yongs su skyob pa'i 'khor lo'i phyig rgyan 'di lags te/'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshalan 'khor lo'iphyog spyad par bgyi

( sta 'di ltar sor mo bcub rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs dang lag mthil nadabye bar bgyiso/ sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam mchis par bgyi ste/ 'di ni byang chub
soms dpa bde 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgags las yongs su bzlas pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i bakhor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar
gyur pas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa' mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgyan 'di lags te/skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa bskyang// sor mo lta
car bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i stong du bzhag go/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brgyang sdu/sor mo lnga car la sbyang nas pus mo g.yas pabastong du mnan par bgyi'o// 'di ni 'gog pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar bzhugs pa 'i tshe ngas rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyurang
lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dusaAlas kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do// rnal 'byor pa bsam gtanasgom pa gang dag ting nge badzin mngon sum du ma gyuran gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i
gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di begyis nas//sems rtsa gcig tu sangs rgyus rnams mig sngara mngon sum du bzhugs pa yid la bgyis te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la dus drug
tu 'thol bshags bgyisan/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par
'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya na 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcang
bar bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas bas ga yon ba'amathe bong 'u tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag pa g.yas pa'i chang pa'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas/
sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzubamon yin tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ o ku phyiku tsa/ ku tsam ra/ tsar tsar/ tsar le swA hA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam
gyis mi khyab pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di brgyas te sngags 'di lan re bzlas shang/ snying khar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad
tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du 'gog cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'du bgyis nas sngags
'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong par ma 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe g.yar laman rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis
ga par 'gyur/ g.yar 'aman de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/
tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ wa rnams kyang rtag tu 'bar mchasi nas rim gro bgyud cing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas
lha dang/ klu dang/ 'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgyan 'di lags te/ 'grong nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sdur sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil
du bkug nas/ sor mo ban de'u tshur bcangs te snying khar gzhag go/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas
mdzub mo phan tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags na 'di lta ste/ na mo nAli kat+tA/ na ma Ar+ya sha pa ta swA hA/ nam Ar+yasha la swA hA/ e hi e hisA hA/ rigs
[t ]kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang phyag rgya 'di lenatam/ 'dzin tem/ klog gam/ 'don par bgyidan/ myur du tshe rabs bdun tshunachad kyi
sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas 'an par ma 'gyur/ dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par ma 'gyur/
rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba ma 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid
na 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rige sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas/ rig sngags 'donab nyan par bgyid do// gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
la la zhag 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab sta/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdudade/ mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshang bar
bgyis nas de'i mgul du btag na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so// gal te yul gang du ltas ngan pa dang rims nad byung ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/ rgyal
po'i kun dga' ra ba dang rdzing dag tu pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad+ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas par bslogs na/ ramis nad rab
tu zha bar 'gyur lags so/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyan 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas
nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i bu nga mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum na brgyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i stong du gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i
rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa 'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i stang du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag
rgya 'ad bgyis nas lus po che'i sdugs lan tri shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smyo nAlam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing/ sdug bsngal rnams
kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dengosasdig thun
sum tshogs par bgyis pas// 'dzam bu'i gling ga sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cud rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab de ra ra 'ang bskal pa re re mngon par byung bar gyur na/ gang

phrag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskul pa'i grangs de nyid kyi bar du sams na dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan du 'byung ba dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na'ang/
00/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu lon dag gis 'di bsu ba dang bcas pa bsku gzugs kyi smyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshes bcolnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum na phyag rgya mdud nas/ rig
sngags stong rtsa brgyadatsang bur bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad 'byangobar 'gyur/ gal te 'byang bar ma 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu 'a gnas ma mchis lags
so de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'ad lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste
sngagasug pa g.yon pas rkang pa g.yon pa'i mtho bo nga la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ deb rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag par gyi stong du btsar
nas lus po cha'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis na/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi'atshal na'ang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// sngags 'don pa 'tsho sgra
'byung bar ma pagyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag spyan 'ad legs te/ snga'asug pa lag pa g.yon pa 'amathebasamathe'u chud
gsin mo'i steng du reg par brgyago/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i ng de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yin par bslangs te/ lag ngar gyi tshigs
u// sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ lus po tsho'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'donapar bgyidan/ drang srong 'khur te 'chi ba dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang dumatshibar
'gyur lags so// dal byung chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig spyan 'dren ba'i phyag rgyani 'di lags te/ sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/ lag ngar gyi tshigs
sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis n ban tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni bad ltas o sa ru la ti li/lo ka ba de ya (sarbaya dru/ bram dzan ka raya/ bu ru swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skud
sa bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ tshangs pa chen po dang/ lha dang/ gludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i
'jig rtenaThams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs/
zapa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so///zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba
ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab po//
